vi vāṃ yantu hṛdayāni vi cittāni manāṃsi ca | atho yat tanvoḥ saṃgataṃ tad vām astu vidūrakam ||
asti vai vāṃ vidvikam ubhau śayane antarā | viṣvañcau pary ā vartethāṃ yathā vāṃ na sahāsati ||
trayaḥ poṣās trivṛtaḥ śrayantām anaktu pūṣā payasā ghṛtena | annasya bhūmā puruṣasya bhūmā bhūmā paśūnāṃ ta iha śrayantām ||
imam ādityā vasunā sam ukṣata- -imam agne vardhaya vāvṛdhānaḥ | asmintrivṛcchrayatāṃpoṣayiṣṇur imam indra saṃ sṛja vīryeṇa ||
bhūmiṣ ṭvā pātu haritena viśvabhṛd agniḥ pipartvayasāsajoṣāḥ| vīrudbhis te arjunaṃ saṃvidānaṃ varco dadhātu sumanasyamānam ||
tredhā jātaṃ janmanedaṃ hiraṇyam agner ekaṃ priyatamaṃ babhūva | somasyaikaṃ hiṃsitasya parāpatad apām ekaṃ vedhaso reta āhus tat te hiraṇyaṃtrivṛdastv āyuṣe ||
tryāyuṣaṃ jamadagneḥ kaśyapasya tryāyuṣam | tredhāmṛtasya cakṣaṇaṃ trīṇy āyūṃṣi nas kṛdhi ||
trayaḥ suparṇās trivṛtā yad āyann ekākṣaram abhisaṃbhūya śakrāḥ | pratyauhanmṛtyum amṛtena sākam antardadhānā bhuvanāni viśvā ||
divas tvā pātu haritaṃ madhyāt tvā pātv arjunam | bhūmyā ayasmayaṃ pātu prāgād devapurā ayam ||
imās tisro devapurās tās tvā rakṣantu sarvataḥ | tās tvaṃ bibhrad āyuṣmān varcasvān uttaro dviṣato bhava ||
puraṃ devānām amṛtaṃ hiraṇyaṃ yaābedhe prathamo devo agre | tasmai namo daśa prācīḥ kṛṇomy anu manyatāṃ trivṛtā vadhena ||
nava prāṇān navabhiḥ saṃ mimīte dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya | harite trīṇi rajate trīṇy ayasi trīṇitapasāviṣṭitāni||
ā te cṛtatv aryamā- -ā pūṣā bṛhaspatiḥ | aharjātasya yan nāma tena te 'ti cṛtāmasi ||
ṛtubhiṣ ṭvārtavair ity ekā ||PS 1.54.5 is repeated
yajñaṃ yantaṃ tapasā bṛhantam anv ā rohāmi manasā sayoniḥ | upahūtāagnejarasaḥ parastāt tṛtīye nāke sadhamādaṃ madema ||
taṃ prajānan prati gṛhṇātu vidvān prajāpatiḥ prathamajā ṛtasya | asmābhir dattaṃ jarasaḥparastād acchinnaṃ tantum anu saṃ carema ||
śyenaḥ suparṇo divyo nṛcakṣāḥ sahasrapāc chatayonir vayodhāḥ | sa no ni yaṃsad vasu yat parābhṛtam asmākam astu pitṛṣu svadhāvat ||
etaṃ sadhasthāḥ parivodadāmi yam āvahāc chevadhiṃ jātavedāḥ | anvāgantā yajamānaḥ svasti taṃ sma jānīta parame vyoman ||
jānīta smainaṃ parame vyoman devāḥ sadhasthā vida lokam etam | iṣṭāpūrtam anu saṃ krāma vidvān yatra te dattaṃ bahudhā vibandhuṣu ||
yebhiḥ pāśair abhidadhāsi druhvaṇaḥ samāmino anṛtaṃ ye samāmire | tāṃs te vi ṣyāmy āyuṣe balāya- -anamīvaṃ pitum addhi prasūtaḥ ||
anāgā babhro ayam astu vīro druhaḥ pāśebhyaḥ pari pāhy enam | rājan pravidvān pra mumugdhi pāśān yasmai carāmi haviṣā ghṛtena ||
kaśyapa indrāya haviṣā cacāra haritvatīṣu maghavā maghone | paspāraviśvā bhuvanasya gopā antarikṣasya mahato vimāne ||
apūpaṃ nābhilaṃ te ghṛtaścutaṃ nadīnāṃ pade suśrutaṃ juhomi | pravidvān rājan pra mumugdhi pāśān anyasyapatnī vidhavā yathāsat ||
anātureṇa varuṇaḥ pathemaṃ svastibhir ati durgāṇi neṣat | tam aśvinā pratigṛhyā svastaye doṣā enam uṣase saṃ pra yacchāt ||
ye piśācā imāṃ vittim ākūtiṃ mohayanti naḥ | teṣāṃ tvam agne nāśaya varcaś cittam atho prajām ||
nāśayāgne piśācānāṃ varcaś cittam atho prajām | athāśāṃ mahyaṃ rādhaya yathāhaṃ kāmaye tathā ||
āśāṃ mahyaṃrādhayitvā- -indriyeṇa yathāmṛtām | tvam agne kravyādaḥ sarvān piśācām̐ arciṣā daha ||
prati daha yātudhānān mūradevānvicarṣaṇe | ye no durasyā dveṣeṇa- -athāśāṃ mohayanti naḥ ||
ye naḥ paśuṣu dipsanty āśāyāṃ puruṣeṣu ca | tāṃs tvaṃ sahasrākṣeśānaḥ piśācām̐ arciṣā daha ||
sahasvedaṃ sahamāne atho devi sarasvati | athedam aśvinā lakṣma rohitaṃ kṛṇutaṃ yuvam ||
āsurasya mukhasyāgne lakṣmamukhaṃ nāmāsi | metojyāyobhūr ita it kanīyo 'so naśyetaḥparomā tvāhiṃsiṣam||
yāsāṃ pitā parjanyo bhūmir mātā babhūva | hvayāmi sarvā oṣadhīr gojātāḥ somajinvatāḥ ||
idaṃ saptaprakhe tvaṃ kilāsaṃ nāśayā tvacaḥ | niṣkṛtir nāma vā asi sedaṃ niṣ kṛdhi bhadrayā ||
niṣkṛtir nāma te mātā niṣkṛtir nāma te pitā | uto tvam asi niṣkṛtiḥ sedaṃ niṣ kṛdhi bhadrayā ||
aurdhvanabhasaḥ prathamaḥ sūryacetā uśadbhyaḥ | cakāra kṛtyām āsuraḥ sā no bhavatu bhadrayā ||
ya imāṃ kṛtyām upajahrur ye vā cakamire ?kṣitam | devānāṃ sarveṣāṃ svasā tān devī nirṛtir hanat ||
kaśyapasya pratisaro dyauṣ pitā pṛthivī mātā | yathābhicakra devās tathāpi kṛṇutā punaḥ ||
yāḥ kṛtyā nīlavatīr yāḥ kṛtyāḥ pāśyāvatīḥ | kṛtyā yāścakrurlohinīs tā ito nāśayāmasi ||
yadi vā idam ājahrur ime bhadrā asann iti | kṛtyāsi kalyāṇy asi sāmuṃ kartāram anv ihi ||

bṛhatte varcaḥ prathatām upa dyāṃ mitrebhya edhi surabhiḥ suvarcāḥ | adhi te rājā varuṇo bravītu tasmā u tvaṃ haviṣā bhāgadhā asaḥ | śataṃ hemantān damayā sapatnān viśas tvā sarvā anu guṅgavo bhavantu ||
yas tvotpipānaṃ pratyutpipāti yas tvā sajāto viriphāty antitaḥ | indras taṃ yoktreadhameyunaktuBhatt. adhi me tasmai (…) ||see 1def
yas tvā yacchantaṃ pratiyaṃyamīti yas tvā jigīṣāt pṛtanāḥ samarye | bṛhaspatis tam avajaṅghanītu tasmai (…) ||see 1def
ye te śulkamāharānya u te baliṃBhatt. āharāṃ somaḥ sajātān upa saṃ namāti te | agniḥsayugvānadhi te bravītu tasmai (…) ||see 1def

variṣṭhaidhipuruḥ prajayā suvīro abhi prayuṅkṣvadamayā sapatnān | indro marutvān adhi te bravītu tasmā u tvaṃ haviṣā bhāgadhā asaḥ | śataṃ hemantān damayā sapatnān viśas tvā sarvā anu guṅgavo bhavantu ||
bhagāya rājñe prathamaṃ juhomi viśve devā uttare mādayantām | uśanpatnībhya uśatībhya ābhyaḥ patimagnaā vaha rātahavyaḥ ||
patiṃ vṛṇīṣva haviṣā gṛṇānā tam ā vahāt savitā taṃ te agniḥ | tasmai namasva śataśāradāya bhagabhaktā bhagavatī suvīrā ||
yam aryaman patim asyai dideśitha jane cit santaṃ tam ihā vahāsi | sumaṅgaly apatighnī suśevā rāyaspoṣeṇa tam iṣā sacasva ||
yaṃ te patim aryamā jāyamānāyai dhātā cakalpa tam ihā vahāsi | abhivareṇa haviṣā juhomi prajānann aitu sumanasyamānaḥ ||
patiṃ te dyāvāpṛthivī adhātāṃ patiṃ mitrāvaruṇā vāto agniḥ | sapta rṣayo 'ditiḥ soma indras te tvā devāḥpativatnīṃkṛṇvantu ||
yas tvārāyaḥ praviveśa- -ajānir janivām̐ uta | atho yas tanvaṃ pasparśa tam ito nir ṇayāmasi ||
niṣ ṭvārāya nayāmasi ya imāṃ praviveśitha | ātmānam asyā mā hiṃsīr anyatra cara meha bhūḥ ||
yad arāyemām upāyasi dhehy asyai rayipoṣaṇam | prajāṃ cid asyā mā hiṃsīr anyatra cara meha bhūḥ ||
yad arāyehāyasi hanāma vīrudhā tvā | atho khanitrimais tvā- -ād vṛṣeṇa yathābhagam ||
yadarāyāsūyaṃ straiṣūyam āvatokyam | yat paitṛṣadyaṃ daurbhāgyaṃ tad ito nir ṇayāmasi ||
yat te sūrya divi deveṣu varcas tasya no dhehi tvam asi pracetāḥ | ahaṃ tvad ugras tviṣitas tviṣīmān imāṃ vācaṃ vi sākṣīya ||
vātaḥ purastāt pavase nabhasvān | namas te vidma te nāmadheyaṃ mā no hiṃsīḥ ||
tapojāamūrodakṣiṇataḥ pavase nabhasvān |Bhatt. asuro;amūrosee Griffiths 2009, 34 namas te vidma te nāmadheyaṃ mā no hiṃsīḥ ||refrain written in K
viśvāyur viśvajanīnaḥ pratīcyā diśaḥ pavase nabhasvān | namas te vidma te nāmadheyaṃ mā no hiṃsīḥ ||refrain written in K
śivo vaiśvadeva udīcyā diśaḥ pavase nabhasvān | namas te vidma te nāmadheyaṃ mā no hiṃsīḥ ||refrain written in K
atiṣṭhāvān bārhaspatya ūrdhvāyā diśaḥ pavase nabhasvān | namas te vidma te nāmadheyaṃ mā no hiṃsīḥ ||
apādyaudapātatanad apaskandyavadhed ahim | kalyāṇyā yathāsmitaṃ śam u naḥ santu vidyutaḥ ||
yat parjanya stanayati sarvaṃ saṃvijate jagat | patiṃ tad ṛtviyāvatī pṛthivī prati modate ||
eṣa enāabhyakrandīd vṛṣāśvo dhenukā iva | ahīṃs tvaṃ vidyutā jahi māsmākaṃ puruṣān vadhīḥ ||
abhikrandātstanayitnor avasphūrjād aśanyā uta | devā maruto mṛḍata naḥ pātu no duritād avadyāt ||
ṛjīte pari ṇo nama- -ādityāḥ śarma yacchata | yuyutaparṇinaṃ śaram utāparṇaṃ riśādasaḥ ||
kṛtavyadhani vidhya taṃ yaś cakāra tam ij jahi | na tvām acakruṣe vayaṃ vadhāya saṃśiśīmahe||
yathā te devy oṣadhe pratīcīnaṃ phalaṃ kṛtam | evā tvaṃ kṛtvane kṛtyāṃ hastagṛhya parā ṇaya ||
punaḥ kṛtyāṃ kṛtyākṛteread kṛtyākṛtyākṛtaṃ(?) godhevāvaṭamanvayat | saktur iva saktupreṣyaṃ pratīcī pratidadhvasat||
yāṃ te cakrur vartaneṣu vārtākuṣu vṛtāsu ca | maṇḍūke kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakrus tayā kṛtyākṛto jahi ||
agnir ivaitu pratikūlam anukūlam ivodakam | sukhe ratha iva vartatāṃ kṛtyā kṛtyākṛtaṃ kṛtā ||
agnir dyumnena sūryo jyotiṣā dyaurmahimnāntarikṣaṃvyacasā | diśa āśābhiḥ pṛthivī payobhir idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ vardhayantu prajāvat ||
tvaṣṭā rūpeṇa savitā savena- -ahar mitreṇa varuṇena rātrī | pūṣā puṣṭair bhago aṃśena bhaktyā- -idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ vardhayantu prajāvat ||
yāṃ viśvakarmā nijaghāna methim antarā dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe | tasyā āhuḥ kṣatriyaṃ garbham etaṃ pari māva patthā mūrdhani dhārayasva ||
chandāṃsy asyā abhito mayūkhā stomā ātmā yajur asyāḥ purīṣam | tasyā āhuḥ kṣatriyaṃ nirmitaṃ pari māva patthā mūrdhani dhārayasva ||
parā ṇudasva vyathayābhimātim adhaspadaṃ kṛṇuṣva durdharāyataḥ | mā tvā dabhan sapatnā dipsantas tava rāṣṭram uttamaṃ dyumnam astu ||
idaṃ tan mitrāvaruṇā havir vāṃ yenāgre devā amṛtatvam āyan | tenāsmaikṣatram adhi dhārayaujo 'sapatnāḥ pradiśaḥ santv asmai ||
ghṛtasya dhārā mitrāvaruṇā duhāṃ vāṃ dhenuranapasphurantī| devaḥ savitota vāyur agnir bhūtasya patir iha śarma yacchāt ||
śaṃ nas tan mitrāvaruṇā gṛṇītaṃ tṛḍhāamitrā bahudhā vi śerām | jayatu senopa ghoṣa etu pṛthak satvāno bahudhā bharantām ||
hanāma mitrāvaruṇāvamitrān bhavāma bhadre sukṛtasya loke | pārayān naḥ savitā devo agnir jayāmedaṃ haviṣā kaśyapasya ||
vāto yaṃ mitrāvaruṇā tad āha viśvantaraṃ nirmitaṃ kaśyapasya | adhvaryavo maruto yasyāsan tena devebhyo varimāṇi cakruḥ ||
acikradat svapā iha bhavad agneyajasvarodasī urūcī | āmuṃ nayanamasārātahavyo yuñjantu suprajasaṃ pañca janāḥ ||
dūre cit santam aruṣāsa indram ā cyāvayantu sakhyāya vipram | yad gāyatrīṃ bṛhatīm arkam asmai sautrāmaṇyādadhṛṣan ?tu devāḥ ||
adbhyas tvā rājā varuṇo juhāva somas tvāyaṃ hvayatu parvatebhyaḥ | indras tvāyaṃ hvayatu viḍbhya ābhyaḥ śyeno bhūtvā viśa ā patemāḥ ||
śyenaṃ havir nayatv ā parasmād anyakṣetre aparuddhaṃ carantam | aśvinā panthāṃ kṛṇutāṃ sugaṃ te garbhaṃ sajātā abhi saṃ viśadhvam ||
śyenaṃ haviḥ kaśyapasyopa śikṣa- -indraṃ vātaḥ prahito dūta ā vaha | viṣahya śatrūnsenāgrair viśo vṛṇāno 'va gaccha kāmī ||
yas te havaṃ paritiṣṭhāt sajāta uta niṣṭiyaḥ | apāca indra tān nītvā-Bhatt. tāṃ -athemam ava gamaya ||
hvayantu tvā pañca janāḥ patiṃmitrāavṛṣata|mss. patimitrā; emend. Barretprati indrāgnī viśve devā viśi kṣemam adīdharan ||
prajāpatir anavartiḥ sa prajābhir anavartiḥ | sa mānavartir anavartiṃ kṛṇotu ||
indro 'navartiḥ sa vīryeṇānavartiḥ | (…) ||see 1c
somo 'navartiḥ sa oṣadhībhir anavartiḥ | sa mānavartir anavartiṃ kṛṇotu ||
āpo 'navartayas tāḥ parjanyenānavartayaḥ | tā mānavartayo 'navartiṃ kṛṇvantu ||
devāanavartayaste 'mṛtenānavartayaḥ | te mānavartayo 'navartiṃ kṛṇvantu ||
payo mahyam oṣadhayaḥ payo me vīrudho dadhan | apāṃ payasvad yat payas tan me varṣantu vṛṣṭayaḥ ||
payo mahyaṃ payasvanto hastino me payo dadhan | payaḥ patatriṇo mahyam aiṇeyāme payo dadhan ||
payasvan me kṣetram astu payasvad uta dhānyam | ahaṃ payasvān bhūyāsaṃ gāvo ma uta payasvatīḥ ||
payo mahyam apsaraso gandharvā me payo dadhan | payo me viśvā bhūtāni vāto dadhātu me payaḥ ||
payo mahyaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ payo dadhat | payo ma indraś cāgniś ca dhātā dadhātu me payaḥ ||
ahaṃ bibharmi te mano ahaṃ cittam ahaṃ vratam | mamed api kratāv aso mama citte sacāvahai ||
āmanā asa ihamanā asa iha te ramatāṃ manaḥ | mayi te ramatāṃ manaḥ ||
āñjanasya madhughasya kuṣṭhasya naladasya ca | vīrodekasya mūlena mukhe nimandanaṃ kṛtam ||
madhu me antar āsye mukhe nimandanaṃ kṛtam | tatro tvaṃ vi vartasva narācīva vartasi ||
yathā nemī rathacakraṃ samantaṃ pariṣasvaje | evā pari ṣvajasva mā yathāsan mayi te manaḥ ||
yathedam aśvinā tṛṇaṃ vāto vahati bhūmyāḥ | evā vayaṃ vahāmasi yāṃ vayaṃ kāmayāmahe ||
uttvā mātā sthāpayatu pra tvā nudatām aśvinā | adhāśiśuriva mātaraṃ mām evānv etu te manaḥ ||
yathā kṣīraṃ ca sarpiś ca manuṣyāṇāṃ hṛdaḥ priyam | evāham asyā nāryā hṛdo bhūyāsam uttaraḥ ||
agneṣ ṭvā tapas tapatu vātasya dhrājiḥ | mā spṛkṣathā niṣadanāya sādhava ut tiṣṭha prehy agnivat te kṛṇomi ||
sūryasya tvā tapas tapatu vātasya dhrājiḥ | mā spṛkṣathā niṣadanāya sādhava ut tiṣṭha prehi sūryavat te kṛṇomi ||
hiraṇyapuṣpī subhagā kūpaś cāyaṃ sumaṅgalaḥ | tāv enāṃ bhadrayā dhattām amṛtāv amṛte bhage ||
hiraṇyaṃ pṛḍvad dharitaṃ tat te aṅgeṣu rohatu | tenemām aśvinā nārīṃ bhagenābhi ṣiñcatam ||
yathā kūpamudahṛtas tṛṣyantoyanti kāminaḥ | evā tvā sarve devaraḥ patayo yantu kāminaḥ ||
hiraṇyākṣi madhuvarṇe hiraṇyaparicartane| aṅkohiraṇyayas tava tenāsyai patim ā vaha ||
yadi vāsi tirojanaṃ yadi vā nadyas tiraḥ | iyaṃ tvā mahyam oṣadhir aṅkenevany ā nayāt ||
punaḥ prāṇaṃ punar apānam asmai punar vyānam uta soma dhehi | ātmāyaṃ cakṣur ?udate samānas tam ū nu pāhi tam ū nujinvajāgṛhi ||
tvaṣṭā rūpeṇa savitā savena- -ahar mitreṇa varuṇena rātrī | indro jyaiṣṭhyena brahmaṇāyaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ pūṣāsmai punar asuṃ dadhātu ||
ya ādityā vasavo ye ca rudrā viśve devā aditir yā ca rātrī | yajño bhagaḥ savitā ye ca devā yamo 'smai punar asuṃ dadhātu ||
punas te rājā varuṇo dadātu somo rājāsum it te punar dāt | indro marudbhir aśvinā te bhiṣajyatām agnī rudro 'sum it te punar dāt ||
punar dyaur devī punar antarikṣam agnir vātaḥ pavamāno bhiṣajyatu | grāhyāḥ pāśān nirṛtyāḥ pāśān mṛtyoḥ pāśād vāk tvā devī punar dadātu ||
idaṃ cakṣurṛtāvarī mā mā hāsīt purāyuṣaḥ | yad vāṃ tamo yadripiśam apa vāṃ tan ni dadhmasi ||
yad andhiyaṃ yad algaṇaṃ yo 'rmo adhirohati | ayasmayas tad aṅkuśo akṣṇo'rmam apalumpatu||
yamahyājimajayan nṛcakṣāBhatt. ajayaṃ yaṃ vā śyenaḥ śakunir yaṃ suparṇaḥ | yad āhuś cakṣur aditer anantaṃ somo nṛcakṣā mayi tad dadhātu ||
yathā cakṣuḥ suparṇasya yathāśvasya yathā śunaḥ | evā me aśvinā cakṣuḥ kṛṇutaṃ puṣkarasrajā ||
yasyāḥ suparṇaḥprapatañBhatt. prapatan cakṣuṣā cakṣur ādade | tasyāḥ samudraje tava cakṣuṣā cakṣur ā dade ||
idaṃ te śiro bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te mastiṣkaṃ ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām ||
idaṃ te hanū bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ tejihvāṃni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām ||
idaṃ te grīvā bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ teskandhānni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām ||
idaṃ te aṃsau bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te bāhū ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām ||
idaṃ te hṛdayaṃ bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te klomānaṃ ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām ||
idaṃ tepṛṣṭīrbhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ teparśūrni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām ||
idaṃ te śroṇī bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te vastraṃ ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām ||
idaṃ ta ūrū bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te jaṅghe ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām ||
idaṃ te kulphau bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te pādau ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām ||
idaṃ te tvacaṃ bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te prāṇān ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām ||
idaṃ te parūṃṣi bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ temajjñoni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām ||
nardamodalavuntaka jiṣṇo hāparājitaḥ | amuṃ bhrūṇāny arpaya svayaṃ pāśaṃ ny āyati ||
asur aitu sahakratur ātmā prāṇo atho balam | sa no dadhātu bhadrayā- -agnir viśvād vasumān svastaye ||
dakṣiṇā mā dakṣiṇato dakṣiṇā pātu savyataḥ | paścād anuvyādhāt pātu purastāt pātu dakṣiṇā ||
śatam āpo divyā mitrasya ca dakṣiṇāḥ | dhātā savitād rudras te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
śataṃ pāśā varuṇasya brahmaṇaspater u śatam | martāt pāśān no vi ṣya śatāt pāśebhyo vayaṃ tvām ||
prācīṃ diśam āsthām agnir māvatv ojase balāya diśāṃ priyo bhūyāsam | anamitrā me diśo bhavantu ghṛtapratīkāḥ ||
dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthām indro māvatv ojase balāya (…) ||see 1bcd
pratīcīṃ diśam āsthāṃ varuṇo māvatv ojase balāya (…) ||see 1bcd
udīcīṃ diśam āsthāṃ somo māvatv ojase balāya (…) ||see 1bcd
dhruvāṃ diśam āsthāṃ viṣṇur māvatv ojase balāya (…) ||see 1bcd
ūrdhvāṃ diśam āsthāṃ bṛhaspatir māvatv ojase balāya diśāṃ priyo bhūyāsam | anamitrā me diśo bhavantu ghṛtapratīkāḥ ||
manāyyaitantuṃ prathamaṃ paśced anyā atanvata | tan nārīḥ pra bravīmi vaḥ sādhvīr vaḥ santūrvarīḥ ||
sādhur vastanturbhavatu sādhuroturatho vṛtā | atho horvarīr yūyaṃ prātar voḍheva dhāvata ||
khargalā iva patvarīr apām ugram ivāyanam | patantu patvarīr iva- -urvarīḥ sādhunā pathā ||
avācyautotudyete todenāśvatarāv iva | prastomamurvarīṇāṃ śaśayānāmastāviṣam ||
nārī pañcamayūkhaṃ sūtravat kṛṇutaṃ vasu | ariṣṭo asya vastā prendra vāsa utau tira ||
śāsa itthā mahām̐ asy amitraghāto adbhutaḥ | na yasya hanyate sakhā na jīyate kadā cana ||
vi rakṣo vi mṛdho jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja | vi manyum indra vṛtrahann amitrasyābhidāsataḥ||
vi na indra vi mṛdho jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ | adhamaṃ gamayā tamo yo asmām̐ abhidāsati ||
svastidā viśāṃ patir vṛtrahā vimṛdho vaśī | vṛṣendraḥ pura etu naḥ somapā abhayaṃkaraḥ ||
apendra dviṣato mano 'pa jijyāsato vadham | vi mahac charma yaccha varīyo yāvayā vadham ||
ayaṃ yo 'titaro maṇis tenāti taraduśyasaḥ| sapatnāndviṣato maṇe pra ṇudasva pṛtanyataḥ ||
pra ṇudasva pra sahasva sapatnāndviṣato maṇe | tarābhimātiṃduśyasāṃ varco bhaṅgdhipṛtanyatām||
varco jahi manyuṃ jahy ākūtiṃ dviṣatāṃ maṇe | devo yo 'titaro maṇis tenāti tara dhūrvataḥ ||
ye dhūrvanti ye druhyanti ye dviṣanti pṛtanyataḥ | sarvān sapatnāṃs temaṇirBhatt. sarvāṃ ni manyuṃ dviṣatas karat ||
tava citte tava vrate tavaivādhaspadaṃ carān | devo yo 'titaro maṇis tenāti taraduśyasaḥ||
ā te manaś cakṣuṣyam ā te hṛdayyaṃ dade | padoṣ ṭe padyam ā dade yathā tiṣṭhāsi me vaśe ||
vāñcha me pādau tanvaṃ vāñchākṣyau vāñchasakthyau| akṣyau vṛṣaṇyantyāḥ keśā oṣṭhau māṃ te kāmena śuṣyatām ||
mayi tvā doṣaṇiśliṣaṃ kṛṇomi hṛdayaśliṣam | yathā mama kratāv aso mamāsaś ced asīd api ||
yāsāṃ nābhir ārehaṇaṃ hṛdi saṃvananaṃ kṛtam | gāvo ghṛtasya mātaro amūṃ saṃ vānayantu me ||
mahyaṃ tvā dyāvāpṛthivī mahyaṃ devī sarasvatī | mahyaṃ tvendraś cāgniś ca- -ahorātre ni yacchatām ||
tūli mūly arjuni punar vo yantu yātavaḥ punar jūtiḥ kimīdinīḥ | yasya stha tam atta yo vaḥprāhaittamatta svā māṃsāny atta ||
atsyavojighatsavaḥ (…) ||see 1bcdef
aviṣyavas pāsyavaḥ (…) ||see 1bcdef
sphātihārī rasahārīḥ (…) ||see 1bcdef
vātajūte manojavaḥ punar vo yantu yātavaḥ punar jūtiḥ kimīdinīḥ | yasya stha tam atta yo vaḥ prāhait tam atta svā māṃsāny atta ||
ā tvāgan rāṣṭraṃ saha varcasod ihi prāṅ viśāṃ patir ekarāṭ tvaṃ vi rāja | sarvās tvā rājan pradiśo hvayantu- -upasadyo namasyo bhaveha ||
tvāṃ viśo vṛṇataṃ rājyāya tvām imāḥ pradiśaḥ pañca devīḥ | varṣman rāṣṭrasya kakudi śrayasva- -ato vasūni vi bhajāsy ugraḥ ||
acchatvā yantu havinaḥ sajātā agnir dūto ajiraḥ santurātiḥ | jāyāḥ putrāḥ sumanaso bhavantu bahuṃ baliṃ prati paśyāsā ugraḥ ||
aśvinā tvāgre mitrāvaruṇobhā viśve devā marutas tvā hvayantu | sajātānāṃ madhyameṣṭhā iha syāḥ sve kṣetre saviteva vi rāja ||
ā pra drava paramasyāḥ parāvataḥ śive te dyāvāpṛthivī abhūtām | tad ayaṃ rājā varuṇas tathāha sa tvāyam ahvat sa ihedam ehi ||
indrendraṃ manuṣyaḥ parehi saṃ yajñiyās tvā varuṇena saṃvidānaḥ | sa tvāyam ahvat sve sadhasthe sa devān yakṣat sa u kalpayād viśaḥ ||
pathyā revatīr bahudhā virūpāḥ sarvāḥ saṅgatya varivas te akran | tās tvā sarvāḥ saṃvidānā hvayantu daśamīm ugraḥ sumanā vaśeha ||
yad ajireṇa haviṣā- -ava tvā gamayāmasi | atrāta indraḥ kevalīr viśo balihṛtas karat ||
hariṇasyaraghuṣyado 'dhi śīrṣaṇi bheṣajam | sukṣetriyaṃ viṣāṇayād visūcīnam anīnaśat ||
anu tvā hariṇo vṛṣā padbhiś caturbhir akramīt | viṣāṇe vi ṣya guṣpitaṃ yat kiṃ ca kṣetriyaṃ hṛdi ||
ado yad avarocate catuṣpakṣam ivacchadiḥ| tena te sarvaṃ kṣetriyam aṅgebhyo nāśayāmasi ||
ud agātāṃ bhagavatī vicṛtau nāma tārake | vi kṣetriyasya muñcatām adhamaṃ pāśam uttamam ||
yadāsuteḥkriyamāṇāyāḥ kṣetriyaṃ tvā vyānaśe | vedāhaṃ tasya bheṣajaṃ kṣetriyaṃ nāśayāmi te ||
apavāse nakṣatrāṇām apavāsa utoṣasām | apāsmat sarvam āmayad apa kṣetriyam akramīt ||
āpa id vā u bheṣajīr āpo amīvacātanīḥ | āpo viśvasya bheṣajīs tās tvā muñcantu kṣetriyāt ||
pumān puṃsaḥ parijāto 'śvatthaḥ khadirād adhi | sa hantu śatrūn māmakān yāṃś cāhaṃ dveṣmi ye ca mām ||
tān aśvattha niḥ śṛṇīhi śatrūn vaibādha dodhataḥ | indreṇa vṛtraghnā mehy agninā varuṇena ca ||
yathāśvattha niḥśṛṇāsi pūrvān jātān utāparān | evā pṛtanyatas tvam abhi tiṣṭha sahasva ca ||
yathāśvatthavibhinatsy antar mahaty arṇave | evā me śatroś cittāni viṣvag bhindhi sahasva ca ||
yaḥ sahamānaś carasi sāsahāna iva rṣabhaḥ | tenāśvattha tvayā vayaṃ sapatnān sahiṣīmahi ||
sinātv enān nirṛtir mṛtyoḥ pāśair amokyaiḥ | aśvattha śatrūn māmakān yāṃś cāhaṃ dveṣmi ye ca mām ||
adharāñcaḥpra plavantāṃ chinnā naur iva bandhanāt |Bhatt. vandhanāt na nir bādha praṇuttānāṃ punar asti nivartanam ||
praiṇān nudāmi manasā pra cittena pra brahmaṇā | praiṇān vṛkṣasya śākhaya- -aśvatthasya nudāmasi ||
yad adaḥ saṃprayatīr ahāvanadatā hate | tasmād ā nadyo nāma stha tā vo nāmāni sindhavaḥ ||
yat preṣitā varuṇena- -āc chībhaṃ samavalgata | tad āpnod indro vo yatīs tasmād āpo anu ṣṭhana ||
apakāmaṃ syandamānā avīvarata vo hikam | indro vaḥ śaktibhir devīs tasmād vār ṇāma vo hikam ||
eko vo deva upātiṣṭhat syandamānā upetya | udāniṣur mahīr iti tasmād udakam ucyadhve ||
āpo devīr ghṛtam id āpa āhur agnīṣomau bibhraty āpa it tāḥ | tīvro raso madhupṛcām araṅgama ā mā prāṇena saha varcasāgan ||
ād it paśyāmy uta vā śṛṇomy ā mā ghoṣogacchativāṅ māsām | mene bhejāno amṛtasya tarhi hiraṇyavarṇā atṛpaṃ yadāpaḥ ||
agnir no dūtaḥ praty etu śatrūn pratidahann abhiśastim arātim | sa cittāni mohayatu pareṣāṃ nihastāṃś ca kṛṇavaj jātavedāḥ ||
ayam agnir amūmuhad yāni cittāni vo hṛdi | vi vo dhamātyokasaḥ pra vo dhamāti sarvataḥ ||
indra cittāni mohaya- -arvāg ākūtyā adhi | agner vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūco vi nāśaya ||
vy eṣām ākūtayaita- -atho cittānimuhyata| atho yad adyaiṣāṃ hṛdi tad eṣāṃ pari nir jahi ||
amīṣāṃ cittāni pratimohayantī gṛhāṇāṅgāny apve parehi | abhi prehi nir daha hṛtsu śokair grāhyāmitrāṃs tamasā vidhya śatrūn ||
asau yā senā marutaḥ pareṣām asmānabhy aity ojasā spardhamānā | tāṃ guhata tamasāpavratena yathaiṣām anyo anyaṃ na jānāt ||
agnir no vidvān praty etu śatrūn pratidahann abhiśastim arātim | sa senāṃ mohayatu pareṣāṃ nihastāṃś ca kṛṇavaj jātavedāḥ ||
yūyam ugrā maruta īdṛśe stha- -abhi preta mṛḍata sahadhvam | amīmṛḍan vasavo nāthitebhyo +'gnir hy eṣāṃ vidvān praty etu śatrūn ||
amitrasenāṃ maghavann asmāñ chatrūyatām abhi | yuvaṃ tān indra vṛtrahann agniś ca dahataṃ prati ||
prasūta indraḥ pravatā haribhyāṃ pra te vajraḥ pra mṛṇann etu śatrūn | jahi pratīcoanūcaḥparāco viśvaṃ hi riṣṭaṃ kṛṇuhi satyam eṣām ||
senāmohanaṃ kṛṇv indrāmitrebhyas tvam | agner vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūco vi nāśaya ||
indraḥ senāṃ mohayatu maruto ghnantv ojasā | cakṣūṃṣy agnir ā dattāṃ punar etu parājitām ||
ekaśataṃ viṣkandhāni viṣṭhitā pṛthivīm anu | teṣāṃ tu sarveṣām idam astu viṣkandhadūṣaṇam ||
karṣaphasya viśaphasya dyauṣpitā pṛthivī mātā | yathābhicakra devās tathāpi kṛṇutā punaḥ ||
aśleṣmāṇo adhārayan tathā tan manunā kṛtam | kṛṇomi vadhri viṣkandhaṃ muṣkābarho gavām iva ||
sūtre piśaṅge khṛgalaṃ yad ābadhnanti vedhasaḥ | śravasyaṃ śuṣmaṃ kābavaṃ vadhriṃ kṛṇvantu bandhuraḥ ||
yenā śravasyo caratha devā ivāsuramāyayā | śunāṃ kapir iva dūṣaṇo bandhurā kābavasya ca ||
duṣṭyai hi tvā bhantsyāmi dūṣayitvā kābavam | ud āśavo rathā iva śapathebhiḥ sariṣyatha ||
yamasya lokād adhy ā babhūvitha pramadā martān pra yunakṣudhīraḥ | ekākinā sarathaṃ yāsi vidvān svapna mimāno asurasya yonau ||
bambas tvāgre viśvavayāpaśyat purā rātryā janitor eke ahni | tataḥ svapnedam adhy ā babhūvitha viṣvaṅvarūpam apagūhamānaḥ ||
bṛhan grāvāsurebhyo 'dhi devān upāvavarta mahimānam icchan | tasmai svapnāya dadhur ādhipatyaṃ trayastriṃśāsaḥ svar ānaśānāḥ ||
naitāṃ viduḥ pitaro nota devā yaiṣā jalpiś caraty antaredam | trite svapnam adadhur āptye nara ādityāso varuṇenānuśiṣṭāḥ ||
vy asya krūram abhi yantu duṣkṛto 'svapnena sukṛtaḥ puṇyam āyuḥ | svar madasi parameṇa bandhunā tapyamānasya manaso 'dhi jajñiṣe ||
vidma te sarvāḥ parijāḥ purastād vidma svapna yo adhipā iho te | yaśasvino no yaśaseha pāhy ārāddviṣebhir apa yāhi dūram ||
ambāḥ sumukhāḥ sṛjata padvat sṛjata satyajñeyam | sṛjāmy ahaṃ dūtān asmai viṣāya hantave | vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam āheyam arasaṃ viṣaṃ nirviṣam ||
indram aham iha huve somapām ubhayāvinam asmai viṣāya hantave | vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam āheyam arasaṃ viṣaṃ nirviṣam ||
varuṇam aham iha huva ugraṃ rājanyaiḥ saha- -asmai viṣāya hantave | vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam āheyam arasaṃ viṣaṃ nirviṣam ||
aditim aham iha huve sūraputrāṃ kanīnikām asmai viṣāya hantave | vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam āheyam arasaṃ viṣaṃ nirviṣam ||
bṛhaspatim aham iha huve yo devānāṃ purohito 'smai viṣāya hantave | vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam āheyam arasaṃ viṣaṃ nirviṣam ||
āṇāścāṇāś caṇḍāmarkā asmai viṣāya hantave | vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam āheyam arasaṃ viṣaṃ nirviṣam ||
navānāṃ navatīnāṃ viṣasya ropuṣīṇām | sarvāsām agrabhaṃ nāma vītāpetārasaṃ viṣam ||
mṛtyur eko yama ekaḥ śarva ekaḥ śarur bhavaḥ | te naḥ kṛṇvantu bheṣajaṃ devasenābhyas pari ||
punar no yamaḥ pitṛbhir dadātu punar mitrāvaruṇā vāto agniḥ | aghamāro aghaśaṃsaḥ punar dāt punar no devī nirṛtir dadātu ||
yā devaiḥ prahiteṣuḥ patāt tapase vā mahasevāvasṛṣṭā| somas tvām asmad yāvayatu vidvān pitaro vā devahutā nṛcakṣasaḥ ||
sahasrākṣo amartyaḥ pururūpa ihāvatu | sakhyetaugra māriṣaṃ sahaguḥ sahapūruṣaḥ ||
yas te manyuḥ sahasrākṣa viṣeṇa pariṣicyate | tena tvam asmabhyaṃ mṛḍa śivo naḥ śambhur ā cara ||
mā te mayau sahasrākṣa bhāme bhūn māmakaṃ jagat | yo no dveṣṭi taṃ gaccha yaṃ dviṣmas taṃ jahi ||
ye sthāsyāṃ prācyāṃ diśi hetayo nāma devās teṣāṃ vo agnir iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā ||
ye sthāsyāṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśy aviṣyavo nāma devās teṣaṃ va āpa iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā ||
ye sthāsyāṃ pratīcyāṃ diśi virājo nāma devās teṣaṃ vaḥ kāma iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā ||
ye sthāsyām udīcyāṃ diśi pravidhyanto nāma devās teṣaṃ vo vāta iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā ||
ye sthāsyāṃ dhruvāyāṃ diśi vilimpā nāma devās teṣaṃ vo 'nnam iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā ||
ye sthāsyām ūrdhvāyāṃ diśy aviṣyanto nāma devās teṣaṃ vo varṣam iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā ||
yo apsv antar yo vṛtre antar yaḥ puruṣe yo aśmani | ya āviveśauṣadhīr yo vanaspatīṃs tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat ||
yaḥ some antar ya u goṣv antar ya āviṣṭo vayasi yo mṛgeṣu | ya āviveśa dvipado yaś catuṣpadas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat ||
ya indreṇa sarathaṃ saṃbabhūva vaiśvānara uta viśvadāvyaḥ | yaṃ johavīmi pṛtanāsuṣāsahiṃ tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat ||
yo devo viśvād yam u kāmam āhur yaṃ dātāraṃ pratigṛhṇantam āhuḥ | yo dhīraḥ śakraḥ paribhūr adābhyas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat ||
yaṃ tvā hotāraṃ manasābhisaṃvidus trayodaśa bhauvanāḥ pañca mānavāḥ | varcodhase yaśase sūnṛtāvate tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat ||
ukṣānnāya vaśānnāya somapṛṣṭhāya vedhase | vaiśvānarasya jyeṣṭhebhyas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat ||
divaṃ pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ ye vidyutam anusaṃcaranti | ye dikṣv antar ya u vāte antas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat ||
bṛhaspatiṃ varuṇaṃ mitram agniṃ hiraṇyapāṇiṃ savitāram indram | viśvān devān aṅgiraso havāmahaBhatt. -mahe with underlining imaṃ kravyādaṃ śamayantv agnim ||
śānto agniḥ kravyād atho puruṣareṣaṇaḥ | atho yo viśvadāvyas taṃ kravyādam aśīśamam ||
āyam agan parṇamaṇir balī balena pramṛṇan sapatnān | ojo devānāṃ paya oṣadhīnāṃ mayi rāṣṭraṃ jinvatv aprayucchan ||
mayi rāṣṭraṃ parṇamaṇe mayi dhārayā śriyam | ahaṃ rāṣṭrasyābhīvarge yujā bhūyāsam uttaraḥ ||
yaṃ nidadhur vanaspatau vājaṃdevāḥ priyaṃ nidhim | taṃ ma indraḥ sahāyuṣā maṇiṃ dadhātu bhartave ||
somasya parṇaḥ saha ugram āgann indreṇa datto varuṇena sakhyā | tam ahaṃ bibharmi bahu rocamāno dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya ||
ā mā rukṣat parṇamaṇir mahyā ariṣṭatātaye | yathāham uttaro 'sāni mānuṣyā adhi sampadaḥ ||
punar maitv indriyaṃ punar ātmā draviṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ca | punar agnayodhiṣṇyāso yathāsthāma kalpayantām ihaiva ||
ye takṣāṇo rathakārāḥ karmārā ye manīṣiṇaḥ | sarvāṃs tān parṇa randhaya- -upastiṃ kṛṇu me janam ||
upastir astu vaiśya uta śūdra utāryaḥ | sarvāṃs tān parṇa randhaya- -upastiṃ kṛṇu me janam ||
yena vehad babhūvitha nāśayāmasi tad vayam | idaṃ tad anyatra tvad apa dūre ni dadhmasi ||
ā te garbho yonim etu pumān vāṇa iveṣudhim | ā vīro 'tra jāyatāṃ putras te daśamāsyaḥ ||
pumāṃsaṃ putraṃ janaya taṃ pumān anu jāyatām | bhavāsi putrāṇāṃ mātā jātānāṃ janayāsi ca ||
yāni bhadrāṇi bījāny ṛṣabhā janayanti | tais tvaṃ putraṃ vindasva sā prasūr dhenukā bhava ||
kṛṇomi te prajāpatyam ā garbho yonim etu te | vindasva putraṃnāri yas tubhyaṃśamasac cham u tasmai tvaṃ bhava ||Bhatt. bhavā
yāsāṃ pitā parjanyo bhūmir mātā babhūva | tās tvā putravidyāya devīḥ prāvantv oṣadhīḥ ||
yas te yonim udiṅgayād ṛṣabho retasā saha | sa ta ā siñcatu prajāṃ dīrghāyuṃ śataśāradām ||
yāṃ tvā vātovarayad ārdranābhā maharṣabhaḥ | tasyās te viśvadhāyaso viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare ||
yāṃ tvā varāho akhanad ekasminn adhi puṣkare | tasyās te viśvadhāyaso viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare ||
yāṃ tvāditir avapad bījavāpam adhi puṣkare | tasyās te viśvadhāyaso viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare ||
yasyāḥ kulāyaṃ salile antar mahaty arṇave | tasyās te viśvadhāyaso viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare ||
ut te bhara uttamāyā adhamāyās ta ud bhare | un madhyamān madhyame tad viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare ||
agrabhaṃ sam agrabham ubhāvantau sam agrabham | divaś ca pṛthivyāś ca viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare ||
nābhūd ahir bhrūṇam ārad ahir adrim arasāvadhīt | viṣasya brahmaṇāmāsīt tato jīvan na mokṣase ||mokṣyase
uṣṭo 'hiḥ samuṣṭo *'hirBhatt. samuṣṭo hi nirdhīto arasaḥ kṛtaḥ | viṣasya brahmaṇāmāsīt tato jīvan na mokṣase ||
punar dadāmi te viṣaṃ pūrvapadyam id āritha | māṃ dadaśvān manyase mayā daṣṭo na mokṣase ||
ekaśataṃ bheṣajāni teṣāṃ mātāsy oṣadhe | samudram ava gacchasi pṛthivyām adhi niṣṭhitā ||
tasyāṃ vedādhi bheṣajaṃ daśaśīrṣo daśajihvaḥ | yas te prathama ādade śaṃ śvāvanta oṣadhe yam adād vīrayug bhiṣak ||
punaś cakṣuḥ punaḥ prāṇaḥ punar āyur na āgamat | niṣ ṭvākaraṃ niṣkṛtyā niṣ ṭvā niṣkṛtyākaram ||
muñcāmi tvā śapathyād atho varuṇyād uta | atho yamasya paḍvīśād viśvasmād devakilbiṣāt ||
saṃ te śīrṣṇaḥ kapālāni hṛdayasya ca yo viduḥ | udyan sūrya ādityo aṅgadyotam anīnaśat ||
himavataḥ pra sravatha sindhau samaha saṅgamaḥ | tā āpaḥ sarvāḥ saṅgatya cakṣuḥ prāṇaṃ ca dhatta naḥ ||
hastivarcasaṃprathatāṃbṛhad yaśo adityā yat tanvaḥ saṃbabhūva | tat sarve savitur mahyam etad viśve devāso aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ ||
mitraś ca varuṇaś ca- -indro rudraś ca vedhatu | devāso viśvadhāyasas tenamāñjantuvarcasā ||
yat te varco jātavedo bṛhad bhavaty āhute | tena mām adya varcasā agne varcasvinaṃ kṛdhi ||
yena hastī varcasā saṃbabhūva yena rājā manuṣyeṣv antaḥ | yena devā jyotiṣā dyām udāyan tena māgne varcasā saṃ sṛjeha ||
yāvad varcaḥ sūryasya- -asurasya ca hastinaḥ | tāvan me aśvinā varcaḥ kṛṇutaṃ puṣkarasrajā ||
yāvac catasraḥ pradiśaś cakṣur yāvat samaśnute | tāvat sam aitv indriyaṃ mayi tad dhastivarcasam ||
saṃśitaṃ ma idaṃ brahma saṃśitaṃ vīryaṃ mama | saṃśitaṃ kṣatraṃ me jiṣṇu yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ ||
sam aham eṣāṃ rāṣṭraṃ śyāmi sam ojo vīryaṃ balam | vṛścāmi śatrūṇāṃ bāhū saṃśyāmisvān aham ||
tekṣṇīyāṃsaḥ parśor agnes tīkṣṇatarā uta | indrasya vajrāt tekṣṇiyāṃso yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ ||
adhas padyantām adhare bhavantu ye na indraṃ maghavānaṃ pṛtanyān | kṣaṇāmi brahmaṇāmitrān un nayāmi svān aham ||
eṣām aham āyudhā saṃśyāmy eṣāṃ rāṣṭraṃ suvīraṃ vardhayāmi | eṣāṃ kṣatram ajaram astu jiṣṇu- -ugram eṣāṃ cittaṃ viśve vantu devāḥ ||
abhi preta jayata prasūtāḥ saṃ vaḥ śyāmi nara āyudhāni | tīkṣṇeṣavo baladhanvano hata- -ugrāyudhāabalānugrabāhavaḥ ||
ihaiva dhruvāṃ ni minomi śālāṃ kṣeme tiṣṭhāti ghṛtam ukṣamāṇā | tāṃ tvā śāle sarvavīrāḥ suvīrā ariṣṭavīrā abhi saṃ carema ||
ihaiva dhruvā prati tiṣṭha śāle aśvāvatī gomatī sūnṛtāvatī | ūrjasvatī ghṛtavatī payasvaty uc chrayasva mahate saubhagāya ||
dharuṇy asi śāle bṛhacchandāḥ pūtidhānyā | ā tvā vatso mīmayadākumāra ā dhenavaḥ sāyam āsyandamānāḥ||
imāṃ śālāṃ savitā vāyur agnis tvaṣṭā hotā ni minotu prajānan | ukṣantūdhnā maruto ghṛtena bhago no rājā ni kṛṣiṃ tanotu ||
mānasya patnī śaraṇā syonā devī devebhir nimitāsy agre | tṛṇaṃ vasānā sumanā asas tvaṃ rayiṃ no dhehi subhage suvīram ||
ā tvā kumāras taruṇa ā vatso jagatā saha | ā tvā pariśrutaḥ kumbha ā dadhnaḥ kalaśy ayat ||
imam indra vardhaya kṣatriyaṃ ma imaṃ viśām ekavṛṣaṃ kṛṇu tvam | nir amitrān akṣṇuhy asya sarvāṃs tānrandhayāsmāahamuttareṣu||
ayam astu dhanapatir dhanānām ayaṃ viśāṃ viśpatir astu rājā | asminn indra mahi varcāṃsi dhehyBhatt. Inda (misprint) avarcasaṃ kṛṇuhi śatrum asya ||
emaṃ bhaja grāme aśveṣu goṣu niṣṭaṃ bhaja yo 'mitro asya | varṣmat kṣatrāṇām ayam astu rājā- -indra śatrūṃ randhaya sarvam asmai ||
asmai dyāvāpṛthivī bhūrivāmaṃ saṃ duhātāṃ gharmadughe iva dhenum | ayaṃ rājā priya indrasya bhūyāt priyo gavām oṣadhīnām utāpām ||
yunajmi ta uttarāvantam indraṃ yena jayanti na parājayante | yas tvā karad ekavṛṣaṃ janānām utarājannuttamaṃ mānavānām ||
uttaras tvam adhare santv anye ye ke ca rājan pratiśatravas te | ekavṛṣa indrasakhā jigīvāṃ chatrūyatām abhi tiṣṭhā mahāṃsi ||
viṣāṇāsyāṅgirasī devajāḥ praticakṣaṇī | divas pṛthivyāḥ saṃbhūtā sahasrākṣīhaidhi naḥ ||
sahasrākṣī yā tu gṛbhā- -ati paśyāsy oṣadhe | sadānvāghnī rakṣoghnī bhaveha praticakṣaṇī ||
ye haranty āsuteyaṃ payasphātiṃ cauṣadhe | tāṃs tvaṃ sahasracakṣo gṛbhāya kṛtavīrye ||
ya āturaṃ randhayante 'rṣmantaṃ ca vihṛtam | tāṃs tvaṃ sahasracakṣo gṛbhāya kṛtavīrye ||
yathāśvā caturakṣo rātriṃ naktātipaśyati | evā sahasracakṣo tvaṃ prati paśyāsy āyataḥ ||
gobhir aśvair vasubhir apakrītāsy oṣadhe | śyāvasyāśvasyacakṣuṣā prati paśya kimīdinaḥ ||
saṃ sacadhvaṃ saṃ pibadhvam annaṃ vo madhumat saha | vrataṃ vaḥ sarvaṃ sadhryak samānaṃ ceto astu vaḥ ||
saṃ jānīdhvam indraś cettā vo 'stv ayaṃ vo 'gnir ni haraḥ śamayāti | yad vairahatyam uta bhīmam āsīd viśve devā apatatplāvayantu ||
śaṃ vaḥ syāstu bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe | śam antarikṣam uta vo marutvān śaṃ vaḥ syāstv aditir devaputrā ||
kalpetāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī kalpantām āpa oṣadhīḥ | kalpantām agnayaḥ sarve 'smai śraiṣṭhāyasavratāḥ||
saṃ vaḥ sṛjāmi hṛdayaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ mano astu vaḥ | saṃsṛṣṭā vas tanvaḥ santu saṃsṛṣṭaḥ prāṇo astu vaḥ ||
saṃ vaḥ paśūnāṃ hṛdayaṃ sṛjāmi saṃ putrāṇām uta yā duhitaro vaḥ | saṃ vo jāyānāṃ manasā manāṃsi saṃ patīnām uta cakṣuḥ sṛjāmi ||

prācī dig agnir adhipatir asito rakṣitādityā iṣavaḥ | tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo namo vo 'stu | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmas tam u prāṇo jahātu ||

dakṣiṇā dig indro 'dhipatis tiraścirājī rakṣitā vasava iṣavaḥ | tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo namo vo 'stu | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmas tam u prāṇo jahātu ||

pratīcī dig varuṇo 'dhipatiḥ pṛdākūrakṣitā mitra iṣavaḥ | tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo namo vo 'stu | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmas tam u prāṇo jahātu ||

udīcī dik somo 'dhipatiḥ svajo rakṣitā vāta iṣavaḥ | tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo namo vo 'stu | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmas tam u prāṇo jahātu ||

dhruvā dig viṣṇur adhipatiḥ kalmāṣagrīvo rakṣitā vīrudha iṣavaḥ | tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo namo vo 'stu | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmas tam u prāṇo jahātu ||

ūrdhvā dig bṛhaspatir adhipatiś citro rakṣitāśanir iṣavaḥ | tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo namo vo 'stu | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmas tam u prāṇo jahātu ||
anaḍvān dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utāmūm anaḍvān dādhārorv antarikṣam | anaḍvān dādhāra pradiśaḥ ṣaḍ urvīr anaḍvān idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam ā viveśa ||
anaḍvān duhe sukṛtasya loka ainaṃpyāyetapavamānaḥ purastāt | parjanyo dhārā maruta ūdho asya yajñaḥ payo dakṣiṇā doho asya ||
anaḍvān indraḥ sa paśubhyo vi caṣṭe trayāṃ chakropa mimīte adhvanaḥ | sa bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad bhuvanaṃ duhānaḥ sarvā devānāṃ bibhrac carati vratāni ||
yasya neśe yajñapatir na yajño nāsyadāteśena pratigrahītā | yo viśvabhṛd viśvakarmā gharmaṃ no brūta yatamaś catuṣpāt ||
indra eṣa manuṣyeṣv antar gharmas taptaś carati śośucānaḥ | suprajā asat sa udāre na sarṣad yo nāśnīyād anaḍuho vijānan ||
yena devāḥ svar āruruhur hitvā śarīram amṛtasya dhāma | tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokaṃ gharmasya vratena yaśasātapasyayā||
dvādaśaitā rātrīr vratyā āhuḥ prajāpateḥ | tatrāpi brahmaṇo vrataṃ tatrāpy anaḍuho balam ||
yās ta āhuḥ prajāpater vratyā rātrīr dvādaśa | tatrāpi brahma yo veda tad vāanaḍuhobalam ||
duhe vāanaḍvānsāyaṃ duhe prātar duhe divā | dohā ye asya saṃyanti tān vidmānupadasvataḥ ||
yo vedānaḍuho dohān saptān upadasvataḥ | prajāṃ ca lokaṃ cāpnoti tathā sapta rṣayo viduḥ ||
madhyam etad anaḍuho yatraiṣa vaha āhitaḥ | etāvad asya prācīnaṃ yāvān pratyaṅ samāhitaḥ ||
padbhiḥ sedim avakrāmann irāṃ jaṅghābhir utkhidan | śrameṇānaḍvān kīlālaṃ kīnāśaś cābhi gacchataḥ ||
indra eṣa manuṣyeṣv anaḍvān ity ucyate | śaphāso asya māriṣan sarvā yāś cāsya kuṣṭhikāḥ ||
indro balenāsi parameṣṭhī vratena yena gaus tena vaiśvadevaḥ | yo asmān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas tasya prāṇān saṃ bṛhat tasya prāṇān vi vṛha ||
gṛhānaimimanasā modamāna ūrjaṃ bibhrad vasumaniḥ sumedhāḥ | aghoreṇa cakṣuṣā mitriyeṇa gṛhāṇāṃpaśyanpaya ut tarāmi ||
ime gṛhā mayobhuva ūrjasvantaḥ payasvantaḥ | pūrṇā vāmasya tiṣṭhantas te no jānantu jānataḥ ||
sūnṛtāvantaḥ subhagā irāvanto hasāmudāḥ | akṣudhyāatṛṣyāso gṛhā māsmad bibhītana ||
yeṣām adhyetipravasan yeṣu saumanaso bahuḥ | gṛhān upa hvayāmahe te no jānantv āyataḥ ||
upahūtā iva gāva upahūtā ajāvayaḥ | atho annasya kīlāla upahūto gṛheṣu naḥ ||
upahūtā bhūridhanāḥ sakhāyaḥsvādusaṃmudaḥ| ariṣṭāḥ sarvapūruṣā gṛhā naḥ santu sarvadā ||
hantāyam astv apratighātyaḥ sāsahvām̐ indraḥ pṛtanā abhiṣṭhiḥ | prajāpatir adadhād ojo asmai bṛhad dhavir haviṣā vardhanena ||
prajāpate haviṣā vardhanena hantāram indram akṛṇor aghātyam | tasmaiviśodevakṛtā namanta sa hi hantā sa hi havyo babhūva ||
prajāpate abhi no neṣa vasya urvīṃ gavyūtim abhimātiṣāhaḥ |urvīṃ with ms. Vā; Bhatt. ūrvīṃ vardhayann indraṃ bṛhate raṇāya devaṃ devena haviṣā vardhanena ||
yathā viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ saṃjayāsi yathā śatrūn sahamānaḥ sahāsai | yathāsaḥ samrāṭ susamrāḍ evā tvendro 'prativadhaṃ kṛṇotu ||
ayaṃ vīro 'prati hantu śatrūn viśve devā apa sadas karātha | māsya prajāṃ rīriṣan mota vīrān imam indro 'prativadhaṃ kṛṇotu ||
jahi śatrūn prati randhayasva-read 'prati? -agniṣ ṭe gopā adhipā vasiṣṭhaḥ | śarma te rājā varuṇo ni yacchād evā tvendro 'prativadhaṃ kṛṇotu ||
saṃ spṛśethāṃ tanūbhyāṃ saṃ mukhābhyāṃ sam ātmanā | saṃ vāṃ brahmaṇaspatiḥ somaḥ saṃ sparśayāti vām ||
abhy asya nāma vācā dadhāmi nāha mokṣyate | mamed ahainaṃ kāme labhai kṛṣṇam ivākhare ||
yaḥ premā preṇyām āsīd dattaḥ somena babhruṇā | tasmād adhi śrutaṃ mama mayy asya mana āhitam ||
yaṃ pumāṃsaṃ kāmayase yasmin vā bhagam icchase | hṛcchokam asminn ā dadhmo yathā śuṣyāti tvām anu ||
yathāsya hṛdayaṃ śuṣyād apicchinneva śaṃguṇī | cakṣurākāśyaṃbhīmaṃBhatt. ākāsyaṃ māṃpaśyam abhirorudam ||
priyaṃkaraṇam uttamaṃ madhughena tad ābhṛtam | tvaṃ hāsi varcasyo 'tho hāsi sumaṅgalaḥ | atho sarvāsāṃ vīrudhāṃ priyaṅkaraṇam ucyase ||
pratīcī somam asy oṣadhe pratīcy uta sūryam | pratīcī viśvān devāṃs tathā tvācchā vadāmasi ||
imāṃ khanāmy oṣadhiṃ nitatnīm anutantamām | āyataḥ pratinandanīṃ parāyato nivartanīm ||
amuṣyāhaṃ parāyata āyato mano agrabham | agrabhaṃ hastyaṃ mano 'tho hṛdayyaṃ manaḥ ||
mayi te mana āhitaṃ mayi cittaṃ mayi vratam | mamed api kratāv aso mama citte sacāvahai ||
ahaṃ vadāni mā tvaṃ sabhāyāṃ gha tvaṃ vada | mamed asas tvaṃ kevalo nānyāsāṃ kīrtayāś cana ||
yadi vāsitirojanaṃ yadi vā nadyas tiraḥ | iyaṃ tvā mahyam oṣadhir baddhveva ny ānayāt ||
saṃ rājāno 'guḥ sam ṛṇāny aguḥ saṃ kuṣṭhāaguḥsaṃ kulā aguḥ | sam asmāsu suṣvapnyaṃ nirdviṣateduṣvapnyaṃ suvāmaḥ ||Bhatt. duḥṣvapnyaṃ
devānāṃ patnīnāṃ garbha yamasya karaṇaḥ | yo bhadraḥ svapnaḥ sa mama yaḥ pāpas taṃ dviṣate pra hiṇmaḥ ||
tṛṣṇāmā nāmāsi kṛṣṇaśakuner mukhaṃ nirṛter mukham | taṃ tvā svapna tathā vidma ||
sa tvaṃ svapnāśva ivākāyam aśva iva nīnāham | anāsmākaṃ devapīyuṃ piyāruṃ vapsaḥ ||
yad asmāsu duṣvapnyaṃBhatt. duḥṣvapnyaṃ yad goṣu yac ca no gṛhe | anāsmākas tad devapīyuḥ piyāruṃ niṣkam iva prati muñcatām ||
navāratnīn avamāya- -asmākaṃ tanvas pari | duṣvapnyaṃ sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃBhatt. duḥṣvapnyaṃ dviṣate nir diśāmasi ||
devā marutaḥ pṛśnimātaro 'po dattodadhiṃ bhinta | divas pṛthivyā uror antarikṣād asmai kṣatrāyānena brahmaṇābhyaḥ prajābhya ābhya oṣadhībhyaḥ svāhā ||
devā agna indrasūrya- -apaḥ (…) ||see 1bcde
devāḥ sayujo mitra varuṇāryamann apaḥ (…) ||see 1bcde
devāḥ pitaro 'vamā āyavaḥ krāvya-read krāvyāpaḥ with K; Bhatt. krāvya apo -apaḥ (…) ||see 1bcde
devāpsuṣado 'pāṃ napāt tanūnapān narāśaṃsa- -apo dattodadhiṃ bhinta | (…) ||see 1cde
deva bṛhaspate 'po dhehy udadhiṃ bhindhi | (…) ||see 1cde
deva prajāpate 'po dhehy udadhiṃ bhindhi | (…) ||see 1cde
deva parameṣṭhinn apo dhehy udadhiṃ bhindhi | divas pṛthivyā uror antarikṣād asmai kṣatrāyānena brahmaṇābhyaḥ prajābhya ābhya oṣadhībhyaḥ svāhā ||
prajāpater jāyamānāḥ prajā jātāś ca yā imāḥ | tā asmai prati vedaya cikitvām̐ anu manyatām ||
yeṣām īśe paśupatiḥ paśūnāṃ catuṣpadām uta vā ye dvipādaḥ | niṣkrītās te yajñiyā yanti lokaṃ rāyaspoṣāya yajamānaṃ sacantām ||
pramuñcanto bhuvanasya gopā gātuṃ devā yajamānāya dhatta | upākṛtaṃśaśamānaṃyad asthāt priyaṃ devānām apy etu pāthaḥ ||
ye badhyamānam anudīdhyānāBhatt. dīdhyānāṃ anvaikṣanta manasā cakṣuṣā ca | agniṣ ṭān agre pra mumukta devaḥ prajāpatiḥ prajayā saṃvidānaḥ ||
yeṣāṃ prāṇāanvabadhnantabadvaṃ gavāṃ paśūnām utapūruṣāṇām| indras tān agre pra mumukta devaḥ prajāpatiḥ prajayā saṃvidānaḥ ||
ya āraṇyāḥ paśavo viśvarūpā ye viśvarūpā utaikarūpāḥ | vāyuṣ ṭān agre pra mumukta devaḥ prajāpatiḥ prajayā saṃvidānaḥ ||
prajānantaḥ prati gṛhṇantu devāḥ prāṇam aṅgebhyas paryācarantam | dyāṃ gaccha prati tiṣṭhā śarīraiḥ svargaṃ yāhi pathibhiḥ śivebhiḥ ||
samās tvāgna ṛtavo vardhayantu saṃvatsara ṛṣayo yāni satyā | saṃ dyumnenadīdihirocanena viśvā ā bhāhi pradiśaś catasraḥ ||
saṃ cedhyasvāgne pra ca bodhayainam uc ca tiṣṭha mahate saubhagāya | mā te riṣann upasattāro atra brāhmaṇās te yaśasaḥ santu mānye ||
tvām agne vṛṇate brāhmaṇā ime śivo agne prataraṇo na edhi | sapatnahāgne abhimātijid bhava sve kṣaye dīdihy aprayucchan ||
ihaivāgne adhi dhārayā rayiṃ mā tvā dabhan pūrvacittā nikāriṇaḥ | kṣatram agne suyamam astu tubhyam upasattā vardhatāṃ teaniṣṭṛtaḥ||
kṣatreṇāgne svena saṃ rabhasva mitreṇāgne mitradheyaṃ yatasva | sajātānāṃ madhyameṣṭheyam asyā rājñām agne vihavyodīdihīha||
ati niho 'ti nirṛtīr aty arātīr ati dviṣaḥ | viśvā hy agne duritā tara tvam athāsmabhyaṃ sahavīraṃ rayiṃ dāḥ ||
anādhṛṣyo jātavedāaniṣṭṛto virāḍ agne kṣatrabhirdīdihīha| vyamīvāḥ pramuñcan mānuṣebhyaḥ śivebhir adya pari pāhi no gayaiḥ ||
ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviyo yato jāto arocathāḥ | taṃ jānann agna ā roha- -athā no vardhayā rayim ||
pradātāraṃ havāmahe agnim ugram ūtaye | śucir yo vṛtrahantamaḥ ||
agne acchā vadeha naḥ pratyaṅ naḥ sumanā bhava | pra ṇo yaccha viśāṃ pate dhanadā asi nas tvam ||
pra ṇo yacchatv aryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ | pra pūṣā prota sūnṛtā rayiṃ devī dadhātu naḥ ||
aryamaṇaṃ bṛhaspatim indraṃ dānāya codaya | vātaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarasvatīṃ savitāraṃ ca vājinam ||
somaṃ rājānam avase 'gniṃ gīrbhir havāmahe | ādityaṃ viṣṇuṃ sūryaṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca bṛhaspatim ||
indravāyūbṛhaspatiḥ suhaveha havāmahe | yathā naḥ sarvam ij jagat saṅgatyāṃ sumanā asat ||
tvaṃ no agne agnibhir brahma yajñaṃ ca vardhaya | tvaṃ no deva dātave rayiṃ dānāya codaya ||
vājasyedaṃ prasave saṃbabhūva memā ca viśvā bhuvanāny antaḥ | utāditsantaṃ dāpayati prajānan rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīraṃ ni yacchāt ||
duhrāṃ me pañca pradiśo duhrām urvīr yathābalam | prāpeyaṃ sarvām ākūtiṃ manasā hṛdayena ca ||
gosaniṃ vācam udeyaṃ varcasā mābhy ūrṇuhi | ā rundhāṃ sarvato vāyus tvaṣṭā poṣāya dhriyatām ||
yata indra bhayāmahe tato no abhayaṃ kṛdhi | maghavañ chagdhi tava tvaṃ na ūtibhir vi dviṣo vi mṛdho jahi ||
indraṃ vayamanūrādhaṃhavāmahe 'nu rādhyāsma dvipadā catuṣpadā | mā naḥsenāararuṣīr upa gur viṣūcīr indra druho vi nāśaya ||
indras trātota vṛtrahā paraspāno vareṇyaḥ | sa rakṣitā caramataḥ sa madhyataḥ sa paścāt sa purastān no astu ||
uruṃ no lokam anu neṣi vidvān svaryaj jyotir abhayaṃ svasti | ugrā ta indra sthavirasya bāhū upa kṣiyema śaraṇā bṛhantā ||
abhayaṃ naḥ karaty antarikṣam abhayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe | abhayaṃ paścād abhayaṃ purastād uttarād adharād abhayaṃ no astu ||
abhayaṃ mitrād abhayam amitrād abhayaṃ jñātād abhayaṃ puro naḥ | abhayaṃ naktam abhayaṃ divā naḥ sarvā āśā mama mitraṃ bhavantu ||
jaya prehi māpa krāmaḥ śatrūṇāṃ veda ā khida | indraḥ sapatnahā bhīmaḥ sañjayas te sam ānṛdhat ||
tvaṃ jayāsi na parā jayāsā arbheṣv ājau maghavan mahatsu ca | ugraṃ cit tvām avase saṃśiśīmahe sa tvaṃ na indra havaneṣu mṛḍa ||
gojitā bāhūasamakratūyudhi karmankarmañchatamūtīsvajaṅkarā | akalpa indro 'pratimānam ojaḥ sa tvaṃ na indra havaneṣu mṛḍa ||
vedāham aindraṃ priyam asya śevadhiṃ yad asya nāma guhyaṃ samīke | sa ij jayāti maghavā mamāsaty asmākaṃ yudhmo vihave havaṃ gamat ||
vayaṃ jayema tvāyujā bhṛto asmākam aṃśam udavābharebhare | asmabhyam indra varivaḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi pra śatrūṇāṃ maghavanvṛṣṇiyāruja ||
tvāṃ deveṣu prathamaṃ havāmahe tvaṃ babhūvitha pṛtanāsu sāsahiḥ | semaṃ naḥ kārum upamanyum udbhidam indra karāsi prasave rathaṃ puraḥ ||
smara smaro 'si devair datto 'si smara | amuṣya mana ā smara yathāhaṃ kāmaye tathā ||
śocayāsya hṛdayaṃ kāma gaccha- -aṅgajvaro dahatu śocatu tmanā | saṅkalpā asya samarantādhībhir iyam evāsya digamahanyanyāḥ ||
nirānandāḥ pramucchado manomuho nayuvo naṣṭakṛtvā araṇyavaḥ | āveśinīḥ pradrupo ropayiṣṇur eta āstādhyaḥ pra hiṇomi brahmaṇā ||
hṛtkartanī ṛtudā grāmānnāśanīḥ svapnacchida ughnanīghnā manomuhaḥ | āveśinīḥ pradrupo ropayiṣṇur eta āstādhyaḥ pra hiṇomi brahmaṇā ||
indrāgnī mitrāvaruṇā te adya- -ubhe ca dyāvāpṛthivī mātariśvā | aśvinā devaḥ savitā bhagaś ca manas ta u ghnantu na ramāsā atra ||
trayastriṃśat tvā uta ghnantu devā ādhyaś cittam upa te bharantām | bharadvājasya matayas ta īśatāṃ chinneva naur bandhanāt pra plavasva ||
etāḥ patanty ādhyo vārṣikīr iva vidyutaḥ | tāsāṃ pratigraho bhava sāyaṃ goṣṭhe gavām iva ||
ni śīrṣato ni pātita ādhyo veśayāmi te | tās tvā samuttudantīr bodhayantīr upāsatām ||
etās ta ādhyaḥ pra hiṇomi brahmaṇā tṛprāaśrīpurogavāḥ| tās tvā tṛṇam iva śoṣayān atho tvā rodayān bahu ||
ajo hy agner ajaniṣṭa śokāt so 'paśyaj janitāram agre | tena devā devatām agra āyan tena rohān arohann upa medhīyāṃsaḥ ||
kramadhvam agnibhir nākam ukhyāṃ hasteṣu bibhrataḥ | divas pṛṣṭhaṃ svar gatvā miśrā devebhir ādhvam ||
agne prehi prathamo devayatāṃ cakṣur devānām uta martyānām | iyakṣamāṇā bhṛgubhiḥ sajoṣasaḥ svar yantu yajamānāḥ svasti ||
svar yanto nāpekṣanta ā dyāṃ rohantu rādhasaḥ | yajñaṃ ye viśvatodhāraṃ suvidvāṃso vi tenire ||
odanam anajmi śavasā ghṛtena divyaṃ samudraṃ payasaṃ bṛhantam | tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokaṃ saroruhāṇā adhi nākam uttamam ||read svar ruhāṇā
yau te pakṣāv ajarau patatriṇau yābhyāṃ rakṣāṃsy apahaṃsy odana | tābhyāṃ patyāsma sukṛtasya lokaṃ yatra rṣayaḥ prathamajāḥ purāṇāḥ ||
yatas tiṣṭho divas pṛṣṭhe vyomann adhy odana | anvāyan satyadharmāṇo brāhmaṇā rādhasā saha ||
pṛṣṭhāt pṛthivyāahamantarikṣam āruham antarikṣād divam āruham | divo nākasya pṛṣṭhāt svar jyotir agām aham ||
ajo 'sy aja svargo 'si tvayā lokam aṅgirasaḥ pra jānan | taṃ lokam anu pra jñeṣma ||
yenā sahasraṃ vahasi yena vā sarvavedasam | tenemaṃ yajñaṃ no vaha svar deveṣu gantave ||
ajaṃca pacata pañca caudanān | ajaṃ pañcaudanaṃ paktvā devā lokān sam ānaśuḥ ||
yā te prajāpihitā purābhūd dhruveṇāśvināpa taṃ bharāmi | agniṣ ṭe tāmādyamaḥ punar dād vaiśvānaraḥ paramasmād vyomnaḥ ||
tvaṃ patiḥ śivo 'gne dvitīyo *'syai prajāṃ jaradaṣṭiṃ sṛjasva | muñcaināṃ grāhyā nirṛtir yad bandha- -agne prajāṃ prajākāmāyai dhehi ||
tvām agne vṛṣabhaṃ vāśiteyam ācyā jānu putrakāmā saparyati | tām ā roha sumanasyamānaḥ prajāpateḥ prajayā saṃ sṛjainām ||
tubhyaṃ nārī putrakāmeyam agne śuddhaṃ pūtaṃ ghṛtam ā juhoti | tām adhi skanda vīrayasva retodhā ugraḥ prajayā saṃ sṛjainam ||
parvatād divo yoner gātrādgātrāt samāśṛtam | reto devasyadevasya tsarau parṇam ivādhām ||tsaru Mehendale, Henning Mem. Vol.
indrasya jātasya pra papāta nābhis tām eko devaḥ prati jagrāha kāmī | tvayā vayaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ somapāḥ sūpayāma uta yā na sūte ||
tejanāt tyajanaṃ jātaṃ tejanaṃ jāyate śarāt | nayeṣatina śocati yas tvā bibharti tejana ||
parutnam asitejana parutnaṃ te prabhañjanam | parutno astu sa kāmo yenāmūṃ kāmayāmahe ||Bhatt. yenāmūn
yāvad oṣaḥ śaro astvo janebhyaḥ kṛṇavad bhayam | tāvad oṣas tvaṃ tejana tyajanaṃ bhavatād iha ||
tyajanaṃ ma āpo dadhan tyajanaṃ maruto dadhan | tyajanaṃ me viśve devās tyajanaṃ pitaro dadhan ||
tenāham anyeṣāṃ striyo atyākṣaṃ vidviṣaḥ purā | purā dviṣo atyākṣaṃ purā madhyandinād uta | purāsāyatvādatyākṣaṃ tejane hi mahad balam ||
asthād dyaur asthāt pṛthivy asthād viśvam idaṃ jagat | asthād avahṛdevāt tiṣṭhāt kāmo ayaṃ tava ||
hiraṇyagarbhaḥ sam avartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patir eka āsīt | sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utāmuṃ tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
ya ojodā baladā yaś ca viśva upāsate praśiṣaṃ yasya devāḥ | yasya chāyāmṛtaṃ yasya mṛtyus tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
yaḥ prāṇato nimiṣato vidhartā patir viśvasya jagato babhūva | ya īśe 'sya dvipado yaś catuṣpadas tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā yena sva stabhitaṃ yena nākaḥ |Bhatt.svaḥ yo antarikṣaṃ vimame varīyas tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī tastabhāna- -adhārayad avasā rejamāne | yasminn adhi vitata eti sūryas tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
yasya viśve himavanto mahitvā samudraṃ yasya rasayā sahāhuḥ | diśo yasya pradiśaḥ pañca devīs tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
āpo ha yasya viśvam āyur dadhānā garbhaṃ janayanta mātaraḥ | tatra devānām adhi deva āsta ekasthūṇe vimite dṛḍha ugre ||
āpo garbhaṃ janayantīr vatsam agre sam airayan | tasyota jāyamānasya- -ulba āsīd dhiraṇyayaḥ ||
hiraṇya ulba āsīd yo 'gre vatso ajāyata | taṃ yonyor vidravantyoḥ pary apaśyad ditir mahī ||
bhūto bhūteṣu paya ā dadhāti sa bhūtānām adhipatir babhūva | sa te mṛtyuś carati rājasūyaṃ sa rājā rājyam anu manyatām idam ||
abhi prehi vīrayasva- -ugraś cettā sapatnahā | ā tiṣṭha mitravardhana tubhyaṃ devā adhi bruvan ||
ātiṣṭhantaṃ pari viśve abhūṣañ chriyaṃ vasānaś carati svarociḥ | mahat tad vṛṣṇo asurasya nāma- -ā viśvarūpo amṛtāni tasthau ||
enā vyāghraṃ pariṣasvajānāḥ siṃhaṃ hinvanti mahate saubhagāya | mahiṣaṃ nasubhuvastasthivāṃsaṃ marmṛjyantedvīpinam apsv antaḥ ||
vyāghro adhi vaiyāghre vi kramasva diśo mahīḥ | viśas tvā sarvā ā yantv āpo divyāḥ payasvatīḥ ||
yā āpo divyāḥ payasā madanti yā antarikṣa uta pārthivā yāḥ | tāsāṃ tvā sarvāsām apām abhi ṣiñcāmi varcasā ||
abhi tvā varcasāsicaṃ divyena payasā saha | yathāso mitravardhanas tathā tvā savitā karat ||
yat te candraṃ kaśyapa rocanāvad yat saṃhitaṃ puṣkalaṃcitrabhānu| yasmin sūryā ārpitāḥ sapta sākaṃ tasmin rājānam adhi vi śrayemam ||
yebhiḥ śilpaiḥ paprathānām adṛṃho yebhir divam abhyapiṃśaḥ pravidvān | yebhir vācaṃ puṣkalair avyayas tena māgne varcasā saṃ sṛjeha ||
yebhiḥ sūrya ātapati pra ketubhir yebhir agnir dadṛśe citrabhānuḥ | yebhir āpaś candravarṇā ajinvan tena māgne varcasā saṃ sṛjeha ||
āyaṃ bhātu pradiśaḥ pañca devīr indra iva jyeṣṭho bhavatu prajānām | asmin dhehi puṣkalaṃ citrabhānv ayaṃ pṛṇātu rajasor upastham ||
anu tvendro 'vatv anu bṛhaspatir anu tvā somo anv agnir āvīt | anu tvā viśve avantu devāḥ sapta rājāno ya udābhiṣiktāḥ ||
anu tvā mitrāvaruṇehāvatām anu dyāvāpṛthivī oṣadhībhiḥ | sūryo 'hobhir anu tvāvatu candramā nakṣatrair anu tvedam āvīt ||
dyauś ca tvā pṛthivī ca pracetasau śukrobṛhandakṣiṇā tvā pipartu | anu svadhā cikitāṃ somo agniḥ pūṣā tvāvatu savitā savena ||
stuvānam agna ā naya yātudhānaṃ kimīdinam | tvaṃ hi devāntito hantā dasyor babhūvitha ||
ājyasyaparameṣṭhiñ jātavedas tanūvaśin | agne taulasyaprāśānaBhatt. prāśān yātudhānān vi lāpaya ||
vi lapantu yātudhānā atriṇo ye kimīdinaḥ | athedam agne no havir indraś ca prati haryatam ||
agniḥ purastād ā yacchatu prendro nudatu bāhumān | bravītu sarvo yātumān ayam asmīty etya ||
paśyāmi te vīryā jātavedaḥ pra ṇo brūhiyātudhānānnṛcakṣaḥ | tvayā sarve paritaptāḥ purastād ā yantu prabruvāṇā upedam ||
ā rabhasva jātavedo hṛdaḥ kāmāya randhaya | dūto noagnaut tiṣṭhaBhatt. agnir yātudhānān ihā naya ||
tvam agne yātudhānān upabaddhān ihā naya | athaiṣām indro vajreṇa- -api śīrṣāṇi vṛścatu ||
idaṃ havir yātudhānān nadīphenamivā vahāt | yadīdaṃ strī pumān akar iha sastuvatāṃjanaḥ ||
yātudhānasya somapa jahi prajāṃ nayasva ca | ni ṣṭuvānasya pātaya param akṣy utāvaram ||
ayaṃ stuvāna āgamat taṃsmota prati haryata | bṛhaspate vaśe kṛthā agnīṣomā vi vidhyatam ||
yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanad varuṇāyamṛtabhraje|Bhatt. mitabhraje tāṃ tvā vayaṃ khanāmasy oṣadhiṃ śepaharṣaṇīm ||
vṛṣaṇas te khanitāro vṛṣā tvam asy oṣadhe | vṛṣāsi vṛṣṇyāvatī vṛṣaṇe tvā khanāmasi ||
ud uṣā ud u sūrya uc chuṣmā oṣadhīnām | ud ejati prajāpatir vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa vājinā ||
ūrdhvaśrāṇam idaṃ kṛdhi yathā sma te virohato abhitaptam ivānati | tatas te śuṣmavattaram iyaṃ kṛṇotv oṣadhiḥ ||
apāṃ rasa oṣadhīnām atho vanaspatīnām | atho somasya bhrātāsy ārśyam asi vṛṣṇyam ||
aśvasya ṛśyasya bastasya puruṣasya ca | ya ṛṣabhasya vājas tam asmaidhehyoṣadhe ||Bhatt. dehy
saṃ vājā ṛṣabhāṇāṃ saṃ śuṣmā oṣadhīnām | saṃpuṃsāmindra vṛṣṇyamBhatt. pūṣām asmai dhehi tanūbalam ||
adyāgne adya savitar adya devisarasvati| adyā me brahmaṇaspate dhanur ivā tānayā pasaḥ ||
ūrdhvās tiṣṭhanti giraya ūrdhvā vātā ud īrate | ūrdhvo 'yaṃ māmako mayūkha ivādhi bhūmyām ||
ut tiṣṭhogra vi dhūnuṣva vi teśvayantunāḍyaḥ |Bhatt. ghnā yantu atandro aśvapā iva nāva glāyo 'dhi muṣkayoḥ ||
hiraṇyaśṛṅgo vṛṣabho yaḥ samudrād udācarat | tenā sahasyenā vayaṃ ni janānt svāpayāmasi ||
na bhūmiṃ vāto 'ti vāti nāti tapati sūryaḥ | janāṃś ca sarvān svāpaya śunaś cendrasakhā caran ||
vahyeśayāḥproṣṭheśayā nārīr yās talpaśīvarīḥ | striyo yāḥ puṇyagandhās tāḥ sarvāḥ svāpayāmasi ||
ejadejad ajagrabhaṃ cakṣuḥ prāṇam ajagrabham | aṅgāny agrabhaṃ sarvā rātrīṇām atiśarvare ||
ya āste yaś ca carati yaś ca tiṣṭhan vipaśyati | teṣāṃ saṃ dadhmo akṣāṇi yathedaṃ harmyaṃ tathā ||
svaptumātāsvaptupitā svaptuśvāsvaptuviśpatiḥ| svapantu sarve jñātayaḥ sarvaṃ ni ṣvāpayā janam ||
svapna svapnābhikaraṇena sarvaṃ ni ṣvāpayā janam |Bhatt. ṣpāpaya otsūryam anyān svāpaya- -āvyuṣaṃ caratād aham indra ivāriṣṭo akṣitaḥ ||
akṣībhyāṃ te nāsikābhyāṃ karṇābhyām āsyād uta | yakṣmaṃ śīrṣaṇyaṃ mastiṣkāl lalāṭād vi vṛhāmasi ||
grīvābhyas ta uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyo anūkyāt | yakṣmaṃ doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyām urasto vi vṛhāmasi ||
klomnas te hṛdayyābhyo halīkṣṇāt pārśvābhyām | yakṣmaṃ matasnābhyāṃ plīhno yaknaste vi vṛhāmasi ||
āntrebhyaste gudābhyo vaniṣṭhor udarād uta | yakṣmaṃ pāṇyor aṅgulibhyo nakhebhyo vi vṛhāmasi ||
asthibhyas te māṃsebhyaḥ snāvabhyo dhamanibhyaḥ | yakṣmaṃ pṛṣṭibhyo majjabhyo nābhyā vi vṛhāmasi ||
ūrubhyāṃ te aṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ pārṣṇibhyāṃ prapadābhyām | yakṣmaṃ bhasadyaṃ śroṇibhyāṃ bhaṃsaso vi vṛhāmasi ||
aṅgādaṅgāl lomnolomno baddhaṃ parvaṇiparvaṇi | yakṣmaṃ tvacasyaṃ te vayaṃ viṣvañcaṃ vi vṛhāmasi ||
aṅgādāṅgād ahaṃ tava paruṣaḥparuṣas pari | kaśyapasya vivṛheṇa yakṣmaṃ te vi vṛhāmasi ||
agnī rakṣohā tigmas tigmaśṛṅga ṛṣir ārṣeyaḥ kaviḥ kavitamaḥ | apāghāśaṃsaṃ nudatāṃ sahatām arātiṃ pratyak pratiharaṇena- -aghāyate 'ghaṃ prati harāmaḥ ||

parameṣṭhī rakṣohā tigmas tigmaśṛṅga ṛṣir ārṣeyaḥ kaviḥ kavitamaḥ | apāghāśaṃsaṃ nudatāṃ sahatām arātiṃ pratyak pratiharaṇena- -aghāyate 'ghaṃ prati harāmaḥ ||
saṃvasava iti vo nāmadheyam ugraṃpaśyā rāṣṭrabhṛto hy akṣāḥ | tasmai ta indo haviṣā vidhema vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām ||
idam ugrāya babhrave yo 'kṣeṣu tanūvaśī | ghṛtenakaliṃśikṣāṇi sa no mṛḍātīdṛśe ||
ghṛtam agne apsarābhyo vaha tvaṃ pāṃsūn akṣebhyaḥ sikatāapaśca |pāṃsūn with K; Bhatt. pāṃśūn yathābhagaṃ havyadātiṃ juṣāṇā madantu devā ubhayāni havyā ||
yo no devo dhanam idaṃ dideśa yo akṣāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ śeṣaṇaṃ ca | sa no 'vatu havir idaṃ juṣāṇo gandharvaiḥ sadhamādaṃ madema ||
yā apsarasaḥ sadhamādaṃ madanty antarā havirdhānaṃ sūryaṃ ca | tā no hastau kṛtena saṃ sṛjantu sapatnaṃ naḥ kitavaṃ randhayantu ||
yad devān nāthito huve brahmacaryaṃ yad ūṣima | akṣānyadbabhrūnālabhe te no mṛḍantv īdṛśe ||
ādinavam ity ekā ||PS 1.72.4 is repeated
bhagas tveto nayatu hastagṛhya bṛhaspatiḥ puraetā te astu | devas tvā savitā satyadharmā- -upasadyāṃ namasyāṃ kṛṇotu ||
yām aśvinā madhukaśāṃ devāagreajanayan | tayā tvā patyām otāṃ kṛṇmo madhumatīṃ vayam ||
uttarā śvaśruvā bhava nanāndur upaśikṣayā | yaśas tvā patyāṃ kṛṇmo bhavā devṛṣu priyā ||
adbhir ātmānaṃ tanvaṃ śumbhamānā gṛhān prehi mahiṣī bhavāsi | tatra tvādur gārhapatyāya devāḥ prajāvatī jaradaṣṭir yathāsaḥ ||
ud uttaram ārohantī vyasyantī pṛtanyataḥ | abhyaṣṭhāḥśatror mūrdhānaṃ sahaputrā virāḍ bhava ||
śvaśrūṇāṃ śvaśurāṇāṃ gṛhāṇāṃ ca bhagasya ca |K and ĀpMP 1.6.7 have dhanasya ca | vi rāja patyāṃ devṛṣu sajātānāṃ virāḍ bhava ||
yad giriṣu parvateṣu goṣv aśveṣu yan madhu | yenākṣā abhyaṣicyanta tenāham asyā mūrdhānam abhi ṣiñcāmi nāryāḥ ||
yad varco gavi kalyāṇe yad vā sūyavase tṛṇe | abhyañjanasya yad varcas tena mānajmi varcasā ||
yenācarad uśanā kāvyo 'gre vidvān kratūnām uta devatānām | sahṛdayena haviṣā juhomi sadhrīcīnaṃ vo mano 'stūgram ||
mahat satyaṃ mahad dhavir uśanā kāvyo mahān | devānām ugrāṇāṃ satāṃ hṛdayāni sahākaram ||
ahaṃ satyena sayujā carāmy ahaṃ devīm anumatiṃ pra veda | indro devānāṃ hṛdayaṃ vo astu sadhrīcīnaṃ vo mano 'stūgram ||
tvaṣṭā vāyuḥ kaśyapa indram agnir manasānv āyan haviṣas padena | avindañchakraṃ rajasi praviṣṭaṃ sadhrīcīnaṃ vo mano 'stūgram ||
yeneme dyāvāpṛthivī vicaṣkabhur yenābhavad antarikṣaṃ svar yat | manasā vidvān haviṣā juhomi sadhrīcīnaṃ vo mano 'stūgram ||
dyāvāpṛthivī hṛdayaṃ sasūvatur yenedaṃ tvaṣṭā vikṛṇoti dhīraḥ | tasyośanā kratubhiḥ saṃvidānaś cittaṃ viveda manasi praviṣṭam ||
cittaṃ caitad ākūtiś ca yena devā viṣehire | etat satyasya śraddhayā- -arṣayaḥ sapta juhvati ||i.e. śraddhayarṣayaḥ, in sandhi for śraddhayā ṛṣayaḥ
tvayā manyo saratham ārujanto harṣamāṇāso hṛṣitāmarutvan| tīkṣṇeṣava āyudhāsaṃśiśānā upa pra yantu naro agnirūpāḥ ||
agnir iva manyo tarasā sahasva senānīr naḥ sahure hūta edhi | jitvāya śatrūn vi bhajāsi veda ojo mimāno vi mṛdho nudasva ||
sahasva manyo abhimātim asme rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇann ehi śatrūn | ugraṃ teśardhonanv ā rurudhre vaśī vaśaṃ nayāsā ekaja tvam ||
eko bahūnām asi manyav īḍitā paśūnpaśūn yuddhāya saṃ śiśādhi | akṛttaruktvayā yujā vayaṃ dyumantaṃ ghoṣaṃ vijayāya kṛṇmahe ||
vijeṣakṛd indra ivānavabravo 'smākaṃ manyo adhipā bhaveha | priyaṃ te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi vidmā tam utsaṃ yata ābabhūvitha ||
ābhūtyā sahasā vajra sāyaka saho bibharṣy abhibhūta uttaram | kratvā no manyo saha medy edhi mahādhanasya puruhūta saṃsṛji ||
saṃsṛṣṭaṃ dhanam ubhayaṃ samākṛtam asmabhyaṃ dattaṃ varuṇaś ca manyo | bhiyo dadhānā hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥ parājitā yantu paramāṃ parāvatam ||
śaṃ no devīpṛśniparṇy aśaṃ nirṛtaye karat | ugrā hi kaṇvajambhanī tāṃ tvāhārṣaṃsahasvatīm||
sadānvāghnī prathamā pṛśniparṇy ajāyata | tayā kaṇvasyāhaṃ śiraś chinadmi śakuner iva ||
ūrjabhṛtaṃ prāṇabhṛtaṃ prajānām uta tarpaṇīm | sarvās tāḥ pṛśniparṇī- -itaḥ kaṇvā mānīnaśat||fornīnaśatsee Bhatt., footnote
samākṛtyainā nir aja tīkṣṇaśṛṅga iva ṛṣabhaḥ | arāyaṃ kaṇvaṃ pāpmānaṃ pṛśniparṇi sahasvati ||
tvam ugre pṛśniparṇyBhatt. agre agnir iva pradahann ihi kaṇvā jīvitayopanīḥ | girim enā ā veśaya tamāṃsi yatra gacchāṃs tat pāpīr api pādaya ||
arāyam asṛkpāvānaṃ yaś ca sphātiṃ jihīrṣati | garbhādaṃ kaṇvaṃ nāśaya pṛśniparṇi sahasvati ||
yā no gā yā no gṛhānBhatt. gṛhāṃ yā na sphātim upāharān |Bhatt. yā naḥ tā ugre pṛśniparṇi tvaṃ kaṇvā mā nīnaśa itaḥ ||
yasminn āśīḥ pratihita idaṃ tac chalyo veṇur veṣṭanaṃ tejanaṃ ca | sūnur janitrīṃ janayehi śṛṇvann ayaṃ ta ātmetaitprahitaḥ ||Bhatt. ita
asthi bhittvā yadi majjñaḥpapāthaBhatt. prapātha yadi vāsi rataḥ puruṣantikāme | urvīṃ gavyūtim abhy ehy arvāṅ paścā raśmīnudyataḥsūryasya ||
mātariśvā pavamānas tvāyan sūrya ābhrājan tanvā dṛśe kaḥ | asno gandhāt puvasaḥ pra cyavasva vi mucyasva yonyā yā te atra ||
pra cyavasvātoabhyehy arvāṅBhatt. adhy ehy arthāṃs te vidma bahudhā bahir ye | imāḥ svasāro ayam it pitā ta iyaṃ te mātemam ehi bandhum ||
amitrair astā yadi vāsi mitrair devair vā deviprahitāvasṛṣṭā- -āviddhāśṛṅgaṃ puruṣe jahātha | bāṇaḥśṛṅgaṃśikharaḥ saṃ satām itaḥ ||Bhatt.  vāṇaḥ śṛṅgaḥ
śikhāsu sakto yadi vāsy agreBhatt. sikhāsu yadi vāsi saktaḥ puruṣasya māṃse | dadhṛṅna pāśām̐apavṛjyamuktvā-Bhatt. dadhir na; apavṛhya -akṣiśalyaḥ kṛṇutām āyanāya ||
hastād dhastaṃ sam ayo bhriyamāṇo bahiṣ ṭvāpaśyānvīrudhāṃ balena | adbhiḥ praṇiktaḥ śayāsā abhyaktaḥ kośe jāmīnāṃ nihito ahiṃsaḥ ||
ṣaṣṭirātre ṣaṣṭikasya śalyasya paridhiṣ kṛtaḥ | itas tam adya te vayam āsthānāccyāvayāmasi ||
saṃ majjā majjñā bhavatu sam u te paruṣā paruḥ | saṃ te rāṣṭrasya visrastaṃ saṃ snāva sam u parva te ||
majjā majjñā saṃ dhīyatām asthnāsthyapi rohatu | snāva te saṃ dadhmaḥ snāvnā carmaṇā carma rohatu ||
loma lomnā saṃ dhīyatāṃ tvacā saṃkalpayāttvacam | asṛk te asnā rohatu māṃsaṃ māṃsena rohatu ||
rohiṇī saṃrohiṇy asthnaḥśīrṇasya rohiṇī | rohiṇyām ahni jātāsi rohiṇy asy oṣadhe ||
yadi śīrṇaṃ yadi dyuttam asthi peṣṭraṃ ta ātmanaḥ | dhātā tat sarvaṃ kalpayāt saṃ dadhat paruṣā paruḥ ||
yadi vajro visṛṣṭas tvāra kāṭaṃpatitvā yadi vā viriṣṭam |Bhatt. kāṭāt vṛkṣād vā yad avasad daśaśīrṣa ṛbhūrathasyeva saṃ dadhāmi te paruḥ ||
ut tiṣṭha prehi samadhāyite paruḥBhatt. samidhāya saṃ te dhātā dadhātu tanvo viriṣṭam | rathaḥ sucakraḥ supavir yathaiti sukhaḥ sunābhiḥ prati tiṣṭha evam ||
udyann ādityo ghuṇān hantu sūryo nimrocan raśmibhir hantu | tāvan noabhisaṃhitam||
apsarā mūlam akhanad gandharvaḥ pary abravīt | tena vo vṛtrahā sūryo ni jambhyām̐ amṛtad ghuṇāḥ ||Bhatt. jambhyāṃ amrucad* ghuṇān+
ghuṇānhantv āyatī ghuṇān hantu parāyatī | ghuṇān avaghnatī hantu ghuṇān pinaṣṭupiṃṣatī||
ghuṇā na kiṃ caneha vaḥ pratibuddhā abhūtana | pradoṣaṃ taskarā iva ||
ghuṇānāṃmadhyatojyeṣṭhaḥ kaniṣṭha uta madhyamaḥ | hatā vaḥ sarve jñātayo hatā mātā hataḥ pitā ||
yathā phena udakena dadṛśānonijasyati| evā vayaṃ ghuṇān sarvān sākaṃ vācā ni jāsayāmasi ||
ni gāvo goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāso avikṣata | nitvamāditya raśmibhirBhatt. nityam ghuṇān sarvām̐ ajījasaḥ ||
udyan raśmīn ā tanuṣva bāṇavadbhiḥ sam arpaya |Bhatt. vāṇavad- ghuṇāṃstvaṃ sarvān āditya ghorayā tanvā tapa ||
ya ānataḥ parāṇato dāror ivāpatakṣaṇam | śarkoṭo nāma vā asi kutas tvaṃ viṣavān asaḥ ||
ya ubhayena praharasi pucchena cāsyena ca | āsye cana te viṣaṃ kutas te pucchadhāv asat ||
vidutsurasya dānavasya tasya tvaṃ napād asi | tasyāgre 'rasaṃ viṣaṃ tatastavārasaṃviṣam ||Bhatt. tuvārasaṃ
arasārasaṃ tvākaraṃ vadhre vadhriṃ tvākaram | vadhriṃ tvā cakrur devā amṛtāsa āsuram ||
iyattakaḥkuṣumbhakas takaṃ bhinadmiśamyayā| tato viṣaṃ parāsicam apācīm anu saṃvatam ||
imāḥ paścā mayūryaḥ sapta svasāro agruvaḥ | tās te viṣaṃ vi jahrira udakaṃ kumbhinīr iva kūpāt kulijinīr iva ||Bhatt. kulajanīr
navānāṃ navatīnām ity eka ||PS 3.9.7 is repeated
vrātam aham apakṣṇānāṃ vrātaṃ muṇḍīyasām uta | vrātaṃ muṇḍivlānām ahaṃ pra dhvāṅkṣām̐ iva cātaye ||
pravaktāpramādayitāemend. Bhatt., ed. pramādaitā nidrā tandrīs tṛtīyakaḥ | tāñjaṅgiḍasyāgnināBhatt.tān sarvān prati dahāmasi||
aśuddhān naḥ pari pāhi rakṣobhya uta jaṅgiḍa | yātudhānāt kimīdinas tasmān naḥ pāhi jaṅgiḍa ||
apsarābhyo gandharvebhyo devebhyo asurebhyaḥ | atho sarvasmāt pāpmanas tasmān naḥ pāhi jaṅgiḍa ||
ni te śatrūn dahati devo agnir nir arātim amatiṃ yātudhānān | ā yāhi śatrūn duritāpaghnañ chatān no yakṣmebhyaḥ pari pāhi jaṅgiḍa ||
akarmāgnim adhipām asya devam anvārapsva sahasā daivyena |thus with K; Bhatt. anvā rapsi sahasvān naḥ sahasā pātu jaṅgiḍo yathā jayema pṛtanājyeṣu ||
satyo agniḥ satyā āpaḥ satye me dyāvāpṛthivīviśvaśaṃbhuvau|Bhatt. -saṃbhuvau | satyam idaṃ brahmāsmākaṃ kṛtam astu yam abadhnād uśanendrāya taṃ te badhnāmi jaṅgiḍam ||
iyattikā śakuntikā sakā jaghāsa te viṣam | māhaṃ mṛṣi mo asau puruṣo mṛta | sa ca na marati mā vayaṃ marāma | āre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā karat ||

triṣaptā visphuliṅgakā viṣasya puṣpakamakṣan| (…) ||see 1cdef
ālvantaruṭaṃ viṣaṃ vidārī karambho arasaṃ viṣam | (…) ||see 1cdef
vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam agniś ca viśvacarṣaṇiḥ |Bhatt. viṣacarṣaṇim (…) ||see 1cdef
śakuntikā me abravīd viṣapuṣpaṃ dhayantikā | (…) ||see 1cdef
na ropayati na mādayati na viṣaṃ hantipūruṣam| māhaṃ mṛṣi mo asau puruṣo mṛta | sa ca na marati mā vayaṃ marāma | āre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā karat ||
navānāṃ navatīnām ity ekā ||PS 3.9.7 = 4.17.7 is repeated
madhumatī patye asmi jārāya madhumattarā | athomadhavyaṃme bhaṃso madhu nipadane aham ||
madhunā mā saṃ sṛjāmi māsareṇasurām iva |Bhatt. surā vāṅ maiyaṃmadhunā saṃsṛṣṭā- -akṣyaume madhusaṃdṛśī ||Bhatt. akṣau
madhu dyaur madhu pṛthivī madhv indro madhu sūryaḥ | striyo yā jajñire madhu tābhyo 'haṃ madhumattarā ||
madhumatīr oṣadhaya āpo madhumatīr uta | gāvo yā jajñire madhu tābhyo 'haṃ madhumattarā ||
madhor jāto madhugho vīrudhāṃ balavattamaḥ | tenāhaṃ sarvasmai puṃse kṛṇve nikaraṇaṃ hṛdi ||
yathāśvo bandhaneṣṭhoBhatt. yathāśva is misprint vaḍavām abhidhāvati | evā tvam ugra oṣadhe 'muṃ kanikradatam ā naya ||
aṅgo nu mod iva śvaso aṅgo nu mod iva stanaḥ | anyā vivitsamāno anyāḥ parājighāṃsan | mām anu pra te manaś chāyāyantamivānv ayat ||Bhatt. yantum
khananti tvātaimātāṃBhatt. taimātā dāsā arasabāhavaḥ | dāsy asi prakrīr asy utkhātam arasaṃ viṣam ||
adanti tvā kakkaṭāsaḥ kuruṅgā adhi sānuṣu | pāpījagdhaprasūrasy abhrikhāte na rūrupaḥ ||
ava jyām iva dhanvanaḥ śuṣmaṃ tirāmi teviṣa| pra ropīr asya pātaya sūryaḥ pūrvā ivoṣasaḥ ||
sindhuḥ paścāt parihitaḥ sūryasyodayanaṃ puraḥ | tato yad antarā vanaṃ tat sarvaṃ viṣadūṣaṇam ||
madhu tvā madhukṛt kṛṇotu pituṃ tvā pitukṛt kṛṇotu | uto niṣadya pātave atho ūrdhvāya tiṣṭhate ||
jaghāsa tvā lomakarṇas tanny āsaparuṣṇiyām|Bhatt. tanyāsaparuruṣṇiyām tad bhaimīś cakrire srajaḥ sarvaṃ mahiṣado viṣam ||
urvyāurukṣitas turāyā āturasya ca | bhūmyā hijagrabhanāmaBhatt. jagrabhaṃ viṣaṃ vārayatām iti | viṣaṃ dūṣayatād iti ||
ahaṃ vā indramātaram indraujām indrabhrātaram | indrādhivaktrāṃ vīrudham āhārṣaṃ viṣadūṣaṇīm ||
yat kiṃ ca padvac chaphavad yat kāṇḍi yac ca puṣpavat | yad ejati prajāpatiḥ sarvaṃ tad viṣadūṣaṇam ||
sindhuḥ paścād dharuṇaḥ sūryasyodayanaṃ puraḥ | tato yad antarā viṣaṃ tad vācā dūṣayāmasi ||
yāvat sūryo vitapati yāvac cābhi vipaśyati | tāvad viṣasya dūṣaṇaṃ vaco nir mantrayāmahe ||
jihvā me madhusaṃsrāvā jihvā me madhuvādinī | jihve varcasvatī bhava māyaṃmepuruṣo riṣat ||Bhatt.māpate
hā hai kalyāṇi subhage pṛśniparṇy anāture | imaṃ me adyapūruṣaṃ dīrghāyutvāyon naya ||
yābhyo varṣanti vṛṣṭayo yābhir jīvanty aghnyāḥ | tā me viṣasya dūṣaṇīḥ savitā vy akāśayat ||
prajāpatiṣ ṭvā badhnāt prathamam astṛtaṃ vīryāya kam | taṃ te badhnāmy āyuṣe varcasa ojase ca balāya ca- -astṛtastvābhi rakṣatu ||
ūrdhvas tiṣṭha rakṣann apramādam astṛtemaṃ mā tvā dabhan paṇayo yātudhānāḥ | indra iva dasyūn ava dhūnuṣva pṛtanyataḥ sarvāñ chatrūn vi ṣahasva- -astṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu ||
śataṃ cana praharanto 'bhighnanto na tastrire |Bhatt. tastire tasminn indraḥ paryadattaBhatt. adhatta cakṣuḥ prāṇam atho balam astṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu ||
indrasya tvā varmaṇā pari dhāpayāmo yo devānām adhirājo babhūva | puras tvā devāḥ pra ṇayantu sarve 'stṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu ||
asminmaṇāvekaśataṃ vīryāṇi sahasraṃ prāṇā asminn astṛte | vyāghraḥ śatrūn adhi tiṣṭha sarvān yas tvā pṛtanyād adharaḥ so 'stv astṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu ||
ghṛtādulluptomadhumān payasvānBhatt. ulapto sahasraprāṇaḥśatayonir vayodhāḥ |Bhatt. sahasraṃ prāṇaḥ śambhūś ca mayobhūś ca- -ūrjasvāṃś ca payasvāṃś ca- -astṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu ||
yathā tvam uttaro aso asapatnaḥ sapatnahā | sajātānām aso vaśī tathā tvā savitā karad astṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu ||
apaś ca rapaś ca- -ūṣmā ca bāṣpaś ca | śokaścābhiśokaścaBhatt. -bhīśok- tṛtīyekaś ca pareparaś ca takmāna ito naśyata ||
veda vai te takman nāma- -agniṣṭvaṃnāmāsi |Bhatt. ṭaṃ taṃ tveto vi nayāmaḥśani takmā||Bhatt. tvetopa
vṛtrasya haro 'si nabhaso napāt | dyauś cāsmat pṛthivī ca takmānaṃ nāśayatām itaḥ ||
pañcapsinir nāma te mātā sa u ekapsinir ucyase | tasyāhaṃ veda te nāma satakmannir ato drava ||
audumbaraś ca nāmāsiBhatt. audumbalaś priyātithiś ca | taṃ tveto nāśayāmasi brahmaṇā vīryāvatā ||
yo 'sijalpaṃśca lapaṃś ca- -āvāṃ catapaṃśca | tṛtīyekaś camauñjigalaśca te takmāna ito naśyata ||
vikilīda vilohitaBhatt. vikilīta vikāśakraṃdarajjana| giriṃ gaccha dhūmaketo hṛṣe namāṃsi santu te ||
bṛhat tvam agne rakṣo adhamaṃ jahi madhyamaṃ ny uttamaṃ śṛṇīhi | śaṃ no agnir jyotiranīko astu śaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī anehasā ||
māteva pitevābhi rakṣatainaṃ muñcatainaṃ pary aṃhasaḥ ||
vātāj jāto antarikṣād vidyuto jyotiṣas pari | sa no hiraṇyajāḥ śaṅkhaḥ kṛśanaḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ ||
hiraṇyānām eko 'si somād adhi jajñiṣe | rathe 'si dārśata iṣudhau rocanas tvam ||
yo agrato rocanāvān samudrād adhi jajñiṣe | śaṅkhena hatvā rakṣāṃsy atriṇo vi ṣahāmahe ||
ye atriṇo yātudhānā rakṣaso ye kimīdinaḥ | sarvāñchaṅkha tvayā vayaṃ viṣūco vi ṣahāmahe ||
śaṅkhenāmīvām amatiṃ śaṅkhenota sadānvāḥ | śaṅkho no viśvabheṣajaḥ kṛśanaḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ ||Bhatt. aṃhasaṃ
divi jātaḥ samudrataḥ sindhutas pary ābhṛtaḥ | sa no hiraṇyajāḥ śaṅkha āyuṣprataraṇo maṇiḥ ||
devānām asthi kṛśanaṃ babhūva tad ātmanvac caraty apsv antaḥ | taṃ te badhnāmy āyuṣe varcasa ojase ca balāya ca kārśanastvābhi rakṣatu ||
kanyā vār avāyatī somam apisrutāvidat|Bhatt. śrutāvidat astaṃ bharanty abravīd indrāya sunomi tvā śakrāya sunomi tvā ||
asau yaeṣivīrako gṛhaṃgṛhaṃ vicākaśat | imaṃ jambhasutaṃ piba dhānāvantaṃ karambhiṇam apūpavantam ukthinam ||
kuvicchakat kuvit karat kuvin no vasyasas karat | kuvitpatidviṣoyatīrBhatt. patidvito indreṇa saṃ gamāmahai ||
ā cana tvā cikitsāmo 'dhi cana tvā nemasi | śanair iva śanakair iva- -indrāyendo pari srava ||
imāni trīṇi viṣṭapā tānīndra vi rohaya | śiras tatasyorvarām ād idaṃ ma upodare ||
asau ca yā na urvarā- -ād imāṃ tanvaṃ mama | atho tatasyayacchiraḥ sarvā tā romaśā kṛdhi ||
khe rathasya khe 'nasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato | apālām indra triṣ pūtvy akṛṇoḥ sūryatvacam ||
divas pṛṣṭhe madhupṛcaḥ suparṇāḥ pañcāśat te bhuvanasya gopāḥ | ānujāvaram anu rakṣanta ugrā yeṣām indraṃ vīryāyairayanta ||
purohitaḥ parameṣṭhīsvarājyāya-Bhatt. svarāḍ jyāyābhī- -abhīvardham asmā akṛṇod bṛhaspatiḥ | tena sapatnān adharān kṛṇuṣva kṣeme paśūn bahulān vardhayitvā jaitrāyod yātu rathavāhanaṃ te ||
gobhājamaṃśaṃtava ye samānāḥBhatt. aṃsaṃ sarve samagrā dadhṛg ābharanta | abhi vardhasva bhrātṛvyān abhi ye tvā pṛtanyataḥ ||
ni piṇḍhi sarvān dhūrvato 'bhīvardho yathāsasi | abhīvardham abhībhavamBhatt. abhīvargham abhīṣeṇaṃ mahāgaṇam | viśas tvā sarvā ā yantv āpo divyāḥ payasvatīḥ ||
abhi vardhasva prajayā vāvṛdhāno abhy anīkaiḥ paśubhirbhavāsi|Bhatt. bhavāti brahmarājanyairviśyairvāvṛdhānaḥBhatt. brahma rājanyair viśvair śūdrair atīhi sabhayā pṛtanyataḥ ||
vardhasva kṣetraiḥ prathasva prajayā vardhasva vīraiḥ paśubhir bahur bhava | śriyā śulkair yatamas tvā pṛtanyādBhatt. śuklair āptas tubhyaṃ sa balihṛtyāya tiṣṭhatu ||
indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇam agnim ūtaye mārutaṃ śardho aditiṃ havāmahe | rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana ||
ta ādityā ā gatā sarvatātaye bhūta devā vṛtratūryeṣuśaṃbhuvaḥ|Bhatt. saṃbhuvaḥ (…) ||see 1cd
avantu naḥ pitaraḥ supravācanā uta devī devaputre ṛtāvṛdhā | (…) ||see 1cd
narāśaṃsaṃ vājinaṃ vājayantaṃ kṣayadvīraṃ pūṣaṇaṃ sumnair īmahe | (…) ||see 1cd
bṛhaspate sadam in naḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi śaṃ yor yat te manurhitaṃ tad īmahe | (…) ||see 1cd
indraṃ kutso vṛtrahaṇaṃ śacīpatiṃ kāṭe nibāḍha ṛṣir ahvad ūtaye |Bhatt. nivāḍha rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana ||
devair no devy aditir ni pātu devas trātā trāyatām aprayucchan | tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ ||
apa naḥ śośucad agham | agne śuśugdhy ā rayim ||
apa naḥ śośucad agham | sukṣetriyā sugātuyā vasūyā ca yajāmahe ||
apa naḥ śośucad agham | pra yad bhandiṣṭha eṣāṃ prāsmākāsaś ca sūrayaḥ ||
apa naḥ śośucad agham | pra yat te agne sūrayo jāyemahi pra te vayam ||
apa naḥ śośucad agham | pra yad agneḥ sahasvato viśvato yanti bhānavaḥ ||
apa naḥ śośucad agham | tvaṃ hi viśvatomukha viśvataḥ paribhūr asi ||
apa naḥ śośucad agham | dviṣo no viśvatomukha- -ati nāveva pāraya ||
devāḥ śaraṇakṛtaḥ śaraṇā me bhavata prācyā diśo 'gninā rājñādhyakṣeṇa | yaśā bhūyāsaṃ yaśasaṃ mā kṛṇuta cārum annādaṃ parā dviṣantaṃ śṛṇīta ||
(…) bhavatasee 1a dakṣiṇāyā diśa indreṇa rājñā- (…) ||see 1bcd
(…) bhavatasee 1a pratīcyā diśo varuṇena rājñā- (…) ||see 1bcd
(…) bhavata-see 1a -udīcyā diśaḥ somena rājñā- (…) ||see 1bcd
(…) bhavatasee 1a dhruvāyā diśo viṣṇuṇā rājñā- (…) ||see 1bcd
(…) bhavata-see 1a -ūrdhvāyā diśo bṛhaspatinā rājñā- (…) ||see 1bcd
(…) bhavata-see 1a -uttamāyā diśaḥ prajāpatinā rājñā- (…) ||see 1bcd
(…) bhavatasee 1a paramāyā diśaḥ parameṣṭhinā rājñā- (…) ||see 1bcd
devāḥ śaraṇakṛtaḥ śaraṇā me bhavata sarvābhyo digbhya īśānena rājñādhyakṣeṇa | yaśā bhūyāsaṃ yaśasaṃ mā kṛṇuta cārum annādaṃ parā dviṣantaṃ śṛṇīta ||
prātar agniṃ prātar indraṃ havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar aśvinā | prātar bhagaṃ pūṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇaspatiṃ prātaḥ somam uta rudraṃ huvema ||
prātarjitaṃ bhagam ugraṃ huvema vayaṃ putram aditer yo vidhartā | ādhraś cid yaṃ manyamānas turaś cid rājā cid yaṃ bhagaṃ bhakṣīty āha ||
bhaga praṇetar bhaga satyarādho bhagemāṃ dhiyamudavā dadan naḥ | bhaga pra ṇo janaya gobhir aśvair bhaga pra nṛbhir nṛvantaḥ syāma ||
utedānīṃ bhagavantaḥ syāma- -uta prapitva uta madhye ahnām | utodite maghavan sūrye vayaṃ devānāṃ sumatau syāma ||
bhaga eva bhagavām̐ astu devās tena vayaṃ bhagavantaḥ syāma | taṃ tvā bhaga sarva ij johavīti sa no bhaga puraetā bhaveha ||
sam adhvarāyoṣaso namanta dadhikrāveva śucaye padāya | arvācīnaṃ vasuvidaṃ bhagaṃ no ratham ivāśvā vājina ā vahantu ||
aśvāvatīr gomatīr na uṣāso vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ | ghṛtaṃ duhānā viśvataḥ prapītā yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
yas te manyo 'vidhad vajra sāyaka saha ojaḥ puṣyati viśvamānuṣak| sāhyāma dāsam āryaṃ tvayā yujā vayaṃ sahaskṛtena sahasā sahīyasā ||
manyur indro manyur evāsa devo manyur hotā varuṇo jātavedāḥ | manyur viśa īḍate mānuṣīr yāḥ pāhi no manyo tapasā sajoṣāḥ ||
abhīhi manyotavasastavīyān tapasā yujā vi jahi śatrūn | amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhā ca viśvā vasūny ā bharā tvaṃ naḥ ||
tvaṃ hi manyo abhibhūtyojāḥ svayambhūr bhāmo abhimātiṣāhaḥ | viśvacarṣaṇiḥ sahuriḥ sahīyām̐ asmāsv ojaḥ pṛtanāsu dhehi ||
abhāgaḥ sann apa pareto asmi tava kratvā taviṣasya pracetaḥ | taṃ tvā manyo akratur jihīḍāhaṃ svā tanūr baladāvā na ehi ||
ayaṃ teasmyupa na ehy arvāṅ pratīcīnaḥ sahure viśvadāvan | manyo vajrinn upa na ā vavṛtsva hanāvadasyūṃruta bodhy āpe ||
abhi prehi dakṣiṇato bhavā no adhā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri | juhomi te dharuṇo madhvo agram ubhā upāṃśu prathamā pibeva ||
agner manve prathamasya pracetasaḥ pāñcajanyasya bahudhā yam indhate | viśoviśaḥ praviśivāṃsam īmahe sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
sujātaṃjātavedasam agniṃvaiśvānaraṃ vibhum | havyavāhaṃ havāmahe sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
yathā havyaṃ vahasi jātavedo yathā yajñaṃ kalpayasi prajānan | evā devebhyaḥsumatimihāvahaBhatt. sumatiṃ hy ā vaha sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
yāmanyāmann upayuktaṃ vahiṣṭhaṃ karmankarmann ābhagam | agnim īḍe rakṣohaṇaṃ yajñavṛdhaṃ ghṛtāhutaṃ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
yena rṣayo valam adyotayan yujā yenāsurāṇāmayuvantamāyāḥ| yenāgninā paṇīn indro jigāya sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
yena devā amṛtam anvavindan yenauṣadhīr madhumatīr akṛṇvan | yenedaṃ svar ābharan sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
yasyedaṃ pradiśi yad virocate yaj jātaṃ janitavyaṃ ca kevalam | staumy agniṃ nāthito johavīmi sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
vāyoḥ savitur vidathāni manmahe yāv ātmanvad vidatho yau ca rakṣathaḥ | yau viśvasya paribhū babhūvathus tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
yayoḥ saṃkhyātā varimāṇi pārthivā yābhyāṃ rajo gupitam antarikṣam | yayoḥ prayāṃ nānu kaścanānaśe tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
tava vrate ni viśante janāsas tvayyudite prerate citrabhāno | yuvaṃvāyosavitā ca bhuvanāni rakṣathasBhatt.vāyuḥ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
pra sumatiṃ savitar vāya ūtaye mahasvantaṃ matsaraṃ mādayethām | arvāg vāmasya pravatā ni yacchathas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
rayiṃ me poṣaṃ savitota vāyus tanūdakṣam ā suvatāṃ suśevam | ayakṣmatāṃ maho asmāsu dhattaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
apetovāyosavitā ca duṣkṛtamBhatt.vāyuḥ apa yakṣmaṃ śimidāṃ sedhataṃ paraḥ | saṃ hy ūrjā sṛjathaḥ saṃ balenaBhatt. ūrjāḥ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
upa śreṣṭhā na āśiṣo devayor dhāmannasthiran| staumi devaṃ savitāraṃ ca vāyuṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
marutāṃ manve adhi me bruvantu premaṃ vājaṃ vājasātā avantu | āśūnivasuyamānahvaūtayeBhatt. suyamāṃ hva te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
utsam akṣitaṃ vyacanti ye sadā ye vāsiñcantirasam oṣadhīṣu |Bhatt. siñcantu puro dadhe marutaḥpṛśnimātṝṃs te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
payo dhenūnāṃ rasam oṣadhīnāṃ javamarvatāṃ kavayo ya invatha | śagmā bhavantu marutaḥ syonās te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
apaḥ samudrād divam ud vahanti divas pṛthivīm abhi ye sṛjanti | ye +'dbhir īśānā marutaś caranti te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
ye kīlālais tarpayanti ye ghṛtena ye vā vayo medasā saṃsṛjanti | ya īśānā maruto varṣayanti te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
yadīd idaṃ maruto mārutena yadi devā daivyenedṛg āra | yūyamīśidhvevasavas tasya niṣkṛtes te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
tigmam anīkaṃ viditaṃ sahasvan mārutaṃśardhaḥpṛtanāsūgram | staumi maruto nāthito johavīmi te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
manve vāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī subhojasau yeaprathethāmamitā yojanāni | pratiṣṭhe hy abhavataṃ vasūnāṃ te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
pratiṣṭhe hi babhūvathur vasūnāṃ pravṛddhe devī subhage urūcī | dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
yesrotyābibhṛtho yemanuṣyānBhatt. manuṣyāṃ yeamṛtaṃbibhṛtho ye havīṃṣi | dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
yeusriyābibhṛtho ye vanaspatīn yayor vāṃ viśvā bhuvanāny antaḥ | dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
ye kīlālais tarpayatho ye ghṛtena yābhyāṃ na rte kiṃ cana śaknuvanti | dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
asantāpe sutapasā huve vām urvī gabhīre kavibhir namasye | dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
yan medam abhiśocati yena vā yena vā kṛtaṃ pauruṣeyaṃ na daivyam | staumi dyāvāpṛthivī nāthito johavīmi te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
bhavāśarvau manve vāṃ tasya vittaṃ yayor vāṃ viśvaṃ yad idaṃ vitiṣṭhate | yāv īśāte asya dvipadoyaucatuṣpadasBhatt. yaś tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
yayor abhyadhva uta yad dūre cid yau viditāv iṣubhṛtāmasiṣṭhau| bhavāśarvau bhavataṃ me syonau tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
yayor vadhān nāpapadyate kiṃ cana- -antar deveṣūta mānuṣeṣu | bhavāśarvau bhavataṃ me syonau tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
yāv ārebhāte bahu sākam ugrau pra ced asrāṣṭram abhibhāṃ janeṣu | bhavāśarvau bhavataṃ me syonau tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
sahasrākṣau vṛtrahaṇā huve vāṃ dūrehetīsvannemīugrau |Bhatt. svanemī bhavāśarvau bhavataṃ me syonau tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
yaḥ kṛtyākṛd yātudhāno mahālo ni tasmin hatam adhi vajram ugrau | bhavāśarvau bhavataṃ me syonau tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
adhi me brūtaṃ pṛtanāsūgrau saṃ vajreṇa sṛjataṃ yaḥkimīdī|Bhatt. yat kimīdi staumi bhavāśarvau nāthito johavīmi tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
manve vāṃ mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāvṛdhau satyaujasau druhvāṇaṃ yau nudethe | yau satyāvānam avatho haveṣu tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
satyaujasau druhvāṇaṃ yau nudethe pra satyāvānam avatho haveṣu | yau gacchatho nṛcakṣasā babhruṇā sutaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
yāv aṅgiraso 'vatho yāv agastiṃ mitrāvaruṇā jamadagnim atrim | yau kaśyapam avatho yau vasiṣṭhaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
yau bharadvājam avatho vadhryaśvaṃ viśvāmitraṃ varuṇa mitra kutsam | yau kakṣīvantam avathaḥ prota kaṇvaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
yau śyāvāśyam avatho yau gaviṣṭhiraṃBhatt. śyāvākṣam; misprint? mitrāvaruṇā purumīḍham atrim | yau vimadam avathaḥ saptavadhriṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
yau medhātithim avatho yau triśokaṃ mitrāvaruṇāuśanāṃkāvyaṃ yau |Bhatt. uśanaṃ yau mudgalam avatho gotamaṃ ca tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
yayo rathaḥ satyavartmarjuraśmir mithuyā carantam abhiyāti dūṣayan | staumi mitrāvaruṇā nāthito johavīmi tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
indrasya manve śaśvad yasya manvire vṛtraghna stomā upamemaāguḥ |Bhatt. memam yo dāśuṣaḥ sukṛto havam etā sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
yaś carṣaṇipro vṛṣabhaḥ svarvid yasya grāvāṇaḥ pravadanti nṛmṇe | yasyādhvaraḥ saptahotāmadacyut sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
ya ugrāṇām ugrabāhur yajur yo dānavānāṃ balam āsasāda | yena jitāḥ sindhavo yena gāvaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
yasya vaśāsa ṛṣabhāsa ukṣaṇo yasmai mīyante svaravaḥ svarvide | yasmai śukraḥ pavatebrahmaśumbhitaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
yasya juṣṭiṃ sominaḥ kāmayante yaṃ havanta iṣuvantaṃ gaviṣṭau | yasminn arkaḥ śiśriye yasminn ojaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
ya uttamaḥ karmakṛtyāya jajñe yasya vīryaṃ prathamasyānubuddham |Bhatt. -nubaddham yenodyato vajro 'bhyāyatāhiṃ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
yaḥ saṃgrāmān nayati saṃ yudhe vaśīBhatt. yuge yaḥ puṣṭāni saṃsṛjati dvayāni | staumīndraṃ nāthito johavīmi sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
śunaṃ vatsān apā karomi śunaṃ badhnāmi tantyām | āgrayaṇaṃ brahmaṇāṃ havis tasmiñjāgāra kaśyapaḥ ||
bāhuṃ vatsam upanayan pātre gāṃ duhann abravīt | ariṣṭaṃ brahmabhyo haviḥ śivaṃ kṛṇotu kaśyapaḥ ||
trayas tiṣṭhanti sukṛtasya loke trayo 'tīkāśās trīṇi śīrṣāṇy eṣām | trayas tiṣṭhanti parigṛhya kumbhīṃ yathā haviḥ kaśyapa na vyathātai ||
satyāt sambhūto vadati taṇḍulān kṣīra āvapan | ṛṣir brahmabhya āgrayaṇaṃ ni vedayatu kaśyapaḥ ||
