ṛtumukhe candrabhāgaḥ pātra odanam ud dharāt | prāśnantu brahmāṇo havir yathā vedena kaśyapaḥ ||
ye bhūtānyasṛjanta ye bhūtāny akalpayan | sarvasya vidvān adhvaryuḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ bhavatu kaśyapaḥ ||
śivā āpo vatsebhyaḥ śivā bhavantv oṣadhīḥ | vāto vatsebhyaḥ kaśyapaḥ śivaḥ śivaṃ tapatu sūryaḥ ||
namaḥ piśaṅgabāhvai sindhau jātāyā ugrāyai | yo asyai nama it karad aped asya gṛhād ayat ||
apehi no gṛhebhyo apehi vatsatantyāḥ | ātmānam atra rotsyasy ava roha mahānasāt ||
hā amba suhūtale atho haisāmanantame| putro yas te pṛśnibāhus tam u tvaṃ sāmanaṃ kṛdhi | atho duhitaraṃ naptrīm atho tvaṃ sāmanā bhava ||
bhūtapatir nir ajatv indraś cetaḥ sadānvāḥ | gṛhasya budhna āsīnās tā vajreṇādhi tiṣṭhatu ||
apetetaḥ sadānvā ahiṃsantīr imaṃ gṛham | dhenur vātra ya sthāsyaty anaḍvān verayā saha ||
yā sahamānā carasi sāsahāna iva rṣabhaḥ | sadānvāghnīṃ tvā vayaṃ jaitrāyācchā vadāmasi ||
sahasva no abhimātiṃ sahasva pṛtanāyataḥ | sahasva sarvā rakṣāṃsi sahamānāsy oṣadhe ||
tvaṃ vyāghrān sahase tvaṃsiṃhām̐ubhayādataḥ | makṣāś cit kṛṇvānā madhu tvaṃ sahasa oṣadhe ||
iyaṃ pitrerāṣṭryety agre prathamāya januṣebhūmaniṣṭhāḥ| tasmā etaṃ surucaṃ hvāram ahyaṃ gharmaṃ śrīṇanti prathamasyadhāsyoḥ||
brahma jajñānaṃ prathamaṃ purastād vi sīmataḥ suruco vena āvaḥ | sa budhnyā upamā asya viṣṭhāḥ sataś ca yonim asataś ca vi vaḥ ||
pra yo jajñe vidvām̐ asya bandhuṃ viśvāni devo janimā vivakti | brahma brahmaṇa uj jabhāra madhyān nīcāduccāsvadhā abhi pra tasthau ||
mahān mahī askabhāyad vi jāto dyāṃ dvitaḥ pārthivaṃ ca rajaḥ | sabudhnādāṣṭra januṣābhy agraṃ bṛhaspatir devatā tasya samrāṭ ||
nūnaṃ tad asya gavyaṃ hinoti maho devasya pūrvasya mahi | eṣa jajñe bahubhiḥ sākam itthā pūrvādardhādavithuraś ca san nu ||
sa hi divaḥ sa pṛthivyā ṛteṣṭhā mahi kṣāman rajasī vi ṣkabhāyati | ahar yac chukraṃ jyotiṣo janiṣṭa- -adhā dyumanto vi vasantv ariprāḥ ||
evātharvā pitaraṃ viśvadevaṃ bṛhaspatir namasāvocad accha | tvaṃ viśvasya janitā dhāsy agre kavir devān na dabhāya svadhāvaḥ ||
mūrdhnā yo agram abhyarty ojasā bṛhaspatimā vivāsanti devāḥ | bhinad valaṃ vi mṛdho dardarīti kanikradad gāḥ svar apo jigāya ||
ud apaptad asau sūryaḥ purudṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā | udāyan raśmibhirhantu- -udāyann arasām̐ akaḥ ||
ny amrucad asau sūryo viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā | nimrocan raśmibhir hantu nimrocann arasām̐ akaḥ ||
ye ca dṛṣṭā ye cādṛṣṭā ubhayehāviṣyavaḥ| teṣāṃ vo agrabhaṃ nāma sarve sākaṃ nijasyata||
adṛṣṭahananī vīrud amitaujā viṣāsahi | cukākaṇi tvaṃ jajñiṣe sādṛṣṭāñ jātaśo jahi ||
jahi jyeṣṭham adṛṣṭānāṃ sarpāṇāṃ moghacāriṇām | krimīṇāṃ sarvā jātāni ?pauñjaṣṭa ivayavaṃmṛṇa ||
yaś ca todo yaś ca sarpa ekādaśaśca yo vṛṣā |ekādaśaś(?); Bhatt. ekādṛṣṭaś cukākaṇi tvaṃ tān vṛśca vṛkṣaṃ paraśumān iva ||
saṃ vṛścaināṃś cukākaṇi vṛkṣaṃ paraśumān iva | krimīṇāṃ sarvā jātāni saṃ dahāgnir ivolapam ||
methiṣṭhāagniraghalas tviṣīmān krimīṇāṃ jātāni pradunotusarvā | bṛhaspatermedinejātavedā adṛṣṭān hantu dṛṣadeva māṣān ||
mamāgne varco vihaveṣv astu vayaṃ tvendhānās tanvaṃ puṣema | mahyaṃ namantāṃ pradiśaś catasras tvayādhyakṣeṇa pṛtanā jayema ||
agne manyuṃ pratinudan pareṣāṃ tvaṃ no gopāḥ pari pāhi viśvataḥ | apāñco yantu prabudhā durasyavo 'maiṣāṃ cittaṃ bahudhā vi naśyatu ||
mama devā vihave santu sarva indravanto maruto viṣṇur agniḥ | mamāntarikṣam urulokam astu mahyaṃ vātaḥ pavatāṃ kāme asmin ||
mahyaṃ yajantāṃ mama yānīṣṭā- -ākūtiḥ satyā manaso me astu | eno mā ni gāṃ katamac canāhaṃ viśve devā abhi rakṣantu mām iha ||
mahyaṃ devā draviṇam ā yajantāṃ mamāśīr astu mama devahūtiḥ | daivā hotāraḥ saniṣan na etad ariṣṭāḥ syāma tanvā suvīrāḥ ||
devīḥ ṣaḍ urvīruruṇas karātha viśve devāsa iha mādayadhvam | māhāsmahiprajayā mā dhanena mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan ||
uruvyacā no mahiṣaḥ śarma yacchād asmin vāje puruhūtaḥ purukṣuḥ | sa naḥ prajāyaiharyaśvamṛḍa- -indra mā no rīriṣo mā parā dāḥ ||
dhātā vidhartā bhuvanasya yas patiḥ savitā devo abhimātiṣāhaḥ | bṛhaspatir indrāgnī aśvinobhā devāḥ pāntu yajamānaṃ nirṛthāt ||
ihārvāñcam ati hvaya indraṃ jaitrāya jetave | asmākam astu kevala itaḥ kṛṇotu vīryam ||
arvāñcam indramamutohavāmahe yo gojid dhanajid aśvajid yaḥ | imaṃ no yajñaṃ vihave juṣasva- -asmākaṃ kṛṇmo harivo medinaṃ tvā ||
trātāram indram avitāram indraṃ havehave suhavaṃ śūram indram | huvema śakraṃ puruhūtam indraṃ svasti no maghavān pātv indraḥ ||
tisro devīr mahi me śarma yacchan prajāyai me tanve yac ca puṣṭam | māṃ viśaḥ saṃmanaso juṣantāṃ pitryaṃ kṣetraṃ prati jānātv asmān ||
yo naḥ śakrābhimanyunā- -indrāmitro jighāṃsati | tvaṃ taṃ vṛtrahañ jahi vasvasmabhyam ā bhara ||
ye naḥ śapanty apa te bhavantv indrāgnibhyām apa bādhāmahe tān | ādityā rudrā uparispṛśo mām ugraṃ cettāram adhirājam akran ||
pṛthivī vaśā sāgniṃ garbhaṃ dadhe semaṃ pāhi tasyai te vidheyaṃ tasyai te namas tasmai te svāhā ||
antarikṣaṃ vaśā sā vāyuṃ garbhaṃ (…) ||see 1abc
dyaur vaśā sā sūryaṃ garbhaṃ (…) ||see 1abc
ṛg vaśā sā sāma garbhaṃ (…) ||see 1abc
dakṣiṇā vaśā sā yajñaṃ garbhaṃ (…) ||see 1abc
viḍ vaśā sā kṣatriyaṃ garbhaṃ (…) ||see 1abc
vāg vaśā sā parameṣṭhiṇaṃ garbhaṃ (…) ||see 1abc
vaśā vaśā sā rājanyaṃ garbhaṃ (…) ||see 1abc
samā vaśā sā saṃvatsaraṃ garbhaṃ dadhe semaṃ pāhi tasyai te vidheyaṃ tasyai te namas tasmai te svāhā ||
sapta sūryā divam anupraviṣṭās tān pathā vāanveti dakṣiṇāvān | te 'smai sarve ghṛtam ā tapanty ūrjaṃ duhānā anapasphurantaḥ ||
ātapan kṣayatinīcā dāsavyādhīniṣṭapan | adhāyatpatraḥ sūrya ud eti bṛhatīr anu ||
ātaptā pitṝn vidma dasyūn niṣṭaptā vayam | guhā ye 'nye sūryāḥ svadhām anu caranti te ||
dyauḥ sacate 'parāñ janāsaḥ pañcānye paro diva ā kṣiyanti | tāṃ brahmadivaṃbṛhad ā viveśa yas tān pravedaprataramatīryata||
yo dadāti yo dadate yo vānidhīnśraddadhāno nidhatte | yamo vaivasvatān rājā sarvānrakṣatuśevadhīn ||
mā vidan paryāyiṇo ye dakṣiṇāḥ parimuṣṇanti dattam | sugena tān pathā sarvān yamo rājātineṣati||
yena pathā vaivasvato yamo rājetoyayau| agnir nas tena nayatu prajānan vaiśvānaraḥ pathikṛd viśvagṛṣṭiḥ ||
mahijyotir nihitaṃ martyeṣu yena devāso atarannarātīn| tenemaṃ setum ati geṣma sarve vaiśvānaraṃ jyotiramīvadevāḥ ||
ud vayaṃ tamasas pari jyotiṣ paśyanta uttaram | devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam ||
āroko bhrājaḥ paṭaraḥ pataṅgaḥ svarṇaro jyotiṣīmān vibhāsaḥ | te 'smai sarve ghṛtam ā tapanty ūrjaṃ duhānā anapasphurantaḥ ||
samutpatantu pradiśo nabhasvatīḥ sam abhrāṇi vātajūtāni yantu | maharṣabhasya nadato nabhasvato vāśrā āpaḥ pṛthivīṃ tarpayantu ||
sam īkṣayati viṣvagvātonabhāṃsy apāṃ vegāsaḥ pṛthag ut patantu | varṣasya sargāmahayantubhūmiṃ pṛthag jāyantām oṣadhayo viśvarūpāḥ ||
abhi kranda stanayārdayodadhiṃ bhūmiṃ parjanya payasā sam aṅdhi | tvayā varṣaṃ bahulam etu sṛṣṭam āśāraiṣī kṛśagur etv astam ||
ud īrayata marutaḥ samudratas tveṣāarkānabha ut pātayantu | pra varṣayantitaviṣāḥsudānavo 'pāṃ rasair oṣadhayaḥ sacantām ||
gaṇās tvopa gāyantu mārutāḥ parjanya ghoṣiṇaḥ pṛthak | sargā varṣasya varṣataḥ sṛjantu pṛthivīm abhi ||
sam avantu sudānava utsā ajagarā uta | vātā varṣasya varṣataḥ pra vāntu pṛthivīm anu ||
vāto vidyud abhraṃ varṣaṃ sam avantu sudānavaḥ | pra pyāyasva pra pinvasva saṃ bhūmiṃ payasā sṛja ||
apām agnis tanūbhiḥ saṃvidāno ya oṣadhīnām adhipā babhūva | sa no varṣaṃ vanutāṃ jātavedāḥ prāṇaṃ prajābhyo amṛtaṃ divas pari ||
āśām-āśāṃ vi dyotatāṃ vātā vāntu diśo-diśaḥ | marudbhiḥ pracyutā meghā varṣantu pṛthivīm abhi ||read anu with K instead of abhi?)
prajāpatiḥ salilād ā samudrād āpa īrayann udadhim ardayāti | pra pyāyatāṃvṛṣṇoaśvasya reto 'rvāṅ etena stanayitnunehy apo niṣiñcann asuraḥ pitā naḥ ||
śvasantugargarā apām ava nīcīr apaḥ sṛja | vadantu pṛśnibāhavo maṇḍūkāīriṇānu ||
saṃvatsaraṃ śaśayānā brāhmaṇā vratacāriṇaḥ | vācaṃparjanyajinvatāṃ pramaṇḍūkāavādiṣuḥ ||
upapravada maṇḍūki varṣam ā vada tāduri | madhye hradasya plavasva vigṛhya caturaḥ padaḥ ||
mahāntaṃ kośamudacābhi ṣiñca savidyutaṃ bhavatu vātu vātaḥ | tanvatāṃ yajñaṃ bahudhā visṛṣṭam ānandinīroṣadhayo bhavantu ||
yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvad vā sapta sindhavovitaṣṭhuḥ| vācaṃ viṣasya dūṣaṇīṃ tām ito niravādiṣam||
suparṇas tvā garutmān viṣa prathamam āvayat | nāropayo nāmādaya utāsmā abhavat pituḥ ||readabhavaḥ?
yāṃ tvāsthat pañcāṅgulir vakrāccid adhi dhanvanaḥ | apaskambhasya bāhvor nir avocam ahaṃ viṣam ||
śalyād viṣaṃ nir avocam añjanāt parṇadher uta | apāṣṭhāc chṛṅgāt kurmalān nir avocam ahaṃ viṣam ||
arasas ta iṣo śalyo 'tho te 'rasaṃ viṣam | utārasasya vṛkṣasya dhanuṣ ṭe arasārasam ||
ye +'pīṣan ye 'dihan ya āsyan ye 'vāsṛjan | sarve te vadhrayaḥ santu vadhrir viṣagiriṣ kṛtaḥ ||
vadhrayas te khanitāro vadhris tvam asy oṣadhe | vadhriḥ sa parvato girir yato jātam idaṃ viṣam ||
vār idaṃ vārayātai varuṇāvata ābhṛtam | tatrāmṛtasyāsiktaṃ tac cakārārasaṃ viṣam ||
khādireṇa śalilena- -atho kaṅkatadantyā | atho viṣasya yad viṣaṃ tena pāpīr anīnaśam ||
kityā śataparvaṇā sahasrākṣeṇa carmaṇā | tīkṣṇābhir abhribhir vayaṃ nir ajāmaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
sahaḥsahasvatyasi- -itaḥ kaṇvāḥ paro 'nudaḥ | imā yā adhunāgatā yāś ceha grahaṇīḥ purā ||
na tā itthā na tā ihāvamāsatā ukhevaśṛṅgavac chiraḥ | sadānvā brahmaṇaspate tīkṣṇaśṛṅgodṛṣann ihi ||
vi te nu manthāḥśaśrire bibhide te gadohanī | dadau te adya gauḥ kaṇve parehy avaraṃ mṛṇe ||
yās tarke tiṣṭhanti yā valīke yāḥ preṅkhepreṅkhayantauta yā nu ghorāḥ | yā garbhān pramṛśanti sarvāḥ pāpīr anīnaśam ||
yāś celaṃ vasata uta yā nudūrśaṃ nīlaṃ piśaṅgam uta lohitaṃ yāḥ | yā garbhān pramṛśanti sarvāḥ pāpīr anīnaśam ||
ākhidantīr vikhidantīḥ prāṇam asyāpi nahyata | durṇāmnīḥ sarvāḥ saṃgatya māmuṣyocchiṣṭakiṃ cana ||
iyaṃ yāmusalāhatā dṛṣatpiṣṭā viṣāsutā | tapur agnistapurdyaus tapustvaṃ sure bhava ||
viṣaṃ te tokma rohayanto 'bruvan viṣaṃ kumbhe 'va srava | viṣaṃ taāmanaṃsure viṣaṃ tvaṃ hasta āhitā viṣaṃ pratihitā bhava ||
siṃhas te astu taṇḍulo vyāghraḥ paryodanam | pṛdākūrastu nagnahur vṛkasya hṛdi saṃ srava ||
iyaṃ yā pātra āsūtā śaṣpasrakvāvighasvarī| varāhamanyur ajany uttānapādam ardaya ||
udardanīpracyavanī pāṃsupiṅgā vighasvarī | utkhātamanyur ajani yat paścāt tat puras kṛdhi ||
viṣaṃ te pavane sure rudhiraṃ sthāle astu te | mathnantv anyo anyasmā iṣudhīṃstvaddhanus tvat ||
viṣapāvāno rudhirāś caranti pātāro martās tavase sura ime | hatāso anye yodhayantyanyāṃs tam ic chaṃsa mahimānaṃ surāyāḥ ||
tān vīrudho visravo balena- -ut pātaya mādaya yodhanāyai | bhinnāratnīr bhinnaśīrṣṇā sam ṛcchatām ārtacelo visravan te surāpaḥ ||
viṣāsutāṃ pibatajarhṛṣāṇā asnā saṃsṛṣṭaṃ rudhireṇa miśrām | chinnahastaś carati grāme antar vairahatyāni bahudhā paṇāyan ||
asimatīm iṣumatīm un nayāmi satād adhi | mādayābhi mādaya- -ahirivainānpra ropaya- -anyo 'nyasya moc chiṣan ||
anu te manyatām agnir varuṇas te 'nu manyatām | tatas te putro jāyatāṃ sa varmī goṣu yudhyatām ||
idaṃ vāyo 'nu jānīhi- -idam indra bṛhaspate | āñjanaṃ putravedanaṃ kṛṇmaḥpuṃsavanaṃ vayam ||
yenaitat pariṣṭabhitaṃ yasmāt putraṃ na vindase | indrāgnī tasmāt tvainasaḥ pari pātām ahardivi ||
atharvāṇo aṅgiraso viśve devā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ | śṛṇvantv adya me havam asyai putrāya vettave ||
indrāṇī varuṇānī sinīvāly utāditiḥ | varutryugrā patnīnāṃ putram adyadideṣṭute ||
putraṃ te mitrāvaruṇā putraṃ devī sarasvatī | putraṃ te aśvinobhā- -ā dhattāṃ puṣkarasrajā ||
yeṣāṃ ca nāma jagrabha yeṣāṃ ca nopasasmara | devās te sarve saṃgatya putraṃ jaivātṛkaṃ dadan ||
ātmana enaṃ nirmimīṣva sa tvat pari jāyatām | tvaṃ bījam urvareva tvaṃbibhṛhiyonyām ||
pṛthivī saha yajñair nakṣatraiḥ saha sūryaḥ | vātaḥ patatribhiḥ saha putram adya dideṣṭu te ||
vṛṣājajñemadhavāno 'yaṃ madhumatībhyaḥ | sa u te yonim ā śayāṃ baḍdakṣaḥpuruṣo bhavan ||
yoniṃ gaccha madhavāna yonyāṃ puruṣo bhava | tataḥ punar nir āyasi śīrṣṇā śroṇī vinonudat ||
bāṇavām̐ iṣudher iva kṛṇvan pitror yathā priyam | śroṇīahiṃsannantarā daśame māsy āyasi ||
sa pratyaṅpratyāvarttā- -itesaṃvatsare punaḥ | yathā jīvāsi bhadrayā bibharat tvāmahābhave||
saṃ te yonim acīkl̥paṃ suprajāstvāya bhadrayā | tatrā siñcasva vṛṣṇyaṃ daśamāsyam avihrutam ||
garbhas te yonim ā śayāṃ garbhojarāyvā śayām |jarāyvā?; Bhatt. and all mss. jarāyuvā kumāra ulbam ā śayāṃ tvaṣṭrākl̥pto yathāparu ||
yathā rājan madhavāna tvaṃ bījaṃ virohasi | evā tvam asyā nir bhindhi kumāraṃ yonyā adhi ||
garbham adhān madhavāno garbhaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ | garbhaṃ ta indraś cāgniś ca garbhaṃ dhātā dadhātu te ||
śivaḥ śivābhir vayasvan saṃ gacchasva tanvā jātavedaḥ | ratnaṃ dadhānaḥ sumanāḥ purastād gṛhebhyas tvā varcase nir vapāmi ||
pṛthivyāṃ gharma stabhito 'ntarikṣe divi śritaḥ | dyaur enaṃ sarvataḥ pātu yas tvā pacaty odana ||
ye samudram airayan ye ca sindhuṃ ye 'ntarikṣaṃ pṛthivīm uta dyām | ye vātena sarathaṃ yānti devās tān āpnoty odanapāko atra ||
ṛcā kumbhyadhihitā sāmnā pacyata odanaḥ | aṃśuṃ somasyaitaṃ manye vaiśvadevam idaṃ haviḥ ||
ulūkhale musale ye ca śūrpe bhūmyām ukhāyāṃ yadivāsasañja| yā vipruṣo yāni nirṇejanāni sarvaṃ tat te brahmaṇā pūrayāmi ||
ūrdhvaḥ prehi mā saṃ vikthā vy asya rajo antaram | rakṣāṃsi sarvā tīrtvā- -athā roha divaṃ tvam ||
turo no aturo bhava saṃ dhībhir dhīyatām ayam | saṃ pṛthivyā sam agninā saṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ saṃ devānāmapasyayā||
ājaddviṣaḥ sukṛtasya loke tṛtīye nāke adhi rocane divaḥ | mṛtyoḥ padaṃ yopayantonveta paścā nikṛtya mṛtyuṃ padayopanena ||
bhūtyā mukham asi satyasya raśmir uccaiḥśloko divaṃ gaccha | uc chrayethāṃ haviṣkṛtau sādhu devān saparyatam ṛjīṣam apalumpatam||
āpo devīr yajñakṛtaś citrā devīr haviṣkṛtaḥ | ekapātra odano 'gniṣṭomena saṃmitaḥ ||
gāyatrī havyavāḍ asi devatāgniḥ sam idhyase | sahasradhāraṃ sukṛtasya loke ghṛtapṛṣṭham amartyau ||
tapaś ca satyaṃ caudanaṃ prāśnītāṃ parameṣṭhinau | tābhyāṃ vai svar ābhṛtaṃ tenādhipatir ucyase ||
urugāyo *'si vāyoḥ prāṇena saṃmitaḥ | apa mṛdhrāṇi maj jahi mukṣīyaduritād aham ||
apa rakṣāṃsi tejasā devebhyo havyam arca tam | vyacasvānsaprathāasi ||
uccaiḥ suparṇo divam ut patāmuṃ priyaṃ devebhyo mā kṛṇv ṛṣibhyaḥ pari dehi mām | śukraṃ śukreṇa bhakṣayā pibantu sukṛto madhu ||
dvayā devā upa no yajñam āgur yān odano juṣateyaiśca pṛṣṭaḥ | ādityā aṅgirasaḥ svargam imaṃ prāśnantv ṛtubhir niṣadya ||
pīyūṣasya kṣīrasya sarpiṣo 'nnasyāgraṃ saṃ bharāma etat | etaṃ bhāgamahutādbhyaḥpra hiṇmas tan no haviḥ prati gṛhantu devā daivāḥ ||
hutādo 'nye 'hutādo 'nye vaiśvadevaṃ havir ubhaye saṃ caranti | te samyañca iha mādayantām iṣam ūrjaṃ yajamānāya matsva ||
memā bhavo mā śarvo vadhīd gā mā vatsānklomaśvayovidan naḥ | ye jātā ye ca garbheṣv antar ariṣṭāagnestanam ā rabhantām ||
imā gāvo vijāvatīḥ prajāvatī strīṣusaṃmanaso bhavantu | āsubhūmānyapi pṛñcantu devā āsāṃ vatsān āyuṣā medasā saṃ sṛjāmi ||
pra vīyantāṃ striyo gāvo viṣṇur yonim anu kalpayāti | pratigṛhṇatīr ṛṣabhasya reta ukṣānaḍvāṃś carati vāsitām anu ||
prayatam agraṃ na hinasti kiṃ cana yathākāmaṃ kṛṇuta somyaṃ madhu | sādhu yajñam ahutādo nayantu rāyaspoṣā yajamānaṃ sacantām ||
ni te padāṃ pṛthivī yantusindhava ud oṣadhayo jihatāṃ preratām irāḥ | parjanyasya maruta udadhiṃ sānv ā hata bhadraṃ sasyaṃ pacyatāṃ modatāṃ jagat ||
sapta ṛṣayaḥ saptasadāṃsyeṣāṃ daśakṣipoaśvinoḥ pañca vājāḥ | prāṇo vyāno mana ākūtir vāg devī devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānatī ||
ye ca dṛṣṭā ye cādṛṣṭāḥ krimayaḥkikṛśāśca ye | teṣāṃ śirāṃsy asinā chinadmy athāsāṃ vatsān āyuṣā medasā saṃ sṛjāmi ||
dyauś cemaṃ yajñaṃ pṛthivī ca saṃ duhātāṃ mātariśvā pavamānaḥ purastāt | tvaṣṭā vāyuḥ saha somena vāta imaṃ saṃ duhrām anapasphurantaḥ ||
gharmaṃ tapāmy amṛtasya dhārayā devebhyo havyaṃ paride savitre | śukraṃ devāḥ śṛtam adantu havyam āsañjuhvānamamṛtasya yonau ||
udvāsayāgneḥśṛtam akarma havyam ā roha pṛṣṭham amṛtasya dhāma | vanaspataya upa barhi stṛṇīta madhvā samantaṃ ghṛtavat karātha ||
yo 'psu yakṣmaḥ śamayāmi taṃ va ūrjā gavyūtiṃ sam anajmy etām | stanyaṃ kṣīram aviṣaṃ vaḥ kṛṇomy asuṃdhayanto 'pi yūtham eta ||asuṃ?; Bhatt. aśundhayanto
iḍānāṃ putrā uta mitriyāṇāṃ payo dhayantv ahṛṇīyamānāḥ | ṛtubhiḥ sasyam uta kl̥ptam astv iryo gopā rakṣatu vāyur enāḥ ||
pibata ghṛtaṃ yatidhā va etad guhā hitaṃ nihitaṃ mānaveṣu | viśve devā vaiśvadevaś cāgnau yathābhāgaṃ haviṣo mādayadhvam ||
yo devānām asi śreṣṭho rudras tanticaro vṛṣā | ariṣṭā asmākaṃ vīrā etad astu hutaṃ tava ||
pūrṇam ahaṃ karīṣiṇaṃ śatavantaṃ sahasriṇam | viśvebhir agne devair imaṃ goṣṭhaṃ sahāruham ||
devainasād unmaditaṃ kṣetriyāc chapathād uta | muñcantu tasmāt tvā devā unmattaṃ rakṣasas pari ||
muniṃ bhavantaṃ pari yānivāvṛtū rakṣāṃsy agna ululā karikratu | atas tvaṃ no adhi pāhi vājinn indreṇa medī bṛhate raṇāya ||
yathāgne devā ṛbhavo manīṣiṇo munim unmattam asṛjan nir enasaḥ | evā te śakro abhayaṃ kṛṇotu mucyasvainaso vi nayāmi rakṣaḥ ||
yathā gāvaś ca bhūmyāṃ puruṣāś ca nyokasaḥ | evonmattasya te mune gṛhṇātu pṛthivī manaḥ ||
muniṃ dādhāra pṛthivī muniṃ dyaur abhi rakṣati | muniṃ hi viśvā bhūtāni munim indro adīdharat parā rakṣaḥ suvāmi te ||
imaṃ me agne puruṣaṃ mumugdhi ya āvitto grāhyā lālapīti | ato *'dhi te kṛṇavad bhāgadheyam anunmaditoagado yathāsat ||
agniṣ ṭe ni śamayatu yat ta etan mana uhyate |readudyutam? (see Lubostky 2002, 90) juhomi vidvāṃs te havir yathānunmadito bhuvaḥ ||
punas tvādurapsarasaḥ punar vātaḥ punar diśaḥ | punar yamaḥ punar yamasya dūtās te tvā muñcantv aṃhasaḥ | jivātave na martave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye ||
uta devā avahitaṃ devā ud dharatā punaḥ | uto mariṣyantaṃ devā daivāḥkṛṇutha jīvase ||
ā tvāgamaṃśaṃtātibhirBhatt.śantātibhir atho ariṣṭatātibhiḥ | dakṣaṃ te bhadram āhārṣaṃ parā suvāmy āmayat ||
dvāv imau vātau vāta ā sindhor ā parāvataḥ | dakṣaṃ te anya ā vātu parānyo vātu yad rapaḥ ||
ā vāta vāhi bheṣajaṃ vi vāta vāhi yad rapaḥ | tvaṃ hi viśvabheṣajo devānāṃ dūta īyase ||
trāyantām imaṃ devās trāyantāṃ maruto gaṇaiḥ | trāyantāṃ viśvā bhūtāni yathāyam agado 'sati ||
ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī ghṛtenāpaḥ sam ukṣata | ghṛtena mucyasvainaso yad ātmakṛtam āritha ||
ayaṃ me hasto bhagavān ayaṃ me bhagavattaraḥ | ayaṃ me viśvabheṣajo 'yaṃ śivābhimarśanaḥ ||
hastābhyāṃ daśaśākhābhyāṃ jihvā vācaḥ purogavī | anāmayitnubhyāṃ śaṃbhubhyāṃ tābhyāṃ tvābhi mṛśāmasi ||
āpa id vā u bheṣajīr āpo amīvacātanīḥ | āpo viśvasya bheṣajīs tās te kṛṇvantu bheṣajam ||
sahṛdayaṃsāṃmanasyam avidveṣaṃ kṛṇomi vaḥ | anyo anyam abhiharyata vatsaṃ jātam ivāghnyā ||
anuvrataḥ pituḥ putro mātrā bhavatusavrataḥ| jāyā patye madhumatīṃ vācaṃ vadatu śantivām ||
mā bhrātā bhrātaraṃdvikṣan mā svasāram uta svasā | samyañcaḥ savratā bhūtvā vācaṃvadatabhadrayā ||
yena devā na viyanti no ca vidviṣate mithaḥ | tat kṛṇmo brahma vo gṛhe saṃjñānaṃ puruṣebhyaḥ ||
jyāyasvantaś cittino mā viyauṣṭa saṃrādhayantaḥ sadhurāś carantaḥ | anyo anyasmai valgu vadantaeta samagrā stha sadhrīcīnāḥ ||
samānī prapā saha vo 'nnabhāgaḥ samāne yoktre saha vo yunajmi | samyañco 'gniṃ saparyata- -arā nābhim ivābhitaḥ ||
yena devā haviṣā yajatrā apapāpmānam aghnata | krodhaṃ manyumanṛtaṃbhāmaṃ duruktam abhiśocanam āre yakṣmaṃ ni dadhmasi ||
sadhrīcīnān vaḥ saṃmanasaḥ kṛṇomy ekaśnuṣṭīnsaṃvananena saṃhṛdaḥ | devā ived amṛtaṃ rakṣamāṇāḥ sāyaṃprātaḥ susamitir vo astu ||
paro 'pehi paraś cara paras tarda parastaram | agner vātasya dhrājyā apa bādhe ahaṃ tvām ||
udakasyedam ayanaṃ vātasyedaṃ nibhañjanam | agner dhūmasyāyaṃ panthā neha tardāyanaṃ tava ||
pari tvā kṛṣṇavartanir agnir dhūmenārciṣā | sa tvaṃ tarda paraś cara- -anyattarddhi tṛṇaṃ yavāt ||
ye tardā asureṣitā devebhir iṣitāś ca ye | sarvāṃs tān brahmaṇā vayaṃ śalabhāñ jambhayāmasi ||
śalabhasya śalabhyās tardasyo patatriṇaḥ |read perhapstardasyotpatatriṇaḥfollowing Bhatt. agner vātasya dhrājyā- -api nahyāma āsyam ||
idaṃ yad gavi bheṣajaṃ viśvād rūpāt samābhṛtam | ākhor ghuṇasya tardasya teṣāṃ snāvnāpi nahyata ||
dṛṣṭā tvam asi gandhena- -oṣadhir ghuṇajambhanī | ākhor ghuṇasya jātāni tāni jambhaya tejasā ||
tūlaṃ tardas tṛṇasyāttu mūlam ākhur dhiyeṣitaḥ | atho vṛkṣasya phalgu yad ghuṇā adantu mā yavam ||
dyauś ca naḥ pitā pṛthivī ca mātā- -agniś ca nṛcakṣā jātavedāḥ | te takmānam adharāñcaṃ nyañcaṃ daśāhnam asyantv adhi dūram asmat ||
takman yaṃ te kṣetrabhāgam apābhajaṃ pṛthivyāḥ pūrve ardhe | atihāya tam atha nohinassi grāhiḥ kila tvā grahīṣyati kilāsaśīrṣaḥ ||
takman parvatā ime himavantaḥ somapṛṣṭhāḥ | vātaṃ dūtaṃ bhiṣajaṃ no akran naśyeto maraṭām̐ abhi ||
na tvā striyaḥ kāmayante na pumāṃsaḥ katame cana | neha takmakāmyā- -alpo roditi no mahān ||
mā no hiṃsīr mahato mā hiṃsīr mahyas tvam | kumārān babhro mā hiṃsīr mā no hiṃsīḥ kumāryaḥ ||
yaḥ sākam utpātayasi balāsaṃ kāsam udrajam | bhīmās te takman hetayas tābhi ṣma pari vṛṅdhi naḥ ||
anyakṣetrenaramate sahasrākṣo 'martyaḥ | abhūduprārthas takmā sa u no mṛḍayiṣyati ||
takman na ta ihāśvā na gāvo neha te gṛhāḥ | śakambharasyamuṣṭihā punar gaccha mahāvṛṣān ||
yau hemantaṃ svāpayatho balena- -arvāg devebhya uta yau paro divaḥ | bhavārudrayoḥ sumatiṃ vṛṇīmahe 'nyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu ||
yo dyām ātanoti yo 'ntarikṣaṃ stabhnāty ojaso jāyamānaḥ | tasmai rudrāya haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu ||the refrain (2d, 3d, …, 8e, 9e) is written in K
yayor vadhān nāpapadyate kiṃ cana- -antar deveṣūta mānuṣeṣu | tābhyāṃ rudrābhyāṃ haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu ||
yāv īśāte paśūnāṃ pārthivānāṃ catuṣpadām uta vā ye dvipādaḥ | tābhyāṃ rudrābhyāṃ haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu ||
yasya pratihitāyāḥ saṃ viśanta āraṇyāḥ paśava uta grāmyāsaḥ | tasmai rudrāya haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu ||
yasmād oṣadhayobarbhriyamāṇāyanti yasmād vṛkṣāso na viyanti viśve | vayāṃsi yasmāt pracaranti bhīṣā tasmai rudrāya haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu ||
yaḥ parvatān vidadhe 'ti vidvān yo bhūtāni kalpayati prajānan | tasmai rudrāya haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu ||
yāv īśānau carato dvipado 'sya catuṣpadaḥ | yā ugrau kṣipradhanvānau tābhyāṃ rudrābhyāṃ haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu ||
punaś cakṣuḥ punaḥ prāṇaṃ punar āyur dhehi no jātavedaḥ | rudra jalāṣabheṣaja vidvāṃsas ta enā haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu ||
īśānaṃ tvā bheṣajānāṃ vijeṣāya vṛṇīmahe | cakre sahasravīryaṃ sarasvān oṣadhe tvā ||
satyajitaṃ śapathayāvanīṃ sahamānāṃ punaḥsarām | sarvāḥ samahvyoṣadhīr ito mā pārayān iti ||
yā śaśāpa śapanena yā vā gha mūram ādadhe | yā vā rasasyaprāśāya- -ārebhetokam attu sā ||
pratīcīnaphalo hi tvam apāmārga babhūvitha | sarvān mac chapathām̐ adhi varīyo yāvayā tvam ||
yac ca bhrātṛvyaḥ śapati yac ca jāmiḥ śapāti naḥ | brahmā yan manyutaḥ śapāt sarvaṃ tan no adhaspadam ||
yāṃ te cakrur āme pātre yāṃ sūtre nīlalohite | āme māṃse kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakrus tayā kṛtyākṛto jahi ||
duṣvapnyaṃ durjīvitaṃ rakṣoabhvamarāyyaḥ | durvācaḥ sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃ tad ito nāśayāmasi ||
kṣudhāmāraṃ tṛṣṇāmāram agotām anapatyatām | apāmārga tvayā vayaṃ sarvaṃ tad apa mṛjmahe ||
samā bhūmiḥ sūryeṇa- -ahnā rātrī samāvatī | kṛṇomi satyam ūtaye arasāḥ santu kṛtvarīḥ ||
yo devāḥ kṛtyāṃ kṛtvā harād aviduṣo gṛham | vatsodhāruriva mātaraṃ taṃ pratyag upa padyatām ||
amā kṛtvā pāpmānaṃ yas tayānyaṃjighāṃsati | aśmānas tasyāṃ dagdhāyāṃ bahulāḥ phaṭ karikratu ||
sahasradhāman viśikhān vigrīvāñchāyayātvam | prati sma cakruṣe kṛtyāṃ priyāṃpriyāvatehara ||
yācakāra na śaśāka śaśrepādam aṅgulim | cakāra bhadram asmabhyam abhagā bhagavadbhyaḥ ||
anayāham oṣadhyā sarvāḥ kṛtyāadūṣayam| yāṃ kṣetre cakrur yāṃ gobhyo yāṃ vā te puruṣebhyaḥ ||
apāmārgo 'pa mārṣṭu kṣetriyaṃ śapathāṃś ca mat | apāhayātudhānyo 'pa sarvā arāyyaḥ ||
apamṛjya yātudhānān apasarvā arāyyaḥ | apāmārga prajayā tvaṃ rayyā sacasva naḥ ||
utevāsy abandhukṛd utāsy anujāmikaḥ | uto kṛtyākṛtaḥ prajāṃ naḍam ivā chindhi vārṣikam ||
brāhmaṇena paryukto 'si kaṇvena nārṣadena | senevaiṣi tviṣīmatī na tatra bhayam asti yatraprāpnoṣyoṣadhe ||
agre 'sy oṣadhīnāṃ jyotiṣevābhidīpayan| uta pākasya trātāsy utahantāsirakṣasaḥ ||
yad ado devā asurāṃs tvayāgre nirakṛṇvata | tasmād adhi tvam oṣadhe apāmārgo ajāyathāḥ ||
vibhindatī śataśākhā vibhindan nāma te pitā | pratyag vi bhindhi taṃ tvaṃ yo asmām̐ abhidāsati ||
asad bhūmyāḥ sam abhavat taddyāmeti bṛhad vacaḥ | tad ittatovidhūmayat pratyak kartāram ṛcchatu ||
pratyaṅhisaṃbabhūvitha pratīcīnaphalas tvam | pratīcīḥ kṛtyā ākṛtya- -amuṃ kṛtyākṛtaṃ jahi ||
śatena mā pari pāhi sahasreṇābhi rakṣa mā | indras te vīrudhāṃ pata ugra ojmānam ā dadhau ||
arātyā dyāvāpṛthivī chintaṃ mūlam atho śiraḥ | vicchidya madhyataḥ pṛṣṭīsLubotsky pṛṣṭhīs (misprint) tāṃ kṛṇvāthām adhaspadam ||
idaṃ śṛṇu jātavedo yad amuṣyā vaco mama | arātyāḥ sarvam ic chiraḥ praśnaṃ vṛhatam aśvinā ||
yā svapnayā carati gaur bhūtvā janām̐ anu | arātim indra tvaṃ jahi tām agnirivasādahāt ||
śreṣṭho me rājā varuṇo havaṃ satyena gacchatu | arātiṃ hatvā santokām ugro devo 'bhi dāsatu ||
deṣṭrī ca yā sinīvālī sapta ca śrotyā yāḥ | arātiṃ viśvā bhūtāni ghnantu dāsīmivāgasi||
somo rājauṣadhībhiḥ sūryācandramasā ubhā | arātiṃ sarve gandharvā ghnantv apsarasaś ca yāḥ ||
bhavo rājā bhavāśarvāv indro vāyur bṛhaspatiḥ | tvaṣṭā me adhyakṣaḥ pūṣā te 'rātiṃ ghnantu sarvadā ||
ye ca devā bhūmicarā ye cāmī divy āsate | ye antarikṣasyeśate te 'rātiṃ ghnantusavratāḥ||
yā ceṣitāsurair devebhir iṣitā ca yā | atho yā manyor jāyate 'rātiṃ hanmi brahmaṇā ||
tad in nu me acacchadan mahad yakṣaṃ bṛhad vapuḥ | viśvair yad devair nirṛtis tanā yujā saṃmṛtyor iha jāyate ||
amamriścitsāprathovadadahim ahirājantam ojasā| āyuṃcitkutsamatithigvamardaya vi nikilbindam ojasā ||
yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvad vā sapta sindhavo mahitvā | tāvatī nirṛtir viśvavārā viśvasya yā jāyamānasyaveda||
viśvasya hi jāyamānasya devi puṣṭasya vā puṣṭapatir babhūvitha | namo 'stu te nirṛte mā tv asmān parā bhujo nāparaṃhātayāsi||
devīm ahaṃ nirṛtiṃ manyamānaḥ piteva putraṃ na sace vacobhiḥ | viśvasya yā jāyamānasyaveda śiraḥśiraḥ prati sūro 'nu tasthe ||
asunvantam ayajamānam iccha stenasyetyāṃ taskarasyānu śikṣa | svapantam iccha sā taityā namas tu te nirṛte 'haṃ kṛṇomi ||
asunvakānnirṛtiḥ saṃjighatsur nāsyāḥ pitā vidyate nota mātā | madhyātsvasrāmanujaghānasarvaṃ na devānāmasuryaṃsam āpa ||
yad asya pāre tamasaḥ śukraṃ jyotir ajāyata | tan naḥ parṣad ati dviṣo 'gne vaiśvānara dyumat ||
pramucyamānaṃbhuvanasyagopaḥ paśuṃ no atra prati bhāgam etu | agnir yajñaṃ trivṛtaṃ saptatantuṃ devo devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānan ||
yau te daṃṣṭrau sudihau ropayiṣṇū nir hvayete dakṣiṇāḥ saṃ ca paśyataḥ | anāṣṭraṃ naḥ pitaras tat kṛṇotu yūpe baddhaṃpramumucimāyad annam ||
ahrastastvam aviduṣṭaḥ parehi- -indrasya goṣṭham api dhāva vidvān | dhīrāsas tvā kavayaḥ saṃ mṛjantv iṣam ūrjaṃ yajamānāyamatsva||
ṛṣibhiṣ ṭvā saptabhir atriṇāhaṃ prati gṛhṇāmi bhuvane syonam | jamadagniḥ kaśyapaḥ svādv etad bharadvājo madhv annaṃ kṛṇotu | pratigrahītre gotamo vasiṣṭho viśvāmitro daduṣe śarma yacchāt ||
yan no agraṃ haviṣa ājagāma- -annasyapātramuta sarpiṣo vā |readprattam? yad vā dhanaṃ vahator ājagāma- -agniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ kṛṇotu ||
yad ājyaṃ pratijagrabha yāṃś ca vrīhīn ajaṃ candreṇa saha yaj jaghāsa | bṛhaspatir haviṣo no vidhartā mā no hiṃsīc chāgo aśvo vaśā ca ||
agnir na etat prati gṛhṇātu vidvān bṛhaspatiḥ praty etu prajānan | indro marutvān suhutaṃ kṛṇotv ayakṣmam anamīvaṃ te astu ||
yan no dadur varāham akṣitaṃ vasu yad vā talpam upadhānena naḥ saha | yadvāviyūthaṃsaha vṛṣṇyā no agniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ kṛṇotu ||
yan naḥ śālāṃ viśvabhogām imāṃ dadur gṛhaṃ vā yoktraṃ sahakṛttyota| yad vā hara upanāhena devāread vāhara (sandhi for vā āhare)? agniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ kṛṇotu ||
sūrye varca iti yac chuśravāhaṃ yena prajā jyotiragrāś caranti | some varco yad goṣu varco mayi devā rāṣṭrabhṛtas tad akran ||
yajñe varco maruto yadadṛṃhan vāyuḥ paśūnasṛjatsaṃ bhagena | gandharvāṇām apsarasāṃ yad apsu mayi (…) ||see 1d
yajñe varco yajamāne ca varca udābhiṣikte rājani yac ca varcaḥ | dakṣiṇāyāṃ varco adhi yan (…) ||see 1d
rathe varco rathavāhane ca varca iṣudhau varcaḥ kavace ca varcaḥ | aśveṣu varco adhi yan (…) ||see 1d
sabhāyāṃ varcaḥ samityāṃ ca varco vadhvāṃ varca uta varco vareṣu | surāyāṃ varco adhi yan (…) ||see 1d
siṃhe varca uta varco vyāghre vṛke varco madhuhāre ca varcaḥ | śyene varcaḥ patvanāṃ yad babhūva (…) ||see 1d
hiraṇyavarcasam uta hastivarcasaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ yajjajñuṣāṃvarca āhuḥ |readsaṃgrāme? kṛṣyāṃ kṣetra ṛṣayo janyānajur mayi devā rāṣṭrabhṛtas tad akran ||
mayi varco mayi śravo mayi dyumnaṃ mayi tviṣiḥ | adhaspadaṃ pṛtanyavo 'haṃ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ ||
payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvan māmakaṃ vacaḥ | atho payasvatāṃ paya ā harāmi sahasraśaḥ ||
ahaṃ veda yathā payaś cakāra dhānyaṃ bahu | saṃbhṛtvā nāmā yo devas taṃ vayaṃ yajāmahe sarvasyāyajvanogṛhe ||
yathā dyauś ca pṛthivī ca tasthatur dharuṇāya kam | evā sphātiṃ ni tanomi mayāreṣu khaleṣu ca ||
yathā kūpaḥ śatadhāraḥ sahasradhāro akṣitaḥ | evā me astu dhānyaṃ sahasradhāram akṣitam ||
śatahasta samāhara sahasrahasta saṃ kira | yatheha sphātir āyati kṛtasya kāryasya ca ||
imā yāḥ pañca pradiśo mānavīḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ | sarvāḥ śaṃbhūr mayobhuvo vṛṣṭe śāpaṃ nadīr iva- -iha sphātiṃ samāvahān ||
iha sphātir oṣadhīnāṃ devānām uta saṃgamaḥ | ihaivāśvinor astu dvāparāśvo ruhat||
tisro mātrā gandharvāṇāṃ catasrogṛhapatnyāḥ| tāsāṃ yāsphātiruttamā tayā tvābhi mṛśāmasi ||
jyeṣṭhasya tvāṅgirasasya hastābhyām ā rabhāmahe | yathāsad bahudhānyam ayakṣmaṃ bahupūruṣam ||
atyāsarat prathamādhokṣyamāṇā sarvān yajñān bibhratī vaiśvadevī | upa vatsaṃ sṛjata vāśyate gaur vy asṛṣṭa sumanā hiṃkṛṇoti||
badhāna vatsam abhi dhehi bhuñjatīṃ ni dya godhug upa sīda dugdhi | iḍām asmā odanaṃ pinvamānā kīlālaṃ ghṛtaṃ madam annabhāgam ||
sā dhāvatu yamarājñaḥ savatsā sukṛtāṃ pathā prathameha dattā | atṛṣṭadattā prathamedam āgan vatsena gāṃ saṃ sṛja viśvarūpām ||
prathamedam āgan prathamādattetād yasmim̐l lokesadyau tvā dadāti | sainaṃdhenoprathamā pārayāsi śraddhayā dattā parame vyoman ||
jānīhi sma saṃskṛte dheno gopatiṃ yas tvā dadātiprathamāṃsvadhānām | pūrvā hi tatra sukṛtaḥ parehy athaiṣa aitā jarasaḥ parastāt ||
ati dhenur anaḍvāham aty anyad vayo akramīt | ati vatsānāṃ pitaraṃ ṛṣabhaṃ pratimāsarat ||read ṛṣabham atimāsarat? (see PS 5.31.7d)
jyotiṣmatī sukṛto yāhi sūre syonās te dheno patayo bhavantu | sapta tvā sūryā anvātapantu yamaṃ dhāva māti saraḥ parācīḥ ||read parācaiḥ with K? (see PS 5.37.5c)
dātre *'mutra mahyaṃ duhānā- -ubhau lokau bhuñjatī vi kramasva | iṣam ūrjaṃ dakṣiṇāḥ saṃvasānā bhagasya dhārām avase pratīmaḥ ||
sahasrāṅgā śataṃ jyotīṃṣy asyā yajñasya paprir amṛtā svargā | sā na aitu dakṣiṇā viśvarūpā- -ahiṃsantīṃ prati gṛhṇīma enām ||
ye te pāśā varuṇa sapta saptatīs tredhā tiṣṭhantiviṣitāruśantaḥ | sinantisarve anṛtaṃ vadantaṃ yaḥsatyavādyati taṃ sṛjanti ||
iha spaśaḥ pra carantīme asya sahasrākṣā ati paśyanti bhūmim | yo 'syavrataṃpramināti kaś ca na sa mucyate varuṇasya pāśāt ||
uteyam asya pṛthivī samīcy utāsau dyaur bṛhatī dūreantā | uto samudro varuṇasya kukṣā utāsminn alpa udakenamuktaḥ||
yas tiṣṭhati manasā yaś ca vañcati yo nilāyaṃ carati yaḥ pralāyam | dvauyadyadvadataḥ sanniṣadya rājā tad veda varuṇas tṛtīyaḥ ||
sarvaṃ tad rajā varuṇo vi caṣṭe yad antarā rodasī yat parastāt | saṃkhyātā asya nimiṣo janānām akṣān na śvaghnī bhuvanā mimīte ||
tvam eva rājan varuṇa dhartā devānām asi viśvarūpaḥ | duścarmāstv adhamaḥ piśaṅgo yaḥ satyāṃ vācam anṛtena hanti ||
yaḥ samāmyo varuṇo yovyāmyo yaḥ sandeśyo varuṇo yo videśyaḥ | yo daivyo varuṇo yaś ca mānuṣaḥ sarvāṃs tve tān prati muñcāmy atra ||
śatena pāśair varuṇābhi dhehi mā te mocy anṛtavāṅ nṛcakṣaḥ | āstāṃ jālma udaraṃ śraṃsayitvā kośaivābandhraḥparikṛtyamānaḥ ||
utotvatprapātayaty utotvad apinahyati| uto tvad asvakaṃ kṛtvā rājā varuṇa īyate ||
ainaṃ chinatti varuṇo naḍaṃ kaśipune yathā | mūlaṃ tasya vṛścati ya enaṃ pramimīṣati ||
ya imāṃ devo mekhalām ābabandha yaḥ saṃnanāha ya u mā yuyoja | yasya devasya praśiṣā carāmi sa pāram icchāt sa u mā vi muñcāt ||
āhutāsyabhihuta ṛṣīṇām asy āyudham | pūrvā vratasyaprāśnatī vīraghnī bhava mekhale ||
mṛtyor ahaṃ brahmacārī yad asmi bhūtān niryācan puruṣaṃ yamāya | tam ahaṃ brahmaṇā tapasā śrameṇa- -anayainaṃmekhalayā sināmi ||
ayaṃ vajras tarpayatāṃ vratena- -avāsya rāṣṭram abhi hantu jīvam | bhinattu skandhān praśṛṇātūṣṇihāḥ||
adharottaram adharottareṇa gūḍhaḥ pṛthivyāmotsṛpat | vajreṇāvahataḥśayām||
yo jināti tam anv iccha yo jināti tam ij jahi | jinato vajra sāyaka sīmantam anvañcamanu pātaya ||
yad aśnāmi balaṃ kurve vajram ā dadā iti | skandhān amuṣya śātayan vṛtrasyeva śacīpatiḥ ||
yat pibāmi saṃ pibāmi samudra iva saṃpibaḥ | prāṇān amuṣya saṃpiban saṃ pibāmy ahaṃ pibam ||
yad girāmi saṃ girāmi samudra iva saṃgiraḥ | prāṇān amuṣya saṃgiran saṃ girāmy ahaṃ giram ||
śraddhāyā duhitā tapaso 'dhi jātā svasa rṣīṇāṃ bhūtakṛtāṃ babhūva | sā no mekhale matim ā dhehi medhām atho no dhehi tapa indriyaṃ ca ||
yāṃ tvā pūrve bhūtakṛta ṛṣayaḥ paribedhire | sā tvaṃ pari ṣvajasva mā dīrghāyutvāya mekhale ||
aśaṃ te śvaśrūr vadatu śvaśuras te aśantaram | devā te abhiśocanaṃ brahma vidveṣaṇaṃ kṛtam ||
ā krandayolulā kuru vācam ā dhehy apriyām | śiro lipsasva hastābhyāṃ keśās te abhiśocanam ||
ye keśā yau pratidhī yat kurīraṃ ya opaśaḥ | atho ye te svāḥ santi sarve te te 'bhiśocanam ||
apa trasaparidhānād unmādanaṃ kṛṇomi te | atho yat te svaṃ vāsaḥ sarvaṃ tat te 'bhiśocanam ||
arkam addhi pra patāto municakṣuṃ kṛṇomi te | atho śvabhyorāyadbhyaḥ prati smagaṅgaṇaṃkuru ||
ut tiṣṭhāre palāyasva marīcīnāṃ padaṃ bhava | atho yat kāryaṃ kurv āśāṃsam ṛṣa muṣkayoḥ ||see Lubotsky 2002, 155-156
upa kṣvedābhi cālaya vātas tūlam ivaijaya | dadbhiḥsaṃdaśyabāhvor udaddhi muravasthiye||
abhi gāya śābaleyaṃ śauṇeyaṃ sādhuvāhinam | kālmāṣeyasyacarkṛdhy āyataḥ prati cālaya ||
ṛśyapucchaṃśunaḥpucchaṃ vātaraṃhaṃ manojavam | taṃ te rathaṃ saṃ bharantu devās tenācarāsipatim icchamānā ||

agnaye sam anaman tasmai pṛthivyā sam anaman | yathāgnaye pṛthivyā samanamann evā mahyaṃ saṃnamaḥ saṃ namantu | vittiṃ bhūtiṃ puṣṭiṃ paśūn brahma brāhmaṇavarcasam | saṃnataya stha saṃ me namata svāhā ||
vāyave sam anaman tasmā antarikṣeṇa sam anaman | yathā vāyave antarikṣeṇa samanaman (…) ||see 1cdef
sūryāya sam anaman tasmai divā sam anaman | yathā sūryāya divā samanaman (…) ||see 1cdef
candrāya sam anaman tasmai nakṣatraiḥ sam anaman | yathā candrāya nakṣatraiḥ samanaman (…) ||see 1cdef
somāya sam anaman tasmā oṣadhībhiḥ sam anaman | yathā somāyauṣadhībhiḥ samanaman (…) ||see 1cdef
yajñāya sam anaman tasmai dakṣiṇābhiḥ sam anaman | yathā yajñāya dakṣiṇābhiḥ samanaman (…) ||see 1cdef
samudrāya sam anaman tasmai nadībhiḥ sam anaman | yathā samudrāya nadībhiḥ samanaman (…) ||see 1cdef
brahmaṇe sam anaman tasmai brahmacāribhiḥ sam anaman | yathā brahmaṇe brahmacāribhiḥ samanaman (…) ||see 1cdef
indrāya sam anaman tasmai vīryeṇa sam anaman | yathendrāya vīryeṇa samanaman (…) ||see 1cdef
devebhyaḥ sam anaman tebhyo 'mṛtena sam anaman | yathā devebhyo 'mṛtena samanaman (…) ||see 1cdef

prajāpataye sam anaman tasmai prajābhiḥ sam anaman | yathā prajāpataye prajābhiḥ samanamann evā mahyaṃ saṃnamaḥ saṃ namantu | vittiṃ bhūtiṃ puṣṭiṃ paśūn brahma brāhmaṇavarcasam | saṃnataya stha saṃ me namata svāhā ||
sapta saṃnamo 'ṣṭamī dhītisādhanī | sakāmānadhvanaḥ kṛṇu saṃjñānam astu vo dhane ||
ye vāruṇā uta nairṛtā vanaspatīnāṃ vīrudhāṃ ca pāśāḥ | ye bhaumā bhūmyā adhi saṃbabhūvus te tvā nahiṃsāñchivatātir astu te ||
ye antarikṣe divi ye ca pāśā annevicṛttābahudhā sinanti | ye paśubhyo adhi saṃbabhūvus te tvā nahiṃsāñchivatātir astu te ||
yaṃmānuṣaṃ manuṣyāḥ śapanteBhatt. yan yāṃ vā hotrāṃ pitryām ārabhante | samāmyo varuṇoyaājagāma sa tvā nahiṃsācchivatātir astu te ||
apaḥpragāhyayadi vā samāmiṣe agnim ārebhiṣe yadi vā samiddham | vidvān avidvān anṛtaṃ yad uvaktha tat tvā nahiṃsācchivatātir astu te ||the refrain (4d, 5d, 6e, 7e) is written in K
yat pratīcyāṃdṛṣatpiṣṭām̐ āmapeṣām̐āmapātre papātha | hīnaḥsatyenānṛtaṃ yad uvaktha tattvā nahiṃsācchivatātir astu te ||
yaṃ bāṇavantaṃ sudihaṃ saṃbharanti yaṃ vā hastaṃ brāhmaṇasyārabhante | samāmyo varuṇoyaṃjaghāna tasya śmaśānād adhiloṣṭaābhṛtaḥ sa tvā nahiṃsācchivatātir astu te ||
yaṃ grāvāṇam ārabhante yenāṃśūnabhiṣuṇvanti somam | yad vā dhanaṃ dhanakāmo niremiṣe kṣetraṃ gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃvobhayādat tattvā nahiṃsācchivatātir astu te ||

apaḥpragāhyayadi vā vyāmiṣe agnim ārebhiṣe yadi vā samiddham | jāmyā hastaṃ kṛtam ārebhiṣereadgṛhyaminstead of kṛtam?) dhanur vottatam iti cakramitha | manyauvārājño varuṇasyāsisaktaḥ sa tvā na hiṃsāc chivatātir astu te ||
yā te prajāpihitā parābhūd yonir vā mugdhā nihitā piśācaiḥ | āsnānaṃ vā yadabhitaṣṭhāthaghoraṃ sarvaṃ tat te brahmaṇā sūdayāmi ||
yady asyāḥ prajā varuṇena guṣpitā durṇāmāno vā ṛtviyam asyārihanti| dveṣātsāpatnādyadi cakrur asyā ayaṃ tā nāṣṭrā apa hantv agniḥ ||
asyā striyā yadi lakṣmīr aputryā garbho vāsyā yātudhānaiḥ parābhṛtaḥ | duḥsvapnyaṃ vā yat svapatī dadarśa- -indrāgnī tat kṛṇutāṃ bhadrayā punaḥ ||
devainasād yadi putraṃ na vindase manuṣyāṇāṃ vā tvā śapatho rarādha | pitṛbhir vā te yadi sūtaḥ pariṣṭhita idaṃ taṃ niṣ kṛṇmo janayāsi putram ||
vaiśvānaro janmanā jātavedāḥ prajāpatiḥsiñcatureto asyām | bādhatāṃ dveṣo nirṛtiṃ parācaiḥ putriṇīm imāṃ prasvaṃ kṛṇotu ||
iha prajām agnir asyai dadhātv ādityebhir vasubhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ | viśve devā havam ā yantu ma imaṃ putro asyā jāyatāṃ vīryāvān ||
yena devy aditir garbham ādadhe yena prajā asṛjata prajāpatiḥ | tenāham asyai haviṣā juhomi yathā pumāṃsaṃ janayāti putram ||
vanve te putraṃ pari devatābhyo anu manyantāṃ marutaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ | garbhas tvā daśamāsyaḥ pra viśatu kumāraṃ jātaṃ pipṛtām upasthe ||
keśy agniṃ keśī viṣaṃ keśī bibharti rodasī | keśī viśvaṃ svar dṛśe keśīdaṃ jyotir ucyate ||
munayovātaraśanāḥ piśaṅgā vasate malāḥ | vātasyānu dhrājiṃ yanti yad devāso ayukṣata ||
unmaditā mauneyena vātām̐ā tasthimā vayam | śarīred asmākaṃ yūyaṃ martāso abhi paśyatha ||
antarikṣeṇa patati svar bhūtāvacākaśat | munir devasya-devasya saukṛtyāya sakhā hitaḥ ||
indrasyāśvo vāyoḥ sakhā- -atho deveṣito muniḥ | ubhā samudrāv ā kṣayati sadyaḥ pūrvam utāparam ||
gandharvāṇām apsarasāṃ devānāṃ caraṇe caran | muniḥ ketasya saṃvidvān sakhā svādur madintamaḥ ||
vāyur asmā upāmanthat pinaṣṭi smā kunaṃnamā | munir viṣasya pātreṇa yad rudreṇāpibat saha ||
saṃyukte dyāvāpṛthivī tiṣṭhantī avicartye | keśenaikasya devasya vy aṣṭabhnāc chacīpatiḥ ||
na tam aṃho na duritaṃ devāso aṣṭa martyam | sajoṣaso yam aryamā mitro nayanti varuṇo ati dviṣaḥ ||
tad dhi vayaṃ vṛṇīmahe varuṇa mitrāryaman | yan no nir aṃhaso yūyaṃ pātha nethā ca martyam ati dviṣaḥ ||
te nūnaṃ no yūyam ūtaye varuṇa (…) | nayiṣṭhā no neṣiṇa stha parṣiṣṭāḥ parṣiṇo ati dviṣaḥ ||
śunam asmabhyam ūtaye varuṇa mitrāryaman | śarma yacchātha sapratha ādityāso yad īmahe ati dviṣaḥ ||
ādityāso atisridho varuṇo mitro aryamā | rudraṃ marudbhir ugraṃ huvema- -indram agniṃ svastaye ati dviṣaḥ ||
netāra ū ṣu ṇas tiro varuṇo mitro aryamā | ati viśvāni duritā rājānaś carṣaṇīnām ati dviṣaḥ ||
yūyaṃ viśvaṃ pari pātha varuṇa mitrāryaman | yuṣmākaṃ śarmaṇi priyāreadpriyewith RV?; Lubotskypriyāḥ syāma supraṇītayo 'ti dviṣaḥ ||
yathā ha tyad vasavo gauryaṃ cit padiṣitāmamuñcatā yajatrāḥ | evo ṣv asman muñcatā vy aṃhaḥ pra tāry agne prataraṃ na āyuḥ ||
devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ prasūto brāhmaṇebhyo nir vapāmi | sa me mā kṣeṣṭa sadamaśyamānaḥ pitṝṇāṃ loke ||
anumataṃ pṛthivyemaṃ pacāmy anu me dyaur manyatām anv antarikṣam | anu manyatām aditir devaputrā ime svarge loke astu ||
brahmaṇokhām adhi dadhāmy agnau bhūmyāṃ tvā bhūmim adhi dhārayāmi | agniḥ pacan rakṣatv odanam imaṃ rakṣaḥpiśācān nudatāṃ jātavedāḥ ||
acyutam akṣitaṃ viśvadānīm utsam iva sadam akṣīyamāṇam | pitā pitāmaha uta yas tṛtīyas ta enaṃ bhāgam upa jīvantv atra ||
prapīnam akṣitaṃ viśvadānīṃ somam iva punar āpyāyamānam | putraḥ pautra uta yaḥ prapautras teṣām astu nihito bhāga eṣaḥ ||
mā me jārīn nihito bhāga eṣa mānuṣanmānuṣadgupto astu |emend. Griffiths:mānuṣānmānuṣād‘from each and every man’ vaivasvate ni dadhe śevadhim etaṃ tasmāutsṛjatu mahyam eva ||
punaḥ pūryatāṃ yad adanty asya- -odano 'yaṃ tiṣṭhatv akṣitaḥ sadā | vaivasvatena gupto astu rājñā mamaitor upa jīvantu me svāḥ ||
śatadhāraṃ sahasradhāram utsam akṣitaṃvyacyamānaṃsalilasya pṛṣṭhe | ūrjaṃ duhānam anapasphurantam upāsīya sukṛtāṃ yatra lokaḥ ||
tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭhaṃ yato jajña ugras tveṣanṛmṇaḥ | sadyo jajñāno ni riṇāti śatrūn anu yaṃ viśve madanty ūmāḥ ||
vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūryojāḥ śatrur dāsāya bhiyasaṃ dadhāti | avyanac ca vyanac ca sasni saṃ te navanta prabhṛtā madeṣu ||
tve kratum api pṛñcanti viśve dvir yad ete trir bhavanty ūmāḥ | svādoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛjā sam adaḥ su madhu madhunābhi yodhīḥ ||
iti cid dhi tvā dhanā jayantaṃ raṇeraṇe anumadanti viprāḥ | ojīyo dhṛṣṇo sthiram ā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhan durevā yātudhānāḥ ||
tvayā vayaṃśāśadmaheraṇeṣu prapaśyanto yudhenyāni bhūri | codayāmi ta āyudhā vacobhiḥ saṃ teśyāmibrahmaṇā vayāṃsi ||
stuṣeyyaṃpuruvarpasamṛbhvam inatamam āptyam āptyānām | ā darśate śavasā sapta dānūn pra sākṣate pratimānāni bhūri ||
ni tad dadhiṣe 'varaṃ paraṃ ca yasminn āvithāvasā duroṇe | ā mātarā sthāpayasejigatnū ata inoṣi karvarā purūṇi ||
imā brahma bṛhaddivo vivakti- -indrāya śūṣam agriyaḥ svarṣāḥ | maho gotrasya kṣayati svarājo duraś ca viśvā avṛṇod apa svāḥ ||
evā mahān bṛhaddivo atharvā- -avocat svāṃ tanvam indram eva | svasāro mātaribhvarīr ariprā hinvanti ca śavasā vardhayanti ca ||
ṛdhaṅmandrayoninovibhāvā amṛtāsuḥ sujanmā vardhamānaḥ | adabdhāsur bhrājamāno 'heva trito dādhāra trīṇi ||
ni yo dharmaṇi prathamaḥsasāda- -ato vapūṃṣi kṛṇute purūṇi | dhāsyur yoniṃ prathama ā viveśa- -ā yo vācam anuditāṃ cikāya ||
yas te śokas tanva ārireca kṣaraddhiraṇyaṃśucayo'nu svāḥ | atrā dadhiṣe amṛtāni nāma- -asme vastrāṇīṣa erayanta ||
pra yad ete prataraṃ pūrvyaṃ guḥ sadaḥsada ātiṣṭhantoajuryam| kaviḥ śuṣasya mātarā rihāṇe jāmirvadhuryuḥpratimānimīta||
tad ū ṣu te mahāpṛthuryaman namaḥ kaviḥ kāvyenākṛṇot | yat samyañco 'bhiyanto *'dhikṣām adhā mahī rodhacakrā vavardha ||
sapta maryādāḥ kavayas tatakṣus tāsāmidekām abhy aṃhuro gāt | utāmṛtāsur vṛta eṣi kṛṇvann asura āptaḥ svadhayā samadguḥ ||
utāyur jyeṣṭho ratnā dadhāty ūrjā vā yaṃ sacate kavir dāḥ | putro vā yat pitarā kṣatram īrte jyeṣṭhaṃ maryādam ahvayan svasti ||
darśan nu tān varuṇa ye ta iṣṭāv āvarvṛtataḥ kṛṇavo vapūṃṣi | ardham ardhena śavasā pṛṇakṣy ardhena śuṣmaṃ vardhase *'mūra ||
avīvṛdhāmaśagmyaṃsakhāyaṃ varuṇaṃ putram aditer iṣiram | kaviśastāny asmai vacāṃsy avocāma rodasī satyavācau ||
ko vaḥ paścāt prāvicchāyat kaḥ puraḥ prākhanat pathaḥ | yadaita tvaramāṇā varuṇaprasūtā āpaḥ ||
prajāpatir asṛjata sa puraḥ prākhanat pathaḥ | sa u no anv avāsṛjat tena sṛṣṭāḥ kṣarāmasi ||
punānā āpo bahudhāsravanti- -imāṃś ca lokān pradiśaś ca sarvāḥ | punantv asmān duritād avadyān muñcantu mṛtyor nirṛter upasthāt ||
āpo asmān mātaraḥ sūdayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtapuvaḥ punantu | viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devīr ud id ābhyaḥ śucir ā pūta emi ||
āpo devīr mātaraḥ sūdayiṣṇavo ghṛtaścuto madhunā saṃpapṛcre| tā asmabhyaṃ sūrayo viśvam āyuḥ kṣapa usrā varivasyantu śubhrāḥ ||
udakasyodakatamā revattamā revatīnām | śundhantāmāpaḥ śundhantv asmān ||
yūyam āpo vīraśriyo yūyaṃ sūdayathā śucīn | yuṣmākam id diśo mahīr īyante pradiśaḥ pṛthak ||
yūyaṃ mitrasya varuṇasya yonir yūyaṃ somasya dhenavo madhiṣṭhāḥ | yuṣmān devīr deva ākṣiyatīndur yūyaṃ jinvata brahmakṣatram āpaḥ ||
śaśvad ābhiḥ śāśadānāḥ śamanānvayāmasi| āpo viśvasya sūdanīr yā devā manave dadhuḥ ||
yad dhāvanti punate tad āpo yat tiṣṭhanti śuddhā it tad bhavanti | nāsām avadyam avidaṃ na ripraṃ sanād eva madhunā saṃpapṛcre||
hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ pra cakramur hitvāvadyam āpaḥ | śataṃ ca vaḥ prasravaṇeṣu devīḥ sahasraṃ ca pavitāraḥ punanti ||
tāstādṛśīrbrahmāṇaṃ sūdayanty aṅgoṣṭhyā stotryā jīvadhanyāḥ | yā viśvasya śucikṛto ayātor gāva iva payasā sthā sujātāḥ ||
viśvād riprān muñcata sindhavo no yāny enāṃsi cakṛmā tanūbhiḥ | indrapraśiṣṭā varuṇaprasūtā ā siñcatāpo madhv ā samudre ||
rātrī mātā nabhaḥ pitā- -aryamā te pitāmahaḥ | śilācī nāma vā asi sā devānām asi svasā ||
yas tvā pibati jīvati trāyase puruṣaṃ tvam | dhartrī ca śaśvatām asi śaśvatāṃ ca nyañcanī ||
yad daṇḍena yad iṣvā yad arur harasā kṛtam | tasya tvam asi bheṣajī niṣkṛtir nāma vā asi ||
bhadrā plakṣenitiṣṭhasy aśvatthe khadire dhave | bhadrā nyagrodhe parṇe sā na ehy arundhati ||
vṛkṣaṃvṛkṣam ā rohasi vṛṣaṇyantīva kanyalā | jayantī pratyātiṣṭhantī saṃjayā nāma vā asi ||
hiraṇyavarṇe yuvate śuṣmelomaśavakṣaṇe| apām asi svasā lākṣe vāto hātmā babhūva te ||
hiraṇyabāho subhage sūryavarṇe vapuṣṭame | rutaṃgacchati niṣkṛtiḥ semaṃ niṣkṛdhipūruṣam||
ghṛtācī nāma kānīno 'jababhru pitā tava | aśvo yamasya yaḥśyāvas tasya hāsnāsyukṣitā||
aśvasyāsnaḥsaṃpatitā sā parṇam abhiṣiṣyadaḥ| sarāpatatriṇyasi sā na ehy arundhati ||
ghṛtācikevātarathe vidyutparṇe arundhati | āturaṃgamiṣṭhāsi tvam aṅga niṣkarīyasī ||
yat te jagdhaṃ piśācais tat ta ā pyāyatāṃ punaḥ | lākṣā tvā viśvabheṣajī devebhis trāyatāṃ saha ||
yathā dyauś ca pṛthivī ca na bibhīto na riṣyataḥ | evā me prāṇa mā bibher evā me 'pāna mā riṣaḥ ||
yathā vāyuś cāntarikṣaṃ ca (…) ||
yathā sūryaś ca candramāś ca (…) ||
yathāhaś ca rātrī ca (…) ||
yathā dhenuś cānaḍvāṃś ca (…) ||
yathā mitraś ca varuṇaś ca (…) ||
yathā brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca (…) ||
yathendraś cendriyaṃ ca (…) ||
yathā vīraś ca vīryaṃ ca (…) ||
yathā prāṇaś cāpānaś ca (…) ||
yathā mṛtyuś cāmṛtaṃ ca (…) ||
yathā satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca (…) ||
yathā bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca na bibhīto na riṣyataḥ | evā me prāṇa mā bibher evā me 'pāna mā riṣaḥ ||
madhuman me nikramaṇaṃ madhuman me parāyaṇam | vācā madhumad udyāsam akṣyau me madhusaṃdṛśī ||
mām anu prasārayan mama pattonipedivān| atho me punar āyato akṣyau kāmena śuṣyatām ||
vaśā madhugha te mātā- -ukṣā bhrātarṣabhaḥ pitā | dhenvā adhi prajāto 'si rājā san madhumattamaḥ ||
vṛṣāṇaṃ vṛṣṇyāvantaṃ somapṛṣṭhaṃ divi śritam | indrāṇy agra ābharan madhughaṃ bhagāya kam ||
pitubhojano madhughaḥ śauṣkāsyo hṛdayāya kam | sa mā madhunānaktu yathāhaṃ kāmaye tathā ||
sindhuprajāno madhugho aśva iva nīyate janām̐ anu | sa mā (…) ||
madhumatī sinīvālī madhunā mā sam ukṣatu | sā mā madhunānaktu yathāhaṃ kāmaye tathā ||
yathā madhu madhukṛto nyañjanti madhāv adhi | evā ny anajmi te mano adhy asyāṃ māmakītanū||
yat te manaḥ parāgataṃ yadbaddhamiha veha vā | tat ta ā vartayāmasi mayi badhnāmi te manaḥ ||
kaśyapaś ca suparṇaś ca yan marīcyām atiṣṭhatām | suparṇaḥ pary avāpaśyat samudre bhūmim āvṛtām ||
yāṃ suparṇaḥ paryapaśyad antar mahaty arṇave | tāṃ sūkara tvaṃ māyayā triḥ samudrād udābharaḥ||
yaṃ samudrād udabharo bhūmiṃ sūkara māyayā | saiṣā viṣasya dūṣaṇy asmai bhavatu bheṣajī ||
acyutā hiraṇyena yā satye adhitiṣṭhati | tasyās te viśvadhāyaso viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare ||
yasyāḥ kulāyam ity ekā ||
yasyā bhūmyā upajīkā gṛhaṃ kṛṇvata ātmane | tasyās te viśvadhāyaso viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare ||
yas tvā bhūme 'nvavindad yas tvā bhūma udābharat | tayoḥ sahasradhāmann ahaṃ nāmāni jagrabha ||
yāni ta indro akṛṇod bhūme nāmāni vṛtrahā | tāni te babhroḥ saṃ vidma sehaidhi viṣadūṣaṇī ||
yāni te marutaś cakrur yāni saptarṣayo viduḥ | viśva ādityā yāṃ viduḥ sā bhūmir viṣadūṣaṇī ||
sahasva yātudhānān sahasva yātudhānyaḥ | sahasva sarvā rakṣāṃsi sahamānāsy oṣadhe ||
sahamāne sahasvati sahanty ahamuttare | utāham asmi sāsahiḥ sāsahe vaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
yā sahamānā carasi sāsahāna ivarṣabhaḥ | sadānvāghnī rakṣoghnī sā tvam ugrāsy oṣadhe ||
khele hai lambanastani naśyetaḥ prāmutaḥ pata | na tvāmavivyacadiha- -ukṣeva śṛṅgavac chiraḥ ||
asuvāne bahuputre anantarve mahodari | pathāsmatsatvaretvaṃ śarkarā bapsatī cara ||
ye 'rāyāś caratha pākasyecchanta āsutim | tān agne kṛṣṇavartane tīkṣṇaśṛṅgodṛṣann ihi ||
ado yad dāru plavate sindhor madhye apūruṣam | tad ā rabhasva durhaṇo tena yāhi parastaram ||
yasyā janitram iṣṭargā adṛṣṭāḥ krimayaḥpluṣayaḥ| tasyai balāsapatnyai namas kṛṇomikuṣṭhyai||
śarvaputre bhavapatni yātubhrātri sadānve | tasyāddhiputrān bhrātṝṃś ca yatra tvā vinayāmasi ||
vṛṣāyam aṃśur vṛṣabhāya gṛhyate vṛṣāyam ugro nṛcakṣase | divyo naryo 'cikradan mahan nāmarṣabhasya yat kakut ||
viṣuvān viṣṇo bhava tvaṃ yo nṛpatir mama | atho indra iva devebhyo vi bravītu janebhyaḥ ||
manuṣyebhyo vi bravītu sajūr indreṇa medinā | agniś ca tubhyaṃ sāhantyo rāṣṭraṃ vaiśvānaro dadhat ||
yasyāyaṃ bhāga ṛṣabha indrāya pariṇīyate | sa hantu śatrūn āyato atho hantu parāyataḥ ||
sa hantā śatror bhavatu hantā bhavatu dodhatām | viśām aha praṇīr ayad agram udbhindatām asat ||
āyuṣmantaṃ varcasvantam atho adhipatiṃ viśām | asyāḥ pṛthivyāś cettāram imam indrarṣabhaṃ kṛṇu ||
yaḥ suśṛṅgaḥ sukakudaḥ kalyāṇo barhir āsadat | kārṣīvaṇaprajānena ṛṣabheṇa yajāmahe ||
ṛṣabheṇa yajamānā akrūreṇeva sarpiṣā | mṛdhaś ca sarvā indreṇa pṛtanāś ca sahāmahe ||
yaṃ tubhyaṃ bhāgam ṛṣabhaṃ devāḥ kevalyaṃ daduḥ | tena vṛtrāṇijaṅghanaḥ śatrūṃś ca jahy āhave ||
jahi śatrūn vi mṛdho nudasva kṛṣyāḥ saṃbhūto asi vīryāvān | indrāya bhāgaṃ pari tvā nayāma urur no loko apṛtanyo astu ||
ghṛtavṛddha ghṛtāhuta sahasraśṛṅga suṣṭuta | ghṛtāhavana dīdihi ||
yo ghṛtenābhighārita ugro jaitrāya tiṣṭhasi | sa naḥsaṅkāsupāraya pṛtanāsāhyeṣu ca ||
karkī subhāga ṛṣabhasya patnī prajākāmā vaśinī vāśitā gauḥ | tāṃ sahasram ekamukhā dadāti garbhaṃ dadhānām ṛtunā carantīm ||
garbhaṃ dadhānā paya id duhānā agnihotraṃ vaiśvadevī duhānā | gaur ṇo mā hiṃsīd varuṇasya patnī ||
karkyā yoniṃ saṃmanaso 'bhi gāvaḥ prajāṃ dhitsanto vṛṣaṇaś caranti | sā na aitv aditir viśvarūpā- -abhi krandanti bhuvanāny enām ||
prajāpatineṣitām ṛtviyāvatīm aināṃ prajāyā ṛṣabhāḥ śrayante | vṛṣaṇyantīṃ vṛṣaṇaḥ saptanāmnīṃ hiṃkṛṇvanto abhi nudantu vāśitām ||
sā pratyadarśyuṣasā suvarṇā śukrāṃvasānā varuṇasyanirṇijam| vaiśvadevī svadhām ābharantī prajāṃ dātā puṣyatu gopatiṣ ṭe ||
svayaṃsthāvary ṛṣabhāya tiṣṭhasi pratīcī somaṃ prati sūryam agnim | ahiṃsantī vāśite mām upehi paśūn dātā puṣyatu gopatiṣ ṭe ||
vaśī dātā bhavatu vāśitāyā agner bhāgam usriyāṃ yo dadāti | priyaṃ dhāma hṛdayaṃ somyaṃ madhu vājinīṃ tvā vājino vājayantu ||
yovāśitāyāṃgavy antar agnir yad asyāṃ nṛmṇaṃ mahimā babhūva | namas tasmai pratigṛhṇan kṛṇomi syonā me astu tanve suśevā ||
eyam agan vāśitā tāṃ pratīmaḥ puṃsāṃ vrātena saha puṣṭyā gauḥ | ūrjaṃ dadhānā ghṛtam id duhānā sahasrapoṣāyame astu dātre ||
anāptā ye vaḥ prathamā yāni karmāṇi cakrire | vīrān no atra mā dabhan tad va etat puro dadhe ||
pratnān mānāt pari ye saṃbabhūvuḥ ślokavantaḥ saumanasasya vantavaḥ | apānakṣāso badhirā ahāsata- -ṛtasya panthāṃ na taranti duṣkṛtaḥ ||
sahasradhāram abhi te sam asvaran divo nāke madhujihvāasaścataḥ| tasyaspaśona ni miṣanti bhūrṇayaḥ padepade pāśinaḥ santu setave ||
pary ū ṣu pra dhanvā vājasātaye pari vṛtrāṇi sakṣaṇiḥ | divas tad arṇavām̐ anv īyase sanisraso nāmāsi trayodaśo māsaḥ ||
indrasya gṛho 'sīndrasya śarmāsīndrasya varmāsīndrasya varūtham asi | vy etenāvaitenāpaitenārātsīr asau svāhā ||
tigmāyudhau tigmahetī suśevāv agnīṣomāv iha su mṛḍataṃ naḥ | mumuktam asmāngṛbhītānavadyāj juṣethāṃ yajñam amṛtam asmāsu dhattaṃ svāhā ||
cakṣuṣo hete manaso hete brahmaṇo hete menyāmenir asi | amenayas te santuye'smān abhyaghāyanti svāhā ||
yo 'smāñ cakṣuṣā manasā yaś ca vācākūtyācittyābrahmaṇāghāyur abhidāsāt | tamagne tvaṃ menyāmeniṃ kṛṇu svāhā ||
ud āyur ut kṛtam ud balam unmanīṣodindriyaṃ nṛmṇam asmāsu dhehi svāhā ||
āyuṣkṛtāyuṣmatī svadhāvantau gopā me stho gopāyataṃ mā | ātmasadau mestaṃtanvesuśevau mā mā hiṃsiṣṭaṃ svāhā ||
indrasya gṛho 'sīndrasya śarmāsīndrasya varmāsīndrasya varūtham asi | taṃtvā pra viśāmi sarvāṅgaḥ sarvātmā sarvaguḥsarvapūruṣaḥsahayanme 'sti tena ||
astṛto nāmāham ayam asmi sa ātmānaṃ pari dadhe dyāvāpṛthivībhyām | gopīthāya pra hūyase ||
astṛto nāma prājāpatyo devo māsas trayodaśaḥ | sarvaguḥ sarvapūruṣaḥ prāgāṃ devapurā aham ||
antaḥ prāgāṃdevapurāḥ sahagrāmaḥ svastaye | saṃvatsarasya madhyataḥ sarvaiḥ sodaryaiḥ saha || prapāṭhaka ||
prāham agāṃ devapurā ya evāsmi sa eva san | yo mā kaś cābhidāsati sa prajāpatim ṛcchatu ||
aśmāsipratispaśaḥ pāhi riṣaḥ pāhi dviṣaḥ | pāhidaivyābhiśastyāḥ samaihatanvaṃ pāhi ||
yo 'smān prācyā diśo 'ghāyur abhidāsāt | etat saṛcchādaśmavarma no 'stu ||
(…) asmān dakṣiṇāyā diśaḥ (…) ||
(…) asmān pratīcyā diśaḥ (…) ||
yo 'smān ūrdhvāyā diśo 'ghāyur abhidāsāt | etat saṛcchādaśmavarma no 'stu ||
prācyai diśe svāhā ||
dakṣiṇāyai diśe svāhā ||
pratīcyai diśe svāhā ||
udīcyai diśe svāhā ||
dhruvāyai diśe svāhā ||
ūrdhvāyai diśe svāhā ||
dive svāhā ||
antarikṣāya svāhā ||
pṛthivyai svāhā ||
pṛthivyai svāhā ||
antarikṣāya svāhā ||
dive svāhā ||
mahākaṇṭhaṃ karīṣajam ūbadhyādamanāhutim | oṣṭhaḥ kokamukhaś ca yas tān ito nāśayāmasi ||
rāmadantam avadalaṃ prahālam ahināsikam | upavartaṃ balāhakaṃ khelaṃ gardabhanādinaṃ gṛdhraṃ hastyāyanaṃ tān (…) ||
pramṛśyādinamabhyamaṃ bhīmahastaṃ marīmṛśam | trastākṣaṃ mṛdvaṅguliṃ nakhograṃ dantavīryaṃ tān (…) ||
paryanyamabhipāpadaṃ jigīṣamāṇaṃ rūpakam | atho śalalyaṃ śevalaṃ tān (…) ||
taṇḍam agretuṇḍikam aliṃśam uta vatsapam | dāmagranthiṃ sanisrasam araṇyeyaṃ cārmyeyaṃ tān (…) ||
idaṃ yaj jānukeśavaṃ rakṣaś caraty āsuraṃ bahiḥ prayutam icchati | aṃsūn pāṃsyūṃśca keśyān arāyāñchvakiṣkiṇas tān ito nāśayāmasi ||
yaḥ kumārāñ janasyātti taruṇān dāsa āsuraḥ | arāyaḥ keśy aghalo yo janān hantyattica tam ito nāśayāmasi ||
hirākṣo nāma gehyo 'rāyo nāma sūrtahā | tam ito nāśayāmasi ||
vitūlaṃ bhasvam ākhidaṃ vanakrośaṃ ca roruham | āmādaṃ prayutaiṣaṇaṃ paryundānaṃ paridravaṃ vṛkasyanyañcaṃgaṅgaṇaṃ tān ito nāśayāmasi ||
yaś ca bhūmā yā ca sphātir yorjā yo rasaś ca te | harāmi śakratām̐ahaṃ tvayā prattāṃ śacīpate ||
kṣetrātkṣetrād ā harāmi sphātiṃ sarvāṃ śacīpate | tvayāhaṃ vṛtrahan prattam ā harāmi gṛhām̐ upa ||
yas te sītābhagaḥ kṣetre yārāddhiryac ca śīyate | atho yā niṣṭhā te kṣetre tāṃ ta ādiṣi brahmaṇā ||
yat khale yan mayāre yad goṣṭhe yac ca śevadhau | atho yat kumbhyāṃ śaye tasya te rasam ā dade ||
ūrjā yā te niruptasya- -ūrjā yāvahatasya te | ūrjāṃ te piṣyamāṇasya- -ūrjāṃ piṣṭāt ta ā dade ||
(…) te niruptasya- -ūrjā yāvahatasya te | ūrjāṃ te pacyamānasya- -ūrjāṃ pakvāt te (…) ||
ūrjā yā tepraṇaddhasya- -ūrjā yā mathitasya te | ūrjāṃ te duhyamānasya- -ūrjāṃ dugdhāt ta ā dade ||
ā te dade gavām ūrjām ūrjām avibhya ā dade | ajābhya ūrjām ādāya- -ā taekaśaphāddade ||
ūrjā yā te puruṣeṣu- -ūrjā vitte ca vedye | ūrjāṃte sarveṣām ahaṃ gṛhāṇāṃ brahmaṇā dade ||
pituṃ nu stoṣaṃ maho dharmāṇaṃ taviṣīm | yasya trito vy ojasā vṛtraṃviparvamardayat ||
svādo pito madho pito vayaṃ tvāvavṛmahe| asmākam avitā bhava ||
upa naḥ pitav ā gahi śivaḥ śivābhir ūtibhiḥ | mayobhūr adviṣeṇyaḥ sakhā suśeva edhi naḥ ||
tava tye pito rasā rajāṃsy anu viṣṭhitāḥ | divi vātā iva śritāḥ ||
tava tye pito dadatas tava svādiṣṭha te pito | pra svādmāno rasānāṃ tuvigrīvā iverate ||
tve pito mahānāṃ devānāṃ mano hitam | akāri cāru ketunā tavāhim avasāvadhīt ||
yad adaḥ pito ajagan vivasva parvatānām | atrā cin no madho pito 'raṃ bhakṣāya gamyāḥ ||
yat te soma gavāśiro yavāśiro bhajāmahe | vātāpe pīva id bhava ||
yad apām oṣadhīnāṃ pariṃśam āriśāmahe (…) ||
karambha oṣadhe bhava pīvo vṛkka udārathiḥ | vātāpe pīva id bhava ||
taṃ tvā vayaṃ pito vacobhir gāvo na havyā suṣūdima | asmabhyaṃ tvā sadhamādaṃ devebhyas tvā sadhamādam ||
prati tyaṃ cārum adhvaraṃ gopīthāya pra hūyase | marudbhir agna ā gahi ||
nahi devo na martyo mahas tava kratuṃ paraḥ (…) ||
ye maho rajaso vidur viśve devāso adruhaḥ (…) ||
ye śubhrā ghoravarpasaḥ sukṣatrāso riśādasaḥ (…) ||
ya ugrā arkam ānṛcur anādhṛṣṭāsa ojasā (…) ||
ye nākasyādhi rocane divi devāsa āsate (…) ||
ya īṅkhayanti parvatān tiraḥ samudram ojasā (…) ||
ā ye tanvanti raśmibhis tiraḥ samudram arṇavam (…) ||
abhi tvā pūrvapītaye sṛjāmi somyaṃ madhu (…) ||
ā yantu maruto gaṇai stutā dadhatu no rayim (…) ||
ā tvā kaṇvāahūṣata gṛṇanti vipra te dhiyaḥ | marudbhir agna ā gahi ||
saṃ mā siñcantu marutaḥ saṃ pūṣā saṃ bṛhaspatiḥ | saṃ māyam agniḥ siñcatu prajayā ca dhanena ca dīrgham āyuṣ kṛṇotu me ||
(…) siñcantv ādityāḥ saṃ mā siñcantv agnayaḥ | indraḥ sam asmān siñcatu (…) ||
(…) siñcantv aruṣāḥ sam arkā ṛṣayaś ca ye | pūṣā sam (…) ||
(…) siñcantu gandharvāpsarasaḥ saṃ mā siñcantu devatāḥ | bhagaḥ sam (…) ||
(…) siñcantu pṛthivīḥ saṃ mā siñcantu yā divaḥ | antarikṣaṃ sam (…) ||
(…) siñcantu pradiśaḥ saṃ mā siñcantu yā diśaḥ | āśā sam (…) ||
(…) siñcantu nadyaḥ saṃ mā siñcantu sindhavaḥ | samudraḥ sam (…) ||
(…) siñcantu kṛṣayaḥ saṃ mā siñcantv oṣadhīḥ | somaḥ sam (…) ||
saṃ mā siñcantu yā āpaḥ saṃ mā siñcantu vṛṣṭayaḥ | sarasvatī sam asmān siñcatu prajayā ca dhanena ca dīrgham āyuṣ kṛṇotu me ||
saṃ bhago varcasā māgne saṃ viṣṇuḥ puṣṭyā sicat | kṣatraṃ sam asmān siñcatu prajayā ca dhanena ca- -āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu mā ||
saṃ virāḍ varcasā māgne saṃ deṣṭrī puṣṭyā sicat | iḍā sam asmān siñcatu prajayā ca (…) ||
saṃ dhātā varcasā māgne saṃ siktiḥ puṣṭyā sicat | saṃ devo asmān aryamā prajayā ca (…) ||
sam aṃśo varcasā māgne saṃ vāyuḥ puṣṭyā sicat | vātaḥ sam asmān siñcatu prajayā ca (…) ||
saṃ sabhā varcasā māgne saṃ surā puṣṭyā sicat | sūryā sam (…) ||
saṃ savitā varcasā māgne saṃ sūryaḥ puṣṭyā sicat | candraḥ sam (…) ||
saṃ paśavo varcasā māgne saṃ yajñaḥ puṣṭyā sicat | dakṣiṇā sam (…) ||
saṃ mā siñcatu draviṇaṃ saṃ mā siñcatv indriyam | tejaḥ sam (…) ||
saṃ mā siñcantu varcāṃsi saṃ mā siñcantu bhūtayaḥ | satyaṃ sam asmān siñcatu prajayā ca dhanena ca- -āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu mā ||
ā rātri pārthivaṃ rajaḥ pituraprāyidhāmabhiḥ | divaḥ sadāṃsi bṛhatī vi tiṣṭhasa ā tveṣaṃ vartate tamaḥ ||
na yasyāḥ pāraṃ dadṛśe na yoyuvad viśvam asyāṃ ni viśate yad ejati | ariṣṭāsas ta urvi tamasvati rātri pāram aśīmahi bhadre pāram aśīmahi ||
ye te rātri nṛcakṣaso draṣṭāro navatir nava | aśītiḥ santy aṣṭā uto te sapta saptatiḥ ||
ṣaṣṭiś ca ṣaṭ ca revati pañcāśat pañca sumnayi | catvāraś catvāriṃśac ca trayas triṃśac ca vājini ||
dvā ca viṃśatiś ca te rātry ekādaśāvamāḥ | tebhir no 'dya pāyubhir nipāhi duhitar divaḥ ||
rakṣā mākir ṇo aghaśaṃsa īśata mā no duḥśaṃsa īśata ||
mā no adya gavāṃ steno māvīnāṃ vṛka īśata | māśvānāṃ bhadre taskaro mā nṛṇāṃ yātudhānyaḥ ||
paramebhiḥ pathibhi steno dhāvatu taskaraḥ | pareṇa datvatī rajjuḥ pareṇāghāyur arṣatu ||
andhaṃ rātritiṣṭhadhūmam aśīrṣāṇam ahiṃ kṛṇu | hanū vṛkasya jambhaya- -ā stenaṃ drupade jahi ||
tvayi rātri vasāmasi svapiṣyāmasi jāgṛhi | gobhyo naḥ śarma yaccha- -aśvebhyaḥ puruṣebhyaḥ ||
atho yāni ca vasmahe yāni cāntaḥparīṇahi| tāni te pari dadmasi ||
rātri mātar uṣase naḥ paridehi| uṣā no ahne pari dadātv ahas tubhyaṃ vibhāvari ||
yat kiṃ cedaṃ patayati yat kiṃ cedaṃ sarīsṛpam | yat kiṃ ca padvadāsanvat tasmāttvaṃ rātri pāhi naḥ ||
sā paścāt pāhi sā puraḥ sottarād adharād uta | gopāya no vibhāvari stotāras ta iha smasi ||
ye rātrim anutiṣṭhanti ye ca bhūteṣu jāgrati | paśūn ye sarvān rakṣanti te na ātmasu jāgratu te naḥ paśuṣu jāgratu ||
veda vai rātri te nāma ghṛtācī nāma vā asi | tāṃ tvā bharadvājo veda sā no vitte 'dhi jāgṛhi ||
brahmāsya śiro bṛhad asya pṛṣṭhaṃ vāmadevyam udaram odanasya | chandāṃsi pakṣau mukham asya satyaṃ viṣṭārī yajñas tapaso 'dhi jātaḥ ||
anasthāḥ śuddhāḥ pavanena pūtāḥ śucayaḥ śucīn api yanti lokān | viṣṭāriṇam odanaṃ ye pacanti naiṣāṃ śiśnaṃ pra dahati jātavedāḥ ||
naiṣāṃ śiśnaṃ pra dahati jātavedāḥ svarge loke bahu straiṇam eṣām | nainān yamaḥ pari muṣṇāti retaḥ ||
āste yama upa yāti devān saṃ gandharvair madati somyaiḥ | viṣṭāriṇam odanaṃ ye pacanti nainānavartiḥ sacate kutaś cana ||
rathī ha bhūtvā rathayāna īyate pakṣī ha bhūtvāpi divaṃ sam eti | eṣa yajño vitato vahiṣṭho viṣṭārī pakvo divam ā sasāda ||
caturaḥ kumbhāṃś caturdhā dadāti kṣīreṇa pūrṇān udakena dadhnā | etās tvā kulyā upa yantu viśvataḥ svarge loke svadhayā pinvamānāḥ ||
ghṛtahradā madhukūlāḥsurodakāḥ kṣīreṇa pūrṇā udakena dadhnā | etās tvā kulyā upa yantu viśvahā svarge loke svadhayā mādayantīḥ ||
puṇḍarīkaṃ kumudaṃ saṃ tanoti bisaṃśālūkaṃ śaphako mulālī | svarge loke svadhayā pinvamānā upa mā tiṣṭhantu puṣkariṇīḥ samaktāḥ ||
yam odanaṃ pacāmi śraddadhāno viṣṭāriṇaṃ lokajitaṃ svargam | sa me mā kṣeṣṭa sadamaśyamāno viśvarūpā kāmadughā dhenur astu me ||
vṛṣabhaṃ santaṃ saha sūnṛtayā svarge loke amṛtaṃ duhānam | ye me putrāḥ pitaraś ca santi te tvā viṣṭārinn upa sarve sadeyuḥ ||
yaimānyajñān abhivitaṣṭāra yasyeme lokāḥ svadhayā samaktāḥ | ye me pautrā uta ye pitāmahās tebhyo viṣṭārinn amṛtāni dhukṣva ||
yadi pṛthivīṃ yady antarikṣaṃ yadi divaṃ devatā vā jagantha | ye me prapautrāḥ prapitāmahāś ca te tvā viṣṭārinn anu pra jñeṣur atra ||
svarge loke apsarasaenāñ jāyā bhūtvopa śerate | viṣṭāriṇam odanaṃ ye pacanty asmiṃlloke dakṣiṇayā pariṣkṛtam ||
nir ṇudaināṃ pra ṇudaināṃ svānnipadanād adhi | vibhraṃśam asyai kṛṇmo vi gṛhair bhraṃśatām asau ||
apāñcaṃ patim ā kurv adharācīṃstriyaṃ naya | atīmāndaśa parvatān atīmā nāvyā daśa ||
adharācīm avācīm athoakuśalāṃdiśam | vibhraṃśam asyai kṛṇmas tenaināṃ pra dahāmasi ||
āja nir aja bilaṃ bilād araṇyam ā kurv araṇyād araṇaṃ janam | mṛgām̐ anu pra pātaya vātasyaināṃ śikhāṃ kuru ||
vātāgre asyā hṛdayaṃ mano reṣmaṇi dadhmasi | vibhraṃśam asyai kṛṇmo vidhvaṃśamāsaktaṃdame||
sarvam anu pari plavatām antarā dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe | yathānavadhṛtā carād vṛṣatūlamivopari ||
aśam asyai vāto vātv aśaṃ tapatu sūryaḥ | atho yad annam aśnāti tad asyai viṣavattaram ||
siṃhas te astu cakṣuṣa ity ekā ||
eṣa vām agnir antarā sa viṣvañcau vy asyatu | yathā vāṃ na sahāsaty uttarasmiṃś canāyuṣi ||
ut pātaya śimidāvati pra pātaya śimidāvati | imau vy asya dampatī pakvaṃ māṃsam ivāsinā ||
meyam asmin patau raṃsta moasmiñchayane sve | jahātuvasanaṃsvam ahir jīrṇām iva tvacam ||
yathā mṛtāś ca jīvāś ca- -asmiṃlloke vyokasaḥ | evemau dampatī stām asmiṃlloke vyokasau ||
suparṇas tvānvavindat sūkaras tvākhanan nasā | dipsauṣadhe tvaṃ dipsantaṃ prati kṛtyākṛto daha ||
prati daha yātudhānān prati kṛtyākṛto daha | atho yo asmān dipsati tam u tvaṃ jahy oṣadhe ||
agne pṛtanāṣāṭ pṛtanāḥ sahasva | prati kṛtyāṃ kṛtyākṛte pratiharaṇena harāmasi ||
iṣvā ṛjīyaḥ patatu dyāvāpṛthivī tatsutāt| tat taṃ mṛga iva vidhyatu kṛtyā kṛtyākṛtaṃ kṛtā ||
agham astv aghakṛte śapathāḥ śapathīvne | pratyak prati prahiṇmasi yaś cakāra tam ṛcchatu ||
yas tvā kṛtya ity ekā ||
punaḥ kṛtyāṃ kṛtyākṛte hastagṛhya parā ṇaya | samakṣam asmā ā dadhmo yathā kṛtyākṛtaṃ hanat ||
putra iva pitaraṃ gaccha svaja ivābhiṣṭhito daśa | tantur ivāvavyayannihi kṛtye kṛtyākṛtaṃ kṛtā ||
ud eṇīva vāriṇy abhiskandaṃ mṛgīva | kṛtyā kartāram ṛcchatu ||
ṛśyasyevaparīśāsaṃ parimāya pari tvacaḥ | durhārdecakruṣekṛtyāṃ grīvāsu prati muñcata ||
yā kṛtye devakṛtā yā vā manuṣyajā asi | tāṃ tvā prati pra hiṇmasi pratīcīnena brahmaṇā ||
yadi strī yadi vā pumān kṛtyāṃ cakāra pāpmane | tām u tasmai nayāmasy aśvam ivāśvābhidhānyā ||
okte me dyāvā pṛthivī oktā devī sarasvatī | oktau ma indraś cāgniś ca krimiṃ jambhayatām imam ||
asyendra kumārasya krimiṃ dhanapate jahi | hatā viśvā arātayo 'nena vacasā mama ||
yo +'kṣyau parisarpati yo nāse parisarpati | datāṃ yo madhyaṃ gacchati taṃ krimiṃ jambhayāmasi ||
virūpau dvau sarūpau dvau kṛṣṇau dvau rohitau dvau | babhruś ca babhrukarṇaś ca gṛdhrāḥ kokāś ca te hatāḥ ||
ye krimayaḥ śitikakṣā ye kṛṣṇāḥ śitibāhavaḥ | ye ke ca viśvarūpās tān krimīñ jambhayāmasi ||
yo dviśīrṣā caturakṣaḥ krimiḥsāraṅgoarjunaḥ | śṛṇāmy asya pṛṣṭīr api vṛścāmi yac chiraḥ ||
ud asau sūryo agād viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā | dṛṣṭāṃś ca ghnann adṛṣṭāṃś ca sarvāṃś ca pramṛṇan krimīn ||
yevāṣāsaḥkaṣkaṣāso dhrūkṣṇāsaḥśipavitnavaḥ | dṛṣṭaś ca hanyatāṃ krimir adṛṣṭaś cota hanyatām ||
hato yevāṣo hataḥ śipavir hato gaṅgaṇivām̐ uta | hatā viśvā arātaya ugreṇa vacasā mama ||
sarveṣāṃ ca krimīṇāṃ sarvāsāṃ ca krimīṇām | bhinadmyaśmanāśiro dahāmy agninā mukham ||
tigmebhir agne arcibhiḥ śukreṇa deva śociṣā | āmādo ni vaha tvam anyam āsani kṛṇvatām ||
śociṣāgne arciṣā ca nir daheto aghāyataḥ | sakhyam āvaṃkṛṇvahetvaṃ ca- -āmāda upa śaṃbhuvan||
nir āmādo nayāmasi niṣ kravyādo gṛhebhyaḥ | sasyādo nāma ye deva te agne mā dabhan tvām ||
āmādaś ca kravyādaś ca sasyādaś cobhayān saha | prajāṃ ye cakrire bhāgaṃ tān ito nir ṇayāmasi ||
ya āmeṣv aramanta na pakvamupadādhṛṣuḥ| te yantu sarve saṃbhūya- -anyatreto 'ghāyavaḥ ||
ya enasvī duṣkṛtakṛt kilbiṣakṛtasādhīyaḥ | punas tān yajñiyā devā nayantu yata āgatāḥ ||
ava reṇum ava rajo nenije hastyaṃ malam | dhātā no bhadrayā neṣat sa no gopāyatu prajām ||
kṛṇve 'haṃ rodasī varma syāma savituḥ save | mātā no bhadrayā bhūmir dyauś cāsmān pātv aṃhasaḥ ||
yad asurāṇām ahany asmān pāpā upethana | devānāṃ payaś ca daivyam āpaḥ śundhantu mām imāḥ ||
ā te pitar marutāṃ sumnam emi mā naḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśo yuvathāḥ | abhi no vīro 'rvatīḥ kṣameta prajāyāmahairudra prajayā ||
yo 'vṛddhaṃ hanti yo garbhe antar yo jātaṃ janitavyaṃ ca pūruṣam | tasmā ṛdhyāsaṃ haviṣāham adya sa naḥ prajāṃ jaradaṣṭiṃ kṛṇotu ||
indrasya bāhū sthavirau vṛṣāṇau citrā imā vṛṣabhau pārayiṣṇū | tauyokṣyeprathamau yoga āgate yābhyāṃ jitam asurāṇāṃ svar yat ||
āśuḥ śiśāno vṛṣabho na bhīmo ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaś carṣaṇīnām | saṃkrandano 'nimiṣa ekavīraḥ śataṃ senā jayatu sākam indraḥ ||
saṃkrandanenānimiṣeṇa jiṣṇunā- -ayodhyena duścyavanena dhṛṣṇunā | tad indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvaṃ yudho nara iṣuhastena vṛṣṇā ||
sa iṣuhastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhir vaśī saṃsraṣṭā yudha indro gaṇena | saṃsṛṣṭajit somapā bāhuśardhy ūrdhvadhanvā pratihitābhir astāt || prapāṭhaka ||
balavijñāyaḥ sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna ugraḥ | abhivīro abhiṣatvā sahojij jaitrāyendra ratham ā tiṣṭha govidam ||
imaṃ vīram anu harṣadhvam ugram indraṃ satvāno anu saṃ rabhadhvam | grāmajitaṃ gojitaṃ vajrabāhuṃ jayantamajmapramṛṇantam ojasā ||
abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamāno adāya ugraḥ śatamanyur indraḥ | duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāḍ ayodhyo asmākaṃ senā avatu pra yutsu ||
bṛhaspate pari dīyā rathena rakṣohāmitrām̐ apabādhamānaḥ | prabhañjañ chatrūnpramṛṇannamitrān asmākam edhy avitā tanūnām ||
indra āsāṃ netā bṛhaspatir dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ pura etu somaḥ | devasenānām abhibhañjatīnāṃ jayantīnāṃ maruto yantu madhye ||
indrasya vṛṣṇo varuṇasya rājña ādityānāṃ marutāṃ śardha ugram | mahāmanasāṃ bhuvanacyavānāṃ ghoṣo devānāṃ jayatām ud asthāt ||
asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣv asmākaṃ yā iṣavas tā jayantu | asmākaṃ vīrā uttare bhavantv asmān devāso 'vatā haveṣu ||
vaiśvānarād arocata jāto hiraṇyayo maṇiḥ | tam ābharad bṛhaspatiḥ kaśyapo vīryāya kam ||
bṛhaspatis tam akṛṇon maṇiṃ vaiśvānaraṃ sahaḥ | saptarṣayo balāya kaṃ saṃ dadhuṣ ṭvā vayodhasaḥ ||
viśve devās ta indriyaṃ saptarṣayaś ca saṃ dadhuḥ | jāto hiraṇyayo maṇir agner vaiśvānarād adhi ||
aśvattho jātaḥ prathamo 'gneḥ priyatamā tanūḥ | vaiśvānarasya sṛṣṭyā kṛtyādūṣiḥ kṛto maṇiḥ ||
kṛtyādūṣiṃ tvāvidaṃ kṛtyādūṣiṃ bharāmi tvā | kṛtyādūṣiṃ kṛṇomi tvā kṛtyādūṣiṃ vayodhasam ||
patatrī pakṣī balavān kṛtyādūṣiḥ sapatnahā | nitatnir viśvabheṣaja ugra āpatiko maṇiḥ ||
patatrī te balāya kaṃ nitatnir bheṣajāya te | jāto hiraṇyayo maṇir apa rakṣāṃsi sedhatu ||
devo maṇiḥ sapatnahā rakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ | hiraṇyayonir aṃśumān kaśyapenābhṛtaṃ sahaḥ ||
vaiśvānaraṃ tejanam ekam āhur agner yoneḥ saha candreṇa jātam | gayasphānaḥ prataraṇo vayodhāḥ kṛtyādūṣir valagahāsy ugraḥ ||
yasyedaṃ bhūmyām adhi nikrāntaṃ pāṃsure padam | mṛjānastanvoyad rapas tasya snāhi tanū adhi ||
dūṣyās tvā vadhaṃ vayaṃ devasya savituḥ save | jīvātave bharāmasi mahyā ariṣṭatātaye ||
ācchedanaḥ pracchedano dviṣatas tapano maṇiḥ | śatruñjayaḥsapatnahā dviṣantam apa bādhatām ||
satyasya sthūṇā pṛthivīṃ dādhāra ṛtena devā amṛtam anv avindan | dhruveṇa tvā haviṣā dhārayāmy abhi tad dyāvāpṛthivī gṛṇītām ||
yebhir homair viśvakarmā dādhāremāṃ pṛthivīṃ mātaraṃ naḥ | tebhiṣ ṭvā homair iha dhārayāmy ṛtaṃ satyam anu carantu homāḥ ||
iha dhriyadhvaṃ dharuṇe pṛthivyā uśatyā mātuḥ subhagāyā upasthe | aparāṇuttā mahasā modamānā asmin vāstau suprajaso bhavātha ||
suprajaso mahasā modamānā varṣman pṛthivyā upari śrayadhvam | asyai śālāyai śarma yacchantu devā dhārābhir enāṃ pṛthivī pipartu ||
imāṃ śālāṃ śreṣṭhatamāṃ vasūnām ariṣṭavīrā abhisaṃcarema | dṛḍhā asyā upamito bhavantu sthirā vīrā upasado bhavantu ||
imāṃ śālāṃ savitā vāyur indro bṛhaspatir ni minotu prajānan | ukṣantūdnāmaruto ghṛtena bhago no rājā ni kṛṣiṃ dadhātu ||
mānasya patni haviṣo juṣasva tīvrāntasya bahulamadhyamasya | ā tvā śiśurvāśyatāmā kumāra āvāśyantāṃdhenavo nityavatsāḥ ||
dṛḍhās te sthūṇā bhavantu bhūmyām adhi dṛḍhāḥ pakṣāsas tava devi śāle | sthiravīrānamitrā na edhi śarma no yaccha dvipade catuṣpade ||
śālā devī gārhapatyāya cākl̥pe tṛṇaṃ vasānā jagate suśevā | sthirāṅgāṃ tvā sthirapūruṣāṃ mānasya patni sthirāṃtvā vīrā abhi saṃ carema ||
vāstoṣpate prati jānīhy asmān svāveśo anamīvo na edhi | yattvemahe prati nas taj juṣasva catuṣpado dvipada ā veśayeha ||
darbho agra oṣadhīnāṃ śatakāṇḍo ajāyata | sa sahasravīryaḥ pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ ||
yathā darbho jāyamānas tvacaṃ bhinatti bhūmyāḥ | evā sa bhidyatāṃ jano yo naḥ pāpaṃ cikitsati ||
apa nāḍam apa kṛtyām apa rakṣaḥ sadānvāḥ | amīvāś cātayāmasi sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ ||
asti vai nivata udvanaṃ na vai sarvam anuplavam | asi tvaṃ tasya dūṣaṇo yo naḥ pāpaṃ cikitsati ||
pari sāyaṃ pari prātaḥ pari madhyaṃdinaṃ pari | darbho hiraṇyahastaghnaḥ pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ ||
girau jātaḥ svarahāsi sākaṃ somena babhruṇā | mā pāpakṛtvanaḥ śiṣo mā pākaḥ puruṣo riṣat ||
divo mūlam avatataṃ pṛthivyām ota āhitaḥ | darbhaḥ sahasravīryaḥ pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ ||
sahasrakāṇḍas taviṣas tīkṣṇavalśo viṣāsahiḥ | darbheṇa sarvā rakṣāṃsy amīvāś cāpa dahāmasi ||
apadagdhaṃduṣvapnyam apadagdhā arātayaḥ | sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ ||
mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā mā bradhnaḥ śakuniḥ patan | darbho rājā samudriyaḥ pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ ||
yo naḥ pāpena vacasā- -aghoṣatoduruktaṃbruvat | ārācchaptam aprāpyāsmān apa tad yātu sarvataḥ ||
yan naḥ śapād araṇo yat sapatnaḥ śvaśrūr vāyacchvaśuro vā śapāti | jyāyasaḥ śapathān vayaṃ yavena yāvayāmasi ||
yān samasyante śapathān vākkṣamyānṛtviyāmadhi| yavaṃ tvaṃ bibhrad bāhvoḥ pūrvaḥ prati śṛṇīhi tān ||
ṛjukeśo yavo babhrur maghavā no 'numādyaḥ | hiraṇyadhanvā śapathān upejatu ||
tvāṃ pītvendro vṛtraṃ śakro jaghāna vāsavaḥ | sa viṣāhī yatharṣabhaḥ sahasva śapathān yava ||
ārāc carantu śapathā yutā ito jihvā u ditā arasāḥ santu sarve | nāmagrāhād vāco heḍād īkṣitādghoracakṣasaḥ śarma te varma kṛṇmasi ||
apāñco yantu śapathā janenāstā aghāyunā | yo nodurasyājjīvate svenānāgase sate ||
pari mā pātu śapathād anṛtād duritād uta | pari mā jyāyasaḥ śaṃsād yavo rakṣatu māriṣam||
anāstigyaṃśapathair anativyādhyaṃ kṛtam | bṛhad varma prati muñcāmi te yavam ||
taṃ vayāṃsīva pakṣiṇa ā viśantu patatriṇaḥ | śaptāraṃ śapathāḥ punaḥ ||
ā no diśa mā pari ṣṭhā arāte mā no rakṣīr dakṣiṇāṃ yācamānām | pra ṇaḥ pradātā savitā ca yacchatāṃ namovīrtsāyāasamṛddhyai ca kṛṇmaḥ ||
yam arāte purodhatse puruṣaṃparirāpiṇam| namas te tasmai kṛṇmo mā vaniṃ mama vivyathaḥ ||
yam adyābhiprayuñjmahe manasā hṛdayena ca | arāte taṃ no māvīrtsīr ditsantaṃparirāpiṇi||
pra ṇo vanir devakṛtā divā naktaṃ ca sidhyatu | arātim anupremo vayaṃ namo 'stv arātaye ||
uta nagnābobhuvatī svapnayā sacase janam | arāte cittaṃvīrtsanty ākūtiṃ puruṣasya ca ||
paro 'pehy asamṛddhe vi te hetiṃ nayāmasi | yaṃ dviṣmas taṃ sacasva kanyā bhūtvā sragviṇīrukmiṇīdṛśe ||
namas te 'stv asamṛddhe mā māṃ purodhiṃ kṛṇuthāḥ | veda tvāhaṃ nimīvantīṃ nitudantīm arāte martyān martyebhyo adhi nirvadantīm ||
mā no vaniṃ mā vācaṃ māvīrtsīr ugrāv indrāgnī na ā bhajatāṃ vasūni | sarve no 'dyaditsanto arātiṃ prati haryata ||
savitāram anumatiṃ bhagaṃ yanto havāmahe | vācaṃ juṣṭāṃ madhumatīṃ vadāni devānāṃ devahūtiṣu ||
yaṃ yācāminakulyā jihvayoṣṭhāpidhānayā | śraddhā tam adya vindatu dattā somena babhruṇā ||
aitu devas trāyamāṇaḥ kuṣṭho himavatas pari | takmānaṃ sarvaṃ nāśayan sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ ||
trīṇi te kuṣṭha nāmāni naghamāronaghāriṣonaghāyuṣo na ghāyaṃ puruṣo riṣat | yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atho divā ||
jīvalā nāma te mātā jīvanto nāma te pitā māriṣā nāma te svasā na (…) ||
uttamo 'sy oṣadhīnām anaḍvāñ jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva na ghāyaṃ puruṣo riṣat | yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atho divā ||
triḥ śāmbubhyogireyebhyas trir ādityebhyas pari | trir jāto viśvadevebhyaḥ sa kuṣṭho viśvabheṣajaḥ sākaṃ somena tiṣṭhati | takmānaṃ sarvaṃ nāśayan sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ ||
aśvattho devasadanas tṛtīyasyām ito divi | tatrāmṛtasya cakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ kuṣṭho 'jāyata | saḥ (…) ||
hiraṇyayī naur acarad dhiraṇyabandhanā divi (…) ||
yatra nāvaḥ prabhraṃśanaṃ yatra himavataḥ śiraḥ | tatrāmṛtasya cakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ kuṣṭho ajāyata | sa kuṣṭho viśvabheṣajaḥ sākaṃ somena tiṣṭhati | takmānaṃ sarvaṃ nāśayan sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ ||
yaṃ tvā veda pūrva aikṣvāko yaṃ vā tvā kuṣṭha kāśyaḥ | yaṃ śāvaso yaṃmātsyas tenāsi viśvabheṣajaḥ ||
śīrṣālākaṃ tṛtīyakaṃ sadandiryaś ca hāyanaḥ | takmānaṃ viśvadhāvīrya- -adharāñcaṃ parā suva ||
ye parvatāḥ somapṛṣṭhā āpa uttānaśīvarīḥ | vātaḥ parjanya ād agnis te kravyādam aśīśaman ||
yas te hanti carācaram utthāsyantaṃ sarīsṛpam | garbhaṃ yo daśamāsyaṃ tam ito nāśayāmasi ||
yadi ghnanty apsaraso gandharvā gehyā uta | kravyādo mūradevinas tān ito nāśayāmasi ||
yas taūrūārohaty asṛk te rehaṇāya kam | āmādaḥ kravyādo ripūṃs tān ito nāśayāmasi ||
yas te śroṇī cyāvayaty antarā dampatī śaye | yoniṃ yo antar āreḍhi tam ito nāśayāmasi ||
yas tvā svapnena tamasā mohayitvā nipadyate | prajāṃ yas te jighatsati tam (…) ||
yas tvā patyuḥpratirūpo jāro bhūtvā nipadyate | arāyaṃ kaṇvaṃ pāpmānaṃ tam ito nāśayāmasi ||
hā hai kharva khalate naigūrakarṇa tuṇḍila | indrasya tigmam āyudhaṃ tena tvā nāśayāmasi ||
namas taṇḍāya namaḥ kusumāya namaḥpratipāvnenamaḥkaḥsvadheye| namas tubhyaṃ nirṛte viśvavāre jaremaṃ dhāpayatāṃ viśvarūpā ||
yāvad dyaur yāvat pṛthivī yāvat paryeti sūryaḥ | tāvattvam ugra gulgulo parīmāṃ pāhi viśvataḥ ||
ekarājñīm ekavratām ekasthām ekalāmikām | pāṭāṃ sapatnacātanīṃ jaitrāyācchā vadāmasi ||
ekarājñy ekavrata ekastha ekalāmike | na tvā sapatnī sāsāha gaireyī ca na bāhyā ||
uttarāham uttarābhya uttared adharābhyaḥ | adhaḥ sapatnī māmaky adhared adharābhyaḥ ||
na saindhavasya puṣpasya sūryo mlāpayati tvacam | pāṭe 'mlātayā tvayā sapatnyā varca ā dade ||
na vai pāṭe pāṭevāsi subhāgaṃkaraṇīd asi | pāṭe bhagasya no dhehy atho mā mahiṣīṃ kṛṇu ||
yat pāṭe adhi vṛkṣe vātaplavā mahīyase | jayantī pratyātiṣṭhantī saṃjayānāma vā asi ||
uttānaparṇāṃ subhagāṃ sahamānāṃ sahasvatīm | acchā bṛhadvadāṃ vada pāṭāṃ sapatnacātanīm ||
pāṭām indro vy āśnād dhantavā asurebhyaḥ | tayāhaṃ sapatnīṃ sākṣīya mahendro dānavān iva ||
pāṭā bibharty aṅkuśaṃ hiraṇyavantam aṅkinam | tena sapatnyā varca ā lumpāmi mamed asat ||
imāṃ khanāmy oṣadhiṃ vīrudhāṃ balavattamām | yayā sapatnīṃ bādhate kṛṇute kevalaṃ patim ||
yāsām ārād āghoṣāmo vātasyeva pṛthag yataḥ | tāsāṃśvanvatīnām indroapikṛtacchiraḥ ||
yāḥ purastād ācaranti sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ (…) ||
yā vātam anusaṃyanty antarikṣe adho divaḥ (…) ||
yāsāṃ preṅkho divi baddho antarikṣe hiraṇyayaḥ (…) ||
yās talpān anunṛtyanty antarikṣe hiraṇyayān (…) ||
yāḥ patanti vātarathā uttānāḥ pādaghātinīḥ (…) ||
yā vṛkṣaṃ parisarpanti sācyakṣīkarikratīḥ (…) ||
yāś catvare saṃgacchante vikumbāś celavāsinīḥ (…) ||
yāsāṃ sikatavāpiṣu gṛho mito hiraṇyayaḥ (…) ||
yā ārokaiḥ prapadyante puṣkarair iva jāmayaḥ (…) ||
yā nadīḥ pratigāhante saṃrabhya kanyā iva (…) ||
yās tīrthāni vigāhante 'ghnyāḥśvasatīriva (…) ||
yāḥ samudrād uccaranty uccair ghoṣān karikratīḥ (…) ||
yā gacchanti janaṃjanam icchantīḥ prayutaṃ bahu | tāsāṃśvanvatīnām indroapikṛtacchiraḥ ||
agnir āyuṣmān sa vanaspatibhir āyuṣmān | sa māyuṣmān āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu ||
vāyur āyuṣmān so 'ntarikṣeṇāyuṣmān (…) ||
sūrya āyuṣmān sa divāyuṣmān (…) ||
candra āyuṣmān sa nakṣatrair āyuṣmān (…) ||
soma āyuṣmān sa oṣadhībhir āyuṣmān (…) ||
yajña āyuṣmān sa dakṣiṇābhir āyuṣmān (…) ||
samudra āyuṣmān sa nadībhir āyuṣmān | sa māyuṣmān āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu ||
brahmāyuṣmat tad brahmacāribhir āyuṣmat | tan māyuṣmad āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu ||
indra āyuṣmān sa vīryeṇāyuṣmān | sa māyuṣmān āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu ||
devā āyuṣmantas te 'mṛtenāyuṣmantaḥ | te māyuṣmanta āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇvantu ||
prajāpatir āyuṣmān sa prajābhir āyuṣmān | sa māyuṣmān āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu ||
dakṣiṇā mā dakṣiṇato dakṣiṇā pātu savyataḥ | paścād anuvyādhāt pātu sarvasyā bhavahetyāḥ ||
paśunā tvaṃ paśupate dvipāddattvācatuṣpadā | ātmanvatīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ prāṇaṃdattvāprāṇihi ||
yāṃ dadāsi śraddadhāno dakṣiṇāṃ brāhmaṇakṛte | sā tvā yakṣmāt pārayatv agneḥsaṃtāpāddivyasya śokāt ||
dadāsīmāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ mā taāmamac chalyān yakṣmān vi vṛhāmo vayaṃ te | karṇaśūlam upahatyā arātīḥ sarve yakṣmā apa tiṣṭhantu sākam ||
annena prāṇaṃ vanute tiro dhatte paridhānena yakṣmam | hiraṇyam aśvaṃ gāṃ dadat kṛṇute varma dakṣiṇām ||
uṣṇīṣaṃ tvā śīrṣaktyā vāsas tvātanvāmayāt| candraṃ hiraṇyam andhyāt karṇād dattaṃ śukraṃ bhrājad bādhiryāt pātu dakṣiṇā ||
upabarhaṇaṃ tvā grīvāmayān maṇayo yakṣmāddatkravyāt| aṅgarogād abhyañjanam annaṃtvāntaṣṭyāmayāt||
adhaspadād āmayataḥ pado rogād upānahau | daṇḍas tvā dattaḥ pari pātu sarpād dakṣiṇataḥ prayato dakṣiṇena ||
saumanasaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dakṣamāṇā iṣam ūrjaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ saṃvasānāḥ | bhagasya dhārām avase pratīmaḥ ||
sahasrāṅgā śataṃ jyotīṃṣy asyā yajñasya paprir amṛtā svargā | ā na etu dakṣiṇā viśvarūpā- -ahiṃsantīṃ prati gṛhṇīma enām ||
agnir mā pātu vasubhiḥ purastāt tasmin krametasmiṃśraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi | sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā ||
vāyur māntarikṣeṇaitasyā diśaḥ pātu tasmin (…) ||
somo mā rudrair dakṣiṇāyā diśaḥ (…) ||
varuṇo mādityair etasyā diśaḥ (…) ||
sūryo mā dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ pratīcyā diśaḥ pātu tasmin krametasmiṃśraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi | sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā ||
apo mauṣadhīmatīr etasyā diśaḥ pāntu tāsu krame tāsu śraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi | tā mā rakṣantu tā mā gopāyantu tābhya ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā ||
viśvakarmā mā saptarṣibhir udīcyā diśaḥ (…) ||
indro mā marutvān etasyā diśaḥ (…) ||
prajāpatir mā prajananavān saha pratiṣṭhayā dhruvāyā diśaḥ (…) ||
bṛhaspatir mā viśvair devair ūrdhvāyā diśaḥ pātu tasmin krametasmiṃśraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi | sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā ||
agniṃ te vasumantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyavaḥ prācyā diśo +'bhidāsān ||
vāyuṃ te 'ntarikṣavantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyava etasyā diśo +'bhidāsān ||
somaṃ te rudravantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyavo dakṣiṇāyā diśo +'bhidāsān ||
varuṇaṃ ta ādityavantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyava etasyā diśo +'bhidāsān ||
sūryaṃ te dyāvāpṛthivīvantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyavaḥ pratīcyā diśo +'bhidāsān ||
apas ta oṣadhīmatīr ṛcchantu ye māghāyava etasyā diśo +'bhidāsān ||
viśvakarmāṇaṃ te saptarṣivantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyava udīcyā diśo +'bhidāsān ||
indraṃ te marutvantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyava etasyā diśo +'bhidāsān ||
prajāpatiṃ te prajananavantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyavo dhruvāyā diśo +'bhidāsān ||
bṛhaspatiṃ te viśvadevavantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyava ūrdhvāyā diśo +'bhidāsān ||
vaikaṅkatenedhmena devebhya ājyaṃ vaha | agne tān iha mādaya sarva ā yantu me havam ||
indra ā yāhi me havam idaṃ kariṣyāmitacchṛṇu | ima aindrā atisarā ākūtīḥ saṃ namantu me | tebhiḥ śakema vīryaṃ jātavedas tanūvaśin ||
yad asāv amuto devā adevaḥ saṃścikīrṣati | mā tasyāgnir havyaṃ vākṣīd dhavaṃ devāś ca mopa gur mamaiva havam etana ||
ati dhāvatātisarā viśvasyeśānā ojasaḥ | vṛścatāmuṣya jīvitam indreṇa saha medinā ||
atisṛtyātisarā indrasyaujasā hata | aviṃ vṛka iva mathnīta tato vo jīvan mā moci prāṇam asyāpi nahyata ||
yān asau pratisarān akaś cakāra kṛṇavac ca yān | tvaṃ tān indra vṛtrahan pratīcaḥ punar ā kṛdhi yathāmuṃtṛṇahañjanam ||
yam amī purodadhire brahmāṇam upabhūtaye | indrasya te adhaspadaṃ taṃ pra yacchāmi mṛtyave kravyād enaṃ śamayatu ||
yadi preyur devapurā brahma varmāṇi cakrire | tanūpānaṃ paripāṇāni cakrire sarvaṃ tad arasaṃ kṛdhi ||
atrainamindra vṛtrahann ugro marmaṇi vidhya | atraivainam abhi tiṣṭha śakra medy ahaṃ tava | anu tvendrā rabhāmahe syāma sumatau tava ||
yathendra udvācanaṃ labdhvā cakre adhaspadam | kṛṇve 'mum adharaṃ tathā śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ ||
āṅgiraso janmanāsi tam u tvāhur vanaspate | sa pīlo rakṣo bādhasva sākam indreṇa medinā ||
apa rakṣāṃsi bādhasva bādhasvaparirāpiṇaḥ| piśācān pīlo kravyādo bādhasva mūradevinaḥ ||
yayāhustṛṣṭaṃkaṭukam apagūḍhaṃ phale kulam | tasyai hiraṇyakeśyai namaḥ kṛṇmo arātaye ||
yā mahatī mahonmānā sarvā āśā vyānaśe | tasyai hiraṇyakeśyai namaḥ kṛṇmo arātaye ||
yas te yoniṃ pratireḍhy āṇḍādo garbhadūṣaṇaḥ | arāyaṃ putraṃprāpīyas taṃ pīluḥ sahatām itaḥ ||
yadā pīlav āṅgirasa pakvo 'tiṣṭho vanaspate | athāhur indraṃ jajñānaṃ śakraṃbarjahyeprati ||
yathā sedim abādhathāḥ pacyamāno vanaspate | evā pīlo rakṣo bādhasva sākam indreṇa medinā ||
yat piśācaiḥ puruṣasya jagdhaṃ bhavaty ātmanaḥ | ā pīlo pyāyate punas tava cāśnāti pippalam ||
pīluṃ tvāhuḥ pīvaṃ tvāhur atho tvāhur vanaspatim | sarvā te bhadrā nāmāni tebhir naḥ pāhy aṃhasaḥ ||
rakṣohaṇaṃ vṛtrahaṇaṃ pīluṃ piśācajambhanam | jajñānam agre vṛkṣāṇāṃ taṃ te badhnāmy āyuṣe ||
kathā dive asurāya bravāma kathā pitre haraye tveṣanṛmṇaḥ | pṛśniṃ varuṇa dakṣiṇāṃ dadāvān punarmagha tvaṃ manasācikitsīḥ ||
na kāmena punarmagho bhavāmi saṃpṛcya kaṃ pṛśnim etām upāje | kena mat tvam atharvan kāvyena kena jātenāsi jātavedāḥ ||
satyam ahaṃ gabhīraḥ kāvyena satyaṃ jātenāsmi jātavedāḥ | na me dāso nāryo mahitvaṃ vrataṃ mīmāya yad ahaṃ dhariṣye ||
na tvad anyaḥ kavitaro na vedhā na dhīrataro varuṇa svadhāvaḥ | tvam aṅga viśvā janimāni vettha sa cin nu tvaj jano māyī bibhāya ||
tvaṃ hy aṅga varuṇa svadhāvo viśvāni vettha janimā śardhanīte | kim enā rajasaḥ paro 'sti kim avareṇāvaram amura ||
ekam enā rajasaḥ paro 'sti para ekena durdāśaṃ cidanyat| tat te vidvān varuṇa pra bravīmy adhovacasaḥ paṇayo bhavantu nīcair dāsā upa sarpantu riprāḥ ||
