tvaṃ hy aṅga varuṇa pra bravīṣi punarmagheṣv avadyāni bhūri | mo ṣu paṇy abhy etāvatā bhūr mā tvā vocann arādhasaṃ janāsaḥ ||
mā mā vocann arādhasaṃ janāsaḥ punas tepṛśniṃjaritar dadāmi | stotraṃ me viśvam ā yāhi janeṣv antar deveṣu mānuṣeṣu vipra ||
ā te stotrāṇi vardhanāni yāmi dehi tan mahyaṃ yad adattam asti | yujyo naḥ saptapadaḥ sakhāsi samā nau bandhur varuṇaḥ samā jā ||
veda vai tad yan nau samā jā dadāmi tubhyaṃ yad adattam asti | devo devāya gṛṇate vayodhā vipro viprāya stuvate sumedhāḥ ||
ajījano hi varuṇa svadhāvann atharvāṇaṃ pitaraṃ viśvadevam | tasmā urvāyuṣkṛṇuhi praśastaṃBhatt. āyuḥ sakhā no 'si paramaś ca bandhuḥ ||
vṛṣā me ravo nabhasā na tanyatur ugreṇa taṃ vacasā bādha id u te | ahaṃ tam asya grabhir agrabhaṃ rasaṃ jyotiṣeva tamasa ud eti sūryaḥ ||
yat te 'podakaṃ viṣaṃ tat ta āt tābhir agrabham | gṛhṇāmi madhyam uttamam utāvamaṃ bhiyasā neśad ād u te ||
balena te balaṃ hanmi tanvāhanmi te tanum | viṣeṇa hanmi te viṣam ahemṛṣīṣṭhāmājīvīḥsee Kim 2014, 17; Bhatt. muriṣṭā, jīvīt pratyag abhy etu tvā viṣam ||
asitasya taimātasya babhror apodakasya ca | sātrāsāhasya manyor jyām ugrasyeva dhanvano vi muñcāmi rathām̐ iva ||
kailāta pṛśna upatṛṇya babhrav ā me śṛṇutāsitāalīkāḥ| mā naḥ sakhyuḥ kāmam api ṣṭhād āśrāvayāddho vīrṣe ramadhvam ||
āliki ca vili pitā yas te mātā ca | vidma te viśvato bandhum arasa kiṃ kariṣyasi ||
urugūlāyā duhitā jātā dāsy asiknyāḥ | prataṅkaṃ dadruṣī nu sāhīnarasām̐ akaḥ ||
karṇā śvāvid abravīd girer avacarantikā | yāḥ kāś cemāḥ khanitrimās tāsām arasatamaṃ viṣam ||
tābuvaṃ na tābuvaṃ na ghed asi tvaṃ tābuvam | tābuvenārasaṃ viṣam ||
tastuvaṃ na tastuvaṃ na ghed asi tvaṃ tastuvam | tastuvenārasaṃ viṣam ||
arasaṃte 'he viṣam iyaṃ kṛṇotv oṣadhiḥ | trāyamāṇā sahamānā sahasvatī sahātā id gor aśvāt puruṣād viṣam ||
yad āñjanaṃ traikakudaṃ jātaṃ himavatas pari | yātūṃś ca sarvān jambhayā sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ ||
utevāsi paripāṇaṃ yātujambhanam āñjana | utāmṛtatvasyeśiṣa utāsi pitubhojanam ||
paripāṇaṃ puruṣāṇāṃ paripāṇaṃ gavām asi | aśvānām arvatām it paripāṇāya tasthiṣe ||
pari māṃ pari ṇaḥ priyaṃ pari ṇaḥ pāhi yad dhanam | arātir in no mā tārīn mā ca naḥ kiṃ canāmamat ||
na taṃ prāpnoti śapatho na kṛtyā nābhiśocanam | nainaṃ viṣkandham aśnute yas tvā bibharty āñjana ||
āsan mantryādduṣvapnyāt kṣetriyācchapathād uta | durhārdaś cakṣuṣo ghorāt tasmān naḥ pāhy āñjana ||
trayo dāsā āñjanasya takmā balāsa ād ahiḥ | varṣiṣṭhaḥ parvatānāṃ trikakun nāma te pitā ||
vṛtrasyāsi kanīnikā parvatasyāsy akṣyau | devebhiḥ sarvaiḥ proktaṃ paridhir nāma vā asi ||
vaido ha veda te nāma gandharvaḥ parivācanam | yata āñjana prajāyase tata ehy ariṣṭatātaye ||
yadi vāsi traikakudaṃ yadi yāmunam ucyase | ubhe te bhadre nāmnī tābhyāṃ naḥ pāhy āñjana ||
yasyāñjana prasarpasy aṅgamaṅgaṃ paruṣparuḥ | tasmād yakṣmaṃ vi bādhasva- -ugro madhyamaśīr iva ||
nainaṃ ghnanti paryāyiṇo nasannām̐ava gacchati | jane sa na pra mīyate yas tvā bibharty āñjana ||
idaṃ vidvān āñjana satyaṃ vakṣyāmi nānṛtam | saneyam aśvaṃ gāṃ vāsa ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣa ||

daśa ca me śataṃ ca (…) ||see 1bcd
śataṃ ca me sahasraṃ ca- -apavaktāra oṣadhe | ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu tvā madhulā karat ||
ā paśyasi prati paśyasi parā paśyasi paśyasi | dyām antarikṣam ād bhūmiṃ tat sarvaṃ devi paśyasi ||
tisro divas tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ ṣaṭ cemaḥ pradiśo mahīḥ | tayāhaṃ sarvān yātūn paśyāni devy oṣadhe ||
suparṇasya divyasya tasya hāsi kanīnikā | sā bhūmim ā rurohitha vahyaṃ śrāntā vadhūr iva ||
tāṃ me sahasrākṣo devo dakṣiṇe hasta ā dadhat | tayāhaṃ sarvaṃ paśyāmi yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhāvyam ||
yathā śvā caturakṣo yathāśvaḥ śyāvo 'rvatām | yathāgnir viśvataḥpratyaṅṅBhatt. pratyaṅ evā tvam asy oṣadhe ||
kaśyapasya cakṣur asi śunyāścaturakṣyāḥ| vīdhre sūryam iva sarpantaṃ mā piśācaṃ tiras karaḥ ||
darśaya mā yātudhānān darśaya yātudhānyaḥ | āpaspṛta iva tiṣṭhantaṃ darśaya mā kimīdinam ||
ud agrabhaṃ paripāṇaṃ yātudhānāt kimīdinaḥ | tenāhaṃ sarvaṃ paśyāny uta śūdram utāryam ||
yathā sūryaś candramāś ca viśvā bhūtā vipaśyataḥ | evā vi paśya tān tvam aghāyur mopa gād iha ||
yo antarikṣeṇa patati bhūmiṃ yaś copasarpati | divaṃ yo manyate nāthaṃ taṃ piśācaṃ dṛśe kuru ||
āviṣ kṛṇuṣva rūpāṇi mātmānam apa gūhathāḥ | adhā sahasracakṣo tvaṃ prati paśyāsy āyataḥ ||
mokṣejāṃs todāṃs tumalān pathiṣṭhām̐ utapārṣatān| ahīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣam arasaṃ kṛṇv oṣadhe ||
aśvakrandasya vaṇḍasya pṛdākor gonaser uta | śvitrāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣam arasaṃ kṛṇv oṣadhe ||
dyāṃpātasya gavakasya godhāpṛṣṭher aher uta | asitānām etaj jātam ariṣṭe 'rasaṃ kṛdhi ||
etaj jātaṃ svajānāṃ tad babhro arasaṃ kṛdhi | sarvasya babhror bheṣajy asīhaviṣadūṣaṇī ||asīhawith Kim 2014, 64, Bhatt./Or. asī hi
trāyamāṇā pra bravītu sarvāṅ rājño ahīnām | tiraścirājīn asitān atho upaśayāś ca ye ||
sahasāhaṃ yātudhānān sahasā yātudhānyaḥ | saho vaḥ sarvān sāsāha tasyāhaṃ nāma jagrabha ||
sahaḥ sākaṃ paidvena- -ugreṇa vacasā mama | andhāhīṃś ca sṛjayāś ca śaphakāṃś ca rathavrayaḥ | sahasā saha utpatya tān sarvām̐ arasām̐ akaḥ ||
asitasya vidradhasya harito yaś ca vidradhaḥ | nimaṅkṣī vidradhānāṃ yo mṛjantī tām̐ ajījabhat ||
yaḥ svajānāṃ nīlagrīvo yaḥ svajānāṃ harir uta | kalmāṣapuccham oṣadhe jambhayāsy arundhati ||
māyaṃ marad ahidaṣṭaḥ pitur asmā asad viṣam | imā hy asmā oṣadhim ā harāmy arundhatīm ||
etaj jātaṃ pṛdākūnām arasaṃ jīvale kṛdhi | indrasya bhadrikā vīrud asīhaviṣadūṣaṇī ||asīhasee Kim 2014, 64; Bhatt. asī hi
śatam arvāk pra syandante pra syandante śataṃ paraḥ | śataṃ vṛtrasya kāṇḍāni tebhya āpo vi dhāvatha ||
antarikṣe patayiṣṇavo nabhasas pari jajñire | āpo hiraṇyavarṇās tās te bhavantu śaṃ hṛde ||
śaṃ te santu hṛdayāya śaṃ tehṛdayyābhyaḥ|Bhatt. hṛdayābhyaḥ śaṃ te yakaklomabhyaḥ śam uteantaṣṭebhyaḥ ||Bhatt. te yantaṣṭebhyaḥ
yad aṅgairapasismiṣe yacchīrṣṇā yac ca pṛṣṭibhiḥ | āpas tat sarvaṃ niṣkaran taṣṭā riṣṭam ivānasaḥ ||
saṃ hṛdayena hṛdayam opaśena sam opaśaḥ | adbhir muñcāpasmitaṃ pārṣṇidyotaḥ sam etu me ||
ācarantīḥ parvatebhyo devīr devebhyas pari | āpo yam adya prāpan na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ ||
śaṃ ta āpo haimavatīḥ śam u tesantūtsyāḥ| śaṃ te saniṣyadā āpaḥ śam u te santu varṣyāḥ ||
śaṃ ta āpo dhanvanyāḥ śam u te santv anūpyāḥ | śaṃ te khanitrimā āpaḥ śaṃ yāḥ kumbhebhir ābhṛtāḥ ||
anabhrayaḥ khanamānā viprā gambhīre 'pasaḥ | bhiṣagbhyo bhiṣaktarā āpoacchāvadāmasi ||
apām aha divyānām apāṃ srotasyānām | apām aha praṇejane 'śvā bhavatha vājinaḥ ||
tā āpaḥ śivā āpo 'yakṣmaṃkaraṇīr apaḥ | yathaiva tṛṣyate mayas tās ta ādyuttabheṣajī ||
brahmajyeṣṭhā saṃbhṛtā vīryāṇi brahmāgre jyeṣṭhaṃ divam ā tatāna | bhūtānāṃ brahma prathamota jajñe tenārhati brahmaṇā spardhituṃ kaḥ ||
brahmeme dyāvāpṛthivī brahmeme sapta sindhavaḥ | brahmeme sarva ādityā brahma devā upāsate ||
brahma brāhmaṇo vadati brahma rātrī ni viśate | sāvitraṃ brahmaṇo jātaṃ brahmaṇāgnir vi rocate ||
brahmauṣadhayo ni tiṣṭhanti brahma varṣanti vṛṣṭayaḥ | brahmedaṃ sarvam ātmanvad yāvat sūryo vipaśyati ||
brahma hotā brahma yajño brahmaṇā svaravo mitāḥ | adhvaryur brahmaṇo jāto brahmaṇot tirate haviḥ ||
brahmasrucoghṛtavatīr brahmaṇā vedir udyatā | brahma yajñasya tantava ṛtvijo ye haviṣkṛtaḥ ||
brahma ṛṣabho bhadraretā brahma gāvo haviṣkṛtaḥ | brahma rathasya devasya yajjayātisvaraṅkṛtaḥ ||
brahmaṇā śīraṃ vahati brahmaṇā yujyate rathaḥ | brahmaṇā puruṣo dvipān na vyathate caran ||
brahmaṇo jātā ṛṣayo brahmaṇo rājanyā uta | brahmedaṃ brahmaṇo jātaṃ brahmaṇo +'viṣyā annam ||
brahma śūdrā rājanyānāṃ brahmaiṣām utavikṣadaḥ| brahmaiṣāṃ bhadraṃ sādanaṃ brahmaṇaiṣāṃ sabhāsadaḥ ||
brahma dāśā brahma dāsā brahmeme kitavā uta | strīpuṃsau brahmaṇo jātau striyo brahma uta vāvana ||
brahmodvatonivato brahma saṃvato vānaspatyāḥ parvatā brahma vīrudhaḥ | brahmedaṃ sarvam anv ā tatāna- -antarā dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ||
brahmaivābhūd uttaraṃ jātavedo radvajro yātudhānaṃ mahālam | bhavāśarvau tapuṣīṃ hetim asmai mayeṣitau vi sṛjatāṃ vadhāya ||
yad aśvinā oṣadhīṣv āsiktaṃ puṣkarasrajā vīrudho madhu bibhrati | tenāham asyā mūrdhānam abhi ṣiñcāmi nāryāḥ ||
yad aśvinā puṣpād adhi mākṣikaṃ madhu saṃbhṛtam | anne lavaṇe yan madhu tenā(…) ||see 1de
yad aśvinā gulgunyā- -āñjane madhu saṃbhṛtaṃ yad asmin madhughe madhu | (…) ||see 1de
yad aśvinākṣa madhu goṣv aśveṣu yan madhu | surāyāṃ sicyamānāyāṃ kīlāle 'dhi yan madhu | tenā(…) ||see 1de
yad aśvinā govarcasaṃ hiraṇyavarcasaṃ hastivarcasam aśvinā | tenāham asyā mūrdhānam abhi ṣiñcāmi nāryāḥ ||
abhi nandam abhi modam abhi darpaṃ kṛṇomi te | ā te bhagaṃ vartayatām aśvinā puṣkarasrajā ||
datsu te varcaḥ subhage jihvāyāṃ te madhūlakam | akṣyau nikaraṇī tava pratīkaṃ madhumattaram ||
ā sacasva talāśeva vṛkṣa ivāpatikaḥ patim | tvaṃ sam agrabhīḥ puṃsaḥ śyena ivānyān patatriṇaḥ ||
ā hi te hārṣam udakam apo bhagābhiṣecanīḥ | yat te varco 'pakrāntaṃ mukhasya praticakṣaṇāt | punas tad aśvinā tvayy ā dhattāṃ puṣkarasrajā ||
abhi tvā varcasāsicaṃ divyena payasā saha | yathāpativatnyaso devṛgbhyo madhumattarā ||
bhagaṃ te mitrāvaruṇā bhagaṃ devī sarasvatī | bhagaṃ te aśvinobhā- -ā dhattāṃ puṣkarasrajā ||
patiṃ te rājā varuṇaḥ patiṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ | patiṃ ta indraś cāgniś ca patiṃ dhātā dadhātu te ||
catasras te khala sraktīr atho madhyam ahaṃ khala | dhārāś catasra stoṣyāmi vediṃ manuṣyavardhanīm ||
ūrjasvantam ā rabhadhvaṃ sphātimantaṃ punītana | indro bījasyābhyāvoḍhā bhaga aitu purogavaḥ ||
bhagasya hy anaḍvāhau yuñjāthāṃ rāśivāhanau | adhā pṛthivyāḥ kīlālam ihā vahatam aśvinā ||
abhivṛtaḥ parihito dhānyena vibhuḥ prabhuḥ | bhartā manuṣyāṇāṃ jajñe devānām ājyaṃ khalaḥ ||
srucaāsan pavanīḥ sṛṇīkāḥparidhiṣkṛtaḥ | kīnāśā āsan hotāro bījadāāsīd dhaviṣpatiḥ ||
ihendra muṣṭī vi sṛjasva pūrṇāv iha saumanasaḥ sam ṛdhyatām | hutādo ye ca gandharvās ta iha sphātiṃ sam ā vahān ||
atipaśyo nicāyaka iḍukaḥ pakvam ā bhara | īśānā gandharvā bhuvanasya sarva ā vahantu khale spātim ihasūnṛtāṃca ||
ā paścād ā purastād ottarād adharād uta | indreha vasor īśānaḥ khale sphātiṃ sam ā vaha ||
sphātim indraḥ khale bahvīm ihot prāṇa ut pṛṇat | sphātiṃ me viśve devāḥ sphātiṃ somo atho bhagaḥ ||
sphātir me astu hastayoḥ sphātir yatra parārabhe | śatahastedam ut pṛṇa samudrasyeva madhyataḥ ||
iha me bhūya ā bhara yathāhaṃ kāmaye tathā | yathedam ud iva sphāyātai traya iva hastinaḥ saha ||
svādvīṃ tvā mitrāvaruṇā svādvīṃ devī sarasvatī | svādvīṃ tvā aśvinā sure kṛṇutāṃ puṣkarasrajā ||
yām asiñcan saudhanvanā viśve devā marudgaṇāḥ | yām aśvināsiñcatāṃ sā surā bahu dhāvatu ||
svādoḥ svādīyasī bhava madhor madhutarā bhava | yatha rśyasyeyam āriśy evā tvaṃ subhage bhava ||
abhrāj jātaṃ varṣāj jātam atho jātaṃ divas pari | atho samudrāj jātaṃ tat surādaraṇaṃ bhava ||
nāḍī nāmāsi januṣā sā surādaraṇī bhava | sakhā hi bhadras ta āsīd vṛkṣaḥ svāduvikaṅkataḥ ||
asuras tv aurdhvanabhasaś cakāra prathamaḥ sure | sure dāsasya tvā gṛhe śiraś cāndhaś ca cakratuḥ ||
niṣ puṣpakaṃ kaśīkāyā nir dhārāyāḥ surām uta | ud ehi vājinīvati kim aṅkatiṣv icchasi ||
ime te janyā āsate gambhīrā abhidhṛṣṇavaḥ | sure devi pari prehi mādayantī janaṃjanam ||
yasyā gṛhṇanti sthālena gām aśvaṃ dhānyaṃ vasu | sā surā bahu dhāvatu ||
ācarantīḥ parvatebhyaḥ khanamānā anabhrayaḥ | yāsāṃ samudre saṃsthānaṃ yāsāṃ nāsti niveśanaṃ tās te dadatubudbudam||
udaṅkodacemāṃsurāṃ yāṃ hṛdā kāmayāmahe | tāṃ me bhagas tām aśvinā tāṃmaāvāṭsarasvatī ||
ayaṃ devo mayūlaśaḥ sā surādaraṇaṃ dadat | saṃsravaṇāt prasravaṇād giribhyas pary ābhṛtaḥ | madhye śatasya maṣṭiṣko 'naḍvān iva mehatu ||
samudrād ūrmir madhumām̐ ud ārad upāṃśunā sam amṛtatvam ānaṭ | ghṛtasya nāma guhyaṃ yad asti jihvā devānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ ||
vayaṃ nāma pra bravāmā ghṛtasya- -asmin yajñe dhārayāmā namobhiḥ | upa brahmāśṛṇavacchasyamānaṃ catuḥśṛṅgo 'vamīd gaura etat ||
catvāri śṛṅgā trayo asya pādā dve śīrṣe sapta hastāso asya | tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyām̐ ā viveśa ||
tridhā hitaṃ paṇibhir guhyamānaṃ gavi devāso ghṛtam anv avindan | indra ekaṃ sūrya ekaṃ jajāna venād ekaṃ svadhayā niṣ ṭatakṣuḥ ||
etā arṣanti hṛdyāt samudrāc chatavrajā ripuṇā nāvacakṣe | ghṛtasya dhārā abhi cākaśīmi hiraṇyayo vetaso madhya āsām ||
samyak sravanti sarito na dhenā antar hṛdā manasā pūyamānāḥ | ete arṣanty ūrmayo ghṛtasya mṛgā iva kṣipaṇor īṣamāṇāḥ ||
sindhor iva prādhvaneśūghanāso vātaḥ pramīyaḥ patayantiyahvāḥ| ghṛtasya dhārā aruṣo na vājī kāṣṭhā bhindann ūrmibhiḥ pinvamānaḥ ||
abhipravantasamaneva yoṣāḥ kalyāṇyaḥ smayamānāso agnim | ghṛtasya dhārāḥ samidho nasanta tā juṣāṇo haryati jātavedāḥ ||
kanyā iva vahatum etavā u añjy añjānā abhi cākaśīmi | yatra somaḥ sūyate yatra yajño ghṛtasya dhārā abhi tat pavante ||
abhy arṣata suṣṭutiṃ gavyam ājīm asmāsu bhadrā draviṇāni dhatta | imaṃ yajñaṃ nayata devatā no ghṛtasya dhārā madhumat pavante ||
dhāman te viśvaṃ bhuvanam adhi śritam antaḥ samudre hṛdy antar āyuṣi | apām anīkāt samithād ya ābhṛtas tamaśyāmamadhumantaṃ ta ūrmim ||
dve virūpe carataḥ svarthe anyānyā vatsam upa dhāpayete | harir anyasyāṃ bhavatisvadhāvāñ chukroanyasyāṃ dadṛśe suvarcāḥ ||Bhatt. śukro
daśemaṃ tvaṣṭur janayanta garbham atandrāso yuvatayo vibhṛtram | tigmānīkaṃ svayaśasaṃ janeṣu virocamānaṃ pari ṣīṃ nayanti ||
trīṇī jānāt prati bhūṣanty asya samudra ekaṃ divy ekam apsu | pūrvām anu pra diśaṃ pārthivānām ṛtūn praśāsad vi dadhāv anuṣṭhu ||
ka imaṃ vo niṇyam ā ciketa vatso mātṝr janayata svadhābhiḥ | bahvīnāṃ garbho apasām upasthān mahānkavirniś carati svadhāvān ||
āviṣṭyo vardhate cārur āsu jihmānām ūrdhvaḥ svayasām upasthe | ubhe tvaṣṭur bibhyatur jāyamānāt pratīcī siṃhaṃ pratijoṣayete||
ubhe bhadre joṣayete na mene gāvo na vāśrā upa tasthur evaiḥ | sa dakṣāṇāṃ dakṣapatir babhūva- -añjantiyaṃ dakṣiṇato havirbhiḥ ||
udyaṃyamītisaviteva bāhū ubhe sicau yatate bhīmaṛñjan| ucchukram atkam ajate simasmān navā mātṛbhyo vasanā jahāti ||
tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇuta uttaraṃ yat saṃpṛñcānaḥ sadanaṃ gobhir adbhiḥ | kavir budhnaṃ parimarmṛjyatedhīḥ sā devatātā samitir babhūva ||
uru te jrayaḥ pary eti budhnaṃ virocamānaṃ mahiṣasya dhāma | viśvebhir agne svayaśobhir iddho 'dabdhebhiḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhy asmān ||
dhanvaṃ srotaḥ kṛṇute gātum ūrmiṃ śukrair ūrmibhir abhi nakṣati kṣām | viśvā sanāni jaṭhareṣu dhatte 'ntar navāsu carati prasūṣu ||
evā no agne samidhā vṛdhāno revat pāvaka śravasā vi bhāhi | tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ ||
yo jāmadagnya iha kauśiko ya ātreya uta kāśyapo yaḥ | bharadvājā gotamā ye vasiṣṭhās tebhyaḥ pra brūma iha kilbiṣāṇi ||
agastyayaḥ kaṇvāḥ kutsāḥ prasravaṇā virūpā gargā mudgalāyaskāḥśūnakāḥ | saṃkṛtayo brāhmaṇā ye nadrugdhās tebhyaḥ pra brūma iha kilbiṣāṇi ||
yo nottiṣṭhād brāhmaṇe nādhamāne māndyena dṛpta uta dhairyeṇa | viśve devā upadraṣṭāro 'sya tasmin viṣaṃ saṃ nayān kilbiṣyam ||
yā ropayaḥ kilbiṣe brāhmaṇasya yāni caināṃsi bahudhā duṣkṛtāni | anutiṣṭhan prokta ātmani taṃ ni dhatte tathā tad devā uta veśayanti ||
nāśnīyān na piben naśayīta naniṃsītajāyāṃ nota putram | brahmakilbiṣe prokta ud eva tiṣṭhet sa ṛtasya panthāḥ ||
śatarcino mādhyamā ye maharṣayaḥ kṣudrasūktānām uta yā prajeha | ṛṣīṇāṃ yāni janimāni vidmas tebhyaḥ pra brūma iha kilbiṣāṇi ||
sodaryāṇāṃ pañcadaśānāṃ śatānāṃ trayastriṃśad ud aśiṣyanta devāḥ | ekasmin viddhe sarve 'rupyaṃ tad brāhmaṇe kilbiṣam anv avindan ||
tasmai sa druhyād ya idaṃ nāyad yo nottiṣṭhād yo na vadātā asmin | brāhmaṇasya kilbiṣe nāthitasya sodaryatām icchato brāhmaṇeṣu ||
uttiṣṭhad brāhmaṇāḥ saṃ vadadhvaṃ jītaṃ yācāma punar aitu sarvam | indrāgnī viśve devās te me jītaṃ punar ā vartayantu ||
sa dīrgham āyuṣ kṛṇute sa prajāyai cikitsati | yo brāhmaṇasya brāhmaṇo hūto anveti kilbiṣe ||
nāsya prajāṃ śarvo hanti na rudro hanti nāśaniḥ | yo brāhmaṇasya brāhmaṇaḥ satye vadati kilbiṣe ||
taṃ somapītho juṣate nṛcakṣā grāvabhiḥ saha | yo brāhmaṇasyāstāṃ hṛdaḥ sūrya ivāpālupat tamaḥ ||
ya utthāya kilbiṣe brāhmaṇasyānnasīcchann avāyati | ubhe enaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī saṃ tapatām athaitv agatasya panthām ||
nava ca yā navatiś cārūḍhā vakṣaṇā anu | itas tāḥ sarvā naśyantu nuttāḥ putthajño mayā ||
sapta ca yāḥ saptatiś cārūḍhā vakṣaṇā anu | itas tāḥ sarvā naśyantu nuttāḥ putthajño mayā ||
pañca ca yāḥ pañcāśac cārūḍhā vakṣaṇā anu | itas tāḥ sarvā naśyantu nuttāḥ putthajño mayā ||
ūrubhyāṃ te 'ṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ pārṣṇibhyāṃ bhaṃsasaḥ | striyā jāra iva putthajñīṃ pra mṛṇīmasi ||
anusṛptāṃ gahaneṣu dhrūkṣṇāṃ pāpīṃ śimidvatīm | tām etāṃ dasyūnāṃ dāsīṃ pra dahātaś cukākaṇi ||
yā strīṇāṃ putrasadanaṃ kevaṭān upasarpati | tām etāṃ dasyūnāṃ dāsīṃ pra dahātaś cukākaṇi ||
pra patātaḥ sukaṭanāḍi suṣeḥ kuṣītako yathā | srakve te tipraṃ dhakṣyāmi sā naśiṣyasi putthagi ||
yadāsyāḥ srakve dahed yadā mūrdhānam agninā | athaiṣā dasyūnāṃ dāsī putthagi ni layiṣyate ||
saṃvatsaram acaro asurebhyaḥ prataṅkinī | yatra kṣetrasya durgandhi tat ta etan nyañcanam ||
naitat tava mātaraṃ sthā na ta etan nyañcanam | asmākam etad vīrebhyo devaiḥ prajananaṃ kṛtam ||
girau te 'śma putram udakaṃ himavatsu | tatropapraskadya nṛty ajāmi yūtheṣu putthagi ||
sa tvaṃ gobhir aśvaiḥ prajayā prataraṃ bhava | yo mā tatra prāhaiṣīr yatra jīvanti bhadrayā ||
mitraḥ pṛthivyod akrāmat tāṃ puraṃ pra ṇayāmi vaḥ | tām ā viśata tāṃ pra viśata sāvaḥ śarma ca varma ca yacchatu ||
vāyur antarikṣeṇod (…) ||see 1abcd
sūryo divod (…) ||see 1abcd
candramā nakṣatrair ud (…) ||see 1abcd
soma oṣadhībhir ud (…) ||see 1abcd
yajño dakṣiṇābhir ud (…) ||see 1abcd
samudro nadībhir ud (…) ||see 1abcd
brahma brahmacāribhir ud ((…) ||see 1abcd
indro vīryeṇod akrāmat tāṃ (…) ||see 1bcd
devāamṛtenodakrāman tāṃ (…) ||see 1bcd
prajāpatiḥ prajābhir ud akrāmat tāṃ puraṃ pra ṇayāmi vaḥ | tām ā viśata tāṃ pra viśata sā vaḥ śarma ca varma ca yacchatu ||
saṃyujyantaḥ prakṛṣanto yad vo devā upocire | tām ebhyaḥ satyām āśiṣam indra khalvāṃ sam ardhaya ||
anaḍvāhaḥ satyāvānaḥ sīraṃ kṛṇotu me vacaḥ | yatrāhaitad dhitāya te tat parjanyo 'bhi vo vṛṣat ||
divyā āpo vaḥ śakvarīr anu vi yantu gahvare | ūrjasvatīr ghṛtavatīḥ payasvatīr dṛśe bhavata mā guhā ||
ud ehi vājinīvatī pūrṇapātrā tviṣīmatī | duhānā pūṣarakṣitā kāmam eṣāṃ sam ā pṛṇa ||
iyaṃ sītā phalavatī śatavalśā vi rohatu | iyaṃ sahasrabhogā asyā indra upāvatu ||
aśvinā phālaṃ kalpayatām upāvatu bṛhaspatiḥ | yathāsad bahudhānyam ayakṣmaṃbahupūruṣam||
yad vo devā upocira iha bhūyaḥ syād iti | iha tām utpṛṇāṃ vayaṃ devīm upa hvayāmahe ||
idaṃ ma ut pṛṇād iti sphātiṃ ma ut pṛṇād iti | rāśiṃ me vardhayād iti ||
sphātikāro bahukāraḥ sphirasphoṣṭhāyam akṣitaḥ | khalo jyeṣṭho vibhuḥ prabhuḥ ||
tasmindhānyaṃny upyate yavo vrīhir atho tilaḥ | tasya gṛhṇīta yat kṛtaṃ parikṣāya catuḥśatam ||
śarkārivanmayāravacBhatt. mayārava cakrīvat kiṃ ca yad vṛṣe | tad vai sphātir upāyatī sarvam evāti ricyate ||Bhatt. rucyate
mahāñjane parā jahi sahasrāpoṣam ardaya | bahvī na oṣadhe bhava samudrasyeva saṃsravaḥ ||
ājyād ajaḥ sam abhavad deśebhya odanā ime | tān apaśyad bṛhaspatiḥ sa vai pañcaudano 'bhavat ||
caturdhaitāṃ sam abhara odanāṃs tvaṃ bṛhaspate | aja ājyāj jātaḥ sa eṣāṃ pañcamo 'bhavat ||
dhūmena divam āpnoty antarikṣam utoṣmaṇā | diśa āpnoti cakṣuṣā ajaḥ pañcaudanaḥ savaḥ ||
yā te mātā yas te pitā bhrātaro ye ca te svāḥ | ajaṃ pañcaudanaṃ paktvā sarve tam upa jīvata ||
ye te pūrve parāgatā apare pitaraś ca ye | tebhyo ghṛtasya kulyaitu śatadhārā vyundatī ||
ye sarvadā dadati ye vā pacanty odanam | te vai yamasya rājyād uttare loka āsate ||
nātirātra āpnoti nainam āpnoty ukthyaḥ | nāgniṣṭoma āpnoty ajaṃ pañcaudanaṃ savam ||
daśarātreṇa saṃmito dvādaśāhena kalpate | dīrghasattreṇa saṃmito 'jaḥ pañcaudanaḥ savaḥ ||
teṣāṃ barhiṣyaṃ sarvaṃ yan naṣṭaṃ yac ca mriyate | yac ca steno 'pājati yeṣāṃ pañcaudanaḥ savaḥ ||
yā pūrvapatiṃ vittvā- -athānyaṃ vindate 'param | pañcaudanaṃ ca tāv ajaṃ pacato na viyoṣataḥ||
samānaloko bhavati punarbhuvāparaḥ patiḥ | ajaṃ pañcaudanaṃ dakṣiṇājyotiṣaṃ dadat ||
sūryo mā varcasokṣatu- -ukṣatām aśvinobhā | āditya ūrdhva uccaran sa u mā varcasokṣatu ||
varcasā māṃ pitur agnir varcasā mā bṛhaspatiḥ | surāyāḥ sicyamānāyāḥ kīlālavarcasena mā | tena mām aśvinobhā ukṣatāṃ puṣkarasrajā ||
varcasvan me mukham astu rocamānaṃ viṣāsahi | tan mā hiraṇyavarcasaṃ kṛṇomi paśyatāṃ priyam ||
madhor ahaṃ madhutaro madhughān madhumattaraḥ | mām anu pra viśatu varca ṛṣabhovāśitāmiva ||
idam āñjanam ānaje varcasyam ā kanikradam | yathā kanikradac carāṇi varcasā ca bhagena ca ||
varcasāgnim ā dadhati varcasod eti sūryaḥ | yāvad varco gohiraṇyasya tāvan me varco bhūyāt ||
yāvat tvaṃ deva sūrya udyann abhi vipaśyasi | tāvan mā varcasābhi vi paśya ||
pūrṇo bhagasyāhaṃ bhūtvā- -arukṣaṃ varcaso ratham | sa mā vahatu sarvadā- -āyuṣmantaṃ suvarcasam ||
bhagenāhaṃ parihito varcasā draviṇena ca | yathā carāṇi sarvadā rocamānaṃ vibhāvasu ||
evā mā bhaga āgamad evā mā varca āgamat | evā mā teja āgamad evā mā yaśa āgamat ||
hiraṇyayena cakreṇa bhagasyāpihito gṛhaḥ | taṃ vy ubjāmi brahmaṇā tasya me dattam aśvinā dattaṃ me puṣkarasrajā ||
ūrdhvā asya samidho bhavanty ūrdhvā śukrā śocīṃṣy agneḥ | dyumattamā supratīkasya sūnos tanūnapād asuro viśvavedāḥ ||
devo deveṣu devaḥ patho anakti madhvā ghṛtena | madhvā yajñaṃ nakṣati prīṇāno narāśaṃsaḥsukṛddevaḥ savitā viśvavāraḥ ||
acchāyam eti śavasā ghṛtena- -īḍe vahniṃ namasāgnim | sruco adhvareṣuprayatsu||
sa yakṣad asya mahimānam agneḥ sa in mandrāsu prayatsu | vasoś cetiṣṭho vasudhātamaś ca ||
dvāro devīr annasya viśve vratā dadante agneḥ | uruvyacaso dhāmnā patyamānāḥ ||
te asya vṛṣaṇo divyā nu yonā | uṣāsānaktemaṃ yajñam avatām adhvaraṃ naḥ ||
daivā hotāra imam adhvaraṃ no agner jihvem abhi gṛṇīta | kṛṇutā naḥ sviṣṭim ||
tisro devīr barhir edaṃsadantv iḍā sarasvatī mahī | bhāratī gṛṇānā ||
tan nasturīpamadbhutaṃ purukṣu | tvaṣṭā suvīryaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ vi syarta nābhim asme ||
vanaspate ava sṛjā rarāṇas tmanā devebhyaḥ | agnir havyaṃ śamitā sūdayāti ||
agne svāhā kṛṇu jātaveda indrāya bhāgam | viśve devā havir idaṃ juṣantām ||
yajūṃṣi yajñe samidhaḥ svāhā- -agniḥ pravidvān iha vo yunaktu | yunaktu devaḥ savitā prajānann asmin yajñe suyujaḥ svāhā ||
indra ukthāmadāni yajñe asmin pravidvān yunaktu suyujaḥ svāhā | chandāṃsi yajñaṃ marutaḥ svāhā māteva putraṃ pipṛteha yuktāḥ ||
praiṣānividaāpriyo yajūṃṣi śiṣṭāḥ patnībhir vahateha yuktāḥ | eyam agan barhiṣā prokṣaṇībhir yajñaṃ tanvānā aditiḥ svāhā ||
viṣṇur yunaktu bahudhā tapāṃsy asmin yajñe suyujaḥ svāhā ||
tvaṣṭā yunaktu bahudhā nu rūpāṇy asmin yajñe (…) ||see 4b
indro yunaktu bahudhā vīryāny asmin (…) ||see 4b
somo yunaktu bahudhā payāṃsy asmin (…) ||see 4b
bhago yunaktv āśiṣonvasmāthus ŚS; Bhatt. ny asmāṃ asmin yajñe suyujaḥ svāhā ||
aśvinā brahmaṇetam arvāg vaṣaṭkāreṇa yajñaṃ vardhayantau svāhā ||
bṛhaspate brahmaṇehy arvāṅ yajño 'yaṃ svaridaṃyajamānāya dhehi svāhā ||Bhatt. itaṃ
āpaḥ punantu varuṇaḥ punātv ayaṃ ca yaḥ pavate viśvadānīm | yajño bhago adhivaktā vidhartā- -agniś ca naḥ pāvayetāṃ sūryaś ca ||
daśaśīrṣo daśajihva ā rabhe vīrako bhiṣak | mā te riṣaṃ khanitā yasmai ca tvā khanāmasi ||
daśarātre kilāsasya vīrudhā veda bheṣajam | itas tad abhriyākhanaṃ kilāsaṃ nāśayāmi te ||
apsv anyā vi rohati dhanvanyanyādhi tiṣṭhati | kilāsam anyānīnaśad varcasānyā sam ukṣatu ||
ājyena ghṛtena juhomi kilāsabheṣajam | vīrudhām agneḥ saṅkāśe kilāsaṃ nānu vidyate ||
piśaṅgarūpo bhavati kalmāṣam uta saṃdṛśi | kilāsa naśyetaḥ paraḥ pra tvā dhakṣyāmi vīrudhā ||
yāni pṛthag utpatanti nakṣatrāṇīva saṃdṛśi | kilāsaṃ sarvaṃ nāśayann ogha ivābhy emi vīrudhā ||
yadi vā puruṣeṣitāt kilāsa paryājagan | namo namasyāmo devān pratyak kartāram ṛcchatu ||
śīrṣṇas te skandhebhyo lalāṭāt pari karṇayoḥ | oṣadhyā varṣajūtayā kilāsaṃ nāśayāmi te | svas tvā varṇa āyaty anarātiḥ sahauṣadhiḥ ||
grīvābhyas ta uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyo anūkyāt | (…) ||see 9cdef
aṃsābhyāṃ te dorbhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ pari hastayoḥ | (…) ||see 9cdef
pṛṣṭibhyas te pārśvābhyāṃ śroṇibhyāṃ pari bhaṃsasaḥ | (…) ||see 9cdef
ūrubhyāṃte 'ṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ pārṣṇibhyāṃ prapadābhyām | oṣadhyā varṣajūtayā kilāsaṃ nāśayāmi te | svas tvā varṇa āyaty anarātiḥ sahauṣadhiḥ ||
sahaiva vo hṛdayāni saha vijñānam astu vaḥ | sahendro vṛtrahā karat saha devo bṛhaspatiḥ ||
samānam astu vo hṛdayaṃ samānam uto vo manaḥ | samāno agnir vo devaḥ saha rāṣṭram upādhvam ||
saṃ jānīdhvaṃ sahṛdayāḥ sarve saṃmanasa stha | naṣṭo vo manyur jīrṇerṣyā saha jīvātha bhadrayā ||
yathā putraḥ pravāvadaḥ pitṛbhyāṃ vadati priyam | evā yūyam anyo 'nyasmai jihvayāvadatapriyam ||
sahaiva vo dhānyāni samānāḥ paśavaś ca vaḥ | saha pṛthivyāṃ vīrudhaḥ saha vaḥ santv oṣadhīḥ ||
saha dīkṣā saha yajño vivāho vaḥ sahāsati | saha prapharvā nṛtyantu saha va striya āsatām ||
sahaiva vo vīryāṇi sahānyān randhayādhvai | saha patatriṇīm iṣum anyasmai hetim asyata ||
saṃ vasyāmi samitiṃ madhunā vācamāñjiṣam| yuṣmākam anye śṛṇvantu- -uditaṃ saṅgate jane ||
yuṣmān mitrā vṛṇatāṃ yuṣmān pratijanā uta | yuṣmāt jñātitvaṃ prepsantyBhatt. yuṣmāt jñā- (sic), Kim 2014, 226yuṣme amṛtaṃ martyā iva ||
saṃsam id yaḥ sam ākaraṃ saha yūthā gavām iva | samānam astu vo mano jyeṣṭhaṃ vijñānam anv ita ||
idaṃ yad eṣāṃ hṛdayaṃ tad eṣāṃ hṛdaye bhavat | atho yad eṣāṃ hṛdayaṃ tad veṣāṃ hṛdi śritam | samānam astu vo manaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ vijñānam anv ita ||
idaṃ yad eṣāṃ mana eṣāṃ yāni manāṃsi ca | sadhryag indra tat kṛṇu rathe pādāv ivāhitau ||
sahasrabāhuḥ puruṣaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt | sa bhūmiṃ viśvato vṛtvā- -aty atiṣṭhad daśāṅgulam ||
tribhiḥ padbhir dyām arohat pād asyehābhavat punaḥ | tathā vy akrāmadviṣvaṅṅBhatt. viṣvaṅ aśanānaśane anu ||
tāvanto asya mahimānas tato jyāyāṃś ca puruṣaḥ | pād asya viśvā bhūtāni tripād asyāmṛtaṃ divi ||
puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhāvyam | utāmṛtatvasyeśvaro yad annenābhavat saha ||
yat puruṣaṃ vyadadhuḥ katidhā vy akalpayan | mukhaṃ kim asya kiṃ bāhū kim ūrū pādā ucyete ||
brāhmaṇo 'sya mukham āsīd bāhū rājanyo 'bhavat | madhyaṃ tad asya yad vaiśyaḥ padbhyāṃ śūdro ajāyata ||
virāḍ agre sam abhavad virājo adhipūruṣaḥ| sa jāto aty aricyata paścād bhūmim atho puraḥ ||
yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā devā yajñam atanvata | vasanto asyāsīd ājyaṃ grīṣmaidhmaḥśarad dhaviḥ ||
taṃ yajñaṃ prāvṛṣā praukṣan puruṣaṃ jātam agraśaḥ | tena devā ayajanta sādhyā vasavaś ca ye ||
tasmād aśvā ajāyanta ye ca ke cobhayādataḥ | gāvo ha jajñire tasmāt tasmāj jātā ajāvayaḥ ||
tasmād yajñāt sarvahuta ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire | chando ha jajñire tasmād yajus tasmād ajāyata ||
tasmād yajñāt sarvahutaḥ saṃbhṛtaṃ pṛṣadājyam | paśūn tāṃś cakre vāyavyān āraṇyān grāmyāś ca ye ||
saptāsyāsan paridhayas triḥ sapta samidhaḥ kṛtāḥ | devā yad yajñaṃ tanvānā abadhnan puruṣaṃ paśum ||
mūrdhno devasya bṛhato 'ṃśavaḥ sapta saptatīḥ | rājñaḥ somasyājāyanta jātasya puruṣād adhi ||
candramā manaso jātaś cakṣuḥ sūryo 'jāyata | śrotrād vāyuś ca prāṇaś ca mukhād agnir ajāyata ||
nābhyāāsīd antarikṣaṃBhatt. nābhyāṃ śīrṣṇo dyauḥ sam avartata | padbhyāṃ bhūmir diśaḥ śrotrāṅ tathā lokām̐ akalpayan ||
imāṃ khanāmy oṣadhim adṛṣṭahananīm aham | aśvasyāvo dadāti tvā vairūpo vājinīvati ||
nādṛṣṭā vo jihvāḥ santi na dantā hanvor adhi | nāpi madhyaṃ no śiras te yūyaṃ kiṃ kariṣyatha ||
indrāmitrā indrahatā na va ihāsti nyañcanam | indro vaḥ sarvāsāṃ sākaṃ śakras tṛṇeḍhu vṛtrahā ||
aśvatarām̐ ayaḥśaphān yān indro adhitiṣṭhati | tair vo 'pi nahyeya te mukhāny udarasarpiṇaḥ ||
apinahyam adṛṣṭānāṃ mukhaṃ pādā dṛter iva | utaiṣāṃ jihvā niṣkartā nirdantā hanvor adhi ||
avadhiṣam asṛgādāṃ ni kroḍādā alipsata | abhaitsaṃsarveṣām āṇḍāni ye adṛṣṭāḥ pṛthivīkṣitaḥ ||
riśyāsaḥ pauruṣāso darbhāsovairiṇāuta | mauñjā adṛṣṭāḥ sairyāḥ sarve sākaṃ ni jasyata ||
adṛṣṭānāṃ sapta jātā pṛthivī na śiśe mahī | tān indro bāhubhyāṃ sarvāñchakro apāvayat ||
ye vaḥ santi sapta jātā adṛṣṭāḥ puruṣādinaḥ | grāvṇāṃśūniva somasya tān sarvān pra mṛṇīmasi ||
ya ātmajā ye vastijā ya ruṣā ya u todinaḥ | tebhyaḥ khanāmy oṣadhiṃ yebhyo bimbīvadhaḥ kṛtaḥ ||
adṛṣṭebhyas taruṇebhyo yuvadbhya sthavirebhyaḥ | āhārṣam ugrām oṣadhiṃ yebhyo bimbīvadhaḥ kṛtaḥ ||
ye ca dṛṣṭā ye cādṛṣṭās titīlāḥśalunāśca ye | tān agne sarvān saṃ daha krimīn anejato jahi ||
śītijalā iti śītā vātā upā vāntu | himenāgnir āvṛto himenāgniḥ parīvṛtaḥ ||
ya(t) tvā devā apārundhann ā samudram adhāvayaḥ | himo jaghāna goajaṃ himo akṣaṃ himaś chadiḥ ||
himād adhi pra yāmasi hime adya vimocanam | yam avaṭaṃ śatadaram avaindha saptavadhraye ||
avakā tatra rohatu khade pari bilaṃ tava | arciṣ ṭe agne prathamam aṅgārām̐ aparām̐ uta ||
gṛbhṇāmi brahmaṇā nāma dhāmadhāma paruṣparuḥ | śītikā nāma te mātā jalāṣo nāma te pitā ||
iha tvam antarā bhava bāhikam astu yad rapaḥ | hime jātodake vṛddhā sindhutas pary ābhṛtā | tayā te agrabhaṃ nāma- -aśvam ivāśvābhidhānyā ||
āmā nāmāsy oṣadhe tasyās te nāma jagrabha | agastyasya putrāso mā vi dhāk puruṣān mama ||
mā no agne tanvaṃ mā vāsāṃsi rīriṣaḥ | yaṃ tvā samudraja vayam ārohāma svastaye ||
divas tārā avāpadran dhārāt samudriyā apaḥ | hiraṇyakumbho harito 'vakābhiḥ parivṛtas tenāgniṃ śamayāmasi ||
śamayāmy arcir agneḥ śivas tapatu mā vi dhāk | gṛbhīte dyāvāpṛthivī gṛbhītaṃ pārthivaṃ rajaḥ ||
ni muñjeṣu yad udakaṃ ni naḍeṣu yad antaram | yat samudre yat sindhau tenāgniṃ śamayāmasi ||
vetasasyāvakāyā naḍasya vīraṇasya ca | rohitakasya vṛkṣasya- -agniṃ śamanam ud bhare ||
āyatīr udahāryo vi te harantu yad rapaḥ | parāyatīḥ parāvataḥ parā harantu yad rapaḥ ||
himasya tvā jarāyuṇa- -agne pari vyayāmasi | śītike śītam it karo himike himam it karaḥ ||
akṣaṇvatā lāṅgalena padvatā patayiṣṇunā | lāṅgūlagṛhyacarkṛṣur vṛkeṇa yavam aśvinā ||
devā etaṃ madhunā saṃyutaṃ yavaṃ sarasvatyām adhi vaṇāvacarkṛṣuḥ| indra āsītsīrapatiḥśatakratuḥ kināśā āsan marutaḥ sudānavaḥ ||
hiraṇyayaṃ kalaśaṃ sudānavo divyayā saraghayā kṛtam | ava bhṛtam aśvinā yavaṃ tad yuvaṃ madhu cakrathuḥ ||
kṛśāv etad ajayatamBhatt. kriśāv aśvinā sāraghaṃ madhu | tato yavo vy arohat so 'bhavad viṣadūṣaṇaḥ ||
yuvārvānsaraghāyāḥ prakhidya madhv ābharat | (…) ||see 4cd
yad vṛkaṃ madhupāvānam avāmayatam aśvinā | (…) ||see 4cd
kairaṇḍā nāma saraso vṛkasya vamyā adhi | tato yavo vy arohat so 'bhavad viṣadūṣaṇaḥ ||
yad asya bharatho madhu saraghā sathv acchinat | sadyas tad arvato yuvaṃ punar ā dattam aśvinā ||
yo yavaṃ digdhaviddho ahidaṣṭa upāsarat | tīrthe radhram iva majjantam ut taṃ bharatam aśvinā ||
yaṃ vahanty aṣṭāyogāḥ ṣaḍyogā yaṃ caturgavāḥ | sa te viṣaṃ vi bādhatām ugro madhyamaśīr iva ||
yasya yava prasarpasy aṅgamaṅgaṃ paruṣparuḥ | tasmād yakṣaṃ vi bādhasva- -ugro madhyamaśīr iva ||
śakalaṃca na te yava- -anyā ruhanty oṣadhīḥ | yava id yāvayād gor aśvāt puruṣād viṣam ||
yavo rājā yavo bhiṣag yavasya mahimā mahān | yavasya manthaṃ papivān indraś cakāra vīryam ||
ā bharāmṛtaṃ ghṛtasya puṣpam ā bhara | anabhrikhāta oṣadha idaṃ dūṣaya yad viṣam ||
ya āyanti digdhaviddhāḥ śūdrā rājanyā uta | cakṣur me sarva ādṛśya te yanty agadāḥ punaḥ ||
jīvātave na martave śiras ta ā rabhāmahe | rasaṃ viṣasya nāvidam udnaḥ phenam adann iva ||
bhūmyā madhyād divo madhyād bhūmyā antād atho divaḥ | madhye pṛthivyā yad viṣaṃ tad vācā dūṣayāmasi ||
aśvatthe nihitaṃ viṣaṃ kapāle nihitaṃ viṣam | śilāyā jajñe taimātaḥ prathamo viṣadūṣaṇī ||
viṣasyāhaṃ vaindakasya viṣasya dārvyasya ca | atho viṣasya svaitnasya samānīṃ vācam agrabham ||
tad id vadanty arthina uta śūdrā utāryāḥ | viṣāṇāṃ viṣvagarthānāṃ sarvathaivārasaṃ viṣam ||
paruṣas tvāmṛtakarṇo viṣa prathamamāvayat| yathā ha taṃ nāropayas tathāsy arasaṃ viṣam ||
yad vo devā upajīkā uddehaṃ śuṣiraṃ daduḥ | tatrāmṛtasyāsiktaṃ tac cakārārasaṃ viṣam ||
śakuntikā me abravīd viṣapuṣpaṃ dhayantikā | na ropayati na mādayaty arasaṃ śārvīyaṃ viṣam ||
aty apaptāma durgāṇi śārīḥ śakunayo yathā | ihendrāṇīṃ varuṇānīṃ sinīvālīṃ krakoḍhyām | grāhāṃ śūraputrāṃ devīṃ yācāmo viṣadūṣaṇam ||
ālakaṃ vyālakaṃ vy āvaṃ jālma jīgīmahe | jaradviṣaṃ yuvābhiṣag vayam it sāsahāmahai ||
asthād dyaur asthāt pṛthivy asthād viśvam idaṃ jagat | asthur viṣasyāropayo 'naḍvāhaḥ kriśā iva ||
yāvat sūryo vitapati yāvac cābhivipaśyati | tenāham indradattena kṛṇomy arasaṃ viṣam | tad viṣam arasaṃ viṣam adhobhāgarasaṃviṣam ||
mātariśvā sam abharad dhātā sam adadhāt paruḥ | indrāgnī abhy arakṣatāṃ tvaṣṭā nābhim akalpayat ||
bhavas tvā abhy arukṣad rudras te aṃsum ābharat | rātrī tvābhy agopāyat sā tvaṃ bhūte ajāyathāḥ ||
dyauṣ ṭa āyur gopāyad antarikṣam asuṃ tava | mātā bhūtasya bhavyasya pṛthivī tvābhi rakṣatu ||
yāṃ tvā devāḥ samadadhuḥ sahasrapuruṣaṃ satīm | sā devī tvam asyedam apāja vy ajā viṣam ||
yāḥ purastāt prasyandante divā naktaṃ ca yoṣitaḥ | āpaḥ puru sravantīs tā u te viṣadūṣaṇīḥ ||
ātapas te varṣam āsīd agniś chāyābhavat tapaḥ | ulbaṃ te abhram āsīt sā tvaṃ bhūte ajāyathāḥ ||
gandharvas te mūlam āsīc chākhā apsarasas tava | marīcīr āsan parṇāni sinīvālī kulaṃ tava ||
ajarā devā adadhur amṛtaṃ martyeṣv ā | tasyai tad agram ā dade tad u te viṣadūṣaṇam ||
anabhrau khanamānaṃ vipraṃ gambhīre apasam | bhiṣak cakṣur bhiṣak khane tad u te viṣadūṣaṇam ||
yāḥ purastād vitiṣṭhante gāvaḥ pravrājinīr iva | amṛtasyeva vā asy atho hāsy arundhatī ||
yo mayaḥ saraghāyāḥ prakhāya madhv ābharat | tato yavaḥ prājāyata so 'bhavad viṣadūṣaṇaḥ ||
yavasyaitat palālino godhūmasya tilasya ca | vrīher yavasya daivyena kṛṇomy arasaṃ viṣam ||
mahīṃ yoniṃ samudrasya- -anv avindann ṛtāyavaḥ |Bhatt. and Kim 2014, 302 avindan tāṃ devā guhyām āsīnāṃ samudrāc cid ud ābharan ||
samudrāc cid udābhṛtya tām u puṣkara ā dadhuḥ | asyāḥ pṛthivyā devyāś cakṣur ākāśyam asi viṣadūṣaṇam ||
samānam arthaṃ paryanti devā rūpaṃrūpaṃ tapasā vardhamānāḥ | yad ādityam abhisaṃviśanti tad ekaṃ rūpam amṛtatvam eṣām ||
devo devebhir ā gaman mahān no atithiṣ pitā | sa praiti jātavedasam ekarūpo guhā bhavan ||
ātithyam agniṃ nir apaptad eva ubhayebhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ | mahān nu marya upa bhakṣam āgansee Kim 2014, 305; Bhatt. martya, nāgan saṃgṛbhyādityā(n) ny aviṣṭa vahniḥ ||
ta ā viśanti puruṣaṃ śayānaṃ prāṇā niviṣṭā naśasantyenam | te no rātryā sumanasyamānā ahnā rakṣantyahṛṇīyamānāḥ||
paśubhyo naḥ paśupate mṛḍa sarva saṃ vṛha āyatām | mā naḥ prāṇeṣu rīriṣaḥ ||
vāyuḥ satye adhiśritaḥ prāṇāpānāv abhirakṣan | saṃ prajāairayadimāḥ ||
devā yattāḥ prajāpatāv ādityāś ca yemire | pūṣā raśmiṣv āyata ādityo viṣṇur ākrame sa rohaṃ divi rohati ||
prajāddevāḥ savituḥ save tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu | añjantau madhunā payo atandraṃ yātam aśvinā ||
viśve devāḥ pra yātana- -ādityāsaḥ sajoṣasaḥ | puraḥ paścāt svastaye ||
brahma varma bṛhaspatiḥ saṃgavo no 'bhi rakṣatu | devo devaiḥ purohitaḥ ||
maruto vṛṣṭyā na ā gata satyadharmāṇa ūtaye | aparāhneṣu jinvata ||
indro rājā divas patir ahar vimāya tiṣṭhati | sa na imāḥ kalpayād diśaḥ ||
āvatas te parāvataḥ parāvatas ta āvataḥ | ihaivabhava mā nu gā mā pūrvān anu gā gatān asuṃ badhnāmi te dṛḍham ||
yat tvābhiceruḥ puruṣaḥ so yad aruṇo janaḥ | unmocana pramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te ||
yaddudrohithaśepiṣe striyai puṃseacittyā|Bhatt. acittyā (…) ||see 2cd
yad enaso mātṛkṛtāc cheṣe pitṛkṛtād uta | unmocana pramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te ||
yat te mātā yat te pitā jāmir bhrātā ca sarjataḥ | pratyak sevasya bheṣajaṃ jaradaṣṭiṃ kṛṇomi tvā ||
ehy ehi punar ehi sarveṇa manasā saha | dūtau yamasya mānu gā adhi jīvapurā ihi ||
anuhūtaḥ punar ehi vidvān udayanaṃ pathaḥ | ārohaṇam ākramaṇaṃ jīvatojīvato 'yanam ||
mā bibher na mariṣyasi jaradaṣṭir bhaviṣyasi | nir avocam ahaṃ yakṣmam aṅgebhyo aṅgajvaraṃ tava ||
śīrṣarogo aṅgarogo yaś ca te hṛdayāmayaḥ | yakṣmaḥ śyena iva prāpaptad vācā nuttaḥ parastaram ||
ṛṣī bodhapratībodhāv asvapno yaś ca jāgṛviḥ | te te prāṇasya goptāro divā naktaṃ ca jāgratu ||
ayam agnir upasadya iha sūrya ud etu te | ud ehi mṛtyor gambhīrāt kṛcchrāc cit tamasas pari ||
namo yamāya namo 'stu mṛtyave namaḥ pitṛbhya uta ye nayante | utpāraṇasya yo veda tam agniṃ tat puro dadhe ||
aitu prāṇa aitu mana aitu cakṣur atho balam | śarīram asya saṃ vidāṃ tat padbhyāṃ prati tiṣṭhatu ||
prāṇenāgne cakṣuṣā saṃ sṛjemaṃ sam īraya tanvā saṃ balena | vetthāmṛtasya mā mṛta mo ṣu bhūmigṛho bhuvat ||
mā te prāṇa upadasan māpāno api dhāyi te | sūryas tvādhipatir mṛtyor udāyacchāti raśmibhiḥ ||
iyam antar vadaty ugrā jihvā paniṣpadā | tayā rogān vi nayāmaḥ śataṃ ropīś ca takmanaḥ ||
ayaṃ lokaḥ priyatamo devānām aparājitaḥ | yasmai tvam iha jajñiṣe diṣṭaḥ puruṣa mṛtyave | tasmai tvānu hvayāmasi mā purā jaraso mṛthāḥ ||
te 'vadan prathamā brahmakilbiṣe 'kūpāraḥ salilo mātariśvā | vīḍuharastapa ugraṃ mayobhuva āpo devīḥ prathamajā ṛtasya ||
somo rājā prathamo brahmajāyāṃ punaḥprāyacchadahṛṇīyamānaḥ | anvartitā varuṇo mitra āsīd agnir hotā hastagṛhyā nināya ||
hasteneva grāhya ādhir asyā brahmajāyeti ced avocat | na dūtāya prahye tastha eṣā tathā rāṣṭraṃ gupitaṃ kṣatriyasya ||
yām āhus tārakāṃ vikeśīṃ ducchunāṃgrāmam avapadyamānām | sā brahmajāyā pra dunoti rāṣṭraṃ yatraprāpādiśaśaḥ kalkuṣīmān ||
brahmacārī carati veviṣad viṣaḥ sa devānāṃ bhavaty ekam aṅgam | tena jāyām anv avindad bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītāṃ juhvaṃ na devāḥ ||
devā etasyām avadanta pūrve saptarṣayas tapase ye niṣeduḥ | bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasyāpanītā durdhāṃdadhāti parame vyoman ||
ye garbhā avapadyante jagad yac cāpalupyate | vīrā ye hanyante mitho brahmajāyā hinasti tān ||
sarve garbhāḥ pra vyathante kumārā daśamāsyāḥ | yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahmajāyāacittyā||Bhatt. acittyā
punar vai devā adaduḥ punar manuṣyā uta | rājānaḥ satyaṃ kṛṇvanto brahmajāyāṃ punar daduḥ ||
punardāya brahmajāyāṃBhatt. yo punardāya; see Kim 2014, 334 kṛtvī devair nikilbiṣam | ūrjaṃ pṛthivyā bhaktvā- -urugāyam upāsate ||
na tatra dhenur duhe nānaḍvān sahate dhuram | vijānir yatra brāhmaṇo rātriṃ vasati pāpayā ||
na varṣaṃ maitrāvaruṇaṃ brahmajyam abhi varṣati | nāsmai samitiḥ kalpate na mitraṃ nayate vaśam ||
asṛṅmatī carati brahmajāyā āśā limpantī pradiśaś catasraḥ | yaḥ kṣatriyaḥ punar enāṃ dadāti sa divo dhārāṃ dhayati prapīnām ||
yo 'punardāya brahmajāyāṃ rājā talpe nipadyate | duryoṇā asmā oṣadhīr yāḥ kāś cābhi vipaśyati ||
viṣam aśnāty apāṃ viṣam aśnāti vīrudhām | yo brahmajāyāṃ na punar dadāti tasmai devāḥ sudihaṃ digdham asyām ||read asyān
udyat patayo daśa striyāḥ pūrve abrāhmaṇāḥ | brahmā ced dhastam agrahīt sa eva patir ekadhā ||
brāhmaṇa eva patir na rājā nota vaiśyaḥ | tat sūryaḥprabruvanneti pañcabhyo mānavebhyaḥ ||
naitāṃ te devā adadus tubhyaṃ nṛpate attave | mā brāhmaṇasya rājanya gāṃ jighatso anādyām ||
akṣadrugdhorājanyaḥ pāpa ātmaparājitaḥ | sa brāhmaṇasya gām adyād adya jīvāni mā śvaḥ ||
nir vai kṣatraṃ nayati hanti varco 'gnir ivārabdhaḥ pra dunoti rāṣṭram | yo brāhmaṇaṃ devabandhuṃ hinasti na sa pitṝṇām apy eti lokam ||
devapīyuś carati martyeṣu garagīrṇo bhavaty asthibhūyān | yo brāhmaṇaṃ manyate annam eva sa viṣasya pibati taimātasya ||
viṣaṃ sa pibati taimātaṃ paśyann agniṃ pra sīdati | yo brāhmaṇasya sad dhanam abhi nārada manyate ||
śatāpāṣṭhāṃ ni girati tāṃ na śaknoti niṣkhidam | annaṃ yobrahmaṇāṃmalvaḥemend. Kim 2014, 346; Bhatt. manyaḥ svādvadmīti manyate ||
ya enāṃ hanti mṛdu manyamāno devapīyur dhanakāmo na cittāt | saṃtasyendro hṛdaye agnim indha ubhe enaṃ dyuṣṭo nabhasī carantam ||
na brāhmaṇo hiṃsitavā agneḥ priyatamā tanūḥ | somo hy asya dāyāda indroasyābhiśastipāḥ||
agnir vai naḥ padavāyaḥ somo dāyāda ucyate | jetāabhiśastendras tat satyaṃ devasaṃhitam ||
āviṣṭitāghaviṣā pṛdākūriva carmaṇā | sā brāhmaṇasya rājanya tṛṣṭaiṣā gaur anādyā ||
iṣur iva digdhā nṛpate pṛdākūr iva gopate | sā brāhmaṇasyeṣur digdhā tayā vidhyati pīyakaḥ ||
tīkṣṇeṣavo brāhmaṇā hetimanto yām asyanti śaravyāṃ na sā mṛṣā | anuhāya tapasā manyunā cota dūrād ava bhindanti te tayā ||
jihvājyābhavatikulmalaṃvāṅ nāḍīkā dantās tapasā sudigdhāḥ | tebhir brahmā vidhyati devapīyūn hṛdbalairdhanurbhirdevajūtaiḥ ||
ye brāhmaṇaṃ hiṃsitāras tapasvinaṃ manīṣiṇaṃ brahmacaryeṇa śrāntam | avartimad bhavitā rāṣṭram eṣāṃ tamasīva nihitaṃ nānu vettāḥ ||
ye sahasram arājann āsan daśaśatā uta | te brāhmaṇasya gāṃ jagdhvā vaitahavyāḥ parābhavan ||
gaur eva tān hanyamānā vaitahavyām̐avātirat | ye keśara prābandhāyāś caramājām apeciran ||
atimātrā ajāyanta nod iva divam aspṛśan | bhṛguṃ hiṃsitvā māhīnā asaṃbhavyaṃ parābhavan ||
ye bṛhatsāmānam āṅgirasam ārpayan brāhmaṇaṃ janāḥ | yetvas teṣām ubhayādann avis tokāny āvayat ||
ye brāhmaṇaṃ pratyaṣṭhīvan ye cāsmic chuklam īṣire | asnas te madhye kulyāyāḥ keśān khādanta āsate ||
aṣṭāpadī caturakṣī catuḥśrotrā caturhanuḥ | dvijihvā dviprāṇā bhūtvā sā rāṣṭram ava dhūnute ||
brahmagavī pacyamānā yāvat sābhi vijaṅgahe | tejo rāṣṭrasya nir hanti na vīro jāyate pumān ||
ākramaṇena vai devā dviṣanto ghnantipūruṣam| steyādaṃ brahmajyaṃ kṣetre cānṛtavādinam ||
viṣam etad devakṛtaṃ rājā varuṇo abravīt | na brāhmaṇasya gāṃ jagdhvā rāṣṭre jāgāra kaś cana ||
tad vai rāṣṭram ā sravati bhinnāṃ nāvam ivodakam | brāhmaṇo yatra jīyate tad rāṣṭraṃ hanti ducchunā ||
ekaśataṃ vai janatā bhūmir yā vyadhūnuta | prajāṃ hiṃsitvā brāhmaṇīm asaṃbhavyaṃ parābhavan ||
yāmudājannṛṣayo manīṣiṇaḥBhatt. and Kim 2014, 363 udājan śramasātāṃ bṛhatīṃ devajūtām | sā brahmajyaṃ pacati pacyamānā rāṣṭram asya bṛhatī yac ca varcaḥ ||
vācā brāhmaṇam ṛcchati jāmi hantyacittyā|Bhatt. acittyā mitrāya satye druhyati yaṃ devā ghnanti pūruṣam ||
ekapācchanda ekakāmaṃ ca | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe prathamayā rātryā prathamayā samidhā ||
dvipācchando dvipadaś ca paśūn | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe dvitīyayā rātryā dvitīyayā samidhā ||
trīṃl lokāṃs trīṃl lokapatīn |Bhatt. trīl lokāns trīṃ tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe tṛtiyayā rātryā tṛtīyayā samidhā ||
catuṣpācchandaś catuṣpadaś ca paśūn | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe caturthyā rātryā caturthyā samidhā ||
pañca diśaḥ pañca pradiśaḥ | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe pañcamyā rātryā pañcamyā samidhā ||
traiṣṭubhaṃ chando virājaṃ svarājaṃ samrājam | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe saṣṭhyā rātryā ṣaṣṭhyā samidhā ||
sapta prāṇān saptāpānān sapta ṛṣīṃś ca | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe saptamyā rātryā saptamyā samidhā ||
ojaś ca tejaś ca sahaś ca balaṃ ca | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe aṣṭamyā rātryā aṣṭamyā samidhā ||
ambhaś ca mahaś cānnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe navamyā rātryā navamyā samidhā ||
brahma ca kṣatraṃ cendriyaṃ ca brāhmaṇavarcasaṃ ca | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe daśamyā rātryā daśamyā samidhā ||
viśvāvasū ca sarvavasū ca | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhenote sandhi -e e- ekādaśyā rātryā ekādaśyā samidhā ||
pāṅktaṃ chandaḥ prajāpatiṃ saṃvatsaram | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe dvādaśyā rātryā dvādaśyā samidhā ||

yo vā ekaśarāvaṃ nirvaped ekarṣim evānu nir vapet | eṣa vā ekarṣir yad agniḥ | ekarṣiṃ caiva lokaṃ cāvarundhenote sandhi -e e- ekarṣir iva tapaty ekarṣir iva dīdāyaikarṣir ivānnādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda | sa ya evaṃ vidvān prāśnīyād etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyed ekarṣes tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmy ekarṣes tvā hastābhyām ā rabha ekarṣes tvāsyena prāśnāmy ekarṣes tvā jaṭhare sādayāmīti | sa yathā hutam iṣṭaṃ prāśnīyād evainaṃ prāśnāti ||

yo vai dviśarāvaṃ nirvapet prāṇāpānāv evānu nir vapet | etau vai prāṇāpānau yan mātariśvā cāgniś ca | prāṇāpānau caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe jyog jīvati sarvam āyur eti na purā jarasaḥ pramīyate yaḥ (…) |see 1d sa ya evaṃ vidvān) praśnīyād etām eva devate manasā dhyāyet prāṇāpānayos tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi prāṇāpānayos tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe prāṇāpānayos tvāsyena prāśnāmi prāṇāpānayos tvā jaṭhare (…) |see 1i (…) ||see 1j

yo vai triśarāvaṃ nirvapet trīṇy eva trikadrukāṇy anu nir vapet | etāni vai trīṇi trikadrukāṇi yad ṛcaḥ sāmāni yajūṃṣi brāhmaṇam | brahma caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe brāhmaṇavarcasī bhavati yaḥ (…)see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyedsee 1e brahmaṇas tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi brahmaṇas tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe brahmaṇas tvāsyena prāśnāmi brahmaṇas tvā (…) |see 1i (…) ||see 1j

yo vai catuḥśarāvaṃ nirvapec catasra evorvīr anu nir vapet | etā vai catasra urvīr yad diśaḥ | diśaś caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe kalpante asmai diśo diśāṃ priyo bhavati yaḥ (…) |see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyedsee 1e diśāṃ tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi diśāṃ tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe diśāṃ tvāsyena prāśnāmi diśāṃ tvā (…) |see 1i (…) ||see 1j

yo vai pañcaśarāvaṃ nirvaped vaiśvānaram eva pañcamūrdhānam anu nir vapet | eṣa vai vaiśvānaraḥ pañcamūrdhā yad dyauś ca pṛthivī ca mātariśvā cāgniścājasrācātapan|see Kim 2014, 377, 379 vaiśvānaraṃ caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe vaiśvānara iva tapati vaiśvānara iva dīdāya vaiśvānara ivānnādo bhavati yaḥ (…) |see 1d (…) prāśniyād etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyedsee 1e vaiśvānarasya tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi vaiśvānarasya tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe vaiśvānarasya tvāsyena prāśnāmi vaiśvānarasya tvā (…) |see 1i (…) ||see 1j

yo vai ṣaṭśarāvaṃ nirvapet ṣaḍ yāvna eva devān anu nir vapet | ete vai ṣaḍ yāvāno devā yad ṛtavaḥ | ṛtūṃś caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe kalpante asmā ṛtavo na ṛtuṣv āvṛścata ṛtūnāṃ priyo bhavati yaḥ (…) |see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etā eva devatā manasā dhyāyedsee 1e ṛtūnāṃ tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmy ṛtūnāṃ tvā hastābhyām ā rabha ṛtūnāṃ tvāsyena prāśnāmy ṛtūnāṃ tvā (…) |see 1i (…) ||see 1j

yo vai saptaśarāvaṃ nirvapet sapta ṛṣīn evānu nir vapet | ete vai sapta ṛṣayo yat prāṇāpānavyānāḥ | saptarṣīṃś caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe jyog jīvati sarvam āyur eti na purā jarasaḥ pramīyate yaḥ (…) |see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etā eva devatā manasā dhyāyetsee 1e saptarṣīṇāṃ tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi saptarṣīṇāṃ tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe saptarṣīṇāṃ tvāsyena prāśnāmi saptarṣīṇāṃ tvā (…) |see 1i (…) ||see 1j

yo vā aṣṭaśarāvaṃ nirvaped virājam evavāṣṭāpadīm anu nir vapet | eṣā vai virāḍ aṣṭāpadī yad dyauś ca pṛthivī cāpaś cauṣadhayaś ca vāyuś cāntarikṣaṃ ca sūryaś ca candramāś ca | virājaṃ caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe vi rājaty asmiṃś ca loke amuṣmiṃś ca vairāja rṣabha ity enam āhur yaḥ (…) |see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyedsee 1e virājas tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi virājas tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe virājas tvāsyena prāśnāmi virājas tvā (…) |see 1i (…) ||see 1j

yo vai navaśarāvaṃ nirvapen nava yāvna eva devān anu nirvapet | ete vai navayāvāno devā yan māsāḥ | māsaś caiva lokaṃ cava rundhe kalpante asmai māsā māsāṃ priyo bhavati yaḥ (…) |see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etā eva devatā manasā dhyāyensee 1e māsāṃ tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi māsāṃ tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe māsāṃ tvāsyena prāśnāmi māsāṃ tvā (…) |see 1i (…) ||see 1j

yo vai daśaśarāvaṃ nirvaped iḍām eva dhenum anu nirvapet | esā vā iḍā dhenur yad yajñaḥ paśavaḥ | iḍāṃ caiva dhenuṃ yajñaṃ ca lokaṃ ca paśūṃś cāva rundhe kalpanteasmāiḍaiḍāṃ priyo bhavati yaḥ (…) |see 1d (…) prāśnīyad etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyedsee 1e iḍāyās tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi- -iḍāyās tvā hastābhyām ā rabha iḍāyās tvāsyena prāśnāmi- -iḍāyās tvā (…) |see 1i (…) ||see 1j

yo vā ekādaśaśarāvaṃ nirvaped rohitam evānu nir vapet | eṣa vai rohito yad indraḥ | indraṃ caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhenote sandhi -e i- indriyāvī priya indrasya bhavati yaḥ (…) |see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyedsee 1e indrasya tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi- -indrasya tvā hastābhyām ā rabha indrasya tvāsyena prāśnāmi- -indrasya tvā (…) |see 1i (…) ||see 1j

yo vai dvādaśaśarāvaṃ nirvaped viśvām eva devān anu nir vapet | ete vai viśve devā yad idaṃ sarvam | viśvāṃś caivadevām̐llokaṃ cāva rundhe kalpante asmai viśve devāḥ priyo viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda | sa ya evaṃ vidvān prāśnīyād etā eva devatā manasā dhyāyed viśveṣāṃ tvā devānāṃ cakṣuṣā paśyāmi viśveṣāṃ tvā devānāṃ hastābhyām ā rabhe viśveṣāṃ tvā devānām āsyena prāśnāmi viśveṣāṃ tvā devānāṃ jaṭhare sādayāmīti | sa yathā hutam iṣṭaṃ prāśnīyād evainaṃ prāśnāti ||

uccair ghoṣo dundubhiḥ satvanāyaṃ vānaspatyaḥ saṃbhṛta usriyābhiḥ | vācaṃ kṣaṇuvāno damayan sapatnān siṃha ivajyeṣyannabhi taṃstanībhiḥ ||
siṃha ivāstānīddruvayovibaddho 'bhikrandann ṛṣabho vāśitām iva | vṛṣā tvaṃ vadhrayas te sapatnā aindras te śuṣmo abhimātiṣāhaḥ ||
saṃjayan pṛtanā ūrdhvamāyur gṛhyā gṛhṇāno bahudhā vi cakṣva | daivīṃ vācam ā hura gurasva vedhāḥ śatrūṇām upa bharasva vedaḥ ||
vṛṣeva yūthaṃ sahaso vidāno gavyann abhi ruva saṃdhanājit | śucā vidhya hṛdayaṃ pareṣāṃ hitvā grāmān pracyutā yantu śatravaḥ ||
dundubher vācaṃ prayatāṃ vadantīm āśṛṇvatī nāthitā ghoṣabuddhā | nārī putrān dhāvatu hastagṛhya- -amitrī bhītā samare vadhānā ||
dhībhiḥ kṛtaḥ pra bharasva vācam ud dharṣaya satvanām āyudhāni | amitrasenām abhijañjabhāno dyumad vada dundubhe sūnṛtāvat ||
pūrvo dundubhe vi ṣahasva śatrūn bhūmyāḥ pṛṣṭhe vada bahu rocamānaḥ | indramedī satvanaḥ saṃ hvayasva mitrair amitrān ava jaṅghanīhi ||
antareme nabhasī ghoṣo astu pṛthak te dhvanayo yantu śībham | abhi kranda stanayotpipānāṃ ślokakṛn mitratūryāya svardhi ||
saṃkrandanaḥ pravedo dhṛṣṇuṣeṇaḥ pravedakṛd bahudhā grāmaghoṣī | śreyo vanvāno vayunāni vidvān kīrtiṃ bahubhyo vi bhaja dvirāje ||
śreyaḥketo vasujit sahīyān mitraṃ dadhānas tviṣito vipaścit | aṃśūniva grāvādhiṣavaṇeadrir gavyaṃ dundubhe adhi nṛtya vedaḥ ||
śatrūṣāṇ nīṣāḍ abhimātiṣāho gaveṣaṇaḥ sahamāna udbhit | vāgvī mantraṃ pra janayasva vājin sāṅgrāmajityāyeṣamud vadeha ||
acyutacyutsamadogamiṣṭho mṛdho jetā pṛtanāṣāḍ ayodhyaḥ | indreṇa kl̥pto vidathā nicikyad dhṛddyotano dviṣatāṃ yāhi śībham ||
imās tapantu tvauṣadhīr oṣadhīnām ayaṃ rasaḥ | aśvatthas te 'yaṃ hṛdy agnir bhūto vy oṣatu pra patāto mamādhyā ||

hā amba tejane dheno lambanastani | na tad vido yad icchasi yad u vittaṃ na tad ghasaḥ ||
putro yas te pṛśnibāhus tam u tvaṃ sāmanaṃ kṛdhi | atho duhitaraṃ naptrīm atho tvaṃ sāmanā bhava ||
asāme kuramesee Hoffmann, Aufsätze p. 7 naigūrasya svasaḥ | arāte nirṛte amate snuhite ||
pareta kastupakaṃ vaḥ punar dadāmi | yo vo na veda taṃ hata tasyāttapariśiśnyam ||Bhatt. tasyātu
tasyāttaputrān bhrātṝṃś caBhatt. tasyāttu tasya goṣṭhaṃ vitāvata | yaś ca sato nāstivākī yaś cāsāv ahavirgṛhaḥ | durṇāmnīs tatra gacchata tatra sarvāḥ paretana ||
pari dhāmānīty ekā ||
antaścarāṃkośecarām atho goṣṭhāvacāriṇīm | athoyāḥsvapne paśyāmas tā ito nāśayāmasi ||
kaṇvā yā gardabhīva nibhasat sūkarīva | tasyai pratipravartaya taptam aśmānam āsani ||
yo maryā abhigacchāt striyaṃ kastupastopinīm | kastupam asyā ācchidya- -athaināṃ cātayātai paramāṃ cit parāvatam ||
yā bhadrā yā śivā yorjā payasā saha | agniṣ ṭā asmākaṃ gṛhe gārhapatyo ni yacchatu ||
idaṃ vo devaḥ savitā- -idaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ | idaṃ vo viśve devā avasānam ayukṣata ||
pari prāgād devo agnī rakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ | sedhan viśvā apa dviṣo dahan rakṣāṃsi viśvahā ||
parīme gām aneṣata pary agnim ahṛṣata | deveṣv akrata śravaḥ ka imām̐ ā dadharṣati ||
tvayīndriyaṃ tvayi varcas tvaṃ dharmapatir bhava | tvam uttaro bhrātṛvyebhyas tava lakṣmīḥ payasvatī ||
tavaitām aśvināhavaṃ tava rāṣṭraṃ divi śritam | tvam āyuṣmān sapatnahā- -uttaro dviṣato bhava ||
tīkṣṇaśṛṅga ṛṣabhaḥ samudra ivākṣitodakaḥ | tvaṃ sahasravīryas tava bāhū gavāṃ patī ||
bhrātṛvyaś ca sapatnaś ca yas tvāmitro jighāṃsati | śriyaṃ tvaṃ sarveṣāṃ teṣām ādāyogro vi dhāraya ||
tvaṃ vaśī satyākūtaḥ satyadharmā gaveṣaṇaḥ | nāṣṭrās tvaṃ sarvās tīrtvā bhrātṛvyāṇāṃ śriyaṃ vṛha ||
tubhyaṃ saṃ yantu balayas tubhyaṃ śulkaḥ pra vīyatām | tubhyaṃ virāṭ payo duhāṃ tvāṃ vāñchantu viśo mahīḥ ||
vāñchatu tvā bṛhad rāṣṭraṃ tviṣis te mukha āhitā | tvaṃ devānāṃ bhava priyas tvayi gāvo adhiśritāḥ ||
tvayīndriyaṃ tvayi varcas tvayi yajño adhiśritaḥ | tavā yantu havaṃ devās tvaṃ priyo bṛhaspateḥ ||
agnīṣomā pavamānau virāḍ devī payasvatī | atandraṃ sarve rakṣantu rāṣṭraṃ te napavādyam ||
agnir iva tṛṇaṃ pra daha- -oghaḥ kūlam ivā ruja | śriyaṃ bhrātṛvyāṇām ā datsva- -āṇḍīkam ivādhi puṣkarāt ||
aśva iva ratham ā datsva siṃha iva puruṣaṃ hara | hastīva naḍvalān bhaṅdhi bhrātṛvyāṇāṃ śriyaṃ vṛha ||
ut te kṛṇotu kaśyapo brahma devair abhiṣṭutam | āprītam avirādhukam ||
etaṃ khadiram ā hara- -atho tejanam ā hara | utaitaṃ parṇam ā hara- -ā harānaḍuho balam ||
idhmān devaiḥsamābhṛtāṃs tāṃs te prādād bṛhaspatiḥ | tān ā dhehi samāhite 'gnau sūryābhicakṣaṇe ||
tebhiṣ ṭvam uttaro bhava bhrātṛvyāṇāṃ śriyaṃ vṛha | atho eṣāṃ payo hara ||
ādityā rudrā vasava ṛṣayo bhūtakṛtaś ca ye | śriyaṃ ca kṣatram ojaś ca tubhyaṃ devā asāviṣuḥ ||
vasur asīndranāmā- -āyuṣmāñ chataśāradaḥ |Bhatt. -āyuṣmān sa indra iva deveṣu tviṣīmān viśa ā vada ||
idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ prathatāṃ gobhir aśvair idaṃ rāṣṭram annenerayā rasena | asmai ṣaḍ urvīr upa saṃ namantu saptahotrā hata śatrūn sacittāḥ ||
ime rājāna iṣubhir ghnantu śatrūn ime rājānaḥ samityānyān vadheyuḥ | ime rājānaḥ pṛtanāḥ sahantām ahaṃ brahmā vi mṛdho hanmi sarvāḥ ||
idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ kratumad vīravaj jiṣṇūgram idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ gardnumac citraghoṣam | asmai rāṣṭrāya balim anye harantv ahaṃ devebhyo haviṣā vidheyam ||
yadi yuddhaṃ yady ṛtitaṃ vo asti devainasād yadi vā pitryeṇa | yenarttīyā dhenavo astu tasmā ahaṃ devebhyo haviṣā juhomi ||
yad vaḥ krūraṃ manaso yac ca vāco devainasād yadi vā pitryeṇa | āpa iva duḥṣvapnyam apa tat svapadhvam athānandinaḥ sumanasaḥ sam eta ||
apām iva vegaḥ pra śṛṇīta śatrūn diśodiśo rabhamāṇaḥ sam eta | ekavratā vi dhanaṃ bhajadhvaṃ purohitena vo rāṣṭraṃ prathayantu devāḥ ||
samyag vo rāṣṭraṃ saha vo manāṃsi samīcīnāḥ paśavo viśvarūpāḥ | samīcīnānāṃ vo aham asmi brahmā samyañco devā havam ā yantu ma imam ||
yathāpaḥ samudrāya samīcīr vahatha śriyam | evā rāṣṭrāya me devāḥ samyañcovahataśriyam ||
saṃsṛṣṭaṃ vo rāṣṭraṃ paśubhir gobhir aśvaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭam annenerayā rasena | mayā brahmaṇā prathamānāśvo vasīyāṃsaḥ sadam ugrā bhavātha ||
bahur yuvā pramṛṇo dhṛṣṇur astu bahuḥ kumāraḥ pratirūpaḥ pitṝṇām | satyaṃ vadantaḥ samitiṃ caranto mitraṃ gṛhṇānā jaraso yantu sakhyam ||
iha kṣatraṃ dyumnam uta rāṣṭraṃ samaitv ihendriyaṃ paśubhiḥ saṃvidānam | avadhunvānā apriyān yāṃś ca dviṣma idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ prathatāṃ sarvadaiva ||
idaṃ rāṣṭram iṣumad vīravaj jiṣṇūgram idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ paśumad brahmavṛddham | idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ hataśatru jiṣṇu ||
sapatnasāhaṃ pramṛṇam idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ dṛḍham ugram | sāḍhāmitram abhimātiṣāhaṃ sarvā jigāya pṛtanā abhiṣṭi ||
audumbareṇa maṇinā puṣṭikāmāya vedhasā | paśūnāṃ sarveṣāṃ sphātiṃ goṣṭhe me savitā karat ||
yo no agnir gārhapatyaḥ paśūnām adhipā asat | audumbaro vṛṣā maṇiḥ saṃ mā sṛjatu puṣṭyā ||
karīṣiṇīṃ phalavatīṃ svadhām irāṃ ca no gṛhe | audumbarasya tejasā dhātā puṣṭiṃ dadhātu me ||
yad dvipāc ca catuṣpāc ca yāny annāni ye rasāḥ | gṛhṇe 'haṃ teṣāṃ bhūmānaṃ bibhrad audumbaraṃ maṇim ||
puṣṭiṃ paśūnāṃ pari jagrabhāhaṃ catuṣpadāṃ dvipadāṃ yac ca dhānyam | payaḥ paśūnāṃ rasam oṣadhīnāṃ bṛhaspatiḥ savitā me ni yacchāt ||
ahaṃ paśūnām adhipā asāni mayi puṣṭaṃ puṣṭapatir dadhātu | mahyam audumbaro maṇir draviṇāni ni yacchatu ||
upa maudumbaro maṇiḥ prajayā ca dhanena ca | indreṇa jinvato maṇir ā māgan saha varcasā ||
devo maṇiḥ sapatnahā dhanasā dhanasātaye | paśor annasya bhūmānāṃ gavāṃ sphātiṃ ni yacchatu ||
yathāgre tvaṃ vanaspate puṣṭyā saha jajñiṣe | evā dhanasya me sphātim ā dadhātu sarasvatī ||
ā me dhanaṃ sarasvatī payasphātiṃ ca dhānyam | sinīvāly utā vahād ayaṃ caudumbaro maṇiḥ ||
tvaṃ maṇīnām adhipā vṛṣāsi tvayi puṣṭaṃ puṣṭapatir jajāna | tvayīme vājā draviṇāni sarvā- -udumbara sa tvam asmat sahasva- -ārād arātim amatiṃ kṣudhaṃ ca ||
grāmaṇīr asi grāmaṇīthyāyā abhiṣikto abhi mā siñca varcasā | tejo 'si tejo mayi dhārayādhi rayir asi rayiṃ mayi dhehi ||
puṣṭir asi puṣṭyā mā sam aṅdhi gṛhamedhī gṛhapatiṃ mā kṛṇu | audumbara sa tvam asmāsu rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni yaccha rāyaspoṣāya prati muñce ahaṃ tvām ||
ayam audumbaro maṇir vīro vīrāya badhyate | sa naḥ sanīṃ madhumatīṃ kṛṇotu rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīraṃ ni yacchāt ||
bhagasya rājñaḥ sumatiṃ gamema yaṃ havante bahudhā mānuṣāsaḥ | karma kṛṇvāno bhagam ā vṛṇīte sa no janeṣu subhagāṃ kṛṇotu ||
bhagaṃ purastāt pratibudhyamānāḥ paśyema devīm uṣasaṃ vibhātīm | pratīcī śubhrā draviṇena sākaṃ bhagaṃ vahanty aditir na aitu ||
bhago no adya svite dadhātu devānāṃ panthām abhi no nayeha | arvācī bhadrā sumatir na aitv adhā bhagena samidho no astu ||
bhagena vācam iṣitāṃ vadāni sarasvatīṃ madhumatīṃ suvarcāḥ | bhagena dattam upa medam āgan yathā varcasvān samitim āvadāni ||
bhago mā goṣv avatu bhago māvatu dhānye | akṣeṣu strīṣu mā bhago bhago māvatu varcasā ||
bhago mā sāyam avatu bhago māvatu rātryā | bhago nipadyamāneṣu prātar mā bhaga ā gamat ||
bhago mā prātar avatu bhago madhyandinaṃ pari | aparāhṇe vayaṃ bhagaṃ vāsa iva pari dadhmahe ||
bhagaṃ devebhyas pari bhagaṃ manuṣyebhyaḥ | divas pṛthivyā aham antarikṣād bhagaṃ vṛṇe | so agne ramatā mayi sa mā prāvatu varcasā ||
bhagaṃ vṛṇānā vadhvaṃ vahanti vaniṃ prayanto bhagam id dhavante | bhagena dattam upa medam āgan viśvaṃ subhūtaṃ draviṇāni bhadrā ||
bhagena devāḥ samaganmahi ya imā viśvā bhuvanābhivaste | prayacchanneti bahudhā vasūni sa no dadhātu yatamad vasiṣṭham ||
vāto bhago varuṇo vāyur agniḥ kṣetrasya patnī suhavā no astu | hiraṇyākṣo atipaśyo nṛcakṣāḥ sarvaiḥ sākaṃ sacamāno na ehi ||
ud ehi deva sūrya saha saubhāgyena | saharṣabhasya vājena sahāvataṃkaraṇena ||
hiraṇyayenety ekā ||
gobhiṣ ṭvā pātv ṛṣabho vṛṣā tvā pātu vājibhiḥ | vāyuṣ ṭvā brahmaṇā pātv indras tvā pātv indriyaiḥ ||
somas tvā pātv oṣadhībhir nakṣatraiḥ pātu sūryaḥ | mādbhiṣ ṭvā candro vṛtrahā vātaḥ prāṇena rakṣatu ||
tisro divas tisraḥ pṛthivīs trīṇy antarikṣāṇi caturaḥ samudrān | trivṛtaṃ stomaṃ trivṛta āpa āhus tās tvā rakṣantu trivṛtā trivṛdbhiḥ ||
trīn nākāṃs trīn samudrāṃs trīn bradhnāṃs trīn vaiṣṭapān | trīn mātariśvanas trīn sūryān goptṝn kalpayāmi te ||
ghṛtena tvā sam ukṣāmy agna ājyena vardhayan | agneś candrasya sūryasya mā prāṇaṃ māyino dabhan ||
mā vaḥ prāṇaṃ mā vo 'pānaṃ mā haro māyino dabhan | bhrājanto viśvavedaso devā daivyena māvata ||
prāṇenāgniṃ saṃ dadhati vātaḥ prāṇena saṃhitaḥ | prāṇena viśvatomukhaṃ sūryaṃ devā ajanayan ||
āyuṣāyuṣkṛtāṃ jīva- -āyuṣmāṃ jīva mā mṛthāḥ | prāṇenātmanvatāṃ jīva mā mṛtyor upa gā vaśam ||
devānāṃ nihitaṃ nidhiṃ yam indrānvavindan pathibhir devayānaiḥ | āpo hiraṇyaṃ jugupus trivṛdbhis tās tvā rakṣantu trivṛtā trivṛdbhiḥ ||
trayastriṃśad devatās trīṇi ca vīryāṇi priyāyamāṇā jugupur apsv antaḥ | asmiṃś candre adhi yad dhiraṇyaṃ tenāyaṃ kṛṇavad vīryāṇi ||
ye devā divy ekādaśa stha te devāso havir idaṃ juṣadhvam ||
ye devā antarikṣa ekādaśa stha (…) ||see 1b
ye devāḥ pṛthivyām ekādaśa stha te devāso havir idaṃ juṣadhvam ||
asapatnaṃ purastāt paścān no 'bhayaṃ kṛtam | savitā mā dakṣiṇata uttarān mā śacīpatiḥ ||
divo mādityā rakṣantu bhūmyā rakṣantv agnayaḥ | indrāgnī rakṣatāṃ mā purastād aśvināv abhitaḥ śarma yacchatām | tiraścīn aghnyā rakṣatu jātavedā bhūtakṛto me sarvataḥ santu varma ||
ye 'psv antar agnayaḥ praviṣṭā mroko manohā khano nirdāha ātmadūṣis tanadūṣiḥ | idaṃ tān ati sṛjāmi nir eno nir anṛtaṃ sṛjāmi ||
abhūtyā satvāya nir duṣvapnyaṃ sṛjāmi | vasiṣṭhārundhatī mā pātāṃ prajāpateḥ prastaro bṛhaspateḥ keśāḥ ||
adabdhaṃ cakṣuḥ suśrutau karṇāv akṣitau me prāṇāpānau | hṛdayā jarasaṃ mā mā hāsīr madhya mā riṣam ||
āpo mā śundhantu duṣkṛtād duritā yāni cakṛma | ayāma śuddhā uditas tanūbhiḥ ||
vaiśvānaro raśmibhir naḥ punātu vātaḥ prāṇeneṣiro namobhiḥ | dyāvāpṛthivī payasā payasvatī ṛtāvarī yajñiye mā punītām ||
punantu māgnayo gārhapatyāḥ punantu mā dhṛṣṇyā devahūtāḥ | punantu mā śakvarīḥ somapṛṣṭhāḥ pavamānāso ajriṇaḥ ||
yaḥ potā sa punātu mā bṛhadbhir deva savitaḥ | varṣiṣṭhairdyām ivopari ||
brahmasavaiḥ punātu mā rājasavaiḥ punātu mā | śataṃ pavitrā vitatātiraścā tebhir mā devaḥ savitā punātu ||
śataṃ ca mā pavitāraḥ punantu sahasraṃ ca prasravaṇeṣv āpaḥ | āpa iva pūto 'smy agnir iva suvarcāḥ sūrya iva sucakṣāḥ ||
urūṇasāv asutṛpā udumbalau yamasya dūtau carato janām̐ anu | tāv asmabhyaṃ dṛśaye sūryāya punar dātām asum adyeha bhadram ||
aganma devāḥ svaḥ svar aganma- -aganma jyotir jyotir aganma | mahendro 'si parameṣṭhī sumitra viśvatomukha mā teyuyomasaṃdṛśaḥ ||
udyann adya citramahaḥ sapatnān me 'va jahi |Bhatt. meva divainān raśmibhir jahi rātryenāṃs tamasā vadhīs te yantv adhamaṃ tamaḥ ||
sūryasyāvṛtam anvāvarte dakṣiṇām anvāvṛtam | agnes tejasā tejasvī bhūyāsam indrasyendriyeṇendriyāvān bhūyāsam ||
idam aham agnes tejasā- -indrasyendriyeṇa somasya dyumnena viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ kratūnām | amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasya- -amuṣyāḥ putrasya varcas teja indriyaṃ prāṇam āyur ni veṣṭayāmi ||
(…) āyur ni yacchet ||
idam aham agnes tejasā- -indrasyendriyeṇa somasya dyumnena viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ kratūnām | amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasya- -amuṣyāḥ putrasya varcas teja indriyaṃ prāṇam āyur ā dāya ||
abhūtyā enaṃ pāśe sitvā duṣvapnyena saṃsṛjya mṛtyor vyātta āsann api dadhāmi ||
yo naḥ svo yo araṇo bhrātṛvyaś ca jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasyāgniś ca marma skandheṣu vindatām ||
yo mā śayānaṃ jāgrataṃ yaś ca suptaṃ jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasyāgniś ca bāhū marmaṇi vṛścatām ||
yo mā carantaṃ tiṣṭhantam āsīnaṃ ca jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasminn agniś ca duritaṃ prati muñcatām ||
yo mā cakṣuṣā manasā yaś ca vācā jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasmā agniś ca- -enāṃsi vahatām itaḥ ||
yaḥ piśāco yātudhānaḥ kravyād yo mā jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasyāgniś ca mūrdhānaṃ prati vidhyatām ||
yo mā brahmaṇā tapasā yaś ca yajñair jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasyāgniś ca hṛdaye 'dhi ni vidhyatām ||
yo me brahma yo me tapo balaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasmā agniś ca kruddhau digdhābhir asyatām ||
yo me annaṃ yo me rasaṃ vācaṃ śreṣṭhāṃ jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasmā agniś ca- -ācchambaṭkāram asyatām ||
yo me tantuṃ yo me prajāṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasmā agniś ca hetiṃ deveṣu vindatām ||
yo me gobhyairasyaty aśvebhyaḥ puruṣebhyaḥ | indraś ca tasmā agniś ca jyāniṃdeveṣu vindatām ||
yo me bhūtim anāmayad vittam āyur jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasmā agniś ca divo aśmānam asyatām ||
yo me veśma yo me sabhāṃ śriyaṃ śreṣṭhāṃ jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasyāgniś ca kṛtyāṃ vi tanutāṃ gṛhe ||
yo me mṛtyum asamṛddhim ahnā rātryācecchati| indraś ca tasyāgniś ca- -arciṣā dahatāṃ svam ||
yo me prāṇaṃ yo me 'pānaṃ vyānaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasyāgniś ca prāṇaṃ prāṇahanau hatām ||
yo mā devajanaiḥ sarpair vidyutā brahmaṇābhyamāt | agastyena medinā- -indraś cāgniś ca taṃ hatām ||
taṃ satyaujāḥ pra dahatv agnir vaiśvānaro vṛṣā | yo mā durasyann īkṣātai yaś ca dipsati vidvalaḥ ||
yo mā dipsād adipsantaṃ yaś ca dipsati dipsa tam | vaiśvānarasya daṃṣṭrayor agner api dadhāmi tam ||
abhi taṃ dyāvāpṛthivī saṃtapatāṃ tapte gharme nyucyatām | nirṛtyā vadhyatāṃ pāśe yo naḥ pāpaṃ cikitsati ||
pratyagvadhena pracyutān bhrātṛvyān ghoracakṣasaḥ | indrāgnī enān vṛścatāṃ maiṣām uc cheṣi kaś cana ||
pratyagvadha pratyag jahi bhrātṛvyān dviṣato mama | apānān prāṇāṃ saṃchidya dviṣatas pātayādharān ||
agne ye mā jighāṃsanty agne ye ca dviṣanti mā | agne ye mopatapyante teṣāṃ priyatamaṃ jahi ||
etaṃ dviṣantam avadhiṣam andhena tamasāvṛtam | etaṃ mṛtyo 'bhi padyasva mā te moci mahodaraḥ ||
dyāvāpṛthivī saṃ nahyethāṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayantī amitrebhyo hetim asyantī ||
vātā pavamānau saṃ nahyethāṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayantāv amitrebhyo hetim asyantau ||
