parameṣṭhī rakṣitā sa imāṃ senāṃ rakṣatu | anuṣṭhātar anu tiṣṭha sarve vīrā bhavantu me ||
viśve devā rakṣitāras ta imāṃ senāṃ rakṣantu | anuṣṭhātāro anu tiṣṭhata sarve vīrā bhavantu me ||
vṛṣā te 'haṃ vṛṣaṇyantyai garbhaṃ dadhāmi yonyām | yadi devapariṣṭhitā prajāṃ tokaṃ na vindase ||
dhātā te taṃ sinīvālī varuṇānī pra yacchatu | pumāṃsaṃ putram indrāṇī śatadāyaṃ dadhātu te ||
saṃvṛtas te vakṣaṇāsu garbhaḥ puṃsā pumān kṛtaḥ | sarvāṅgas tanvor jāyatām agnir ivāraṇyor adhi ||
dhatsva vīraṃ karmaṇyaṃ prasvaṃ tvāvadhrim avaśāṃ kṛṇomi | ātmanas te lohitād garbhaḥ saṃvartatāṃ vṛṣā ||
tvaṣṭā piṃśatu te prajāṃ dhātā tokaṃ dadhātu te | rākā sīvyatu sūcyā bhūtasyeśānā bhuvanasya devī ||
sinīvālīm anumatiṃ rākāṃ guṅguṃ sarasvatīm | devānāṃ patnīr yā devīr indrāṇīm avase huve ||
abhinnāṇḍā vṛddhagarbhā- -ariṣṭā vīrasūr iyam | vi jāyatāṃ pra jāyatāṃ bahvī bhavatu putriṇī ||
pari sṛja garbhaṃ dhehi māśāḥ pra cyoṣṭa lohitam | anūnaḥ pūrṇo jāyatām aśrāmoranvo apiśācadhītaḥ ||
tvaṃ dadhāsi dvipade catuṣpade garbhaṃ prajām ejate viśvarūpām | kanikradad vṛṣabho vīḍuśepāḥ prajāpate tanvāṃ dhehi garbham ||
abhikrandaṃ stanayaṃ dhehi garbhaṃ vidyotamānaḥ pavamāno vīrudbhiḥ | parjanyemāṃ pṛthivī retasāvata- -apāṃ rasair oṣadhīnāṃ paśūnām ||
ā te nayāmi vṛṣaṇaṃ yaḥ prajānāṃ prajāpatiḥ | sa tedadhātvṛtviyaṃ garbhaṃ yonyāṃ vijāṃ prajām ||
ye vṛṣāṇo garbhakṛta ṛtviyānāṃ samenasaḥ | tāṃs te hvayāmi tad u te sam ṛdhyatām ||
agneṣ ṭe tvaṣṭur varuṇād indrāt somād bṛhaspateḥ | putraṃ te putrakāmāyai devebhyo nir mame prajām ||
aṅgād aṅgāt saṃ sravatu tad yonau prati tiṣṭhatu | prajā te vakṣaṇāśayā tat te bījaṃ vi rohatu ||
atsaso yamanaṃ saso 'bhūtir yakṣmam ajījanat | imaṃ sahasrabhāg indro viśaraṃ nāśayāti te ||
yaḥ kāryo yaś ca kṛtaḥ svayaṃjā uta hāryaḥ | devā indrajyeṣṭhā viśaraṃ nāśayantu te ||
viśarasya vijṛmbhasya- -iṣur mātā dhanuṣ pitā | ādityāḥ putrā ādityā viśaraṃ naśayantu te ||
dhanvano jyāyā iṣvā apaskambhasya bāhvoḥ | apāṣṭhāc chṛṅgāt kurmalād viśaraṃ nāśayāmi te ||
alavatī ruruśīrṣṇy atho yasyāyo mukham | devyai parjanyaretasa iṣave kṛṇutā namaḥ ||
yām atrayo aṅgiraso gotamā vīrudhaṃ viduḥ | tayā bharadvājaḥ kaṇvo viśaraṃ nāśayāti te ||
yas tvā straiṇād apasaro yaḥ puṃso adhyāruhat | āklāntaṃ saṃklāntaṃ snāva tad u te kalpayāmasi ||
vāta ivābhraṃ cyāvayāmi yakṣmaṃ te tanvas pari | vācā yac cakrus te guru tad ṛcā laghu kṛṇmasi | tenāham ṛtodyena viśaraṃ nāśayāmi te ||
yathā na satyaṃ puruṣaḥ sadā vaditum arhati | viṣkandhaṃ tvad apaśaraṃ viśaraṃpuṣṭyāmayam| jambhaṃ hanugrābhaṃ śaṅkhaṃ tān ajenā ajāmasi ||
śunamid va oṣadhayo vi dadhe bheṣajāya kam | dhanāyuvaḥ sanāyuvaḥ puruṣaṃ pārayiṣṇavaḥ ||
ātmatrāṇi devajūtā vīrudhāyuṣyā kṛtā | tayāham indradattayā viśaraṃ nāśayāmi te ||
alasya vyañjanasya veṣṭanasyota parṇadheḥ | grantherjyāyāiṣvā viśaraṃ nāśayāmi te ||
sākaṃ viṣkandha pra pata cāṣeṇa kikidīvyā | sākaṃ vātasya dhrājyā sahanaśyanihākayā ||
jaṅgiḍo 'si jaṅgiḍo rakṣitāsi jaṅgiḍaḥ | dvipāc catuṣpād asmākaṃ sarvaṃ rakṣatu jaṅgiḍaḥ ||
yā gṛtsyas tripañcāśīḥ śataṃ kṛtyākṛtaś ca ye | sarvān vinaktatejaso 'rasān jaṅgiḍas karat ||
arasaṃ kṛtrimaṃ nāḍam arasāḥ sapta visrasaḥ | apeto jaṅgiḍāmatim iṣum asteva sādhaya ||
kṛtyādūṣaṇa evāyam atho arātidūṣaṇaḥ | atho sahasvāṃ jaṅgiḍaḥ pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat ||
sa jaṅgiḍasya mahimā pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ | viṣkandhaṃ yena sāsāha saṃskandham oja ojasā ||
tṛṣṭvā devā ajanayan niṣṭhitaṃ bhūmyām adhi | tam u tvāṅgirā iti brahmāṇaḥ pūrvyā viduḥ ||
na tvā pūrvā oṣadhayo na tvā tarantu yā navāḥ | vibādha ugro jaṅgiḍaḥ paripāṇaḥ sumaṅgalaḥ ||
aśvopadān bhagavo jaṅgiḍāmitavīrya | purā ta ugrāya sata upendro vīryaṃ dadau ||
ugra it te vanaspata indra ojmānam ā dadhau | amīvāḥ sarvāś cātayañ jahi rakṣāṃsy oṣadhe ||
aśarīkaṃ viśarīkaṃ balāsaṃpuṣṭyāmayam| takmānaṃ viśvaśāradam arasaṃ jaṅgiḍas karat ||
indrasya nāma gṛhṇanta ṛṣayo jaṅgiḍaṃ daduḥ | devā yaṃ cakrur bheṣajam agre viṣkandhadūṣaṇam ||
sa no rakṣatu jaṅgiḍo dhanapālo dhaneva | devā yaṃ cakrur brāhmaṇāḥ paripāṇam arātiham ||
durhārdasaṃ ghoracakṣuṃ pāpakṛtvānam āgatam | tāṃs tvaṃ sahasracakṣo pratībodhena nāśaya paripāno 'si jaṅgidaḥ ||
pari mā divaḥ pari mā pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣāt pari mā vīrudbhyaḥ | pari mā bhūtāt pari mota bhavyād diśo diśo jaṅgiḍaḥ pātv asmān ||
ya ṛṣṇavo devakṛtā ya uco babhṛte nyāḥ | sarvāṃs tān viśvabheṣajo arasān jaṅgiḍas karat ||
prati gṛhāṇa pṛthivī nītam etad ājyasya mathitaṃ śarīram | imāṃ dhenum asya dātus tvaṃ rakṣa barhiṣy ā yathāsat ||
uta tvāhur varuṇasya patnīm atho tvāhur aditiṃ viśvarūpām | adhi jarāyum āghāre havyavāham agnāv asyā mahimānaṃ juhomi ||
sa sāhasraṃ tantum anv ā tatāna soagniṣṭomāndaśataṃ sam āpa |Bhatt. -ṣṭomāṃ adhijarāyuṃ savatsāṃ yo dadāti taṃ vai devāḥ svar ā rohayanti ||
adhijarāyuḥ svar ā rohayanty anena dattā sudughā vayodhāḥ | sāsmai duhāṃ śatadhāram akṣitaṃ yam asya loke parame vyoman ||
pūrvavatsena saha vatsinī gaur yo 'syā vatso aparo jarāyu tat | tṛtīyaṃ māṃsaṃ parinirmitaṃ yat tasmād devā adhijarāyum āhuḥ ||
ā dhāvaya śavasā vāvṛdhāna- -uttarāva śrava ādhehy asmai | imam indra mahatāmena rakṣa saṃ prajayā tanvā saṃ balena ||
durvedāvastād bahudhā parastād viśve devāḥ prati paśyanty āyatīm | yā bhadrā yā sarvataḥ samīcī sed āhutir bhavatu me tarājyā ||
gṛṣṭiṃ dhenum adhijarāyuṃ svadhāṃ kṛṇvānaḥ pra dadāti brahmaṇe | sāsmai duhāṃ śatadhāram akṣitam amuṣmim̐lloke yuga uttarasmin ||
vatsaṃ jarāyu pratidhuk pīyūṣaṃ yo no dadāti sudughāmadhenum | tasya devāḥ pratirantvāyuḥ sa ā rohatu sukṛtām ulokam ||
parivālām adhijarāyuṃ yudhā jīvo adadāgra etām | syonā naḥ śagmā śivā viśeha mā no hiṃsīr harasā daivyena ||
bhadrakṛtaṃ sukṛtamādu śaṃbhuvam araṃ bhuvaṃ prati gṛhṇāmy āyatīm | ghṛtaśriyaṃ nabhasī saṃvasānāṃ devānmanuṣyām̐asurān utarṣīn ||
pañca devāḥ pra pibanta etām indras tvaṣṭā varuṇo mitro agniḥ | te sarve sam adur mahyam etāṃ tayeha jīvan pra tirasvāyuḥ ||
kaśyapo 'yaṃ jamadagnir vasiṣṭha ṛṣayo naḥ sasanur agra etām | bharadvājo gotamo atrir naḥ syonāṃ viśvāmitro daduṣaḥ pra tirāty āyuḥ ||
ūrjaṃ devebhyaḥ subhaga ūrjaṃ manuṣyebhyaḥ | ūrjaṃ pitṛbhyo aghnya ūrjā dadata mā viśa ||
yā jātā oṣadhayo devebhyas triyugaṃ purā | manye nu babhrūṇām ahaṃ śataṃ dhāmāni sapta ca ||
śataṃ vo amba dhāmāni sahasram uta vo ruhaḥ | adhā śatakṛtvo yūyam imaṃ me agadaṃ kṛta ||
puṣpavatīḥ prasūmatīḥ phalinīr aphalā uta | aśvā iva stha jitvarīr vīrudhaḥ pārayiṣṇavaḥ ||
oṣadhīr iti mātaro yad vo devīr upabruve | rapāṃsi vighnatīr ita rakṣaś cātayamānāḥ ||
niṣkṛtir nāma vo mātā niṣkṛtir nāma vaḥ pitā | sarāḥ patatriṇī stha yad āmayati niṣkṛtiḥ ||
aśvatthe vo niṣadanaṃ parṇe vo vasatiṣ kṛtā | gobhāja it kilāsatha yat sanavatha puruṣam ||
yad ahaṃ vājayann imā oṣadhīr hasta ādadhe | ātma yakṣmasya naśyatu purā jīvagṛbho yathā ||
uc chuṣmā oṣadhīnāṃ gāvo goṣṭhād iverate | dhanaṃ saniṣyantīnām ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣaḥ ||
yad oṣadhayaḥ samagmata rājānaḥ samitāv iva | vipraḥ sa ucyate bhiṣag rakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ ||
aśvāvatīṃ somāvatīm ūrjayantīm udojasam | āvitsi sarvā oṣadhīr ito mā pārayān iti ||
ati viśvāḥ pariṣṭhā stena iva vrajam akramīt | oṣadhayaḥ pracucyavur yat kiṃ ca tanvo rapaḥ ||
yasyauṣadhayaḥ prasarpatha- -aṅgam aṅgaṃ paruṣ paruḥ | tasmād yakṣmaṃ vi bādhadhvam ugro madhyamaśīr iva ||
anyā vo anyām avatv anyānyasyā upāvata | oṣadhayaḥ saṃvidānā idaṃ me prāvatā vacaḥ ||
avapatantīr apadaṃ diva oṣadhayas pari | yaṃ jīvamaśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ ||
yā oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīr bahvīḥ śatavicakṣaṇāḥ | bṛhaspatiprasūtās tā no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
yāḥ phalinīr yā aphalā akośā yāś ca keśinīḥ | bṛhaspatiprasūtās tā no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
jīvalāṃ naghāriṣām ā te badhnāmy oṣadhim | yā ta āyur upāharād apa rakṣāṃsi cātayāt ||
kālo aśvo vahati saptaraśmiḥ sahasrākṣo ajaro bhūriretāḥ | tām ā rohanti kavayo vipaścitas tasya cakrā bhuvanāni viśvā ||
sapta cakrān vahati kāla eṣa saptāsya nābhīr amṛtaṃ nv akṣaḥ | sa imā viśvā bhuvanāny añjan kālaḥ sa īyate prathamo nu devaḥ ||
pūrṇaḥ kumbho adhi kāla āhitas taṃ vai paśyāmo bahudhā nu santam | sa imā viśvā bhuvanāni pratyaṅ kālaṃ tam āhuḥ parame vyoman ||
sa eva san bhuvanāny ābharat sa eva san bhuvanāni pary ait | pitā sann abhavat putra eṣāṃ tasmād vai nānyat param asti tejaḥ ||
kālo 'mūṃ divam ajanayat kala imāṃ pṛthivīm uta | kālena bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ ca- -iṣitaṃ ha vi tiṣṭhate ||
kālo bhūtim asṛjat kale tapati sūryaḥ | kālo ha viśvā bhūtāni kāle cakṣur vi paśyati ||
kāle manaḥ kāle prāṇaḥ kāle nāma samāhitam | kālena sarvā nandanty āgatena prajā imāḥ ||
kāle tapaḥ kāle jyeṣṭhaṃ kāle brahma samāhitam | kālo ha sarvasyeśvaro yaḥ pitāsīt prajāpateḥ ||
teneṣitaṃ tena jātaṃ tad u tasmin pratiṣṭhitam | kālo ha brahma bhūtvā bibharti parameṣṭhinam ||
kālaḥ prajām asṛjata kālo agre prajāpatim | svayambhūḥ kaśyapaḥ kālāt tapaḥ kālād ajāyata ||
kālād āpaḥ sam abhavan kālād brahma tapo diśaḥ | kālenod eti sūryaḥ kāle ni viśate punaḥ ||
kālena vātaḥ pavate kālena pṛthivī mahī dyaur mahī kāla āhitā | kālo ha bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ ca putro ajanayat puraḥ ||
kālād ṛcaḥ sam abhavan yajuṣ kālād ajāyata | kālo yajñaṃ sam airayad devebhyo bhāgam akṣitam ||
kāle gandharvāpsarasaḥ kāle lokāḥ samāhitāḥ | kāle 'yam aṅgirā devo atharvā cādhi tiṣṭhataḥ ||
imaṃ ca lokaṃ paramaṃ ca lokaṃ puṇyāṃś ca lokān vidhṛtīś ca puṇyāḥ | sarvām̐l lokān abhijitya brahmaṇā kālaḥ sa īyate paramo nu devaḥ ||
saptaitaṃ sapta ṛṣayaḥ śalyakartā dvādaśa | āviddhaṃ śalyaṃ cākratur indrarāśiṃ mahodaram ||
indrarāśiṃ mitrāvaruṇāv āviddhaṃ nir akṛntatam | prasūtam indreṇogreṇaBhatt. -greṇo (misprint) brāhmaṇānām asat pituḥ ||
nainam aśnīyād abrāhmaṇo na gṛhān pra haret svān | tṛṣṭaṃ viṣam iva taimātam indrarāśiḥ khale śaye ||
ayaṃ śaye tanvaṃ rakṣamāṇo yo aśnāty avicakṣāṇa etam | madhye khalasya nirmita indrarāśir mahodaraḥ ||
utaiṣa yakṣmaṃ bhavati- -indrarāśir mahodaraḥ | bhīmo annasya saṃkāśe aśva ivātti śinī naḍam ||
ya indrarāśiṃ nirvapād vardhayāt khalamānyāḥ | sphātiṃ ca khalyāṃ gṛhṇātu gavāṃ ca bahu puṣyatu ||
yam uvāha śunaḥśepo yam indro brahmaṇaspatiḥ | taṃ cakruḥ śivam asmabhyaṃ ṛṣayo jīvanāya kam ||
tṛḍhaṃ śākaṃ tam aśayad dattam āsīc chvāpadam | pandrā sma rupyantaḥ śere ya ādanvahutaṃ haviḥ ||
anaḍuhāṃpṛśniśaphānāṃ vahatāṃ vaharāpiṇām | kīnāśasya śramāt svedād indrarāśir ajāyata ||
yat kināśasya sveda eti saṃtaptas tanvas pari | apāṃ gāva iva tṛṣyantīr indrarāśiṃ so aśnute ||
yat kīnāśaṃsīrapatir daṇḍena hanti manyutaḥ | yat kiṃ ca khalyaṃ sādānvavam indrarāśau tad āhitam ||
ulūkhalamusalaṃ tāni codaya sūrpaṃ nāry apavice kṛṇuṣva | vāhāya putrāya gotama indrarāśiṃ madhumantaṃ kṛṇotu ||
etat sūrpaṃ jaritar ā hara- -ulūkhalamusalaṃ kumbhy ā gahi | putrā no adya sudinatve ahni pittam aśnanta madhumantam aṃśum ||
agnir no dūtaḥ prahito 'yam āgan sa naḥ sarvam annam aviṣaṃ kṛṇotu | nirāviddham akṛtaṃ brahmaṇeto 'domadhaṃ pittam atta prasūtāḥ ||
svādo pito madhopitaBhatt. pito upa naḥ pitav ā gahi | śivaḥ śivābhir ūtibhiḥ ||
siṃho bhūtvā gā mṛṇāty agnir bhūtvā dhānyam | indrarāśir anirmito mayāraṃ cāvagacchati||
śatakāṇḍo duścyavanaḥ sahasraparṇa uttiraḥ | darbho ya ugra oṣadhis taṃ te badhnāmy āyuṣe ||
nāsya keśān pra vapanti norasi tāḍam ā ghnate | yasmāacchinnaparṇena darbheṇa śarmayacchati||
divi te tūlam oṣadhe pṛthivyām asi niṣṭhitaḥ | tvayā sahasrakāṇḍena āyuṣ pra vardhayāmahe ||
tisro divo aty atṛṇas tisra imāḥ pṛthivīr uta | tayāhaṃ sarvān durhārdo jihvāṃ ni tṛṇadmi vacāṃsi ca ||
tvam asi sahamāno aham asmi sahasvān | ubhau sahasvantau bhūtvā sapatnānsahiṣīvahi||
sahasva no abhimātiṃ sahasva pṛtanāyataḥ | sahasvasarvāndurhārdaḥBhatt. sarvāṃ durhārdo suhārdo me bahūn kṛdhi ||
darbheṇa devajātena diviṣṭambhenaśaśvadit | tenāhaṃ sasvatojanām̐ asanaṃ sanavāni ca ||
priyaṃ mā darbhaṃ kṛṇu brahmarājanyābhyāṃ śūdrāya cāryāya ca | yasmai ca kāmayāmahe sarvasmai ca vipaśyate ||
yo jāyamānaḥ pṛthivīm adṛṃhad yo astabhnād antarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca | yaṃ bibhrataṃ nanu pāpmā viveda sa no 'yaṃ darbho dharuṇo divā kaḥ ||
sapatnahā śatakāṇḍaḥ sahasvān oṣadhīnāṃ prathamaḥ saṃ babhūva | sa no 'yaṃ darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvatas tena sākṣīya pṛtanāḥ pṛtanyataḥ ||
sahasrārghaḥ śatakāṇḍaḥ payasvān apām agnir vīrudhāṃ rājasūyam | sa no 'yaṃ darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvato daivo maṇir āyuṣā saṃ sṛjāti naḥ ||
ghṛtādulluptomadhumān payasvān bhūmidṛṃho acyutaś cāvayiṣṇuḥ | nudan sapatnān adharāṃś ca kṛṇvan darbhāroha mahatā mahendriyeṇa ||
tvaṃ bhūmim aty eṣy ojasā tvaṃ vedyāṃ sīdasi cārur adhvare | tvāṃ pavitram ṛṣayo 'bharanta tvaṃ punīhi duritāny asmat ||
tīkṣṇo rājā viṣāsahī rakṣohā viśvacarṣaṇiḥ | tejo devānāṃ balam ugram etat taṃte badhnāmi jarase svastaye ||
darbheṇa tvaṃ kṛṇu vīryāṇi darbhaṃ bibhrad ātmanā mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ | atiṣṭhāyo varcasaidhvanyān sūrya ivā bhāhi pradiśaś catasraḥ ||
ud īratāṃ pṛthivī jīradānuḥ śīta enām antarvān anu vātu vātaḥ | ṛtviyāvatī pṛthivī prati gṛhṇātu bījaṃ sahasravalliśaṃ suruhārohayantī ||
indra enāṃ haryaśvo agnir vā rohitāśvaḥ | aśvinā rāsabhāśvā kṛṣiṃ devīm ayūyujan ||
śunaṃ varatrām ā yaccha śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya | śunaṃ totapyatāṃ phālaḥ śunaṃ vahatu lāṅgalam ||
yunaktu vāhān vi yugā tanota kṛte kṣetre vapateha bījam | tathā dhātā tathā bhagas tathā kṛṇutām aśvinā tathā devī sarasvatī ||
supippalā oṣadhayo nāhīnā apakṣata | tad indro varuṇo vāyur aśvinedaṃ me pra tiratā vacaḥ ||
dhātā pūṣā bṛhaspatir bhūtyāḥ sam ajīgaman | kṛṣiṃ devāḥ svarvidaḥ ||
kalyāṇī subhageva yā saṃsthāyāṃ vapuṣeṇyā | sā nas tirāti madhumantam aṃśum ||
annasya bhūmā puruṣasya bhūmā bhūmā paśūnāṃ ta iha śrayantām | tīvrā varṣantu vṛṣṭayo bhūtaye mahase vṛdhe ||
pinvānaḥ parjanyas tiṣṭhatu saha pṛṣṭhayod eti sūryaḥ | ānandaṃ janayan yavaḥ sarvā arātīr apabādhamānaḥ ||
vi jihīṣva pṛthivīm ahyur vi pakṣam ṛdvī bhava | bhadraṃ rohatu dhānyam ||
utsedha sedha gā ajan vindeherāṃ mahas kṛdhi | mā vo riṣat kūṭagrāhoBhatt. riṣāt mā va ā śāri lāṅgalam ||
moasmākamugrāḥ saṃrabdhāsBhatt. mo [']smākam tanvaḥ kiṃ canāmamat | rāyaspoṣaṃ śunāsīrā atho sītābhagaś ca yaḥ ||
deṣṭrī samudraḥ sinīvālī kṛṣiṃ no abhi hinvata | imā yāḥ pañca pradiśas tā vāto abhi hinvata | valīke satvatām iva tīvrā varṣantu vṛṣṭayaḥ ||
śunaṃ kīnāśo anv etuvāhāñ chunaṃ phālo vinudann etu bhūmim | śunāsīrā haviṣā vāvṛdhānā śunaṃ dhānyāni kṛṇutāṃ yuvaṃ naḥ ||
yā naḥ pīparad aśvinā jyotiṣmatī tamas tiraḥ | tām asme rāsetām iṣam ||

ūrdhvaśrito vai nāmaitā āpo yad oṣadhayaś ca vanaspatayaś ca tāsām agnir adhipatiḥ | yo vā etā ūrdhvaśrita āpo vedāgnim adhipatim | yathaitam etā ūrdhvā upatiṣṭhanty evainam ūrdhvā upa tiṣṭhanty adhipatir bhavati svānāṃ cānyeṣāṃ ca ya evaṃ veda ||

praskadvarīr vai nāmaitā āpo yatpṛṣvās tāsām ādityo 'dhipatiḥ | yo vā etāḥ praskadvarīr āpo vedādityam adhipatim | yathaitā etasminn udyati praskandanty evāsminn ā yati praskandanty adhipatiḥ (…) ||see 1e

takvarīr vai nāmaitā āpo yāḥ sūdaya tāsāṃ pṛthivy adhipatnī | yo vā etās takvarīr āpo veda pṛthivīm adhipatnīm | yathaitā etasyāṃ praṇutās takantīr yanty evainena dviṣantaḥ praṇutā yanty adhipatiḥ (…) ||see 1e

vaśinīr vai nāmaitā āpo yāḥ syandante tāsāṃ varuṇo 'dhipatiḥ | yo vā etā vaśinīr āpo veda varuṇam adhipatim | yathaitam etāsāṃ syandamānānāṃ vaśam ādatta evā dviṣatāṃ vaśam ā datte 'dhipatiḥ (…) ||see 1e
ūrjo vai nāmaitā āpo yad gāvas tāsāṃ tvaṣṭādhipatiḥ | yo vā etā ūrja āpo veda tvaṣṭāram adhipatim | ūrjasvī tejasvī bhavati pra sāhasrān paśūn āpnoty adhipatir bhavati (…) ||see 1e
varco vai nāmaitā āpo yad ghṛtaṃ tāsāṃ pūṣā adhipatiḥ | yo vā etā varca āpo veda pūṣaṇam adhipatim | varcasvī tejasvī bhavaty utāsyānabhyaktasya mukhaṃ rocate 'dhipatiḥ (…) ||see 1e
ojo vai nāmaitā āpo yan madhu tāsām indro 'dhipatiḥ | yo vā etā oja āpo vedendram adhipatim | ojasvī vīryāvān indriyāvī bhavati pra rājasabhāyāṃ madhuparkam āpnoty adhipatiḥ (…) ||see 1e
ugrā vai nāmaitā āpoyaddhrādunayas tāsāṃ maruto adhipatayaḥ | yo vā etā ugrā āpo veda maruto 'dhipatīn | ugro balavāna bhavati mārutaṃ śardha ity enam āhur adhipatiḥ (…) ||see 1e

maho vai nāmaitā āpo yad varṣaṃ tāsāṃ parjanyo 'dhipatiḥ | yo vā etā maha āpo veda parjanyam adhipatim | mahasvī mitrabāho bhavaty utainena svā nandanty asmākam ayam iti tasmāt sarvo vṛṣṭe mahīyate 'dhipatiḥ (…) ||see 1e

atimanyā vai nāmaitā āpo yat surā tasām aśvinādhipatī | yo vā etā atimanyā āpo vedāśvinādhipatī | ati manyate bhrātṛvyān nainaṃ bhrātṛvyā ati manyante tasmān matto mattam ati manyate 'dhipatiḥ (…) ||see 1e
paricito vai nāmaitā āpo yāḥ karṣvāṃ tāsāṃ yamo 'dhipatiḥ | yo vā etāḥ paricita āpo veda yamam adhipatim | pary enaṃ svāś ca viśyāś cāvaśyanty adhipatiḥ (…) ||see 1e
rantayo vai nāmaitā āpo ya striyas tāsāṃ kāmo 'dhipatiḥ | yo vā etā rantīr āpo veda kāmam adhipatim | ramante asmin ramaṇīyo bhavati kāma iva strīṇām adhipatiḥ (…) ||see 1e

viśvabhṛto vai nāmaitā āpo yat puruṣas tāsāṃ mṛtyur adhipatiḥ | yo vā etā viśvabhṛta āpo veda mṛtyum adhipatim | viśvasya bhartā bhavati viśvam enaṃ bibharty āsya trayo 'gnayo gṛhe dhīyante dakṣiṇāgnir gārhapatya āhavanīyaḥ | ainaṃ catvāri vāmāni gacchanti niṣkaḥ kaṃso 'śvataro hasty adhipatiḥ (…) ||see 1e

tāsāṃvā etāsām apāṃ himavān ūdhaḥ somo vatsaḥ parameṣṭhy adhipatiḥ | yo vā etāsām apāṃ himavantam ūdhaḥ somaṃ vatsaṃ parameṣṭhinam adhipatiṃ veda | parameṣṭhī bhavatigacchatiparameṣṭhitām adhipatir bhavati svānāṃ cānyeṣāṃ ca ya evaṃ veda ||
agnis takmānam apa bādhatām itaḥ somo grāvā marutaḥ pūtadakṣāḥ | vedir barhiḥ samidhaḥ śośucānā apa rakṣāṃsy amuyā dhamantu ||
ayaṃ yo ruro abhiśocayiṣṇur viśvā rūpāṇi haritā kṛṇoti | tasmai te 'ruṇāya babhrave tapur maghāya namo 'stu takmane ||
takman sārthinam icchasva vaśī san mṛḍayāsi naḥ | athehi yatra te gṛhā aninūrtteṣu dasyuṣu ||
yaḥ puruṣaḥ pāruṣeyo 'vadhvaṃsa ivāruṇaḥ | takmānaṃ viśvadhāvīrya-Bhatt. -vīryā adhar- -adharāñcaṃ parā suva ||
adharāñcaṃ pra hiṇomi manas kṛtvā takmane | śakambharasya muṣṭihā punar gaccha mahāvṛṣān ||
mahāvṛṣān mūjavata oka edhi paretya | vratāni takmane brūmo anyakṣetrāṇi vā imāḥ ||
oko asya mūjavanta oko asya mahāvṛṣāḥ | yāj jātas takmaṃ tād asi balihikeṣunyocaraḥ||
takmanvyāla vigada vyaṅga bhūri yāvaya | dāsīṃ niṣṭakvarīm iccha tāṃ vajreṇa sam arpaya ||
giriṃ gaccha girijāsi girau te māhiṣo gṛhaḥ | dāsīm iccha prapharvyaṃ tāṃ takman vīva dhūnuhi ||
yas tvaṃśītoatho rūraḥ sahakāsāvīviyaḥ| bhimās te takman hetayas tābhismapari vṛṅdhi naḥ ||
takman bhrātrā balāsena svasrā kāsikayā saha | pāmnā bhrātṛvyeṇa naśyetomaraṭāṅabhi ||
gandhāribhyo mūjavadbhyaḥ kāśibhyo magadhebhyaḥ | jane priyam iva śevadhiṃ takmānaṃ pari dadhmasi ||
nārkavindān nārvidālān nānnadīṃ vartakāvatīm | vratāni takmane brūmo anyakṣetrāṇi vā imāḥ ||
anyakṣetre na ramate sahasrākṣo amartyaḥ | abhūd u prārthas takmā sa gamiṣyati balihikām ||
adogacchamūjavatas tato vā gha parastaram | mā smāto abhyair naḥ punas tat tvā takmann upa bruve ||
parasmaiva tvaṃ cara paramasyāṃ parāvati | yathā no nāntam āyasi yathā no nābhiśocayā ||
yatheyam urvī pṛthivī vṛddhaiva garbham ādadhe | evā dadhāmi te garbhaṃ tasmai tvām avase huve ||
parvatād divo yoner gātrād gātrāt samāśṛtam | reto devasya devasya tsarau parṇam ivā dhām ||tsaru Mehendale, Henning Mem. Vol.
viṣṇur yoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rupāṇi piṃśatu | ā siñcatu prajāpatir dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te ||
garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvāli garbhaṃ dhehisarasvati| garbhaṃ yuvam aśvināsyāmā dhattaṃ puṣkarasrajā ||
garbhaṃ te rājā varuṇo garbhaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ | garbhaṃ ta indraś cāgniś ca garbhaṃ dhātā dadhātu te ||
garbho asy oṣadhīnāṃ garbho vanaspatīnām | garbho viśvasya bhūtasya so agne garbham ehadhāḥ||
yenauṣadhayo garbhinīḥ paśavo yena garbhinaḥ | teṣāṃ garbhasya yo garbhas tena tvaṃ garbhiṇī bhava ||
vi te granthiṃ cṛtāmasi dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te | ā yoniṃ putro rohatu jananaṃ prati jāyatām ||
janiṣṭa hi mahiyā ā yoniṃ sam ihāsarat | athā soma iva bhakṣaṇam ā garbhaḥ sīdatv ṛtviyam ||
dhātaḥ śreṣṭhena rūpeṇa- -asyā nāryā gavīnyoḥ | pumāṃsaṃ putram ā dhehi daśame māsi sūtave ||
savitaḥ śreṣṭhena rūpeṇa (…) ||see 12.3.10bcd
viṣṇoḥ śreṣṭhena (…) ||see 12.3.10
tvaṣṭaḥ śreṣṭhena (…) ||see 12.3.10
bhagaḥ śreṣṭhena rūpeṇa- -asyā nāryā gavīnyoḥ | pumāṃsaṃ putram ā dhehi daśame māsi sūtave ||
adhi skanda vīrayasva garbham ā dhehi yonyām | vṛṣāṇaṃ vṛṣṇyāvantaṃ prajāyai tvā nayāmasi ||
yad veda rājā varuṇo veda devo bṛhaspatiḥ | indro yad vṛtrahā veda taṃ garbhakaraṇaṃ piba ||
vi jihīṣva bārhatsāme garbhas te yonim ā śayām | dadan te putraṃ devāḥ somapām ubhayāvinam ||
somasya tva rtviyena- -upaimi garbhakṛtvane | tatas te putro jāyatāṃ kartavai vīryebhyaḥ ||
jāyasvāgne 'śvatthād asmai kṣatrāyaujase | ugra āpatikādadhi yo vṛkṣām̐ adhirohati ||Bhatt. vṛkṣāṃ
vibādhaṃ cit sahamānaṃ tvām agne janayāmasi | jātāṃ janiṣyamāṇāṃ sapatnān pra ṇudasva me ||
aśvatthasyārohasya vṛkṣasyāraṇayaḥ kṛtāḥ | tato jātāya te 'jani vīḍujambhāgnir agnaye ||
taṃ jātaṃ jātavedasam ā dadhāmy amartyam | pāvakam agnim ūtaye śucimantaṃ viṣāsahim ||
ut tanuṣva dhanuḥ prati muñcasva varma jahi śatrūn vīryā te kṛṇomi | atra radhyantu ya u te sapatnās tvam ekavṛṣo bhava ||
vṛṣabhaṃ tvā sajātānāṃ sapatnānāṃ viṣāsahim | hantāraṃ śatrūṇāṃ kṛṇmo virājaṃ gopatiṃ gavām ||
samudro 'sy apāṃ jyeṣṭha indro deveṣu vṛtrahā | vyāghraṃ siṃhaṃ tvā kṛṇmo damitāraṃ pṛtanyatām ||
indra iva dasyūn adharān kṛṇuṣva- -ugra iva vāto viśṛṇan sapatnān | te śuṣyantv apa dāvād iva- -agneḥ paryavīvarathā enān ||
saṃ vṛścaināṃs te śuṣyantu vṛścainān mopajāṃ śiṣaḥ | sapatnān sarvāṃs tṛḍhvā tvam ekavṛṣo bhava ||
tvam ugras tvaṃ balī tvam edhi vivācanam | tvaṃpṛtanyataḥpūrvaḥ sapatnām̐ ava dūnuṣva ||Bhatt. sapatnāṃ
asapatnaḥ sapatnahā- -indra ivāriṣṭo akṣitaḥ | adhaḥ sapatnās te padoḥ sarve santvabhiṣṭhitāḥ||
mlāyantu te khātamūlāḥ sapatnā agnim eṣāṃ nir hvayāmi śarīrāt | haviṣaiṣām api dadhāmi prāṇāṃs tathaibhyo amuciḥ kṛtāḥ ||
abhivardham abhibhavaṃ sapatnakṣayaṇaṃ haviḥ | rāṣṭrāya tubhyaṃ kṛṇmaḥ sapatnebhyaḥ parābhavan ||
yo naḥ svo yo araṇo 'rātiyati pūruṣaḥ | idhmasyeva prakṣāyakas tasya moccheṣi kiṃ cana ||
asapatnam iti dve ||PS 10.8.4-5 are repeated
(…) ||PS 10.8.5 is repeated
tvayā pūrvam ātharvāṇo jaghnū rakṣāṃsy oṣadhe | tvayā jaghāna kaśyapas tvayā kṛṇvo agastyaḥ ||
tvayā vayam apsaraso gandharvāṃś cātayāmasi | ajaśṛṅgy aja rakṣaḥ sarvān gandhena nāśaya ||
nadīṃ yantv apsaraso apāntāram iva śvasan | gulgulū pīlā nalady aukṣagandhiḥ pramandinī ||
yatrāmartyā apsv antaḥ samudre turūr nīlī turvaśī puṇḍarīkā | tat paretā apsarasaḥ pratibuddhā abhūtana ||
yatra preṅkho gandharvāṇāṃ divi baddho hiraṇyayaḥ | (…) ||see 4cd
gandharvāṇām apsarasām ānartam iti saṅgamam | (…) ||see 4cd
yatrāśvatthā nyagrodhā mahārukmāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ | (…) ||see 4cd
yatra vo 'kṣā haritā arjunā āghāṭāḥ kakaryaḥ saṃvadanti | tat paretā apsarasaḥ pratibuddhā abhūtana ||
iyaṃvīrucchikhaṇḍino gandharvasyāpsarāpateḥ | bhinattu muṣkāv api yātu śephaḥ ||
eyam agann oṣadhir vīrudhāṃ vīryāvatī | ajaśṛṅgy arāṭakī tīkṣṇaśṛṅgī vyṛṣatu||
apeteto apsaraso gandharvā yatra vo gṛhāḥ | tīkṣṇaśṛṅgy arāṭaky ajaśṛṅgī vyṛṣatu||
jāyā veda vo apsaraso gandharvāḥ patayo yūyam | apa krāmat puruṣād amartyā martyaṃ mā sacadhvam ||
bhīmā indrasya hetayaḥ śatamṛṣṭīr ayasmai | tābhir gandharvān abhaidyān avakādān vyṛṣatu||
avakādām̐ abhiśoco bhitsu dyotayamāmakān | gandharvān sarvān oṣadhe pra ṇudasva parā ṇaya ||
unmādayantīr abhiśocayantīr muniṃ nagnaṃ kṛṇvatīr moghahāsinam | apsaraso raghaṭo yāś caranti gandharvapatnīr ajaśṛṅgy āśaye ||
śvetīkṛṇvānaḥ puruṣaṃ viśvā rūpāṇibobhuvat| śvevaikaṃ kapir ivaikaṃ kumāraḥ sarvakeśakaḥ | priyo dṛśe bhūtvā gandharvaḥ sacate striyaṃ tam ito nāśayāmasi ||
yo vai vaśāṃ devayate pacate vāhutāmamā | mṛtyoḥ sa badhyate pāśe devānāṃ ca yamasya ca ||
dakṣiṇāṃ sūryām aditiṃ vadanti vaśāṃ vācaṃ kalpayantaḥ samānīm | sapta ṛṣayo ni dadhur vācam etāṃ sarasvatī mṛḍayā kalpayantaḥ ||
imāṃ vaśāṃ vācam āhur vaśeti tisro vaśā atihitāḥ sadhasthe | tāsām agnau manasaikāṃ juhomi tāṃnaḥ svādvīṃ bhūtapatiḥ kṛṇotu ||
svadvīṃ na etāṃ savitā kṛṇotu svadvīṃ na etāṃ janitā paśūnām | juhudhy agne vayunāni vidvāṃs tāṃ naḥ svādvīṃ bhūtapatiḥ kṛṇotu ||
idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vaśinī vaśāśi mahimne tvā garbho abhy ā viveśa | uśatī tvam uśato gaccha devān satyāḥsantu yajamānasya kāmāḥ ||
iyam ambhasā vājasutastabhe gaur yasyām indro varuṇastitviṣāte| nṛmṇam anṛmṇaṃ sacata iyamāgan dhīraḥ paśur vīryam ā viveśa ||
vaśāsasūvasthaviraṃ vipaścitaṃ vaśāsasūvavaṣkayaṃ divispṛśan | vaśāsasūvataruṇaṃ vibhājane vaśāsasūvasaṃjitaṃ dhanānām ||
yat prokṣaṇam apatad barhiṣas pari dakṣiṇato vedyā indriyāvat | vaśā saṃbhūtyādhi gaur amīmet tasyāḥ pīvo abhavad varmavāsasam ||
namo mahimna uta cakṣuṣe vāṃ vaśarṣabho manasā tat kṛṇomi | devām̐ apītaṃ pathibhiḥ śivebhir mā no hiṃsiṣṭaṃ harasā daivyena ||
vaśām askandad ṛṣabhas tiṣṭhantīm adhi tantuṣu | garbhaṃ tam adya ko veda yatidhā so akalpayat ||
rūpam ekaḥ pary abhavad rājā nāmaika ucyate | patīrūpasyaiko rūpaṃ rūpam ekaḥ sukṛtvanām ||
prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī mṛtyur viśvānaraḥ svaḥ | sarasvānasyā yajñasya vaśāyā adhi jajñire ||
yasya gṛha ādāyeta vaśā devakṛtaṃ haviḥ | nidhānam asyā eṣyaṃ duhitre patyām iva ||
nāsyāḥ sakṛd abhi tiṣṭhen nāsya śloṇā gṛhe syāt | vaśā kanyeva durmaṅkā- -apacityā vijānatā ||
naināṃ rakṣed brāhmaṇebhyo nāmā vi glāpayāti ca | yatīṃ napratyāvartayed yasya goṣu vaśā syāt ||
nāsyā vaśām ā rundhed devā manuṣyā uta | vaśaṃ yadanvaidbrahmaṇā tasmād eṣābhavad vaśā ||
vaśaṃ kṛṇvānā vaśinīyam āgan padaṃ kalyāṇy avapaśyamānā | aniṣṭyeṣṭim abhijāyamānā yajñasya mātrām abhikalpamānā ||
indravantas te marutas turīyaṃ bhejire vaśe | turīyam ādityā rudrās turīyaṃ vasavo vaśe ||
turīya bhāja ādityān vaśāyāḥ kavayo viduḥ | athāsyāḥ pathyaikā tanuś catasraś cakl̥pe diśaḥ ||
vaśā panthām anv apaśyan nākapṛṣṭhaṃ svarvidām | ādityāenāmanv āyann ṛṣayaś ca tapasvinaḥ ||
padepade kalpayanta ādityāṅgiraso yajuḥ | īḍānāanv āyan vaśān tadaiḍaṃ sāmocyate ||
vaśeḍā vaśānumatir vaśām āhuḥ sarasvatīm | virājaṃ manyante vaśāṃ vāg vaśā pṛthivī vaśā ||
vaśā deṣṭrī sinīvālī vaśoṣā nirṛtir vaśā | vaśāyāṃ mṛtyum aviśad ā mṛtyum aviśad vaśā ||
agnir vāg udakaṃ cakṣur mano vāto vaśī vaśā | tanvaṃ ko asyās taṃ veda yayodakrāmad ekayā ||
yāṃ cakṣuṣā manasā saṃvidānā hṛdā paśyanti kavayo manīṣinaḥ | tasyāḥ prajādhipatiḥ paśūnāṃ vaśā rājñā nāṃtaveṣā sṛṣṭiḥ ||
ko vaśāyā ūdho veda ka ulbaṃ ca jarāyu ca | stanān asyāḥ ko veda ka i tad veda yad duhe ||
aham asyā ūdho veda- -aham ulbaṃ ca jarāyu ca | stanān asyā ahaṃ veda- -atho tad veda yad duhe ||
nainām̐ ahaṃ rakṣeyaṃBhatt. naināṃ dadyām eva syāc ca me | stanā hy asyā ahaṃ veda kṣīram ulbaṃ ca jarāyu ca ||
kṛttir yonir adhivāso jarāyu pāṇḍamulbaṃnābhir uṣṇīṣam asyāḥ | ā jarasaṃ dhayatu mātaraṃ vaśī brahmabhiḥ kl̥ptaḥ sa hy asya bandhuḥ ||
indrasya nu vīryāṇi pra vocaṃ yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī | ahann ahim anv apas tatarda pra vakṣaṇā abhinat parvatānām ||
ahannahiṃ parvate śiśriyāṇaṃ tvaṣṭāsmai vajraṃ svaryaṃtatakṣa| vāśrā iva dhenavaḥ syandamānā añjaḥ samudram ava jagmur āpaḥ ||
vṛṣāyamāṇo 'vṛṇīta somaṃ trikadrukeṣv apibat sutasya | ā sāyakaṃ maghavādatta vajram ahannenaṃ prathamajām ahīnam ||
yad indrāhan prathamajām ahīnām ān māyinām amināḥ prota māyāḥ | āt sūryaṃ janayan dyām uṣāsaṃ tādītnā śatruṃ na kilā vivitse ||
ahan vṛtraṃ vṛtrataraṃ vyaṃsam indro vajreṇa mahatā vadhena | skadhāṃsīva kuliśenā vivṛkṇā- -ahiḥ śayad upapṛk pṛthivyāḥ ||
ayoddheva durmada ā hi juhve mahāvīraṃ tu vibādham ṛjīṣam | nātārīd asya samṛtiṃvadhānāṃ saṃ rujānāḥ pipiṣa indraśatruḥ ||
apād ahastoapṛtanyadindram āsya vajram adhi sānau jaghāna | vṛṣṇo vadhriḥ pratimānaṃ babhūṣan purutrā vṛtro aśayad vyastaḥ ||
nadaṃ na bhinnam amuyā śayānaṃ mano ruhāṇā ati yanty āpaḥ | yāś cid vṛtro mahinā paryatiṣṭhat tāsām ahiḥ patsutaḥśīr babhūva ||
nicāvayā abhavad vṛtraputra- -indro asyā ava vadhar jabhāra | uttarā sūr adharaḥ putra āsīd dānuḥ śaye sahavatsā na dhenuḥ ||
atiṣṭhantīnām aniveśanānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ madhye nihitaṃ śarīram | vṛkasya niṇyaṃ vi caranty āpo dīrghaṃ tama āśayad indraśatruḥ ||
dāsapatnīr ahigopā atiṣṭhan niruddhā āpaḥ paṇineva gāvaḥ | apāṃ bilam apihitaṃ yad āsīd vṛtraṃ jaghanvām̐ apa tad vavāra ||
aśvyovāro abhavas tad indra sṛke yat tvāpratyahandeva ekaḥ | ajayo gā ajayaḥ śūra somam avāsṛjaḥ sartave sapta sindhūn ||
nāsmai vidyun na tanyatuḥśiṣedha na yāmyaham akiraddhrāduniṃca indraś ca yad yuyudhāte ahiś ca- -utāparībhyo maghavā vi jigye ||
aher yātāraṃ kam apaśya indra hṛdi yat te jaghnuṣo bhīr agacchat | nava cayannavatiṃ ca sravantīḥ śyeno na bhīto ataro rajāṃsi ||
indroyāto'vasitasya rājā śamasyaca śṛṅgiṇo vajrabāhuḥ | sed u rājā kṣayati carṣaṇīṇām arān na nemiḥ pari tā babhūva ||
yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān devo devān kratunā paryabhūṣat | yasya śuṣmād rodasī abhyasetāṃ nṛmṇasya mahnā sa janāsa indraḥ ||
yaḥ pṛthivīṃ vyadhamānām adṛṃhad yaḥ parvatān prakupitām̐ aramṇāt | yo antarikṣaṃ vimame varīyo yo dyām astabhnāt sa (janāsa indraḥ) ||
yo hatvāhim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn yo gāudājadapadhā valasya | yo aśmanor antar agniṃ jajāna saṃvṛk samatsu sa (janāsa indraḥ) ||
yenemā viśvā cyavanā kṛtāni yo dāsaṃ varṇam adharaṃ guhākaḥ | śvaghnīva yojigīvām̐llakṣam ādad aryaḥ puṣṭāni sa (…) ||
yaṃ smā pṛcchanti kuha seti ghoram utem āhur naiṣo astīty enam | so aryaḥ puṣṭīr vija ivā mināti śradasmai dhatta sa (…) ||
yo radhrasya coditā yaḥ kṛśasya yo brahmaṇo nādhamānasya kīreḥ | yuktagrāvṇo yo 'vitā suśipraḥ sutasomasya sa (…) ||
yasyāśvāsaḥ pradiśi yasya gāvo yasya grāmā yasya viśve rathāsaḥ | yaḥ sūryaṃ ya uṣasaṃ jajāna yo apāṃ netā sa (…) ||
yaṃ krandasī saṃyatī vihvayate pare 'vara ubhayā amitrāḥ | samānaṃ cid ratham ātasthivāṃsā nānā havete sa (…) ||
yasmān na rte vijayante janāso yaṃ yudhyamānā avase havante | yo viśvasya pratimānaṃ babhūva yo acyutacyut sa (…) ||
yaḥ śaśvato mahy eno dadhānān abudhyamānān sarvā jaghāna | yaḥśardhatenānudadāti śṛdhyāṃ yo dasyor hantā sa (…) ||
yaḥ śambaraṃ parvateṣu kṣiyantaṃ catvāriṃśyāṃśarady anvavindat | ojāyamānaṃ yo ahiṃ jaghāna dānuṃ śayānaṃ sa (…) ||
yaḥ śambaraṃ paryacarac chaśībir yo vā vṛkasya nāpibat sutam | antar girau yajamānaṃ bahuṃ janaṃ yas taṃ nāsūrukṣu sa (…) ||
yaḥ saptaraśmir vṛṣabhas tuviṣmān avāsṛjat sartave sapta sindhūn | yo rauhiṇam asphurad vajrabāhur dyām ārohantaṃ sa (…) ||
dyāvā cid asmai pṛthivī namete śuṣmāc cid asya parvatā bhayante | yaḥ somapā nicito vajrabāhur yo vajrahastaḥ sa (…) ||
yaḥ sunvantam avati yaḥ pacantaṃ yaḥ śaṃsantaṃ yaḥ śaśamānam ūtī | yasya brahma vardhanaṃ yasya somo yasyedaṃ rādhaḥ sa janāsa indraḥ ||
yaḥ sunvate pacate dudhra ā cid vājaṃ dadarṣi sa kilāsi satyaḥ | vayaṃta indra viśvaha priyāsaḥ suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema ||
jāto vyakhyat pitror upasthe bhuvo na veda janituḥ parasya | taviṣyamāṇo nv ojo akhyad vratā devānāṃ sa janāsa indraḥ ||
yaḥ somakāmo haryaśva āsu yasmād rejante bhuvanāni viśvā | yo jaghāna śambaraṃ yaś ca śuṣṇaṃ ya ekavīraḥ sa janāsa indraḥ ||
śaṃna indrāgnī bhavatām avobhiḥ śaṃ na indrāvaruṇā rātahavyā | śam indrāsomā sa vitāya śaṃ yoḥ śaṃ na indrāpūṣaṇā vājasātau ||
śaṃno bhagaḥ śam u naḥ śaṃso astu śaṃ naḥ purundhiḥ śam u santu rāyaḥ | śaṃnaḥ satyasya sūyamasya śaṃsaḥ śaṃ no aryamā purujāto astu ||
śaṃ no dhātā śam u dhartā no astu śaṃ na urūcī bhavatu svadhābhiḥ | śaṃ rodasī bṛhatī śaṃ no adriḥ śaṃ no devānāṃ suhavāni santu ||
śaṃ no agnir jyotiranīko astu śaṃ mitrāvaruṇāv aśvinā śam | śaṃ naḥ sukṛtāṃ sukṛtāni santu śaṃ na iṣiro abhi vātu vātaḥ ||
śaṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvahūtau śam antarikṣaṃ dṛśaye no astu | śaṃ na oṣadhīr vanino bhavantu śaṃ no rajasaḥ patir astu jiṣṇuḥ ||
śaṃ na indro vasubhir devo astu śam ādityebhir varuṇaḥ suśaṃsaḥ | śaṃ no rudro rudrebhir jalāṣaḥ śaṃ nas tvaṣṭā gnābhir iha śṛṇotu ||
śaṃ naḥ somo bhavatu brahma śaṃ naḥ śaṃ no grāvāṇaḥ śam u santu yajñāḥ | śaṃ naḥ svarūṇāṃ mitayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ prasvaḥ śam v astu vediḥ ||
śaṃ naḥ sūrya urucakṣā ud etu śaṃ no bhavantu pradiśaś catasraḥ | śaṃ naḥ parvatā dhruvayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ sindhavaḥ śam u santv āpaḥ ||
śaṃ no aditir bhavatu vratebhiḥ śaṃ no bhavantu marutaḥ svarkāḥ | śaṃ no viṣṇuḥ śam u pūṣā no astu śaṃ no bhavitraṃ śam v astu vāyuḥ ||
śaṃ no devaḥ savitā trāyamānaḥ śaṃ no bhavantūṣaso vibhātīḥ | śaṃ naḥ parjanyo bhavatu prajābhyaḥ śaṃ naḥ kṣetrasya patir astu śambhuḥ ||
śaṃ naḥ satyasya patayo bhavantu śaṃ no arvantaḥ śam u santu gāvaḥ | śaṃna ṛbhavaḥ sukṛtaḥ suhastāḥ śaṃ no bhavantu pitaro haveṣu ||
śaṃno devā viśvadevā bhavantu śaṃ sarasvatī saha dhībhir astu | śam abhiṣācaḥ śam u rātiṣācaḥ śaṃno divyāḥ pārthivāḥ śaṃ no apyāḥ ||
śaṃno aja ekapād devo astu śam ahir budhnyaḥ śaṃ samudraḥ | śaṃ noapāṃnāpat perur astu śaṃ naḥ pṛśnir bhavatu devagopāḥ ||
ādityā rudrā vasavo juṣantām idaṃ brahma kriyamāṇaṃnavīyaḥ| śṛṇvantu no divyāḥ pārthivāso gojātā uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ ||
ye devānām ṛtvijo yajñiyāso manor yajatrā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ | te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
tad astu mitrāvaruṇā tad agne śaṃ yor asmabhyam idam astu śastam | aśīmahi gātum uta pratiṣṭhāṃ namo dive bṛhate sādanāya ||
agnāv agniś carati praviṣṭa ṛṣīṇāṃ putro adhirāja eṣaḥ | tasmai juhomi haviṣā ghṛtena mā devānāṃ yūyavad bhāgadheyam ||
yukto vaha jātavedaḥ purastād agne viddhi kriyamāṇaṃ yathedam | tvaṃ bhiṣag bheṣajasyāpi kartā tvayā gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ sanema ||
tathā tvam agne kṛṇu jātavedo 'nena vidvān haviṣā yaviṣṭha | piśāco asya yatamo jaghāsa yathā so asya paridhiṣ patāti ||
yo 'sya dideva yatamo jaghāsa yathā so asya paridhiṣ patāti | tathā tvam agne kṛṇu jātavedo viśvebhir devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ ||
akṣyau ni vidhya hṛdayaṃ ni vidhya jihvāṃ nitṛndhipra dataḥ śṛṇīhi | piśāco asya yatamo jaghāsa- -agne yaviṣṭha prati taṃ śṛṇīhi ||
yad asya hṛtaṃ vihṛtaṃ yat parābhṛtam ātmano jagdham uta yat piśācaiḥ | tad agne vidvān punar ā bhara tvaṃ śarīre prāṇam asum erayāsya ||
apāṃ tvā pāne yatamo dadambha- -odane manthe yadi vota lehe | tad ātmanā prajayā piśācā vi yātayantām agado 'yam astu ||
kṣīre tvā māṃse yatamo dadambha- -akṛṣṭapacye aśane dhānye yaḥ | tad ātmanā prajayā piśācā vi yātayantām agado 'yam astu ||
āme supakve śabale vipakve ya imaṃ piśāco aśane dadambha | tam indro vājī vajreṇa hantu bhinattu somaḥ śiro asya dhṛṣṇuḥ ||
divā tvā naktaṃ yatamo dadambha kravyād yātuḥ śayane piśācaḥ | tad agne vidvān pra daha kṣiṇīhy apy enaṃ dhehi nirṛter upasthe ||
somasyendrasya varuṇasya rājño viṣṇor balena savituḥ savena | agner hotreṇa pra ṇude piśācān yaviṣṭhasya brahmaṇā jātavedasaḥ ||
kravyādam agne rudhiraṃ piśācaṃ manohanaṃ jahi jātavedaḥ sahobhiḥ | śraddhemaṃ brahma juṣatāṃ dakṣiṇāyur yathā jīvāty agado bhavāti ||
punas tvā prāṇaḥ punar aitv āyuḥ punaś cakṣuḥ punar aitu śrotram | apaghnā no duritāni viśvā śataṃ himāḥ sarvavīrā madema ||
punar asmai mano dhehi punar āyuḥ punar balam | apānām asya prāṇaṃ ca- -agne vardhaya jīvase ||
cakṣuḥ sūrya punar dehi vāta prāṇaṃ sam īraya | śarīram asya māṃsāny agne saṃ bhārayā tvam ||
sam ā bhara jātavedo yaj jagdhaṃ yat parābhṛtam | gātrāṇy asya kalpaya punar ā pyāyatām ayam ||
somasyeva jātavedo aṃśur ā pyāyatām ayam | agne virapsinaṃ medhyam ayakṣmaṃ kṛṇu jīvase ||
saṃ mā siñcantu maruta ity ekā ||
vi muñcāmi brahmaṇā jātavedasam agniṃ hotāram ajaraṃ rathaspṛtam | sarvā devānāṃ janimāni vidvān yathābhāgaṃ vahatu havyam agniḥ ||
ye pumāṃso yātudhāna yā striyo yātudhānyaḥ | balavad indrasya vajreṇa- -avācīnān ava hanmi tān ||
yaṃ śapāmo ya u naḥ śapāti yaṃ dviṣmo ya u dveṣat piśācaḥ | kravyādam agne mahatā vadhena tam atrāpi pra daha jātavedaḥ ||
ya ārebhe yasya vā ghāsy apsarā yaḥ kṛṇvena saṃvido yātumāvān | ulūkayātuṃ bhṛmalo yasya yātus tam (…) ||see 1d
ya ādade yasya vā ghāsi pitryā stena śvayātur utasaṃbhidhehibhiḥ| yaḥ patād rodhanasyādhidevanaṃ kravyāt piśācaḥ kraviṣas titṛpsan ulūkayātuṃ bhṛmalo yasya yātus tam (…) ||see 1d
yaḥ puruṣeṇeyate rathena kravyād yātuḥ piśunaḥ piśācaḥ | vaiśvānareṇa sayujā sūryeṇa tam (…) ||see 1d
yo no valiṃ mṛgayāṃ yaś ca naḥ kṛṣiṃ paritiṣṭhād yātubhir yaś ca naḥ śapāt | astā rudraḥśrathatvāyur asya tam (…) ||see 1d
mā yātumānvidatamṛḍitāram alokā asmai pradiśo bhavantu | sam enaṃ tapatāṃ rodasī ubhe tam atrāpi pra daha jatavedaḥ ||
jyotiṣmatīs tapanā yāś ca rocanā pratyoṣantīs tanvo yās te agne | tābhir me marmāṇy abhito dadasva mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā nṛcakṣaḥ ||
āpo devīḥ piśācānām apanahyantv āsyam | yathemaṃ mamātmānam anādhṛṣya punaḥ patān ||
sadaṃ puṣpe sadaṃ phale sadam indrābhirakṣite | sadā piśācā mriyantāṃ maiṣāmuccheṣi kaś cana
ye patanto yātudhānā divānaktam upācarān | rātrī mā tebhyo rakṣatv ahna ātmānaṃ pari dade ||
imaṃ badhnāmi te maṇiṃ dīrghāyutvāya tejase | darbhaṃ sapatnajambhanaṃ dviṣatas tapanaṃ hṛdaḥ ||
dviṣatas tāpayan hṛdaḥ śatrūṇāṃ tāpayan manaḥ | durhārdaḥ sarvāṃs tvaṃ darbha gharma ivābhīt sutāpayan ||
gharma ivābhitapan darbha dviṣato nitapan maṇe | hṛdaḥ sapatnānāṃ bhindhi- -indra iva virujaṃ valam ||
bhindhi darbha sapatnānāṃ hṛdayaṃ dviṣatāṃ maṇe | udyaṃ tvacam iva bhūmyāḥ śira eṣāṃ vi pātaya ||
bhindhi darbha sapatnān me bhindhi me pṛtanāyataḥ | bhindhi mesarvāndurhārdo bhindhi me dviṣato maṇe ||
chindhi darbha sapatnān me chindhi me pṛtanāyataḥ | chindhi me sarvāndurhārdaś chindhi me dviṣato maṇe ||
vṛśca darbha sapatnān me vṛśca me pṛtanāyataḥ | vṛśca me sarvān durhārdo vṛśca me (dviṣato maṇe) ||
kṛnta darbha sapatnān me kṛnta me pṛtanāyataḥ | kṛnta mesarvāndurhārdaḥ kṛnta me dviṣato maṇe ||
piṃśa darbha sapatnān me piṃśa me pṛtanāyataḥ | piṃśa mesarvāndurhārdaḥ piṃśa me dviṣato maṇe ||
vidhya darbha sapatnān me vidhya me pṛtanāyataḥ | vidhya me sarvān durhārdo vidhya me dviṣato maṇe ||
nikṣa darbha sapatnān me nikṣa me pṛtanāyataḥ | nikṣa me sarvān durhārdo nikṣa me dviṣato maṇe ||
tṛndhi darbha sapatnān me tṛndhi me pṛtanāyataḥ | tṛndhi me sarvān durhārdas tṛndhi me dviṣato maṇe ||
bhaṅdhi darbha sapatnān me bhaṅdhi me pṛtanāyataḥ | bhaṅdhi me sarvān durhārdo bhaṅdhi me dviṣato maṇe ||
mṛṇa darbha sapatnān me mṛṇa me pṛtanāyataḥ | mṛṇa me sarvān durhārdo mṛṇa me dviṣato maṇe ||
mantha darbha sapatnān me mantha me pṛtanāyataḥ | mantha me sarvān durhārdo mantha me dviṣato maṇe ||
piṇḍhi darbha sapatnān me piṇḍhi me pṛtanāyataḥ | piṇḍhi me sarvān durhārdaḥ piṇḍhi me dviṣato maṇe ||
oṣa darbha sapatnān menote sandhi -e o-; read ma? oṣa me pṛtanāyataḥ | oṣa me sarvān durhārda oṣa me dviṣato maṇe ||
daha darbha sapatnān me daha me pṛtanāyataḥ | daha me sarvān durhārdo daha me dviṣato maṇe ||
jahi darbha sapatnān me jahi me pṛtanāyataḥ | jahi me sarvān durhārdo jahi me dviṣato maṇe ||
yat te darbha jarāmṛtyū sa temarmasuvarma te | tenemaṃ varmiṇaṃ kṛtvā sapatnān jahi vīryaiḥ ||
śataṃ te darbha varmāṇi sahasraṃ vīryāṇi te | tam asmai viśve tvāṃ devā jarase bhartavā aduḥ ||
tvām āhur devavarma tvāṃ darbha brahmaṇaspatim | tvām indrasyāhur varma tvaṃ rāṣṭrāṇi rakṣasi ||
sapatnakṣayaṇaṃ darbhaṃ dviṣatas tapanaṃ hṛdaḥ | maṇiṃ kṣatrasya vardhanaṃ tanūpānaṃ kṛṇomi te ||
yat samudro abhyakrandat parjanyo vidyutā saha | tato hiraṇyayo bindus tato darbho ajāyata ||

hanmi te 'haṃ kṛtaṃ havir yo me ghoram acīkṛtaḥ |Bhatt. acīkl̥paḥ apāñcauta ubhau bāhū api nahyāmy āsyam ||

uditaḥ śatayojanam indro vartayate ratham | sāyakaṃkṣuravartmānamemend. Lubotsky ("having a sharp track", an epithet of Indra's vajra- = ratha-); Bhatt. kṣuravartamānam aher jātāni jambhayan ||
dṛḍhāsa āsann ahayo hatā udarasarpiṇaḥ | pucchamudveṣṭayantaḥ śvā piṇḍam adann iva ||
pāpaka pāparūpaka kiṃ me sakhāyam ātudaḥ | na mām apaśya āgataṃ satīnaṃ viṣadūṣaṇam ||
ahijambhāś carāmasi muṣkābarho gavām iva | pīlāupa svajaṃ hanma upa stambhe pṛdākvam ||
ye ke cedam upāsauṣur vātasyeva pṛthag yataḥ | aṅgo nu sarve brūta- -āheyam arasaṃ viṣam ||
triddhisi te niṣadanaṃread tṛṇḍmasi? tripuṣi pāpa te gṛhaḥ | acchinnaṃ tvā vātohanty acchinnam abhi varṣati ||
nākulena bheṣajena tenāhīn jambhayāmasi | māṃścaturnāma vṛkṣakaḥ sa enān arasān akaḥ ||
asitāhe 'rasaṃ viṣam ubhayoḥ sitasya ca |Lopez svajasya abhikrandasya yā ropīs tā ito 'pa nayāmasi ||
idaṃ paidvoajāyata- -idam asya vivartanam | idaṃ kanikrado mṛgo viṣam eti parābhavam ||
viṣūcīnā vātā vāntu viṣvag varṣantu vṛṣṭayaḥ | viṣvag viṣaṃ pra meha tvaṃ śatadhāra ivāvaṭaḥ ||
nir ito haritasrajam indro vartayate ratham | tenāpi lihna īyate nipiṃṣann ahināmnaḥ ||
yenendra dasyūn amṛṇor yena vṛtraṃ parābhinaḥ | tenā śatakrato tvam aher jātāni jambhaya ||
praty amodata pṛthivī prati dyauḥ prati sūryaḥ | paidvo yad aśvamātā krandenāhīn apāvapat ||
yadā paidvo 'śvamātā krandenāhīn apāvapat | rajjū ṣmadatvatīḥśere pūyantīḥpṛthivīm anu ||

sadyo jāto 'kanikradat solbo vy adhūnuta | krandenāśvasya vājino 'hanyantāhayaḥ pṛthak ||
imaṃ stomam arhate jātavedase ratham iva saṃ mahemā manīṣayā | bhadrā hi naḥ pramatir asya saṃ sady agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava ||
yasmai tvam āyajase sa sādhaty anarvā kṣeti dadhate suvīryam | sa tūtāva nainam aśnoty aṃhatir agne (…) ||see 1d
bharāmedhmaṃ kṛṇavāmā havīṃṣi te citayantaḥ parvaṇā parvaṇā vayam | jīvātave prataraṃ sādhayā dhiyo 'gne (…) ||see 1d
śakema tvā samidhaṃ sādhayā dhiyas tve devā havir adanty āhutam | tvam ādityām̐ ā vaha tān hy ūṣmasy agne (…) ||see 1d
tvam adhvaryur uta hotāsi pūrvyaḥ praśāstā potā januṣā purohitaḥ | viśvāvidvām̐ārtvijyā dhīra puṣyasy agne (…) ||see 1d
diśāṃ gopā asya caranti jantavo dvipāc ca yad uta catuṣpad aktubhiḥ | citraḥ praketa uṣaso mahām̐ asy agne (…) ||see 1d
yo viśvataḥ supratīkaḥ sadṛṅṅ asi dūre cit san taḍid ivāti rocase | rātryāś cid andho ati deva paśyasy agne (…) ||see 1d
pūrvo devā bhavatu sunvato ratho 'smākaṃ śaṃso abhy astu dūḍhyaḥ | tad ā jānītota puṣyatā vāco 'gne (…) ||see 1d
vadhair duḥśaṃsām̐ apa dūḍhyo jahi dūre vā ye anti vā ke cid atriṇaḥ | athā yajñāya gṛṇate sugaṃ kṛdhy agne (…) ||see 1d
yad ayukthā aruṣā rohitā rathe vātajūtā vṛṣabhasyeva te ravaḥ | ād invasi vanino dhūmaketunā- -agne (…) ||see 1d
adha svanād uta bibhyuḥ patatriṇo drapsā yat te yavasādo vy asthiran | sugaṃ tat te tāvakebhyo rathebhyo 'gne (…) ||see 13.5.1d
tvaṃ mitrasya varuṇasyadhāsy avayātāṃ marutāṃ heḍo adbhutaḥ | mṛḍā su no bhūtv eṣāṃ manaḥ punar agne (…) ||see 13.5.1d
devo devānām asi mitro adbhuto vasur vasūnām asi cārur adhvare | śarmant syāma tava saprathastame 'gne (…) ||see 13.5.1d
tat te bhadraṃ yat samiddhaḥ sve dame somāhuto jarase mṛḍayattamaḥ | dadhāsi ratnaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dāśuṣe 'gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava ||
yasmai tvaṃ sudraviṇodadāśo 'nāgās tvam adite sarvatātā | yaṃ bhadreṇa śavasā codayāsi prajāvanto rādhasā te syāma ||
sa tvam agne saubhagatvasya vidvān asmākam āyuḥ pra tireha deva | tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ ||
kim indrasya parihitaṃ kim agneḥ kiṃ viṣṇos tvaṣṭur varuṇasya vāsaḥ | bṛhaspater uta somasya rājñaḥ kiṃ vasānā maruto varṣayantu ||
dhātū rudrasya kiṃ vāyor vājināṃ vasanaṃ mahat | kiṃ pūṣā brahmaṇaspatir viśve devāś ca bibhrati ||
kiṃ devānāṃ paridhānaṃ samānaṃ yasminn eṣāṃ sāṃmanasyaṃ babhūva | kva rātrī niviśate kvāhaḥ kvedam abhraṃ bhavati yat sameti vyeti ca ||
katamenāpo divam udvahanti kaḥ samenodayanena netā | vātasya tvā vidyutāṃ stanayitnur apāṃpṛcchāmyayanāny agneḥ ||
pṛcchāmitvā pṛṣatīṃ rohiṇīṃ ca vatsaṃpṛcchāmisaha mātaraṃ tvā | indraṃ tvānupṛcchāmisākṣāt sabhānāṃ ca sabhāpatim ||
ko vayasām adadhān nāmāni kaḥ paśūnāṃ kaḥ sarpāṇāṃ devajanā ya āsan | ko 'sya jantor adadhād brūhi nas tat ||
kati rohāḥ svar ā rohayanti yebhī rohito divam āruroha | rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ kṣatrabhṛto vasubhṛto vasudānavo vasuyavaḥ ||
kaś caturdhā vi kramate mahitvā kaṃ rakṣanti kavayo 'pramādam | puruṣaṃ tvānupṛcchāmisākṣān mṛtyor aṅgāni kati tāni vettha ||
yaṃ siṣeva vṛṣabhaś carṣaṇīṇām indro vajram ahīnā spardhamānaḥ | yena vṛtraṃ maghavā saṃpipeśa taṃ naḥ pra brūhi yadi taṃ pravettha ||
kaḥ parvatānām adadhān nāmāni ko vanaspatīnām adadhād oṣadhīnām | pṛcchāmitvā bhuvanasya nābhiṃ gāṃ tvāpṛcchāmikatamāni sākṣāt ||
devatalpā devakośāḥ kveha tān naḥ pra brūhi yadi tān pravettha | pṛcchāmitvā garagiraḥ kiyanto yebhyo 'gnir havyaṃ vahati prajānan hutaṃ martyair amṛto martyebhyaḥ ||
svapne ya ekas tamasā sahaity aṅgāni gṛhṇan puruṣasya cakṣuḥ | sa prātar eti tamasā punaḥ sa hā jyotir eti kva sadadeti ||
vratapatim adhipatiṃ madhukṛtā madhupatim | devāṃs tvā sarvān pṛcchāmy ahutādaś ca te kati ||
ko 'ntarikṣāt pari paśyatīdaṃ yasmād agra indriyaṃ saṃbabhūva | mahat sa kasmād abhayaṃ bibhāya kasya yuktasyāsyā srakvāl lohitaṃ parāpatat tat kveha ||
ittham eke pravrajantīttham eke dakṣiṇāḥ pratyañca udañcaḥ prāñco 'bhivrajantyeke | teṣāṃ sarveṣām iha saṅgatiḥ sākaṃ sa eko bhūtaś carati prajānan ||

marīcir āsīt sā manasaḥ sam abhavat | sā pravīyata sā garbham adhatta | sa garbho 'vardhata sa vṛddho 'bravīj jāyā iti | tasyai prajāpatir ajuhot svadhiṣṭhānā ceti svadhicaraṇā ceti | prajāpatiḥsasṛjekapāle vijihīthāṃ mā mā saṃ tāptaṃ mahāntaṃ lokam abhipaśyamānesee Lopez 2010; Bhatt. prajāpate svasurjyo so 'jāyata tasya jātasya dyāvāpṛthivī pārśve āstāṃ samudrau kukṣī sūryācandramāsāv akṣī virāṭ śiraḥ | tasmāj jātāt sarve pāpmāno vijante sarve asmāt pāpmāno vijante ya evaṃ veda ||
endro bāhubhyām abharac cikitvān apo devīr varuṇāya prajānan | tam ādityā abhy aṣiñcanta sarve rājānam ugraṃ bṛhate raṇāya tā na āpo rājasūyā avantu ||

varuṇena preṣitā yanti śubhrā utsaṃ devīr dadhate yāhiraṇyayam| yā brahmaṇā punate saṃvidānās tāḥ (…) ||see 1e
apaḥ samudrād divam ud vahanti divas pṛthivīm abhi yāḥ sṛjanti | yābhir īśānā marutaś caranti tāḥ (…) ||see 1e
yā amṛtaṃ bibhrati yā madhu priyaṃ yāagṛbhṇanṛṣayo devasakhye | yābhir indram aty anayann arātīs tāḥ (…) ||see 1e
yā jīvadhanyā dhanam utpṛṇanti devāyate dāśuṣe martyāya | yāsāṃ payo akṣitam akṣitānāṃ tāḥ (…) ||see 1e
hiraṇyaupaśā dhvajanīḥ punānā yāḥ samudram abhyarcanti dhenavaḥ | yāḥ parjanyo vahaty antarikṣe tāḥ (…) ||see 14.1.1e
rathantare bṛhati gīyamāne kṣatraṃ jinvanti pra tiranty āyuḥ | yābhis trayān vājino vājayanti tāḥ (…) ||see 14.1.1e
yābhiḥ saha vṛtrahā somam indro vasor īśāno apibat sutasya | yāḥ sapta ṛṣayaḥ kavayaḥ punanti tāḥ (…) ||see 14.1.1e
sapta ṛṣayo bharatam abhy aṣiñcann āsmin rāṣṭram adadhur dakṣiṇāvat | prajāyai manum asumavanta devās tāḥ (…) ||see 14.1.1e
yābhir yajñaṃ prāñcamukṣayantidhīrā yābhiḥ somaṃ madhupṛcaṃ punanti | yābhir idaṃ jīvati viśvam ejat tāḥ (…) ||see 14.1.1e
yāsāṃ stokā madhumayā babhūvur ghṛtaṃ saṃjñānaṃ madhu pinvate yāḥ | yāḥ soma āpaḥ praṇayanti brahmaṇā tāḥ (…) ||see 14.1.1e
yāsāṃ pador ājyaṃ vājinaṃ tu somasya prasavam anu yāḥ pavante | antarvatīs taruṇavatsā ghṛtācīs tā na āpo rājasūyā avantu ||
ajījananta matayaḥ svarvida ā brahmaṇā sūktadheyāny aguḥ | asūṣuta rājasūyāḥ payāṃsi prāsāvīd devaḥ savitā bhuvanāni viśvā ||
somo rājā bhavo rājā paśupatiḥ paśūnāṃ varuṇo dhṛtavrataḥ | ye rājasūye asūyanta devās te te kṣatraṃ dadhatv āyur ojaḥ ||
āsthād ud asthād ajaniṣṭa vipro mṛdho vy āsthad aśasīta bāhū | āreavādhiṣṭanirṛtiṃ parācaiḥ samapṛkta raśmibhiḥ sūryaś ca ||
apaśyaṃ tvāvarohantaṃ divataḥ pṛthivīm iva | apaśyam asyantaṃ rudraṃ nīlagrīvaṃ śikhaṇḍinam ||
diva ugro 'vārukṣat praty aṣṭhād bhūmyām adhi | janāsaḥ paśyatemaṃ nīlagrīvaṃ vilohitam ||
eṣa aity avīrahā rudro jalāṣabheṣajī | vi te kṣepam anīnaśad vātīkāro vy etu te ||
namas te bhava bhāmāya namas te bhava manyave | namas te astu bāhūbhyām uto ta iṣave namaḥ ||
yām iṣaṃ giriśanta haste bibharṣy astave | śivāṃ giriśa tāṃ kṛṇu mā hiṃsīḥ puruṣān mama ||
śivena vacasā tvā giriśācchā vadāmasi | yathā naḥ sarvam ij jagad ayakṣmaṃ sumano asat ||
yā ta iṣuḥ śivatamā śivaṃ babhūva te dhanuḥ | śivā śaravyā yā tava tayā no mṛḍa jīvase ||
yā te rudra śivā tanūr aghorāpāpakāśinī | tayā nas tanvā śantamayā giriśantābhi cākaśa ||
asau yas tāmro aruṇa utababhrurvilohitaḥ | ye ceme abhito rudrā dikṣu śritāḥ sahasraśo 'vaiṣāṃ heḍa īmahe ||
adṛśaṃ tvāvarohantaṃ nīlagrīvaṃ vilohitam | uta tvā gopā adṛśann uta tvodāhāryaḥ | uto tvā viśvā bhūtāni tasmai dṛṣṭāya te namaḥ ||
namo 'stu nīlaśikhaṇḍāya sahasrākṣāya vājine | atho ye asya satvānas tebhyo 'ham akaraṃ namaḥ ||
namāṃsi ta āyudhāya- -anātatāya dhṛṣṇave | ubhābhyām akaraṃ namo bāhubhyāṃ tava dhanvane ||
pra muñca dhanvanas pary ubhayor ātnyor jyām | yāś ca te hasta iṣavaḥ parā tā bhagavo vapa ||
avatatya dhanus tvaṃ sahasrākṣa śateṣudhe | niśīrya śalyānāṃ mukhā śivo naḥ śambhur ā cara ||
vijyaṃ dhanuḥ śikhaṇḍino viśalyo bāṇavām̐ uta | aneśannasyeṣavaḥ śivo asya niṣaṅgatiḥ ||
pari te dhanvano hetir asmānvṛṇaktuviśvataḥ | atho ya iṣudhis tava- -āre asmin ni dhehi tam ||
yā te hetir mīḍhuṣṭama haste babhūva te dhanuḥ | tayā tvaṃ viśvato asmān ayakṣmayā pari bhuja ||
supārśvā kāmadughā na āgañ chataudanā payasā pinvamānā | ūrjaṃduhānāanapasphurantī yajamānasya pra tiranty āyuḥ ||
gṛbhṇāmi medhyām uśatīṃ svastaya ūrjasvatīm anamīvāṃ svādhyām | viśvo loko mama deveṣv astu śataudanāṃ śraddadhānaḥ pacāmi ||
badhāna devīm abhi dhehi muñjatīṃ śataudanāṃ kāmadughā hy eṣā | maināṃ hiṃsīr aśmanā jahṛṣāṇo 'py etudevām̐atigacchatidviṣaḥ ||
ā rabhasva brahmaṇā vaiśvadevīṃ śataudanāṃ śatapāpmāno asyāḥ | samarpayann aśmanā parvatena svargaṃ lokam adhi rohayainam ||
dhṛṣṇu hy enāṃ vikṛtā vikṛntann apaghnaṃś carmerayā saṃ sṛjainām | virājo duhiterayā samaktā kāmaṃ kāmaṃ yajamānāya duhām ||
yathāparu viśasannāti maṃsthāḥ kṛṇuṣvā me nāvadheyāni pṛthak | agan devān mānuṣī yā purābhūc chataudanā pururūpā suvarṇā ||
dvipāddvihastaḥ puruṣo mahādamo vanaspatiṃ bibharti sāyakāgram | tena parūṃṣi pravidvān aghnyāyāḥ śataudanāṃ devīṃ śatadhā vy asya ||
etaṃ bradhnaṃ carmaṇaḥ kṛnta sādhu tam u pramāya śatadhā vy asya | samut sṛjann avadhānāni sarvā rāyaspoṣaṃ yajamānāya dhehi ||
ṛcā kumbhīm adhy agnau śrayāmi bhūmyāṃ tvā bhūmim adhi dhārayāmi | apo māṃsaṃ bibhratī mā vyathiṣṭhā mā tvā vadhiṣur menibhiḥ piśācāḥ ||
ūrdhva prehi mā saṃ vikthā vy asya rajo antaram | rakṣāṃsi sarvā tīrtvā- -athā roha divaṃ tvam ||
divaṃ prehi śataudane sahasrasyāyanaṃ bhava | ayutaṃ prayutaṃ bhava- -akṣitir bhavatāt tvaṃ svargaṃ lokam āruhaḥ ||
śataudanāṃ śatadhā bhakṣayanti śataṃ rohān rohati yo dadāti | vāmadevyaṃ naudhasam asyāḥ pakṣau tṛtīye nāke adhi viṣṭapi śritā ||
śataudanāṃ śatadhā kalpamānā śataṃ rūpāṇi kṛṇute svaryatī | sā no devī suhavā śarmayacchatv atho mṛḍātīdṛśe ||
śataudanā dvādaśāhena saṃmitā śataṃ pṛṣṭhāni sasṛje svaryatī | sarvān yajñān pariyatī parastāt sā dātāraṃ rāyaspoṣe dadhātu ||
abhi prehi śataudana ījānānsomasatvanaḥ | yajñāṃs tvaṃ sarvānāptvā kāmaprasyāyanaṃ bhava ||
abhi prehi śataudane yajñenāyajvanas tara | ā devayūnarūruho yatrādas tridivaṃ divaḥ ||
īrāpadī prathamā śataudanā satyaṃ ha madhyam amṛtaṃ śiras tava | ubhe devī rodasī ā pṛṇāsi ||
ṛtaṃ ha śroṇī uta sakthau tanvā- -ojo ha bāhū uta tad balāya kam | anuṣṭhujaṭharam ād u pārśve sarvām̐llokāṃ chataudanā samāpa ||
cakṣuṣmatī prathamā śataudanā sūryo ha cakṣur uta candramās tava | viśvair devair ṛtubhiḥ saṃvidānā sā dātāraṃ tṛptyā tarpayāsi ||
śataṃ payāṃsi śatam asyā vatsāḥ śatadhā pakvāṃ vi bhajanty enām | sapta lokā divy ārpitā ye tāṃ jigetha prathamā śataudane ||
sahasreṇa śatamānā yad eṣi lokāṃ jigetha prathamā śataudane | sarvavedasam uta vājapeyaṃ sarvām̐l lokāṃ chataudanā samāpa ||
indraḥ papāta prathamaḥ śataudanāṃ sapta ṛṣibhyaḥ sumanasyamānaḥ | tayāsurāṇāṃ balam oja ā dade tayā ruroha viṣṭapo devalokān ||
viśvāmitro 'yaṃ jamadagnir atrir bharadvājo gotamo 'yaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ | idaṃ pakvaṃ kaśyapasaptamāḥ prāśnantu prathamāḥ śataudanām ||
jyotiṣmatī prathamā śataudanā trīṇi jyotīṃṣi kṛṇute svar yatī | tāṃ dātāra upa jīvanti yatra tatra devaiḥ sadhamādaṃ madanti ||
chandaḥpakṣā bṛhatī śataudanā trīṇicchandāṃsisasṛje svar yatī | ṛtūṇām adhirājaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ patim asyā vindan ||
atikramyāgniṣṭomam atirātraṃ śataudane | yajñāṃs tvaṃ sarvān āptvā cityam agniṃ vy aśnuhi ||
aśvamedhyam atikramya dvādaśāhaṃ śataudane | trirātraṃsāhnamāptvā vājapeyena kalpate ||
ye sahasrair ījānā agnihotrahutaś ca ye | yajñair ye sarvair ījānās tān āpnoti śataudanā ||Bhatt. tāna
śaṃ te parūṃṣi subhage dadhāmi śaṃ te māṃsāny attathā bhavanti | asthi yat te śamitā śaśāra tat te tvaṣṭā vihṛtaṃ niṣ kṛṇotu ||
ye yajñena jitā lokā yā nucchandāṃsibhejire | sarvāṃs tām̐l lokān āpnoti yo dadāti śataudanām ||
iṣirā yoṣā yuvatīrdamūnā rātrī devasya savitur bhagasya | aśvakṣatā suhavā saṃbhṛtaśrīr ā paprau dyāvāpṛthivī mahitvā ||
ava viśvāny aruhad gabhīrā- -udvarṣiṣṭham aruhadaśramiṣṭhā| uśatī rātry anu sānu bhadrād vi tiṣṭhate mitra iva svadhābhiḥ ||
narye vandye subhage sujāta ā cāgan rātri sumanā iha syām | asmāṃs trāyasva naryāṇi jātā- -aśvyā yāni gavyāni puṣṭā ||
siṃhasya rātry uśatī piśasya vyāghrasya dvīpino varca ā dade | aśvasya bradhnaṃ puruṣasya māyaṃ puru rūpāṇi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī ||
śivāṃ rātrim ahni sūryaṃ ca himasya mātā suhavā no astu | asya stomasya subhage ni bodha yena tvā vande viśvāsu dikṣu ||
stomasya no vibhāvari rātri rājeva joṣasai | asāma sarvavīrā bhavāma sarvavedaso vyucchantīr anūṣasaḥ ||
śamyā ha nāma dadhiṣe mama dipsanti ye dhanā | rātrīha tān asad apa-Lopez rātri hitānaḥsutalpā -atha steno na vidyate atha ripur na vidyate ||

bhadrāsi rātri camaso na piṣṭo viśvaṃ gorūpaṃ yuvatir bibharṣi | cakṣuṣmatī memṛśatīvapūṃṣimṛśatīwith Lopez; Bhatt. mṛṣatī prādityāndivyān rukmām̐ amukthāḥ ||Lopezprādityaṃdivyaṃrukmam; Bhatt. pradityāṃ divyāṃ rukmāṃ
yo adya stena āyaty aghāyur martyo ripuḥ | rātrī tasya pratītya pra grīvā pra śiro hanat ||
pra pādau na yathāyati pra hastau na yathāśiṣat | yo malimlar upāyati sa saṃpiṣṭo apāyati | apāyati sv apāyati śuṣke sthāṇāv apāyata ||
andhaṃ rātri tiṣṭhadhūmam aśīrṣāṇam ahiṃ kṛṇu | akṣau vṛkasya nir jahy ā stenaṃdrupadejahi ||
ye te rātry anaḍvāhas tīkṣṇaśṛṅgāḥ svāśavaḥ | tebhir no adya pāraya- -ati durgāṇi viśvahā ||
rātriṃ rātrim ariṣyantas tarema tanvā vayam | gambhīram aplavā iva na tareyur arātayaḥ ||
yathā śāmyākaḥ prapatan predivān nānu vidyate | evā rātri pra pātaya yo asmām̐ abhy aghāyati ||
apa stenaṃ vāsomathaṃ goajam uta taskaram | atho yo arvataḥ śiro +'bhidhāya ninīṣati ||
yad adya rātri subhage vibhajanty ayovasu | yad ehy asmān bhrājaya- -athed anyān upāyasi ||
uṣase naḥ paridehiBhatt. dhehi sarvān rātry anāgasaḥ | uṣā no ahna ā bhajād ahas tubhyaṃ vibhāvari ||
samyan digbhyaḥ pavate saṃ svarvin madhor ato mādhavaḥ pātv asmān | agnir devo duṣṭarītur adābhya idaṃ kṣatraṃ rakṣatu pātv asmān ||
rathantaraṃ sāmabhiḥ pātv asmān gāyatreṇacchandasāviśvarūpam | dvādaśā iṣṭayā stomo ahnāṃ samudro vāca idam ojaḥ pipartu ||
ugrā diśām abhibhūtir vayodhāḥ śuciḥ śukre ahany ojasye | indrādhipatiḥ pipṛtād ato no mayi kṣatraṃ viśvato dhārayedam ||
bṛhad rāṣṭraṃ kṣatrabhṛd vṛddhavṛṣṇyaṃ triṣṭubhaujaḥ śubhitam ugravīram | indra stomaiḥ pañcadaśena varca idaṃ vātena sagareṇa rakṣatu ||
prācī diśāṃ sahayaśā yaśasvatī viśve devāḥ prāvṛṣāhnāṃ svarvatī | idaṃ kṣatraṃ duṣṭaram astv ojo anādhṛṣṭaṃ sahasvaṃ sahasvat ||
vairūpe sāmany ahatacchakeyaṃ jagatyainad vikṣv ā veśayāmi | viśve devāḥ saptadaśena vadyam idaṃ kṣatraṃ salilāvatam ugram ||
dhatrī diśāṃ kṣatram idaṃdādhartu- -upasthāśānāṃ mitravad astv ojaḥ | mitrāvaruṇā śaradāhnācikitnū asmai kṣatrāya mahi śarma yacchatam ||
vairāje sāmany adhi me manīṣā- -anuṣṭubhā saṃbhṛtaṃ vīryaṃsahaḥ| idaṃ kṣatraṃmitravadārdradānvojā mitrāvaruṇā rakṣatam ādhipatye ||
samrāḍ diśāṃsahasāmnīsahasvaty ṛtur hemantoviṣṭhayānaḥ pipartu | oṣajātāṃ bṛhatī ca śakvarī- -imaṃ yajñam avatāṃ no ghṛtācī ||
svarvatī sudughā naḥ payasvatī diśāṃ devy avatu no ghṛtācī | tvaṃ gopāḥ puraetota paścād bṛhaspate yāmyāṃ yuṅdhi vācam ||
stomaikaviṃśe bhuvanasya patni vivasvagvāte abhi no gṛṇīhi | ghṛtavatī savitar ādhipatye payasvatī rantir āśā no astu ||
ūrdhvā diśāṃ rantir āśauṣadhīnāṃ saṃvatsareṇa savitā no ahnā | revat sāmnāṃpaṅktiśchandasām ajātaśatruḥ syonā no astu ||
viṣṭambhodivo dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyā asyeśānā jagato viṣṇupatnī | viśvavyacā iṣayantī suhutiḥ syonā no astv aditer upasthe ||
dhruvā diśāṃ viṣṇupatny aghorā- -asyeśānā sahaso yā manotā | bṛhaspatir mātariśvota vāyuḥ saṃdhānā vātā abhi no gṛṇantu ||
yo naḥ pitā janitā yo vidhartā yo naḥ sato abhy ā saj jajāna | sa āśiṣā draviṇam icchamānaḥ prathamacchado vara ā viveśa ||
abhy ā vartasva pṛthivī yajñena payasā saha | apānto agnir iṣito 'va rohatu ||
yad agne candraṃ yat pūtaṃ yac chukraṃ yac ca yajñiyam | tad devebhyo bharāmasi ||
iṣam ūrjam aham ata ādi yajñasya yonau mahiṣasya dhāman | ā no goṣu viśastv ā prajāyāṃ jahāmi sedim anirām amīvām ||
āyuṣo 'si prataraṇaṃ vipraṃ bheṣajam ucyase | tad āñjana tvaṃ śantāte 'si māyobhavaṃ kṛtam ||
yo harimā jāyānyo aṅgabhedo visalpakaḥ | sarvaṃ te yakṣmam aṅgebhyo bahir nir hantv āñjanam ||
āñjanaṃ pṛthivyāṃ jātaṃ bhadraṃ puruṣajīvanam | kṛṇotv atpramāyakaṃ rathajūtim anāgasam ||
prāṇa prāṇaṃ trāyasvāso asave mṛḍa | nirṛte nirṛtyā naḥ pāśebhyo muñca ||
sindhor garbho 'si vidyutāṃ puṣpam | vātaḥ prāṇaḥ sūryaś cakṣur divas payaḥ ||
devāñjanaṃ traikakudaṃ pari mā pāhi viśvataḥ | na tvā taranty oṣadhayo bāhyāḥ parvatīyā uta ||
vīdaṃ madhyam avāsṛjad rakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ | amīvāḥ sarvāś cātayan nāśayad abhibhā itaḥ ||
bahv idaṃ rājan varuṇa- -anṛtam āha puruṣaḥ | tasmāt sahasravīrya muñca naḥ pary aṃhasaḥ ||
yad āpo aghnyā iti varuṇeti yad ūcima | tasmāt sahasravīrya muñca naḥ pary aṃhasaḥ ||
mitraś ca tvā varuṇaś ca- -anu preyatur āñjana | tau tvānugatya dūraṃ bhogāya puna rohatu ||
ṛṇād ṛṇam iva saṃ naya kṛtyāṃ kṛtyākṛto gṛham | cakṣurmantrasya durhārdaḥ pṛṣṭīr api śṛṇāñjana ||
yad asmāsu duṣvapnyaṃ yad goṣu yac ca no gṛhe | amāmagatyasta durhārdaḥ priya prati muñcatām ||
apām ūrjaojasovāvṛdhānam agner jātam adhi jātavedasaḥ | caturvīraṃ parvatīyaṃ yad āñjanaṃ diśaḥ pradiśaḥkaradic chivās te ||
caturvīraṃ badhyata āñjanaṃ te sarvā diśo abhayās te bhavantu | dhruvas tiṣṭhādhi saviteva vārya imā viśo abhi harantu te balim ||
āṅkṣvaikaṃ maṇim ekaṃ kṛṇuṣva snāhyekena pibaikam eṣām | caturvīraṃ nairṛtebhyaś caturbhyo grāhyā bandhebhyaḥ pari pātv asmān ||
agnir māghnyenāvatu prāṇāyāpānāyāyuṣe | varcasa ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā ||
indro mendryeṇāvatu prāṇāyāpānāyāyuṣe | varcasa ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā ||
somo mā somyenāvatu prāṇāyāpānāyāyuṣe | varcasa ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā ||
bhago mā bhagenāvatu prāṇāyāpānāyāyuṣe | varcasa ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā ||
maruto mā gaṇair avantu prāṇāyāpānāyāyuṣe | varcasa ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā ||
āyurdā deva jarasaṃ pṛṇāno ghṛtapratīko ghṛtapṛṣṭho agne | ghṛtaṃ pibann amṛtaṃ cāru gavyaṃ piteva putraṃ jarase nayemam ||
āyur asmai dhehi jātavedaḥ prajāṃ tvaṣṭar adhi ni dhehy onaḥ | rāyaspoṣaṃ savitar ā suvāsmai śataṃ jīvāti śaradas tavāyam ||
imam agna āyuṣe varcase dhāḥ priyaṃ reto varuṇa mitra rājan | mātevāsmā adite śarma yaccha viśve devā jaradaṣṭir jathāsat ||
agniṣ ṭa āyuḥ prataraṃ kṛṇotu somas te puṣṭiṃ prataraṃ dadhātu | indro marutvān adhi te bravītv ādityais te aditiḥ śarma yacchatu ||
revatīs tvā vyakṣaṇaṃ kṛttikāś cakṛtus tvā |Bhatt. cakṛtas apasas tvām atanvata dhiyo 'vayann avāgnāyīr apṛñcan ||
sahasram antām̐ abhito 'dadantā-Bhatt. antāṃ -aśītir madhyam abhayaṃ vi nārīḥ | devīr devāya paridhe savitre mahat tad āsāmaghavan mahitvam ||
imam aśmānam ā tiṣṭha- -aśmeva tvaṃ sthiro bhava | pra mṛṇīhi durasyataḥ sahasva pṛtaṇāyataḥ ||
yena devaṃ savitāraṃ pari devā adhārayan | tenemaṃ brahmaṇaspate pari rāṣṭrāya dhattana ||
parīmam indram āyuṣe mahe kṣatrāya dhattana | yathainaṃ jarase nayāñBhatt. nayāṃ jyokkṣatre adhi jāgarat ||
parīmaṃ somam āyuṣe mahe śrotrāya dhattana | yathainaṃ jarase nayāṃ jyok śrotre adhi jāgarat ||
pari dhatta dhatta varcasemaṃ jarāmṛtyuṃ kṛṇuta dīrgham āyuḥ | bṛhaspatiḥprāyacchadvāsa etat somāya rājñe paridhātavā u ||
jarāṃ su gaccha pari dhatsva vāso bhavā gṛṣṭīnām abhiśastivā u | śataṃ ca jīva śaradaḥ suvarcā rāyaspoṣam upa saṃ vyayasva ||
parīdaṃ vāso api dhāḥ svastaye 'bhūr vāpīnām abhiśastipā u | śataṃ ca jīva śaradaḥ purūcīr vasūni cārur vibhajāsi jīvan ||
yoge yoge tapastaraṃ vāje vāje havāmahe | sakhāya indram ūtaye ||
hiraṇyavarṇo ajaraḥ suvīro jarāmṛtyuḥ prajayā saṃ viśasva | tad agnir āha tad u soma āha bṛhaspatiḥ savitā tad indraḥ ||
yadottamat tantu badhāya nāvadvāsaḥ pūrvayāvat pururūpapeśaḥ | bhadrātīkā samajaraṃ suvīraṃ tena devāḥ pra tirantv āyuḥ ||
yasya brāhmaṇaḥsicamārabhante śrathnanto nīvaṃ pratiranta āyuḥ | tasya devā devahūtiṃ juṣantāṃ sa viśvahā sacatāṃ svasti ||
anyad ā dhatsva pari dhatsva vāsa imam ulbam apalumpāmiyas te | jarase tvām ṛṣayaḥ saṃ vyayantu sūryo bhagas te pratirantvāyuḥ ||
yasya devāsaḥ prathamavāsyaṃ harāmi taṃ tvā viśve avantu devāḥ | taṃ tvā bhrātaraḥ suvṛdhā vardhamānam anu jāyantāṃ bahavaḥ sujātam ||
ahatenāhato bhava sthira sthireṇa saṃ bhava | pra mṛṇīhi durasyataḥ sahasva pṛtanāyataḥ ||
mitraḥ pṛthivyā adhyakṣaḥ | sa māvatv asmin brahmaṇy asmin karmaṇy asyāṃ purodhāyām asyāṃ dehahūtyām asyām ākūtyām asyām āśiṣi svāhā ||

prajāpatiḥ prajānām adhyakṣaḥ | (…) ||see 15.7.1bcd
yamaḥ pitṝṇām adhyakṣaḥ | sa māvatv asmin (…) ||see 15.7.1bcd
pitaraḥ pare 'varastatastatāmahaḥ| te māvantv asmin brahmaṇy asmin karmaṇy asyāṃ purodhāyām asyāṃ devahūtyām asyām akūtyām asyām āśiṣi svāhā ||
devānāṃ devā devā deveṣv adhidevāḥ parā kramadhvam | prathamā dvitīyeṣu dvitīyāstṛtīyeṣu||
trir ekādaśā viśve vaiśvānarā mahi mahānto na mārabhadhvam | idaṃ śakeyaṃ yad idaṃ kṛṇomi svāhā ||
jīmūtasyeva bhavati pratīkaṃ yad varmī yāti samadām upasthe | anāviddhayā tanvā jaya tvaṃ sa tvā varmaṇo mahimā pipartu ||
dhanvanā gā dhanvanājiṃ jayema dhanvanā tīvrāḥ samado jayema | dhanuḥ śatror apakāmaṃ kṛṇotu dhanvanā sarvāḥ pṛtanā jayema ||
vakṣyantīved ā ganīganti karṇaṃ priyaṃ sakhāyaṃ pariṣasvajānā | yoṣeva śiṅkte vitatādhi dhanvañ jyā iyaṃ samiti pārayantī ||
te ācarantī samaneva yoṣā māteva putraṃ pipṛtām upasthe | apa śatrūn vidhyatāṃ saṃvidāne ārtnī ime visphurantī amitrān ||
bahvīnāṃ pitā bahur asya putro vyacaḥ kṛṇoti samado 'vagatya | iṣudhiḥsaṅkāḥpṛtanāś ca sarvāḥ pṛṣṭhe ninaddho jayati prasūtaḥ ||
rathe tiṣṭhan nayati vājinaḥ puro yatrayatra kāmayate suṣārathiḥ | abhīśūnāṃ mahimānaṃ panāyata manaḥ paścād anuyacchantiraśmayaḥ ||
tīvrān ghoṣān kṛṇvatāṃ vṛṣapāṇayo 'śvā rathebhiḥ saha vājayantaḥ | apakrāmantaḥ prapadair amitrān kṣiṇantiśatrūṃranapavyayantaḥ ||
rathavāhanaṃ havir asya nāma yatrāyudhaṃ nihitam asya varma | tatrā ratham upa śagmaṃ sadema viśvāhā vayaṃ sumanasyamānāḥ ||
svāduṣaṃsadaḥ pitaro vayodhāḥ kṛcchreśritaḥ śaktīvanto gabhīrāḥ | citrasenā iṣubalā amṛdhrāḥ satovīrā uravo vrātasāhāḥ ||
brahmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ śive no dyāvāpṛthivī anehasā | pūṣā naḥ pātu dūritād ṛtāvṛdho rakṣāmākirṇo aghaśaṃsa īśata ||
bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghāyoḥ | indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varivaḥ kṛṇotu ||
suparṇaṃ vaste mṛgo asyā danto gobhiḥ saṃnaddhā patati prasūtā | yatrā naraḥ saṃ ca vi ca dravanti tad asmabhyam iṣavaḥ śarmayacchān||
suparṇo vāso yad u sarpir āsā mano hiraṇyam iṣavaḥ patatrī | māsmāṅ arann amuta āpatantīr itaḥ prahitāḥ savitar jayantu ||
ahir iva bhogaiḥ pary eti bāhuṃ jyāyā hetim apabādhamānaḥ | hastaghno viśvā vayunāni vidvān pumān pumāṃsaṃ pari pātu mṛtyoḥ ||
ā jaṅghanti sānv eṣāṃ jaghanām̐ upa jighnate | aśvājani tra pracodaya- -aśvān samatsu pādaya ||
divas pṛthivyāḥ pary oja ābhṛtaṃ vanaspatibhyaḥ pari saṃbhṛtaṃ sahaḥ | apām ojmānaṃ pari gobhir ābhṛtam indrasya vajraṃ haviṣā rathaṃ yaja ||
indrasya vajro marutām anīkaṃ mitrasya garbho varuṇasya nābhiḥ | semāṃno havyadātiṃ juṣāṇo deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya ||
vanaspate vīḍvaṅgo hi bhūyā asmatsakhā prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ | gobhiḥ saṃnaddho ratha vīḍayasva- -āsthātā te jayatu jetvāni ||
upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ purutrā te manutāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat | sa dundubhe sajūr indreṇa devair dūrād davīyo apa sedha śatrūn ||
ā krandaya balamojona ā dhā abhi ṣṭana duritā bādhamānaḥ | apa sedha dundubheducchunāmita indrasya muṣṭir asi vīḍayasva ||
prāmūñ jayābhīme jayantu ketumad dundubhir vāvadītu | samaśvaparṇāḥ patayantu no naro 'smākam indra rathino jayantu ||
indro rathāya prapadaṃ kṛṇotu yam adhyaṣṭhān maghavā jayantām | irya iva paśubhiryuyotugopā ariṣṭo jātaḥ prathamaḥsiṣāsan||
parjanyasyeva stanayitnur āsor indrāgnyor iva cekhidyate ghoṣo asya | sāhasro vīraḥ śataṃ sasanvān ayutaṃ sasanvān ratha mṛḍeha ||
śyenasya pakṣau hariṇasya bāhū indrasya muṣṭir marutām anīkam | gobhiḥ saṃnaddho asi vīḍayasva ||
ud yaṃyamīti sahiteva bāhū ubhe sicau yajate bhīmaṛñjan| uc chukram atkam ajate śacībhir navā mātṛbhyo vasanā jahāti ||
ugrau te nemī pavī ta ugrā ugrāḥ śaṅkavo bṛhato rathasya | īṣātraveṇavo namatis ta ugrā- -agniś cakṣuḥ pravayaṇaṃ rathasya | tenāmitrān pramṛṇan yāhi śatrūn ||
arā nābhayo balam it te akṣa ugrau te koṣau saha nisyadābhyām | āṇyor vadhrān uta koṣaghorā sthānaṃ bandha uta vandhuraṃ te ||
goṣṭhe balaṃ mṛga ekam aṅgaṃBhatt. gauṣṭhe parā kramadhvaṃ maha ā suvanta | abhīśavo hatānena vṛtram ayaṃ kṣatreṇa prajayāstūgraḥ ||
ā tiṣṭha jiṣṇus tarasā sapatnān sāhasro vīraḥ pramṛṇan yāhi śatrūn | pṛṣṭiyuge kṛṇutaṃ vīryāṇi tadetām etaṃ ratham asya śagme ||
aṣṭau cakṣūṃṣi kavayaḥ saṃ namantv aśvā prākāśā ṛju dhāvayantaḥ | anu tvā skambho dadatāṃ piteva cakramāṇam ainaṃ dhatsvopasthe pra tirāty āyuḥ ||
kavibhiḥsyūtaḥsa rathe vibaddhaḥ sa dhanvadhir dhanucitte jajāna | anuprāsyemānipṛthumadhyamāny aśvebhyaḥ śaṃtvāya kavibhiḥ kṛtāni tebhiṣ ṭe śarma yacchantu devāḥ ||
agniṃ brūmo vanaspatīn oṣadhīr uta vīrudhaḥ | indraṃ bṛhaspatiṃ sūryaṃ te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
brūmo devaṃ savitāraṃ dhātāram uta pūṣaṇam | tvaṣṭāram agryaṃ brūmas te (…) ||see 1d
brūmo rājānaṃ varuṇaṃ mitraṃ viṣṇum atho bhagam | aṃśaṃ vivasvantaṃ brūmas te (…) ||see 1d
gandharvāpsaraso brūmo aśvinā brahmaṇaspatim | aryamā nāma yo devas te (…) ||see 1d
vātaṃ brūmaḥ parjanyam antarikṣam atho diśaḥ | āśāś ca sarvā brūmas te (…) ||see 1d
ahorātre idaṃ brūma sūryācandramasā ubhā | ādityān sarvān brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
muñcantu mā śapathyād ahorātre atho uṣāḥ | somo mā divyo muñcatu yam āhuś candramā iti ||
pañca rājyāni vīrudhāṃ somaśreṣṭhāni brūmasi | bhaṅgo darbho yavaḥ sahas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
ye grāmyāḥ sapta paśava āraṇyā uta ye mṛgāḥ | śakuntān pakṣiṇo brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
bhavāśarvāv idaṃ brūma ugraḥ paśupatiś ca yaḥ | iṣūr yā eṣāṃ vidmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
yajñaṃ brūmo yajamānam ṛcaḥ sāmāni bheṣajā | yajūṃṣi hotrān brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
ṛtūn brūma ṛtupatīn ārtavām̐ uta hāyanān | samāḥ saṃvatsarān māsas te no (…) ||see 1d
divaṃ brūmo nakṣatrāṇi bhūmiṃ yakṣāṇi parvatān | samudrā nadyo veśantās te (…) ||see 1d
sapta ṛṣīn vā idaṃ brūmo 'po devīḥ prajāpatim | pitṝn yamaśreṣṭhān brūmas te (…) ||see 1d
viśvān devān idaṃ brūmaḥ satyasandhān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ | viśvābhiḥ patnībhiḥ sākaṃ te (…) ||see 1d
ādityā rudrā vasavo devā daivā atharvaṇaḥ | aṅgiraso manīṣiṇas te (…) ||see 1d
ye devā diviṣado 'ntarikṣasadaś ca ye | pṛthivyāṃśakrāye śritās te (…) ||see 1d
eta devā dakṣiṇataḥ paśvāt prāñca ud etana purastāc chakrā uttarād viśve devāḥ sametya te (…) ||see 1d
arāyān brūmo rakṣāṃsi sarpān puṇyajanān uta | mṛtyūn ekaśataṃ brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
yā devīḥ pañca pradiśo ye devā dvādaśartavaḥ |Bhatt. -daśarttavaḥ saṃvatsarasya ye daṃṣṭrās te naḥ santu sadā śivāḥ ||
bhūtaṃ brūmo bhūtapatiṃ bhūtānām uta yas patiḥ | bhūtāni sarvā brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
yāvad dyaur yāvat pṛthivī yāvat paryeti sūryaḥ | tāvat tvam ugra oṣadhe pari pāhy arundhati ||
ariṣṭas tvā khanaty ariṣṭāya khanāmi tvā | dvipāc catuṣpād asmākaṃ sarvam astv anāturam ||
devānām asi svasā marutām asi sañcarī | yaṃ jīvam aśnuṣe tvaṃ na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ ||
arundhatī nāmāsi tṛtīyasyām ito divi | tatrāmṛtasya rohaṇaṃ tenatvācchāvadāmasi||
śaṃ ta āpo hṛdyāḥ śaṃ te kulijyā uta | śaṃ vātaḥ śaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ te tapatu sūryaḥ ||
śaṃ ta indrāgnī bhavatāṃ śaṃ rātrī prati dhīyatām | śaṃ te pṛthivyāṃ vīrudhaḥ śam u te santv oṣadhīḥ ||
bahvīṣu hi tvām avidam oṣadhīṃ vīryavatīm | arundhati tvām āhārṣam ito mā pārayān iti ||
abhiprepseva jīvantam abhi dasyed arundhatī | eṣā daviddya bheṣajī devī vātīkṛtasya ca ||
anu ṣiñca nas tat kurv agado vai bhaviṣyati | vātīkṛtasya bheṣajy āgan devy arundhatī ||
mā bibher na mariṣyasy agado vai bhaviṣyasi | vātīkṛtasya bheṣajy āgan devy arundhatī ||
arundhatyaḥ saṃ vadante gāvaḥ pravrājinīr iva | yam āturam abhigaccha- -amāvataṃ kṛṇu māvatam ||
imaṃ me tvaṃjarāmṛtyuṃ puruṣaṃ kṛṇv oṣadhe | rājñī hi sarvāsām asy oṣadhīnām arundhatī ||
trāyamāṇā hy asi jīvalā vīryāvatī | arundhati tvām āhārṣam ito mā pārayān iti ||
digdhena ca viddhasya- -aghasyāghaviṣā ca yā | arundhati tvaṃ tasyāsi viṣasya viṣadūṣaṇī ||

yaḥ kṣipto mṛtyunā yasmair yodaṣṭastṛṣṭadaṃśmabhiḥ | arundhati tvaṃ tasyāsi viṣasya viṣadūṣaṇī ||
saṃ jihīṣvāmukthā yakṣmād ārukṣo lokam uttamam | apā jīvasi pātreṇa- -adhi jīvapurā ihi ||
apsaraso vi vo yakṛd vi vo bhinadmi mehanam | vicaṇḍālaṃvy arjunaṃ vi vavṛtraṃ bhinadmi vaḥ ||
viśvajanyāḥ pāñcajanyā mahārukmāḥ śikhaṇḍinīḥ | sarvā indrasya vajreṇa hatā budbudayātavaḥ ||
andhācīm asitācīm ulūkhalasya budhnena | avaitaṃ vatsapaṃ jahi ||
dūrād enāḥ praty ā paśyam āpatantīr atho divaḥ | devānāṃ havyamohanīr indro apsaraso hanat ||
ā hatā apa tā itaḥ khalād iva yātudhānyaḥ | amuṃ gacchata pūruṣaṃ samudram apa gacchati ||
divaṃ gacchantu divyāḥ saro gacchantu sārasīḥ | uluṅgulasya yo guhas tad u gacchantv āsurīḥ ||
āskandike viskandike parācīr apanṛtyantu|Bhatt. nṛtyatu sāraṅgeṇa śunā saha ||
yaḥ sāraṅgohiraṇyadan śvādivyaḥ pariplavaḥ | tasyāhaṃ nāma jagrabha- -asmā ariṣṭatātaye ||
adyāṃ te viraṇī parācīr apa nṛtyata | śṛṇāmi ghorā vaḥ pṛṣṭī brahmaṇā kīkasā uta ||
ekatriṃśad aśvavatīś catasra uta guṅguvaḥ | śivā daśa śṛtā daśa keśinīḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ | idam uluṅgulukābhyo apsarābhyo 'karaṃ namaḥ ||
