tvaj jātā rudra śantamā tvaṃ hi no babhuryā irāya bheṣajebhiḥ |Bhatt. om. irāya vi yakṣmān yāvayāsmad vyaṃhoBhatt. vyakṣmāṃ vy amīvāś cātayāsmadviṣūcīḥ||
tvaṃ devānām asi rudra śreṣṭhas tavas tavasām ugrabāho | hṛṇīyasā manasā modamāna ā babhūvitha rudrasya sūnoḥ ||
tvaṃ hi no vīrām̐ īraya bheṣajebhir uruṃ no bhavanta maghavo marutvan |Bhatt. marutvaṃ | karā naḥ pāram aṃhasaḥ svasti viśvā abhītīr apa sedhāsmat ||
tvaṃ hi no vṛṣabha cakṣimeṣṭhā asmai rudrāyogrāya mīḍhuṣe | kṣayadvīrāya pra bharāmahe matiṃ yathā naḥ śam aso dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade ||
kva teṣu rudra hasto mṛḍayāko jalāṣaḥ | apabhartā rapaso daivyasya ||
pra yakṣmaḥ pra nirṛtir etv asmat senevasṛṣṭā pracatām amīvā | ārādhvaṃ sanā vṛjanājahīta||Bhatt. ārāddhat, jahītii; see Lelli
arhandhanur hitaṃ bibharṣy arhanniṣkaṃ rajantaṃ viśvarūpam | arhann idaṃ dayase viśvam ejan na te dūraṃ na pariṣṭhāsti te bhava sadyaḥ sarvān pari paśyasi bhūmim ||
namas te astu vidyute namas testanayitnave| namas te astv aśmane yena pradiśam asyasi ||
mā devānām ugra rājann asmākaṃ puruṣā riṣan | rakṣāṃsy asmad yakṣmāṃś ca nāśayāmasi brahmaṇā ||
brahmaṇeto nāśayāmo yat kiṃ cāṅgeṣv āmayat | śalyān yakṣmasyātho ropīsBhatt. śalyāṃ tā ito vi nayāmasi ||
nayāmi vāṃ paśupatī ghṛtenājyena vardhayan | yaṃ dviṣmo yaś ca no dveṣṭi tasya veśaḥkariṣyathaḥ||
adhi brūtaṃ paśupatī dvipade me catuṣpade | prasūtau yatra jaghnatus tato me mātaraṃ riṣat ||
yā vāṃ rudraḥ śivā tanū yā vāṃ santi rogaṇāḥ | yā vām āyuṣmatīs tanūs tābhir no mṛḍataṃ yuvam ||
na pra minanti vratino vratāni satyaṃ jinvanto vidathā vadantaḥ | yasyeme rodasī ubhe saṃyukte manasā hṛdā ||
sa prajānāṃ prajāpatiḥ sādhu rakṣati varṣati | sa veda ratnabheṣajaṃ devebhyas pary ābhṛtaṃ tena no mṛḍataṃ yuvam | jīvātave na martave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye ||
saguṇāsa āsate saṃyuktā balāya kam | teṣāṃ yad indriyaṃ vṛha cati rocati rocanā ||
ye te rocane bṛhatī antarikṣe atho divaḥ | tābhyām upa pra yāhi naḥ sarvavīrām̐ ariṣyataḥ ||
sarvavīrā ariṣyanto rocane adhi tasthima | yathā nas tṛṣṇamad vasu divi kṣipadbhyo apsu yā ||
indrāgnī huve prathamau hvayāmi marutaḥśivān|Bhatt. śivāṃ hvayāmiviśvāndevānBhatt. viśvāṃ imaṃ homamavantume ||
tvaṃ prathamo amṛtatvam agne devo devatvaṃ prathamo jigetha | tava divi hṛdayaṃ saṃ babhūva sa naḥ śivā āpo jātavedo niyaccha||
agnāv agniś (carati praviṣṭa ṛṣīṇāṃ putro adhirāja eṣaḥ | tasmai juhomi haviṣā ghṛtena mā devānāṃ yūyavad bhāgadheyam) ||
ye devā diviṣṭhaye pṛthivyāṃ jātavedo ya urāv antarikṣe | ye giriṣu parvateṣv apsv antas te devā aśaniṃ yāvayātha ||
mitraṃ digbhiḥ kṛṇuṣva jātaveda āśābhir mitram adhipā vipaścit | mā no hiṃsīr divyenāgninā sasyāṃ yena yanti maruta spardhamānāḥ ||
vidyotamāna stanayan vṛṣevaiṣi kanikradat | bhīmaḥ parjanya te rathaḥ sa u naḥ śarma yacchatu ||
ye vidyutam aśanim ā tanvanti marutaḥ salilād adhi | kṛṣyai no viśvavārāyā avadhanvā ni tanvatām ||
yo vidyutam aśanim ātaṃty antarikṣād utavātāddivaś ca | tebhyo marudbhyo namo 'stv ojase ||
tā yantu svaraṃkṛtāḥ syonāḥ śivatamāḥ pathā | mā na indra yavaṃ vadhīr mitramenena kṛṇmahe ||
darbho agra oṣadhīnāṃ śatakāṇḍo ajāyata | sa devaiḥ prahito 'yam āgan svastaye vṛṣā marudbhiḥ sahasaṃvidānaḥ||
vṛṣākṣasyāsurasya menir asi tāṃ tvayā tathā veda karṇasya kauvidasyevamāśā | tāṃ mābhy ava gā dvādaśāhnāni vi rakṣe ||
asir me tigmasyāyasa indrāgnibhyāṃsusaṃśitaḥ| tena sedhām id āduniṃ kṛṣiṃ me māva gād iti sasyaṃ me mā vadhīd iti ||
marutaḥ pari vṛṅdhi no divaḥ kṣudrebhir aśmabhiḥ |Bhatt. aśmibhiḥ udumbarasya śākhayā vicakṣuṣā- -aśaniṃ yāvayāmasi ||
maruto mṛḍayāta no divaḥ śukrebhir aśmabhiḥ |Bhatt. aśmibhiḥ udumbarasya śākhayā vicakṣuṣā- -aśaṇiṃ yāvayāmasi ||
vartād vartam ā krāma parvatād adhi parvatam | girau pratiśṛtā satī vṛkṣān bhaṅdhi mā yavam ||
adāmnā tvā sandhyāmi yāvaṇyā paribhūrṇyā | sānau pratiśṛtā satī tṛṇaṃ bhaṅdhi mā yavam ||
uśatī nāmāsi salindā nāma | anyām āsāṃ gaccha yaṃ dviṣmas taṃ gaccha ||
parācīm anu saṃvataṃ parācīm anu saṃvidaṃ parācy anu ni drava | itas tvā nāśayāmasi brahmaṇā vīryāvatā ||
vār bhavodakaṃ bhava- -udakasyodakaṃ bhava | kṣudrāt kṣodīyasī bhūtvā- -athehy adhamaṃ tamaḥ ||
syonā bhava śivā bhava śivāc chivatarā bhava | phenān mṛdīyasī bhūtvā- -idaṃ śasyam upā cara ||
namas te astu vidyute stanayitnave | namas te agne dūre hete kṛṇmo mā no hiṃsīr dvipado mā catuṣpadaḥ ||
prati tvā sahasāsahaḥ sahasā prati rudhmasi | aindram idaṃ saho mahad bhūmyās tavaṃ divi śritam | aphālakṛṣṭam ā krama mā na indra yavaṃ vadhīḥ ||
yāḥ samudrād uccaranty utsebhyoyā nadībhyaḥ | atyantaḥ sarpo vaidyuto 'śaniṃ yāvayād itaḥ || anuvāka 5 |
antakāya mṛtyave nama iha- -ayam astu puruṣaḥ sahāsunā | sūryasya bhāge amṛtasya loke prāṇā apānā iha te ramantām ||
ud enaṃ bhago agrabhīd ud enaṃ somo aṃśumān | ud enaṃ maruto devā ud indrāgnī svastaye ||
iha te 'sur iha prāṇaBhatt. tesur ihāyur iha te manaḥ | uttvānirṛtyāḥ pāśebhyo daivyā vācā bharāmasi ||
ut krāmāto māva patthā mṛtyoḥ paḍvīśam avamuñcamānaḥ | mā cchitthā asmāl lokād agneḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśaḥ ||
tubhyaṃ vātaḥ pavatāṃ mātariśvā tubhyaṃ varṣantv amṛtāny āpaḥ | sūryas te tanve śaṃtapāt tvāṃ mṛtyur dayatāṃ mā prameṣṭhāḥ||
udyānaṃ te puruṣa nāvayānaṃ jīvātaṃ te dakṣatātiṃ kṛṇotu | ā hi rohemam amṛtaṃ sukhaṃ ratham athajirvirvidatham ā vadāsi ||
mā te manas tatra gān mā tiro bhūn mā jīvebhyaḥ pra mado mānu gāḥ pitṝn | viśve devā abhi rakṣantu tveha ||
mā gatānām ādīdhīthā ye nayanti parāvatam | ud ā roha tamaso jyotir ehyBhatt. ehm ā te hastaṃ rabhāmahe
śyāmaś ca tvā śabalaś ca preṣitau yamasya yau pathirakṣī śvānau | arvāṅ ehi mā vi dīdhyo māti tiṣṭhaḥ parāṅmanāḥ ||
maitaṃ panthām anu gā bhīma eṣa yena pūrvaṃ nayatha taṃ bravīmi | tama etat puruṣa mā pra patthā bhayaṃ parastād abhayaṃ te arvāk ||
rakṣantu tvāgnayo ye apsv antā rakṣatu tvā manuṣyā yam indhate | vaiśvānaro rakṣatu jātavedā divyas tvā mā pra dhāg vidyutā saha ||
rakṣatu tvā pṛthivī rakṣatu dyaus sūryaś ca tvā rakṣatāṃ candramāś ca | mā tvā kravyād abhi maṃsta- -ārāt saṃkasukāc cara ||
antarikṣaṃ rakṣatu devahetyā bodhaś ca tvā pratībodhaś ca rakṣatām | asvapnaś ca tvānavadrāṇaś ca rakṣatāṃ gopāyaṃś ca tvā rakṣatāṃjāgṛviśca ||
te tvā rakṣantu te tvā gopāyantu te tvāṃhasas pāntu | tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā ||
jīvebhyas tvā samude vāyur indro dhātā dadhātu savitā trāyamāṇaḥ | mā tvā prāṇo balaṃ hāsīd asuṃ te 'nu hvayāmasi ||Bhatt. tenu
mā tvā jambhaḥ saṃhanur mā tamo vidanBhatt. vidaṃ mā jihvā barhiḥ pramayuḥ kathā syāḥ |Bhatt. varhiḥ uttvādityā vasavo bharantu- -ud indrāgnī svastaye ||
ayaṃ devā ihaivāstv ayaṃ māmutra gād itaḥ | imaṃ sahasravīryeṇa mṛtyor ut pārayāmasi ||
uttvā mṛtyor apīparaṃ saṃdhamantuvayodhasaḥ |Bhatt. dhamanta mā tvā vyastakeśyo mātvāgharudorudan ||
āhārṣaṃ tvāvidaṃ tvā punar āgāḥ punarṇavaḥ | sarvāṅga sarvaṃ te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuś ca te 'vidam ||Bhatt. tevidan
ut tvā dyaur ut pṛthivy ut prajāpatir agrabhīt | ut tvā mṛtyor oṣadhayaḥ | somarājñīr apīparan ||
yāvatte jyotir abhūd apa tvat tamo akramīt | apatvanmṛtyuṃ nirṛtimBhatt. tvaṃ apa yakṣmaṃ ni dadhmasi ||
ā rabhasvemām amṛtasya śnuṣṭim acchidyamānā jaradaṣṭir astu te | asuṃ ta āyuḥ punar ā bharāmi rajas tamo mopa gā mā prameṣṭhāḥ||
jīvatāṃ jyotir abhy ehi lokam ā tvā harāmi śataśāradāya | drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ te kṛṇomy ava muñcantu mṛtyupāśā aśastīḥ ||Bhatt. mṛtyapāśā
vātāt te prāṇam avidaṃ sūryāc cakṣur ahaṃ pari | yat te manas tvayi tad dhārayāmi saṃ vitsvāṅgair vadajihvayālapan||
prāṇena tvāṃ dvipadāṃ catuṣpadām agnim iva jātam abhi saṃ dhamāmi | namas te mṛtyo cakṣuṣe namaḥ prāṇāya te 'karam ||Bhatt. tekaram
ayaṃ jīvatu mā mṛta- -imaṃsamīrayāmasi | kṛṇomy asmai bheṣajaṃ mṛtyo mā puruṣaṃ vadhīḥ ||
jīvalāṃ naghāriṣāṃ jīvantīm oṣadhīm aham | trāyamāṇāṃ sahamānāṃ sahasvatīm arundhatīm iha huve 'smā ariṣṭatātaye ||Bhatt. huvesmā
adhi brūhi mā rabhathāḥ sṛjemaṃ tavaivasantsarvahāyā ihāstu | bhavāśarvau mṛḍataṃ śarma yacchatam apasidhya duritaṃ dhattam āyuḥ ||
devānāṃ hetiḥ pari tvā vṛṇaktu pārayāmi rajasauttvā mṛtyor apīparam |Bhatt. u(t) tvā ārād agniṃ kravyādaṃnirūhanBhatt. niruhaṃ jivātave te paridhiṃ dadhāmi ||
asmai mṛtyo adhibrūhi- -imaṃdayasvodito 'yam etu |Bhatt. itoyam ariṣṭaḥ sarvāṅgaḥsuśrujjarasā śatahāyanātmanā bhujam aśnavat ||corr. śatahāyana ātmanā?
yat te niyānaṃ rajasaṃ mṛtyo anavadhariṣyam | patha imaṃ tasmād rakṣanto brahmāsmai varma kṛṇmasi ||
kṛṇomi te prāṇāpānau jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ kṛṇutāṃ dīrgham āyuḥ svasti | vaivasvatena prahitān yamadūtāṃś carata ārād apa sedhāmi sarvān ||
ārād arātiṃ nirṛtiṃ paro grāhiṃ kravyādaḥ piśacān | rakṣo yat sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃ tattamaivāpa hanmasi ||
agneṣ ṭe prāṇam amṛtād āyuṣmato manave jātavedasaḥ |corr. vanve yathā na riṣyāamṛtaḥsajūr asas tat te kṛṇomi tad u te sam ṛdhyatām ||
śive te stāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī asantāpe adhiśriyau | śaṃ te sūrya ā tapatiBhatt. sūryā śaṃ vāto vātu te hṛde | śivā abhi kṣarantu tvā- -āpo divyāḥ payasvatīḥ śivās te santv oṣadhīḥ ||
uttvāhārṣam adharasyād uttarāṃ pṛthivīm abhi | tatra tvādityau rakṣatāṃ sūryāś candramasā ubhā ||
yat te vāsaḥ paridhānaṃ yāṃ nīviṃ kṛṇuṣe tvam | śivaṃ te tanve tat kṛṇmaḥ saṃsparśe 'dhrūkṣṇam astu te ||Bhatt. dhrūkṣṇam
yat kṣureṇa marcayatā sutejasā vaptā vapasikeśaśmasru| śumbhaṃ mukhaṃ mainam āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ ||
śivau te stāṃ vrīhiyavāv abalāsāv adomadhau | etau yakṣmaṃ vi bādhete etau muñcatoaṃhasaḥ||
yad aśnāsi yat pibasi dhānyaṃ kṛṣyāḥ payaḥ | ādyaṃ yad anādyaṃ sarvaṃ te annam aviṣaṃ kṛṇomi ||
ahne ca tvā rātraye ca- -ubhābhyāṃ pari dadhmasi | arāyebhyo jighatsubhya imaṃ naḥ parirakṣata||
śataṃ te 'yutaṃ hāyanāBhatt. teyutam dve yuge trīṇi catvāri santu | indrāgnī viśve devā anu manyantām ahṛṇīyamānāḥ ||
śarade tvā hemantāya vasantāya griṣmāya pari dadhmasi | varṣāṇi tubhyaṃ syonāni yeṣu vardhanta oṣadhīḥ ||
mṛtyur īśe dvipadāṃ mṛtyur īśe catuṣpadām | tasmāttvā mṛtyor gopater ud dharāmi sa mā mṛthāḥ ||
so 'riṣṭa na mariṣyasiBhatt. soriṣṭa na mariṣyasi mā bibheḥ | na vai tatra pra mīyante no yanty adharaṃ rajaḥ ||
sarvo vai tatra jīvati gaur aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ | yatredaṃ brahma kriyateBhatt. krīyate paridhir jīvanāya kam ||
pari tvā pātu samānebhyo 'bhicārāt sabandhubhyaḥ | amamrirbhavāmṛto 'tijīvothus with ŚS; Bhatt. yamaṃmir, tajīvo mā tehāsiṣurasavaḥ śarīram ||
viśve tvā devā amṛtena bibhratv adhivaktā paśupatiṣ ṭe astu | anāmayat savitā te kṛṇotv ā tvā prāṇo viśatu jīvanāya ||
ye mṛtyava ekaśataṃ yā nāṣṭrātijīvyā | muñcantutasmāttvā devā agner vaiśvānarād adhi ||
rakṣohaṇaṃ vājinam ā jigharmi mitraṃ prathiṣṭham upa yāmi śarma | śiśāno agniḥ kratubhiḥ samiddhaḥ sa no divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam ||
ayodaṃṣṭrān arciṣā vāvṛdhānān upa spṛśa jātavedaḥ samiddhaḥ | ā jihvayā mūradevān rabhasva kravyādo vṛṣṭvāpi dhatsvāsan ||
ubhobhayāvinn upa dehi daṃṣṭrā hiṃsraḥ śiśāno 'varaṃ paraṃ ca |Bhatt. śiśānovaraṃ utāntarikṣe pari yāhy agne jambhaiḥ saṃ dhehy abhi yātudhānān ||
agne tvacaṃ yātudhānasya bhindhi hiṃsrāśanir harasā hantv enam | pra parvāṇi jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi kravyāt kraviṣṇur vi cinoty enam ||
yajñair iṣūḥ saṃnamamāno agne vācā śalyām̐ aśanibhir dihānaḥ | tābhir vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān pratīco bāhūn prati bhaṅdhy eṣām ||
yatredānīṃ paśyasi jātavedas tiṣṭhantam agna uta vā carantam | utāntarikṣe patantaṃ yātudhānaṃ tamasā vidhya sarvā śiśānaḥ ||
utārabdhāc chṛṇīhi jātaveda utārebhāṇād ṛṣṭibhir yātudhānāt | agne pūrvo ni jahi śośucāna āmādaḥ kṣviṅkās tam adantv enīḥ ||
iha pra brūhi yatamaḥ so agne yo yātudhāno ya idaṃ śṛṇoti | tam ā rabhasva samidhā yaviṣṭha nṛcakṣasaś cakṣuṣe randhayaitam ||
tīkṣṇenāgne cakṣuṣā rakṣa yajñaṃ prāñcaṃ vasubhyaḥ pra ṇaya pracetaḥ | hiṃsraṃ rakṣāṃsy abhi śośucānaṃ mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā nṛcakṣaḥ ||
nṛcakṣā rakṣaḥ prati paśya vikṣu tasya trīṇi pratiśṛṇīhyagrā | tasyāgne pṛṣṭīr harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlaṃ yātudhānasya vṛśca ||
triryātudhānaḥ prasitiṃ ta etv ṛtaṃ yo agne anṛtena hanti | tam arciṣā sphūrjayañ jātavedaḥ samakṣam enaṃ gṛṇate ni vṛṅdhi ||
yad agne adya mithunā śapāto yad vācas tṛṣṭaṃ janayanta rebhāḥ | manyor manasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā tayā vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān ||
parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān parāgne rakṣo harasā śṛṇīhi | parārciṣā mūradevāñ chṛṇīhi parāsutṛpaḥ śośucataḥ śṛṇīhi ||
parādya devā vṛjinaṃśṛṇantu pratyag enaṃ śapathā yantu sṛṣṭāḥ | vācāstenaṃ śaravaṛcchantumarman viśvayaitu prasitiṃ yātudhānaḥ ||
sanād agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ | anu daha sahamūrān kravyādo mā te hetyā mukṣata daivyāyāḥ ||
yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte yo aśvyena paśunā yātudhānaḥ | yo aghnyāyā bharati kṣīram agne teṣāṃ śīrṣāṇi harasāpi vṛśca ||
saṃvatsarīṇaṃ payausriyāyās tasya māsīd yātudhāno nṛcakṣaḥ |corr. māśīd pīyūṣam agne yatamas titṛpsāt taṃ pratyañcam arciṣā vidhya marman ||
viṣaṃ gavāṃ yātudhānāḥ pibantv ā vṛścantām aditaye durevāḥ | paraiṇān devaḥ savitā dadātuBhatt. paraiṇāṃ parā bhāgam oṣadhīnāṃ jayantām ||
tvaṃ no agne adharād udaktas tvaṃ paścād uta rakṣā purastāt | prati tye teajarāsastapiṣṭhāBhatt. te te aghaśaṃsaṃ śośucato dahantu ||
paścāt purastād adharād udaktaḥ kaviḥ kāvyena pari pāhy agne | sakhā sakhāyam ajaro jarimṇe agne martyām̐ amartyas tvaṃ naḥ ||Bhatt. gne
tad agne cakṣuḥ prati dhehi rebhe śaphārujaṃ yena paśyasi yātudhānam | atharvavajjyotiṣā daivyena [Bhatt. atharvava(j) satyaṃ dhūrvantam acitaṃ ny oṣa ||Bhatt. oṣaḥ
pari tvāgne puraṃ vayaṃ vipraṃ sahasya dhīmahi | dhṛṣadvarṇaṃ divedive hantāraṃ bhaṅgurāvatām ||
vi jyotiṣā bṛhatā bhāty agnir āvir viśvāni kṛṇute mahitvā | prādevīr māyāḥ sahate durevāḥ śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣase vinikṣe ||
agnī rakṣāṃsi sedhati śukraśocir amartyaḥ | śuciḥ pāvaka īḍyaḥ ||
agne rakṣā ṇo aṃhasaḥ pratiṣmadeva rīṣataḥ | tapiṣṭhair ajaro daha ||
ye te śṛṅge ajare jātavedas tigmaśocībrahmasaṃśite | tābhyāṃ durhārdam abhidāsantaṃ kimīdinaṃ pratyañcaṃ yātudhānaṃ jātavedo vi nikṣva ||
viṣeṇa bhaṅgurāvataḥ sam indra rakṣaso daha | agne śukreṇa śociṣā tapuragrebhir arcibhiḥ ||
praty agne mithunā daha yātudhānā kimīdinā | saṃ tvā śiśāmi jāgṛhy adabdhaṃ vipra manmabhiḥ ||
praty agne harasā haraḥ śṛṇīhi viśvataḥ prati | yātudhānasya rakṣaso balaṃ vi ruja vīryam ||
sādānveyaṃ pra mṛṇa rakṣa indraBhatt. sādānveyāḥ yātudhānakṣayaṇair mūraiḥ | etāv agne mithunā yātudhānā viṣvañcaumruktauharasā śayātām ||Bhatt. uktau
bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghāyoḥ | indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varīyaḥ kṛṇotu ||
indrāsomā tapataṃ rakṣa ubjataṃ ny arpayataṃ vṛṣaṇā tamovṛdhaḥ | parā śṛṇīhi tam acito ny oṣataṃ hataṃ nudethāṃ ni śiśītam atriṇaḥ ||Bhatt. atriṇaḥ+
indrāsomā sam aghaśaṃsam abhy aghaṃ tapur yayastu carur agnivām̐ iva | brahmadviṣe kravyāde ghoracakṣase dveṣo dhattam anavāyaṃ kimīdine ||
indrāsomā duṣkṛto vavre antar anārambhaṇe tamasi pra vidhyatam | yathaiṣāṃ nātaḥ punar ekaś canodayat tad vām astu sahase manyumac chavaḥ ||
indrāsomā vartayataṃ divas pary agnitaptebhir yuvam aśmahanmabhiḥ | tapurvadhebhir ajarebhir atriṇo ni parśāne vidhyataṃ yantu nisvaram ||
indrāsomā pra harataṃ divo vadhaṃ saṃ pṛthivyā aghaśaṃsāya tarhaṇam | ut takṣataṃ svaryaṃ parvatebhyo yena rakṣo vavṛdhānaṃnijūrvathaḥ||
indrāsomā pari vāṃ bhūtu viśvata iyaṃ matiḥ kakṣyāśveva vājinā | yāṃ vāṃ hotrāṃ pari hiṇomi medhayā- -imā brahmāṇi nṛpatīva jinvatam ||
prati smarethāṃ tujayadbhir evair hataṃ druho rakṣaso bhaṅgurāvataḥ | indrāsomā duṣkṛte mā sugaṃ bhūd yo mā kadā cid abhidāsati druhuḥ ||
yo mā pākena manasā carantam abhicaṣṭe anṛtebhir vacobhiḥ | āpa iva kāśinā saṃgṛbhītā asannastvasata indra vaktā ||Bhatt. astāsata
ye pākaśaṃsaṃ viharanta evair ye vā bhadraṃ dūṣayanti svadhābhiḥ | ahaye vā tān pradadātu soma ā vā dadhātu nirṛter upasthe ||
yo no rasaṃ dipsati pitvo agne yo aśvānāṃ yo gavāṃ yas tanūnām | ripu stena steyakṛd dabhram etuBhatt. abhram ni ṣa hīyatāṃ tanvā tanā ca ||
paraḥ so astu tanvā tanā ca tisraḥ pṛthivīr adho astu viśvāḥ | prati śuṣyati yaśo asya devā yo mā divā dipsati yaś ca naktam ||
suvijñānaṃ cikituṣe janāya sac cāsac ca vacasī paspṛśāte | tayor yat satyaṃ yatarad ṛjīyas tad it somo 'vati hanty āsat ||
na vā u somo vṛjinaṃ hinoti na kṣatriyaṃ mithuyā dhārayantam | hanti rakṣo hanty āsad vadantam ubhāv indrasya prasitau śayāte ||
yadi vāham anṛtadevo asmi moghaṃ vā devām̐ apyūhe agne | kim asmabhyaṃ jātavedo hṛṇīṣe droghavācas te nirṛthaṃ sacantām ||
adyā murīya yadi yātudhānoasmi yadi vāyustatapapūruṣasya|Bhatt. tadapa adhā sa vīrair daśabhir vi yūyā yo mā moghaṃ yātudhānety aha ||
yo māyātuṃ yātudhānety āha yo mā rakṣāḥ śucir asmīty āha | indras taṃ hantu mahatā vadhena viśvasya jantor adhamas padīṣṭa ||
pra yā jigāti khargaleva naktam apa druhus tanvaṃ gūhamānā | vavrām̐ anantām̐ ava sā padīṣṭa grāvāṇo ghnantu rakṣasa upabdaiḥ ||
vi tiṣṭhadhvaṃ maruto vikṣvicchataBhatt. vikṣvītsata gṛbhāyata rakṣasaḥ saṃ pinaṣṭana | vayo ye bhūtvā patayanti naktabhir ye vā ripo dadhire deve adhvare ||
eta u tye patayanti śvayātava indraṃ dipsanti dipsavo 'dābhyam |Bhatt. dipsavodābhyam śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyo vadhaṃ nūnaṃ sṛjad aśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ ||
pra vartaya divo aśmānam indra somaśitaṃ maghavan saṃ śiśādhi | prākto apākto adharād udakto abhi jahi rakṣasaḥ parvatena ||Bhatt. 'bhi
indro yātūnām abhavat parāśaro havirmathīnām abhy āvivāsatām | abhīd u śakraḥ paraśur yathā vanaṃ pātreva bhindant sata eti rakṣasaḥ ||
ulūkayātuṃ śuśulūkayātuṃ jahiśvayātumuta kokayātum | suparṇayātum uta gṛdhrayātuṃ dṛṣadeva pra mṛṇa rakṣa indra ||
mā no rakṣo abhi naḍ yātumāvatām apocchataṃ mithunā yā kimīdinā | pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātv aṃhaso antarikṣaṃ divyāt pātv asmān ||
indra jahi pumāṃsaṃ yātudhānam uta striyaṃ māyayā śāśadānām |Bhatt. śāsadānām vigrīvāso mūradevā rudantu mā te dṛśan sūryam uccarantam ||
prati cakṣva vi cakṣva- -indraś ca soma jāgṛtam | rakṣobhyo vadham asyatam aśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ ||
yā babhravo yāś ca śukrā rohiṇīr uta pṛśnayaḥ | asiknīḥ kṛṣṇā oṣadhīḥ sarvāacchāvadāmasi ||
trāyantām imaṃ puruṣaṃ yakṣmād deveṣitād adhi | yāsāṃ dyauṣ pitā pṛthivī mātā samudro mūlaṃ vīrudhāṃ babhūva ||
āpo 'graṃ divyā oṣadhayas | tās te yakṣmam enasyam aṅgādaṅgādanīnaśan||Bhatt. anīnaśaṃ
prastṛṇatī stambinīr ekaśṛṅgāḥ pratanvatīr oṣadhīr ā vadāmi | aṃśumatīḥ kāṇḍinīr yā viśākhā hvayāmi te vīrudho vaiśvadevīr ugrāḥ puruṣajīvanīḥ ||
yad vaḥ sahaḥ sahamānā vīryaṃ yac ca vo balam | tenemam asmād yakṣmāt puruṣaṃ muñcantauṣadhīḥ ||
jīvalāṃ naghāriṣāṃ jīvantīm oṣadhīm uta | arundhatīm unnayantīṃ puṣpāṃ madhumatīṃ huve ||
ihā yantu pracetaso medinīr vacaso mama | yathemaṃ pārayāmasi puruṣaṃ duritād adhi ||
agner ghāso apāṃ garbho yā rohanti punarṇavāḥ |Bhatt. punarnavāḥ dhruvāḥ sahasranāmnīr bheṣajīḥ santv ābhṛtāḥ ||
avakolvā udakātmāna oṣadhayaḥ | vyajṛṣantī duritaṃtīkṣṇaśṛṅgyaḥ||
unmuñcantīr vivaruṇā ugrā yā viṣadūṣanīr atho balāsanāśanīḥ | rakṣonāśanīḥ kṛtyādūṣaṇīś ca yās tā ihāyantvoṣadhīḥ ||
śivās te santv oṣadhīr apakrītāḥ sahīyasīr vīrudho yā abhiṣṭutāḥ | apāṃ sarasvatīṃ jyeṣṭhāṃ trāyantām asmākaṃ gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ paśum ||
madhuman mūlaṃ madhumad agram āsāṃ madhuman madhyaṃ vīrudhāṃ babhūva | madhumat parṇaṃ madhumat puṣpam āsāṃ madhoḥ saṃbhūtā amṛtasya bhakṣo ghṛtam annaṃduhrategopurogavam ||
yāvatīḥ kīyatīś cemāḥ pṛthivyām adhy oṣadhīḥ | tā naḥ sahasraparṇyo mṛtyor muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
vaiyāghro maṇir vīrudhāṃ trāyamāṇo 'bhiśastipāḥ |Bhatt. trāyamāṇobhiśastipāḥ+ amīvāḥ sarvā rakṣāṃsy apa hantv adhi dūram asmat ||
siṃhasyeva stanathor oṣadhīnām agner iva vijanta ābhṛtābhyaḥ | gavāṃ yakṣmaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ vīrudbhir atinuttonāvyāetusrotyāḥ||Bhatt. atinukto … eta
mumucānāoṣadhayo agner vaiśvānarād adhi | bhūmiṃ saṃtanvatīrita yāsāṃ rājā vanaspatiḥ ||
yāś cāhaṃ veda vīrudho yāś ca paśyāmi cakṣuṣā | ajñātā jānīmaś ca yā yāsu vidmasi saṃbhṛtam | sarvāḥ samagrā oṣadhīr bodhantu vacaso mama ||
yā rohanty āṅgirasīḥ parvateṣu sameṣu ca vīrudho viśvabheṣajīḥ | tā no mayasvatīḥ śivā oṣadhīḥ santu śaṃ hṛde ||
aśvattho darbho vīrudhāṃ somo rājāmṛtaṃ haviḥ | vrīhir yavaś ca bheṣajau divas putrāv amartyau ||
uj jīhīdhve stanayaty abhikrandanty oṣadhīḥ | yadā vaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ parjanyo retasāvati ||
tasyāmṛtasyemaṃ balaṃ puruṣaṃ pārayāmasi | atho kṛṇomi bheṣajaṃ yathāsacchatahāyanaḥ ||
varāho veda vīrudhaṃ nakulo veda bheṣajīḥ | gandharvāḥ sarpā yā vidus tā ihāyantvoṣadhīḥ ||
yāḥ suparṇā āṅgirasīr divyā yā raghaṭo viduḥ | vayāṃsi haṃsā yā vidur yāś ca sarve patatriṇaḥ | mṛgā yā vidur oṣadhīs tā asmā avase huve ||
yāvatīnām oṣadhīnāṃ gāvaḥ prāśnanty aghnyā yāvatīnām ajāvayaḥ | tāvatīr viśvabheṣajīr ā bharāmi tvām abhi ||
yāvatīṣu manuṣyā bheṣajaṃ bhiṣajo viduḥ | tāvatīs tubhyam ābhṛtāḥ śarma yacchantv oṣadhīḥ ||
puṣpavatīḥ prasūmatīḥ phalinīr aphalā uta | saṃmātara iva duhrām asmā ariṣṭatātaye ||
uttvāhārṣaṃ pañcaśalād uttvā daśaśalād uta | uttvā yamasya paḍvīśād oṣadhībhir apīparam ||
indrasya prathamo ratho devānām aparo ratho varuṇasya tṛtīya it | ahīnām apamā ratha sthāṇum ārad athā riṣat ||
darbhaḥ śocis tarūṇakam aśvasya vāraḥ puruṣasya vāraḥ | rathasyabandhuramBhatt. bandhur mahīnām ahīnām arasaṃ viṣaṃ vār id ugram ||
ava śveta padā jahi pūrveṇa cāpareṇa ca | udaplutam iva dārv ahīnām arasaṃ viṣaṃ vār id ugram ||
araṃghaso nimajya- -unmajya punar abravīt | udaplutam iva dārv ahīnām arasaṃ viṣaṃ vār id ugram ||
paidvo hantikaṣarṇīlaṃ paidvaḥśvitramutāsitam|Bhatt. paidvaścitramupāsitam paidvoratharvyāḥśiraḥBhatt. rathavrayāḥ saṃ bibhedapṛdākvāḥ||Bhatt. pradākvāḥ
paidva prehi prathamo anu tvā vayam emasi |Bhatt. prathamonu ahīnvyasyatāt pathoBhatt. ahīnaviśvadāt yena smā vayam emasi ||
idaṃ paidvo ajāyata- -idam asya parāyaṇam | imāny arvataḥ padā- -ahighnyo vājinīvataḥ ||
saṃyataṃ na vi ṣparad vyāttaṃ na saṃ yamat | asmin kṣetre dvāv ahī strī ca pumāṃś ca tā ubhā arasā ||
arasāsa ihāhayo ye anti ye ca dūrake | ghanena hanmi vṛścikam ahiṃ daṇḍenāgatam ||
aghāśvasyedaṃ bheṣajam ubhayoḥsvajasyaca |Bhatt. sajasya indro mahyam aghāyantam ahiṃ paidvo arundhayat ||
paidvasya manmahe vayaṃ sthirasya sthiradhāmnaḥ | ime paścātpṛdākavaḥBhatt. pradākavaḥ pradīdhyataāsate ||Bhatt. pratīdhyata
naṣṭāsavo naṣṭaviṣā hatā indreṇa vajriṇā | jaghānendro jaghnimā vayam ||
hatās tiraścirājayo nipiṣṭāsaḥpṛdākavaḥ | darviṃkarikrataṃśvitraṃBhatt. ścitraṃ darbheṣv asitaṃ jahi ||
kairātikā kumārikā sakhā khanati bheṣajam | hiraṇyayībhirabhribhir girīṇām upa sānuṣu ||
āyam agan yuvā bhiṣak pṛśnihāparājitaḥ | sa vai svajasya jambhana ubhayor vṛścikasya ca ||
indro me 'hīn ajambhayanBhatt. mehīn mitraś ca varuṇaś ca | vātāparjanyobhā ||
paidvo me 'hīn ajambhayatBhatt. mehīn pṛdākūṃścapṛdākvaḥ|Bhatt. pradākūṃś ca pradākvaḥ svajāntiraścirājīn kasarṇīlāndaśonaśīn||Bhatt. kaśarṇīlān daśodaśīn
indro jaghāna prathamo janitāram ahe tava | teṣāṃ vas tṛhyamāṇānāṃ kaḥsvitteṣām asad rasaḥ ||Bhatt. kasyuteṣām
saṃ hi śīrṣāṇy agrabhaṃ pauñjiṣṭaiva karvaram |Bhatt. pauñjaṣṭa sindhor madhyaṃ paretya vy anijam aher viṣam ||
ahīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣaṃ parā vahantu sindhavaḥ | hatās tiraścirājayo nipiṣṭāsaḥpṛdākavaḥ||Bhatt. pradākavaḥ
oṣadhīnām ahaṃ vṛṇa urvarīr iva sādhuyā | nayāmy arvatīr iva- -ahe nir aitu te viṣam ||
yad agnau sūrye viṣaṃ pṛthivyām oṣadhīṣu yat | kāndāviṣaṃ kaniklakaṃBhatt. kaniklaka nir aitv aitu te vahiḥ ||
aṅgādaṅgāt pra cyāvaya hṛdayaṃ pari varjaya | adhā viṣasya yat tejo avācīnaṃ tad etu te ||
agne trāyasva vimadaṃ nayemaṃ punar dhehi jīvase jātavedaḥ | mā te heḍāṃsi duritāva ganma māhir vadhīd viṣataḥ puruṣaṃ naḥ ||Bhatt. viṣitaḥ
ye agnijā oṣadhijā ahīnāṃ ye abhrajā vidyuta ā babhūvuḥ | teṣāṃ jātāni bahudhā bahūniBhatt. vahudhā tebhyaḥsarpebhyonamasā vidhema ||Bhatt. sarvebhyo
taudī nāmāsi kanyā ghṛtācī nāma vā asi | adhaspadena te pador ā dade viṣadūṣaṇam ||
āre abhūd viṣam araud viṣe viṣam aprāg api | agnirahernir adhāg viṣaṃ somo niraṇayīt|Bhatt. aṇait daṃṣṭāramanvagād viṣam ahir amṛta ||Bhatt. daṃṣṭrāramanagād
kutas tau jātau katamaḥ so ardhaḥ kasmāl lokāt katarasyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ | vatsau virājaḥ salilād udaitāṃ tautvā pṛcchāmi katareṇa dugdhā ||Bhatt. taṃ tvā, drugdhā
yo 'krandayat salilaṃ mahitvāBhatt. yokrandayat yoniṃ kṛtvā tribhujaṃ śayānam |Bhatt. śayānā vatsaḥ kāmadugho virājo guhā cakre tanvaḥ parācīḥ ||
yāni catvāri bṛhanti yeṣāṃ caturthaṃ viyunakti vācam | brahmainad vidyāt tapasā vipaścid yasminn ekaṃ yujyate yasminn ekam ||
bṛhataḥ pari sāmāni ṣaṣṭhāt pañcādhi nirmitā | bṛhad bṛhatyā nirmitaṃ kuto 'dhi bṛhatī mitā ||Bhatt. kutodhi
bṛhatī pari mātrāyā mātur mātrādhi nirmitā | māyā hi jajñe māyāyā māyāyā mātalī pari ||
vaiśvānarasya pratimopari dyaur yāvad rodasī vibabādhe agniḥ | tataḥ ṣaṣṭhād āmuto yanti stomā ud ito yanty abhi ṣaṣṭham ahnaḥ ||
ṣaṭ ṭvā pṛcchāma ṛṣayaḥ kaśyapedaṃ tvaṃ hi yuktaṃ yuyukṣe yogyaṃ ca | virājam āhur brahmaṇaḥ pitaraṃ tāṃ no vi dhehyṛtuthāsakhibhyaḥ ||Bhatt. ṛtathā
yāṃ pracyutām anu yajñāḥ pracyuvanta upatiṣṭhanta upatiṣṭhamānām | tasyā vraje prasave yakṣam ejati sā virāḍ ṛṣayaḥ parame vyoman ||
aprāṇaiti prāṇena prāṇatīnāṃ virāṭ svarājam abhy eti paścāt | viśvaṃmṛśantīmabhirūpāṃ virājaṃBhatt. mṛṣantīm paśyanti tve na tve paśyanty enām ||
ko virājo mithunatvaṃ pra veda ka ṛtūn ka u kalpam asyāḥ | kramān ko asyā bahudhā vidugdhān ko asyā dhāma katidhā vyuṣṭīḥ ||
iyam eva sā yā prathamā vyaucchat sāpsv antaś carati praviṣṭā | vadhūr jigāya navagaj janitrī mahānto asyāṃ mahimāno antaḥ ||
chandaḥpakṣe uṣasā pepiśāne samānīṃ yonim anu saṃ carete | sūryapatnī saṃ carataḥ prajānatī ketumatī ajare bhūriretasā ||
ṛtasya panthām anu tisra āgus trayo gharmā anu reta āguḥ | prajām ekā jinvaty ūrjam ekā rāṣṭram ekā rakṣati devayūnām ||
agnīṣṭomam adadhur yā turīyāsīd yajñasya pakṣām ṛṣayaḥ kalpayantaḥ | gāyatrīṃ triṣṭubhaṃ jagatīm anuṣṭubhaṃ bṛhadarkīṃ yajamānāya svar ābharantaḥ ||
pañca vyuṣṭīr anu pañca dohā gāṃ pañcanāmnīm ṛtavo 'nu pañca |Bhatt. ṛtavonu pañca diśaḥ pañcadaśenakl̥ptās tā ekamūrdhnīr abhi lokam ekam ||
ṣaḍ jātā bhūtā prathamaja rtasya ṣaḍ u sāmāni ṣaḍahaṃ vahanti | ṣaḍyogaṃ sīram anu sāmasāma ṣaḍ āhur dyāvāpṛthivī ṣaḍurvīḥ||urvīḥwith ŚS; Bhatt. ūrvī
ṣaḍ āhuḥśītānṣaḍ u māsauṣṇānBhatt. śītāṃ … uṣṇāṃ ṛtūnno brūta yatamo 'tiriktaḥ |Bhatt.ṛtuṃ… yatamotiriktaḥ sapta suparṇāḥ kavayo ni ṣeduḥ sapta chandāṃsy anu sapta dīkṣāḥ ||
sapta homāḥ samidho ha sapta madhūni saptartavo nu sapta | saptājyāni pari bhūtam āyan sapta hotāra ṛtuthā yajanti tāḥ saptagṛdhrā itiśuśravāham||
aṣṭau dhāmāni prathamaja rtasya- -aṣṭendrartvijo daivyā ye | aṣṭayonir aditir aṣṭaputrā aṣṭamīṃ rātrim abhi havyam eti ||
itthaṃ śreyo manyamānedam āgāṃ yuṣmākaṃ sakhye aham asmiśevā|Bhatt. sevā samānajanmā kratur astu vaḥ śivaḥ sa naḥ sarvāḥ saṃ carati prajānan ||
kevalīndrāya duduhe hi gṛṣṭir vaśaṃ pīyūṣaṃ prathamaṃ duhānā | athātarpayac caturaś caturdhā devān manuṣyām̐ asurān utarṣīn ||
aṣṭendrasya ṣaḍ yamasya ṛṣīṇāṃ sapta saptadhā | apo manuṣyān oṣadhīs tān u pañcānu secire ||
ko nu gauḥ ka ekarṣiḥ kim u sāma kā āśiṣaḥ | yakṣmaṃ pṛthivyām ekavṛd ekartuḥ katamo nu saḥ ||
eko gaur eka ekarṣir ekaṃ sāmaikadhāśiṣaḥ | yakṣmaṃ pṛthivyām ekavṛd ekarturnāti ricyate ||
prāṇāya namo yasya sarvam idaṃ vaśe | yo bhūtaḥ sarvasyeśvaro yasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam ||
namas te prāṇa krandāya namas te stanayitnave | namas te astu vidyute namas te prāṇa varṣate ||
yat prāṇa ṛtāv āgate abhikrandaty oṣadhīḥ | pra vīyante garbhaṃ dadhate atho bahvīr vi jāyante ||
yat prāṇa stanayitnunā- -abhikrandaty oṣadhīḥ | sarvaṃ tadā pra modate yad u kiṃ ca bhūmyām adhi ||
yadā prāṇo abhyakrandīd varṣeṇa stanayitnunā | paśavas tat pra modante maho vai no bhaviṣyati ||
abhivṛṣṭā oṣadhayaḥ prāṇena sam avādiran | āyur vai naḥ prātītarat sarvā naḥ surabhīr akaḥ ||
namas te prāṇa prāṇate namo astv apānate | pratīcīnāya te namaḥ parācīnāya te namaḥ sarvasmai ta idaṃ namaḥ ||
namas te astv āyate namo astu parāyate | namas te prāṇa tiṣṭhata āsīnāyota te namaḥ ||
yā te prāṇa priyā tanū yā vā te prāṇa preyasī | atho yad bheṣajaṃ tava tasya no dhehi jīvase ||
prāṇaḥ prajā anuvasteBhatt. anu paste, Barret anūpāste pitā putram iva priyam | prāṇo ha sarvasyeśvaroBhatt. prāṇe yac ca prāṇati yac ca na ||
prāṇo mṛtyuḥ prāṇo amṛtaṃBhatt. prāṇomṛtaṃ prāṇaṃ devā upāsate | prāṇo ha satyavādinam uttame loka ā dadhat ||
prāṇo virāṭ prāṇo deṣṭrī prāṇaṃ sarvā upāsate | prāṇo 'gniś candramāḥ sūryaḥBhatt. agniś prāṇam āhuḥ prajāpatim ||
prāṇāpānau vrīhayavāv anaḍvān prāṇa ucyate | yave ha prāṇa āhito apāno vrīhir ucyate ||Bhatt. āhitopāno
apānati prāṇati puruṣo garbhe antaḥ | yadā tvaṃ prāṇa jinvasy atha sa jāyate tvat ||
prāṇam āhur mātariśvānaṃ vāto ha prāṇa ucyate | prāṇe ha bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ ca prāṇe sarvaṃ samāhitam ||
ātharvaṇīr āṅgirasīr daivīrmanuṣyajāś ca yāḥ |Bhatt. devīr sarvāḥ pra modantaoṣadhīr yadā tvaṃ prāṇa jinvasi ||
yadā prāṇo abhyavarṣīd varṣeṇa pṛthivīṃ mahīm | oṣadhayaḥ pra modante atho yāḥ kāś ca vīrudhaḥ ||Bhatt. modantetho
yas te prāṇedaṃ veda yasmiṃś cāsi pratiṣṭhitaḥ | sarve asmai baliṃ harānBhatt. valiṃ amuṣmiṃl loka uttame ||
yathā prāṇabalihṛtasBhatt.valihṛtas tubhyaṃ sarvāḥ prajā imāḥ | evā tasmai baliṃ harānBhatt. valiṃ yas tvā śuśrāva śuśruvuḥ ||
antargarbhaś carati devatāsv ābhūto bhūtaḥ sa u jāyate punaḥ | sa bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhaviṣyat pitā putraṃ pra viveśā śacībhiḥ ||
ekaṃ padaṃ not khidati salilād dhaṃsa utpatan |Bhatt. utpataṃ yad aṅga sa tam utkhiden naivādyanaśvo na rātrīnāhaḥsyānBhatt. utkhidenvaivādya na śce rātrī nāha na prajñāyaiti kiṃ cana ||
aṣṭācakraṃ vartata ekanemi sahasrākṣaraṃ pra puro ni paścāt | ardhenedaṃ pari babhūva viśvaṃ yad asyārdhaṃ katamaḥ sa ketuḥ ||
yo asya viśvajanmana īśe sarvasya ceṣṭataḥ | anyeṣu kṣipradhanvane tasmai prāṇa namo 'stu te ||Bhatt. namostu
yo asya sarvajanmana īśe viśvasya ceṣṭataḥ | atandro brahmaṇā dhīraḥ prāṇo mām abhi rakṣatu ||
ūrdhvaḥ supteṣu jāgāra nanu tīryaṅ ni padyate | na suptam asya supteṣv anu śuśrāva kaś cana ||Bhatt. suśrāva
prāṇa māmatparyāvṛtoBhatt. māvat namadanyo bhaviṣyasi |Bhatt. vadanyo apāṃ garbham iva jīvase prāṇa badhnāmi tvā mayi ||
sāhasras tveṣa ṛṣabhaḥ payasvān viśvā rūpāṇi vakṣaṇāsu bibhrat | bhadraṃ dātre yajamānāya śikṣan bārhaspatya usriyas tantumātān||Bhatt. ātāṃ
apāṃ yo agre pratimā babhūva prabhūḥ sarvasmaipṛthivīvadevī |Bhatt. pṛthivī ca pitā vatsānāṃ patir aghnyānāṃ sāhasre poṣe api naḥ kṛṇotu ||
pumānantarvānsthaviraḥ payasvānBhatt. antarvāṃ vasoḥ kabandham ṛṣabho bibharti | tam indrāya pathibhir devayānair hutam agnir vahatu jātavedāḥ ||
devānāṃ bhāga upanāha eṣo apāṃ rasa oṣadhīnāṃ ghṛtasya |Bhatt. eṣopāṃ somasya drapsam avṛṇīta śakro bṛhannadrirabhavad yac charīram ||Bhatt. abhir
pitā vatsānāṃ patir aghnyānām atho pitā mahatāṃ gargarāṇām | vatso jarāyuḥ pratidhuk pīyūṣa āmikṣā ghṛtaṃ tad v asya retaḥ ||
somasya pūrṇaṃ kalaśaṃ bibharṣi tvaṣṭā rūpāṇāṃ janitā paśūnām | śivās te santu prajanva imā ny asmabhyaṃ svadhite yaccha yā amūḥ ||
indrasyaujovaruṇasya bāhū aśvinor aṃsau marutām iyaṃ kakut | bṛhaspatisaṃbhṛtam etam āhur ye dhīrāsaḥ kavayo ye manīṣiṇaḥ ||
ājyaṃ bibharti ghṛtam asya retaḥ sāhasraḥ poṣas tam u yajñam āhuḥ | indrasya rūpam ṛṣabho vasānaḥ so asmāṃ devāḥ śiva aitu dattaḥ ||
daivīrviśaḥpayasvān ā tanoṣi tvām indraṃ tvāṃ sarasvantam āhuḥ | sahasraṃ sa ekamukhā dadāti yo brāhmaṇa ṛṣabham ā juhoti ||
bṛhaspatiḥ savitā te mano dadhau tvaṣṭur vāyoḥ pary ātmā ta ābhṛtaḥ | antarikṣe manasā tvā juhomi barhiṣṭe dyāvāpṛthivī abhūtām ||
ya indra iva deveṣv eti goṣu vivāvadat | tasya ṛṣabhasyāṅgāni brahmā saṃ stautu bhadrayā ||
pārśve āstām anumatyā bhagasyāstāmanūvṛjau|Bhatt. anuvṛjau aṣṭhīvantāv abravīn mitro mamaitaukevalāv iti ||Bhatt. mamaito
bhasad āsīd ādityānāṃ śroṇī āstāṃ bṛhaspateḥ | pucchaṃ vātasya devasya tena dhūnoty oṣadhīḥ ||
kroḍaāsījjāmiśaṃsasyaBhatt. āsīrjāmisaṃsasya somasya kalaśo dhṛtaḥ |Bhatt. dṛtaḥ utthātur abruvan pado yad ṛṣabhaṃ vyakalpayan ||
gudā āsan sinīvālyāḥ sūryāyās tvacam abruvan | devāḥ saṃgatya yat sarva ṛṣabhaṃ vyakalpayan ||
te kuṣṭhikāḥsaramāyaiBhatt. svaramāyai kūrmebhyo adadhuḥśaphān|Bhatt. śaphāṃ ūbadhyamasya kīṭebhyaś śvavartebhyoadhārayan ||Bhatt. śaparttebhyo
śṛṅgābhyāṃ rakṣa ṛṣaty arātiṃ hanti cakṣuṣā | śṛṇoti bhadraṃ karṇābhyāṃ gavāṃ yaḥ patir aghnyaḥ ||
śatayājaṃsayajateBhatt. śatayātaṃ sejate nainaṃdunvantyagnayaḥ |Bhatt. nṛṇvanty jinvanti sarve taṃ devā yo brāhmaṇa ṛṣabham ā juhoti ||
brāhmaṇāya vṛṣabhaṃ dattvāBhatt. brāhmaṇa ṛṣabhaṃ varīyaḥ kṛṇute manaḥ | puṣṭiṃ soaghnyānāṃ sve goṣṭhe vi paśyatu ||Bhatt. aghnyānāsme
gāvaḥ santu prajāḥ santv atho astu tanūbalam | sarvaṃ tad anu manyantāṃ devāṛṣabhadāyine||
ayaṃpipānaindriyaṃ rayiṃ bibharticetanīm|Bhatt. retanīm ayaṃdhenuṃsudughāṃ nityavatsāṃ vaśaṃ duhe vipaścitaṃ puro divaḥ ||
piśaṅgarūpo nabhaso vayodhā aindraḥ śuṣmo viśvarūpo na āgan | prajām asmabhyaṃ dadhad rayiṃ ca rāyaspoṣam upasatvā sadema ||
etaṃ vo yuvānaṃ pari dadhmo atra tena krīḍantīścaratavaśām̐ anu | mā no hiṃsiṣṭa januṣā subhāgā rāyaś ca poṣair abhi naḥ sacadhvam ||
upehopaparcano 'smin goṣṭha upa pṛñcatu | upa ṛṣabhasya yad reta upendra tava vīryam ||
ayaṃ pratisaro maṇir vīro vīrāya badhyate | vīryāvāntsapatnahā śūravīraḥ paripāṇaḥ sumaṅgalaḥ ||
ayaṃ maṇiḥ sapatnahā suvīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna ugraḥ | pratyak kṛtyā dūṣayann etu vīraḥ ||
anenendro maṇinā vṛtram ahann anenāsurān parābhāvayan manīṣī | anena dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ajayad anenājayat pradiśaś catasraḥ ||
ayaṃ srāktyo maṇiḥ pratīvartaḥpratisaraḥ | ojasvān vimṛdho maṇiḥ so asmān pātu viśvataḥ ||
tad agnir āha tad u soma āha bṛhaspatiḥ savitā tad indraḥ | te te devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥpratisarairajantu ||Bhatt. pratisarau rujantu
antar dadhe dyāvāpṛthivī utāhar uta sūryam | utemaṃ brahmaṇaspatiṃ te te devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥpratisarairajantu ||Bhatt. pratisarau rujantu
ye srāktyaṃ maṇiṃ janā varmāṇi kṛṇvate | sūryo divam ivāruhya vi kṛtyā bādhate vaśī ||
srāktyena maṇina ṛṣiṇeva manīṣiṇā | ajaiṣaṃ sarvāḥ pṛtanā vi mṛdho hanmi rakṣasaḥ ||
yāḥ kṛtyā āṅgirasīr yāḥ kṛtyā āsurīr uta | kṛtyā yāḥ svayaṃkṛtā yā u cānyebhir ābhṛtāḥ | ubhayīs tāḥ parā yantu parāvataṃ navatiṃ nāvyāati||Bhatt. nāvyāyati
asmai maṇiṃ varma badhnantu devā indro viṣṇuḥ savitā rudro agniḥ | prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī virāḍ vaiśvānara ṛṣayaś ca sarve ||
uttamo asy oṣadhīnām anaḍvān jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva | yam aicchāmāvadāma taṃ pratispāśanamabruvan ||
sa id vyāghro bhavaty atho siṃho atho vṛṣā sarvā diśo vi rājatiBhatt. omits this pāda yo bibhartīmaṃ maṇim ||
nainaṃ ghnanty apsaraso na gandharvā na martyāḥ | sarvā diśo vi rājāti yo bibhartīmaṃ maṇim ||
kaśyapas tvām asṛjata kaśyapas tvāṃ samairayat | abibhastvendro mānuṣeBhatt. abhivas bibhratsaṃśreṣiṇe'jayat ||Bhatt. sāśreśraṇejayat
maṇiṃ sapatnajambhanaṃ varma devā abadhnata | yas tvā kṛtyābhir yas tvā dīkṣābhir yas tvā yajñair jighāṃsati | pratyaktvamindra taṃ jahiBhatt. tamindra vajreṇa śataparvaṇā ||
ayam idvaipratīvartaḥBhatt. vaiḥ sahasvān sañjayo maṇiḥ | prajāṃ dhanaṃ ca rakṣatu paripāṇaḥ sumaṅgalaḥ ||
asapatnaṃ no adharād asapatnaṃ na uttarāt | indrāsapatnaṃ naḥ paścāj jyotiḥśūrapuras kṛdhi ||Bhatt. jyotiṣpuraḥ puras
aindrāgnaṃ varma bahulaṃ yad ugraṃ viśve devā nāti vidhyanti sarve | tat te tanvaṃ trāyatāṃ sarvato bṛhad āyuṣmān jaradaṣṭir yathāsat ||
ā tvārukṣad devamaṇir mahyā ariṣṭatātaye | imaṃ methim abhisaṃviśadhvaṃ tanūpānaṃ trivarūtham ojase ||
asminn indro ni dadhātu nṛmṇam imaṃ devāso abhisaṃviśadhvam | dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya- -āyuṣmān jaradaṣṭir yathāsat ||
indro badhnātu te maṇiṃ jigīvām̐ aparājitaḥ somapā abhayaṅkaro vṛṣā | sa tvā rakṣatu sarvadā divā naktaṃ ca viśvataḥ ||
indro manthatu manthitā śakraḥ śūraḥ purandaraḥ | yathā hanāma senām amitrāṇāṃ sahasraśaḥ ||
pūtirajjurupadhmānīBhatt. ubadhnānī pūtiṃ senāṃ kṛṇotvamūm|Bhatt. amuṃ agniṃ dhūmaṃ parādṛśya hṛtsv ā dadhatāṃ bhayam ||
paruṣān amūn paruṣāhvaḥ kṛṇotu hanty enān vadhako vadhaiḥ | kṣipraṃ śara iva bhajyantāṃ bṛhajjālena saṃjitāḥ ||
amūn aśvattha ni śṛṇīhi khādāmūnkhadirājiram| tājadbhaṅga iva bhajyantāṃ bṛhajjālena saṃjitāḥ ||
antarikṣaṃ jālam āsīj jāladaṇḍā diśo mahīḥ | tenābhidāya senām indro dasyūnapāvapat||Bhatt. upāvapat
bṛhatte jālaṃ bṛhata indraśūraBhatt. bṛha te … śūraḥ sahasrārghasyaśatavīryasya | tenā ny ubja maghavann amitrānBhatt. amitrā śaśvatībhyaḥsamābhyaḥ ||
bṛhat te jālaṃ bṛhataśBhatt. bṛhadda śakrasya vājinīvataḥ | tenā śataṃ sahasram ayutaṃ jaghāna- -indro dasyūnām abhidhāya senām ||
ayaṃ loko jālam āsīc chakrasya mahato mahān | tenāham indrajālena tamasāmūn abhi dadhāmi sarvān ||
sedirugrāvartir ārtiś cānapavācanā | śramas tandrīś ca mohaś ca tairamūn abhi dadhāmi sarvān ||Bhatt. tainamūn
mṛtyaveamūnpra yacchāmiBhatt. mṛtyavemūṃ mṛtyupāśair amīsitāḥ|Bhatt. śitāḥ mṛtyor yeaghalādūtāsBhatt. aghalā tebhya enān prati nayāmibaddhvā||Bhatt.baddhān
mṛtyudūtāamūnnayata yamadūtā apombhata | paraḥ sahasrā hanyantāṃ tṛṇeḍhv enānmatyaṃbhavasya||Bhatt. martyaṃ bhavaśca
sādhyā ekaṃ jāladaṇḍam udyatyayanty ojasā | rudrā dvitīyaṃ vasavas tṛtīyam ādityair ekaudyataḥ||
viśve devā upariṣṭād ubjanto yantv ojasā | madhyena ghnanto yantu senām aṅgiraso vadhaiḥ ||
vanaspatīn vānaspatyān oṣadhīr uta vīrudhaḥ | dvipāccatuṣpādiṣṇāmi yathā senāmamūṃhanat ||
gandharvāpsaraso devān sarpān puṇyajanān pitṝn | dṛṣṭān adṛṣṭān iṣṇāmiBhatt. dṛṣṭāṃ yathā senāmamūṃhanat ||
mṛtyupāśā ime yuktā yān ākramya na mucyase | amuṣyā hantu senāyā idaṃ kūṭaṃsahasraśaḥ||Bhatt. sahasrahaṃ
gharmaḥ samiddho agninā- -ayaṃ homaḥ sahasrahā | bhavaś ca pṛśnibāhuḥ śarvasenāmamūṃhatam ||Bhatt. sarva
mṛtyoroṣamā padyantāṃBhatt. mṛtyorāsam kṣudhaṃsediṃvadhaṃ bhayam |Bhatt. sedhiṃ indraś cākṣujālābhyāṃ śarvasenāmamūṃhatam ||Bhatt. sarva
parājitāḥ pra trasatāmitrā jitādhāvatabrahmaṇā | bṛhaspatipraṇuttānāṃ māmīṣāṃ moci kaś cana ||
ava padyantām eṣām āyudhāni māśakanpratidhām iṣum |Bhatt. śakaṃ athaiṣāṃ bahu bibhyatām iṣavo ghnantu marmaṇi ||
sam enān krośatāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe sam antarikṣaṃ saha devatābhiḥ | mā jñātāraṃ māpratiṣṭhāṃvidantaBhatt. pratiṣṭhāmidanta mitho 'pighnānā upa yantu mṛtyum ||read vighnānā or 'bhighnānā?
diśaś catasro 'śvataryo devarathasya puroḍāśāḥBhatt. catasrośvataryo śaphā antarikṣamuddhiḥ||Bhatt. udbhiḥ
dyāvāpṛthivī pakṣasī ṛtavo 'bhīśavoBhatt. ṛtavobhīśavo vākparirathyam||Bhatt. parirukthiyam
ahorātre cakre māsāarāḥBhatt. māsārā, but note crit. app. saṃvatsaro adhiṣṭhānam ||
virāḍ īṣāgnī rathamukham indraḥ savyaṣṭhāś candramāḥ sārathiḥ ||
ito jayeto vi jayasva jaya saṃ jaya svāhā ||
divas pṛthivyā antarikṣāt samudrād agner vātān madhukaśā hi jajñe | tāṃcāyitvāmṛtaṃvasānāṃ hṛdbhiḥprajāḥ prati nandanti sarvāḥ ||Bhatt. ṛgbhiḥ
paśyanty asyāś caritaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthaṅ naro bahudhā mīmāṃsamānāḥ | agner vātān madhukaśā hi jajñe marutām ugrā naptiḥ ||
mahad viśvarūpaṃ payo asyāḥ samudrasyota tvā reta āhuḥ | yata aiti madhukaśā rarāṇā tat prāṇas tad amṛtaṃ niviṣṭam ||
mātādityānāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ prāṇaḥ prajānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ | hiraṇyavarṇā madhukaśā ghṛtācī mahad bhargaś carati martyeṣu ||
madhoḥ kaśām ajanayanta devās tasyā garbho abhavad viśvarūpam | taṃ jātaṃ taruṇaṃ piparti mātā sa jāto viśvā bhuvanābhi vaste ||
kas tau pra vedakau tau na āha yāv asyā stanau sahasradhārāv akṣitau | ūrjaṃ duhāteanapasphurantau||
kas taṃ pra veda ka u taṃ ciketa yo asyā hṛdaḥ kalaśaḥ somadhāno akṣitaḥ | brahmā sumedhāḥ so asmin madeta ||
hiṅkarikratī bṛhatī vayodhā uccairghoṣābhi yāti yāvratā| trīn gharmān abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyuṃ payate payobhiḥ ||
yām āpīnām upa sīdanty āpo yāṃ śakvarā vṛṣabhā yāṃ svarājaḥ | te varṣanti tevarṣayantiBhatt. te varṣanti te varṣanti tad vide kāmam ūrjam āpaḥ ||
stanayitnus te vāk prajāpate vṛṣā śuṣmaṃ kṣipasi bhūmyām adhi | agner vātān madhukaśā hi jajñe marutām ugrā naptiḥ ||
yathā somaḥ prātaḥsavane aśvinor bhavati priyaḥ | evā me aśvinā varca ātmani dhriyatām ||
yathā somo dvitīyasavana indrāgnyor bhavati priyaḥ | evā ma indrāgnī varcaḥ (…) ||
yathā somas tṛtīyasavana ṛbhūṇāṃ bhavati priyaḥ | evā ma ṛbhavo varca ātmani dhriyatām ||
madhujaniṣīya madhu maṃsiṣīya | payasvān agna āgamaṃ taṃ mā saṃ sṛja varcasā ||
saṃ māgne varcasā sṛja saṃ prajayā sam āyuṣā | vidyur me asya devā indro vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ ||
yad giriṣv iti pāñcarcikī ||
yathā madhu madhukṛtaḥ saṃbharanti madhāv adhi | evā me aśvinā balam ojaś ca dhriyatām ||
yathā makṣā idaṃ madhu nyañjanti kṣaṇāv adhi | evā me aśvinā varcas tejaś ca dhriyatām ||
aśvinā sāragheṇa mā madhunāṅktaṃśubhaspatī |Bhatt. madhumāṅgaṃ, emend. madhu māṅtaṃ yathā varcasvatīṃ vācam ā vadāni janām̐ anu ||
vṛṣā śuṣmaṃ kṣipasi bhūmyāṃ divo madhoḥkaśayāpṛthivīm anakṣi |Bhatt. kaśāyā tāṃ jātāṃ paśava upa jīvanti sarve tenoseṣamūrjaṃ piparti ||Bhatt. śeṣam
pṛthivī daṇḍo antarikṣaṃ garbho dyauḥ kaśā vidyut prakaśaḥ | madhoḥ kaśāsi ghṛtācī hiraṇyayo binduḥ ||
urvy asi prabhvy asy ambho 'si nabho 'si maho 'si | ambho mā kṛṇu nabho māṃ kṛṇu maho mā kṛṇu ||
samudro 'sy akṣitoaparimitaḥBhatt. aparimitā sahasrasaniḥ sahasraṃ mā gacchatu | yo vai madhukaśāyāḥ sapta madhūni veda sapta madhumatīn ||
madhumantaṃ lokaṃ jayati madhv asyāhāryaṃ bhavati | yad vīdhre stanayati prajāpatir eva tat prajābhyaḥ prādur bhavati ||
tasmāt prācīnopavītas tiṣṭhet prajāpate 'nu mā budhyasveti | anv enaṃ prajāpatir anu prajā budhyante ya evaṃ veda ||
yāṃ kalpayanti vahatau vadhūm iva viśvarūpāṃ hastakṛtāṃ cikitsavaḥ | sārād etv apa nudāma enān ||
śīrṣaṇvatīṃ payasvatīṃ karṇinīṃ kṛtāṃ kṛtyākṛtā saṃbhṛtāṃ viśvarūpām | pratyak prati pra hiṇmasi yaś cakāra tam ṛcchatu ||
śūdrakṛtā rājakṛtā strīkṛtā brahmabhiḥ kṛtā | jāyā patyā nutteva kartāraṃbandhumṛcchatu ||
anayāham oṣadhyety ekā ||
kṛtyāḥ santu kṛtyākṛte śapathāḥ śapathīvne | pratyak prati pra hiṇmasi yaś cakāra tam ṛcchatu ||
pratīcīna āṅgiraso 'dhyakṣo naḥ purohitaḥ | pratīcīḥ kṛtyā ākṛtya- -amuṃ kṛtyākṛtaṃ jahi ||
yas tvovāca parehīti pratikūlam udāyyam | taṃ kṛtye 'bhi ni vartasva māsmān iccho anāgasaḥ ||
yas te parūṃṣi saṃdadhau rathasyeva vibhur dhiyā |read rathasyeva rbhur dhiyā? taṃ gaccha tatra te +'yanam ajñātas te 'yaṃ janaḥ ||Bhatt. teyaṃ
yetvākṛtyāālebhireBhatt. yas tvā kṛtyālebhire vidvalā abhicāriṇaḥ | vidmedaṃ kṛtyādūṣaṇaṃ prativartma punaḥsaraṃ tena tvā snapayāmasi ||
yad durbhagāṃprasnapitāṃBhatt. praśnapitā mṛtavatsām upeyima | apaitu sarvaṃ mat pāpaṃ draviṇaṃ mopa tiṣṭhatu ||
yat te pitṛbhyo dadato yajñe vā nāma jagṛhuḥ | saṃdeśyāt sarvasmāt pāpād imā muñcantu tvauṣadhīḥ ||
devainasātpitryānnāmagrāhāt saṃdeśyādabhiniṣkṛtāt| muñcantu tvā vīrudho vīryeṇa brahmaṇa ṛgbhiḥ payasa ṛṣīṇām ||
yathā vātaścyāvayatibhūmyā reṇum antarikṣāc cābhram | evāsmat sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃ brahmanuttamapāyati||Bhatt. brahmanuktamupāyati
apa krāma nānadatī vinaddhā gardabhīva | kartṝnnakṣasvetonuttāBhatt. ṛcchasveto brahmaṇā vīryāvatā ||
ayaṃ panthāpi nayāmi tvā kṛtye prahitāṃ prati tvā pra hiṇmaḥ | tenābhi yāhi bhuñjaty anasvatīva vāhinī viśvarūpā kurūṭinī ||
parāk te jyotir apathaṃ te arvāg anyatrāsmad ayanā kṛṇuṣva | pareṇehi navatiṃ nāvyāati durgā srotyā mā kṣaniṣṭhāḥ parehi ||
vāta iva vṛkṣaṃ nimṛṇīhipādaya mā gām aśvaṃ puruṣam uc chiṣa eṣām | kartṝnnivṛtyetaḥ kṛtye aprajāstvāya bodhaya ||Bhatt. kṛtyeprajāstvāya
yāṃte cakrur barhiṣi yāṃ śmaśāne kṛtyāṃ kṣetre valagaṃ vā nicakhnuḥ | agnau vā tvā gārhapatye 'bhiceruḥBhatt. vāktvā gārhapatyebhiceruḥ pākaṃ santaṃ dhīratarā anāgasaṃ tad ito nāśayāmasi ||
upāhṛtam anubuddhaṃ nikhātaṃ vairaṃ tsāryanvavidāma kartṝn |Bhatt. tsāryaṃnavidāma tad etu yata āgataṃ tatrāśva iva vartatāṃ hantu kṛtyākṛtaḥ prajām ||
svāyasāasayaḥsanti no gṛheBhatt. svāyasāsayaḥ vidma te kṛtye yatidhā parūṃṣi ||
ut tiṣṭhaiva parehīto ajñāte kim ihecchasi |Bhatt. parehītojñāte grīvās te kṛtye pādau ca- -apikartsyāminir drava ||
indrāgnī asmān rakṣatāṃ yau prajānāṃ prajāpatī | somo rājādhipā mṛḍitā ca- -ṛtasya naḥ patayo mṛḍayantu ||
bhavāśarvāv asyatāṃ pāpakṛtvane kṛtyākṛte duṣkṛte vidyutaṃ devahetim ||
yady eyatha dvipadī catuṣpadī kṛtyākṛtā saṃbhṛtā viśvarūpā | seto'ṣṭāpadī bhūtvāBhatt. svedoṣṭāpadī punaḥ parehi ducchune ||
abhyaktāktā svaraṃkṛtā sarvaṃ bharantī duritaṃ parehi | jānīhi kṛtye kartāraṃ duhiteva pitaraṃ svam ||
parehi kṛtye mātiṣṭho viddhasyeva padaṃ naya | mṛgaḥsa mṛgayustvaṃBhatt. mṛgasya … taṃ na tvā nikartum arhati ||
martyo mṛtyuḥ svayaṃkṛtaṃ yaṃcakārācittyā|Bhatt. cityā hastābhyām ātmane vadham ||
uta hantipūrvāsinaṃ pratyādāyāparaiṣvā |Bhatt. pratyādāyāvarhiṣvā uto pūrvasya nighnato vi hanty aparaḥ prati ||Bhatt. avaraḥ
etad dhi śṛṇu me vaco athehi yataeyatha|Bhatt. vacothehi yateyatha yas tvā cakāra taṃ punaḥ ||
anāgohatyaṃ vai bhīmaṃ kṛtye mā no gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ vadhīḥ ||
yatrayatrāsinihitā tatas tvotthāpayāmasi | parṇāl laghīyasī bhava ||
yadi sthatamasāvṛtāBhatt. tamasābhṛtā jālenābhihitāyūyam |Bhatt. jālenābhihatā sarvāḥ saṃlupyetaḥkṛtyāḥBhatt. kṛtyā punaḥkartrepra hiṇmasi ||Bhatt. kṛtye
kṛtyākṛtaṃ mūlakṛtam abhiniṣkāriṇaḥ prajām | mṛṇīhi kṛtye moc chiṣo amuṃ kṛtyākṛtaṃ jahi ||Bhatt. chiṣomuṃ
yathā sūryas tamaso mucyate pari rātriṃ jahāty uṣasaś ca ketūn | evāhaṃ sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃ hastīva rajo duritaṃ jahāmi ||
upamitaḥ pratimito 'tho parimitaś ca yāḥ | śālāyā viśvavārāyā naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi ||
yat te naddhaṃ viśvavāre pāśo granthiś ca yaḥ kṛtaḥ | bṛhaspatir ivāhaṃ balaṃ vācā visraṃsayāmitat ||
āyayāmasaṃbabarhaBhatt. yāma saṃ vavṛha granthiṃ cakāra te dṛḍham | parūṃṣi vidvāṃ śasteva- -indreṇa vi cṛtāmasi ||
saṃdaṃśānāṃpaladānāṃ pariṣvañjalyasyaca |Bhatt. paruṣyaṃjalyasya sarvā mānasya patnyā te naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi ||
vaṃśānāṃ te nahanāni prāṇāhasya tṛṇasya ca | pakṣāṇāṃ viśvavāre te naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi ||
yāni te antaḥ śikyāny ābedhū raṇyāya kam | pratetāni vi cṛtāmasiBhatt. cetāni śivā mānasya patni na uddhitā tanve bhava ||
havirdhānam agniśālaṃ patnīnāṃ sadanaṃ sadaḥ | sado devānām asi devi śāle ||
akṣum opaśaṃ vitataṃ sahasrākṣaṃ viṣūvati | apinaddham abhihitaṃ brahmaṇā vi cṛtāmasi ||
yaś ca tvā prati gṛhṇāti yena cāsi mitā tvam | ubhau mānasya patni tau jīvatāṃ jaradaṣṭī ||
amutrainam āgacchatādBhatt. gacchatāṃ dṛḍhā naddhā pariṣkṛtā | tasyās te vi cṛtāmasy aṅgamaṅgaṃ paruṣparuḥ ||
agnim antaś chādayasi puruṣān paśubhiḥ saha | vijāvati prajāvati vi te pāśāṃś cṛtāmasi ||
ūrjasvatī ghṛtavatī pṛthivyāṃ nimitā mitā | viśvānnaṃ bibhratī śālā mā hiṃsīḥ pratigṛhṇataḥ ||
yas tvā pūrvo nimimāya saṃjabhāra vanaspatīn | prajāyai cakre tvā śāle parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ ||
namas tasmai namo dātre śālāpataye ca kṛṇmasi | namo 'gnaye pracarateBhatt. namognaye puruṣāya ca te namaḥ ||
gobhyo aśvebhyo namo yac chālāyāṃ vijāyate | antarā dyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ca yad vyacas tena śālāṃ prati gṛhṇāmi ta imām ||
yad antarikṣaṃ rajaso vimānaṃ tatkṛṇvaudaraṃ śevadhibhyaḥ | yac chālāṃ prati gṛṇāmi tasmai ||
tṛṇair āvṛtā paladān vasānā rātrīva śālā jagato niveśanī | mitā pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhati hastinīva padvatī ||
yā dvipakṣā catuṣpakṣā ṣaṭpakṣā yā nimīyate | aṣṭāpakṣāṃ daśapakṣāṃ śālāṃ mānasya patnīm agnir garbha ivā śaye ||
iṭasya te vi cṛtāmy apinaddham aporṇuvan |Bhatt. aporṇuvaṃ varuṇena samubjitāṃ mitraḥ prātar vy ubjatu ||
kulāye 'dhi kulāyāṃBhatt. kulāyedhi kośe kośaḥ samubjitaḥ | tatra marto vi jāyate yasmād viśvaṃ prajāyate ||
catuḥsraktiṃ paricakrāṃ kavibhir nimitāṃ mitām | indrāgnī rakṣataḥ śālām amṛtausomyaṃsadaḥ||Bhatt. saumyau ṣadaḥ
mā naḥ pāśān prati muco gurur bhāro laghur bhava | vadhūm iva tvā śāle yatrakāmaṃ bharāmasi ||
imā āpaḥ pra harāmy ayakṣmā yakṣmanāśanīḥ | gṛhān abhi pra sīdāmy amṛtena sahāgninā ||
pratīcīṃ tvā pratīcīnaḥ śālepraimyahiṃsatīm | agnir hy antar āpaś ca- -ṛtasya prathamobhā ||
svāhā devebhyaḥsvāhyebhyaḥ prācyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne ||
svāhā devebhyaḥsvāhyebhyo dakṣiṇasyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne ||
svāhā devebhyaḥsvāhyebhyaḥ pratīcyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne ||
svāhā devebhyaḥsvāhyebhya udīcyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne ||
svāhā devebhyaḥsvāhyebhyo dhruvāyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne ||
svāhā devebhyaḥsvāhyebhya ūrdhvāyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne ||
svāhā devebhyaḥsvāhyebhyo diśodiśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne ||
arātīyor bhrātṛvyasya durhārdo dviṣataḥ śiraḥ | pra vṛścāmīdam ojasā ||
varmamahyamayaṃ maṇiḥ phālāj jātaḥ kariṣyati | tṛpto manthena māgamad rasena saha varcasā ||
yattvā śikvaḥ parāvadhīt takṣāhastenavāsyā|Bhatt. vāsyāḥ āpas tvā tasmāj jīvalāḥ punantu śucayaḥ śucim ||
hiraṇyasrag ayaṃ maṇir duhāno vasv akṣitam | śraddhāṃ yajñaṃ maho dadhad gṛhe vasatu no 'tithiḥ || [Bhatt. notithiḥ
tasmai ghṛtaṃ surāṃ madhv annam annaṃkṣadāmahe|Bhatt. kṣudhāmahe sa naḥ piteva putrebhyaḥ śreyaḥśreyaś cikitsatu devebhyo maṇir etya ||
yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir maṇiṃ phālaṃ ghṛtaścutam ugraṃ khadiram ojase | tena tvaṃ dviṣato jahi ||
tam agniḥ praty amuñcata- -ājyāya rasāya kaṃ so asmā ājyaṃ duhe | bhūyobhūyaḥśvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ dviṣato jahi ||
yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir maṇiṃ phālaṃ ghṛtaścutam ugraṃ khadiram ojase | tena tvaṃ dviṣato (…) ||see 7e
tam indraḥ praty amuñcata- -ojase vīryāya kaṃ so asmai balam id duhe | (…) ||
taṃ sūryaḥ praty amuñcata tenemā ajayad diśaḥ so asmai varca id duhe | (…) ||
taṃ somaḥ praty amuñcata draviṇāya rasāya kam | so asmai maha id duhe (…) ||
taṃ bibhrac candramā maṇim asurāṇāṃ puro 'jayadBhatt. purojayad dānavānāṃhiraṇyayīḥ so asmai teja id duhe (…) ||
taṃ rājā varuṇo maṇiṃ praty amuñcata śaṃbhuvaṃ so asmai rājyaṃ duhe (…) ||
taṃ tvaṣṭā praty amuñcata prajābhyo vīryāya kaṃ so asmai rūpam id duhe (…) ||
taṃ bibhrat savitā maṇiṃ tenedam ajayat svaḥ so asmai sūnṛtāṃ duhe (…) ||
tam āpo bibhratīr maṇiṃ sadā dhāvanty akṣitāḥ saābhyo amṛtaṃ duhe (…) ||
tenemāṃ maṇinā kṛṣim aśvināv abhi rakṣataḥ sa bhiṣagbhyāṃ payo duhe (…) ||
yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir vātāya maṇim āśaveBhatt. maṇināśave so asmai vācam id duhe (…) ||
taṃ devā bibhrato maṇiṃ sarvām̐l lokān yudhājayanBhatt. sarvāṃ sa ebhyo jitam id duhe (…) ||
tam imaṃ devatā maṇiṃ tubhyaṃ dadhatu bhartave sa u te bhūtim id duhām | bhūyobhūyaḥśvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ dviṣato jahi ||
antardeśā abadhnata pradiśas tam abadhnata | prajāpatisṛṣṭo maṇir dviṣato me adharām̐ akaḥ ||
ṛtavas tam abadhnata- -ārtavās tam abadhnata | saṃvatsaras taṃ baddhvā sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ vi rājati ||
atharvāṇo abadhnata- -ātharvāṇā abadhnata | aṅgirasas taṃbaddhvāBhatt. vaddhvā dasyūnāṃ bibidhuḥ puraḥ ||Bhatt. vividhuḥ
taṃ dhātā praty amuñcata sa bhūtāny akalpayat | tena tvaṃ dviṣato jahi ||
yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir devebhyo asurakṣitim | sa tvāyaṃ maṇir āgamat saha gobhir ajāvibhir annena prajayā saha ||
(…) |see 5ab (…)āgamansee 5c; Bhatt. agaman madhor ghṛtasya dhārayā kilālena śriyā saha ||
yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir devebhyo asurakṣitim | sa tvāyaṃ maṇir āgamad ojasā tejasā sahasā bhūtyā draviṇena śriyā saha ||
yasya lokā ime trayaḥ payo dugdham upāsate | sa tvāyam abhi rakṣatu maṇiḥ śraiṣṭhyāya mūrdhataḥ ||
sa tvāyaṃ śatadakṣiṇo maṇiḥśraiṣṭhyāya jinvatu |Bhatt. maṇi(ḥ) yaṃ devāḥ pitaro manuṣyā upajīvanti sarvadā ||
yasmai tvā yajñavardhana maṇe pratyamucaṃ śivam | taṃ tvaṃ śatadakṣiṇa maṇe śraiṣṭhyāya jinvatāt ||
asapatnaḥ sapatnahā sapatnān me adharām̐ akaḥ | uttaraṃ dviṣatas tvā maṇiḥ kṛṇotu devajāḥ ||
maṇiṃ sahasravīryaṃ brahmaṇā tejasā saha prati muñcāmi te śivam | sa tvāyam abhi rohatu devaiḥ phālamaṇiḥ saha ||
yathā bījam urvarāyāṃ kṛṣṭe phālena rohati | evāsmin prajā paśavo annamannaṃ vi rohatu ||
etam idhmaṃ samābhṛtaṃ juṣāṇo agne prati harya homam | tasmin videma sumatiṃ svasti cakṣuḥ prāṇaṃ prajāṃ paśūn jātavedasi brahmaṇā ||

kṣā cāsi kṣamā cāsi tasyās te bhūtaṃ ca subhūtaṃ ceti mukhe | tābhyāṃ te vidheyaṃ tābhyāṃ te namas tābhyāṃ no mṛḍa tābhyāṃ no 'dhi brūhi tābhyāṃ no 'bhi jighra | māteva putraṃ piteva sūnum ayaṃ te asmitaṃmā mumugdhi grāhyāBhatt. tanmā bandhebhyo vimadaṃ nayemam ||

sarvā cāsi sarvaṃ ca ta idaṃ tasyās te viśvaṃ ca viśve ca devā iti mukhe | tābhyāṃ te vidheyaṃ tābhyāṃ te namas tābhyāṃ no mṛḍa tābhyāṃ no 'dhi brūhi tābhyāṃ no 'bhi jighra | māteva putraṃ piteva sūnum ayaṃ te asmitaṃmā mumugdhi grāhyā bandhebhyo vimadan nayemam ||
yad devā devaheḍanaṃ devāsaś cakṛmā vayam | ādityās tasmān no yūyam ṛtasyartena muñcata ||
ṛtasyārtenādityā yajatrā muñcateha naḥ | yajñaṃ yad yajñavāhasaḥ śikṣanta upārima ||
medasvatā yajamānāḥ srucājyena juhvataḥ | akāmā viśve vo devāḥ śikṣanto nopa śekima ||
yad vidvāṃso yadavidvāṃsa enāṃsicakṛmā vayam | [Bhatt. enāya tasmān na iha muñcata viśve devāḥ sajoṣasaḥ ||
yadi jāgrad yadisvapann enaenasyo 'karam |Bhatt. svapannayanenasyokaram bhūtaṃ mā tasmād bhavyaṃ ca drupadād iva muñcatām ||
drupadād iva mumucānaḥ svinnaḥ snātvā malād iva | pūtaṃ pavitreṇājyaṃ viśvān muñcantu mainasaḥ ||
yadyāmaṃ cakrur nikhananto agre kārṣīvaṇā na vido na vidyayā | vaivasvate rājani taj juhomyBhatt. taṃ adhāyajñiyaṃmadhuman no astu ||Bhatt. yajñaṃ
vaivasvataḥ kṛṇavad bheṣajāni madhubhāgo madhunā saṃ sṛjāti | mātur yad ena iṣitaṃ na āgan yad vāpitāparāddhojihīḍe ||
yadīdaṃ mātur yadi vā pitur no bhrātuḥ putrādreṣataena āgan |Bhatt.retasa yāvanto asyāḥ pitaraḥ sacante teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ śivo astu manyuḥ ||
apamityam apratītaṃ yad asmi yamasya yena balinā carāmi | idaṃ tad agne anṛṇo bhavāmi jīvannenaḥprati dadāmi sarvam ||Bhatt. ena(ḥ)
ihaiva santaḥ prati dadhma etaj jīvā jīvebhyo ni harāma enat | apamitya dhānyaṃ yaj jaghāsa- -agnir mā tasmād anṛṇaṃ kṛṇotu ||
anṛṇā asminn anṛṇāḥ parasmin tṛtīye nāke anṛṇāḥ syāma | ye devayānā uta pitṛyāṇāḥ sarvān patho anṛṇāḥ kṣayema ||
yad dhastābhyāṃ cakṛmā kilbiṣam akṣam aktum upalipsamānāḥ | ugraṃpaśye ugrajitau tad adya- -apsarasām anu dattām ṛṇaṃ naḥ ||
ugraṃpaśye rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ kilbiṣaṃ yad akṣavṛttam anu dattaṃ nas tat | ṛṇān no naṛṇamertsamānoBhatt. ṛṇān no narṇāyurecchamāno yamasya lokeadhirajjurāyat ||Bhatt. adhijarāyat
yasmā ṛṇaṃ yasya jāyām upaimi yaṃ yācamāno abhyaimi devāḥ | te vācaṃvādiṣurmottarāṃBhatt. pābhiṣur; proposespāviṣur maddevapatnīapsarasāv adhītam ||Bhatt. madhyevapatnī
yad adīvyann aham ṛṇaṃ kṛṇomy adāsyann agna uta saṃgṛṇāmi | vaiśvānaro adhipā no vasiṣṭha ud in nayāti sukṛtasya lokam ||
vaiśvānaraḥ pāvayā naḥ pavitrair yat saṃgaram abhidhāvāmy āśām | anājānan manasā yācamāno yat tatraino apa tat suvāmi ||
vaiśvānarāya prati vedayāma etad yad gṛṇaṃ saṃgaro devatāsu | sa etān pāśān vicṛtaṃ pra veda- -atha pakvena saha saṃ bhavema ||
yad antarikṣaṃ pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ yan mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā jihiṃsima |Bhatt. proposesjihiṃsa agnir mā tasmād enaso gārhapatyaḥ pra muñcatu ||
bhūmir mātāditir no janitraṃ bhrātāntarikṣam abhiśastyā naḥ | dyaur naḥ pitāpitryācchaṃ bhavātiBhatt. pitryāt saṃ jāmim ṛtvā māva patsi lokāt ||
yatrā suhārdaḥ sukṛto madanti vihāya rogaṃ tanvaḥ svāyāḥ | aśloṇāaṅgairahrutāḥ svargeBhatt. aśloṇāṅgairahṛtāḥ+ atrā paśyema pitarau ca putrān ||Bhatt. 'trā
viṣāṇā pāśām̐ adhi vi ṣyatutvadBhatt. tvata ya uttamā adhamā vāruṇā ye | yad dāruṇā badhyase yac ca rajjvā yad bhūmyāṃ badhyase yac ca vācā ||
udagātāṃ bhagavatī vicṛtau nāma tārake | prehāmṛtasya yacchatāṃ pra yad baddhakamocanam ||Bhatt. vaddhakamocanam
vi jihīṣva lokaṃ kṛṇu baddhān muñcāsi baddhakam |Bhatt. pathā yonyā iva pracyuto garbhaḥ pathaḥ sarvām̐ anu kṣayā ||
taṃ prajānan prati gṛhṇātu vidvān prajāpatiḥ prathamajā ṛtasya | asmābhir dattaṃ jarasaḥ parastād acchinnaṃ tantum anu saṃ carema ||
tataṃ tantum anv eke caranti yeṣāṃ dattam ayanaṃ pitryeṇa | abandhv eke dadataḥ pra yacchān dātuṃ cecchikṣānsa svarga eṣām ||
anvārabhethām anusaṃrabhethām etaṃ lokaṃ śraddadhānāḥ sacante | yad vāṃ pūrtaṃ praviṣṭam agnau tasya guptaye dampatī saṃ śrayethām ||
devāḥ pitaraḥ pitaro devā | yo 'smi so 'smi so 'yam asmi ||
sa pacāmi sa yajāmi sa yajate 'sya | śaṃmaiṣṭam astu śunaṃ śāntaṃBhatt. śvamaya iṣṭam; the emend. is also Bhatt.'s śivaṃ kṛtaṃ tasmān mā yavam ||
nāke rājan prati tiṣṭha tatraitat prati tiṣṭhatu | viddhi pūrtasya no rājan sa deva sumanā bhava ||
apāsmād brāhmaṇīsandhām apadhārānni dadhmasi | indrāgnī naḥ savedasāv arṇavād adhi muñcatām ||
namas te brāhmaṇīsandhe parehi yataeyatha yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ te pra suvāmi tam adhi pra sūtāḥ ||Bhatt. prasūtā
apāraṃ tvāhur arṇavam anināyāṃ na ye viduḥ |Bhatt. anināyāṃ; read aniryājyaṃ? yas te vedodaram āsyaṃ mahat sākṣād veda mukhaṃ tava niyājaṃ tava te viduḥ ||
indreṇa kl̥ptā yonir narako asyāḥ kulāyam | mahān samudro rajaso vimānaḥ svarge loke api naḥ kṛṇotu ||
tasyaudanasya bṛhaspatiḥ śiro brahma mukhaṃ sūryācandramasāv akṣyau bṛhadrathantare śrotre | agnir āsyaṃ vidyuj jihvā maruto dantāḥ pavamānaḥ prāṇaḥ ||
oṣadhayo lomāni vanaspatayaḥ keśāḥ samudro mūtram aśvinā prapade | caruṃ pañcabilam ukhaṃ gharmam abhīndhe ||
cakṣur musalaṃ kāma ulūkhalaṃ ditiḥ śūrpam aditiḥ śūrpagrāhī vātoapāvinak|Bhatt. apāvinat gāvas taṇḍulā aśvāḥ kaṇā maśakās tuṣāḥ kabru phalīkaraṇāḥ śyāmam ayo lohitam ayo 'sya māṃsam ||
trapubhasmārjunam asthīniBhatt. tripu haritaṃ varṇaḥ puṣkalaṃ gandhaḥ | khalaḥ pātram uṣṭārau bāhūsphyāvaṃsau gudā varatrā īṣānūkyaṃ yugāni jatravaḥ ||
ṛtaṃ hastābhiṣecanaṃ kulyopasecanam ārtavāḥ paktāro agniḥ prāśītā brāhmaṇaḥ pratigrahītā ||

tasyaudanasya bhūmiḥ kumbhī dyaur apidhānaṃ śiro 'bhram ūṣmā nīhāro bṛhad āyavanaṃ rathantaraṃ darviḥ | diśaḥ pārśve sītāḥ parśavaḥsikatāūbadhyaṃBhatt. siktā ubhadyaṃ palalam upastaraṇam ahorātre vikramaṇe odanasya ||

varṣaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ marutaḥ paryaindhata kiṣkaravaḥ paridhayaḥ | ṛcā kumbhyadhidhīyataārtvijyena preṣyate brahmaṇā prati gṛhyate ||Bhatt. adhidhīhitārtvijyena; the emendation is based on Bhatt.'s proposal
ya etasyaudanasyaivaṃ mahimānaṃ vidyāt | nālpa iti brūyān nānupasecana iti nedaṃ ca kiṃ ceti ||
yāvad dātābhimanasyet taṃ nātivadet | odanena yajñavacaḥ sarve lokāḥ samāpyāḥ ||
yasmin samudro dyaur bhūmis trayo 'varaparaṃ śritāḥ ||

brahmavādino vadanti pratyañcam odanaṃ prāśīḥparāñcāṃBhatt. parāñcā tvam odanaṃ prāśīs tvām odanā iti | kasyainaṃ hastābhyāṃ prāśīḥ ||
tataś cainam anyena śīrṣṇā prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | śiras te vi patiṣyatīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyena mukhena prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | śiras te vi hvariṣyatīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyābhyām akṣībhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyām etam agre prāśnan | andho bhaviṣyasīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyābhyāṃ śrotrābhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyām etam agre prāśnan | badhiro bhaviṣyasīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyenāsyena prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | vāk te 'pa kramiṣyatīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyayā jihvayā prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | jihvā te pūrvā mariṣyatīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyair dantaiḥ prāśīr yair etam agre prāśnan | dantās te śatsyantīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyaiḥ prāṇaiḥ prāśīr yair etam agre prāśnan | prāṇas tvā hāsyatīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyenorasā prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | kṛṣyā na rātsyasīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyena vyacasā prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | rājayakṣmas tvā haniṣyatīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyena pṛṣṭhena prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | vidyuttvā haniṣyatīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyenodareṇa prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan varuṇas tvā haniṣyatīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyena vastinā prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | apsu mariṣyasīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyābhyām ūrubhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyām etam agre prāśnan | ūrū te 'vapatsyeteity enam āha ||Bhatt. patvete
tataś cainam anyābhyām aṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyām etam agre prāśnan |Bhatt. (error?) yenaitam srāmo bhaviṣyasīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyābhyāṃ padbhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyām etam agre prāśnan | sarpas tvā haniṣyatīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyasyāṃ pratiṣṭhayāṃ prāśīr yasyām etam agre prāśnan | apratiṣṭhāno bhaviṣyasīty enam āha ||
tataś cainam anyābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyām etam agre prāśnan | brāhmaṇaṃ haniṣyasīty enam āha ||
