ta enaṃ prāśiṣus ta enamārūruhanta enam ajīgaman |ārūruhanemend. Bhatt. etasmād vai lokā lokāṃs trayastriṃśataṃ prajāpatirnirmimīta||Bhatt. nimimīta; the emendation is his
tasya guptaye yajñān asṛjanta devāḥ | ye trayastriṃśat prajāpatisṛṣṭāḥ puṇyalokāḥ | te 'sya sarve 'bhijitā avaruddhā bhavanti ya evaṃ veda ||
eṣa vā odanaḥ sarvāṅgaḥ sarvātmā sarvaparuḥ sarvapāt sarvapṛṣṭhaḥ | sarvāṅgaḥ sarvātmā sarvaparuḥ sarvapāt sarvapṛṣṭho bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
ya evaṃ viduṣa upadraṣṭā bhavaty upadraṣṭā prāṇaṃ ruṇaddhi | na ca prāṇaṃ ruṇaddhyathasarvasvaṃ jīyate ||Bhatt. aca
na ca sarvasvaṃ jīyate 'thainam āhāpratiṣṭhāno 'nāyatano mariṣyasīti | apratiṣṭhāna evānāyatano mriyate ya evaṃ viduṣa upadraṣṭā bhavati ||
kena pārṣṇī ābhṛtepūruṣasya kena māṃsaṃ saṃbhṛtaṃ kena gulphau | kenāṅgulīḥ peśinīḥ kena khāni kenocchṛṅkhau madhyataḥ kaḥ pratiṣṭhāḥ ||
kasmān nu gulphāv adharāv akṛṇvann aṣṭhīvantā uttaraupūruṣasya| nirṛtyajaṅghe ni dadhuḥ kva svijBhatt. nirhṛtya jānunoḥ sandhī ka imau jajāna ||
catuṣṭayaṃ yujyate saṃhitāntaṃ jānubhyām ūrdhvaṃ śithiraṃ kabandham | śroṇī yad ūru ka u taj jajānaBhatt. uru yābhyāṃ kusindhaṃ sudhṛtaṃ babhūva ||
kati devāḥ katame ta āsan ya uraś cikyur agriyaṃpūruṣasya| kati stanau ni dadhuḥ kaḥ kaphoḍau kati skandhān kati pṛṣṭīr acinvan ||
ko asya bāhū sam abharad vīryaṃ kṛṇavād iti | aṃsau ko asya tad devaḥ kusindhaā dadhād adhi ||Bhatt. kasindha
mastiṣkam asya yatamo lalāṭaṃ kṛkāṭikāṃ prathamo yaḥ kapālam | citvā cityaṃ puruṣasyahanvorBhatt. hanor divaṃ ruroha katamaḥ sa devaḥ ||
kaḥ sapta khāni vi tatarda śīrṣṇiBhatt. śīrṣāṇi karṇāv imāv akṣaṇī nāsike mukham | yeṣāṃ purutrā vijayasyamahmaniBhatt. madmani catuṣpādo dvipādo yanti yāmam ||
hanvor hi jihvām adadhāt purūcīm adhā mahīm adhi śiśrāya vācam | sa ā varīvarti mahinā vyomann apo vasānaḥ ka u cit pra veda ||
mūrdhānam asya saṃsīvya- -atharvā hṛdayaṃ ca yat | mastiṣkād ūrdhvaṃ prairayat pavamāno 'dhi śīrṣṇaḥ ||
tad vā atharvaṇaḥ śiro devakośaḥ samubjitaḥ | tat prāṇo abhi rakṣatu śriyam annam atho manaḥ ||
priyāpriyāṇi bahulā svapnaṃ saṃbādhatandryaḥ | ānandam ugro nandāṃś ca tān ud vahati pūruṣaḥ ||
ārtiravartirnirṛtiḥBhatt. avarti kuto nu puruṣe 'matiḥ | rāddhiḥ samṛddhiravyṛddhirBhatt. advṛddhir matir uditayaḥ kutaḥ ||
ko asminn āpo adadhād viṣūvṛtaḥ purūcyutaḥ sindhusṛtyāya jātāḥ | tīvrāruṇā lohinīs tāmradhūmrā ūrdhvā avācīḥ puruṣe tiraścīḥ ||
ko asmin prāṇam adadhāt ko apānaṃ vyānam u | samānam asmin ko devo 'dhi śiśrāya pūruṣe ||
ko asmin rūpam adadhāt ko mahmānaṃ ca nāma ca | gātuṃ ko asmin kaḥ ketuṃ kaś caritrāṇi pūruṣe ||
ko asmin reto adadhāt tantur ā tāyatām iti | medhāṃ ko asminn adhyauhat ko bāṇaṃ ko nṛto dadhau ||
ko vāsasā pary adadhāt ko asyāyur akalpayat | balaṃ ko asmai prāyacchat ko asyākalpayaj javam ||
ko asmin yajñam adadhād eko agre adhi pūruṣe | ko asmin satyaṃ ko 'nṛtaṃ ko mṛtyuṃ ko 'mṛtaṃ dadhau
kenāpo anv atanuta kenāhar akṛṇod ruce | uṣasaṃ kenānvaindha kena sāyaṃbhavaṃ dade ||
kenemāṃ bhūmim aurṇot kena pary abhavad divam | kenābhi mahnā parvatān kena karmāṇi pūruṣaḥ ||
kena devām̐ anukṣiyatiBhatt. kṣati kena daivīr ajanayad diśaḥ | kenedamanyannakṣatraṃBhatt. anyaṃ kena sat kṣatram ucyate ||
kena parjanyam āpnoti kena somaṃ vicakṣaṇam | kenemam agniṃ puruṣaḥ kena saṃvatsaraṃ mame ||
keneyaṃ bhūmir nihitā kena dyaur uttarā hitā | kenedam ūrdhvaṃ tiryak ca- -antarikṣaṃ vyaco hitam ||
brahmaṇā bhūmir nihitā brahmadyāmuttarāṃ dadhau | brahmedam ūrdhvaṃ tiryak ca- -antarikṣaṃ vyaco hitam ||
kena śrotriyam āpnoti kenemaṃ parameṣṭhinam | kena yajñaś ca śraddhā ca kenāsmin nihitaṃ manaḥ ||
brahma śrotriyam āpnoti brahmemaṃ parameṣṭhinam | brahma yajñaś ca śraddhā ca brahmāsmin nihitaṃ manaḥ ||
ka idam asthy asṛjata ka idaṃ māṃsaṃ sam abharat | ka imāṃ tvacaṃ ca loma ca ka idaṃ rūpaṃ sam airayat ||
brahmāsthy asṛjata brahma māṃsaṃ sam abharat | brahma tvacaṃ ca loma ca brahma rūpaṃ sam airayat ||
ka idaṃ cakṣur asṛjata kaḥ prāṇaṃ kheṣvāvayat|Bhatt. āmayat ka idaṃ manaś ca vācaṃ ca ka imāṃ sam abharat puram ||
brahma cakṣur asṛjata brahma khe prāṇam āvayat | brahma manaś ca vācaṃ ca brahma sam abharat puram ||
nainaṃ cakṣur jahāti na prāṇo jarasaḥ puraḥ | puraṃ yo brahmaṇo veda yasmāt puruṣa ucyate ||
yo vai tāṃ brahmaṇo veda- -amṛtenāvṛtāṃpuram |Bhatt. āmṛtāṃ tasmai brahma ca brāhmyāś ca- -āyuṣ prāṇaṃ prajāṃ daduḥ ||
aṣṭācakrā navadvārā devāṇāṃ pūr ayodhyā | tasyāṃ hiraṇyayaḥ kośaḥ svargo jyotiṣāvṛtaḥ ||
tasmin hiraṇyaye kośe tryaretripratiṣṭhite |Bhatt. triyare tasmin yad antar ātmanvat tad vai brahmavido viduḥ ||
prabhrājamānāṃ hariṇīṃ yaśasā saṃparīvṛtām | puraṃ hiraṇmayīṃ brahmā viveśāparājitām ||
ayaṃ tevaraṇomaṇiḥBhatt. varuṇo sapatnakṣayaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ | tenā rabhasva tvaṃ śatrūn pra mṛṇīhi durasyataḥ ||
aināñ chṛṇīhi pra mṛṇā rabhasva maṇis te astu puraetā purastāt | avārayantavaraṇenadevāBhatt. varuṇena abhyācāram asurāṇāṃśvaḥśvaḥ||Bhatt. svaryat
ā tvārakṣadvaraṇoviśvabheṣajaḥBhatt. varuṇo sahasrākṣo harito hiraṇyayaḥ | yas te śatrūn adharān pātayāsi pūrvas tān dabhnuhi ya u tvā dviṣanti ||
ayaṃ te kṛtyāṃ vitatāṃ pauruṣeyam ayaṃ vadham | ayaṃ te sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ varaṇovārayiṣyate ||Bhatt. varuṇo
varaṇovārayātāBhatt. varuṇo idaṃ devo vanaspatiḥ | yakṣmaḥ praviṣṭo yo 'smin tam u devā avīvaran ||
svapnaṃsuptvā yadi paśyāsi pāpaṃ mṛgaḥsṛtiṃyatidhāvādajuṣṭām|Bhatt. śṛti … dhāyāyaduṣṭam parikṣavāc chakuneḥ pāpavādād ayaṃ maṇirvaraṇovārayātai ||Bhatt. varuṇo
arātyā mā nirṛtyā abhicārād atho bhayāt | mṛtyor ojīyaso vadhāt tvaṃvaraṇavāraya ||Bhatt. varuṇa
varaṇenapravyathitāBhatt. varuṇena bhrātṛvyā me sabandhavaḥ | asūrtaṃ rajo 'py agusBhatt. asūrtāṃ teyantvadhamaṃ tamaḥ ||
yan me mātā yan me pitā bhrātaro yac ca me svā yad enaś cakṛmā vayam | tasmān no vārayiṣyate 'yaṃ devo vanaspatiḥ ||
ariṣṭo 'ham ariṣṭagur āyuṣmān sarvapūruṣaḥ | taṃ māyaṃvaraṇomaṇiḥBhatt. varuṇo pari pātu diśodiśaḥ ||
ayaṃ mevaraṇaurasiBhatt. varuṇa rājā devo vanaspatiḥ | sa me kṣatraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca paśūn ojaś ca me dadhat ||
imaṃ bibharmivaraṇamBhatt. varuṇaṃ āyuṣmāñ chataśāradaḥ |āyuṣmāṃ sa me śatrūn vi bādhatām indro dasyūn ivāsurān ||
yathā vāto vanaspatīn jīrṇān bhanakty ojasā | evā sapatnāṃs tvaṃ bhaṅdhi pūrvāñ jātān utāparānBhatt. pūrvāṃ varaṇastvābhi rakṣatu ||Bhatt. varuṇas
yathā vātena prakṣīṇā vṛkṣāḥ śere nyarpitāḥ | (evā sapatnāṃs) tvaṃ sarvān pra kṣiṇīhi nyarpaya pūrvāñ jātān utāparān varaṇas(tvābhi rakṣatu) ||Bhatt.varuṇas
yathā vātaś cāgniś ca sarvān psāto vanaspatīn | evā sapatnāṃs tvaṃ psāhi pūrvāñ jātān utāparān varaṇastvābhi rakṣatu ||Bhatt. varuṇas
tāṃs tvaṃ pra chindhivaraṇaBhatt. varuṇa purā diṣṭāt purāyuṣaḥ | ya imaṃ paśuṣu dipsanti ye cāsya rāṣṭradipsavaḥ ||
yathā sūryo atibhāti yathāsmin teja āhitam | evā sapatnāṃs tvaṃ sarvān ati bhāhi śvaḥśvo varaṇastvābhi rakṣatu ||Bhatt. varuṇas
yathā yaśaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yathāsmiñ jātavedasi | evā mevaraṇomaṇiḥBhatt. varuṇo kīrtiṃ bhūtiṃ ni yacchatu tejasā mā sam ukṣatu yaśasā sam anaktu mām ||
yathā yaśo agnihotre vaṣaṭkāre yathā yaśaḥ | (…) ||see 8cdef
yathā yaśaḥ somapīthe madhuparke yathā yaśaḥ | (…) ||see 8cdef
yathā yaśaḥ kanyāyāṃ yathāsmin saṃbhṛte rathe | (…) ||see 16.64.8cdef
yathā yaśaś candramasy āditye ca nṛcakṣasi | (…) ||see 16.64.8cdef
yathā yaśaḥ prajāpatau yathāsmin parameṣṭhini | (…) ||see 16.64.8cdef
yathā deveṣv amṛtaṃ yathaiṣu satyam āhitam | evā mevaraṇomaṇiḥBhatt. varuṇo kīrtiṃ bhūtiṃ ni yacchatu tejasā mā sam ukṣatu yaśasā sam anaktu mām ||
asya vāmasya palitasya hotus tasya bhrātā madhyamo asty aśnaḥ | tṛtīyo bhrātā ghṛtapṛṣṭho asya- -atrāpaśyaṃ viśpatiṃ saptaputram ||
sapta yuñjanti ratham ekacakram eko aśvo vahati saptanāmā | trinābhi cakram ajaram anarvaṃ yasminn imā viśvā bhuvanāni tasthuḥ ||
imā ratham adhi ye sapta tasthuḥ saptacakraṃ sapta vahanty aśvāḥ | sapta svāsaro abhi saṃ navanta yatra gavāṃ nihitā sapta nāmā ||
ko dadarśa prathamaṃ jāyamānam asthanvantaṃyad anasthā bibharti | bhūmyā asur asṛg ātmā kva svit ko vidvāṃsam upa gāt praṣṭum etat ||
pākaḥ pṛcchāmi manasāvijānan devānām enā nihitā padāni | vatse baṣkaye 'dhi sapta tantūn vi tatnire kavaya otavā u ||
acikitvāṃś cikituṣaś cid atra kavīn pṛcchāmi vidmane na vidvān | vi yas tastambha ṣaḍ imā rajāṃsy ajasya rūpe kim api svid ekam ||
iha bravītu ya īm aṅga veda- -asya vāmasya nihitaṃ padaṃ veḥ | śīrṣṇaḥ kṣīraṃ duhrate gāvo asya vavriṃ vasānā udakaṃ padāpuḥ ||
mātā pitaram ṛta ā babhāja dhīty agre manasā saṃ hi jagme | sā bībhatsur garbharasā nividdhā namasvanta id upavākam īyuḥ ||
yuktā mātāsīd dhuri dakṣiṇāyā atiṣṭhad garbho vṛjanīṣv antaḥ | amīmed vatso anu gām apaśyad viśvarūpyaṃ triṣu yojaneṣu ||
tisro mātṝs trīn pitṝn bibhrad eka ūrdhvas tasthau nem ava glāpayanti | mantrayante divo amuṣya pṛṣṭhe viśvavidaṃ vācam aviśvaminvām ||
dvādaśāraṃ nahi taj jarāya varvarti cakraṃ pari dyām ṛtasya | ā putrā agne mithunāso atra sapta śatāni viṃśatiś ca tasthuḥ ||
pañcapādaṃ pitaraṃ dvādaśākṛtiṃ diva āhuḥ pare ardhe purīṣiṇam | atheme anya upari vicakṣaṇaṃ saptacakre ṣaḍara āhur arpitam ||
pañcāre cakre parivartamāne tasminn ā tasthur bhuvanāni viśvā | tasya nākṣas tapyate bhūribhāraḥ sanād eva na chidyate sanābhiḥ ||
sanemi cakram ajaraṃ vi vāvṛta uttānāyāṃ daśa yuktā vahanti | sūryasya cakṣū rajasaity āvṛtaṃ yasminn ā viśvā bhuvanāny ārpitā ||
sākaṃjānāṃ saptatham āhur ekajaṃ ṣaḍ id yamā ṛṣayo devajā iti | teṣām iṣṭāni vihitāni dhāmaśaḥ sthātre rejante vikṛtāni rūpaśaḥ ||
striyaḥ satīs tām̐ u me puṃsa āhuḥ paśyadakṣaṇvānna vi cetad andhaḥ |Bhatt. akṣanvāṃ kavir yaḥ putraḥ sa īm ā ciketa yas tā vijānāt sa pituṣ pitāsat ||
avaḥ pareṇa para enāvareṇa padā vatsaṃ bibhratī gaur ud asthāt | sā kadrīcī kaṃ svid ardhaṃ parāgāt sā kva svit sūte nahi yūthe asmin ||
avaḥ pareṇa pitaraṃ yo asya- -anuveda para enāvareṇa | kavīyamānaḥ ka iha pra vocad devaṃ manaḥ kuto adhi prajātam ||
ye arvāñcas tām̐ u parāca āhur ye parāñcas tām̐ u arvāca āhuḥ | indraś ca yā cakrathuḥ soma tāni dhurā ni yuktā rajaso vahanti ||
dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pari ṣasvajāte | tayor anyaḥ pippalaṃ svādvatty anaśnann anyo abhi cākaśīti ||
yasmin vṛkṣe madhvadaḥ suparṇā niviśante suvate cādhi viśve | tasyed āhuḥ pippalaṃ svādv agre tan non naśad yaḥ pitaraṃ na veda ||
yatrā suparṇā amṛtasya bhakṣam animeṣaṃ vidathābhisvaranti | ino viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa mā dhīraḥ pākam atrā viveśa ||
yad gāyatre adhi gāyatram āhitaṃ traiṣṭubhād vā traiṣṭubhaṃ niratakṣata | yad vā jagaj jagaty āhitaṃ padaṃ ya it tad vidus te amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ ||
gāyatreṇa prati mimīte arkam arkeṇa sāma traiṣṭubhena vākam | vākena vākaṃ dvipadā catuṣpadā- -akṣareṇa mimate sapta vāṇīḥ ||
jagatā sindhuṃ divy askabhāyad rathantare sūryaṃ pary apaśyat | gāyatrasya samidhas tisra āhus tato mahnā pra ririce mahitvā ||
upa hvaye sudughāṃ dhenum etāṃ suhasto godhug uta dohad enām | śreṣṭhaṃ savaṃ savitāsāviṣan no 'bhīddho gharmas tad u ṣu pra vocam ||
hiṃkṛṇvatī vasupatnī vasūnāṃ vatsam icchantī manasābhy āgāt | duhām aśvibhyāṃ payo aghnyeyaṃ sā vardhatāṃ mahate saubhagāya ||
gaur amīmed abhi vatsaṃ miṣantaṃ mūrdhānaṃ hiṅṅ akṛṇon mātavā u | sṛkvāṇaṃ gharmam abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyuṃ payate payobhiḥ ||
ayaṃ sa śiṅkte yena gaur abhīvṛtā mimāti māyuṃ dhvasanāv adhi śritā | sā cittibhir ni cakāra martyaṃ vidyud bhavantī prati vavrim auhata ||
vidyud dadrāṇāṃ salilasya pṛṣṭhe yuvānaṃ santaṃ palito jagāra | devasya paśya kāvyaṃ mahitvādyā mamāra sa hyaḥ sam āna ||
anac chaye turagātu jīvamBhatt. anacchraye ejad dhruvaṃ madhya ā pastyānām | jīvo mṛtasya carati svadhābhir amartyo martyenā sayoniḥ ||
apaśyaṃ gopām anipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiś carantam | sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīr vasāna ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣv antaḥ ||
ya īṃ cakāra na so asya veda ya īṃ dadarśa hirug in na tasmāt | sa mātur yonā parivīto antar bahuprajā nirṛtim ā viveśa ||
dyaur naḥ pitā janitā nābhir atra bandhur no mātā pṛthivī mahīyam | uttānayoś camvor yonir antar atrā pitā duhitur garbham ādhāt ||
pṛcchāmi tvā param antaṃ pṛthivyāḥ pṛcchāmi tvā bhuvanasya nābhim | pṛcchāmi tvā vṛṣṇo aśvasya reto vācaḥ pṛcchāmi paramaṃ vyoma ||
iyaṃ vediḥ paro antaḥ pṛthivyā ayaṃ yajño bhuvanasya nābhiḥ | ayaṃ somo vṛṣṇo aśvasya reto brahmāyāṃ vācaḥ paramaṃ vyoma ||
saptārdhagarbhā bhuvanasya reto viṣṇos tiṣṭhanti pradiśo vidharmaṇi | te dhītibhir manasā te vipaścitaḥ paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvataḥ ||
na vi jānāmi yad ivedam asmi niṇyaḥ sannaddho manasā carāmi | yadā māgan prathamajā ṛtasya- -ād id vāco aśnuve bhāgam asyāḥ ||
apāṅ prāṅ eti svadhayā gṛbhīto 'martyo martyenā sayoniḥ | tā śaśvantā viṣūcīnā viyantā ny anyaṃ cikyur na ci cikyur anyam ||
ṛco akṣare parame vyoman yasmin devā adhi viśve niṣeduḥ | yas tan na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati ya it tad vidus ta ime sam āsate ||
ṛcaḥ padaṃ mātrayā kalpayanto 'rdharcena cākl̥pur viśvam ejat | tripād brahma pururūpaṃ vi caṣṭe tena jīvanti pradiśaś catasraḥ ||
sūyavasād bhagavatī hi bhūyā atho vayaṃ bhagavantaḥ syāma | addhi tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīṃ piba śuddham udakam ācarantī ||
gaurīr mimāya salilāni takṣaty ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī | aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī sahasrākṣarā bhuvanasya paṅktis tasyāḥ samudrā adhi vi kṣaranti ||
athāpād eti prathamā padvatīnāṃ kas tad vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā ciketa | garbho bhāraṃ bharaty ā cid asya ṛtaṃ piparty anṛtaṃ ni pāti ||
kṛṣṇaṃ niyānaṃ harayaḥ suparṇā apo vasānā divam ut patanti | tāāvavṛtrantsadanād ṛtasya- -ād id ghṛtena pṛthivīṃ vyūduḥ||Bhatt. aduḥ
dyaur javenā pṛthivī varimṇāntarikṣaṃ mahitvāpo bhūmnā | devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ prasūto brāhmaṇebhyo nir vapāmi ||
ṛṣibhyas tvā rṣeyebhyas tvā (nir vapāmi) ||
juṣṭatamaṃ vahnitamaṃ papritamaṃ sasnitamam ūrjo bhāgam akṣitam akṣitaye nir vapāmi ||
vasavas tvā gāyatreṇa chandasā nir vapantu ||
rudrās tvā traiṣṭubhena chandasā nir vapantu ||
ādityās tvā jāgatena chandasā nir vapantu ||
idam abhirāvṇām idam abhigatvarāṇām idam abhimanyūnām ||
yathā kūpaḥ śatakhāḥ sahasrakhā nopadasyati | evedaṃ mopa dasat tīrtham aśvinor iva ||
yo no dveṣan manasā yaś ca vācā daivyeloka uta mānuṣe yaḥ | grāvṇā hantu mahatā tasya sarvam indro devo maghavāñ chacīpatiḥ ||Bhatt. śacīpatiḥ
vīrutsu vastraṃparijāyaitad ūrjā soma punar ā viśeha naḥ | dṛṃhasva bāhvo amba dhṛṣva mā riṣo agniś caitat saniṣyatha ||
devīr āpa ūrjo bhāgāya vo 'kṣitā akṣitayaā siñcāmi ||
akravyādā tanvā jātavedo yā te svargā tapasā sayoniḥ | tayaudanam abhiśrāmyaitaṃ tayā no agne mahi śarma yaccha ||
somasyāṃśubhiryatamaddhvamBhatt. yata madhyam adityāḥ pṛṣṭhe sīdata | ye ta odana devayāne loke viduḥ pātraṃ dārumayaṃ manuṣyāḥ | teṣām edhi pātramātraḥ svargaḥ pṛthivīṃ vidma tava pātram ||
etās tvaudanopa yantv āpo ghṛtaścutaḥ payasā vardhayantīḥ | stabhnāsi svaḥ pṛthivīm uta dyām utāntarikṣaṃ svadhayā pūrayāsi ||

yāvantās taṇḍulās ta rtasya viṣṭhāsBhatt. proposes to emend stha ṛtasya tāvanto yajñās ta rtasya dohāḥ |Bhatt. proposes to emend stha ṛtasya tāvatī svadhā ghṛtapṛṣṭho me astu- -ūrjaṃ duhāṃ madhupṛcaṃ vyoman ||
yam odanaṃ pacāmi śraddadhānaḥ pātrīpūraṃghṛtapṛṣṭhaṃ juṣāṇaḥ | sa memākṣeṣṭa sadamaśyamānoBhatt. me māṃ kṣeṣṭha sadamiṣyamāṇo yamasya loke parame vyoman ||
odanaḥ pātreṇa saha dakṣiṇayā brāhmaṇebhyo datto amṛtatve dadhāti | sūryasya dhrājīr anu raśmīn āganBhatt. raśmīna āgan divas pṛṣṭhān śakuna ivarohan||
saṃ prāṇena prāṇabhṛtaṃ sṛjāmi saṃ vīryeṇa payasāśiṣā ca | āstāvaṃ gaccha sukṛtāṃ yatra lokaṃ te tvā prāśnantu dakṣiṇato niṣadya ||
agniṣṭomena sarathaṃ hi yāhy athoktam atirātraṃ ca gaccha |read athoktham? dvirātramātras tryahaṃ vy aśnuhy athā roha catūrātraṃ ratham iva ||
catūrātreṇa kalpamāno hi yāhy atha saptarātraṃ daśarātraṃ ca gaccha | dvādaśāhaṃ paribhūya viśvata ekaviṃśatyā vi mṛdho nudasva ||
ekaviṃśatyā vi mṛdho hi yāhy athaikacatvāriṃśatopa yāhy ekam | trayastriṃśatāmṛto bhūtvā trimāsyam odanānv ārabhasva ||
idāvatsaraṃ ca parivatsaraṃ ca bradhnasya viṣṭapi parame vyoman | nākena nākam abhi saṃ bhavaudana ||
sādhyā nayantu mukhato mamaitam ādityā rudrā vasavaḥ sacetasaḥ | viśve devā ṛtubhiḥ saṃvidānā imaṃ rakṣantu sadam apramādam ||
idāvatsaraṃ ca parivatsaraṃ ca saṃvatsaram ahorātrāṇi māsaḥ | sūryasyāgneś candramaso 'nubhūtiṃBhatt. 'nubhūtaṃ vātasyābhūtim anvābhavaudana||
yam īḍate pitaro yaṃ ca devāḥ purohitaṃ tapasā brahmaṇā ca | svadhām ūrjam akṣitim ā juhomi vāte deve pavamāne bṛhaspatau ||
caturdhety odanaḥ kalpamāna ūrjā devān svadhā pitṝn | śarīraṃ manuṣyān āśitaṃbhavo brāhmaṇān so 'smākam astu parame vyoman ||
ayaṃ panthā odana devayāno anāruddho mṛtyunā tena yāhi | adabdhaḥ svato nihitaḥ sukṛdbhirBhatt. sukṛtibhir brahmaṇā śiṣṭaḥ praśiṣā yamasya so ('smākam astu parame vyoman) ||
yatra te gṛhā odana tat parehi yatrāpāṃ tad u gacchantv āpaḥ | yatra yonim odanaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ so asmākam astu parame vyoman ||
hutaṃ te vāci hutam astu cakṣuṣi hutaṃ vijñāne hutam astu te bale | śrotre prāṇe te hutaṃ prajāmṛtatve te hutaṃ kāme ca hutam astu te ||
yad vāgneyo yadi vāsyaindro yadi māruto yadi vaiśvadevaḥ | yas te agnir nṛmaṇā nāma hṛdyas tasminn eṣa suhuto astv odanaḥ so asmākam astu parame vyoman ||
ya āviveśa nṛmaṇāmanuṣyām̐ agnīnām agniḥ prathamo vayodhāḥ | tasminn eṣaḥ (…) ||
yā te tanūr apacakrāma mṛtyor devānāṃ sakhyam abhi jīvalokam | apsucarā gahvareṣṭhā mahitvā tasyām eṣaḥ suhuto astv odanaḥ so asmākam astu parame vyoman ||
aheḍamānābhy ehi no gṛhaṃ saṃkāśaṃ bhadre sumanā aghorāḥ | prati tvā varṣavṛddham etu ||
eṣā naḥ svadhā navagaj janitry amṛteṣv amṛtāhutābhūt | tān no gopāya sadam apramādam āsmākam aitor anu rakṣa jāgṛhi ||
ye no nidhim abhidāsanty etaṃ pravāhaṃ proḍhaṃ yamarājye | rājā teṣāṃ varuṇa indriyāṇy abhi tiṣṭḥatu harasā daivyena | etaṃ sadhasthāḥ pari vo dadāmy anukhyātā yajñapatir yad āyat ||

ya ākhidanti vikhidanti dattaṃ vi gṛhṇate dakṣiṇā nīyamānāḥ | tān indro devo maghavāñ chacīpatirBhatt. śacīpatir agnimedī pradahann etu śakraḥ | bṛhaspatir varuṇaḥ soma indro mamaiva dattaṃ kevalaṃ kṛṇvantu ||
śīrṣaktiṃ śīrṣāmayaṃ karṇaśūlaṃ tṛtīyakam | sarvaṃ śīrṣaṇyaṃ te rogaṃ bahir nirmantrayāmahe ||
karṇābhyāṃ tekaṅkūṣebhyaḥBhatt. kaṅkuśebhyaḥ śuktivalgaṃ vilohitam | (…) ||see 1cd
yaḥ kṛṇotipramotamBhatt. pramodam andhaṃ kṛṇoti pūruṣam | (…) ||see 1cd
yasya hetoḥ pracyavate yakṣmo nāsata āsyataḥ | (…) ||see 1cd
śīrṣarogam aṅgarogaṃ viśvāṅgīnaṃ visalpakam | sarvaṃ śīrṣaṇyaṃ te rogaṃ bahir nirmantrayamahe ||
yasya bhīmaḥ pratīkāśa udvepayati pūruṣam | takmānaṃ śītaṃ rūraṃ ca taṃ te nir mantrayāmahe ||
yaūrūanusarpaty atho ye 'nu gavīnike |Bhatt. eti gavīnike balāsam antar aṅgebhyo bahir nirmantrayāmahe ||
yadikāmād apakāmādBhatt. yadīkāmātavakāmād dhṛdayājjāyate pari | hṛdo balāsam aṅgebhyo bahir nirmantrayāmahe ||
harimāṇaṃ te aṅgebhyo yakṣmodhām antarātmanaḥ | yakṣmaṃ te sarvam aṅgebhyo bahir nirmantrayāmahe ||
āso balāso bhavatu mūtraṃ bhavatv āmayat | yakṣmāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣaṃ nir avocam ahaṃ tvat ||
bahir bilaṃ nir dravatu kahāvāhaṃtavodarāt| yakṣmāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣaṃ nir avocam ahaṃ tvat ||
udarāt te pari klomno nābhyā hṛdayād adhi | yakṣmodhām antarātmano bahir nir mantrayāmahe ||
yāḥ sīmānaṃ virujanti mūrdhānaṃ pratyarṣaṇīḥ | ahiṃsantīr anāmayā nir dravanti bahir bilam ||
yā hṛdayam upasarpanty anutanvanti kīkasāḥ | (…) ||see 3cd
yāḥ pārśve uparṣanty anunikṣanti pṛṣṭīḥ | (…) ||see 3cd
yās tiraścīr uparṣanty arṣaṇīr vakṣaṇābhyaḥ | (…) ||see 3cd
yā gudā anusarpanty āntrāṇi yopayanti ca | (…) ||see 3cd
yāmajjñoanusarpanti parūṃṣi virujanti ca | ahiṃsantīr anāmayā nir dravanti bahir bilam ||
ye aṅgānimadayanti yakṣmāso ropaṇāsaḥ | yakṣmāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣaṃ nir avocam ahaṃ tvat ||
visalpakasya vidradhasya vātīkārasya vālajeḥ | yakṣmāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣaṃ nir avocam ahaṃ tvat ||
pādābhyāṃ te kulphābhyāṃ jaṅgābhyāṃ jānubhyām ūrubhyāṃ śroṇibhyāṃ pari bhaṃsasaḥ | anūkyād arṣaṇīr uṣṇihābhyo grīvābhyaḥ skandhebhyaś śīrṣṇo rogam anīnaśam ||
saṃ te śīrṣṇaḥ kapālāni hṛdayasya ca yo viduḥ | udyan sūrya ādityo 'ṅgarogam anīnaśat ||
sapatnahanam ṛṣabhaṃ ghṛtena kāmaṃ śikṣāmi haviṣājyena | nīcaiḥ sapatnān mama pādaya tvam abhiṣṭuto mahatā vīryeṇa ||
yan me manaso na priyaṃ na cakṣuṣo yan me hṛdaye nābhinandati | tad duṣvapnyaṃ prati muñcāmi sapatne kāmaṃ tuṣṭuvān ud ahaṃ bhideyam ||
duṣvapnyaṃ kāma duritaṃ ca kāma- -aprajastām asvakṛtām avartim |Bhatt. kāmāprayastām ugra īśānaḥ prati muñca tasmin yo asmabhyamaṃhūraṇācikitsāt||Bhatt. aṃhuraṇā
sā te kāma duhitā dhenur ucyate yām āhur vācaṃ kavayo virājam | tayā sapatnān pari vṛṅdhi ye mama pary enān prāṇaḥ prajāḥ paśavo jīvanaṃ vṛṇaktu ||
kāmasyendrasya varuṇasya rājño viṣṇor balena savituḥ savena | agner hotreṇa pra ṇudasapatnān śambīva nāvam udakeṣu dhīraḥ ||Bhatt. chambīva
adhyakṣo vājī mama kāma ugraḥ kṛṇotu mahyam asapatnam eva | viśve devā mama nāthaṃ bhavantu sarve devā havam ā yantu ma imam ||
idam ājyaṃ ghṛtavaj juṣāṇāḥ kāmajyeṣṭhā iha mādayantām | kṛṇvantu mahyam asapatnam eva ||
indrāgnī kāma sarathaṃ hi bhūtvā nīcaiḥ sapatnān mama pādayātha | teṣāṃ pannānām adhamā tamāṃsy agne vāstūny anunirdahā tvam ||Bhatt. vastūni nirdahā
jahi tvaṃ kāma mama yesapatnā andhātamāṃsyava pādayainān |Bhatt. sapatnāndhā tamāsyava pādayaināṃ anindriyā arasāḥ santu sarve yathā na jivāt katamac canaiṣām ||
avadhīt kāmo mama ye sapatnā uruṃ lokam akaran mahyam edhatum | mahyaṃ namantāṃ pradiśaś catasro mahyaṃ ṣaḍurvīrghṛtam ā vahantu ||Bhatt. urvī
yat te kāma śarma trivarūthamudbhidBhatt. udbhir brahma varma vitatam anativyādhyaṃ kṛtam | tena sapatnān pari vṛṅdhi ye mama pary enān prāṇaḥ prajāḥ paśavo jīvanaṃ vṛṇaktu ||
adharāñcaḥ pra plavantāṃ chinnā naur iva bandhanāt | na sāyakapraṇuttānāṃ punar asti nivartanam ||
agnir yava indro yavaḥ somo yavaḥ | yavayāvāno deva yāvayantv amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putraṃ jīvalokān mṛtalokaṃ gatāsum ||
asarvavīraś carati praṇutto mitrāṇāṃ dveṣyaḥparivargyaḥsvānām |Bhatt. pariviṣyaḥ uta pṛthivyām ava syanti vidyuta ugro devaḥ pramṛṇatsapatnān ||Bhatt. pramṛṇan
cyutā ceyaṃ bṛhaty acyutā ca vidyud bibhartistanayitnūṃśca sarvān |Bhatt. bhavanti stanayitnuṃś teṣām ādityo draviṇena tejasā- -udyan sapatnān nudatāṃ me sahasvān ||
yathā devā asurānprāṇudantayena-Bhatt. prāṇadanta -indro dasyūn adhamaṃ tamobabādhe|Bhatt. tamopavādhe tathā tvaṃ kāma mama yesapatnāsBhatt. sapatnāṃs tān asmāl lokāt pra ṇudasva sarvān ||
yena devā asurānprāṇudantaviśvahā yenendro dasyūn adhamaṃ tamobabādhe|Bhatt. tamopavādhe tena tvaṃ kāma mama ye sapatnās tān asmāl lokāt pra ṇudasva dūram ||
kāmo jajñe prathamo nānyat purā nainaṃ devā āpuḥ pitaro nota martyāḥ | tatas tvam asijyāyānviśvahā mahāṃsBhatt. jyāyāṃ tasmai te kāma nāma it kṛṇomi ||
na vai vātaś cana kāmam āpa nāgniḥ sūryo nota candramāḥ | (…) ||see 8cd
na vā āpaś cana kāmam āpur nāhorātrāṇi vihitāni yanti | (…) || ||see 8cd
na vai puṇyajanāś cana kāmam āpur na gandharvāpsaraso na sarpāḥ | tatas tvam asijyāyānviśvahā mahāṃsBhatt. jyāyāṃ tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi ||
yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvad āpaḥsiṣyaduryāvad agniḥ |Bhatt. śiṣyadur tatas tvam asijyāyānviśvahā mahāṃsBhatt. jyāyāṃ tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi ||
yāvatīr diśaḥ pradiśo viṣūcīr yāvatīr āśā abhicakṣaṇā divaḥ | tatas tvam asijyāyānviśvahā mahāṃsBhatt. jyāyāṃ tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi ||
yāvatīr bhṛṅgājatvaḥkurūravo yāvatīr vaghāvṛkṣasarpyaḥ| tatas tvam asijyāyānviśvahā mahāṃsBhatt. jyāyāṃ tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi ||
yās te śivās taṇvas kāma bhadrā yābhiḥ satyaṃ bhavati yad vṛṇīte | tābhiṣṭvamasmān upa saṃ viśasva-Bhatt. ṭam -anyatra pāpīr apa veśayā dhiyaḥ ||
yau te mātonmamārja jātāyāḥ pativedanau | durṇāmā tatra mā gṛdhad aliṃśa uta vatsapaḥ ||
palālānupalālau śarkuṃ kokaṃ malimrucaṃ palījakam |Bhatt. malimṛcaṃ āśleṣaṃ vavrivāsasam ṛkṣagrīvaṃ pramīlinaṃ muṣkayor apa hanmasi ||
mā saṃ vṛto mopa sṛpa ūrū māva sṛpo 'ntarā | kṛṇomy asyai bheṣajaṃ bajaṃ durṇāmacātanam ||
durṇāmā ca sunāmā ca- -ubhau saṃvṛtamicchataḥ|Bhatt. icchata(ḥ) arāyam apa hanmasi sunāmā straiṇam icchatām ||
yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ keśy asura stambajā uta taṇḍikaḥ | arāyān asyā bhaṃsaso muṣkayor apa hanmasi ||
anujighraṃ pramṛśantaṃ kravyādam uta reriham | arāyaṃ śvakiṣkiṇaṃBhatt.chvakiṣkiṇaṃ bajaḥ piṅgo anīnaśat ||
yas tvā suptāṃ tsaratiBhatt. carati yaś ca dipsatijāgratīm|Bhatt. jāgratīḥ chāyām iva pratānsūryaḥBhatt. tāṃ parikrāmam anīnaśat ||
yas tvā suptāṃ nipadyate bhrātā bhūtvā piteva ca | bajas tvaṃ sahatām itaḥ klībarūpaṃ tirīṭinam ||
yaḥ kṛṇoty avatokāṃ mṛtavatsām imāṃ striyam | tam oṣadhe tvaṃ nāśaya- -asyāḥ kamalamañjivam||
ye śālāḥ parinṛtyanti sāyaṃ gardabhanādinaḥ kusūlāye ca kukṣilāḥ kakubhāḥ saramāḥ sumāḥ | tān oṣadhe tvaṃ gandhena viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya ||
ye kukundhāḥkukūrabhāḥ kṛttīrdūrśānibibhrati |Bhatt. kṛtyair duruśāni klībā iva pranṛtyanto ghoṣāṃ ye kurvate vane tān ito nāśayāmasi ||
yeṣāṃ paścāt prapade puraḥ pārṣṇī puro mukham | khalajāḥ śakadhūmajā uruṇḍā ye ca maṭmaṭāḥ kumbhamuṣkā ayāśavaḥ | tān asyā brahmaṇaspate pratībodhena nāśaya ||
ye sūryaṃnatitikṣantathus ŚS; Bhatt. nititikṣanti (not -kṣanty) ātapantamamuṃ divaḥ | arāyān bastavāsino durgandhīṃllohitāsyānBhatt. durgandhīlohitāsyāṃ makakān nāśayāmasi ||Bhatt. vakakāṃ
ye sūryāt parisarpanti snuṣeva śvaśurād adhi | bajaś ca teṣāṃ piṅgaś ca hṛdaye 'dhi ni vidhyatām ||
ya ātmānam atimātram aṃśaādhāyabibhrati |Bhatt. aṃsādāya strīṇāṃ śroṇipratodina indra rakṣāṃsi nāśaya ||
ye pūrve vadhvo yanti haste śṛṅgāṇi bibhrataḥ | āpākesthānprahāsinaBhatt. āpākestāṃ prahāsima stambe ye kurvate jyotis tān ito nāśayāmasi ||
paryastākṣāḥpracaṅkaśā straiṇāḥ santu paṇḍagāḥ | ava bheṣaja pātaya ya imāṃsaṃvivṛtsaty apatiḥsvapatīṃ striyam ||Bhatt. apati
uddharṣiṇaṃ munikeśaṃ jambhayantaṃ marīmṛśam | upeṣantamudumbalaṃBhatt. upeśantam tuṇḍenam uta śāluḍam | padā pra vidhya pārṣṇyāBhatt. pravudhya sthālīṃ gaur iva syandanā ||
yas te garbhaṃ pratimṛśāj jātaṃ vā mārayāti te | piṅgas tam ugradhanvā kṛṇotu hṛdayāvidham ||
ye amno jātān mārayantiBhatt. amlo sūtikā anuśerate | strībhāgān piṅgo gandharvān abhraṃ vāta ivājatu ||
pariśiṣṭaṃ dhārayataṃ yad dhitaṃ māva pādi tat | garbhaṃ ta ugrau rakṣatāṃ bheṣajau nīvibhāryau ||
paripāṇaṃ puruṣāṇāṃ rakṣasām asi cātanam | arāyān sarvān durṇāmno yātudhānān viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya ||
pavīnasāt taṅgalvāc chāyakād uta nagnakāt | prajāyai patye tvā piṅgaḥ pari pātu kimīdinaḥ ||
dvyāsyāścaturakṣāḥ pañcapādād anaṅguleḥ | vṛndād abhi prasarpataḥ pari pāhi varīvṛtāt ||
ya āmaṃ māṃsam adanti pauruṣeyaṃ ca yekravirBhatt. krimir garbhān khādanti keśavāḥ | arāyān asyā bhaṃsaso muṣkayor apa hanmasi ||
piṅga rakṣa jāyamānaṃ pumāṃsaṃ mā striyaṃ kran | āṇḍādo garbhaṃ mā dabhan bādhasvetaḥ kimīdinaḥ ||
aprajāstvaṃ mārtavatsam ād rodam agham āvayam |Bhatt. aghav vṛkṣād ivasrajaṃkṛtvā- -apriye prati muñca tat ||
piṅga jahi yātudhānān durgandhīṃllohitāsyān | tvayā praṇuttāḥ kravyādo viṣvañco yantu nirhatāḥ ||
ucchiṣṭe nāmarūpāṇy ucchiṣṭe loka āhitaḥ | ucchiṣṭa indraś cāgniś ca viśvam antaḥ samāhitam ||
ucchiṣṭe dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaṃ bhūtaṃ samāhitam | āpaḥ samudra ucchiṣṭe candramā vāta āhitaḥ ||
sann ucchiṣṭe 'saṃś cobhau mṛtyur vājaḥ prajāpatiḥ | laukyāucchiṣṭaāyattāBhatt. ucchiṣṭā vraśca draś cāpi śrīr mayi ||Bhatt. vṛś
dṛḍho dṛṃha sthiro nyo brahma viśvasṛjo daśa | nābhim iva sarvataś cakram ucchiṣṭe devatā hitā ||
ṛk sāma yajur ucchiṣṭa udgīthaḥ prastutaṃ sthitam | hiṅkāra ucchiṣṭesvaraḥBhatt. śvaraḥ sāmnomeḍiśca tan mayi ||Bhatt. meḍhiś
aindrāgnaṃ pāvamānaṃ mahānāmnīr mahāvratam | ucchiṣṭe yajñasyāṅgāny antar garbha iva mātari ||
rājasūyaṃ vājapeyam agniṣṭomas tadadhvaraḥ | arkāśvamedhā ucchiṣṭe jīvabarhir madintamaḥ ||
agnyādheyam atho dīkṣā kāmapraś chandasā saha | utsannā yajñāḥ sattrāṇy ucchiṣṭe 'dhi samāhitāḥ ||
agnihotraṃ ca śraddhā ca vaṣaṭkāro vrataṃ tapaḥ | dakṣiṇeṣṭaṃ pūrtaṃ ca- -ucchiṣṭe 'dhi samāhitāḥ ||
ekarātras trirātraś ca sadyaḥkrīḥ prakrīr ukthyaḥ | otaṃ nihitam ucchiṣṭe yajñasyāṇūnividyayā ||
catūrātraḥ pañcarātraḥ ṣaḍrātraś cobhayaḥ saha | ṣoḍaśī saptarātraś ca- -ucchiṣṭājjajñire sarve ye yajñā amṛte hitāḥ ||
pratihāro nidhanaṃ viśvajic cābhijic ca yaḥ | sāhnātirātrā ucchiṣṭe dvādaśāho 'pi tan mayi ||
sūnṛtāsaṃnatiḥkṣemaḥBhatt. saṃnati(ḥ) svadhorjāmṛtaṃsahaḥ|Bhatt. saha ucchiṣṭe sarve pratyañcaḥ kāmāḥ kāmena tṛpyantu ||
nava bhūmīḥ samudrāś ca- -ucchiṣṭe 'dhi śritā divaḥ | ā sūryo bhāty ucchiṣṭe ahorātre ca tan mayi ||
upahavyaṃ viṣūvantaṃ ye ca yajñā guhā hitāḥ | bibharti bhartā viśvasya- -ucchiṣṭo janituḥ pitā ||
pitā janitur ucchiṣṭo asoḥ pautraḥ pitāmahaḥ | sa khyeti viśvasyeśāno vṛṣā bhūmyām atighnyaḥ ||
ṛtaṃ satyaṃ tapo dīkṣāBhatt. dīkṣāḥ śramo dharmaś ca karma ca | bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad ucchiṣṭe vīryaṃ lakṣmīr balaṃ bale ||
samṛddhir oja ākutiḥ kṣatraṃ rāṣṭraṃ ṣaḍ urvyaḥ | saṃvatsaro 'dhy ucchiṣṭa iḍā praiṣā grahā haviḥ ||
caturhotāra āpriyaś caturmāsyāni nividaḥ | ucchiṣṭe yajñā hotrāś ca paśubandhās tad iṣṭayaḥ ||
ardhamāsāś ca māsāś ca- -ārtava ṛtubhiḥ saha | ucchiṣṭe ghoṣiṇīr āpaḥ stanayitnuḥśrutirmahī ||Bhatt. ścyutir
śarkarāḥsikatāaśmānaBhatt. sikatāśmāna oṣadhayo vīrudhas tṛṇā | abhrāṇi vidyuto varṣam ucchiṣṭe saṃśritā śritā ||
rāddhiḥ prāptir vyāptiḥ samāptir maha edhatuḥ | atyāptir ucchiṣṭe bhūtir āhitā nihitā hitā ||
yac ca prāṇati prāṇena yac ca paśyati cakṣuṣā | ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ ||
prāṇāpānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiś ca kṣitiś ca yā | (…) ||see 3cd
devāḥ pitaro manuṣyā gandharvāpasaraś ca ye | (…) ||see 3cd
ṛcaḥ sāmāni chandāṃsi purāṇaṃ yajuṣā saha | (…) ||see 3cd
atharvāṅgiraso brahma sarpapuṇyajanāś ca ye | (…) ||see 3cd
ānandāś ca pramodāś ca- -abhīmodamudaś ca ye | ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ ||
yan manyur jāyām āvahat saṃkalpasya gṛhād adhi | ka āsañ janyāḥ ke varāḥBhatt. āsaṃ ka u jyeṣṭhavaro 'bhavat ||
tapaś caivāstāṃ karma ca- -antar mahaty arṇave | ta āsan janyās te varāḥBhatt. āsaṃ sa u jyeṣṭhavaro 'bhavat ||
daśa sākam ajāyanta devā devebhyaḥ paraḥ | yo vai tāṃ vidyān nāmathā sa vā adya mahad vadet ||
prāṇāpāṇau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiś ca kṣitiś ca yā | vyānodāno vāṅ manas te vā ākūtim ā vahan ||
ajātā āsann ṛtavo 'tho dhātā bṛhaspatiḥ | indrāgnī aśvinā tarhi kaṃte jyeṣṭham upāsata ||Bhatt. tante, but with two proposals for emend.
tapaś caivāstāṃ karma ca- -antar mahaty arṇave | tapo ha jajñe karmaṇas taṃte jyeṣṭham upāsata ||
kuta indraḥ kutaḥ somaḥ kuto agnir ajāyata | kutas tvaṣṭā sam abhavad dhātā sam abhavat kutaḥ ||
indrād indraḥ somāt somo agner agnir ajāyata | tvaṣṭā ha jajñe tvaṣṭur dhātā dhātur ajāyata ||
ye ta āsan daśa jātāBhatt. āsaṃ devā devebhyaḥ paraḥ | putrebhyo lokaṃ dattvā kasmin te loka āsate ||
yeto bhūmiḥ purvāsīd yām addhātaya id viduḥ | ke tasyāṃ devā āsate kasminn u sādhiśritā ||Bhatt. kasmin sādhiśritā+
kutaḥ keśān kutaḥ snāva kuto asthīny ābharat | aṅgā parvāṇi majjānaṃ ko māṃsaṃ kuta ābharat ||
yadā keśān asthi snāva māṃsaṃ majjānam ābharat |Bhatt. māsaṃ, misprint śarīraṃ kṛtvā pādavat kaṃlokam anu prāviśat ||Bhatt. taṃ
saṃsico nāma te devā ye saṃbhāraiḥ samabharan | sarvaṃ saṃsicya martyaṃ devāḥ puruṣam āviśan ||
śirohastāvatho bāhūBhatt. hastād jihvāṃ grīvāś ca kīkasāḥ | pṛṣṭīr barjahye pārśve kas tat sam adadhād ṛṣiḥ ||
ūrū pādāv aṣṭhīvantau śroṇī hastāv atho mukham | tvacā prāvṛtya tat sarvaṃ saṃdhā sam adadhān mahī ||
yat tac charīram apayat saṃdhayā saṃhitaṃ mahat | yenedam adya rocate ko asmin varṇam ābharat ||
sarve devā upāśikṣan tad u jānādvadhūḥsatī | īśā vaśasya yā jāyā sāsmin varṇam ābharat ||
yadā tvaṣṭā vyatṛṇat pitā tvaṣṭur ya uttaraḥ | gṛhaṃ kṛtvā martyaṃ devāḥ puruṣam āviśan ||
svapno vai tandrīr nirṛtiḥ pāpmāno nāma devatāḥ | jarā khālityaṃ pālityaṃ śarīram anu prāviśan ||
steyaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vṛjinaṃ satyaṃ yajño yaśo mahaḥ | balaṃ ca kṣatram ojaś ca śarīram anu prāviśan ||
bhūtiś cavāabhūtiś caBhatt. vābhūtiś rātayo 'rātayaś ca yāḥ | kṣudhaś ca sarvās tṛṣṇāś ca śarīram anu prāviśan ||
nindyāś cavāanindyāś caBhatt. vānindyāś yaś ca hanteti neti ca | śarīraṃ śraddhā dakṣiṇā- -aśraddhā cānu prāviśan ||
vidyāś cavāavidyāś caBhatt. vāvidyāś yac cānyad upadeśyam | śarīraṃ brahma prāviśad ṛcaḥ sāmātho yajuḥ ||
ānandā nandāḥ pramudo 'bhīmodamudaś ca ye | haso nariṣṭā nṛttāni śarīram anu prāviśan ||
ālāpāś ca pralāpāś ca- -abhīlāpalapaś ca ye | śarīraṃ sarve prāviśann āyujaḥ prayujo yujaḥ ||
prāṇāpānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiś ca kṣitiś ca yā | vyānodānau vāṅ manaḥ śarīrena ta īyante ||
āśiṣaś ca praśiṣaś ca saṃśiṣo viśiṣaś ca yāḥ | cittāni sarve saṃkalpāḥ śarīram anu prāviśan ||
tvarāś ca vai dhṛtayaś ca- -īḍāśīḥ sūnṛterā |Bhatt. cerāḥ śrīḥ śarīraṃ sarve prāviśann ṛtarīrṣyāyudho mṛdhaḥ ||
āsneyīś ca vāsteyīś ca tvaraṇāḥ kṛpaṇāś ca yāḥ | guhyāḥ śukriyā yā sthūlā bībhatsurasādhayan ||Bhatt. bibhatsur
asthi kṛtvā samidhaṃ tad aṣṭāpo asādayan | retaḥ kṛtvājyaṃ devāḥ puruṣam āviśan ||
yā āpo yāś ca devatā yā virāḍ brahmaṇā saha | śarīraṃ brahma prāviśac charīre 'dhi prajāpatiḥ ||
sūryaś cakṣur vātaḥ prāṇaṃ puruṣasya vi bhejire | athāsyetaram ātmānaṃ devāḥ prāyacchann agnaye ||
tasmād vai vidvān puruṣam idaṃ brahmeti manyate | sarvā hy asmin devatāḥ śarīre 'dhi samāhitāḥ ||
yadaibhya sthānam aṅgeṣu pitā lokām̐ akalpayat | śarīraṃ sarvā devatā yathāṅgam anu prāviśan ||
aṅgamaṅgaṃ śarīrasya sarve devā anu prāviśan | pitā hy ebhyaḥprāyacchat taṃ lokam aparājitam ||
taṃ lokam aparājitaṃ sarve devā anu prāviśan | prajāpatir yam ābharac charīraṃ bahudhā hitam ||
agne jāyasvāditir nāthiteyaṃ brahmaudanaṃ pacati putrakāmā | saptaṛṣayo bhūtakṛtas te tvā manthantu prajayā saheha ||Bhatt. saha ||
kṛṇuta dhūmaṃ vṛṣaṇaḥ sakhāyo 'droghāvitā vācam accha | ayam agniḥ pṛtanāṣāṭ suvīro yena devāasahantaśatrūn ||
agne 'janiṣṭhā mahate vīryāya brahmaudanāya paktave jātavedaḥ | saptarṣayo bhūtakṛtas te tvājījanann asmai rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni yaccha ||
samiddho agne samidhā samidhyase viśvān devān yajñiyām̐ eha vakṣaḥ | tebhyo havyaṃśrapayañjātavedaḥBhatt. śrapayaṃ svargaṃ lokam adhi rohayainam ||
tredhā bhāgo nihito jātavedo yaḥ puro vo devānāṃ pitṝṇām uta martyānām | aṃśāṃjānīdhvaṃ vi bhajāmi taṃ vo yo devānāṃ sā imaṃ pārayāti ||
agne sahasvān abhibhūrabhīdasi nīco nyubja dviṣataḥ sapatnān | iyaṃ mātrā mīyamānā mitā ca sajātāṃs te balihṛtaḥ kṛṇotu ||Bhatt. balihutaḥ
sākaṃ sajātaiḥ payasāsahaidhyBhatt. sahedy ud ubjainaṃ mahate vīryāya | ūrdhvo nākasyādhi roha viṣṭapaḥ svargo loka iti yaṃ vadanti ||
iyaṃ mahī prati gṛhṇātu carma pṛthivī devī sumanasyamānā | adhi gacchema sukṛtām ulokam ||
etau grāvāṇau sayujā yuṅdhi carmaṇi nir bhindhy aṃśūnyajamānāya sādhu | avaghnatīni jahi ye pṛtanyava ūrdhvāṃ prajām uddharanty udūha||Bhatt. uha
gṛhāṇa grāvāṇau sukṛtā vīra hasta ā te devā yajñiyā yajñam aguḥ | trayo varāyatamāṃstvaṃ vṛṇīṣeBhatt. yatamāstyaṃ tās te samṛddhīr iha rādhāyāmi ||
upaśvasedruvayesīdatā yūyaṃBhatt. druvaye vi vicyadhvaṃyajñiyāsastuṣaiḥ | śriyā samānān atisarvāntsyāma-Bhatt. sarvāṃ -adhaspadaṃ dviṣatas pādayema ||
iyaṃ te dhītir idam u te janitraṃ gṛhṇātu tvām aditiḥ śūraputrā | parā punīhi ya imāṃ pṛtanyavo asmai rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni yaccha ||
parehi nāri punar ehi kṣipram apāṃ tvā goṣṭho adhy arukṣad bharāya | tāsāṃgṛhṇītādyatamā yajñiyā asan vibhājya dhīrītarā jihītāt ||
emā agur yoṣitaḥ śumbhamānā ut tiṣṭha nāritavasaṃrabhasva |Bhatt. tapataṃ supatnī patyā prajāvatyā tvā-Bhatt. prajāvatyā -aganyajñaḥ prati kumbhaṃ gṛbhāya ||Bhatt. tvākaṃ
ūrjo bhāgo nihito yaḥ purāvaBhatt. vo ṛṣipraśiṣṭāpa ā haraitāḥ | ayaṃ yajño nāthavid gātuvit prajāvid ugraḥ paśumad vīravid vo astu ||Bhatt. paśuvad
agne carur yajñiyas tvādhy arukṣac chucis tapiṣṭhas tapasā tapainam | ārṣeyā daivā abhisaṃgatya bhāgam imaṃ tapiṣṭhā ṛtubhis tapantu ||
śuddhā āpo yoṣito yajñiyā imāBhatt. yakṣiyā, misprint? āpaś carum iva sarpantu śubhrāḥ | dadat prajā bahulān paśūn me paktaudanasya sukṛtām etu lokam ||
brahmaṇā śuddhā uta pūtā ghṛtena somasyāṃśavas taṇḍulā yajñiyā ime | apaḥ pra viśatu prati gṛhṇātu vaś carur imaṃpaktvāsukṛtām etu lokam ||Bhatt. paktā
abhyāvartasva prajayā sahaināṃ pratyaṅ enaṃ devatābhiḥ sahaidhi | svargaṃ lokam abhi saṃ vahainam ādityo devaḥ paramaṃ vyoma ||
uruḥ prathasva mahatā mahimnā sahasrapṛṣṭhaḥ sukṛtasya loke | pitāmahāḥ pitaraḥ prajopaja- -ahaṃ paktvā pañcadaśas te asmi ||
sahasrapṛṣṭhaḥ śatadhāro akṣito brahmaudano devayānaḥ svargaḥ | amūṃs ta ā dadhāmi prajayāreṣaya- -enaṃ balihārāya mṛḍatāṃ mahyam eva ||Bhatt. resahainaṃ … kṛṇutāṃ
ud ehi vediṃ prajayā vardhayainaṃ nudasva rakṣaḥ prataraṃ dhehy enam | śriyā samānān atisarvāntsyāma-Bhatt. sarvāṃ -adhaspadaṃ dviṣataḥ pādayema ||
ṛtenataṣṭāmanasā hiteyaṃBhatt. tiṣṭhā brahmaudanasya nihitā vedir agre | aṃśadhrīṃ śuddhām upa dhehi nāriBhatt. aśadhrīṃ, misprint? tatraudanaṃ sādaya daivānām ||
aditer hastāṃ srucam etāṃ dvitīyāṃ saptarṣayo bhūtakṛto yām akṛṇvan | sā gātrāṇi viduṣy odanasya darvir vedyām adhyenaṃcinotu ||Bhatt. enañ
śṛtaṃ tvā havir upa sīdantu daivā nisṛpyāgne punar enaṃ prasīdaBhatt. sarpya somena pūto jaṭhare sīda brahmaṇām ārṣeyās te māriṣanprāśitāraḥ ||
soma rājan saṃjñānam ā vapaibhyaḥ subrāhmaṇā yatame tvopasīdān | ṛṣīn ārṣeyāṃs tapaso 'dhijātānBhatt. jātāṃ brahmaudane suhavā johavīmi ||
imā āpo madhumatīr ghṛtaścyuto brahmaṇāṃ hasteṣu pra pṛthak sādayāmi | yatkāma idam abhiṣiñcāmi vo 'ham indro marutvāṃs tad adād idaṃ me ||
idaṃ me jyotir amṛtaṃ hiraṇyaṃ pakvaṃ kṣetrāt kāmadughā ma eṣā | idaṃ dhanaṃ ni dadhe brāhmaṇeṣu kṛṇve panthāṃ pitṛṣu yaḥ svargaḥ ||
agnau tuṣām̐ āvapajātavedasi paraḥ kambūkān upa mṛḍhy etān |Bhatt. apa … etāṃ etaṃśuśrumagṛharājasya bhāgam atho vidma nirṛter bhāgadheyam ||
śrāmyataḥ pacata edhisunvataḥ svargaṃ lokam adhi rohayainam | yena rohāt param āpadya yad vayaḥ ||
babhrer adhvaryo mukham etad vimṛḍḍhyBhatt. mṛḍhy ājyāya lokaṃ kṛṇuhi prajānan | ghṛtena gātrānu sarvā vimṛḍḍhiBhatt. mṛḍhi kṛṇve panthāṃ pitṛṣu yaḥ svargaḥ ||
babhrerakṣaḥsamadam ā vapaibhyoBhatt. rakṣasva brāhmaṇā yatame tvopasīdān | purīṣiṇaḥ prathamānāḥ purastād ārṣeyās te māriṣanprāśitāraḥ ||
ārṣeyeṣu ni dadhaodanatvā nānārṣeyāṇām apy asty atra |Bhatt. nānāṛṣeyāṇām agnir me goptā marutaś ca sarve viśve devā abhi rakṣantu pakvam ||
yajñaṃ duhānaṃ sadam it prapīnaṃ pumāṃsaṃ dhenuṃ sadanaṃ rayīṇām | prajāmṛtatvam uta dīrghamāyūBhatt. āyu rāyaś ca poṣam upa tvā sadema ||
vṛṣabho 'si svarga ṛṣīn ārṣeyān gaccha | sukṛtāṃ loke sīda tan nau saṃkṛtam ||
sam ā cinuṣvānusaṃprehy agne pathaḥ kalpaya devayānān | ebhiḥ sukṛtair anu pra jñeṣma yajñe nāke tiṣṭhantam adhi saptaraśmau ||
yena devā jyotiṣā dyām udāyan brahmaudanaṃ paktvā sukṛtasya lokam | taṃ tvā pacāmi jyotiṣāṃ jyotir uttamaṃ sa nastaṃdhehi sukṛtām uloke ||
prācyai tvā diśe nir vapāmi śatadhāram apakṣudham | sa paktāraṃ vaha sukṛtāṃ yatra loko yatra ṛṣayaḥ prathamajāḥ purāṇāḥ ||

udīcyai tvā (…) ||
dhruvāyai tvā (…) ||
ūrdhvāyai tvā (…) ||
dive tvā (…) ||
antarikṣāya tvā (…) ||
pṛthivyai tvā (…) ||
paśubhyas tvā (…) ||
sarvābhyas tvā devatābhyo nir vapāmi śatadhāram apakṣudham | sa paktāraṃ vaha sukṛtāṃ yatra loko yatra ṛṣayaḥ prathamajāḥ purāṇāḥ ||
pumān puṃso adhi tiṣṭha carma na te śiṣṇaṃ pra dahāj jātavedāḥ | bhavāt te straiṇam apy apsarāsu ||
mahatī dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣam idaṃ mahat | mahān mahimnā sarvāṅga yas tvā pacaty odana ||
saptainaṃ sūryāabhitaḥBhatt. sūryāvitaḥ sapta puṣkariṇīr uta | sapto sahasraṃ gandharvā yas tvā pacaty odana ||
dhātaiṣām udgātāsīd devā hotāra ṛtvijaḥ | sarvāṅgaṃ yatraudanaṃ satyenāgre samairayan ||
sapta ṛṣayo bhūtakṛta ṛṣayaḥ sādhyāś ca ye | te vai sarvāṅgam odanaṃ śraddhayāgre sam airayan ||
yaḥ sarvāṅgaṃ pacati brāhmaṇaṃ ca na hiṃsati | tasmai jyotiṣmantaṃ lokaṃ yamo rājābhi rakṣati ||
taṃ sarvāṅgaṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭhaṃ dyumātraṃdevasaṃhitam |Bhatt. dyaumātraṃ ni dhatsvāmutra śevadhiṃ taṃ te brahmābhi rakṣatu ||
tasyaudanasyodaram antarikṣaṃ dyauḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ diśaḥ pārśve | sūryācandramasāvakṣyāvBhatt. akṣāv ṛtavo dantāḥ pavamānaḥ prāṇo aṅgiraso rūpam ||
ānayaitamā rabhasva sukṛtāṃBhatt. nayaitum lokam api gacchatu prajānan | tīrtvā tamāṃsi bahudhāvipaśyann ajo nākam ā kramatāṃ tṛtīyam ||
pra pado nenigdhi duścaritaṃ yac cacāra śuddhaiḥ śaphair ā kramatāṃ prajānan | jyotiṣmantaṃ sukṛtāṃ lokam īpsan tṛtīye nāke adhi vi kramasva ||
anuchyaśyāmenatvacam etāṃviśastarBhatt. anu psāmena … viśastad yathāparv asinā māti maṃsthāḥ | mābhi druhaḥparuśaḥkalpayainaṃBhatt. paruṣyaḥ sukṛtāṃ madhye adhi vi śrayemam ||
bhūmyāṃ tvā bhūmim adhi dhehy etām ā siñcodakam ava dhehy enam | pary ādhattāgninā śamitāraḥ śṛtogacchatu sukṛtāṃ yatra lokaḥ ||Bhatt. śṛco
ut krāmātaḥ paricedataptas taptāccaror adhi nākaṃ tṛtīyam |Bhatt. cetutaptātaptā caror agner agnir adhi saṃ babhūvitha jyotiṣmān gaccha sukṛtāṃ yatra lokaḥ ||
pañcaudanaḥ pañcadhā vi kramasva- -ākraṃsyamānaḥ pañca jyotīm̐ṣi | ījānānāṃ sukṛtāṃ prehi madhyaṃ jyotiṣmantam abhi lokaṃ jayāsmai ||
ajam evāgnim ajamijjyotir āhur ajaṃ brahmaṇe jīyatā deyam āhuḥ | ajas tamāṃsy apa hanti dūram asmiṃl loke śraddadhānena dattaḥ ||Bhatt. asmilloke
etad vo jyotiḥ pitaras tṛtīyaṃ pañcaudanaṃ brahmaṇe 'jaṃ dadāti | ajas tamāṃsy apa hanti dūraṃ pañcaudano brahmaṇe dīyamānaḥ ||
pañcaudano brahmaṇe dīyamāno 'jo nākam ā kramatāṃ tṛtīyam | vicakramāṇaḥ sukṛtasya loke sa jyotiṣā tamo apa hanti dūram ||
ajā kramasva sukṛtāṃ yatra lokaḥ śarabho nu catto ati durgāṇi neṣataḥ |Bhatt. proposes to emend neṣaḥ pañcaudano brahmaṇe dīyamāno viśvarūpā kāmadughāsy ekā ||
jyotiṣmantaṃ sukṛtāṃ lokam īpsan pañcaudanaṃ brahmaṇe 'jaṃ dadāti | sa vyāpnuhy abhi lokaṃ jayāsmai śivo 'smabhyaṃ pratigṛhīta edhi ||
ajas trināke tridive tripṛṣṭhe sukṛtāṃ lokedadivāṃsaṃdadhāti |Bhatt. yadivāsaṃ pañcaudano brahmaṇe dīyamānaḥ sa dātāraṃ tṛptyātarpayāsi||
ajo hy agner ajaniṣṭa śokād vipro viprasya sahaso vayodhāḥ | hutam iṣṭam abhipūrtaṃ vaṣaṭkṛtaṃ tad devā ṛtuśaḥ kalpayantu ||
amotaṃ vāso dadhyād dhiraṇyam api dakṣiṇām | tathā lokān samāpnuyād ye divyā ye ca pārthivāḥ ||
etāstvājadhārā upa yantu viśvataḥBhatt. tvāda, but with proposal of emend. somyā devīr ghṛtapṛṣṭhā madhuścutaḥ | stabhāna pṛthivīṃ divaṃ sacasva nāke tiṣṭhāsy adhi saptaraśmau ||
pṛṣṭhāt pṛthivyā iti catasraḥ ||PS 3.38.8-11 are repeated

pañcaudanaṃ pañcabhir aṅgulībhir darvyod dhara pañcadhaudanam etam | prācīṃ diśaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ pratīcīm udīcīṃ dhruvām ūrdhvāṃ diśam ā kramasva ||
prācyāṃ diśi śiro ajasya dhehi dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇaṃ dhehi pārśvam | pratīcyāṃ diśi bhasadam asya udīcyāṃ diśy uttaraṃ dhehi pārśvam ||
ajasyānūkamūrdhvāyāṃ diśi dhehiBhatt. ajasyānukam diśi dhehi pājasyaṃ dhruvāyām | antarikṣe madhyato madhyam asya padbhiś caturbhiḥ prati tiṣṭha dikṣu ||
śṛtam ajaṃ śṛtayā prorṇuhi tvacā sarvair aṅgaiḥ saṃbhṛtaṃ viśvarūpam | sa ut tiṣṭha prehi nākam uttamaṃ padbhiś caturbhiḥ prati tiṣṭha dikṣu ||
sarvā diśaḥ saṃvidānāḥ sadhrīcīḥ sāntardeśāḥ prati gṛhṇantu tejasam | te rakṣantu tava tubhyam etaṃ tābhyo juhomi haviṣā ghṛtena ||
yaṃ brāhmaṇe nidadhe yaṃ cavikṣuBhatt. nidade … dikṣu yā vipruṣa odanānām ajasya | sarvaṃ tad agne sukṛtasya loke jānītān naḥ saṃgamane pathīnām ||
ajaḥ pañcaudano vy akramata | tasyora iyam abhavad udaram antarikṣaṃ dyauḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ diśaḥ pārśve ||
ditiś cāditiś ca śṛṅge satyaṃ ca rtaṃ ca cakṣuṣī | viśvaṃ rūpaṃ śraddhā prāṇo virāṭ śiraḥ ||
eṣa vā aparimito yajño yadajaḥpañcaudanaḥ |Bhatt. adaḥ, with proposal of emend. ad 16.100.3b aparimitaṃ lokaṃ jayaty aparimitaṃ lokam ava rundhe ya evaṃ viduṣe 'jaṃ pañcaudanaṃ dadāti ||
nāsyāsthīnibhindyānBhatt. bhindyāṃ namajjñonirdhayet|Bhatt. majño nirdaye sarvāṇi samādāya- -idaṃidaṃpraveśayet||Bhatt. samādāyevim idaṃ pra veśaye
idam idam asya rūpaṃ tenainaṃ saṃ gamayati | svadhām ūrjam akṣitiṃ maho asmai duhe ya evaṃ viduṣe 'jaṃ pañcaudanaṃ dadāti ||
indrāya bhāgaṃ savitā kṛṇotv imaṃ yajñaṃ yajñapatiś ca sūriḥ | ye no dveṣanty anutānrabhasva-Bhatt. tā -ariṣṭā vīrāyajamānasyasarve ||emend. Kim 2019; Bhatt. yajamānaś ca
pañca lokāḥ pañca rtavaḥ | pañcasvṛtuṣvṛdhnotiBhatt. pañcasututuṣṭudhnoti, with this proposal of emend. ya evaṃ viduṣe 'jaṃ pañcaudanaṃ dadāti ||

eṣa vai nidāgho yajño yadajaḥpañcaudanaḥ |Bhatt. adaḥ, with this proposal of emend. nirapriyaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ dahatinirwith ŚS; Bhatt. narapriyaṃ bhavaty ātmanā parāsyāpriyo bhrātṛvyo bhavati (…) ||see 2c
yo vā āyantam ityṛtuṃveda |Bhatt. ṛtaṃ, with proposal of this emend. āyatīm evāpriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyam ādatte bhavaty ātmanā (…)see 3d (…) ||see 2c

(…) vai bhavantam iti (…) |see 4a bhavantīm eva (…) ||see 4bcd
(…) vā abhibhavantam iti (…) |see 4a abhibhavantīm eva (…) ||see 4bcd
(…) vā udyantam iti (…) |see 4a udyatīm eva (…) ||see 4bcd

yo vai sarvam ityṛtuṃveda | sarvām evāpriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyam ādatte bhavaty ātmanā parāsyāpriyo bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ viduṣe 'jaṃ pañcaudanaṃ dadāti ||
yāvanty asya lomāni brahmāstṛṇoti vedyām | tāvatīr asya dhārāḥ samudrasyevākṣitāḥ ||
duhāṃ kṣīraṃ bhavatu sarpir ebhyaḥ surā bhūtvopa tiṣṭhāt surāpām | madhor dhārā madhupebhyo duhāno 'jo nāke tiṣṭhatu modamānaḥ ||
skambheneme viṣkabhite dyauś ca bhūmiś ca tiṣṭhataḥ | skambha idaṃ sarvam ārpitam ejad yatprāṇannimiṣac ca yat ||Bhatt. ejat prāṇaṃ
ekacakraṃ vartata ekanemi sahasrākṣaraṃ pra puro ni paścāt | ardhenedaṃ pari babhūva viśvaṃ yad asyārdhaṃ katamaḥ sa ketuḥ ||
pañcavāhi vahaty agram asya pṛṣṭayo yuktā anusaṃvahanti | ayātam asya dadṛśe na yātaṃ paraṃ nedīyo 'varaṃ davīyaḥ ||
idaṃsavitarvi jānīhiBhatt. savitur ṣaḍ yamā eka ekajaḥ | tasmin hāpitvam icchante ya eṣām eka ekajaḥ ||
tiryagbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhno yasmin yaśo nihitaṃ viśvarūpam | atrāsata ṛṣayaḥ sapta sākaṃ ye asya gopā mahato babhūvuḥ ||
tisro ha prajā atyāyamāyan ny anyāarkamabhito +'viśanta |Bhatt. viśantu bṛhan ha tasthau rajaso vimāno harito hariṇīr ā viveśa ||
dvādaśa pradhayaś cakram ekaṃ trīṇi nabhyāni ka u tac ciketa |Bhatt. naddhāni tatrāhatās trīṇi śatāni śaṅkavaḥ ṣaṣṭiśca khīlāavicācalāye ||
anantaṃ vitataṃ purutrā anantam antavac cā samakte | te nākapālaś carati prajānan vidvān bhūtaṃ yad u bhavyam asya ||
āviḥsannihitaṃ guhā jarannāma mahat padam |Bhatt. caran tatraidaṃ sarvam ārpitam ejatprāṇannimiṣac ca yat ||Bhatt. prāṇaṃ
ūrdhvaṃ bharantam udakaṃ kumbhenevodahāryam | paśyanti sarve cakṣuṣā na sarve manasā viduḥ ||
ūnāt pūrṇam ud acati pūrṇād ūnam ud acyate | kaviṣ ṭad brahmā veda yatas tat pariṣicyate ||
prajāpatiś carati garbhe antar adṛśyamāno bahudhā pra jāyate | ardhena viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ jajāna yad asyārdhaṃ kim u taj jajāna ||
yad ejati carati yac ca tiṣṭhaty aprāṇatprāṇannimiṣac catiṣṭhat|Bhatt. aprāṇaprāṇaṃ … ceṣṭata, with proposal for emend. tad dādhāra pṛthivīṃ viśvarūpaṃ tat saṃbhūya bhavaty ekam eva ||
yāpurastād yujyate yota paścādBhatt. yāḥ yā viśvato yujyate yota sarvataḥ | yayā yajñas tāyate prāṅ tāṃ tvā pṛcchāmi katamā nu sarcām ||
yataḥ sūrya udety astaṃ yatra ca gacchati | tad eva manye 'haṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ tato nāpy eti kiṃ cana ||
satyenordhvas tapati brahmaṇā- -arvāṅ vi paśyati | prāṇena tiryaṅ prāṇati yasminjyeṣṭham adhi śritam ||Bhatt. yasmiṃ
yo vai te vidyād araṇī yābhyāṃ nirmathyate vasu | savidvānjyeṣṭhaṃ manyetaBhatt. vidyāṃ sa vidyād brāhmaṇaṃ mahat ||
apād agre sam abhavat so agre svar ābharat | catuṣpād bhūtvā bhogyaḥ sarvam ādatta bhojanam ||
bhogyo bhavad atho annam adad bahu | yo devam uttarāvantam upāsātai sanātanam ||
sanātanam enam āhur utādyāsat punar navaḥ | ahorātre pra jāyete anyo anyasya rūpayoḥ ||
śataṃ sahasram ayutaṃ nyarbudam asaṃkhyeyaṃ svam asmin niviṣṭam | tad asya ghnanty abhipaśyata eva tasmād devo rocate sa etat ||
ārāgramātraṃ dadṛśa utaikaṃ naiva dṛśyate | tataḥ pariṣvajīyasī devatā sā mama priyā ||
iyaṃ kalyāṇy ajarā martyasyāmṛtā gṛhe | yasmai kṛtā śaye sa yaś cakāra tadāra saḥ ||
tvaṃ strī tvaṃ pumān asi tvaṃ kumāry uta vā kumāraḥ | tvaṃ jīrṇo daṇḍenavañcasiBhatt. bhajjāsi tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ ||
utaiṣa jyeṣṭha uta vā kaniṣṭha utaiṣa bhrātota vā pitaiṣaḥ | eko devo manasi praviṣṭaḥ prathamo jātaḥ sa u garbhe antaḥ ||
anejaty ejati sarvam asmin viśvā bhūtāni paryābhṛtasya | sa pumān puṃso janayann ṛtena sarvān antān gacchatu tiṣṭhann eva ||
madhye divo nihitaḥ pṛśniraśmā vi cakramāṇau rajasasphātyantau | sa viśvābhir abhi caṣṭe śacībhir antarā pūrvam aparaṃ ca ketum ||
ye arvāg uta vā purāṇe vedaṃ vidvāṃsam abhito vadanti | ādityam eva te pari vadanti sarve agniṃ dvitīyaṃ trivṛtaṃ ca haṃsam ||
ekām ṛcaṃ sam indhate dvādaśabhir agnibhiḥ | tasyām āpas tasyāṃ gāvas tasyām oṣadhayaḥ śritāḥ ||
sapta suparṇā upa dhamanta bāṇam anuṣṭubhā saṃbhṛtaṃ vāyum etam | tam ātataṃ vitataṃ tantum ātataṃ manaḥ punātu salilasya pṛṣṭhe ||
sapta ṛṣayaḥ pratihitāḥ śarīre saptarakṣantisadam apramādam | saptāpaḥ svapato lokam īyus tatrajāgṛtoasvapnajausatrasadau ca devau ||
bhavāśarvau mṛḍataṃ mābhi yātaṃ bhūtapatī paśupatī namo vām | pratihitam āyatāṃ mā vi srāṣṭaṃ mā no hiṃsiṣṭaṃ dvipado mā catuṣpadaḥ ||
śune kroṣṭre mā śarīrāṇikartamBhatt. karttum aliklavebhyo gṛdhrebhyo ye ca kṛṣṇā aviṣyavaḥ | makṣikāḥ paśupate vayāṃsi te vighase māvidanta||ŚS vidanta; Bhatt. viyanta
krandāya te prāṇāya te yāś ca te bhava ropayaḥ | namas te rudra kṛṇmaḥ sahasrākṣāmartya ||
purastāt te namaḥ kṛṇma uttarād adharād uta | abhīvargād divas paryBhatt. abhīvargā antarikṣāya te namaḥ ||
mukhāya te paśupate yāni cakṣūṃṣi te bhava | tvace rūpāya saṃdṛśe pratīcīnāya te namaḥ ||
aṅgebhya udarāya jihvāyā āsyāya ca | dadbhyo gandhāya te namaḥ ||
astrā nīlaśikhaṇḍena sahasrākṣeṇa vājinā | rudreṇādhvagaghātināBhatt. -kaghātinā tena mā sam arāmahi ||
sa no bhavaḥ pari vṛṇaktu viśvata āpa ivāgniḥ pari vṛṇaktu no bhavaḥ | mā no abhi maṃsta namo astv asmai ||
catur namo aṣṭakṛtvo bhavāya daśa kṛtvaḥ paśupate namas te | taveme pañca paśavo vibhaktā gāvo aśvāḥ puruṣā ād ajāvayaḥ ||
tava catasraḥ pradiśas tava dyaus tavedam ugrorv antarikṣam | tavedaṃ sarvam ātmanvad yad ejad adhi bhūmyām ||
uruḥ kośo vasudhānas tavāyaṃ yasminn imā viśvā bhūtāny antaḥ | sa no mṛḍa paśupate namas te paraḥ kroṣṭāroabhibhāḥśvānaḥ | paro yantv agharudo vikeśyaḥ ||
dhanur bibharṣi haritaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ sahasraghniśatavadhaṃśikhaṇḍin|thus ŚS; Bhatt. śikhaṇḍinam+ rudrasyeṣuś carati devahetis tasmai namo yatamasyāṃ diśītaḥ ||Bhatt. yatamasyān
yo 'bhiyāto nilayate tvām ugra nicikīrṣati | paścād anuprayuṅkṣe taṃ viddhasyapadanīriva ||Bhatt. patanīr
bhavārudrau sayujāsaṃvidānāv ubhā ugrau carato vīryāya | tayor bhūmir antarikṣaṃ svar dyaus tābhyāṃ namo bhavamatyāya kṛṇmaḥ ||
namas te astv āyate namo astu parāyate | namas te rudra tiṣṭhata āsīnāyota te namaḥ ||
namaḥ sāyaṃ namaḥ prātar namo rātryā namo divā | bhavāya ca śarvāya ca- -ubhābhyām akaraṃ namaḥ ||
sahasrākṣam atipaśyaṃ purastād rudram asyantaṃ bahudhā vipaścitam | mopārāma jihvayeyamānam ||
śyāvāsvāṃkṛṣṇam asitaṃmṛṇantaṃBhatt. gṛṇantaṃ bhīmaṃ rathaṃ keśinaḥ pādayantam | pūrvepratīmonamo astv asmai ||Bhatt. pratīvo
mā no 'bhi srā matyaṃ devahetiṃBhatt. devahatiṃ mā naḥ krudhaḥ paśupate namas te | anyatrāsmad divyāṃ śākhāṃ vi dhūnu ||
mā no hiṃsīr adhi brūhi pari ṇo vṛṅdhi mākrudha|Bhatt. kṣudhaḥ mā tvayā sam arāmahi ||
mā no aśveṣu goṣu puruṣeṣu mā gṛdho no ajāviṣu | anyatrogra vi vartaya piyārūṇāṃprajāṃ jahi ||Bhatt. priyārūṇāṃ
yasya takmā kāsikā hetir ekā- -aśvasyeva vṛṣaṇaḥ krandaeti|Bhatt. krandaheti abhipūrvaṃ nirṇayate namo astv asmai ||
yas tiṣṭhati viṣṭabhito antarikṣe 'yajvanaḥpramṛṇandevapīyūn |Bhatt. pramṛṇaṃ tasmai namo daśabhiḥ śakvarībhiḥ ||
tubhyam āraṇyāḥ paśavo mṛgā vane hitās tubhyaṃ vayāṃsi śakunāḥ patatriṇaḥ | tava yakṣmaṃ paśupate apsv antas tubhyaṃ kṣaranti divyā āpo vṛdhe ||
śiṃśumārā ajagarāḥ pulīkayājaṣāmatsyāBhatt. jagā rajasā yebhyo asyasi | na te dūraṃ na pariṣṭha- -asti te bhava sadyaḥ sarvāṃpari paśyasi bhūmim ||Bhatt. sarvān
pūrvasmāddhaṃsyuttarasmin samudre mā no rudra takmanā na viṣeṇa | mā naḥ saṃ srā divyenāgninā- -anyatrāsmad vidyutāṃ pātayaitām ||
bhavo divo bhava īśe pṛthivyā bhava ā papra urv antarikṣam | tasya naprāpadducchunā kā caneha ||Bhatt. prāpata
bhava rājan yajamānāya mṛḍa paśūnāṃ hi paśupatir babhūtha |Bhatt. babhūvitha yaḥ śraddadhāti santi devā iti catuṣpade dvipade asya mṛḍa ||
mā no mahāntam uta mā no arbhakaṃ mā naḥ kṣiyantam uta mā no akṣitaḥ | mā no hiṃsīḥ pitaraṃ mota mātaraṃ svāṃtanvaṃrudra mā rīriṣo naḥ ||Bhatt. tanuṃ
rudrasyailabakārebhyo 'saṃsūktagirebhyaḥ | idaṃ mahāsyebhyaḥ śvabhyo akaraṃ namaḥ ||
namas te ghoṣiṇībhyo namas te keśinībhyaḥ | namaḥ saṃyatībhyo namo namasvatībhyaḥ ||
namas te jāyamānāyai jātāyā uta te namaḥ | bālebhyaḥ śaphebhyo rūpāyāghnye te namaḥ ||
yo vidyāt sapta pravataḥ sapta vidyāt parāvataḥ | śiro yajñasya yo vidyāt sa vaśāṃ prati gṛhṇīyāt ||
vedāhaṃ sapta pravataḥ sapta veda parāvataḥ | śiro yajñasyāhaṃ veda somaṃ cāsyāṃ vicakṣaṇam ||
yayā dyaur yayā pṛthivī yayāpo gupitā imāḥ | vaśāṃ sahasradhārāṃ brahmaṇācchā vadāmasi ||
śataṃ vatsāḥ śataṃ dogdhāraḥ śataṃ goptāro adhi pṛṣṭhe asyāḥ | ye devās tasyāṃ prāṇanti te vaśāṃ vidur ekadhā ||
yajñapadīrākṣīrā svadhāprāṇā mahīlukā | vaśā parjanyapatnī devām̐ apyeti brahmaṇā ||
anu tvāgniḥ prāviśad anu somo vaśe tvā | ūdhas te bhadre parjanyo vidyutas te stanā vaśe ||
apas tvaṃ dhukṣe prathamā urvarā aparā vaśe | tṛtīyaṃ rāṣṭraṃ dhukṣe annaṃ kṣīraṃ vaśe tvam ||
yad ādityair hūyamānā- -upatiṣṭha ṛtāvari | indraḥ sahasraṃ pātraiḥ somaṃtvāpāyayadvaśe ||Bhatt. tvāpāyad
yad anūcīndram airBhatt. ayirāṭ āttva ṛṣabho 'hvayat | tasmāt te vṛtrahā payaḥ kṣīraṃ kruddho 'bharad vaśe ||
yat te kruddho dhanapatiḥ kṣīraṃ te abharad vaśe | idaṃ tad adya nākas triṣu pātreṣu rakṣati ||
triṣu pātreṣu taṃ somam ā devy abharad vaśā | atharvā yatra dīkṣito barhiṣy āsta hiraṇyaye ||
saṃ hi somenāgata sam u sarveṇa padvatā | vaśā samudre prānartīd ṛcaḥ sāmāni bibhratī ||
saṃ hi sūryeṇāgata sam u sarveṇa cakṣuṣā | vaśā samudram aty aṣṭhād gandharvaiḥ kalibhiḥ saha ||
saṃ hi vātenāgata sam u sarvaiḥ patatribhiḥ | vaśā samudram atyakhyad bhadrā jyotīṃṣi bibhratī ||
tad bhadrāḥ sam agacchanta vaśā deṣṭry atho svadhā | atharvā yatra dīkṣito barhiṣy āsta hiraṇyaye ||
abhīvṛtā hiraṇyena yad atiṣṭha ṛtāvari | aśvaḥ samudro bhūtvā- -adhy askandad vaśe tvā ||
vaśā mātā rājanyasya vaśā mātā svadhe tava | vaśāyājajñaāyudhaṃBhatt. yajña tataś cittam ajāyata ||
ūrdhvo bindur ud acarad brahmaṇaḥ kakudād adhi | tatas tvaṃ jajñiṣe vaśe tato hotā ajāyata ||
āsnas te gāthā bhavantu- -uṣṇihābhyo balaṃ tava | pājasyājjajñe te yajña stanebhyo raśmayo vaśe ||
īrmābhyām ayanaṃ jātaṃ sakthibhyāṃca vaśe tava |Bhatt. śaktibhyāṃ āntrebhyo atrā jajñira udarād adhi vīrudhaḥ ||
yad udaraṃ varuṇasya- -anuprāviśathāvaśe |Bhatt. prāviśatā tatas tvā brahmodahvayat sa hi netram avet tava ||
sarve garbhād avepanta jāyamānādasūsvaḥ|Bhatt. asusvaḥ sasūvahi tām āhur vaśetiBhatt. sasuva brahmaṇā kl̥pta uta bandhur asyāḥ ||
yudha ekaḥ saṃ sṛjati yo asyā eka id vaśī | tarāṃsi yajñā abhavan tarasāṃ cakṣur abhavad vaśā ||
vaśā sūryaṃ praty agṛhṇād vaśā yajñam adhārayat | vaśāyām antar āviśad odano brahmaṇā saha ||
vaśām evāhur amṛtaṃ vaśāṃ mṛtyum upāsate | vaśedaṃ sarvam abhavad devāBhatt. vasedaṃ manuṣyā asurāḥ pitara ṛṣayaḥ ||
ya evaṃ vidyāt sa vaśāṃ prati gṛhṇīyāt | tathā hi yajñaḥ sarvapād duhe dātreanapasphuran||Bhatt. anvasphuraṃ
tisro jihvā varuṇasya- -antar didyaty āsani | tāsāṃ yā madhye rājati sa vaśā duṣpratigrahā ||
caturdhā reto abhavad vaśāyā apas turīyam amṛtaṃ turīyaṃ yajñas turīyaṃ paśavas turīyam | ya evaṃ vidyāt sa vaśāṃ prati gṛhṇīyāt ||
vaśā dyaur vaśā pṛthivī vaśā viṣṇuḥ prajāpatiḥ | vaśāyā dugdham apiban sādhyā vasavaś ca ye ||
vaśāyā dugdhaṃ pītvā sādhyā vasavaś ca ye | amī bradhnasya viṣṭapi payo asyā upāsate ||
somam enām eke duhre ghṛtam eka upāsate | ya evaṃ viduṣe vaśāṃ dadus te gatās tridivaṃ divaḥ ||
vaśāṃ dattvā brāhmaṇebhyaḥBhatt. da(t)tvā sarvāṃl lokān sam aśnute |Bhatt. sarvāllokān ṛtaṃ hy asyām āhitam api brahmātho tapaḥ ||
vaśāṃ devā upa jīvanti vaśāṃ manuṣyā uta | vaśedaṃ sarvam abhavad yāvat sūryo vipaśyati ||
parūṃṣi yasya saṃbhārā ṛcoyasyānūkyam||
chandāṃsi yasya lomāni paristaraṇam id dhavir yajurhṛdayam ucyate ||
yad atithipatir atithīn pratipaśyati devayajanaṃ prekṣate ||
yad abhivadati dīkṣām upaiti yad udakaṃ yācaty apaḥ pra ṇayati | yā yajñā apaḥ praṇīyante tā eva tāḥ ||
yat tarpaṇam āharanti yo 'gnīṣomīyaḥ paśur badhyate sa eva saḥ ||
yat khātam āharanti puroḍāśā eva tau yad āvasathān kalpayanti sadohavirdhānāny eva tat kalpayanti ||
yad upastṛṇanti barhir eva tat ||
yat kaśipūpabarhaṇāny āharanti paridhaya eva te | yad upariśayanam āharanti svargam eva tena lokam ava rundhe ||
yad abhyañjanam āharanty ājyam eva tat | yad aśanakṛtaṃ hvayanti haviṣkṛtam eva tad u hvayanti | yad vrīhayo yad yavā nirupyante aṃśava eva te ny upyante ||
ulūkhalaṃ musalaṃ grāvāṇauBhatt. ulūkhalamusalaṃ śūrpaṃ pavitraṃ tūṣā ṛjīṣaḥ | srug darvir mekṣaṇam āyavanam āpo 'bhiṣavaṇī yad droṇakalaśaḥ kumbhī ||Bhatt. āpobhiṣavaṇī droṇakalaśaḥ
idam eva kṛṣṇājinaṃ vāyavyāni pātrāṇi | yajamānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vā etad atithipatiḥ kṛṇuteBhatt. yajamānabrāhmaṇaṃ yad āhāryāṇy avekṣata idaṃ bhūyā idām iti ||
yad āha bhūya uddhareti prajāṃ caiva tena paśūṃś ca vardhayate prāṇam eva tena varṣīyāṃsaṃ kṛṇute | yat saṃpṛcchati kāmam eva tenāva rundhe kāmaṃ hipṛṣṭoyācati ||
yad udakam abhiṣiñcaty apa eva tenāva rundhe | yad upaharati havīṃṣy ā sādayati ||
teṣām āsannānām atithir ātmani juhoti | srukkāreṇa vaṣatkāreṇasrucāhastena prāṇe yūpe ||
tasmān na dviṣann adyān na dviṣato 'nnam adyān na mīmāṃsitasya na mīmāṃsyamānasya ||
sarvo vā eṣo jagdhapāpmā yasyānnam aśnanti ||
sarva u eṣo 'jagdhapāpmā yasyānnaṃ nāśnanti ||
prajāpater vā eṣa vikrāntam anuvikrame ya upaharanti ||
prajāpatyo vā etasyaiva yajño vitato ya upaharati ||
sarvadā vā eṣa sutasomo yuktagrāvārdrapavitra āhṛtayajñakratur vitatādhavaro ya upaharati ||
yo 'tithīnāṃ sa āhavanīyo yo 'nnakaraṇaḥ sa dakṣiṇāgnir yo veśmani sa gārhapatyaḥ ||
iṣṭaṃ ca vā eṣa pūrtaṃ cāśnāti yaḥ pūrvo 'tither aśnāti ||
prajāṃ ca vā eṣa paśūṃś cāśnāti (…) ||see 8b
ūrjaṃ ca vā eṣa payaś ca gṛhāṇām aśnāti yaḥ pūrvo 'tither aśnāti ||
eṣa vā atithir yac chrotriyaḥ ||
tasmāt pūrvo nāśnīyād aśitāvaty aśnīyāt tad vratam ||
yajñasyāvicchedāya yajñasya guptaye yajñasya sātmatvāya ||
yat kṣīram upasicyopaharati yāvad agniṣṭomea samṛddheneṣṭvāvarundhe tāvad enenāva rundhe ||
yat sarpir upasicyopaharati yāvat sāhnena samṛddhena (…) ||
yan madhūpasicyopaharati yāvad atirātreṇa samṛddhena (…) ||
yan māṃsam upasicyopaharati yāvad dvādaśāhnena samṛddheneṣṭvāvarundhe tāvad enenāva rundhe ||
yad udakam upasicyopaharati prajānāṃ prajananāya jyog jīvati sarvam āyur eti na punar ā jarasaḥ pramīyate ya evaṃ veda ||
tasmai vāta uṣā hiṅ kṛṇoti savitā bhūtyā pra stauti bṛhaspatir ūrjayodgāyati tvaṣṭā puṣṭyā prati harati viśve devā nidhanam | nidhanaṃ bhūtyāḥ prajāyāḥ paśūnāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
tasmā udyant sūryo hiṅkṛṇoti saṃgavaḥ pra stauti madhyandina udgāyaty aparāhṇaḥ prati haratyastaṃyannidhanam | (…) ||see 1d
tasmā abhrobhavanhiṅ kṛṇoti vidyotamānaḥ pra stauti stanayann udgāyativarṣanprati haratyudgṛhṇannidhanam |Bhatt. varṣaṃ … udgṛhṇaṃ (…) ||see 1d
atithīn prati paśyati hiṅ kṛṇoty abhi vadati pra stauty udakaṃ yācaty udgāyaty upa harati prati haraty ucchiṣṭaṃ nidhanam | nidhanaṃ bhūtyāḥ prajāyāḥ paśūnāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
ete vai priyāś cāpriyāś ca rtvijaḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayanti yad atithayaḥ ||
yat kṣattāraṃ hvayaty ā śrāvayati yat pratiśṛṇoti praty ā śrāvayati ||
yat pariveṣṭāraāvasathānprapadyanteBhatt. āvasathāṃ camasādhvaryava eva te teṣāṃ naikaś canāhotā ||
yat prātar upaharati prātaḥsavanam eva tat ||
yad dīvopaharati mādhyaṃdinam eva tat savanam ||
yat sāyam upaharati tṛtīyasavanam eva tat ||
yad atithipatir atithīnpariviṣyāsanaṃyācateBhatt. pariviśyāsanaṃ avabhṛtham eva tadupāvaiti||Bhatt. upāvayati
yat sabhāgayati dakṣiṇām eva tat sabhāgayati yad anutiṣṭhaty udavasyaty eva tat ||
sa upahūtaḥ pṛthivyāṃ bhakṣayatyBhatt. makṣayaty upahūtas tasmin yat pṛthivyāṃ viśvarūpam | pṛthivyāṃ tapati pṛthivyām ā bhāti svargaloko bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
sa upahūto antarikṣe bhakṣayaty upahūtas tasmin yad antarikṣe viśvarūpam | antarikṣe tapaty antarikṣa ā bhāti (…) ||see 1d
sa upahūto divi bhakṣayaty upahūtas tasmin yad divi viśvarūpam | divi tapati divy ā bhāti (…) ||see 1d
sa upahūto deveṣu bhakṣayaty upahūtas tasmin yad deveṣu viśvarūpam | deveṣu tapati deveṣv ā bhāti (…) ||see 1d
sa upahūto lokeṣu bhakṣayaty upahūtas tasmin yal lokeṣu viśvarūpam | lokeṣu tapati lokeṣv ā bhāti svargaloko bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
yat prāṅ āsīno virvapati yajñāya ca devebhyaś cā vṛścate ||
yad dakṣiṇāsīno nirvapati yamāya ca pitṛbhyaś cā vṛścate ||
yat pratyaṅ āsīno nirvapati varuṇāyāpsuṣadaā vṛścate ||Bhatt. varuṇāyāpsuṣade cā vṛścate
yad udaṅ āsīno nirvapati somāya ca rājñe saptaṛṣibhyaś cāvṛścate ||Bhatt. sapaṛṣibhyaś
yad upasthaṃ kṛtvāsīno nirvapati vāyave cāntarikṣāya cā vṛścate ||
yad ūrdhvas tiṣṭhan nirvapati dive cādityāya cāvṛścate ||

yaṃ kāmayeta pāpīyān ātmanā prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena syād iti | tasyaivaṃ nir vapet tasyaivaṃ nirupyaivam evānu nirvapet | tadaiva sa pāpīyān ātmanā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena bhavati- idamidaṃ kuryāt sā prāyaścītiḥ ||

yaṃ kāmayeta na vasīyān na śreyān ātmanā prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena syād iti | tasyaivaṃ nir vapet tasyaivaṃ nirupayaivam evānu nirvapet | tadaiva sa na vasīyān na śreyān ātmanā prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena bhavati- idamidaṃ kuryāt sa prāyaścittiḥ ||

yaṃ kāmayetavasīyāñchreyān ātmanā prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena syād iti | tasyaivaṃ nir vapet tasyaivaṃ nirupyaivam evānu nirvapet | tadaiva sa vasīyāñ chreyān ātmanā prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena bhavati- idamidaṃ kuryāt sā prāyaścittiḥ ||
yad avahanyamānasya taṇḍula skandati samāṃsamāmasya varaḥ pramāyuko bhavati ||
yad ayastā bhavati pitṛdevatyaṃ karoti ||
yadviṣyandate gṛhāṇāṃ ca paśūnāṃ ca payo viṣyandate||
yad apasiñcati gṛhāṇāṃ ca paśūnāṃ ca payo 'pa siñcati ||
yad āyavanī śīryate gṛhapatir mriyate ||
yad darviḥ śīryate gṛhapatnī mriyate ||
yat kumbhī vikasati sarvajyānir dātā ca pratigṛhītā ca jīyete ||
yat prāñcam udvartayati yajñāya ca devebhyaś cā vṛścate ||
yad dakṣiṇāñcam udvartayati yamāya ca pitṛbhyaś cā vṛścate ||
yat pratyañcam udvartayati varuṇāyāpsuṣadaā vṛścate ||Bhatt. varuṇāyāpsuṣade cā
yad udañcam udvartayati somāya ca rājñe saptaṛṣibhyaś cā vṛścate ||
yad anuvṛttam uddharati diśodiśa evainaṃ bhayam ā gacchati ||
yat prācīnaṃ barhi stṛṇāti yajñāya ca devebhyaś cā vṛścate ||
yad dakṣiṇācīnaṃ barhi stṛṇāti yamāya ca pitṛbhyaś cā vṛścate ||
yat pratīcīnaṃ barhi stṛṇāty akṛtapūrvaṃ karoti ||
yad udīcīnaṃ barhi stṛṇāti somāya ca rājñe saptaṛṣibhyaś cā vṛścate ||
yat purastāt pātrasya tsaruṃ karoty arśaḥ pratigrahītur mukhe jāyate ||
yad dakṣiṇataḥ pātrasya tsaruṃ karoti yamāya ca pitṛbhyaś cā vṛścate ||
yat paścāt pātrasya tsaruṃ karoti pratīcī pratigrahītāraṃ śaravya rcchati ||
yad uttarataḥ pātrasya tsaruṃ karoti somāya ca rājñe saptaṛṣibhyaś cā vṛścate ||
yac chukro bhavaty ādityānām eva priyaṃ dhāmopaiti | sa yaḥ śukraṃ prāśnīyād ādityānāṃ tvā priyeṇa dhāmnā prāśnāmīty enaṃ prāśnīyāt | tataś cainam anyena dhāmnā prāśnāty ādityebhyaś cā vṛścate ||

yat phalīkṛto bhavati viśveṣām eva devānāṃ priyaṃ (…) |see 1b sa yaḥ phalīkṛtaṃ prāśnīyād viśveṣāṃ tvā devānāṃ priyeṇa dhāmnā (…) |see 1d (…) prāśnātisee 1e viśvebhyo devebhyaś cā vṛścate ||Bhatt. devebhya ā
yad aphalīkṛto bhavati marutām eva priyaṃ (…) |see 1b sa yo 'phalīkṛtaṃ prāśnīyān marutāṃ tvā priyeṇa (…) | (…) prāśnātisee 1e marudbhyaś cā vṛścate ||Bhatt. marudbhya ā
yad avakṣāmo bhavaty agner eva (…) |see 1b sa yo 'vakṣāmaṃ prāśnīyād agnes tvā priyeṇa (…) |see 1d (…) prāśnātysee 1e agnaye cā vṛścate ||Bhatt. agnaya ā
yad anavakṣāmo bhavati mitrāvaruṇayor eva (…) |see 1b sa yo 'navakṣāmaṃ prāśnīyān mitrāvaruṇayos tvā priyeṇa (…) |see 1d (…) prāśnātisee 1e mitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ cā vṛścate ||Bhatt. mitrāvaruṇābhyām ā
yad aklinno bhavati- -indrasyaiva (…) |see 1b sa yo 'klinnaṃ prāśnīyād indrasya tvā (…) |see 1d (…) prāśnāti-see 1e -indrāya cā vṛścate ||Bhatt. -indrāyā
yat klinno bhavati pitṝṇām eva (…) |see 1b sa yaḥ klinnaṃ prāśnīyāt pitṝṇāṃ tvā (…) |see 1d (…) prāśnātisee 1e pitṛbhyaś cā vṛścate ||Bhatt. pitṛbhya ā
yat kṣudro bhavaty apām eva (…) |see 1b sa yaḥ kṣudraṃ prāśnīyād apāṃ tvā priyeṇa (…) |see 1d (…) prāśnātysee 1e adbhyaś cā vṛścate ||Bhatt. adbhya cā
yac chithiro bhavati diśām eva (…) |see 1b sa yaḥ śithiraṃ prāśnīyād diśāṃ tvā (…) | [see 1d (…) prāśnātisee 1e digbhyaś cā vṛścate ||Bhatt. digbhya ā

yac chuṣko bhavaty ūrdhvanabhasa eva priyaṃ dhāmopaiti | sa yaḥ śuṣkaṃ prāśnīyād ūrdhvanabhasas tvā priyeṇa dhāmnā prāśnāmīty enaṃ prāśnīyāt | tataś cainam anyena dhāmnā prāśnāty ūrdhvanabhase cā vṛścate ||Bhatt. ūrdhvanabhasa ā
yat kṣīram upasicya prathamaṃ prāśnāti kilāsaḥ pratigrahītā bhavati ||
yat sarpir upasicya prathamaṃ prāśnāti sarpaḥ pratigrahītāraṃ hanti ||
yan madhūpasicya prathamaṃ prāśnāti mahādevaḥ pratigrahītāraṃ hanti ||
yan māṃsam upasicya prathamaṃ prāśnātīśānaḥ pratigrahītāraṃ hanti ||
yad udakam upasicya prathamaṃ prāśnāti tat samṛddham | jyog jīvati sarvam āyur eti na purā jarasaḥ pramīyate ya evaṃ veda ||
yat prāśiṣyan purastād atimṛśati | prāṅ pratigrahītuḥ prāṇaḥ pra krāmati tata evotthāya pra vrajati śiras tasya rujatīti dvādaśīn nāti jīvaty evaṃ cainaṃ prāśnantam upadraṣṭā gṛhṇāti ||
yat prāśiṣyan dakṣiṇataḥ pramṛśati | dakṣiṇā pratigrahītuḥ (…) ||see stanza 1
yat prāśiṣyann uttarataḥ parimṛśaty udaṅ pratigrahītuḥ prāṇaḥ pra krāmati tata evotthāya pra vrajati śiras tasya rujatīti dvādaśīn nāti jīvaty evaṃ cainaṃ prāśnantam upadraṣṭā gṛhṇāti ||
yat prāśiṣyan paścāt prāñcam abhimṛśati | śarmaṇā caivainaṃ tad varmaṇā cābhi mṛśati śarma caivāsmai varma ca bhavati jayaty odanam odanaloko bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||

indrasyauja sthendrasya saha sthendrasya balaṃ stha- -indrasya nṛmṇaṃ sthendrasya śukraṃ sthendrasya vīryaṃ stha | jiṣṇave yogāyendrayogair vo yunajmi jiṣṇave yogāya viśvāni mā rūpāṇy upa tiṣṭhantu yuktāmaāpa stha ||Bhatt. māpa
(…)see 1ab (…) yogāya kṣatrayogair vaḥ (…) ||see 1cde
(…)see 1ab (…) yogāya brahmayogair vaḥ (…) ||see 1cde
(…)see 1ab (…) yogāyānnayogair vaḥ (…) ||see 1cde

indrasyauja sthendrasya saha sthendrasya balaṃ stha- -indrasya nṛmṇaṃ sthendrasya śukraṃ sthendrasya vīryaṃ stha | jiṣṇave yogāyāpāṃ yogair vo yunajmi jiṣṇave yogāya viśvāni mā rūpāṇy upa tiṣṭhantu yuktāmaāpa stha ||Bhatt. Māpa
agner bhāga stha | apāṃ śukraṃ devīr āpo varco asmāsu dhatta | prajāpater vo dhāmnāsmai lokāya sādaye ||
