yo va āpo apāṃ bhāgo 'psv antar yajuṣyo devayajanaḥ |Bhatt. om. 'psv antar idaṃ tam ati sṛjāmi taṃ mābhy ava nikṣi | tena tam abhy ati sṛjāmi yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ | taṃ vadheyaṃ taṃstṛṣīyānenabrahmaṇānena karmaṇānayā menyā ||Bhatt. stviṣīyānena
(…) apāmūrmirapsv antar yajuṣyaḥ (…) ||see stanza 1; Bhatt. mūrmuryajuṣyo
(…) apāṃ vegaḥ (…) ||see stanza 1
(…) apāṃ binduḥ (…) ||see stanza 1
(…) apāṃ garbhaḥ (…) ||see stanza 1
(…) apāṃ vatsaḥ (…) ||see stanza 1
(…) apāṃ vṛṣabhaḥ (…) ||see stanza 1
(…) apāmaśmāpṛśnir divyo 'psv antar yajuṣyaḥ (…) ||see stanza 1
yo va āpo apāṃ hiraṇyagarbho 'psv antar yajuṣyo devayajanaḥ |Bhatt. om. apāṃ idaṃtam ati sṛjāmi taṃ mābhy ava nikṣi | tena tam (…) ||see 1cde

yeva āpo apām agnayo 'psv antar yajuṣyā devayajanāḥ |Bhatt. yo idaṃtān ati sṛjāmi tān mābhy ava nikṣi | tais tam abhy ati sṛjāmi yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ | taṃ vadheyaṃ taṃ stviṣīyānena brahmaṇānena karmaṇānayā menyā ||
yad arvācīnam aikahāyanād anṛtaṃ kiṃ codima | āpo mā tasmād enaso duritāt pāntu viśvataḥ ||
ariprā āpo apa ripram asmat | prāsmad eno duritaṃ supratīkāḥ pra duṣvapnyaṃ pra malaṃ vahantu ||
samudraṃ vo 'pa sṛjāmi svāṃ yonimapītana|Bhatt. apīhi ariṣṭāḥ sarvahāyaso mā ca naḥ kiṃ canāmamat ||

viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si sapatnahā pṛthivīsaṃśito 'gnitejāḥ | pṛthivīm anu vi krame 'haṃ pṛthivyās taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ | pūrvajān sapatnān avainān bādhe aty enān kramāmy apāṅ apanuttaḥ sapatnaḥ ||
viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si sapatnahā- -antarikṣasaṃśito vāyutejāḥ | antarikṣam anu vi krame 'ham antarikṣāt taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ | sahajān sapatnān (…) ||see 1fg
viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si sapatnahā dyusaṃśitaḥ sūryatejāḥ | divam anu vi krame 'haṃ divas taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ | aparajān sapatnān (…) ||see 1fg
(…) sapatnahāsee 1a diksaṃśito vātatejāḥ | diśo anu vi krame 'haṃ digbhyas tam (…) ||see 1defg
(…) sapatnahā-see 1a -āśāsaṃsito manastejāḥ | āśā anu vi krame 'ham āśābhyas tam (…) ||see 1defg
(…) sapatnahā-see 1a -apsaṃsito varuṇatejāḥ | apo anu vi krame 'ham adbhyas tam (…) ||see 1defg
(…) sapatnahāsee 1a ṛksaṃśitaḥ sāmatejāḥ | ṛco anu vi krame 'haṃ ṛgbhyas tam (…) ||see 1defg
(…) sapatnahāsee 1a yajñasaṃśito brahmatejāḥ | yajñam anu vi krame 'haṃ yajñāt tam (…) ||see 1defg
(…) sapatnahā-see 1a -oṣadhīsaṃśitaḥ somatejāḥ | oṣadhīr anu vi krame 'ham oṣadhībhyas tam (…) ||see 1defg
(…) sapatnahāsee 1a kṛṣisaṃśitaḥ puruṣatejāḥ | kṛṣim anu vi krame 'haṃ kṛṣyās tam (…) ||see 1defg
viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si sapatnahā prāṇasaṃśito 'nnatejāḥ | prāṇam anu vi krame 'haṃ prāṇāt taṃ nirbhajāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ ||
agamaṃsvar agamaṃ jyotir abhy aṣṭhāṃ viśvāḥ pṛtanā arātīḥ | yo +'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas tasyedaṃ prāṇam āyur ni veṣṭayāmi- -idam enam adhamaṃ tamo gamayāmi ||

sūryasyāvṛtam anv āvarte dakṣiṇām anv āvṛtam | diśojyotiṣmatīrabhi paryāvarte sapta ṛṣīn abhi paryāvarte brahmābhi paryāvarte brāhmaṇān abhi paryāvarte | te me draviṇaṃ yacchantu te me brāhmaṇavarcasam ||
yat te 'nnaṃ bhuvaspata ākṣiyatipṛthivīm anu |Bhatt. ākṣayatu tasya nas tvaṃ bhuvaspate saṃprayaccha prajāpate | yaṃ vayaṃ mṛgayāmahe taṃ vadhai stṛṇavāmahi ||
vyātte parameṣṭhino brahmaṇāpīpadāmatam |Bhatt. brahmaṇāpīpadāmṛ vaiśvānarasya daṃṣṭrābhyāṃ mṛtyus taṃ samadhādabhi||Bhatt. ibhiḥ
iyaṃ taṃpsātvāhutiḥ samid devī sahīyasī | rājño varuṇasya bandho 'si so *'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram anne prāṇe badhāna ||Bhatt. somam
apām asmai vajraṃ pra harāmi caturbhṛṣṭiṃ śīrṣabhidyāya vidvān | so asya parvā pra śṛṇātu sarvā tan me devā hy anu jānantu viśve ||Bhatt. anu mā jānantu
yad agne tapasā tapa upa prekṣāmahe vayam | priyāḥśrutasya bhūyāsma-Bhatt. priyā -āyuṣmantaḥ sumedhasaḥ ||
virāḍ vā idam agre 'jāyata tasyā jātāyā abibhet sarvam | iyam evedaṃ bhaviṣyati na vayam iti ||
sod akrāmat sā dakṣiṇāgnau ny akrāmat | yajñarto vāsateyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
(…) sā gārhapatye ny akrāmat |see 2a gṛhamedhī gṛhapatir bhavati (…) ||see 2b
(…) sāhavanīye ny akrāmat |see 2a yanty asya devādevahūtiṃpriyo devānāṃ bhavati (…) ||see 2b; Bhatt. devahetiṃ
(…) sā sabhāyāṃ ni (…) |see 2a yanty asya sabhāṃ sabhyo bhavati (…) ||see 2b
(…) sā samitau ni (…) |see 2a yanty asya samitiṃ sāmityo bhavati (…) ||see 2b
(…) sāmantraṇe ny akrāmat |see 2a yanty asyāmantraṇam āmantraṇīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||

(…) sāntarikṣe caturdhā vikrāntātiṣṭhatsee 2a tāṃ devamanuṣyā abruvann iyaṃtad veda yad ubhaya upajīvema- -imām upa hvayāmahā iti tām upahvāyanta | ūrja ehi svadha ehisūnṛtaehīrāvaty ehīti | tasyā agnir vatsa āsīd gāyatryabhidhānyabhramūdhaḥ ||

tasyā bṛhac ca rathantaraṃ ca dvau stanāv āstāṃ yajñāyajñiyaṃ ca vāmadevyaṃ ca dvau | oṣadhīrvai rathantaraṃ devāaduhranvyaco bṛhadBhatt. aduhraṃ apo vāmadevyaṃ yajñaṃyajñāyajñiyam||Bhatt. yajñiyāyajñam
ete vai virājaḥ kāmadugha stanāḥ | kāmaṃkāmaṃ virājaṃ duhe ya evaṃ veda ||
(sod akrāmat) sā vanaspatīn āgacchat tāṃ vanaspatayo 'ghnata sā saṃvatsare sam abhavat | tasmāt saṃvatsare vanaspatīnāṃ vṛkṇam api rohati vṛścyanty asyāpriyaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ ya (evaṃ veda) ||
(…) sā pitṝn āgacchat tāṃ pitaro 'ghnata sā māse sam abhavat | tasmān māse pitṛbhyo dadati svadhāvān pitṛṣu bhavati pra pitṛyāṇaṃ panthāṃ jānāti yaḥ (…) ||
(…) sā devān āgacchat tāṃ devāaghnataBhatt. ghnata sārdhamāse sam abhavat | tasmād ardhamāse devebhyo juhvati juhoty agnihotraṃ pra devayānaṃ panthāṃ jānāti yaḥ (…) ||
(…) sā manuṣyān āgacchat tāṃ manuṣyāaghnataBhatt. ghnata sā sadyaḥ sam abhavat | tasmād ubhayadyur manuṣyā upa haranty upāsya gṛhe haranti yaḥ (…) ||

sod akrāmat sāsurān āgacchat tām asurā upāhvayanta māya ehīti | tasyā virocanaḥ prāhrādur vatsa āsīd ayaspātraṃ pātram | tāṃdvimūrdhārtviyo'dhok tāṃ māyām adhok | tāṃ māyām asurā upa jīvanty upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||

(…) sā pitṝn āgacchatsee 1a tāṃ pitara upāhvayanta svadha ehīti | tasyā yamo vaivasvato vatsa āsīd rajatapātraṃ pātram | tām antako mārtayo 'dhok tāṃ svadhām adhok | tāṃ svadhāṃ pitara upa (…) ||see 1ef

(…) sā manuṣyān āgacchatsee 1a tāṃ manuṣyā upāhvayanterāvaty ehīti | tasyā manur vaivasvato vatsa āsīt pṛthivīpātraṃ pātram | tāṃ pṛthur vainyo 'dhok tāṃ kṛṣiṃ ca sasyaṃ cādhok | tāṃ kṛṣiṃ ca sasyaṃ ca manuṣya upa (…) ||see 1ef
(…) sā devān āgacchatsee 1a tāṃ devā upāhvayantorja ehīti | tasyā indro vatsa āsīd dārupātraṃ pātram | tāṃ savitādhok tām ūrjam adhok | tām ūrjaṃ devā upa (…) ||see 1ef

(…) sā sapta ṛṣīn āgacchatsee 1a tāṃ sapta ṛṣaya upāhvayanta brahmaṇvaty ehīti | tasyāḥ somo vatsaāsīcchandaḥpātraṃ pātram | tāṃ bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso 'dhok tāṃ brahma ca tapaś cādhok | tad brahma ca tapaś ca sapta ṛṣaya upa (…) ||see 1ef

(…) sā gandharvāpsarasa āgacchatsee 1a tāṃ gandharvāpsarasa upāhvayanta puṇyagandha ehīti | tasyāś citrarathaḥ sauryavarcaso vatsa āsīt puṣkaraparṇaṃ pātram | tāṃ vasuruciḥ sauryavarcaso 'dhok tāṃ puṇyaṃ gandham adhok | taṃ puṇyaṃ gandhaṃ gandharvāpsarasā upa (…) ||see 1ef

(…) sā puṇyajanān āgacchatsee 1a tāṃ puṇyajanā upāhvayanta tirodha ehīti | tasyāḥ kubero vaiśravaṇo vatsa āsīd āmapātraṃ pātram | tāṃ rajatanābhiḥ kāberako 'dhok tāṃ tirodhām adhok | tāṃ tirodhāṃ puṇyajanā upa (…) ||see 1ef

sod akrāmat sā sarpān āgacchat tāṃ sarpā upāhvayanta viṣavaty ehīti | tasyās takṣako vaiśāleyo vatsa āsīd alābupātraṃ pātram | tāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭra airāvato 'dhok tāṃ viṣam adhok | tad viṣaṃ sarpā upa jīvanty upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||

tasmādyasmāalābunābhiṣiñcenBhatt. yasmādalābunā manasā tvā pratyāhanmīty enaṃ pratyāhanyāt | yat pratyāhanti viṣaṃ pratyāhanti na ca pratyāhanti viṣam anu prasicyate | viṣam asyāpriyaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ hanti ya evaṃ veda ||
aghāyatām api nahyā mukhāni sapatneṣu vajramarpayaitam| indreṇa dattā prathamā śataudanā bhrātṛvyaghnī yajamānāya gātuḥ ||
vediṣ ṭe carma bhavatu barhir lomāni yāni te | eṣā tvā raśanāgrahīd grāvātvaiṣo'dhi nṛtyatu ||Bhatt. tveṣodhi
bālās te prokṣaṇīḥ santu jihvā saṃmārṣṭvaghnye | śuddhā tvaṃ yajñiyā bhūtvā divaṃ prehi śataudane ||
yaḥ śataudanāṃ pacati kāmapreṇasakalpate |Bhatt. si prītā hy asya ṛtvijaḥ sarve yanti yathāyatham ||
ye te devi śamitāraḥ paktāro ye ca te janāḥ | ete tvā sarvegopsyantiBhatt. gopsanti maibhyo bhaiṣīḥ śataudane ||
sa svargam ā rohati yatrādas tridivaṃ divaḥ | hiraṇyajyotiṣaṃ kṛtvā yo dadāti śataudanām ||
satāṃllokān sam āpnotiBhatt. tāṃ yeṣu devāḥ samāsate | apūpaṃ nābhiṃ kṛtvā yo dadāti śataudanām ||
vasavas tvā dakṣiṇata uttarān marutas tvā | ādityāḥ paścādgopsyantiBhatt. gopsanti sātirātram agniṣṭomam atidrava||Bhatt. bhruva (drava+?)
gandharvā apsaraso devi rudrā aṅgirasas tvā | ete tvā sarvegopsyantiBhatt. gopsanti sātirātram agniṣṭomam atidrava||Bhatt. dravaḥ
antarikṣaṃ divaṃ bhūmim ādityān maruto diśaḥ | lokān sarvān āpnoti yo dadāti śataudanām ||
ghṛtaṃ prokṣantī subhagā devān devī gamiṣyati | paktāram aghnye mā hiṃsīr divaṃ prehi śataudane ||
ye pitaro diviṣado 'ntarikṣasadaś ca ye ceme bhūmyām adhi | tebhyas tvaṃdhukṣvasarvadāBhatt. dhukṣa(kṣva?) kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||
yat te śiro ye ca śṛṅge yau karṇau yau ca te akṣyau | āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||
yat te mukhaṃ yā jihvā ye dantā ye ca te hanū | (…) ||see 3cd
yat te klomā yad dhṛdayaṃ purītat sahakaṇṭhikā | (…) ||see 3cd
yat teyakṛdye matasne āntrāṇi yāś ca tegudāḥ|Bhatt. gudā (…) ||see 3cd
yas te plāśir yovaniṣṭur yau kukṣī yac ca ta udaram | (…) ||see 3cd
yas te majjā yāny asthīni yan māṃsaṃ yac ca lohitam | (…) ||see 3cd
yau te bāhū yau te aṃsau doṣaṇī yā ca te kakut | (…) ||see 3cd
yete skandhā yā grīvāBhatt. yatte yāḥ pṛṣṭīr yāś ca parśavaḥ | (…) ||see 3cd
yau ta ūrū aṣṭhīvantauBhatt. ūru ye śroṇī yā ca te bhasat | (…) ||see 16.137.3cd
yat te pucchaṃ ye te bālāBhatt. ye bālā yad ūdho ye ca te stanāḥ | (…) ||see 16.137.3cd
yās te jaṅghā yāḥ kuṣṭhikā ṛtsarāye ca te śaphāḥ |Bhatt. hritsarā (…) ||see 16.137.3cd
yat te carma śataudane yāni lomāny aghnye | āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu ||
ayaṃ te stana āmikṣām ayaṃ sarpir ayaṃ madhu | ayaṃ te sarvān kāmān duhāṃ devi śataudane ||
kroḍau te stāṃ puroḍāśāv ājyenābhighāritau | tau pakṣau devi kṛtvā sā dātāraṃ divaṃ vaha ||
ulūkhale musale ye ca carmaṇi ye vā śūrpe taṇḍulāḥ kaṇāḥ | yad vā vāto mātariśvā mamātha- -agniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ kṛṇotu ||
apo devīr madhumatīr ghṛtaścuto brahmaṇāṃ hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi | yatkāma idam abhiṣiñcāmi vo 'haṃ tan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām ||
prajāpatiś ca parameṣṭhī ca śṛṅge indraḥ śiro agnir lalāṭaṃ yamaḥ kṛkāṭaṃ somo rājā mastiṣkaḥ | satyaṃcakṣurṛtaṃ śrotre prāṇāpānau nāsikeBhatt. cakṣu dyaur uttarā hanuḥ pṛthivy adharā ||
agnir āsyaṃ vidyuj jihvā maruto dantāḥ pavamānaḥ prāṇaḥ | viśvaṃ vāyuḥ kaṇṭhaḥ svargo lokaḥ kṛṣṇadraṃ vidharaṇī vikeśyaḥ ||
revatī grīvāḥ kṛttikā skandhā gharmo vahaḥ śyenaḥ kroḍo antarikṣaṃ pājasyam | mitraś ca varuṇaś cāṃsau tvaṣṭā cāryamā ca doṣaṇī ||
mahādevo bāhū bṛhaspatiḥ kakud bṛhatīḥ kīkasāḥ | devānāṃ patnīḥ pṛṣṭaya upasadaḥ parśavaḥ ||
indrāṇī bhasad vātaḥ pucchaṃ pavamāno bālāḥ | brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca śroṇī balam ūrū dhātā ca savitā cāṣṭhīvantau ||
jaṅghā gandharvāapsarasaḥBhatt. (a)psarasaḥ kuṣṭhikā aditiḥ śaphāḥ | ceto hṛdayaṃ yakṛn medhā harimā pittaṃ vrataṃ purītat ||
kṣutkukṣir irā vaniṣṭhuḥBhatt. kṣuta parvatāḥ plāśir devajanā gudā manuṣyā āntrāṇy atrā udaram itarajanā ūbadhyaṃ rakṣāṃsi lohitam | krodhovṛkkau manyur āṇḍau prajā śepaḥ ||
samudro vastir nadī sūtrī stanayitnur ūdho varṣasya pataya stanāḥ | viśvavyacāś carmauṣadhayo lomāni nakṣatrāṇi rūpam ||
abhraṃ pīvo majjā nidhanam | nidhanaṃ bhūtyāḥ prajāyāḥ paśūnāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||

indraḥ prāṅ tiṣṭhan dakṣiṇā tiṣṭhan yamaḥ pratyaṅ tiṣṭhan dhātodaṅ tiṣṭhan savitā | tṛṇāni prāptaḥ somorājāvṛttaānandaḥ|Bhatt. rājāvṛtrahānandaḥ īkṣamāno mitre yujyamāno vaiśvadevo yuktaḥ prajāpatir vimuktaḥ sarvam | etad vai gorūpam | upainaṃrūpavantaḥpaśavas tiṣṭhanti ya evaṃ veda ||Bhatt. rūpaṃvantaḥ
śrameṇa tapasā sṛṣṭā brahmaṇā vittarte śritā | satyenāvṛtā śriyā prāvṛtā yaśasā parivṛtā svadhayā parihitā śraddhayā paryūḍhā dīkṣayā guptā yajñe pratiṣṭhitā loko nidhanam ||
chandāṃsi rūpam aṅgirasaḥ santāpā brahma padavā- -ayaṃ brāhmaṇo 'dhipatiḥ | tāmādadānasyabrahmagavīṃ jinato brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyasya | apa krāmati sūnṛtā vīryaṃ puṇyā lakṣmīḥ ||
saiṣā bhīmā brahmagavy aghaviṣā kṛtyākūlbajamāvṛtāBhatt. kulvajam ābhṛtā sarvāṇy asyāṃkrūrāṇisarve ca mṛtyavaḥ sarvāṇy asyāṃ ghorāṇi sarve ca puruṣavadhāḥ ||
sā brahmajyaṃ brahmagavy ādīyamānā mṛtyoḥ paḍvīśa ā dyati | meniḥ śatavadhā hi sā brahmajyasya kṣitir hi sā ||
tasmād vai brāhmaṇānāṃ gaur durādharṣā vijānatā | vaiśvānaraudvītāBhatt. udgīthā mahādevo 'pekṣamāṇā vajrodhāvantīBhatt. dhāvanti hetiḥ śaphān utkhidantī ||
kṣurapavir īkṣamāṇā mṛtyur hiṅkṛṇvatī | vāśyamānābhisphūrjatiBhatt. vāśyamānāvi brahmagavī brahmajyam ||

ugro devaḥ pucchaṃ paryasyantī sarvajyāniḥ karṇauvarīvarjayantī rājayakṣmo mehantī menir duhyamānā śīrṣaktir dugdhā | sedirupatiṣṭhantīBhatt. setadir mithoyodhaḥ parāmṛṣṭā śaravyā mukhe 'pinahyamāne ||
ṛtirhanyamānā vyṛddhirhṛtā-Bhatt. ṛtur … hitā- -aghaviṣā nipatantī tamo nipatitā | anugacchantī prāṇān upa dāsayati brahmagavī brahmajyasya ||
vairaṃ vikṛtyamānā pautrādyaṃ vibhājyamānā devahetirhriyamāṇāmatirhitā nirṛtir nihitā |Bhatt. hrīyamāṇāmatir pāpmādhidhīyamānāBhatt. pāpmānidhīyamānā pāruṣyam avadhīyamānāprajastāvihitā ||
gharmaḥparyādhīyamānā vaiśvānaraḥ parihitā viṣaṃ prayasyantī takmā prayastā | mūlabarhaṇīparyākriyamāṇākṣitiḥ paryākṛtā ||
aghaṃ pacyamānā parābhūtiḥ pakvā | sugudhriyamāṇāśīviṣauddhṛtāsaṃjñā gandhena ||
abhūtir upahriyamāṇā parābhūtir upahṛtā | śarvaḥkruddhaḥpiśyamānāBhatt. sarvaḥ … piṣyamāṇā śimidā piśitā ||
ārtiraśyamānāvīkartoaśitā|Bhatt. asyamānā vīkartositā aśitālokāc chinatti brahmacārī brahmajyam asmāc cāmuṣmāc ca ||Bhatt. asitā
tasyā āhananaṃ kṛtyā menir āśasanaṃ valagaūbadhyam asvagatāparihvṛtā|Bhatt. pariddnutā agniḥ kravyād bhūtvā brahmagavī brahmajyaṃpraviśyātti||
sarvāsyāṅgāni mūlāni vṛścatiBhatt. vṛścyati chinatty asya pitṛbandhūn parā bhāvayati mātṛbandhūn | vivāhāṃjñātīnsarvānapi kṣāpayati brahmagavī kṣatriyasyāpunardīyamānā ||Bhatt. jñātīṃ sarvam
avāstum enam asvagamaprajasaṃkarotyBhatt. apratisaṃ aparāparaṇobhavati kṣīyate |Bhatt. aparāpariṇo ya evaṃ viduṣo brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyo gām ādatte ||
kṣipraṃ vai tasyāhanane gṛdhrāḥ kurvata ailavam | (…) tasyādahanaṃ pari nṛtyanti keśinīr āghnānāḥ pāṇinorasi kurvāṇāḥ pāpam ailavam ||
(…) tasya vāstuṣu gaṅgaṇaṃ kurvate vṛkāḥ | kṣipraṃ vai tasyapṛcchanti yat tad āsīd idaṃ nu tāt ||
chindhy ā chindhi pra chindhy api kṣāpaya kṣāpaya | ādadānam āṅgirasi brahmajyam upa dāsaya ||
vaiśvadevī hy ucyase kṛtyākūlbajāmāvṛtā oṣantī samoṣantī brahmaṇo vajraḥ ||
kṣurapavir mṛtyur bhūtvāpidhāvitaḥ | ā datse jinatāṃ varca iṣṭaṃ pūrtaṃ cāśiṣaḥ ||
ādāya jītaṃ jītāya loke 'muṣmin prayacchasi|Bhatt.yacchati aghnyepadavīrbhava brāhmaṇasyābhiśastyā ||Bhatt. padavī
meniḥ śaravyā bhavāghād aghaviṣā bhava | agnhye pra śiro jahi brahmajyasya kṛtāgasaḥ ||

tvayā pravṛktaṃ rajatam agnir dahatu duṣkṛtaṃ devapīyumarādhasam |Bhatt. devapīyūm vṛścapravṛścachindhi pra chindhiBhatt. 2x vṛścya kṛnta pra kṛnta piṃśa pra piṃśauṣa sam oṣa daha pra daha | brahmajyaṃ devy aghnya ā mūlād anu saṃdaha ||
yat te śīrṣaṇi daurbhāgyaṃ saktaṃ keśeṣu nihitaṃ lalāṭe | ayaṃ tad viśvabheṣajo apāmārgo 'pa lumpatu ||
yat te bhruvor daurbhāgyaṃ karṇayorakṣṇorhitam | (…) ||see 1cd
(yat) te mukhe nāsikāyāṃ daurbhāgyaṃ vācy oṣṭhayoḥ | (…) ||see 1cd
yat te datsu daurbhāgyaṃ jihvāyāṃ chubuke hitam | (…) ||see 1cd
(yat) te manasi saṃkalpe daurbhāgyaṃ prāṇa āhitam | (…) ||see 1cd
yat te hanvor daurbhāgyaṃ kaṇṭhe klomasu viṣṭhitam | (…) ||see 1cd
yat te skandheṣu grīvāsu daurbhāgyaṃ kīkasāsv anūkye | (…) ||see 1cd
yat te doṣṇor daurbhāgyam aṃsayorupapakṣayoḥ | (…) ||see 1cd
yat te bāhvor daurbhāgyam aratnyoḥkalkuṣīranu |Bhatt. kalpuṣīr (…) ||see 1cd
yat te hastayor daurbhāgyaṃ pāṇyor aṅgulīr anu | (…) ||see 1cd
yat tepṛṣṭiṣudaurbhāgyaṃ jaghane sphijor hitam | (…) ||see 16.147.1cd

yat te hṛdaye daurbhāgyaṃ nābhyāṃ vakṣaṇā anu | (…) ||see 16.147.1cd

yā te kā ca pāpī lakṣmīr athoyā te apaśutā | ayaṃ tad viśvabheṣajo apāmārgo 'pa lumpatu ||
kaṇṭhadaghnāmahimārttinṛṇāṃBhatt. ⟨ mārtimṛṇāṃ? devebhyaḥ kilbiṣaṃ yad babhūva | imās tad āpaḥ pra vahantu ripraṃ punātu mā śatadhāraṃ pavitram ||
snāhi ripraṃ śamalaṃ ca sarvaṃ kṛṣṇe cele sādayitvā pāpam | hitvāvartiṃ nirṛtiṃ mṛtyupāśān sūryaṃ jyotir abhy ehy agnim ||
udyanto asmān mahataḥ samudrān mucyamāno aṃhasaḥ pāpmanaś ca | punar manaḥ punar āyur na āgan mā mā dabhan paṇayo yātudhānāḥ ||
ava ripram anikṣmahy aśastimadhy ātmanaḥ | varca ā dhīyatāṃ mayi teja ā dhīyatāṃ mayi | prāṇāpānau mā mā hāsiṣṭaṃ sarvam āyur aśīya ||
brahma bhrājad ud agād antarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca brahmāvādhūṣṭāmṛtena mṛtyum | brahmopadraṣṭā sukṛtasya sākṣād brahmāsmad apa hantu śamalaṃtamaśca ||Bhatt. tapaś
pratīcīr āyatā stara vitatāḥ paśyāmahai |Bhatt. ⟨ paśyāmahai? samudre apsu yā hitā- -asurāṇāmayasmayī||
hariḥ suparṇo divam āruho 'rciṣā ye tvā dipsanti divam utpatantam | ava tāṃ jahi harasā jātavedo 'bibhyad ugro hy arciṣā divam ā roha sūrya ||
ayojālā asurā māyino 'yasmayaiḥ pāśair aṅkino ye caranti | tāṃs te randhayāmi harase jātavedaḥ sahasrabhṛṣṭiḥsapatnān pramṛṇan yāhi vajraḥ ||Bhatt. sahasrapṛṣṭhiḥ
devānām adhipā eti gharma ṛtena bhrājann amṛtaṃ vicaṣṭe | hiraṇyavarṇo nabhaso deva sūrya gharmo bhrājan divo antān pary eṣi vidyutā ||
vidyotante vidyuto agnijihvā hiraṇyavarṇā amṛtā apsv antaḥ samudre | rudrasya kṣipno stanayitnorvidyuttasyaBhatt. vidyu vaiśvānārasya hetiḥ pari ṇo vṛṇaktu ||
vidyutā bhrājan hṛdayaṃ yāty agnir vyāghrā apsuṣado yatra bhīmāḥ | viṣṇoḥ kramai stanayann eti rudro nudaṃ chatrūn vi mṛdho bādhamāno 'sapatnāḥ pradiśo me kṛṇotu ||
apo vasānaḥ samaity antarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca samiddho agnir divyas tapodhāḥ | vaiśvānaraḥ śamayā śītarūre apāṃ suparṇo diva eti pṛṣṭhe ||
vaiśvānaraḥ samudraṃ pary eti śukro gharmo bhrājan tejasā rocamāṇaḥ | nudaṃ chatrūn pradahan me sapatnān ādityo dyām adhyarukṣad vipaścit ||
vaiśvānaraḥ saṃ tapaty antarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca samiddho agnir divyas tapojāḥ | śikṣantv asmā abhi sunvanti soma ṛtena bhrājann amṛtaṃ vaste atkī ||
rārahyete nelayataḥ śītarūre tanvāv asya bhīme | rūpāṇy eti bahudhā vasāno guhā kṛṇvānas tanvaḥ parācīḥ ||
pañcāre cakre parivartamāne samārohanti bhuvanāni viśvā | tasya nākṣas tapyate bhūribhāraḥ sanād eva na chidyate sanābhiḥ ||
pañcabhis taptas tapaty eṣa etat sahasradhāmānam anu tiṣṭhanty enam | sapta tvā sūrya harito vahanti brahmaṇādityas trivṛtā mukhena ||
vi dyotate dyotata ā ca dyotate apsv antar amṛto gharmaudyan| hantā vṛtrasya haritām anīkam anādhṛṣṭās tanvaḥ sūryasya ||
gharmaḥ paścād uta gharmaḥ purastād ayodaṃṣṭrāya dviṣato 'pi dadhmaḥ | vaiśvānaraḥ śītarūre vasānaḥ sapatnān me dviṣato hantu sarvān ||
ṛtūn ṛtubhiḥ śrapayati brahmaṇaikavīro gharmaḥ śucānaḥ samidhā samiddhaḥ | brahmā tvā tapati brahmaṇā tejasā ca ||
brahma jajñānaṃ prathamaṃ samā dade taj jāyamānaṃ na bibhide nabhidyate| tad aṅgamānaṃ pitaraṃ vyāhatiBhatt. ⟨ aṃhamānaṃ? tasya nāḍya ātatā vitatās tatā u tāḥ ||
asayajjāna sata ā jabhāraBhatt. ⟨ asajjajāna? ya īṃ jajāna sa id asya bhartā | prajāpatiḥ prajābhiḥ saṃvidānas trīṇi jyotīṃṣi dadhate na pākaḥ ||
prajāpatiś carati garbhe antaḥ sa jāyamāno bahudhā pra jāyate | tasya padam abhi paśyanti vedhasas tasminn ārpitā bhuvanāni viśvā ||
yasmin devāḥ pitaro manuṣyā arā nābhāv iva śritāḥ | apāṃ tvā puṣpaṃ pṛcchāmi yatra tanmāyayāhitam||Bhatt. māyāhitam
yatrāpāṃ puṣpaṃ nihitaṃ māyayātihitaṃ guhā | yo vai tad vidyāt pratyakṣaṃ sa vidyād brāhmaṇaṃ mahat ||
maṇistriṣūtronihitaḥ svarvid ūrdhvas tiryaṅ viśa etu prajānan | sa pumān puṃso janayann ṛtena sarvān antān gacchatu sadya eva ||
sarvāṃ rātrīṃ sam oṣatv ādityo jātavedasā | agner adhi divam ā rohann āyuṣā sam anaktu mā varcasā saṃ sṛjāti mā ||
gharmaḥ sāhasraḥ samidhā samiddho 'sapatnāḥ pradiśo me kṛṇotu | sapatnān sarvān me sūryo hantu vaiśvānaro hariḥ ||
gharmastaptaḥpra dahatuBhatt. tapta(ḥ) bhrātṛvyān dviṣato mama | ā dattāṃ chatrūn āditya udyan sūryaḥ pṛtanyataḥ ||
vaiśvānaraḥ pra dahatu bhrātṛvyān dviṣato vṛṣā | udyan me śukra ādityo vi mṛdho hantu sūryaḥ ||
śukraṃ suparṇaṃ hari brahma bhrājad ajasraṃ jyotir divam ā tatāna | hariḥ suparṇaḥ pramathiṣṇur āśuḥ sapatnān hantu mahātā vadhena ||
hariḥ suparṇaḥ sudino 'bhayaṃkaro hiraṇyavarṇo durudāpa āśuḥ | sapatnān sarvān me sūrya ādityo hantu raśmibhiḥ ||
mahāntam arthaṃ pari sadya etv ahorātrevidadhacchukra udyan | sapatnān sarvān me sūrya etu vaiśvānaro dahan ||
udyann adya mitramaha ity ekā ||
tejas tapāṃsi mukhato bibharṣy ānandaṃ bhūtiṃ mahasaḥ pratiṣṭhām | paryūhamāṇaḥ śriyam eṣi sarvato amoghaṃ satyaṃ yaśa udyataṃ te ||
brahmacārīṣṇaṃś carati rodasī ubhe yasmin devāḥ saṃmanaso bhavanti | sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utāmūṃ sa ācāryaṃ tapasā pipartu ||
ācārya upanayamāno brahmacāriṇaṃ kṛṇute garbham antaḥ | taṃ rātrīs tisra udare bibharti taṃ jātaṃdraṣṭumabhisaṃyanti devāḥ | brahmacāriṇaṃ pitaro manuṣyā devajanā gandharvā enam anu yanti sarve ||
trayastriṃśataṃ triśatān ṣaṭ sahasrān sarvān sa devāṃs tapasā piparti | iyaṃ samit pṛthivīdyaurdvitīyā- -utāntarikṣaṃ samidhā pṛṇāti | brahmacārī samidhā mekhalāvī śrameṇa lokāṃs tapasā piparti ||
pūrvo jāto brahmaṇo brahmacārī gharmaṃ vasānas tapaso 'dhi tiṣṭhat | tasmāj jātaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brahma jyeṣṭhaṃ devāś ca sarve amṛtena sākam ||
brahmacārī samidhā samiddhaḥ kārṣṇaṃvasāno dīkṣito dīrghaśmaśruḥ | sa sadya eti pūrvād aparaṃ samudraṃ lokān saṃrabhya muhur ācarikrat ||
brahmacārī janayan brahma- -apo lokaṃ prajāpatiṃ parameṣṭhiṇaṃ virājam | garbho bhūtvāmṛtasya yonāv indro bhūtvāsurāṃs tatarha ||
imāṃ bhūmīṃ pṛthivīṃ brahmacārī bhikṣāṃ jabhāra prathamo divaṃ ca | te brahma kṛtvā samidhā upāsate tayor ārpitā bhuvanāni viśvā ||
ācāryastatakṣanabhasī ubheBhatt. tadakṣa urvī gambhīre pṛthivīṃ divaṃ ca | te brahmacārī tapasābhi rakṣati tayor devāḥ sadhamādaṃ madanti ||
arvāg anyaḥ paro anyo guhā nidhī nihitau brāhmaṇasya | tau brahmacārī tapasābhi rakṣati tat kevalaṃ kṛṇute brahma vidvān ||
arvāg anyo divas pṛṣṭhād ito 'nyaḥ pṛthivyāagnīBhatt. pṛthivyāgni sameto nabhasī antareme | tayoḥśrayante raśmayo 'dhi dṛḍhāsBhatt. tayo(ḥ) tān ā tiṣṭhati tapasā brahmacārī ||
abhikrandannaruṇaḥ śitiṅgoBhatt. abhikrandanvaruṇaḥ bṛhacchepo 'nu bhūmau jabhāra | brahmacārī siñcati sānau retaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tena jīvanti pradiśaś catasraḥ ||
parjanyo mṛtyur varuṇaḥ soma oṣadhayaḥ payaḥ | jīmūtā āsan satvānas tair idaṃ svar ābharan ||
agnau sūrye candramasi mātariśvani brahmacāry apsu samidham ā dadhāti | teṣām arcīṃṣi pṛthag abhre caranti teṣām ājyaṃ puruṣo varṣam aśvaḥ ||
amā ghṛtaṃ kṛṇute kevalam ācāryo bhūtvā varuṇo yadyad aicchat prajāpatau | tad brahmacārī prāyacchat svān mitro adhy ātmanaḥ ||
ācāryo brahmacārī brahmacārī prajāpatiḥ | prajāpatir vi rājati virāḍ indro 'bhavad vaśī ||
brahmacaryeṇa tapasā rājā rāṣṭraṃ vi rakṣate | ācāryo brahmacaryeṇa brahmacāriṇam icchate ||
brahmacaryeṇa kanyā yuvānaṃ vindate patim | anaḍvān brahmacaryeṇa- -aśvo ghāsaṃ jigīrṣati ||
brahmacaryeṇa tapasā devā mṛtyum apājayan | indro ha brahmacaryeṇa- -amṛtaṃ svar ābharat ||
oṣadhayo bhūtā bhavyam ahorātre vanaspatayaḥ | saṃvatsaraḥ sahartubhis te jātā brahmacāriṇaḥ ||
pārthivā divyāḥ paśava āraṇyā grāmyā ca ye | apakṣāḥ pakṣiṇaś ca ye te jātā brahmacāriṇaḥ ||
pṛthak sarve prajāpatyāḥ prāṇām̐ ātmasu bibhrati | sarvāṃs tān brahma rakṣati brahmacāriṇyābhṛtam||Bhatt. ābhṛtāṃ
brahmacārī brahma bhrājad bibharti tasmin devā adhi viśvesametāḥ|Bhatt. sametā(ḥ) sa snāto babhruḥ piṅgalaḥBhatt. misprint brabhruḥ pṛthivyāṃ bahu rocate ||
devānām etatpariṣūtamBhatt. pariṣutam anabhyārūḍhaṃ carati rocamānam | tasmin sarve paśavas tatra yajñās tasminn annaṃ saha devatābhiḥ ||Bhatt. misprint tasinnaṃ
prāṇāpānau janayann ād vyānaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ janayan brahma medhām | vācaṃ śreṣṭhāṃ yaśo asmāsu dhehy ||
annaṃ reto lohitam udaraṃ tānikalpan|Bhatt. kalpam brahmacārī salilasya pṛṣṭhe tapo 'tiṣṭhat tapyamānaḥ samudre ||
satyaṃ bṛhad ṛtam ugraṃ dīkṣā tapo brahma yajñaḥ pṛthivīṃ dhārayanti | sā no bhūtasya bhavyasya patny uruṃ lokaṃ pṛthivī naḥ kṛṇotv asaṃbādhaṃ madhyato mānaveṣu ||
yasyā udyataḥ pravataḥ samaṃ bahu nānāvīryā oṣadhīr yā bibharti | pṛthivī naḥ prathatāṃ rādhyatāṃ naḥ ||
yasyāṃ samudra uta sindhur āpo yasyāṃ devā anṛtam anvavindan | yā bibharti bahudhā prāṇam ejatread prāṇad with K? sā no bhūmir goṣv aśveṣv apy anne kṛṇotu ||
yasyāṃ pūrve pūrvajanā vicakrire yasyāṃ devā asurān abhyavartayan | yasyām idaṃ jīvati viśvam ejat sā no bhūmiḥ pūrvapeye dadhātu ||
yasyāṃ catasraḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yasyām annaṃ kṛṣṭayaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ | gavām aśvānāṃ vayasaś ca viṣṭhā bhagaṃ varcaḥ pṛthivī no dadhātu ||
viśvaṃbharā vasudhānī pratiṣṭhā hiraṇyavakṣā jagatoniveśanīḥ| vaiśvānaraṃ bibhratī bhūmir agnim indrarṣabhā draviṇe no dadhātu ||
yasyām āpaḥ paricarāḥ samānīr ahorātre apramādaṃ kṣaranti | sā no bhūmir bhūridhārā payo duhām athoukṣatuvarcasā ||
yāṃ rakṣanty asvapnā viśvadānīṃ devā bhūmiṃ pṛthivīm apramādam | sā no madhu priyaṃ duhām athoukṣatuvarcasā ||
yārṇave 'dhi salilam agra āsīd yāṃ māyābhiranvacaranmanīṣiṇaḥ | yasyāṃ hṛdayaṃ parame vyomant satyenāvṛtamamṛtaṃ pṛthivyāḥ | sā no bhūmis tviṣiṃ balaṃ rāṣṭre dadhātu me ||
yām aśvināv amimātāṃ viṣṇur yasyāṃ vicakrame | indro yāṃ cakra ātmane anamitrāṃ chacīpatiḥ | sā no bhūmir vi sṛjatāṃ mātā putrāya naḥ payaḥ ||
girayas te parvatā himavanto 'raṇyan te pṛthivi syonam astu naḥ | babhruṃ kṛṣṇāṃ rohiṇīṃ viśvarūpāṃ dhruvāṃ bhūmiṃ pṛthivīm indraguptām ajīto 'hato akṣato adhyaṣṭhāṃ pṛthivīm aham ||Bhatt. ajītohato
yat te madhyaṃpṛthiviyac ca nabhyaṃ yās ta ūrjas tanvaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ | tāsu no dhehy abhi naḥ pavasva ||
mātā bhūmiḥ putro ahaṃ pṛthivyāḥ parjanyaḥ pitā sa u naḥ pipartu ||
yasyāṃ vediṃ parigṛhnanti bhūmyāṃ yasyāṃ yajñaṃ tanvate viśvakarmāṇaḥ | yasyāṃmīyante svaravaḥ pṛthivyām ūrdhvāḥ śukrā āhutyāḥ purastāt | sā no bhūmir vardhayād vardhamānā ||
yo no dveṣat pṛthivi yat pṛtanyād yo 'bhimanyātai manasā vadhena | tan no bhūme randhaya pūrvakṛtvane ||
tvajjātās tvayi caranti martyās tvaṃ bibharṣi dvipadaś catuṣpadaḥ | tvayīmepṛthivipañca mānavā yebhyo jyotir amṛtaṃ martyebhya udyan sūryo raśmibhir ā tanoti ||
tā naḥ prajāḥ saṃduhratāṃsamagrā vāco madhu pṛthivī dhehi mahyam ||
viśvasvaṃmātaram oṣadhīnāṃ dhruvāṃ bhūmiṃ pṛthivīṃ dharmaṇā dhṛtām | śivāṃ syonām anu carema viśvahā ||
mahat sadhasthaṃ mahatī babhūvitha mahān vega ejathur vepathuṣ ṭe | mahāṃstvendro rakṣati vīryeṇa sā no bhūme prarocaya hiraṇyasyeva saṃdṛśi ||
agnir bhūmyām agnir oṣadhīṣv agnim āpo bibhraty agnir aśmasu | agnir antaḥ puruṣeṣu goṣv aśveṣv agnayaḥ ||
agnir diva ā tapaty agner devasyorv antarikṣam | agniṃ martāsa indhate havyavāhaṃ ghṛtapriyam ||

agnivāsāḥ pṛthivy asitajñus tviṣīmantaṃsaṃśitaṃ mā kṛṇotu | bhūmyāṃ devebhyo juhvati yajñaṃ havyam araṃkṛtam |Bhatt. || bhūmyāṃ manuṣyā jīvanti svadhayānnena martyāḥ | sā no bhūmiḥ prāṇam āyur dadhātu jaradaṣṭiṃ mā pṛthivī kṛṇotu ||
yas te gandhaḥ pṛthivi saṃbabhūva yaṃ bibhraty oṣadhayo yam āpaḥ |Bhatt. vibhraty yaṃ gandharvā apsarasaś ca bhejire yas te gām aśvam arhati | tenāsmān surabhīn kṛṇu mā no dvikṣata kaś cana ||
yas te gandhaḥ puṣkaram āviveśa yaṃ saṃjabhruḥ sūryāyā vivāhe | amartyāḥ pṛthivi gandham agre | tenāsmān surabhīn kṛṇu mā no dvikṣata kaś cana ||
yas te bhūme puruṣeṣu strīṣu puṃsu bhagorucir yo vadhūṣu vadhūyuṣu | yo goṣv aśveṣu yo mṛgeṣūta hastiṣu | kanyāyāṃ varco yad bhūme tenāsmām̐ adhi saṃ sṛja mā no dvikṣata kaś cana ||
śilā bhūmir aśmā pāṃsur yā bhūmiḥ saṃbhṛtā dhṛtā | yasyāṃ vṛkṣā vānaspatyā dhruvās tiṣṭhanti viśvahā | bhūmiṃ hiraṇyavakṣasaṃ dhṛtām acchā vadāmasi ||
udīrāṇā utāsīnās tiṣṭhantaḥ prakrāmantaḥ | padbhyāṃ dakṣiṇasavyābhyāṃ mā vyathiṣmahi bhūmyām ||
vimṛgvarīṃ pṛthivīm ā vadāmi kṣamāṃ bhūmiṃ brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānām | ūrjaṃ puṣṭiṃ bibhratīmannabhāgaṃ ghṛtaṃ tvābhi ni ṣīdāmi bhūme ||
śuddhā ma āpas tanvaḥ kṣaranti yo me sehurapriyetaṃ ni dadhmaḥ | pavitreṇa pṛthivīm ut punāmi ||
nidhīn bibhratī bahudhā guhā vasu maṇiṃ hiraṇyaṃ pṛthivī dadhātu naḥ | vasūni no vasudā rāsamānā devī dadhātu sumanasyamānā ||
yās te prācīḥ pradiśo yā udīcīr yās te bhūme adharād yāś ca paścāt | syonās tā mahyaṃ carate bhavantu mā ni paptaṃ bhuvane śiśriyāṇe ||
mā mā paścān mā purastān nudiṣṭhāḥ svasti bhūme me kṛṇu varīyo yāvayā vadhan mā vidan paripanthinaḥ ||
yāvat te 'bhi vipaśyāmi bhūme sūryeṇa medinā | tāvan me cakṣur mā meṣṭa- -uttarām uttarāṃ samām ||
yat te bhūme vikhanāmy oṣaṃ tad api rohatu | mā te marma vimṛgvari mā te hṛdayam arpipam ||
yac chayānaḥ paryāvarte dakṣiṇaṃ savyam abhi bhūme pārśvam | uttānās tvā pratīcīṃ pṛṣṭyāyadabhiśemahe mā hiṃsīs tatra no bhūme sarvasya pratiśīvari ||
grīṣmas te bhūme varṣāṇi śarad dhemantaḥ śiśiro vasantaḥ | ṛtavas tevihitāhāyanā ahorātre pṛthivī no duhātām ||

yāpasarpaṃnudamānā vimṛgvarī yasyām āsann agnayo apsv antaḥ | parā dasyūn dadatī devapīyūn indraṃ vṛṇānā pṛthivī na vṛtraṃ śakrāya dadhre vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe | sa no bhūmer ā diśatu yad dhanaṃ kāmayāmahe ||

bhago anu prayuṅktāmBhatt. °yuṃktām indro yātu purogavaḥ | yasyāṃ sadohavirdhāne yūpo yasyāṃ nimīyate | brahmāṇo yasyām arcanti ṛgbhiḥ sāmnā yajurvidaḥ | yujyante yasyām ṛtvijaḥ somam indrāya pātave | sā no bhūmir dakṣiṇāyāṃ suśevā yajñe dadhātu sumanasyamānā ||
yasyāṃ pūrve bhūtakṛta ṛṣayo gā udānṛcuḥ | sapta satreṇa vedhaso yajñena tapasā saha | sā naḥ paśūn viśvarūpān dadhātu dīrghaṃ ma āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu ||
yasyām annaṃ vrīhiyavau yatremāḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ | bhūmyai parjanyapatnyai namo 'stu varṣam edhate ||
yasyāṃ gāyanti nṛtyanti janā martyā vailavāḥ | yujyante yasyām ākrando yasyāṃ vadati dundubhiḥ | sā no bhūmiḥ pra ṇudatāṃsapatnānBhatt. sapatnāṃ yo no dveṣṭy adharaṃ taṃ kṛṇotu ||
yasyāṃ puro devakṛtāḥ kṣetre yasyāṃ vikurvate | prajāpatiḥ pṛthivīṃ viśvagarbhām āśāmāśāṃ raṇyāṃ naḥ kṛṇotu ||
janaṃ bibhratī bahudhā vivācasaṃ nānādharmāṇaṃ pṛthivī yathaukasam | sahasraṃ dhārā draviṇasya no duhāṃ dhruveva dhenur anapasphurantī ||
yas te sarpo vṛścikas tṛṣṭadaṃśmā hemantajabdhobhṛmalo guhā śaye | krimirilmaṃpṛthivi prāvṛṣi yad ejati tan naḥ sarpan mopasṛpadBhatt. sṛpa(d) yac chivaṃ tena no mṛḍa ||
ye te panthāno bahudhā janāyanā rathasya vartman manasaś ca yātave | yebhiś caranty ubhaye bhadrapāpās taṃ panthāṃ jayemānamitram ataskaram ||
mandaṃ (⟨ malvaṃ?) bibhratīgurubhṛd bhadrapāpasya nidhanaṃ titikṣuḥ | sūkareṇa pṛthivī saṃvidānā varāhāya vijihītemṛgāya ||
ye ta āranyāḥ paśavo mṛgā vane hitāḥ siṃhā vyāghrāḥ puruṣādaś caranti | ulaṃ vṛkaṃ pṛthivi ducchunām ita ṛkṣīkāṃ rakṣo apa badhāsmat ||
ye gandharvāpsaraso ye carāyāḥ kimīdinaḥ | piśācān sarvā rakṣāṃsi tān asmad bhūme yāvaya ||

yāṃ dvipādaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ saṃpatanti haṃsāḥ suparṇāḥ śakunā vayāṃsi | yasyāṃ vāta īyate mātariśvā rajāṃsi kṛṇvaṃścyāvayaṃśca vṛkṣān | vātasya pravām upavām anu vāty arcir yasyāṃ kṛṣṇam aruṇaṃ ca saṃbhṛte ahorātre vihite bhūmyām adhi ||
varṣeṇa bhūmiḥ pṛthivī vṛtāvṛtā | sā no dadhātu bhadrayā priye dhāmanidhāmani ||
dyauś ca ma idaṃ pṛthivī ca- -antarikṣaṃ ca me vyacaḥ | agniḥ sūrya āpo medhāṃ viśve devāś ca saṃ dadhuḥ ||
aham asmi sahamāna uttaro nāma bhūmyām | abhisāḍ asmi viśvāṣāḍ āśāmāśāṃ viṣāsahiḥ ||
yad ado devi prathamānā purastād devaiḥ sṛṣṭāvyasarpomahitvam | ā tvā subhūtam aviśat tadānīm akalpayathāḥ pradiśaś catasraḥ ||
ye grāmā yāny araṇyāni yāḥ sabhā adhi bhūmyām | teṣv ahaṃ devi pṛthivy udyāsaṃ madhumad vacaḥ ||
yad vadāni madhumat tad vadāni yad īkṣe ṣutadyaḥ punantu mā | tviṣīmān asmijūtimānyān hanmi dodhataḥ ||
aśva iva rajo duduhe vi taṃ janaṃ ya ākṣiyan pṛthivīm ād ajāyata | madrāpari bhuvanasya gopā vanaspatīnāṃ gṛbhir oṣadhīnām ||
śantivā surabhiḥ syonā kīlālodhnī payasvatī | bhūmir no adhi bravītu pṛthivī payasā saha ||
bhūmi mātar ni dhehi mā bhadrayā supratiṣṭhitam | saṃvidānā divā tvaṃ śriyāṃ mā dhehi bhūtyām ||
yāmanvaicchaddhaviṣā viśvakarmā yasyām āsann agnayo 'psv antaḥ | bhujiṣyaṃ pātraṃ nihitaṃ guhā- -āsīd āvir bhogair abhavan mātṛmadbhiḥ ||
tvam asy āvapanī janānām aditiḥ kāmadughā viśvarūpā | yat taūnaṃtat ta ā pūrayāti prajāpatiḥ prajābhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ ||
kasminn aṅge tapo asyādhi tiṣṭhati kasminn aṅga ṛtam asyādhyāhitam | kva vrataṃ kva śraddhāsya tiṣṭhati kasminn aṅge satyam asya pratiṣṭhitam ||
kva brahma kva tiṣṭhanty āpaḥ kasminn aṅge diśo asya pratiṣṭhitāḥ | katamad aṅgam anu saṃ carete ahorātre saṃvidāne samānam ||
kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhati bhūmir asya kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhaty antarikṣam | kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhaty āhitā dyauḥ kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhaty uttaraṃ divaḥ ||
kasmād aṅgād dīpyate agnir asya kasmād aṅgāt pavate mātariśvā | kasmād aṅgād vi mimīte 'dhi candramāḥ skambhasya mahad vimimāno aṅgam ||
kva prepsan dīpyata ūrdhvo agniḥ kva prepsan pavate mātariśvā | yatra prepsantīr abhiyanty āvṛtaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥsvideva saḥ ||
kva prepsantī yuvatī virūpe ahorātre dravataḥ saṃvidāne | yatra prepsantīr abhiyanty āpaḥ skambhaṃ (…) ||
kvārdhamāsāḥ kva yanti māsāḥ saṃvatsareṇa saha saṃvidānāḥ | yatra yanty ṛtavo yatrārtavāḥ skambhaṃ (…) ||
yasmin skandhā prajāpatirBhatt. emend. skabdhvā? lokān sarvām̐ adhārayat | skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥsvideva saḥ ||
yat paramam avamaṃ yac ca madhyamaṃ prajāpatiḥ sasṛje viśvarūpam | kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa tatra yan na pārviśat kva tad babhūva ||
kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa bhūtaṃ kiyad bhaviṣyadanvāśaye'sya | ekaṃ yad aṅgam akṛṇot sahasradhā kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa tatra ||
yatra lokāś ca kośāś ca brahma yatra janā viduḥ | asac cayatrasac cāntaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥsvideva saḥ ||
yatra tapaḥ parākramya ṛtaṃ dhārayaty uttaram | vrataṃ ca yatra śraddhā ca brahmāpaḥ samāhitāḥ skambhaṃ (…) ||
yasmin bhūmir antarikṣaṃ dyaur asminn adhyāhitā | yatrāgniś candramā sūryo vātas tiṣṭhanty ārpitāḥ skambhaṃ (…) ||
yasya trayastriṃśad devā aṅge sarve samāhitāḥ | skambhaṃ (…) ||
yatra ṛṣayo bhūtakṛta ṛcaḥ sāma yajur mahī | ekarṣir yasminn ārpitāḥ skambhaṃ (…) ||
yasya catasraḥ pradiśo nāḍyas tiṣṭhantiprapyasāḥ| yajño yasmin parākrāntaḥ skambhaṃ (…) ||
yatrāmṛtaṃ ca mṛtyuś ca puruṣaś ca samāhitāḥ | samudro yasya nāḍyaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥsvideva saḥ ||
ye puruṣe brahma vidus te skambham anu saṃ viduḥ | yo veda parameṣṭhinaṃ yaś ca veda prajāpatim | jyeṣṭhaṃ ye brāhmaṇaṃ vidus te skambham anu saṃ viduḥ ||
yasya śiro vaiśvānaraś cakṣur aṅgiraso 'bhavan |Bhatt. cacakṣur, misprint?; aṅgirasobhavaṃ aṅgāni yasya yātavaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥsvideva saḥ ||Bhatt. katama(ḥ)
yasya brahma mukham āhur jihvāṃ madhukaśām uta | virājaṃ yasyodha āhuḥ skambhaṃ (…) ||
yasmād ṛco apātakṣaṃ yajur yasmādapākaṣan|Bhatt. apākaṣaṃ chandāṃsi yasya lomāni skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ ||
asacchākhāṃpratiṣṭhantīṃ paramam iva janā viduḥ | uto san manyante 'vare ye 'sya śākhām upāsate
yatrādityāś ca rudrāś ca vasavaś ca samāhitāḥ | skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ ||
yasya trayastriṃśad devāBhatt. trayaṃstriṃśad nidhiṃ rakṣanti sarvadā | nidhiṃ tam adya ko veda yaṃ devā abhirakṣata ||
yatra devā brahmavido brahma jyeṣṭham upāsate | yo vai ta brāhmaṇo veda taṃ vai brahmavido viduḥ ||
bṛhanto nāma te devā asatas pari jajñire | ekaṃ tad aṅgaṃ skambhasya- -asad āhuḥ paro janāḥ ||
yatra skambhaḥ prajanayan purāṇaṃ vyavartayat | ekaṃ tad aṅgaṃ skambhasya purāṇam anu saṃ viduḥ ||
yatra trayastriṃśad devā aṅgā gātrāṇi bhejire | tān vai trayastriṃśad devān eke brahmavido viduḥ ||
hiraṇyagarbhaṃ paramam anatyudyaṃ janā viduḥ | skambhas tad agre prāsiñcad dhiraṇyaṃ loke antarā ||
skambhelokāḥskambhe tapaḥ skambhe 'dhy ṛtam āhitam | skambhaṃ tvā vidma pratyakṣam indre sarvaṃ samāhitam ||
indre lokā indre tapa indre 'dhy ṛtam āhitam | indraṃ tvā vidma pratyakṣaṃ skambhe sarvaṃ samāhitam ||
nāma nāmnā johavīmi purā sūryāt puroṣasaḥ | yad adaḥ prathamaṃ saṃbabhūva saha tat svarājyaṃ jagāma yasmān na param asti bhūtam ||
yasya bhūmiḥ pramāntarikṣam utodaram | divaṃ yaś cakre mūrdhānaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ ||
yasya sūryaś cakṣuś candramāś ca punar navaḥ | agniṃ yaś cakra āsyaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ ||
yasya vātaḥ prāṇāpānau cakṣur aṅgiraso 'bhuvan |Bhatt. bhuvaṃ diśo yaś cakre prajñānīs tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ ||
yaḥ śramāt tapaso jāto lokān sarvān samānaśe | somaṃ yaś cakre kevalaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ ||
skambho dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyāmutāmūṃ skambho dādhārorv antarikṣam | skambho dādhāra pradiśaḥ ṣaḍ urvīḥ skambha idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam ā viveśa ||
kathaṃ vāto nelayati kathaṃ na ramate manaḥ | kim āpaḥ satyaṃ prepsantīḥ pracaṅkramītisarvadā ||Bhatt. caṃkramiti, emend. caṃkramati
mahad yakṣaṃ bhuvanasya madhye tapasi krāntaṃ salilasya pṛṣṭhe | tasmiṃ chrayante ya u ke ca devā vṛkṣasyaskambhaṃparitaiva śākhāḥ ||
yasmai hastābhyāṃ pādābhyāṃ vācā śrotreṇa cakṣuṣā | yasmai devā sadā baliṃ prayacchanti vimite 'mitaṃ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥsvideva saḥ ||
apa tasya tamo hataṃ vyāvṛttaḥ sapāpmanā| sarvāṇi tasmin jyotīṃṣi yāni trīṇi prajāpatau ||
yo vetasaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ salile veda | sa vai guhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ ||
na prajāpatim aty eti nāty eti parameṣṭhinam | utota tatra no vṛta yaj jyeṣṭhaṃ paro atyayat ||
asti vai tat paro bhūmer asti vai tat paro divaḥ | lokā vai tasmin saṃprotā yasminn otāḥ prajā imāḥ ||

antaḥpātre rerihati dūrśedurnihitaiṣiṇi |Selva 2019, 56; Bhatt. duḥśe durni° uruṇḍe abhicaṅkrame vakmake bastavāsini sarvāsāṃ bhaṇvā vaḥ sākaṃ nāmadheyāni vidmasi | yatijātānivastatiemend. Bhatt. naśyatetaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
karṇā dṛṣadrathāmaham urukīṃ keśinīṃ krakum | khaḍurīm ambarīṣyaṃ nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ || prapāṭhaka ||
paṇḍugirāṃ phāladatīm asaṃsūktanigāriṇīm | asātāḥ sarvā vo brūmo naśyatetaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
yāḥ śayānaṃ jambhayanti naktam icchanty āturam | atho janasya suptasya mukhā hastāt prarihantiBhatt. ruhanti datsu datkavanocitās tā ito nāśayāmasi ||
āpatantīr vikṣiṇānā vastagandhāḥ sadānvāḥ | bhaṇvā (a)sinā totsyāmi tīkṣṇaśṛṅga ivarṣabhaḥ ||
sadānvāḥ sādānveyāṃ strīpuṃsām̐ ubhayān saha | sahe sahasvān sahasā vi mṛdho hanmi rakṣasaḥ ||Bhatt. vimṛdho
caturdaṃṣṭrān kumbhamuṣkān dīrghakeśām̐ asṛnmukhān | alābugandhīn undurān durṇāmno nāśayāmasi ||
stambe jātā adhi bāle rodākām̐ rudatīṃ tvat | durṇāmnīḥ sarvāḥ santokā nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
yāsāṃ jātāni krośanti bhitsv antar vane jvala upa vṛkṣeṣu śerate | (…) ||see 8cd
yā vātābhra utpatite carttāvarṣeṇa vidyutā śālā icchanti satvaram | durṇāmnīḥ sarvāḥ santokā nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
yā dhānyāt saṃbhavanti kṣetrād uptādvarpitāta| kṛtād abhiprahāyyā naśyatetaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
yāḥ puruṣāḥ pāpagandhāḥ sadā rukṣā visṛkpadī | tā vajreṇa samarpayan nirajetaḥ śacīpate ||
ut tiṣṭhatanirdravata na va ihāsti nyañcanam | indro vaḥ sarvāsāṃ sākaṃ garbhān āṇḍāni bhetsyati ||
indra jahi sthūlaśaṃkhāṃ mṛṇīhi durṇaśīṃ kuham | arāyīṃ śakadhūmyaṃ nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
kim āsutāṃnagnahvam ajamāyuṃ canighnatīm| viṭiṭiṅgāḥpratodinīr nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
yasyāsutaṃ randhayadhve yūyaṃ bhaṇvāḥ sadānvāḥ | tṛṣṭaṃ kṛṇutāṇḍaraṃ yadā rasena tṛpyata- -āt surām ava mehatha ||Bhatt. me hatha
tasyāḥ pītvāvamakty atho śīrṣakty ā śaye | tā ekānnadūṣaṇīr nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
apārogāñ chakadhūmān vṛkṣāṇāṃ yantu satvaram | atho durhārdaso gṛhaṃ pra mṛśantv arāyyaḥ ||
tāsām ekācchavakā śaṅkāvaṅkā vanekṛkur hasanaikā kanikradā | sarvāsāṃ bhaṇvā vaḥ sākaṃ nāmadheyāni vidmasi | yati jātāni vas tati naśyatetaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
sahasvatīṃ pra harāmi- imāṃ śālāṃ viṣāsahim | sadānvāghnīm oṣadhiṃ jaitrāyācchā vadāmasi ||
duḥsaṃkāśebhīmacakṣoBhatt. duḥśaṅkāśe nagne bhaṇve sadānve dhrājiṃtviṣiṃśucim agnim arāyi kim ihecchase | dhūmaṃ mābhi pragāyi ni stauṣāmi sadānve ||
kaṅkyekā prakhidaikā kimicchāntyabhiśrayā | caranti naktaṃ durṇāmno arāyīḥ sūtikaiṣyasBhatt. rāyī(ḥ) tā ito nāśayāmasi ||
apakrathām abhiśrayām ānṛtyantīṃkutūhalām| kusūlīṃ rathabhañjanīṃ khalāj jātās trikūkvas tā ito nāśayāmasi ||
yā vikeśīr unmadityā- -urarā ghoracakṣavaḥ | śīrśāṇy anyā anyāsāṃ vitāvantīr ivāsate sadānvā brahmaṇaspate paro bhrūṇāny arpaya ||
yāsāṃ gandho nānārūpaḥ paryaiti puruṣaṃ pathi | tā agniḥ sahatām ito jātavedāḥ sadānvāḥ ||
yāḥ puruṣaṃ dahyamānaṃ śūnyam agnau jighatsanti | bhaṇvā niṣkuṣṭā nāmāsi muṣṭāgreṇa sadānvās tā ito nāśayāmasi ||
yā ucitā āvapane śuṣkaṃ khādanti maṣmasaṃ vaḍavā gardabhīr iva | nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
garbhān ekaḥ prati morśaṃBhatt. emend. mṛśaṃ? yā adanti sadānvāḥ | ucitās tanvaṃ striyā gāva ā rohiṇīr iva tā ito nāśayāmasi ||
yāḥ pitṛyāt saṃbhavanti- -indrajā naḥ sadānvāḥ | apa mityam ivābhṛtaṃ punas tā prati dadmasi ||
āmādinīḥ krūrādinīr anagnigandhyādinīḥ | amuṃ paretyoddhitaṃ śavam atta sadānvāḥ | śavaḥ kevala ācāraḥ kim u śālāsv icchatha ||
yāḥ kumārīr yāḥ sthavirā yuvatīr yāḥ sadānvāḥ | sarvā yantukurūṭinīḥ kulīnādhenu sarpatv arāyīr abhibhā itaḥ ||
tābhyo rudro visṛjatBhatt. visṛja(t) tviṣim adhvagaghātinīm | tā astā hantu vidyutā vajreṇānaparādhinā | tāsāṃ tvaṃ śakra moc chiṣa indra bhaṇvāḥ phalīkuru ||
kumārān ekā sthavīrān yā adantiprakhādinīḥ| tā indro hantu vṛtrahā yā devo viśvād rakṣāṃsi sedhati ||
yāś ca dāsīr asurāṇāṃ manuṣyebhyaś ca yāḥ kṛtāḥ | ubhayīs tāḥ parā yantu parāvataṃ navatiṃ nāvyāati||
yāsāṃ ghoṣaḥ saṃgatānāṃ vṛkāṇām iva gaṅgaṇaḥ | pracaṅkaśāmaivaharāṃ prayacchantīṃ pratigrahāṃ nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
yāni sāyaṃ yathāsthāmād rātrīṃ yakṣāṇi prerate | agniṣ ṭā sarvā sāhantyo viśvād rakṣāṃsi sedhatu ||
yā ṛkṣīkāḥ kalīlāndā- -apsu jātāḥ pulīkayāḥ | gopā āsām eko veda yato jātāḥ sadānvās tā ito nāśayāmasi ||
gurucchāyām ūrdhāryaṃ śiśumākāṃ pratiśrukām | atiduhnāṃ vicalantīṃ vitūlumām | sarvāś caṇḍasya naptyo nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
āvadantīṃnāmahūkāṃ taṃstanīkāṃ vṛṅktapadīm | udradantīmanāsikāṃ nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
vāvadākām albhaṣāsāṃ vijavrāṃ labruvaṃ lavum | arāyīṃ vācamejayāṃ nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
dadāmīty eva brūyād anu cainām abhutsata | vaśāṃ brahmabhyo yācadbhyas tat prajāvad apatyavat ||
prajayāsavi krīṇīteBhatt. su paśubhiś copa dasyati | ya ārṣeyebhyo yācadbhyo devānāṃ gāṃ naditsati||
kūṭayāsya saṃ śīryante śroṇayā kāṭam ardati | baṇḍayā dahyante gṛhāḥ kāṇayā jīyate svam ||
vilohito adhiṣṭhānāc chakno vindati gopatim | tathāvaśāyāḥsāṃvidyaṃ duradabhnā hy ucyase ||
yo asyāḥkarṇāvāskunoty ā sa deveṣu vṛścate | lakṣma kurva iti manyate kanīyaḥ kṛṇute svam ||
pador asyā adhiṣṭhānād viklindurnāma vindati | anāmanāt saṃ śīryante yā mukhenopajighrati ||
yad asyā gopatau satyā loma dhvāṅkṣo ajīhiḍat | tataḥ kiśorā mriyante vatsāṃś ca ghātuko vṛkaḥ ||
yad asyāḥ kasmai cid bhogāya bālān kaś cit pra kṛntati | tataḥ kumārā mriyante yakṣmaśchantsatyanāmanāt ||
yad asyāḥ palpulanāya śakṛddāsī samasyati |Bhatt. sa(⟨ śa)kṛd tato 'pirūpaṃ jāyate tasmād avyeṣyad enasaḥ ||
jāyamānābhi jāyate devān sabrāhmaṇān vaśā | tasmād brahmabhyo deyaiṣā tad āhuḥ svasya gopanam ||
ya enāṃ vanim āyanti teṣāṃ devakṛtā vaśā | brahmajyeyaṃ tad abruvan ya enāṃ nipriyāyate ||
ya enāṃ yācadbhya ārṣeyebhyo na ditsati | ā sa deveṣu vṛścate brāhmanānāṃ ca manyave ||
yasyānyaḥsyād vaśābhogoBhatt. yasyānya(ḥ) anyām iccheta tarhi saḥ | hiṃsyād adattā gopatiṃ yācitāṃ ca na ditsati ||
yathā śevadhir nihito brāhmaṇānāṃ tathā vaśā | tām etad ā yanti yasmin kasmiṃś ca jāyate ||
svam etad ā yanti yad vaśāṃ brāhmaṇā abhi | yathaitān anyaj jinīyād evāsyānirodhanam ||
cared evā traihāyaṇād avijñātagadā satī | vaśāṃ ca vidyān nārada brāhmaṇastarhyeṣyaḥ ||
ya enām avaśām āha devānāṃ nihitaṃ nidhim | ubhau tasmai bhavāśarvau parikramyeṣum asyataḥ ||
duradabhnainam ā śaye yācitāṃ ca na ditsati | nāsmai kāmaḥ sam ṛdhyate yam adattvā cikīrṣati ||
yo asyā ūdho na veda- -atho asyā stanān uta | ubhayenaivaināṃ duhe dātuṃ ced aśakad vaśām ||
devā vaśāṃ yācanti mukhaṃ kṛtvā brahmaṇam | teṣāṃ sarveṣāmadadadBhatt. aga(⟨ da)dad dheḍaṃnyeti mānuṣaḥ ||
heḍaṃ paśūnāṃnyeti brāhmaṇebhyo 'dadad vaśām | devānāṃ nihitaṃ bhāgaṃ martyaś cen nipriyāyate ||
yad anye śataṃ yāceyur brāhmaṇā gopatiṃ vaśām | athaitā devā abruvann evaṃ haviduṣovaśā ||
ya evaṃ viduṣe 'dattvā- -anyasmai dadad vaśām | durgā tasmā adhiṣṭhāne pṛthivī sahadevatā ||
devā vaśāmayācanBhatt. ayācaṃ yasminn agre ajāyata | tām etāṃ vidyān nāradaḥ saha devair udājata||
anapatyam alpapaśuṃ vaśā kṛṇotu pūruṣam | brāhmaṇaiś ca yācitām athaināṃ ni priyāyate ||
agnīṣomābhyāṃ kāmāya mitrāya varuṇāya ca | tebhyo yācanti brāhmaṇās tebhya ā vṛścate 'dadhat ||read 'dadat
yāvad asyā gopatir na- -upaśṛṇuyādṛcaḥsvayam |Bhatt. ṛca(ḥ) cared asya tāvad goṣu nāsya śrutā gṛhe syāt ||
yo asyā ṛca upaśrutya- -atha goṣv acīcarat | āyuś ca tasya bhūtiṃ ca devā vṛścanti hīḍitāḥ ||
vaśā carantī bahudhā devānāṃ nihito nidhiḥ | āviṣkṛṇute rūpāṇi yathā sthāma jigāṃsati ||
āvir ātmānaṃ kṛṇute yathā sthāma jigāṃsati | atho ha brahmabhyo vaśā yākyāya kṛṇute manaḥ ||
manasā saṃkalpayati tad devām̐ api gacchati | atho habrahmāṇovaśām upaprayanti yācitum ||
svadhākāreṇa pitṛbhyo yajñena devatābhyaḥ | dānena rājanyo vaśāyā māturheḍaṃ na gacchati ||
vaśā rājanya te mātā tathā saṃbhūtam agraśaḥ | tasyā āhur anarpaṇaṃ ya brahmabhyaḥ pradīyate ||
yathājyaṃ pratigṛhītam ālumpet sruco agnaye | evā ha brahmāṇo vaśām āgnaye vṛścate 'dadhat ||read 'dadat
puroḍāśavatsā sudughā loke asyopa tiṣṭhati | sāsmai sarvān kāmān duhe vaśā pradaduṣe bahūn ||
sarvān kāmān yamarājye vaśā pradaduṣe duhe | athāhur nārakaṃ lokaṃ nirundhānasyayācitām ||
pravīyamānā carati kruddhāgopataye vaśā | vehataṃ mā manyamāno mṛtyoḥ pāśeṣu badhyatām ||
yo vehataṃ manyamāno gṛheṣu pacate vaśām | apy asya putrān pautrāṃś ca yācayate bṛhaspatiḥ ||
mahad eṣā vi tapati carantī goṣu gaur api | tato ha gopataye vaśā daduṣe viṣaṃ duhe ||
priyaṃ paśūnāṃ bhavati yad brahmabhyaḥ pradīyate | ato vaśāyās tat priyaṃ yad devatrā haviḥ syāt ||
yā vaśā udakalpayan devā yajñād udetya | tāsāṃviliptyaṃbhīmām udākurutanāradaḥ||Bhatt. nārada(ḥ)
tāṃ devā amīmāṃsanta vaśeyāṃ na vaśeti | tām abravīn nārada eṣā vaśānāṃ vaśatamā ||
kati nu vaśā nārada yās tvaṃ vettha manuṣyajāḥ | katamāsāṃ bhīmatamā kasyā nāśnīyād abrāhmaṇaḥ ||
viliptyā bṛhaspate yā ca sūtavaśā vaśā | tāsāṃ nāśnīyād abrāhmaṇo yaāśaṃsetibhūtyām ||
namas te astu nārada- -anuṣṭha viduṣe vaśā |read anuṣṭhu? katamāsāṃ bhīmatamā yāmadattvāparābhavet ||
viliptyā bṛhaspate yā ca sūtavaśā vaśā | yāḥ prayacched brahmabhyoBhatt. prayacched yaāśaṃśetibhūtyām ||
trīṇi vai vaśājātāni viliptī sūtavaśā vaśā | tāḥ pra yacched brahmabhyaḥBhatt. yacched syonāvaskaḥ prajāpatau ||
etad vo brāhmaṇā havir iti manvīta yācitaḥ | vaśāṃ ced enaṃ yāceyur yā bhīmādaduṣo gṛhe ||
devā vaśām upāvadan na nodāditi hīḍitāḥ | etābhir ṛgbhirbhedasya tasmād vai sa parābhavat ||
utaitāṃ bhedonāradād vaśām indreṇa yācitaḥ | tasmāttaṃdevā enasoBhatt. tasmā(t)taṃ vṛścann ahamuttare ||
ye vaśāyā adānāya vadanti parirāpinaḥ | indrasya manyave jālmā ā vṛścanteacityā||Bhatt. acittyā
yo gopatiṃ pārāṇīya- -athāhur mā dadā iti | rudrasyās tāṃ hetiṃ te pari yanty acetasaḥ ||
yadi hutāṃ yady ahutām amā ca pacate vaśām | devān sabrāhmaṇān ṛtvā jihmo lokān nir ṛcchati ||
asṛṅ māṃsaṃ tvacaṃ peṣṭraṃ mastṛhaṇaṃmajjñaḥśarīram |Bhatt. peṣṭramastṛhaṇaṃ agniḥ kravyād attvamuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasyāmuṣyāḥputrasya ||
prātaryāvadbhyo devebhyaḥ sāyaṃyāvadbhyo devebhyo viśvadānīṃyāvadbhyo devebhyaḥ | amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ā vṛścāmi ||
vaiśvānarāya kṣipradhanvane 'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ā vṛścāmi ||
kṣipradhanvan kṣiprahasta | amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasyāmuṣyāḥ putrasya hṛdayaṃyakṛnmatasnepra vidhya ||
indrāgnibhyāṃ prajāpataye parameṣṭhine somāya rājñe varuṇāya rājñe | pūṣṇe dhātre savitre tvaṣṭre 'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ā vṛścāmi ||
uṣase 'hne rātraye sūryāyāmum (…) ||see 5b
vīrudbhya oṣadhībhyo vanaspatibhyo vānaspatebhyo 'mum (…) ||see 5b
adbhyo mātariśvane 'dyāvāpṛthivībhyām amum (…) ||see 5b
idāvatsarāya parivatsarāya saṃvatsarāya bṛhate viśvarūpāyāmum (…) ||see 5b
mādbhyaḥ saṃvatsarāyāmum (…) ||see 5b
marudbhyo 'śvibhyāṃ brahmaṇe brahmaṇaspataye 'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ā vṛścāmi ||
ye svaś cakrur ye svarjajñuḥ| tebhyaḥ svaḥkṛdbhyaḥ svaḥkārebhyo 'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ā vṛścāmi | te svaḥkṛtaḥ svaḥkārā amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putraṃ parā bhāvayantu ||
ye tapaś cakrur ye tapojajñuḥ| tebhyas tapaskṛdbhyas tapaskārebhyo 'mum (…) |see 6b te tapaskṛtas tapaskārā amum (…) ||see 6c
ye brahma cakrur ye brahmajajñuḥ| tebhyo brahmakṛdbhyo brahmakārebhyo 'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ā vṛścāmi | te brahmakṛto brahmakārā amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putraṃ parā bhāvayantu ||
aghāriṇīm amūmaghaviddhāṃvikeśīm apapratidhimāsoktīṃ devamanuṣyāḥ paśyantu | amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putraṃ rurudhuṣīm ||
aliklavā gṛdhrāḥ kaṅkāḥ suparṇāḥ śvapadāḥ patatriṇaḥ |Bhatt. aliklavāḥ gṛ- (sic) vayāṃsi śakunayo 'muṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasyāmuṣyāḥ putrasyādahane carantu ||
tad āpaḥ pra vahata- -avadyaṃ ca malaṃ ca yat | yad duṣvapnyam ārima yad ṛcānṛtam ūdima ||
āpaḥ sapta sravantīs tā no muñcaṃtv aṃhasaḥ ||
muñcantu mā śapathyād atho varuṇyād uta | atho yamasyapaḍbīśād viśvasmād devaduṣkṛtāt ||
jāmiśaṃsād duṣvapnyād druho mā muñcantu varuṇasya pāśāt ||
mahyam indro varuṇo bṛhaspatiḥ savitā varca ādadhan ||
bhrātṛvyahaṃ sapatnaham asau me bhrātṛbhyo 'sau sapatnaḥ ||
taṃ hanmi taṃ duḥsvapnyena vidhyāmi tam anāyuṣṭayā vidhyāmi taṃ kṣapitāyavyena vidhyāmi tam adharāñcaṃ mṛtyupatham abhyapa nudāmi ||

vidma te svapna janitraṃ pāpmanaḥ putro 'sy abhūtyā adhi jāto yamasya karaṇaḥ | taṃ tvā svapna tathā vidma | yo bhadraḥ svapnaḥ sa mama yaḥ pāpas taṃ dviṣate pra hiṇmaḥ | tam asmai gamayāmas tenainaṃ vidhyāmo 'bhūtyainaṃ vidhyāmo nirbhūtyainaṃ vidhyāmaḥ parābhūtyainaṃ vidhyāmo grāhyaiṇaṃ vidhyāmas tamasainaṃ vidhyāmo agna enaṃ kravyāda ā vṛśāmo devānām enaṃ ghoraiḥ krūraiḥpraiṣairabhi preṣyamopraiṣairSelva 2019, 185; Bhatt. preṣyair vaiśvāṇarasyainaṃ daṃṣṭrayor api dadhmaḥ ||

(…) janitraṃsee 1a vānaspatyānāṃ putro 'si vīrudbhyo 'dhi (…) ||see 1b-o
(…) janitraṃsee 1a tandriyāḥ putro 'si koṭīyā adhi (…) ||see 1b-o
(…) janitraṃsee 1a rakṣasāṃ putro 'syabhvebhyo'dhi (…) ||see 1b-o] [abhvebhyoSelva 2019, 190; Bhatt. abbhavebhyo
vidma te svapna janitraṃ gandharvāṇāṃ putro 'sy apsarobhyo adhi jāto yamasya karaṇaḥ | taṃ tvā svapna iti trīṇi ||1c-o are repeated, see Selva 2019, 195
dyāvāpṛthivī ahorātrenakṣatrapeśaḥ| idam aham amuṣminn āmuṣyāyaṇe 'muṣyāḥ putreduṣvapnyaṃvrajet ||
yad asmāsv ity āṣṭādaśakī ||
mā pra gāma patho vayaṃ mā yajñād indra sominaḥ | mānta sthur no arātayaḥ ||
yo yajñasya prasādhanas tantur deveṣv ātataḥ | tam āhutam aśīmahi ||
namo mitrasya varuṇasya cakṣase maho devāya tad ṛtaṃ saparyata | dūredṛśe devajātāya ketave divas putrāya sūryāya śaṃsata ||
dyāvā ca tatra tatatanann ahāni ca na te adevaḥ pradivo vi vāsati | yad etaśebhiḥ pratarai ratharyasi prācīnam anyad anu vartate raja ud anyena jyotiṣā yāsi sūrya ||
yena sūrya jyotiṣā bādhase tamoBhatt. vādhase jagac ca viśvam abhīyarṣi bhānunā | tenāsmad viśvām anirām anāhutim apāmīvām apa duṣvapnyaṃ suva ||
viśvām anirām amīvām anāhutim amuṣmāāmuṣyāyaṇāyāmuṣyāḥ putrāya pra hiṇmaḥ ||
dyāvāpṛthivī vahataṃduṣvapnyaṃparā vahataṃduṣvapnyam| amuṣmāāmuṣyāyaṇāyāmuṣyāḥ putrāya ||

indro vajram asiñcad vṛtrāya hantave | tvaṣṭā vajram asiñcad vṛtrāya hantave ||
yo vajraḥ sa viśvānaro yat tegmavīryaṃ sa viśvāṣāḍ yad dhārambhaṇaṃ sa vaiśvānaraḥ ||
etad vā idaṃ sarvaṃ yad etāni trīṇi | viśvānaro vaiśvānaro viśvāṣāṭ ||
sarvān evapuṇyāṃllokān ava rundhe sarvāś ca devatā ya evaṃ vidvān anaḍuho vrataṃ bibharti ||
tam ādatta tam ud aiṅgayat tam upāmimīta pra harāṇīti ||
so 'sya hastād amucyata daivo vajraḥ kṣuraḥ paviḥ sahasrapṛṣṭir divispṛśaḥ ||

sa samudraṃ prāviśat sa samudram adahat ||
tasmāt samudro durgir apapid vaiśvānareṇa hi dagdhaḥ ||Bhatt. jagdhaḥ
sa śakra ud akrāmat so 'dhyāyad asau vajro asuraiḥ sampadyadevās taṃ rakṣatiBhatt. emend.rakṣanti? vrataṃ carāṇīti sa vratam acarat ||

viśvān devān marudgaṇās tam anv avādravanBhatt. °dravaṃ somaḥ prathamo 'thendrāgnī ||
tamupāmantrayantāpuṇyayāvācā krūrayā ca haniṣyāmas tvāvittvācetsyāmonacatamiṣyasīti so 'śāmyat ||
tasmād yo brahma vedotāpaskṛtaṃ śamayati dohayata evainān ||
tam ṛksāmābhyām ādatta yajuṣā yajñena gāyatreṇa vāmadevyena ca ||
etad vā idaṃ sarvaṃ yad ṛksāme etāv indrasya bāhū ||
tam ādatta taṃ paruṣy ādhatta ||
prajā vai samṛddhir akṣitiḥ paśavaḥ parūṃṣi ||

diśa evānu prati tiṣṭhati yaḥ (…) ||see 17.27.4b

tasya vṛtrasyāṅgā parvāṇi śarīrāṇy abhajyanta | etāni vai vṛtrasyāṅgā parvāṇi śarīrāṇi yad ime parvatāḥ ||
sa yatra hṛdā manasā kāmayata iha me rādhyate tad asmai rādhyate ||
asyām eva pratiṣṭhām āyatanaṃ vindate yaḥ (…) ||see 17.27.4b
sa devān āgacchat taṃ devā abruvann āśaṃsāmahe gurv etad vratam āraṇyeṣu paśuṣu grāmyeṣv aty eti ||
so 'naḍvāham upādhāvat tam anaḍvān abravīt kiṃ me pratīvāho bhaviṣyatīti varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti sa varam avṛṇīta ||
bradhnaloko 'sāni bradhnasya viṣṭapi śrayā iti ||
ṣoḍaśo vā ita ūrdhvo loko yad bradhno yad bradhnasya viṣṭapaḥ ||
bradhnaloko bhavati bradhnasya viṣṭapi śrayate yaḥ (…) ||see 17.27.4b
athāhīnā āśvatthir abravīn na tād brāhmaṇaṃ nindāni yād enam aśṛṇon ned iṣṭāpūrtena vi bhavānīti ||
kṛtyā vā eṣā manuṣyeṣu carati yad anaḍvān yad anaḍudvratī ||
ya evaṃ viduṣo 'sādhu kīrtayati- -iṣṭam evāsya pūrtaṃ māyāṃ saṃ vṛkte ||
indro vāagreasureṣv anaḍudvratam acaratBhatt. vāgre teṣām iṣṭaṃ pūrtaṃ māyāṃsaṃvṛktānindraṃhy enam ||
so 'naḍuho vahe 'kramata sarvām̐l lokān prājānāt ||
yāv asya pūrvapādau tau pūrvapakṣau yāvaparapādautāv aparapakṣau ||
yāvasyauṣṭhautau puroḍāśauBhatt. asyoṣṭḥau ye nāsike tau sruvau ||
ye asyākṣau tau sūryācandramasau ye nimeṣās tāny ahorātrāṇi yāni vakṣaṇāni te sūryasya raśmayaḥ saḥ (…) ||
droṇakalaśaḥ śiraḥ somo rājā mastiṣkaḥ ||
ye asya śṛṅge tad ṛtaṃ satyam ||
dhruvaṃ vā ṛtaṃ satyaṃ tasmād ete dhruve ||
dhruvam evartaṃsatyam anu prati tiṣṭhati yaḥ (…) ||see 17.27.4b
carācarā vai śraddhā tasmāt karṇau muhur varīvarjayati ||
śraddadhate 'smai śraddhānīyo bhavati yaḥ (…) ||see 17.27.4b
vasor eva dhārāṃ samṛddhim akṣitim ava rundhe yaḥ (…) ||see 17.27.4b
kalpante asmā ṛtavo na rtuṣv ā vṛścata ṛtūnāṃ priyo bhavati yaḥ (…) ||see 17.27.4b
tapaś ca varaś ca mahaś ca yaśaś ca yad asminn antarṛcaḥsāmāni yajūṃṣi brāhmaṇam ||
brahma caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe brāhmaṇavarcasī bhavati yaḥ (…) ||see 17.27.4b
pra patho devayānāṃ jānāti yaḥ (…) ||see 17.27.4b
jyog jīvati sarvam āyur eti na purā jarasaḥ pra mīyateBhatt. eti ta yaḥ (…) ||see 17.27.4b
prathate prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena yaḥ (…) ||see 17.27.4b
yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas tasya prāṇān saṃ vṛha tasya prāṇān vi vṛha ||
indro 'sīndrasya rūpam asi prajāpatir asi parameṣṭhy asi ||
svar asi svargo 'si svargaloko 'si svargaṃ mā lokaṃ gamaya ||
yenāsya vahas tena yajño yena vahati tena lokaḥ ||
yenainaṃ paśyati tena viśvo yenainaṃ gamayati tena sarvaḥ ||
ye 'sya pādāḥ sā pratiṣṭhā | prati tiṣṭhati prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena ya evaṃ vidvān anaḍuho vrataṃ bibharti ||
naḍam ā roha na te atra loka idaṃ sīsaṃ bhāgadheyaṃ ta ehi | yo goṣu yakṣmaḥ puruṣeṣu yakṣmas tena tvaṃ sākam adharāṅ parehi ||
aghaśaṃsaduḥśaṃsau kareṇānukareṇa ca | mṛtyūṃśca sarvāṃs teneto yakṣmāṃś ca nir ajāmasi ||
nir ito mṛtyuṃ nirṛtiṃ nir yakṣmam ajāmasi | yo no dveṣṭi tamaddhyagne kravyād yaṃ dviṣmas taṃ te pra suvāmaḥ ||
yady agniḥ kravyād yadi vā vyāghra imaṃ goṣṭham anyokā ā viveśa | taṃ māṣājyaṃ kṛtvā pra hiṇomi dūraṃ sa gacchatv apsuṣado 'ty agnīn ||
yattvākuddhāḥpracakrur manyunā puruṣe mṛte | sukalpam agnetattvayā punas tvod dīpayāmasi ||
punas tvādityā rudrā vasavaḥ punar brahmā vasunītir agre | punas tvā brahmaṇaspatir ādhād dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya ||
yo agniḥ kravyāt praviveśa vo gṛham imaṃ paśyann itaraṃ jātavedasam | taṃ harāmi pitṛyajñāya dūraṃ sa gharmam indhat parame sadhasthe ||
kravyādam agniṃ pra hiṇomi dūraṃ yamarājño gacchatu ripravāhaḥ | ihaivāyam itaro jātavedā devo devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānan ||
kravyādam agnim iṣito harāmi janāndruhantaṃvajreṇa mṛtyum | vi taṃ śāsmi gārhapatyena vidvān pitṝṇāṃ loke api bhāgo asya ||
kravyādam agniṃ śasamānam ukthyaṃ pra hiṇomi pathibhiḥ pitṛyāṇaiḥ | mā devayānaiḥ pathibhir ā gā atraivaidhi pitṛṣu jāgṛhi tvam ||
sam indhate saṃkasukaṃ svastaye śuddhā bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ | jahāti ripram aty ena eti samiddho agniḥsupunāpunāti ||
devo agniḥ saṃkasuko divas pṛṣṭhāny āruhat | mucyamāno nir aṃhaso mohyāsmām̐aśastyāḥ||Bhatt. aśastyā(ḥ)
asmin vayaṃ saṃkasuke agne riprāṇi mṛjmahe | abhūma yajñiyāḥ śuddhāḥ pra ṇa āyūṃṣitāriṣat||
saṃkasuko vikasuko nirṛtho yaś canisvaraḥ| te te yakṣmaṃ savedaso dūrād dūramacucyavuḥ||
annāttvā puruṣebhyoBhatt. annā(t) tvā gobhyo aśvebhyas tvā | kravyādaṃ nir ṇudāmasy agniṃjīvitayopanam||
yo no aśveṣu vīreṣu yo goṣu yo ajādiṣu | kravyādaṃ nir ṇudāmasy agnir yo janayopanaḥ ||
samiddho agna āhuta sa no mābhyapakramīḥ | atraiva dīdihidyavi jyok ca sūryāya dṛśe ||
yasmin devāamṛjata yasmin manuṣyā uta | tasmin ghṛtastāvomṛṣṭvā tvam agne divaṃ ruha ||
sīse mṛḍhvaṃ naḍe mṛḍhvam agniḥ saṃkasukaś ca yaḥ | atho avyāṃ rāmāyāṃ śīrṣaktim upabarhaṇe ||
sīse balaṃ sādayitvāread 'balaṃ ormalaṃ? śīrṣaktim upabarhaṇe | avyām asiknyāṃ mṛṣṭvā śuddhā bhavanti yajñiyāḥ ||
paraṃ mṛtyo anu parehi panthāṃ yas ta eṣa itaro devayānāt | cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi- -iha me vīrā bahavo bhavantu ||
ime jīvā vi mṛtair āvavṛtrann abhūd bhadrā devahūtir no adya | prāñco agāma nṛtaye hasāya suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema ||
imaṃ jīvebhyaḥ paridhiṃ dadhāmi maiṣāṃ nu gād aparo artham etam | jyog jīvantaḥ śaradaḥ purūcīs tiro mṛtyuṃ dadhatāṃ parvatena ||
yathāhāny anupūrvaṃ bhavanti yathartava ṛtubhir yanti sākam | yathā na pūrvo aparaṃ jahāty evā tvaṣṭar āyuṃṣi kalpayaiṣām ||
ā rohatāyur jarasaṃ vṛṇānā anupūrvaṃ yatamānā yati ṣṭha | tān vas tvaṣṭā sujanimā sajoṣāḥ sarvam āyur nayatu jīvanāya ||
aśmanvatī rīyate saṃ rabhadhvaṃ vīrayadhvaṃ pra taratā sakhāyaḥ | atrā jahīta ye asan durevā anamīvānut taremābhi vājān ||
ut tiṣṭhatā pra taratā sakhāyo +'śmanvatī syandate nadīyam | atrā jahīta ye asann aśivāḥ śivānsyonān ut taremābhi vājān ||Bhatt. śivāṃ
vaiśvadevīṃ sūnṛtām ā rabhadhvaṃ śuddhā bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ | atikrāmanto duritāni viśvā śataṃ himāḥ sarvavīrā madema ||
udīcīnaiḥ pathibhir vāyum adbhir atikrāmanto 'varān parebhiḥ | triḥ sapta kṛtva ṛṣayaḥ paretā mṛtyuṃpratyauhanpadayopanena ||
mṛtyoḥ padaṃ yopayanta eta drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ | āsīnā mṛtyuṃ nudatā sadhasthe 'tha jīvā vidatham ā vadema ||
imā nārīr avidhavāḥ supatnīr āñjanena sarpiṣā saṃ viśantu | anaśravo anamīvāḥ suratnā ā rohantu janayo yonim agre ||
ime vīrā avidhavāḥ sujānaya āñjanena sarpiṣā saṃ spṛśantām | anaśravo anamīvāḥ suratnāḥ syonād yoner adhi talpaṃ ruheyuḥ ||
vyākaromi haviṣāham etau tau brahmaṇā vy ahaṃ kalpayāmi | svadhāṃ pitṛbhyo ajarāṃ kṛṇomi dīrghenāyuṣā sam imāṃ sṛjāmi ||
yo no agniḥ pitaro hṛtsv antar āviveśāmṛto martyeṣu | mayyahaṃ taṃ pari gṛhṇāmi devaṃ mā so asmān dvikṣata mā vayaṃ tam ||
apāvartyāgniṃ gārhapatyaṃ kravyādā preta dakṣiṇā | priyaṃ pitṛbhya ātmane brahmaṇe kṛṇuta priyam ||
dvibhāgadhanam ādāya pra kṣināty avartyā | agniḥ putrasya jyeṣṭhasya yaḥ kravyādanirāhitaḥ||
yat kṛṣate yad vanute yac cavastenavindate | sarvaṃ martyasya tan nāsti kravyāc cedanirāhitaḥ||
ayajñiyohatavarcā bhavati nainena havir attave | chinatti kṛṣiṃ gāṃ dhanaṃ yaḥ kravyād anuvartate ||
bahu gṛdhyaiḥ pra vadaty ārtiṃ martyo ny eti ca | kravyādyamagnir antikād anuvidvān vitāvati ||
grāhyā gṛhāḥ saṃ sṛjyante yatstriyā mriyate patiḥ |Bhatt. ya(t) brahmaiva vidvān eṣyo yaḥ kravyādaṃ nir ādadhat ||
yad ripraṃ duritaṃ cakṛmā yac ca duṣkṛtam | āpo mātasmācchundhantv agniḥ saṃkasukaś ca yaḥ ||Bhatt. saṅkasukaś
tā adharād udīcīrāvavṛtranBhatt. āvavṛtraṃ prajānatīḥ pathibhir devayānaiḥ | parvatasya ṛṣabhasyādhi pṛṣṭhe navāś carantisaritaḥpurāṇīḥ||
agne akravyān niṣkravyādaṃ nudā devajanaṃ vaha ||
imaṃ kravyāt pra viveśa- -ayaṃ kravyādam anv agāt | vyāghrau kṛtvā nānānaṃ taṃ harāmi śivāparam ||
antardhir devānāṃ paridhir manuṣyāṇām agnir gārhapatya ubhayān antarā śritaḥ | jīvānām agne pra tira dīrgham āyuḥ pitṝṇāṃ lokam upa yantu ye mṛtāḥ ||
sugārhapatyo vitapann arātīr uṣāmuṣāṃ śreyasīṃśreyasīṃ dadhat | sarvān agne sahamānaḥ sapatnān aiṣām ūrjaṃ rayim asmāsu dhehi ||
imam indraṃ vahniṃ paprim anv ārabhadhvaṃ sa vo nividvān vijahātu mṛtyum | tenāpa hata śarum āpatantaṃ tena rudrasya pari pātāstām ||
ahorātre anv eṣibibhrat kṣemyas tiṣṭhan prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ | anāturāṃ sumanasas talpabibhraj jyogeva naḥ puruṣagandhir edhi ||
te deveṣv ā vṛścante pāpaṃ jīvanti sarvadā | kravyādyānagnir antikād anuvidvānvitāvati ||
preva manasā patiti muhur ā vartate punaḥ | kravyādyamagnir antikād aśva ivānuvapate naḍam ||
ye 'śraddhayā dhanakāmyāt kravyādā samāsate | te vā anyeṣāṃ kumbhīṃ pary ādadhati sarvadā ||
iṣīkāṃ caratīṃvittvā tilpiyaṃ daṇḍanaṃ naḍam | tān indra idhmaṃ kṛtvā yamasyāgniṃ nirādadhau ||
aviḥ kṛṣṇā bhāgadheyaṃ paśūnāṃ sīsaṃ kravyād uta candraṃ ta āhuḥ | māṣāḥ piṣṭā bhāgadheyaṃ havyaṃ te 'raṇyānyā gahvaraṃ sacasva ||
pratyañcam arkaṃ pratyarpayitvā pravidvānpanthāṃvi hy ācakāra | parāmīṣāmasūndideśa dīrgheṇāyuṣā sam adhād ihemān ||
anaḍvāhaṃ plavam anv ārabhadhvaṃ sa vonirvakṣadduritād avadyāt |Bhatt. nirvakṣa(d) ā rohata savitur nāvaṃhiraṇyayīṃ ṣaḍbhir ūrmibhir amatiṃ carema ||
gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavenakṣudhaṃpuruhūtaviśvām| vayaṃ rājānaḥ prathamā dhanānām ariṣṭāsa ṛjanībhis tarema ||
pūrṇaṃ nāri pra harābhi kumbham apāṃ rasair oṣadhīnāṃ ghṛtasya | imānpātṝṃramṛtenā sam aṅdhi sthirā vīrāḥ saṃmanaso bhavantu ||
pumān puṃso adhi tiṣṭha carma tatra hvayasva yatamā priyā te | yāvantāv agre prathamaṃ sameyathus tad vāṃ vayo yamarājye samānam ||
tāvad vāṃ tejas tati vīryāṇi tāvac cakṣus tatidhā vājināni | agniḥ śarīraṃ sacate yadaidho adhā pakvān mithunā saṃbhavāthaḥ||Bhatt. bhavātha(ḥ)
sam asmiṃl loke sam u devayāne saṃ smā sametaṃ yamarājye | pūtau pavitrair upa tad u hvayethāṃ yadyad reto adhi vāṃ saṃbabhūva ||
āpaḥ putrāso abhi saṃ viśadhvam imaṃ jīvaṃ jīvadhanyāḥ sam eta | tāsāṃ bhajadhvam amṛtaṃ yad āhur yam odanaṃ pacati vo janitrī ||
yaṃ vaḥ pitā pacati yaṃ ca mātā riprānnirmukthyaiśamalāc ca vācaḥ | sa odanaḥ śatadhāraḥ svarga ubhe vyāpa nabhasī mahitvā ||
ubhe nabhasī ubhayāṃś ca lokān ye yajvanām abhijitāḥ svargāḥ | teṣāṃ jyotiṣmān madhumān yo agre tasmin putrair jarasi saṃ śrayethām ||
prācīṃprācīṃ pradiśam ā rabhetām etaṃ lokaṃ śraddadhānāḥ sacante | mimāthāṃ pātraṃ tad vāṃ pūrṇam astu sa vāṃ pakvaḥ pitryāṇe nyāyat ||
dakṣiṇāṃ diśam abhi nakṣamāṇau pary āvartethām abhi pātram etat | tasmai vāṃ yamaḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ pakvāya śarma bahulaṃ ni yacchāt ||
pratīcī diśām iyam idvaraṃvāṃ yasyāṃ somo adhipā mṛḍitā ca | tasyāṃ mimāthāṃ sukṛtaḥsacethām adhā pakvena saha saṃ bhavema ||
uttaraṃ rāṣṭraṃ prajayottarāvad diśām udīcī kṛṇavan no agram | pāṅktaṃ chandaḥ puruṣo babhūva viśvair viśvāṅgaiḥ saha saṃ bhavema ||
dhruveyaṃ virāṇ namo astv asyai śivā putrebhya uta mahyam astu |Bhatt. putrebhyaṃ, misprint sā no devy adite viśvavāra irya iva gopā abhi rakṣa pakvam ||
piteva putrām̐ abhi saṃ sacasva naḥ śivā no vātā iha vāntuśagmāḥ|Bhatt. śagmā(ḥ) yam odanaṃpacatodevate iha taṃ nas tapa uta satyaṃ ma vittām ||
yadyat kṛṣṇaḥ śakuna eha gatvā tsaraṃ viṣaktaṃ bila āsasāda | dāsī vā yad ārdrahastā samaṅkta ulūkhalaṃ musalaṃ śundhatāpaḥ ||
ayaṃ grāvā pṛthubudhno vayodhāḥ pūtaḥ pavitrair apa hantu rakṣaḥ | ā roha carma mahi śarma yaccha mā dampatī pautram aghaṃ ni gātām ||
vanaspatiḥ saha devair na āgan rakṣaḥ piśācām̐ apabādhamānaḥ |Bhatt. piśācāṃ saucchrayātaipra vadāti vācaṃ tena lokām̐ abhi sarvāñ jayema ||
sapta medhāṃ paśavaḥ pary agṛhṇan ya eṣāṃmedasvānuta yaścakarśa| trayastriṃśad devatās tvāṃ sacante sa naḥ svargam abhi neṣi lokam ||
svargaṃ lokam abhi no nayāsi saṃ jāyā saha putraiḥ syāma | gṛhṇāmi hastam anv aitv atra mā nas tārīn nirṛtir moarātiḥ||
grāhiṃ pāpmānam ati tām̐ ayāmaBhatt. tāṃ tamo vyasya pravadāsivalgu | vānaspatya udyato mā jihiṃsīr mā taṇḍulaṃ vi śarīr devayantam ||
viśvavyacā ghṛtapṛṣṭho bhaviṣyaṃ sayonir lokam upa yāhi vidvān | varṣavṛddham upa yaccha śūrpe tviṣiṃ palāvān apa tad vinaktu ||
trayo lokāḥ saṃmitā brāhmaṇena dyaur evāsau pṛthivy antarikṣam | aṃśūngṛbhitānanu saṃrabhethāmread gṛbhītām̐? ā pyāyantāṃ punar ā yantu śūrpāt ||
pṛthag rūpāṇi bahudhā paśūnām ekarūpo bhavati saṃ samṛddhyām | etāṃ tvacaṃ lohinīṃ tāṃ nudethāṃ grāvā śundhātimalagaiva vastrā ||
janitrīva prati hṛṇyāsisūnuṃ saṃ tvā dadhāmi pṛthivīṃpṛthivyā|Bhatt. pṛthivyām ukhāḥ kumbhīr vedyāṃ saṃcarantāṃ yajñāyudhair ājyenābhiṣiktāḥ ||Bhatt. ājyenātiṣaktā+
bhūmyāṃ tvā bhūmim adhi dhārayāmi tanūḥ samānī vikṛtā ta eṣā | yadyad yuktaṃ likhitam arpaṇaṃ ca tena mā susror api tadvapāmi||
agniḥ pacan rakṣatu tvā purastād indro rakṣād dakṣiṇato mahitvā | somas tvā dṛṃhād dharuṇe pratīcyā uttarāttvā varuṇaḥ saṃ dadātai ||Bhatt. uttarā(t)
ā yantu divaḥ pṛthivīṃ sacante bhūmyāḥ sacante urv antarikṣam |sacante urv: sandhi? śuddhāḥ satīs tā u śundhanta eva tā naḥ svargam abhi lokaṃ nayantu ||
pūtāḥ pavitraiḥ pavante abhrād divaṃ ca yanti pṛthivīṃ calokān|Bhatt. lokāṃ tā jīvalā jīvadhanyāḥ pratiṣṭhāḥ pātra āsiktāḥ pary agnirendhām||
utevaprabhvīruta saṃmitāsa uta śukrāḥ śucayaścāmṛtāsaḥ| tā odanaṃ dampatibhyāṃ pratiṣṭhā āpaḥ śikṣantīḥ pravatā sunāthāḥ ||
ud yodhayanty abhi valgantī taptāḥ phenam asyanti bahulaṃ ca bindum |Bhatt. bindūn yoṣeva dṛṣṭvā patim ṛtviyā yā- -etais taṇḍulair bhavatā sam āpaḥ ||
saṃkhyātā stokāḥ pṛthivīṃ sacante prāṇāpānaiḥ saṃmitā oṣadhībhiḥ | asaṃkhyātā opyamānāḥ suvarṇāḥ sarvaṃ samāpaṃ śucayaḥ śucitvam ||
utthāpaya sīdato budhna enān adbhir ātmānam api saṃ sṛjantām | amāsi pātra udakaṃ yad etan mitās taṇḍulāḥ pradiśo yatīmāḥ ||
pra yaccha parśuṃ tvarayā harantv ahiṃsanta oṣadhīr dāntu parvam | somo yāsāṃ pari rājyaṃ babhūva- -amanyutā vīrudho me bhavantu ||
navaṃ barhir odanāya stṛṇīta priyaṃ hṛdaś cakṣuṣovalgvastu| tatra devāḥ saha devair viśantv imaṃ prāśnantu dakṣiṇato niṣadya ||
vanaspate stīrṇam ā sīda barhir agniṣṭomaiḥ saṃmito devatābhiḥ | tvaṣṭeva rūpaṃ sukṛtaṃ svadhītyenā ehāḥ pari pātre dadṛśrām ||
dhartā dhriyasva dharuṇe pṛthivyā acyutaṃ tvā devatāścyāvayantu| taṃ dampatī jīvantau jīvaputrā udvāsayātaḥpary agnidhānāt ||
ṣaṣṭyaiśaradbhyaḥ pari dadhma etaṃ svaḥ pakvenābhyaśnavātai| upainaṃ putrāḥ pitaraś casīdān imaṃ svargaṃ gamayāntam agne ||
sarvān samāgān abhijitya lokān yāvantaḥ kāmāḥ samapūpuras tān | vigāhethāmāyavanaṃ ca darvir ekasmin pātre adhyuddharainam ||
upa stṛṇīhi prathayā purastād ghṛtena pātram abhi ghārayedam | vāśrevosrā taruṇaṃ starasmim imaṃ devāso abhihiṃkarātha ||
upāstarīrakaro lokam etam uruḥpṛthuścāsamaḥsvargaḥ | tasmin suparṇo mahiṣaḥ śrayātai devā enaṃ devatābhyaḥ pra yacchān ||
yadyaj jāyā pacati tvat paraḥparaḥ patir vā jāya uta tvat tiraḥ | saṃ tat sṛjethāṃ saha vāṃ tad astuBhatt. santat … vāntad saṃ rādhayantau saha lokam etam ||
yāvanto asyāḥ pṛthivīṃ sacante asmāt putrāḥ pari ye saṃbabhūvuḥ | sarvāṃs tān upa pātre hvayethāṃ nābhiṃ janānāḥśiśavaḥsamāyan||
vasor yā dhārā madhunā samaktā ghṛtena miśrā amṛtasya nābhayaḥ | sarvās tā ava rundhe svargaḥṣaṣṭyāṃ śaratsu nidhipā abhīcchāt ||
nidhiṃ nidhipā abhy enam icchād anīśvarā abhitaḥ santv anye | asmābhir datto nihitaḥ svargas tribhiḥ kāṇḍais trīn svargānarukṣat||
agnī rakṣas tapatu yadvidevaṃ kravyāt piśāca iha mā pra pāsta | nudāma enam ava rudhmo asmad ādityā no aṅgirasaḥ sacantām ||
ādityebhyo aṅgirobhyo madhv idaṃ ghṛtena miśraṃ prati vedayāmaḥ | śuddhahastau brāhmaṇasyānihatya- -enaṃ svargaṃ sukṛtāvapītam||
idaṃ kāṇḍam uttamaṃ prāpam asya yasmāl lokāt parameṣṭhī samāpa | ā siñca sarpir ghṛtavat samaṅdhy eṣa bhāgo aṅgiraso no atra ||

na kilbiṣam atra nādhāro asti na yan mitraiḥ samamamāna eti | paktāraṃ pakvaḥ punar ā viśāsy anūnaṃ pātraṃ nihitaṃ no astu ||

prācyai diśe agnaye 'dhipataye 'sitāya rakṣitra ādityāyeṣumata etaṃ pari dadhmaḥ | taṃno gopāyantv āsmākamaitorBhatt. tanno diṣṭaṃ no atra jarase ni neṣat | jarā mṛtyave pari ṇo dadhātv adhā pakvena saha saṃ bhavema ||
dakṣiṇāyai diśa indrāyādhipataye tiraścirāje rakṣitre vasubhya iṣumadbhya etam (…) ||
pratīcyai diśe varuṇāyādhipataye pṛdākave rakṣitreBhatt. pra(⟨ pṛ)dākave mitrāyeṣumata etam (…) ||
udīcyai diśe somāyādhipataye svajāya rakṣitre vātāyeṣumata etam (…) ||
dhruvāyai diśe viṣṇave 'dhipataye kalmāṣagrīvāya rakṣitre vīrudbhya iṣumatībhya etam (…) ||

ūrdhvāyai diśe bṛhaspataye 'dhipataye śvitrāya rakṣitre aśanībhya iṣumatībhya etaṃ pari dadhmaḥ | taṃno gopāyantv āsmākamaitorBhatt. tanno diṣṭaṃ no atra jarase ni neṣat | jarā mṛtyave pari ṇo dadhātv athā pakvena saha saṃ bhavema ||
satyenottabhitā bhūmiḥ sūryeṇottabhitā dyauḥ | ṛtenādityās tiṣṭhanti divi somo adhi śritaḥ ||
somenādityā balinaḥ somena pṛthivī mahī | ato nakṣatraṇām eṣām upasthe soma āhitaḥ ||
somaṃ manyate papivān yatsaṃpiṃṣantyoṣadhim | somaṃ yaṃ braḥmāno vidur na tasyāśnāti pārthivaḥ ||
ācchadvidhānair gupito bārhataiḥ soma rakṣitaḥ | grāvṇām ic chṛṇvan tiṣṭhasi na te aśnāti pārthivaḥ ||
cittir vāvopabarhaṇaṃ cakṣur āvad abhyañjanam | dyaur bhūmiḥ kośa āsīd yad ayāt sūryā patim ||
raibhy āsīd anudeyī nārāśaṃsī nyocanam | sūryāyā bhadram id vāso gāthayaitipariṣkṛtā||
stomā āsan pratidhayaḥ kurīraṃ chandaopaśaḥ|opaśaḥ with ŚS; Bhatt. upaśaḥ sūryāyā aśvinā varā- -agnir āsīt purogavaḥ ||
somo vadhūyur abhavad aśvināstām ubhā varā | sūryāṃ yat patye śaṃsantīṃ manasā savitādadāt ||
mano asyā anaāsīd dyaur āsīd uta chadiḥ | śukrāv anaḍvāhāv āstāṃ yad ayāt sūryā patim ||
ṛksāmābhyām abhihitau gāvau tesāmanāvaitām | śrotre te cakre āstāṃ divi panthāś carācaraḥ ||
śucī te cakre yātyā vyāno akṣa āhataḥ | ano manasmayaṃ sūryā- -ārohat prayatī patim ||
sūryāyā vahatuḥ prāgāt savitā yam avāsṛjat | aghāsu hanyante gāvaḥ phalgunīṣu vyuhyate||
yad aśvinā pṛcchamānāv ayātaṃ tricakreṇa vahatuṃ sūryāyāḥ | kvaikaṃ cakraṃ vām āsīt kva deṣṭrāyatasthathuḥ||
yad ayātaṃ śubhaspatī vareyaṃ sūryām upa | viśve devā anu tad vām ajānan putraḥ pitarāv avṛnīta pūṣā ||
dve te cakre sūrye brahmāṇa ṛtuthā viduḥ | athaikaṃ cakraṃ yad guhā tad addhātaya id viduḥ ||
pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśād yena tvābadhnāt savitā suśevāḥ | ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke syonaṃ te astu sahapatnyai vadhu ||
aryamaṇaṃ yajāmahe subandhuṃ pativedanam | urvārukam iva bandhanād ito muñcantu māmutaḥ ||
preto muñcantu māmutaḥ subaddhām amutas karat | yatheyam indra mīḍhvaḥ suputrā subhagāsati ||
bhagas tveto nayatu hastagṛhya- -aśvinā tvā pra vahatāṃ rathena | gṛhān gaccha gṛhapatnī yathāso vaśinī tvaṃ vidatham ā vadāsi ||
iha priyaṃ prajāyai te sam ṛdhyatām asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya jāgṛhi | enā patyā tanvaṃ saṃ spṛśasva- -athajirvirvidatham ā vadāsi ||
ihaiva staṃ mā vi yauṣṭaṃ dīrgham āyur vy aśnutam | krīḍantau putrair naptṛbhir modamānau sve gṛhe ||
pūrvāparaṃ carato māyayaitau śiśū krīḍantau pari yāto adhvaram | viśvāny anyo bhuvanā vicaṣṭa ṛtūṃr anyo vidadhaj jāyate navaḥ ||
navonavo bhavati jāyamāno 'hnāṃ ketur uṣasām ety agram | bhāgaṃ devebhyo vi dadhāty āyan pra candramās tirate dīrgham āyuḥ ||
parā dehi śāmūlyaṃ brahmabhyo vi bhajā vasu | kṛtyaiṣā padvatī bhūtvā- -ā jāyā viśate patim ||
nīlalohitaṃ bhavati kṛtyāsaktir vy ajyate | edhante asyā jñātayaḥ patir bandheṣu badhyate ||
aślīlā tanūr bhavati ruśatī pāpayāmuyā | patir yad vadhvo vāsasaḥ svam aṅgamabhyūrṇute||
āśasanaṃ viśasanam atho adhivikartanam | sūryāyāḥ paśya rūpāṇi tāni brahmā tu śundhati ||
tṛṣṭam etat kaṭukam apāṣṭhavad viṣavan naitad attave |Bhatt. viṣavaṃ sūryāṃ yo brahmā veda sa id vādhūyam arhati ||
sa vaitatsyonaṃ harati brahmā vāsaḥ sumaṅgalam | prāyaścittiṃ yo adhyeti yena jāyā na riṣyati ||
yuvaṃ bhagaṃ saṃbharathaḥsamṛddham ṛtaṃ vadantām ṛtodyena | brahmaṇaspate patim asyai rocayāmuṃ cāru sambhalo vadatu vācam etām ||
ihed asātha naparogamātha- -imaṃ gāvaḥ prajayā vardhayātha | śubhaṃ yatīr usriyāḥ somavarcaso viśve devāḥkranniha vo manāṃsi ||
imaṃ gāvaḥ prajayā saṃ viśadhvam ayaṃ devānāṃ na mināti bhāgam | asmai vaḥ pūṣā marutaś ca sarve asmai vo dhātā savitā suvāti ||
anṛkṣarā ṛjavaḥ santu panthāno yebhiḥ sakhāyo yanti no vareyam | saṃ bhagena sam aryamṇā saṃ dhātā sṛjatu varcasā naḥ ||

yo anidhmo dīdāyāpsv antar yaṃ viprāsa īḍate adhvareṣu | apān napān madhumatīr apo dā yābhir indro vāvṛdhe vīryāvān ||
idam ahaṃ ruśantaṃ grābhaṃ tānūdūṣimapa nudāmi | yaḥ śico bhadro rocānas tam ud acāmi ||

śaṃ te hiraṇyaṃ śam u santv āpaḥ śaṃ methir bhavatu śaṃ yugasya tardma | śaṃ ta āpaḥ śatapavitrā bhavantu śaṃ patyā tanvaṃ saṃ spṛśasva ||
yathā sindhur nadīnāṃ sāmrājyaṃ suṣuve vṛṣā | evā tvaṃsamrājñyedhi patyur astaṃ paretya ||

yā akṛntannavayanyāś ca tatnireBhatt. avayaṃ yā devīr antām̐ abhito 'dadanta |Bhatt. antāṃ tās tvā jarase saṃvyayantv āyuṣmatīdaṃ pari dhatsva vāsaḥ ||
jīvaṃ rudanti vi nayanty adhvaraṃ dīrghām anu prasitiṃ dīdhiyur naraḥ | vāmaṃ pitṛbhyo ya idaṃ samīrire mayaḥ patibhyo janaye pariṣvaje ||
dhruvaṃ syonaṃ prajāyai te dhārayāmy aśmānaṃ devyāḥ pṛthivyā upasthe | tam ā rohānumādyā suvīrā dīrghaṃ ta āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu ||
devas te savitā hastaṃ gṛhṇātu somo rājā suprajasaṃ kṛṇotu | agniḥ subhagāṃ jātavedāḥ patyā patnīṃ jaradaṣṭiṃ kṛṇotu ||
gṛhṇāmi te saubhagatvāya hastaṃ mayā patyā jaradaṣṭir yathāsaḥ | bhago aryamā savitā purandhir mahyaṃ tvādur gārhapatyāya devāḥ ||
yenāgnir asyā bhūmyā hastaṃ jagrāha dakṣiṇam | tena gṛhṇāmi te hastaṃ mā vyathiṣṭhā mayā saha ||
dhātā te hastam agrahīt savitā hastam agrahīt | bhagas te hastam agrahīd aryamā hastam agrahīt | patnī tvam asi dharmaṇā- -ahaṃ gṛhapatis tava ||
mameyam astu poṣyā mahyaṃ tvādād bṛhaspatiḥ | mayā patyā prajāvatī saṃ jīva śaradaḥ śatam ||
tvaṣṭā vāso vy adadhāc chubhe kaṃ bṛhaspateḥ praśiṣā kavīnām | tenemāṃ nārīṃ savitā bhagaś ca sūryām iva pari dhattāṃ prajāyai ||
gṛhās tvā prorṇuvantu varcasā bhagena jyotiṣmad idaṃ prati muñcasva vapuḥ | uṣā iva sūryasya saṃdṛśi ||
indrāgnī dyāvāpṛthivī ha pūṣā mitrāvaruṇā bhago aśvinobhā | bṛhaspatir maruto brahma soma imāṃ nārīṃ prajayā vardhayantu ||
bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaḥ sūryāyāḥ śīrṣe keṣām̐ akalpayat | tenemām aśvinā nārīṃ patyā saṃśobhayāmasi||
idaṃ tad rūpaṃ yad avasta yoṣā jāyāṃ jijñāse manasā carantīm | tām anv artiṣye sakhibhir navagvaiḥBhatt. arttiṣye ka imaṃ vidvān vicacartapāśam ||
ahaṃ vi ṣyāmi mayi rūpam asyā vedad it paśyan manasaḥ kulāyam | na steyam admi manasod amucye svayaṃ śrathnāno varuṇasya pāśam ||
imaṃ vi ṣyāmi varuṇasya pāśaṃ yena tvābadhnāt savitāsuśevaḥ| uruṃ lokaṃ sugam atra panthāṃ kṛṇomi tubhyaṃ sahapatnyai vadhu ||

somasya jāyā prathamaṃ gandharvas te 'paraḥ patiḥ | tṛtīyo agniṣ ṭe patis turīyas temanuṣyajāḥ||
somo dadad gandharvāya gandharvo dadad agnaye | rayiṃ ca putrāṃś cādād agnir mahyam atho imām ||
ā vām agan sumatir vājinīvasū ny aśvinā hṛtsu kāmā araṃsata | abhūtaṃ gopā mithunā śubhaspatī priyā aryamṇo duryām̐ aśīmahi ||
sā mandasānā manasā śivena rayiṃ dhehi sarvavīraṃ vacasyam | sugaṃ tīrthaṃ suprapāṇaṃ śubhaspatī sthāṇuṃ pathiṣṭhām apa durmatiṃ hatam ||
apa rakṣāṃsy apa durmatiṃ hataṃ śubhaspatī vahator yāto asmāt | purogavojayanrakṣāṃsy agne kṣetravit pūrvo vi mṛdho nudasva ||
yā oṣadhayo yā nadyo yāni kṣetrāṇi yā vanā | te tvā vadhu prajāvatīṃ patye rakṣantu rakṣasaḥ ||
emaṃ panthām aganma sugaṃ svastivāhanam | yatra vīro na riṣyaty anyeṣāṃ vindate vasu ||
