carma varmaitad ā hara- -asyai nāryāupastire| sinīvāli pra jāyatāṃ bhagasya sumatāv asat ||
upa stṛṇīhi balbajam adhi carmaṇi rohite | tatropaviśya suprajā imam agniṃ saparyatu ||
yaṃ balbajaṃ nyasyatha carma copastṛṇīthana | tad ā rohatu suprajā yā kanyā vindate patim ||
ā roha carmopa sīdāgnim eṣa devo hanti rakṣāṃsi sarvā | sumaṅgaly upa sīdemam agniṃ saṃpatnī prati bhūṣeha devān ||
pra jāyantāṃ mātur asyāupasthān nānārūpāḥ paśavo jāyamānāḥ | iha prajāṃ janaya patye asmai sujyaiṣṭhyo bhavatu te putra eṣaḥ ||
sumaṅgalī prataraṇī gṛhāṇāṃ suśeva patye śvaśurāya śambhūḥ | syonā śvaśruvai pra gṛhān viśemānBhatt. viśemāṃ prajāvatī jaradaṣṭir yathāsaḥ ||
sumaṅgalīr iyaṃ vadhūr imāṃ sameta paśyata | saubhāgyam asyaidattvāBhatt. datvā daurbhāgyena paretana ||
yā durhārdo yuvatayo yāś ceha jaratīr api | varco hy asyai saṃ dattā- -athāstaṃ vi paretana ||
rukmaprastaraṇaṃ vahyaṃ viśvā rūpāṇi bibhratam | ārohat sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam ||
ā roha talpaṃ sumanasyamānā- -iha prajāṃ janaya patye asmai | indrāṇīva subudhā budhyamānā jyotirugrā uṣasaḥ prati jāgaraḥ ||
devā agre ny apadyanta patnīṃ sam aspṛśanta tanvas tanūbhiḥ | sūryeva nāri viśvarūpā mahitvā prajāvatī patye śaṃ bhavāsi ||
udīrṣvātaḥpativatnī hy eṣā viśvāvasuṃ namasā gīrbhir īḍe | jāmim iccha pitṛṣadaṃ nyaktāṃ sa te bhāgo januṣā tasya viddhi ||
yā apsarasaḥ sadhamādaṃ madanty antarā havirdhānaṃ sūryaṃ ca | tās te janitram abhi tāḥ parehi namas te gandharva rtunā kṛṇomi ||
namo ghandharvasya manase namo bhāmāya cakṣuṣe ca kṛṇmaḥ | viśvāvaso namo brahmaṇā te kṛṇomy abhi jāyā apsarasaḥ parehi ||
rāyā vayaṃ sumanasaḥ syāma- -ud ito gandharvam āvīvṛtāma | agan sa devaḥ paramaṃ sadhasthamBhatt. agaṃ sa aganma vayaṃ pratiranta āyuḥ ||
saṃ pitarāv ṛtviye sṛjethāṃ pitā mātā ca retaso bhavāthaḥ | maryo yoṣām adhi rohayaitāṃ prajāṃ kṛṇvāthām iha modamānau ||
ā vāṃ prajāṃ janayatu prajāpatir ahorātrābhyāṃ sam anaktv aryamā | adurmaṅgalī patilokam ā viśemaṃ śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade ||
tāṃ pūṣañ chivatamām erayasva yasyāṃ bījaṃ manuṣyā vapanti | yā na ūrū uśatī viśrayāti yasyām uśantaḥ praharema śepaḥ ||
ā rohorum upa dhatsva hastaṃ pari ṣvajasva jāyāṃ sumanasyamānaḥ | prajāṃ kṛṇvāthām iha puṣyataṃ rayiṃ dīrghaṃ vām āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu ||
yaṃ no dadur brahmabhāgaṃ vadhūyor vāso vadhvaś ca vastram | yuvaṃ brahmaṇe 'numanyamānau bṛhaspate sākam indraś ca dattam ||
devair dattaṃ vanunā sākam etad vādhūyaṃvadhvovāso asyāḥ | yo brahmaṇe cikituṣe dadāti sa id rakṣāṃsitalpyānihanti ||
syonād yoner adhi budhyamānau hasāmudau mahasā modamānau | sugū suputrausugṛhautarātho jīvā uṣaso vibhātīḥ ||Bhatt. vibhātī(ḥ)
navaṃ vasānaḥ surabhiḥ suvāsā udāgāṃ jīva uṣaso vibhātīḥ |Bhatt. vibhātī(ḥ) āṇḍāt patatrīvāmukṣi viśvasmād enasas pari ||
śumbhanī dyāvāpṛthivī antisumnemahivrate | āpaḥ sapta sravantīs tā no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||Bhatt. ahasaḥ
sūryāyai devebhyo mitrāya varuṇāya ca | ye bhūtasya pracetasas tebhyo 'ham akaraṃ namaḥ ||
ya ṛte cidabhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhyaātṛdaḥ| saṃdhātā saṃdhiṃ maghavā purūvasurniṣkartā vihṛtaṃ punaḥ ||Bhatt.purūvasuni(⟨ rni)ṣkartā
apāsmat tama ucchatuBhatt. apāsma(t) nīlaṃ piśaṅgam uta lohitaṃ yat | nirdahanīṃpṛṣātakīm asmintāṃsthāṇāv adhy ā sṛjāmi ||
yāvatīḥ kṛtyā upavāsane yāvanto rājño varuṇasyapāśāḥ|Bhatt. pāśāt vyṛddhayo yā asamṛddhayaś ca- -asmin tā sthāṇau prati muñcāmi sarvāḥ ||
ye antā yāvatīḥ sica otavo ye ca tantavaḥ | vāso yat patnībhir utaṃ tan mā syonam upa spṛṣāt ||
uśatīḥ kanyalā imāḥ pitṛlokāt patiṃ yatīḥ | ava dīkṣāmasṛkṣatasvāhā ||
bṛhaspatināvasṛṣṭāṃ viśve devā adhārayan | varco goṣu praviṣṭaṃ yat tenemāṃ saṃ sṛjāmasi ||
bṛhaspatināvasṛṣṭāṃ viśve devā adhārayan | tejo goṣu praviṣṭaṃ yat tenemāṃ saṃ sṛjāmasi ||
bṛhaspatināvasṛṣṭāṃ viśve devā adhārayan | payo goṣu praviṣṭaṃ yat tenemāṃ saṃ sṛjāmasi ||
bṛhaspatināvasṛṣṭāṃ viśve devā adhārayan | yaśo goṣu praviṣṭaṃ yat tenemāṃ saṃ sṛjāmasi ||
bṛhaspatināvasṛṣṭāṃ viśve devā adhārayan | bhago goṣu praviṣṭaṃ yat tenemāṃ saṃ sṛjāmasi ||
yad asau duhitā tava vikeśy arudad bahu rodena kṛṇvaty agham | agniṣ ṭvā tasmād enasaḥ savitā ca pra muñcatām ||
yad amī keśino janā gṛhe tesamanartiṣū rodena kṛṇvanto 'gham | (…) ||see 7de
yaj jāmayo yad yuvatayo gṛhe tesamanartiṣū rodena kṛṇvatīr agham | (…) ||see 7de
yad imau dampatī ubhau vivāhe aghamāratū rodena kṛṇvantāv agham | (…) ||see 7de
yat te prajāyāṃ paśuṣu yad vā gṛheṣu niṣṭhitam aghakṛdbhir aghaṃ kṛtam | agniṣ ṭvā tasmād enasaḥ savitā ca pra muñcatām ||
iyaṃ nāry upa brūte pūlpāny āvapantikā | dīrghāyur astu me patir edhantāṃ pitaro mama ||
ihemāvindra saṃ nuda cakravākeva dampatī | prajāvantau svastakau dīrgham āyur vy aśnutām ||
yad āsandyām upadhāneBhatt. āsandhyā(⟨ ndyā*)m yad vopavāsane kṛtam | vivāhe kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakrur āsnānetāṃni dadhmasi ||Bhatt. taṃ
yad duṣkṛtaṃ yac chamalaṃ vivāhe vahatau ca yat | tat saṃbhalasya kambale mṛjmahe duritaṃ vayam ||
saṃbhale malaṃ sādayitvā kambale duritaṃ vayam | abhūma yajñiyāḥ śuddhāḥ pra ṇa āyūṃṣitāriṣan||
yā me priyatamā tanūḥ sā me bibhāya vāsasaḥ | tasyāgre tvaṃ vanaspate nīviṃ kṛṇuṣva mā vayaṃ riśāma ||
kṛtrimaḥ kaṅkataḥ śatadan ya eṣaḥ | apāsyāḥ keśyaṃ malam apa śīrṣaṇyaṃ likhāt ||
aṅgādaṅgādyūyamasyā apa yakṣmaṃ ni dhattana |Bhatt. (a)pa tan mā prāpat pṛthivīṃ mota devān divaṃ mā prāpan morv antarikṣam | apo mā prāpan malam etad agne yamaṃ mā prāpat pitṝṃś ca sarvān ||
saṃ tvā nahyāmi payasā pṛthivyāḥ saṃ tvā nahyāmi payasauṣadhīnām | saṃ tvā nahyāmi prajayā dhanena sā saṃnaddhāsanuhivājam emam ||
amo 'ham asmi sā tvaṃ dyaur ahaṃ pṛthivī tvam | mano 'ham asmi vāk tvaṃ tāv iha saṃ bhavāva prajām ā janayāvahai ||
janīyanti no agravaḥ putrīyanti sudānavaḥ | ariṣṭāsaḥ sacemahi bṛhate vājasātaye ||
ye pitaro vadhūdarśā imaṃ vahatumāgaman|Bhatt. āgamaṃ (⟨ gaman) te asyai vadhvai saṃpatnyai prajāvac charma yacchantu ||
yedaṃpūrvāganraśanāyamānā prajām asyai draviṇaṃ cehadattvā|Bhatt. datvā tāṃ vahantv agatasyābhi panthāṃ virāḍ iyaṃ suprajā aty ajaiṣīt ||
pra budhyasva subudhā budhyamānā dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya | gṛhān prehi sumanasyamānā dīrghaṃ ta āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu ||
vi te muñcāmi raśanāṃ vi raśmīn vi yoktrāṇi paricartanāni ca | ariṣṭāsminjyotiṣi śivā gṛhapatau bhava ||
syonā bhavaśvaśurebhyaḥ syonā patye gṛhebhyaḥ | syonāsyai sarvasyai viśe syonāpuṣṭāyaiṣāṃbhava ||
udehi vājin yo 'psv antar idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ pra viśa sūnṛtāvat | yo rohito viśvam idaṃ jajāna sa tvā rāṣṭrāya subhṛtaṃ pipartu ||Bhatt. piparttu
ud vājaāganyo 'psv antar viśa ā roha tvadyonayo yāḥ | somaṃ dadhāno 'pa oṣadhīr gāś catuṣpado dvipada ā veśayeha ||
yūyam ugrā marutaḥ pṛśnimātara indreṇa yujā pramṛṇīta śatrūn | ā vo rohitaḥ śṛṇavat sudānavas triṣaptāmarutaḥ svādusaṃmudaḥ ||
ruho ruroha rohita ā ruroha garbho janīnāṃ januṣām upastham | tābhiḥ saṃrabdho anv avindat ṣaḍ urvīr gātuṃ prapaśyann iha rāṣṭram āhāḥ ||
ā te rāṣṭram iha rohito 'hār mṛdho vy āsthad abhayaṃ te abhūt | tasmai te dyāvāpṛthivī revatībhiḥ kāmaṃ duhatām iha śakvarībhiḥ ||
rohito dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna taṃ tantuṃ parameṣṭhī tatāna | tatra śiśriye 'ja ekapād adṛṃhad dyāvāpṛthivī balena ||Bhatt. adṛṃha(d)
rohito dyāvāpṛthivī adṛṃhat tena sva stabhitaṃ tena nākaḥ | tenāntarikṣaṃ vimitā rajaṃsi tena devā amṛtam anv avindan ||
vi rohitoamṛśadviśvarūpaṃ samākṛṇvānaḥ praruho ruhaś ca | divaṃ rūḍhvā mahatā mahimnā saṃ te rāṣṭram anaktu payasā ghṛtena ||
yās te ruhaḥ praruho yās ta āruho yābhir āpṛṇāsi divam antarikṣam | tāsāṃ brahmaṇā payasā vāvṛdhāno viśirāṣṭre jāgṛhi rohitasya ||Bhatt. visi (⟨ viśi)
yās te viśas tapasaḥ saṃbabhūvur vatsaṃ gāyatrīm anu tā ihāguḥ | tāstvāviśantu manasā śivenaBhatt. tās tā saṃmātā vatso abhy eti rohitaḥ ||
ūrdhvo rohito adhi nāke asthād viśvā rūpāṇi janayan yuvā kaviḥ | tigmenāgnir jyotiṣā vi bhāti tṛtīye cakre rajasi priyāṇi ||
sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabho jātavedā ghṛtāhutaḥ somapṛṣṭhaḥ suvīraḥ | mā māhāsīnnāthitonettvā jahāniBhatt. ne(t)tvā gopoṣaṃ ca me vīrapoṣaṃ ca dhehi ||
rohito yajñasya janitā mukhaṃ ca rohitāya vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi | rohitaṃ devā yanti sumanasyamānāḥ sa mā rohaiḥ sāmityai rohayāti ||
rohito yajñaṃ vy adadhād viśvakarmaṇe tasmāt tejāṃsy upa memāny āguḥ | vocayaṃ te nābhiṃ bhuvanasyādhi majmani ||
ā tvā ruroha bṛhaty uta paṅktir ā kakud varcasā viśvavedaḥ | ā tvā rurohoṣṇihākṣaraṃ vaṣaṭkāra ā tvā ruroha rohito retasā saha ||
ayaṃ vaste garbhaṃ pṛthivyā divaṃ vaste 'yam antarikṣam | ayaṃ bradhnasya viṣṭapaḥ svar lokān sam ānaśe ||
vācaspate pṛthivī naḥ syonā syonāyonis talpā suśevā |Bhatt. (syonā) in brackets ihaiva prāṇaḥ sakye no astu taṃ tvāparameṣṭhinpary agnir varcasā dadhātu ||
vācaspataṛtavaḥ pañcaBhatt. vācaspate (without sandhi) vaiśvakarmaṇāḥ pari ye babhūvuḥ | (…)see 7c (…) pari rohito varcasā dadhātu ||see 7d
vācaspate saumanasaṃ manaś ca goṣṭhe no gā ramaya yoniṣu prajām | ihaiva prāṇaḥ sakhye no astu taṃ tvāparameṣṭhinpary ahaṃ varcasā dadhāmi ||
pari tvā dhāt savitā devo agnir varcasā mitrāvaruṇāv abhi tvā | sarvā arātīr apakrāmann udehi- -idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ kṛṇuhisūnṛtāvat||
yaṃtvā pṛṣatī rathe pṛṣṭir vahati rohitaḥ | śubhā yāsiriṇannapaḥ | tenemaṃ brahmaṇaspate rohaṃ rohayottamam ||
anuvratā rohiṇī rohitasya sūriḥsuparṇā bṛhatī suvarcāḥ | tayāvājān viśvarūpāṃ jayema tayā viśyāḥ pṛtanā abhi ṣyāma ||
idaṃ sado rohiṇī rohitasya- -asau panthāḥ pṛṣatī yena yāti | tāṃ gandharvāḥkaśyapāun nayanti tāṃrakṣanti kavayo 'pramādam ||
sūryasyāśvā harayaḥ ketumantaḥ sadā vahanty amṛtāḥ sukhaṃ ratham | ghṛtapāvā rohito bhrājamāno divaṃ devaḥ pṛṣatīm ā viveṣa ||
yo rohito vṛṣabhas tigmaśṛṅgaḥ pary agniṃ pari sūryaṃ babhūva | yo viṣṭabhnāti pṛthivīṃ divaṃ ca tasmād devā adhi sṛṣṭīḥ sṛjante ||
rohito divam āruhan mahatas pary arṇavāt | sarvā ruroha rohito ruhaḥ ||Bhatt. ruha(ḥ)
vi mimīṣva payasvatīṃ ghṛtācīṃ devānāṃ dhenur anapaspṛg eṣā | indraḥ somaṃ pibatu kṣemo astv agniḥ prastautuvi mṛdho nudasva ||
samiddho agniḥ samidhāno ghṛtavṛddho ghṛtāhutaḥ | abhīṣāḍ viśvāṣāḍ agniḥ sapatnān hantu ye mama ||
hantv enān pradahatv agnir yo naḥ pṛtanyati | kravyādāgninā vayaṃ sapatnān pra dahāmasi ||
agne sapatnam adharaṃpādayāsmad vyathayā sajātam utpipānaṃ bṛhaspate | indrāgnī mitrāvaruṇāv adhare padyantāmapratimanyūyamānāḥ||
avācīnān ava jahi- -indra vajreṇa bāhumān | adhā sapatnān mamakān agnes tejobhir ā dade ||
udyantvaṃdeva sūrya sapatnān me +'dharān kṛṇu |Bhatt. medharāṃ (⟨ rān) avainānaśmanājahiBhatt. aśmi(⟨ śma*)nā te yantv adhamaṃ tamaḥ ||
vatso virājo vṛṣabho matīnām ā ruroha śukrapṛṣṭho 'ntarikṣam | ghṛteṇārkam abhy arcanti vatsaṃ brahma santaṃ brahmaṇā vardhayantu ||
divaṃ ca roha pṛthivīṃ ca roha rāṣṭraṃ ca roha draviṇaṃ ca roha | prajāṃ ca rohāmṛtaṃ ca roha rohitena tanvaṃ saṃ spṛśasva ||
ye devā rāṣṭrabhṛto 'bhito yanti sūryam | tebhiṣ ṭe rohitaḥ saṃvidāno rāṣṭraṃ dadhātu sumanasyamānaḥ ||
uttvā yajñā brahmapūtā vahanty adhvagato harayas tvā vahanti | tiraḥ samudram ati rocase 'rṇavam ||
rohitedyāvāpṛthivī adhi śriteBhatt. rohito (⟨ te*) vasujiti gojiti saṃjiti saṃdhanājiti | sahasraṃ yasya draviṇāni sapta ca voceyaṃte nābhiṃ bhuvanasyādhi majmani ||Bhatt. voca(⟨ ce)yante
yaśā yāsi pradiśo diśo 'nu yaśāḥ paśūnām uta carṣaṇīnām | yaśāḥ pṛthivyā adityā upasthe 'ham asmi saviteva cāruḥ ||
amutra sann iha vettha- -iha san tāni paśyati | itaḥ paśyanti rocanaṃ divi sūryaṃ vipaścitam ||
devo devam arcayaty antaś caraty arṇave | samānam agnim indhate taṃ viduḥ kavayaḥ pare ||
ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpady aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī | sahasrākṣarā bhuvanasya paṅktis tyasyāḥ samudrā adhi vi kṣaranti ||
ārohan dyām amṛtaḥ prāva me vaca uttvā yajñā brahmapūtā vahanti | ghṛtaṃ pibantaṃ harayas tvā vahanti ||
veda tat te amartti yat ta ākramaṇaṃ divi | yat te sadhasthaṃ parame vyoman ||
sūryo dyāṃ sūryaḥ pṛthivīṃ sūrya āpo 'ti paśyati | sūryo bhūtasyaikaṃ cakṣur ā ruroha divaṃ mahīm ||
urvīr āsan paridhayo vedir bhūmir akalpata | tatraitāv agnī ādhatta himaṃ ghraṃsaṃ ca rohitaḥ ||
himaṃ ghraṃsaṃcādhāya yūpān kṛtvā parvatān | varṣājyāv agnī ījāte rohitasya svarvidaḥ ||
svarvido rohitasya brahmaṇāgniḥ samāhitaḥ | tasmād ghraṃsas tasmād dhimas tasmād yajño ajāyata ||
brahmaṇāgniḥ saṃidhāno brahmavṛddho brahmahutaḥ | brahmeddhāv agnī ījāte rohitasya svarvidaḥ ||
apsv anyaḥ samāhitaḥ satye anyaḥ samāhitaḥ | (…) ||see 1cd
yaṃ vātaḥ pariśumbhati yam indro brahmaṇaspatiḥ | brahmeddhāv agnī ījāte rohitasya svarvidaḥ ||
vediṃ bhūmiṃ kalpayitvā divaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇām | ghraṃsaṃ tad agniṃ kṛtvā cakāra viśvamātmanvad varṣeṇājyena rohitaḥ ||
varṣam ājyaṃ ghraṃso agnir vedir bhūmir akalpata | tatraitānparvatām̐ agnirBhatt. tatraitāṃ gīrbhir ūrdhvām̐ akalpayat ||
gīrbhirūrdhvānkalpayitvā rohito bhūmim abravīt | tvad idaṃ sarvaṃ jāyatāṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhāvyam ||
sa yajñaḥ prathamo bhūto bhavyo ajāyata | tasmāddhayajñaidaṃsarvaṃ yat kiṃ cedaṃ virocate rohitenarṣiṇābhṛtam||
ud asya ketavo divi śukrā bhrājanta īrate | ādityasya nṛcakṣaso mahivratasyamīduṣaḥ ||
diśāṃ prajñānaṃ svarayantam arciṣā supakṣam āśuṃ patayantam arṇave | stavāma sūryaṃ bhuvanasya gopāṃ yo raśmibhir diśa ābhāti sarvāḥ ||Bhatt. sarvā(ḥ)
yat prāṅ pratyaṅ svadhayā yāsiśībhaṃ nānārūpe ahanī karṣi māyayā | tad āditya mahi tat te mahi śravo yad eko viśvaṃ pari bhūma jāyase ||
vipaścitaṃ taraṇiṃ bhrājamānaṃ vahanti yaṃ haritaḥ sapta bahvīḥ | stutād yam atrirdivamunnināya taṃ tvā paśyema pariyantam ājim ||
mā tvā dabhan pariyantam ājiṃ sugena durgam ati yāhiśībham| divaṃ ca sūrya pṛthivīṃ ca devīm ahorātre vimimāno yad eṣi ||
svasti te sūrya carase rathāya yenobhāv antau pariyāsi sadyaḥ | yaṃ te vahanti harito vahiṣṭhās tam ā roha sukham āśvaśvam ||
sukhaṃ sūrya ratham aṃśumantaṃ syonaṃ suvahnim adhi tiṣṭha vājinam | yaṃ te vahanti harito vahiṣṭhāḥ śatam aśvā yadi vā sapta bahvīḥ ||
sapta sūryo harito yātave rathe hiraṇyatvacaso bṛhatīr ayukta |Bhatt. hiṇyatvacaso (misprint) amociśukrorajasaḥ parastād vidhūya devas tamo divam āruhat ||
ut ketunā bṛhatā devā āgann apāvṛk tamo 'bhi jyotir aśrait |mss. tamobhir divyaḥ suparṇa sthavīro vy akhyadBhatt. suparṇaḥ adityāḥ putro bhuvanāni viśvā ||
udyan raśmīn ā tanuṣe prajāḥ sarvā vi paśyati |Bhatt. paśyati (⟨ si?) ubhā samudrau kratunā vi bhāsi sarvāṃ lokān paribhūr bhrājamānaḥ ||
pūrvāparaṃ carato māyayaitau śiśūkundānā pari yāto arṇavam | viśvāny anyo bhuvanābhi vaste hairaṇyairanyaṃharito vahanti ||
divitvātrirdhārayat sūryā māsāya kartave | sa eṣi sudhṛtastapan svar bhūtāvacākaśat ||
ubhāv antau sam arṣati vatsaḥ saṃmātarāv iva | nanv etad itaḥ purā brahma devā amī viduḥ ||
yat samudram anu śritaṃ tatsiṣāsatisūryaḥ | adhvāsya vitato mahān pūrvaś cāparaś ca yaḥ ||
taṃ sam āpnotijūtibhis tasmān nāpacikitsati| tenāmṛtasya bhakṣaṃ devānāṃ nāva rundhate ||
ud u tyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ | dṛśe viśvāya sūryam ||
apa tye tāyavo yathā nakṣatrā yanty aktubhiḥ | sūrāya viśvacakṣase ||
adṛśram asya ketavo vi raśmayo janām̐ anu | bhrājanto agnayo yathā ||
taraṇir viśvadarśato jyotiṣkṛd asi sūrya | viśvam ā bhāsi rocanaḥ ||Bhatt. rocanaḥ (⟨ rocanam*?)
pratyaṅ devānāṃ viśaḥ pratyaṅṅ ud eṣimānuṣīḥ| pratyaṅ viśvaṃ svar dṛśe ||
yenā pāvaka cakṣuṣā bhuraṇyantaṃ janām̐ anu | tvaṃ varuṇa paśyasi ||
vi dyām eṣi rajas pṛthv ahar mimāno aktubhiḥ | paśyan janmāni sūrya ||
sapta tvā harito rathe vahanti deva sūrya | śociṣkeśaṃ vicakṣaṇam ||
ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ sūro rathasya naptyaḥ | tabhir yāti svayuktibhiḥ ||
abhi mā varcasā giraḥ siñcantīr ā caraṇyatha | abhi vatsaṃ na dhenavaḥ ||
tā arṣanti śubhriyaḥ pṛñcatīr varcasā priyaḥ | jātaṃ jātrīr yathā hṛdā ||
vajrāyeva sāddhiyaḥBhatt. sāddhiyaḥ (⟨ sādhvyaḥ+?) kīrtiṃ śremāṇam ā vahān | mahyam āyur ghṛtapriyaḥ ||
rohito divam ākramīt tapasā tapasvī | sa yonim aiti sa u jāyate punaḥ sa devānām adhipatir babhūva ||
yo viśvacarṣaṇir uta viśvatomukho viśvataspāṇir utaviśvataspṛdhaḥ |Bhatt. emend. -thaḥ | saṃ bāhubhyāṃ bharati saṃ patatrair dyāvāpṛthivī janayan deva ekaḥ ||
ekapāddvipado bhūyo vi cakrame dvipāt tripādam abhy eti paścāt | tripāddhaṣaṭpado bhūyo vi cakrame ta ekapadas tanvāṃ sam āsate ||
atandro yāsyan harito yad āsthā divi rūpaṃ kṛṇuṣe rocamānaḥ | ketumām̐udyansahamāno rajāṃsi viśvā āditya pravato vi bhāsi ||
baṇ mahām̐ asi sūrya baḍ āditya mahām̐ asi | mahāṃs te mahato mahimā tvam āditya mahām̐ asi ||
rocase divi rocase antarikṣepataṅga pṛthivyāṃ rocase rocase apsv antaḥ | ubhā samudrau rucyā vy āpitha devo devāsi mahiṣaḥ svarvit ||
arvāk parastād viyato vyadhva āśur vipaścit patayan pataṅgaḥ | viṣṇur vicittaḥ śavasādhitiṣṭhan pra ketunā sahate viśvamejat||
tigmo vibhrājan tanvaḥ śiśāno 'raṃgamāsaḥ pravato rarāṇaḥ | jyotiṣmān pakṣī mahiṣo vayodhā viśvā āsthāt pradiśaḥ kalpamānaḥ ||
citraś cikitvān mahiṣaḥ suparṇa ārocayan rodasī antarikṣam | ahorātre pari sūryaṃ vasāne prāsya viśvā tirato vīryāṇi ||
citraṃ devānāṃ ketur anīkaṃ jyotiṣmān pradiśaḥ sūrya udyan | divākaro ati dyumnais tamāṃsi viśvātārīdduritāni śukraḥ ||Bhatt. viśvātārī(d)
citraṃ devānām ud agād anīkaṃ cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ | āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca ||
uccā patantam aruṇaṃ suparṇaṃ madhye divas taraṇiṃ bhrājamāṇam | paśyema tvā savitāraṃ yam āhur ajasraṃ jyotir yad avindadatriḥ||
divas pṛṣṭhe dhāvamānaṃ suparṇam adityāḥ putraṃ nāthakāma upayāmibhītaḥ |Bhatt. yāma;yāmiwith ŚS sa naḥ sūrya pra tira dīrgham āyur mā riṣāma sumatau te syāma ||
ahorātrāṇi vidadhat kṛṇvāṇaḥ pārthivaṃ rajaḥ | navaṃnavaṃ sakhībhavaṃ kṛṇuṣe deva sūrya ||
sahasrāhṇyaṃviyatāv asya pakṣau harer haṃsasya pacataḥ svargam |read patataḥ saviśvāndevān urasy upadadya saṃpaśyan yāti bhuvanāni viśvā ||
rohito loko abhavad rohito 'gre prajāpatiḥ | rohito yajñānāṃ mukhaṃ rohito jyotir ucyate ||
rohito bhūto abhavad rohito bhavyam ābharat | rohito yajñānāṃ mukhaṃ rohitaḥ svar ā bharat ||
rohitaḥ kālo abhavad rohito 'ty atapad divam | rohito raśmibhir bhūmiṃ samudram anu saṃ carāt ||
sarvā diśaḥ saṃ carati rohito adhipatir divaḥ | divaṃ samudram ād bhūmiṃ sarvān lokān vi rakṣatu ||Bhatt. sarvāṃ

bibharty aṃśuṃ prati muñcate srajamBhatt. vi bharty udūhateraśmīn aṃśuṃ bṛhantam |ūhateemend. Bhatt. (vs. uhate) divākaraḥ paśyati yat parāt paraṃ prāhṇā pra varṣmaṇā viśvamaprāṅ hiraṇyayo haritaḥ keturudyan||
ārohañchukrobṛhatīr atandroBhatt.ārohañśukro martyaḥ kṛṇute vīryāṇi | divyaḥ suparṇo mahiṣo vātaraṃhā yat sarvān lokām̐ abhi yad vibhāti ||Bhatt. sarvāṃ
abhy anyad eti pary anyadvasāno 'horātrābhyāṃ mahiṣaḥ kalpamānaḥ | sūryaṃ vayaṃ rajasi kṣiyantaṃ gātuvidaṃ havāmahe nāthakāmāḥ ||
pṛthivīpromahiṣo nādhamānasya gāturadabdhacakṣuḥpari sarvaṃ babhūva | viśvaṃsaṃpaśyansuvidatro yajatraḥBhatt. saṃpaśyaṃ, yajatra(ḥ) śivayā nas tanvā śarma yacchāt ||
pary asya mahimā pṛthivīṃ samudraṃ jyotiṣā vibhrājan pari dyām antarikṣam | ahorātrābhyāṃ saha saṃvidāna upā na āyuḥ pra tirād ariṣṭam ||
abodhy agniḥ samidhā janānāṃ prati dhenum ivāyatīm uṣāsam | yahvā iva pra vayām ujjihānāḥ pra bhānavaḥ sisrate nākam accha ||
kumāraṃ mātā yuvatir garbham antar guhā bibharti na dadāti pitre | anīkam asya na minaj janāsaḥ puraḥ paśyanti nihitam aratau ||
tam etaṃtvaṃyuvate kumāraṃ tveṣī bibharṣi mahiṣī jajāna | urvīr hi garbhaḥ śarado vavardha- -apaśyaṃ jātaṃ yam asūta mātā ||
yasya tisro vartana ekadhā satoBhatt. varttana (⟨ varttanaya?) yasmai baliṃ devajanā haranti | tasyāsau dyauḥ pṛthivy antarikṣaṃ guhā tiṣṭhanti vasunā samaktāḥ ||
nava divo devajanena guptā navāntarikṣāṇi nava bhūmaya imāḥ | yasminn idaṃ sarvamotaṃprotaṃotaṃemend. Barret; Bhatt. ota- yasmādanyanna paraṃ kiṃ canāsti ||
na tasmāt pūrvaṃ na paraṃ nv asti na bhūtaṃ nota bhavyaṃ yad āsīt | sahasrapād ekamūrdhā dvyātmā sa evedam ā varīvarti bhūtam ||
ekaikaṃ ye apatan suparṇāḥBhatt. apataṃ somaṃ dipsanto 'hyā nibāḍhāḥ | kas teṣāṃ veda pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca ko nidānaṃ ka ātmānam eṣām ||
yebhir vāta iṣitaḥ pravāti ye dadante pañca diśaḥ sadhrīcīḥ | ya āhutim atyamanyanta devā apāṃ netāraḥ katame ta āsan ||
imām eṣāṃ pṛthivīṃ vasta eko antarikṣaṃ pary eko babhūva | divam eṣāṃ dadate yo vidhartā sarvā diśo rakṣaty eka eṣām ||
vrātyo vāvedam agra āsīd vīyamāna eva sa prajāpatiṃ samairayat||Bhatt. īrayat
sa prajāpatir ātmani suparṇam apaśyat ||
tad ekam abhavat tal lalāmam abhavat tan mahad abhavat taj jyeṣṭham abhavat tat tapo 'bhavat tat satyam abhavat tad brahmābhavat tena prājāyata ||
so 'vardhata sa mahān abhavat sa mahādevo 'bhavat sa īśāno 'bhavat sa devānām īśān agacchat sa devānām ekavratyo 'bhavat ||
sa dhenur ādhatta tad indradhanur abhavat ||
nīlam asyodaraṃ lohiny asya pṛṣṭiḥ ||
nīlenāpriyaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ prorṇoti lohitena dviṣantaṃ vidhyatīti brahmavādino vadanti ||

sa prācīṃ diśam anu vy acalat | taṃ bṛhac ca rathantaraṃ ca viśve ca devā ādityāś cānu vy acalan | bṛhataś ca vai sa rathantarasya ca viśveṣāṃ ca devānām ādityānāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda | bṛhate ca vai sa rathantarāya ca viśvebhyaś ca devebhya ādityebhyaś ca- -āvṛścateya evaṃvidvāṃsaṃvrātyam upavadati ||

tasya prācyāṃ diśi | śraddhā pūṃścalī mitro māgadho vijñānaṃ vāso 'har uṣṇīṣaṃ rātrī keśā haritau pravartau kalmalir maṇiḥ | bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca pariṣkandau mano vipathaṃ mātariśvā pavamānaś cavipathavāhauvātaḥ sārathī reṣmā pratodaḥ kīrtiś ca yaśaś ca puraḥsarāv ainaṃ kīrtir gacchaty ainaṃ yaśo gacchati ya evaṃ veda ||

sa dakṣiṇāṃ diśam anu vy acalat | taṃyajñāyāyajñiyaṃca vāmadevyaṃ ca yajñaś ca paśavaś cānu vy acalan | yajñāyāyajñiyasyaca vai sa vāmadevyasya ca yajñasya ca paśunāṃ ca (…) | yajñāyāyajñiyāyaca vai sa vāmadevyāya ca yajñāya ca paśubhyaś ca (…) ||
tasya dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi | ūṣāḥpūṃścalīmantro māgadho (…) |see 2bc ahorātrīca pariṣkandau (…) ||see 2d

sa pratīcīṃ diśaṃ (anu vy acalat) | taṃ vairūpaṃ ca vairājaṃ ca varuṇaś ca rājā paścānu vy acalan | vairūpasya ca vai sa vairājasya ca varuṇasya ca rājño apāṃ ca (…) | vairūpāya ca vai sa vairājāya ca varuṇāya carājñedbhyaśca (…) ||
tasya pratīcyāṃ diśi | irāḥ puṃścalī haso māgadho (…) |see 2bc paurṇamāsī cāmāvāsyā ca pariṣkandau (…) ||see 2d

sa udīcīṃ diśam anu vy acalat | taṃ śyaitaṃ ca naudhasaṃ ca somaś ca rājā sapta ṛṣayaś cānu vy acalan | śyaitasya ca vai sa naudhasasya ca somasya ca rājñaḥ sapta ṛṣīnāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya (evaṃ veda) | śyaitāya ca vai sa naudhāsāya ca somāya ca rājñaḥ sapta ṛṣibhyaś cāvṛścateya evaṃvidvāṃsaṃvrātyam upavadati ||

tasyodīcyāṃ diśi | vidyut puṃścalīstanayitnurmāgadho vijñānaṃ vāso 'har uṣṇīṣaṃ rātrī keśā haritau pravartau kalmalir maṇiḥ | śrutaṃ ca viśrutaṃ ca pariṣkandau mano vipathaṃ mātariśvā ca pavamānaś cavipathavāhau vātaḥ sārathī reṣmā pratodaḥ kīrtiś ca yaśaś ca puraḥsarāv ainaṃ kīrtir gacchaty ainaṃ yaśo gacchati ya (evaṃ veda) ||

sa saṃvatsaram ūrdhvo 'tiṣṭhat taṃ devā abruvan vrātya kiṃ nutiṣṭhasīti| so 'bravīd āsandīṃ me saṃ bharantv iti tasmā āsandīṃ sam abharan | tasyā vasantaś ca grīṣmaś ca pūrvau pādav āstāṃ varṣāś ca śarac cāparau | taṃ bṛhac ca rathantaraṃ cānūcye āstāṃ yajñāyajñiyaṃca vāmadevyaṃ ca tiraśce | ṛcaḥ prāñcas tantavo yajūṃṣi tīryañcaḥ | veda āstaro brahmopa barhaṇaṃ sāmāsīda udgītho 'paśrayantām asīdat | tasya saṃkalpāḥ prahāsyā āsan devajanāḥ pariṣkandā apsarasaḥ patnīr viśvāni bhūtāny upasadaḥ | ainaṃ viśvāni bhūtāni gacchanti priyo viśveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
tasmai prācyā diśaḥ | vāsantau māsau goptārāv akurvan bṛhac ca rathantaraṃ cānuṣṭhātārau | vāsantāv enaṃ māsau prācyā diśo gopāyato bṛhac ca rathantaraṃ cānutiṣṭhato ya (evaṃ veda) ||
tasmai dakṣiṇāyā diśaḥ | graiṣmau māsau goptārāv akurvan yajñāyajñiyaṃca vāmadevyaṃ cānuṣṭhātārau | graiṣmāv enaṃ māsau dakṣiṇāyā diśo gopāyato yajñāyajñiyaṃca vāmadevyaṃ cā(nu …) ||see 1d
tasmai pratīcyā diśaḥ | vārṣikau māsau goptārāv akurvan vairūpaṃ ca vairājaṃ cānuṣṭhātārau | vārṣikāv enaṃ māsau pratīcyā diśo gopāyato vairūpaṃ ca vairājaṃ cā(nu …) ||see 1d
tasmā udīcyā diśaḥ | śaradau māsau goptārāv akurvañ chyaitaṃ ca naudhasaṃ cānuṣṭātārau | śāradāvenaṃ māsā udīcyā diśo gopāyataḥ śyaitaṃ ca naidhasaṃ cā(nu …) ||see 1d
tasmai dhruvāyā diśaḥ | haimanau māsau goptārāv akurvan bhūmiṃ cāgniṃ cānuṣṭhātārau | haimanāv enaṃ māsau dhruvāyā diśo gopāyato bhūmiś cāgniś ca(nu …) ||see 1d
tasmā ūrdhvāyā diśaḥ | śaiśirau māsau goptārāv akurvan divaṃ cādityaṃ cānuṣṭhātārau | śaiśirāv enaṃ māsā ūrdhvāyā diśo gopāyato dyauś cādityaścānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda ||
tasmai prācīnād antardeśād bhavam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan | bhava enam iṣvāsaḥ prācīnād antardeśād anuṣṭhātā(nu tiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda) ||
tasmai dakṣiṇāyād antardaśāc charvam iṣvāsam (anuṣṭhātāram akurvan) | śarva enam iṣvāso dakṣiṇād antardeśād (…) ||see 1d
tasmai pratīcīnād antardeśād rudram iṣvāsam (anuṣṭhātāram akurvan) | rudra enam iṣvāsaḥ pratīcīnād antardeśād (…) ||see 1d
tasmā udīcīnād antardeśāt paśupatim iṣvāsam (anuṣṭhātāram akurvan) | paśupatir enam iṣvāsa udīcīnād antardeśād (…) ||see 1d
tasmai dhruvād antardeśād ugraṃ devam iṣvāsam (anuṣṭhātāram akurvan) | ugra enaṃdevaiṣvāso dhruvād antardeśād (…) ||see 1d
tasmā ūrdhvād antardeśān mahādevam iṣvāsam (anuṣṭhātāram akurvan) | mahādeva enam iṣvāsa ūrdhvād antardeśād anuṣṭhātā (…) ||see 1d
tasmai sarvebhyo 'ntardeśebhya īśānam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan | īśāna enam iṣvāsaḥ sarvebhyo 'ntardeśebhyo 'nuṣṭhātānutiṣṭhatiya (evaṃ veda) ||

sa dhruvān diśam anu vy acalat | taṃ bhūmiś cāgniś cauṣadhayaś ca vanaspatayaś ca vīrudhaś ca vānaspatyāś cānu vy acalan | bhūmeś ca vai so 'gneś cauṣadhīnāṃ ca vanaspatināṃ ca vīrudhāṃ ca vānaspatyānāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya (evaṃ veda) | bhūmaye ca vai so 'gnaye cauṣadhibhyaś ca vanaspatibhyaś ca vīrudbhyaś ca vānaspatyebhyaś cā vṛścate ya evaṃvidvāṃsaṃvrātyam upavadati ||

sa ūrdhvāṃ diśam (anu vy acalat) | tam ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ ca sūryaś ca candramāś cānu vy acalan | ṛtasya ca vai sa satyasya ca sūryasya ca candramāsaś ca (…) | ṛtāya ca vai sa satyāya ca sūryāya ca candramāse ca (…) ||see 1gh

sa bṛhatīṃ diśaṃ (anu vy acalat) | tam ṛcaś ca sāmāni ca yajūṃṣi ca brahma cānu vy acalan | ṛcāṃ ca vai sa sāmnāṃ ca yajuṣāṃ ca brahmaṇaś ca (priyaṃ dhāma …) | ṛgbhyaś ca vai sa sāmabhyaś ca yajurbhyaś ca brahmaṇe ca (…) ||see 1gh

sa uttamāṃ diśaṃ (anu vy acalat) | tam itihāsaś ca purāṇaṃ ca gāthāś ca nārāśaṃsīścānu vy acalan | itihāsasya ca vai sa purāṇasya ca gāthānāṃ ca nārāśaṃsīnāṃ ca (priyaṃ …) | itihāsāya ca vai sa purāṇāya ca gāthābhyaś ca nārāśaṃsībhyaś ca (…) ||see 1gh

saparamāṃ diśam anu vy acalat | tam ṛtavaś cārtavāś ca lokāś ca laukyāś cānu vy acalan | ṛtūnāṃ ca vai sa ārtavānāṃ ca lokānāṃ ca laukyānāṃ ca priyaṃ (dhāma …) | ṛtubhyaś ca vai sa ārtavebhyaś ca lokebhyaś ca laukyaibhyaś cā vṛścate (ya …) ||

sokadrīcīṃ diśam anu vy acalat tatonāvartsyannamanyata| taṃ virāḍ anu vy acalat sarve ca devāḥ sarvāś ca devatāḥ | virāje ca vai sa sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ sarvāsāṃ ca devatānāṃ ca priyaṃ (…) | virāje ca vai sa sarvebhyaś ca devebhyaḥ sarvābhyaś ca devatābhya āvṛścate(ya …) ||

so 'nādiṣṭāṃ diśam anu vy acalat tatonāvartsyannamanyata| taṃ dakṣiṇāgniś ca gārhapatyaś cāhavanīyaś ca yajñaś ca yajamānaś cānu vy acalan | dakṣiṇāgneś ca vai sa gārhapatyasya cāhavanīyasya yajñasya yajamānasya ca priyaṃ (dhāma …) | dakṣiṇāgnaye ca vai sa gārhapatyāya cāhavanīyāya ca yajñāya ca yajamanāya cāvṛścate(ya …) ||
so 'ntardeśān anu vy acalat | taṃ ditiś caditiś ceḍā cendraṇī cānu vy acalan | diteś ca vai so 'diteś ceḍāyāś cendrāṇyāś ca (priyaṃ …) | ditaye ca vai so 'ditaye ceḍāyai cendrānyai cā (vṛścate …) ||

sa diśo 'nu vy acalat | taṃ prajāpatiś ca parameṣṭhī ca pitā ca pitāmahaś cānu vy acalan | prajāpateś ca vai sa parameṣṭhinaś ca pituś ca pitāmahasya ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya (evaṃ …) | prajāpataye ca vai sa parameṣṭhine ca pitre ca pitāmahāya cāvṛścate ya evaṃvidvāṃsaṃvrātyam upavadati ||

sa mahimā sadrur bhūtvāntaṃ bhūmyā agacchat samudro 'bhavat | taṃ prajāpatiś ca parameṣṭhī cāpaś ca śraddhā ca varṣaṃ cabhūtvānuvy avartanta | taṃ yajñaś ca lokaś cānnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca bhūtvābhi pary āvartanta| ainam āpo gacchanty ainaṃ varṣaṃ gacchaty ainaṃ śraddhā gacchaty ainaṃ dīkṣā gacchaty ainaṃ yajño gacchaty ainaṃ loko gacchaty ainam annaṃ gacchaty ainam annādyaṃ gacchati ya (evaṃ veda) ||

so 'rajyata tasmād rajyamānād rājanyo ajāyata | sa viśaḥ sabandhūn annaṃ cānnādyaṃ cābhy udatiṣṭhata| viśāṃ ca vai sa sabandhūnāṃ cānnasya cānnādyasya ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya (evaṃ veda) | viḍbhyaś ca vai sa sabandhubhyaś cānnāya cānnādyāya cāvṛścate ya evaṃvidvāṃsaṃvrātyam upavadati ||

sa viśo 'nu vy acalat | taṃ sabhā ca samitiś ca senā ca surā cānu vy acalan | sabhāyāś ca vai sa samiteś ca senāyāś ca sūrāyāś ca sa priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda | sabhāyai ca vai sa samitaye ca senāyai ca surāyai cāvṛścate ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ vrātyam upavadati ||Bhatt. vidvāsaṃ (misprint)

yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyo rājño 'tithir gṛham āgacchet | śreyāṃsam enam ātmanomānayettathā rāṣṭrāya nā vṛścate tathā kṣatrāya nā vṛścate tathā brahmaṇe nā vṛścate | tato vai brahma ca kṣatraṃ cod atiṣṭhatāṃ te abrūtāṃ kaṃpraviśāveti | te prajāpatir abravīd bṛhaspatim eva brahma prāviśad indraṃ kṣatram iti | tato vai bṛhaspatim eva brahma prāviśad indraṃ kṣatram | iyaṃ vāva bhūmir bṛhaspatir asau dyaur indraḥ | ayaṃ vāvāgnir brahmāsāv ādityaḥ kṣatram | ainaṃ kṣatraṃ gacchatīndrayāvī bhavati ya ādityaṃ kṣatraṃ divam indraṃ veda | ainaṃ brahma gacchati brāhmaṇavarcasī bhavati yo 'gniṃ brahma bṛhaspatiṃ bhūmiṃ veda ||
yasyoddhṛteṣv agniṣv ahute agnihotra evaṃ vidvān vrātyo 'tithiḥ | svayam enam abhyudetya brūyād vrātya kvāvātsīr iti vrātyo dakam iti vrātya tarpayantv iti ||
yad āha vrātya kvāvātsīr iti patha eva tena devayānān ava rundhe |Bhatt. itī (yad āha) vrātyodakam ity apa eva tenāva rundhe | yad āha vrātya tarpayantv iti prāṇam eva tena varṣāyāṃ saṃ kṛṇute ||
purāgnihotrasya havanād upāṃśu kṛṇvīta | vrātya yathā te priyaṃ tathāstv iti vrātya yathā te nikāmas tathāstv iti vrātya yathā te vaśastathāstv iti ||
yad āha vrātya yathā te priyaṃ tathāstv iti priyam eva tenāva rundhe priye priyasya bhavaty ainaṃ priyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda ||

(yadāha vrātya yathā) te nikāmas tathāstv iti nikāmam eva tenāva rundhe nikāme nikāmam asya bhavaty ainaṃ nikāmo gacchati (ya evaṃ veda) | yad āha vrātya yathā te vaśas tathāstv iti vaśam eva tenāva rundhe vaśī vaśasya bhavaty ainaṃ vaśo gacchati ya evaṃ veda ||

yasyādhiśrite agnihotra evaṃ vidvān vrātyo 'tithir gṛham āgacchet | svayam enam abhyudetya brūyād vrātyāti sṛja hoṣyāmīti | ati casṛjejjuhūyān nacātisṛjenna juhūyāt |Bhatt. sṛje(j); cātisṛje(n) yo vā evaṃ viduṣā vrātyenānatisṛṣṭo juhoti | na devayānaṃ panthāṃ pra jānāti na pitṛyāṇam ā deveṣuvṛścate'hutam asya bhavati | yo vā evaṃ viduṣā vrātyenānatisṛṣṭo juhoti | pra devayānaṃ panthāṃ jānāti pra pitṛyānaṃ paryasyāsmim̐lloka āyatanaṃ śiṣyate hutam asya bhavati ||
yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātya ekāṃ rātrim atithir gṛhe vasati | ye pṛthivyāṃ puṇyā lokās tān evainenāva rundhe ||
(yasyaivaṃ vidvān) vrātyo dvitīyāṃ rātriṃ (atithir gṛhe vasati) | ye antarikṣe puṇyā lokās (tān evainenāva rundhe) ||
(yasyaivaṃ vidvān) vrātyas tṛtīyāṃ rātriṃ (atithir gṛhe vasati) | ye divi puṇyā lokās (tān evainenāva rundhe) ||
(yasyaivaṃ vidvān) vrātyaś catūrthīṃ rātrim ātithiḥ (gṛhe vasati) | sarvān evainenapuṇyām̐llokān ava rundhe ||
(yasyaiva vidvān) vrātyaḥ pañcamīṃ rātrim atithiḥ (gṛhe vasati) | parāvata evainena lokān ava (rundhe) ||
yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyo 'parimitā rātrīr atithir gṛhe vasati | aparimitān evainena lokān ava rundhe ||

yasyāvrātyo vrātyabruvo nāmabibhratī gṛhān atithir āgacchet | karṣed enaṃ na cainaṃ karṣet |Bhatt. karṣe(t) | etasyai devatāyā udakaṃ yācāmīty asmā udakaṃ yācet | etāṃ devatāṃ pari veveṣmīty enaṃ pari veveṣyāt | etasyām evāsya devatāyāṃ hutam iṣṭaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
yat prācīṃ diśam anuvyacalad indro bhūtvānu vy acalan mano 'nnādaṃ kṛtvā | manasānnādenānnam atti yaḥ (evaṃ veda) ||
yad dakṣiṇāṃ diśam anu vyacalan mārutaṃśardhobhūtvānu vy acalan manyum annādaṃ kṛtvā | manyunānnādenānnam (atti ya evaṃ veda) ||
yat pratīcīṃ diśam anu vyacalad varuṇo bhūtvānu vy acalad apo 'nnādīḥ kṛtvā | adbhirannādībhir annam (atti ya evaṃ veda) ||
yad udīcīṃ diśam anu vyacalat somo rājā saptaṛṣibhir bhūtvānu vy acalad āhutim annādīṃ kṛtvā | āhutyānnādyānnam (atti ya evaṃ veda) ||
yad dhruvāṃ diśam anuvyacalad viṣṇur bhūtvānu vy acalad virājamannādīṃkṛtvā | virājānnādyānnaṃ (atti ya evaṃ veda) ||
yad ūrdhvaṃ diśam anu vyacalad bṛhaspatir bhūtvānu vy acalad vaṣaṭkāram annādaṃ kṛtvā | vaṣaṭkāreṇānnādenānnaṃ (atti ya evaṃ veda) ||
yat paśūn anuvyacalad rudro bhūtvānu vy acalad oṣadhīr annādīḥ kṛtvā | oṣadhībhir annādībhir annaṃ (atti ya evaṃ veda) ||
yad devān anuvyacalad īśāno bhūtvānu vy acalad balam annādaṃ kṛtvā | balenānnādenānnaṃ (atti ya evaṃ veda) ||
yan manuṣyān anuvyacalad agnir bhūtvānu vy acalat svāhākāram annādaṃ kṛtvā | svāhākāreṇānnādena (annam atti ya evaṃ veda) ||
yat pitṝn anuvyacalad yamo bhūtvānu vy acalat svadhākāram annādaṃ kṛtvā | svadhākāreṇānnādena (annam atti ya evaṃ veda) ||
yat prajā anuvyacalat prajāpatir bhūtvānu vy acalat prāṇam annādaṃ kṛtvā | prāṇenānnādena (annam atti ya evaṃ veda) ||
yad antardeśān anuvyacalad vāyur bhūtvānu vy acalad vātam annādaṃ kṛtvā | vātenānnādena (annam atti ya evaṃ veda) ||
yad diśo 'nuvyacalat parameṣṭhī bhūtvānu vy acalad brahmānnādaṃ kṛtvā | brahmaṇānnādenānnam atti ya evaṃ veda ||

tasya sapta prāṇāḥ saptāpānāḥ sapta vyānāḥ | yo 'sya prathamaḥ prāṇa ūrdhvo nāma so 'yam agniḥ | yo 'sya dvitīyaḥ prāṇaḥ proḍho nāma so 'sāv ādityaḥ | yo 'sya tṛtīyaḥ prāṇo 'bhyūḍho nāma so 'sau candramāḥ | yo 'sya caturthaḥ prāṇo vibhūr nāma so 'yaṃ pavamānaḥ | yo 'sya pañcamaḥ prāṇo 'parimito nāma ta ime paśavaḥ | yo 'sya ṣaṣṭhaḥ prāṇaḥ priyo nāma tā imāḥ prajāḥ | yo 'sya saptamaḥ prāṇo yonir nāma tā imā āpaḥ ||

yo 'sya prathamo 'pānaḥ | sā paurṇamāsī | yo 'sya dvitīyo 'pānaḥ | sāṣṭakā | yo 'sya tṛtīyo 'pānaḥ | sāmāvāsyā | yo 'sya caturtho 'pānaḥ | sā śraddhā | yo 'sya pañcamo 'pānaḥ | sā dīkṣā | yo 'sya ṣaṣṭho 'pānaḥ | sa yajñaḥ | yo 'sya saptamo 'pānaḥ | sa vaṣaṭkāraḥ | yo 'sya prathamo vyānaḥ | seyaṃ bhūmiḥ | yo 'sya dvitīyo vyānaḥ | tad antarikṣam | yo 'sya tṛtīyo vyānaḥ | sa dyauḥ | yo 'sya caturtho vyānaḥ | tāni nakṣatrāṇi | yo 'sya pañcamo vyānaḥ | ta ṛtavaḥ | yo 'sya ṣaṣṭho vyānaḥ | ta ārtavāḥ | yo 'sya saptamo vyānaḥ | sa saṃvatsaraḥ | samānaṃ arthaṃ pari yanti devā iti saṃvatsaraṃvāvaitadṛtavo *'nu pari yanti | yad ādityam abhi saṃ viśantīti paurṇamāsīṃ caiva tad amāvāsyāṃ cābhi saṃ viśanti | tad ekaṃ rūpam amṛtatvam eṣām ity āhutir eva | rūpaṃrūpaṃ tapasā vardhamānā ity ahorātre eva | yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ karṇaḥ so 'yam agnir yaḥ savyaḥ so 'yaṃ pavamānaḥ | yad asya dakṣiṇam akṣi tad asāv ādityo yat savyaṃ tad asau candramāḥ | ditiś cāditiś ca śīrṣakapāle saṃvatsaraḥ śiro 'horātre nāsike | rātryāparāṅ ahnā pratyaṅ namo vrātyāya ||
atisṛṣṭo apāṃ vṛṣabho atisṛṣṭā agnayo divyāḥ | rujan parirujan mṛṇan pramṛṇam mroko manohā khano nirdāha ātmadūṣis tanūdūṣiḥ ||
idaṃ tān ati sṛjāmi tān mābhy ava nikṣi | tais tam abhy ati sṛjāmi yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ ||
apām agram asi samudraṃ tvābhy ava sṛjāmi | ye 'psv agnayo 'ti tān sṛjāmi mrokaṃ khaniṃ tanūdūṣim | yo va āpo agnir āviveśa sa eṣa yad vo ghoraṃ tad etat ||
indrasyendriyeṇābhiṣiñcedariprāāpo apa ripram asmat |Bhatt. ṣiñce riprā praino vahatu pra duṣvapnyam ||
śivena mā cakṣuṣā paśyatāpaḥ śivayā tanvopa spṛśata tvācaṃ me | śivān agnīn apsuṣado havāmahe mayi kṣatraṃ varca ā dhatta devīḥ ||

nir durarmaṇya ūrjā madhumatī vāṅ madhumatī stha | madumatīṃ vācam udeyaṃ vāco 'haṃ mā yavam | adabdho me gopā adabdho gopīthaḥ | suśrutau karṇaubhadraśrutaukarṇau bhadraṃ ślokaṃ śrūyāsam | upaśrutiś ca mānuśrutiś ca māhāsiṣṭāṃ sauparṇaṃ cakṣur ajasraṃ jyotiḥ | ṛṣīṇāṃ prastaro 'si namo daivāya prastarāya | mūrdhāhaṃ rayīṇāṃ mūrdhāhaṃ samānānāṃ bhūyāsam ||

rujaś ca mā venaś ca mā hāsiṣṭām urvaś ca mācamasaśca mā hāsiṣṭāṃ vimokaś camārdrapaviśca mā hāsiṣṭām ārdradānuśca mā mātariśvā ca mā hāsiṣṭāṃ mūrdhā ca mā vidharmā ca mā hāsiṣṭāṃ dhartā ca mā dharuṇaś ca mā hāsiṣṭāṃ mṛdhaś ca mā vaimṛdhaś ca mā hāsiṣṭām ||
bṛhaspatir ma ātmā nṛmaṇā nāma | hṛdayājarasaṃ mā mā hāsīr asaṃtāpaṃ me hṛdayam astu | urvīgavyūtiḥsamudro asmi vidharmaṇā | nābhir ahaṃ rayīṇāṃ nābhir ahaṃ samānānāṃ bhūyāsam ||

svāsad asi sūṣā amṛtā martyeṣv ā | mā mā prāṇo 'vahāya parā gān mā māpāno 'vahāya parā gāt | sūryo māhnaḥ pātv agniḥ pṛthivyā vāyur antarikṣād yamo manuṣyebhyaḥ sarasvatī pārthivebhyaḥ | prāṇāpānau mā mā hāsiṣṭaṃ mā jane pra meṣi | svasty adyoṣaso doṣasaś ca sarvā āpaḥ sarvagaṇo aśīya ||
subhūr asi raśmir asy āyurdhā asy āyur mayi dhehi | (subhūr asi raśmir) asi varcodhā asi varco mayi dhehi ||
subhūr asi raśmir asi tejodhā asi tejo mayi dhehi ||
sūryo me varcodhā varco dadhātv indriyam asīndriyaṃ mayi dhehi varco asi varco mayi dhehi ||
śakvarī stha paśavo mopa stheṣur mitrāvaruṇā me prāṇāpānāv agnir me dakṣaṃ dadhātu ||
vidma te svapna janitraṃ pāpmanaḥ putro 'si yamasya karaṇaḥ | sa naḥ svapna suṣvapnyāt pāhi ||Bhatt. su(⟨ du)ṣvapnyāt
(…) janitraṃ grāhyāḥ putro (…) |see 1a (…) ||see 1b
(…) janitraṃ nirṛtyāḥ putro (…) |see 1a (…) ||see 1b
(…) janitram abhūtyāḥ putro (…) |see 1a (…) ||see 1b
(…) janitraṃ nirbhūtyāḥ putro (…) |see 1a (…) ||see 1b
(…) janitraṃ parābhūtyaḥ putro (…) |see 1a (…) ||see 1b
vidma te svapna janitraṃ devajāmīnāṃ putro 'si yamasya karaṇaḥ | sa naḥ svapna suṣvapnyāt pāhi ||read duṣvapnyāt?; see 1b

ajaiṣmādyāsanāmādyābhūmānāgaso vayam | uṣo yasmād duṣvapnyād abhaiṣmāpa taduccha| dviṣate tat parā vaha śapate tat parā vaha | yaṃ dviṣmo yaś ca no dveṣṭi tasmā enad gamayāmaḥ | uṣā devī vācā saṃvidānā vāg devī uṣasā saṃvidānā | uṣaspatir vācaspatinā saṃvidāno vācaspatir uṣaspatinā saṃvidānā | te 'muṣmai parā vahantvarāyāndurṇāmnāḥ sadānvā rakṣāṃsi | kumbhīkā dūṣīkāḥpīyakān| jāgradduṣvapnyaṃ svapneduṣvapnyam | anāgamiṣyatovarānavitteḥ | saṃkalpān amucyā druhaḥ pāśāt | tad amuṣyāgne parā vahantu devā vadhrir yathāsad vithuro na sādhuḥ | tad asmai gamayāma iti ||

evānevāva sā garat | asau māṃ dveṣṭi sa ātmānaṃ dveṣṭu yo māṃ dveṣṭi sa ātmānaṃ dveṣṭu | nir dviṣantaṃ divo niṣ pṛthivyā nir antarikṣād bhajāma | suyāmaṃś cākṣuṣā | idam aham amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putraṃ duṣvapnyād avadaye| yad adoado abhyagacchaṃ yad doṣā yat pūrvāṃ rātriṃBhatt. pūrvāṅ yad divā yan naktaṃ yaj jāgrato yat svapantaḥ | yad aharahar duṣvapnyam abhigacchāmi tasmād enam avadaye| taṃ jahi tena mandasva tasya pṛṣṭīr api śṛṇīhi taṃ prāṇo jahātu sa viprāṇo astu sa pra mīyatāṃ sa tato mā jīvīt ||

jitam asmākam udbhinnam asmākam ṛtam asmākaṃ tejo 'smākaṃ brahmāsmākaṃ svar asmākaṃ yajño 'smākaṃ paśavo 'smākaṃ vīrā asmākaṃ prajā asmākam | tasmān nir bhajāmo 'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram | sa grāhyāḥ pāśān mā moci | tasyedaṃ prāṇam āyur ni veṣṭayāmi- -idam enam adhamaṃ tamo gamayāmi ||

jitam asmākam udbhinnam asmākam ṛtam asmākaṃ tejo 'smākaṃ brahmāsmākaṃ svar asmākaṃ yajño 'smākaṃ paśavo 'smākaṃ vīrā asmākaṃ prajā asmākam | tasmān nir bhajāmo 'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram | sa mṛtyoḥpaḍvīśānmā moci | tasyedaṃ prāṇam āyur ni veṣṭayāmi- -idam enam adhamaṃ tamo gamayāmi ||

jitam asmākam udbhinnam asmākam abhy aṣṭhāṃ viśvāḥ pṛtanā arātīḥ svar abhyāvarte | sūryasyāvṛtam anvāvarte dakṣiṇām anvāvṛtam | tad agnir āha tad u soma āha pūṣā mā dhāt sukṛtasya loke | aganma svar aganma saṃ sūryasyajyotiṣāganma| vasyobhūyāya vasumān yajño vasu vaṃsīya vasumān bhūyāsam ||
viṣāsahiṃ sahamānaṃ sāsahānaṃ sahīyāṃsaṃ sahamānaṃ sahojitam | viśvajitaṃ svarjitam abhijitaṃ vasujitaṃ gojitaṃ saṃjitaṃ saṃdhanājitam | īḍyaṃ nāmahvayaindram āyuṣmān bhūyāsam ||
(…) |see 1abcd (…) indraṃ devānāṃ priyo bhūyāsam ||see 1e
(…) |see 1abcd (…) indraṃ prajānāṃ priyo bhūyāsam ||see 1e
viṣāsahiṃ sahamānaṃ sāsahānaṃ sahīyāṃsaṃ sahamānaṃ sahojitam | viśvajitaṃ svarjitam abhijitaṃ vasujitaṃ gojitaṃ saṃjitaṃ saṃdhanājitam | īḍyaṃ nāmahvayaindraṃ paśūnāṃ priyo bhūyāsam ||
ud ihy ud ihi sūrya varcasā mābhy ud ihi | dviṣaṃś ca mahyaṃ radhyatu mā cāhaṃ dviṣate radhaṃ taved viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi | tvaṃ naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhir viśvarūpaiḥ svadhāyaṃ no dhehi parame vyoman ||
ud ihy ud ihi sūrya varcasā mābhy ud ihi | yāṃś ca paśyāmi yāṃś ca na teṣu me sumatiṃkṛdhi taved viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi | tvaṃ naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhir viśvarūpaiḥ svadhāyaṃ no dhehi parame vyoman ||

mā tvā dabhan salile apsv antar ye pāśina upatiṣṭanty atra | hitvāśastiṃ divam ārukṣa etāṃ sa no mṛḍa sumatau te syāma taved viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi | tvaṃ naḥ prīṇīhi paśubhir viśvarūpaiḥ svadhāyaṃ no dhehi parame vyoman ||
tvaṃ na indra mahate saubhagāya- -adabdaiḥ pari pāhy aktubhis taved viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi | tvaṃ naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhir viśvarūpaiḥ svadhāyaṃ no dhehi parame vyoman ||

tvaṃ na indrotibhiḥ śivābhiḥ śaṃtamo bhava | ārohan tridivaṃ divo gṛṇānaḥ somapītaye priyadhāmā svastaye taved viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi | tvaṃ naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhir viśvarūpaiḥ svadhāyaṃ no dhehi parame vyoman ||

tvam indrāsi viśvavit sarvavit pūruhūtas tvam indremaṃ suhava stomam erayasva | śivābhis tanūbhir abhi naḥ sacasva taved viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi | tvaṃ naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhir viśvarūpaiḥ svadhāyaṃ no dhehi parame vyoman ||

adabdho divi pṛthivyām utāsi na taāpurmahimānam antarikṣe | adabdhena brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānaḥ sa tvaṃ na indra divi ṣaṃ śarma yaccha taved viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi | tvaṃ naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhir viśvarūpaiḥ svadhāyaṃ no dhehi parame vyoman ||
yā ta indratanūrapsv antar yāntar agnau yā pṛthivyāṃ yā ta indra pavamāne svarvidaḥ | yayendra tanvāntarikṣaṃ samāpitha tayā ta indra tanvā saṃśiśādhi taved (…) ||see 7efg
tvām indra brahmaṇā vardhayantaḥ satraṃ niṣedurṛṣayonādhamānāsBhatt. ṛrṣayo* taved (…) ||see 7efg

tvaṃ rakṣase pratiśaś catasrasread pradiśaś tvaṃ śociṣā nabhasī vi bhāsi | ṛtasya panthām anv eṣi vidvāṃs tvam imā viśvā bhuvanābhi tiṣṭhasi taved viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi | tvaṃ naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhir viśvarūpaiḥ svadhāyaṃ no dhehi parame vyoman ||

saptabhiḥ parāṅ tapasy ekayārvāṅ aśastim eṣi sudine bādhamānaḥ | tvaṃ tṛtaṃ tvaṃ paryeṣvitsaṃŚS eṣy útsam sahasradhāraṃ vitathaṃ svarvidaṃŚS vidáthaṃ taved viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi | tvaṃ naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhir viśvarūpaiḥ svadhāyaṃ no dhehi parame vyoman ||

tvam indras tvaṃ mahendraṃs tvaṃ viṣṇus tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ | tubhyaṃ yajño vi tāyate tubhyaṃ juhvati juhvatas taved viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi | tvaṃ naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhir viśvarūpaiḥ svadhāyaṃ no dhehi parame vyoman ||

asati sat pratiṣṭhitaṃ sati bhūtaṃ pratiṣṭhitam | bhūtaṃ ha bhavya āhitaṃ bhavyaṃ bhūte samāhitaṃ taved viṣṇo bahudhā vīryāṇi | tvaṃ naḥ pṛṇīhi paśubhir viśvarūpaiḥ svadhāyaṃ no dhehi parame vyoman ||
śukro 'si bhrājo 'si | sa yathā tvaṃ bhrājato bhrājo 'sy evāhaṃ bhrājato bhrājyāsam ||
rucir asi roco 'si | sa yathā tvaṃ rucyā roco 'sy evāhaṃ prajayā paśubhir brāhmaṇavarcasena rociṣīya ||
udyate nama udāyate nama uditāya namaḥ | virāje namaḥ svarāje namaḥ samrāje namaḥ ||
astaṃyate namo 'stameṣyate namo 'stamitāya namaḥ | virāje namaḥ svarāje namaḥ samrāje namaḥ ||
āditya nāvam ārukṣaṃ śatāritrāṃ svastaye | ahar no adya pīparad rātrī satrāti pārayāt ||
sūrya nāvam ārukṣaṃ śatāritrāṃ svastaye | rātrī no adya pīparad ahaḥ satrāti pārayāt ||
prajāpater āvṛto brahmaṇā varmaṇāhaṃ kaśyapasya jyotiṣā varcasā ca |Bhatt. va | (misprint) jaradaṣṭiḥ kṛtavīryo vihāyāḥ sahasrāyuḥ sukṛtaś careyam ||
ṛtena gupta ṛtubhiś ca sarvair bhūtena gupta uta bhavyena cāham | mā mā prāpann iṣavo daivyā yā mā mānuṣīr avasṛṣṭā vadhāya ||
parivṛto brahmaṇā varmaṇāhaṃ kaśyapasya jyotiṣā varcasā ca | mā mā prāpat pāpmā mota mṛtyur antar dadhe salilena vācaḥ ||
agnir mā gopāḥ pari pātu viśvato vyucchantīr uṣasaḥ parvatā dhruvā | udyan sūryo nudatāṃ mṛtyupāśān sahasraṃ prāṇā mayi te ramantām ||
o cit sakhāyaṃ sakhyāvavṛtyāṃ tiraḥpurū cid arṇavaṃ jaganvān | piturnapātamā dadhīta vedhā adhi kṣami prataraṃ dīdhyānaḥ ||
na te sakhā sakhyaṃ vaṣṭyetat salakṣmā yad viṣurūpā bhavāti | sahas putrāso asurasya vīrā divo dhartāra urviyā parikhyan||
uśanti ghā te amṛtāsa etad ekasyacittyajasaṃ martyasya | nite mano manasidhāyyasme janyuḥ patis tanvam āviviśyāḥ||
na yat purā cakṛmākaddha nūnam ṛtaṃ vadanto anṛtaṃrapema| gandharvo apsv apyā ca yoṣā sā no nābhiḥ paramaṃ jātaman nau ||
garbhe nū nau janitā dampatī kar devas tvaṣṭā savitā viśvarūpaḥ | nakir asya pra minanti vratāni veda nāv asya pṛthivī uta dyauḥ ||
ko adya yuṅkte dhuri gā ṛtasya śimīvato bhāminodurhaṇāyūn| āsanniṣūnhṛtasvasomayobhūn ya eṣāṃ bhṛtyām ṛṇadhatsajīvāt ||
ko asya veda prathamasyāhnaḥ kaīṃdadarśa ka iha pra vocat | bṛhan mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma kad ubravaāhanovīcyānṝn ||
yamasya māyamyaṃkāma āgan samāne yonausahaśeyyāya| jāyeva patye tanvaṃriricyāṃ vicidvṛheva rathyeva cakrā ||
natiṣṭhatina ni miṣanty ete devānāṃspaśaihayecaranti | anyena mad āhano yāhi bhūyaṃ tena vi vṛha rathyeva cakrā ||
rātrībhir asmā ahabhir daśasyetBhatt. daśasye(t) sūryasyacakṣurmuhur un mimīyāt | divā pṛthivyā mithunā sabandhū yamīr yamasya vivṛhed ajāmi ||
ā ghā tā gacchān uttarā yugāni yatrajāmayaḥkṛṇavann ajāmi | upa barbṛhi vṛṣabhāya bāhum anyamicchasva subhage patiṃ mat ||
kiṃ bhrātāsadyadanāthaṃ bhavāti kim u svasā yan nirṛtir nigacchāt | kāmamūtābahvetadrapāmiBhatt. vahv tanvāmetanvaṃsaṃ pipṛgdhi ||
na vā u te tanvā tanvaṃ saṃ papṛcyāṃ pāpam āhur yaḥ svasāraṃ nigacchāt | anyenamattaḥ pramudaḥ kalpayasva na te bhrātā subhage vaṣṭy etat ||
na te nāthaṃ yamy atrāham asmi na te nūnaṃ tanvā saṃ papṛcyām | asaṃyad etan manaso hṛdo me bhrātā svasuḥ śayane yacchayīya||
bato batāsi yama naiva te mano hṛdayaṃ cāvidāma | anyā kila tvāṃ kakṣeva yuktaṃ pari ṣvajāte libujeva vṛkṣam ||
tasya vā tvaṃ mana iccha sa vā tava- -adhā kṛṇusva saṃvidaṃ subhadrām ||
trīṇi chandāṃsi kavayo vi cetire pururūpaṃ darśataṃ viśvacakṣaṇam | vātā āpa oṣadhayas tāny ekasminbhuvanaārpitāni||
vṛṣā vṛṣṇe duduhe dohasā divaḥ payāṃsiyahvoaditer adābhyaḥ | viśvaṃ sa veda varuṇo yathā dhiyā sayajñiyoyajati yajñiyām̐ ṛtūn ||
rapad gandharvīr apyā ca yoṣaṇā nadasya nāde pari pātu no manaḥ | iṣṭasya madhye aditir nu pātu no bhrātā no jyeṣṭhaḥ prathamo vi vocati ||
socinnu bhadrā kṣumati yaśasvaty uṣā uvāsa manave svarvatī | yad īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agniṃhotāraṃ vidathāya jījanan ||
adha tyaṃdrapsaṃvibhavaṃ vicakṣaṇaṃ dvir ābharad viṣitaḥ śyeno adhvare | yadi viśo vṛṇate dasmam āryā agniṃ hotāram adha dhīr ajāyata ||
sadāsi raṇvo yavasevapuṣyate hotrābhir agne manuṣaḥ svadhvaraḥ |Bhatt. manuṣa(ḥ) viprasya vāyacchaśamānaukthyaṃ vājaṃ śasyavām̐upayāhibhūribhiḥ ||
ud īraya pitarā jāra ābhiśam iyakṣati haryatohṛttaiṣyati | vivakti vahniḥ svapasyatemakhas taviṣyateasuro vepate matīn ||
yas te agne sumatiṃ martyo akṣata sahasaḥsūno'ti sa pra śṛṇve | iṣaṃ dadhāno vahamānoaśvair ā sadyumām̐amavānbhūṣatidyūn ||
śrudhīno agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣyu ratham amṛtasya dravitnum |Bhatt. dravitnu(m) ā no vaha rodasī vedaputre mākir devānām apa bhūr iha syāḥ ||
yad agna eṣā samitir bhavāti devī deveṣu yajatā yajatra | ratnā ca yad vi bhajāsi svadhāvo bhāgaṃ no atra vasumantaṃvītāt||
praty agnir uṣasām agram akhyat praty ahāni prathamo jātavedāḥ | prati sūryasya purutrā ca raśmīn prati dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatāna ||
anv agnir uṣasām agram akhyad anvahāni prathamo jātavedāḥ | anu sūryasya purutrā ca raśmīn anu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatāna ||
dyāvā ha kṣāmā prathame ṛtena- -abhisrāve bhavataḥ pratyavācāḥ | devo yan martān yatathāya kṛṇvanBhatt. marttāṃ sīdad dhotā pratyaṅ svam asūn ||
devo devān paribhūr ṛtena vahā no havyaṃ prathamaś cikitvān | dhūmaketuḥ samidhā bhāṛjīko mandrohotā nityo vācāyajīyān||
arcāmi vāṃ vardhāyāpoghṛtasnūBhatt. varcā(⟨ rdhā)yāpo dyāvābhūmi śṛṇutaṃ rodasī me | ahā yad devā asunītimāyan madhvā no atra pitarā śaśītām ||
svāvṛgdevasyāmṛtaṃ yadīgor ato jātāsodhārayantaurvī | viśve devā anu tat teyajurgur duhe yad enī divyaṃ ghṛtaṃ vāḥ ||
kiṃ svin no rājā jagṛhe kad asya- -ati vrataṃ cakṛmā ko vi veda | mitraś ciddhiṣmā juhurāṇo devān śloko na yātān api vājo asti ||
durmantv atrāmṛtasya nāma salakṣmā yadviṣurūpābhavāti | yamasya yo manavate sumantv agne tam ṛṣva pāhy aprayucchan ||
yasmin devā vidathe mādayante vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante | sūrye jyotir adadhur māsyaktūn paritaddyotanaṃ carato ajasrā ||
yasmin devā manmani saṃcaranty apācye tye na vayam asya vidma | mitro no atrāditir anāgān savitā devo varuṇāya vocat ||
sakhāya ā śiṣāmahe brahmendrāya vajriṇe | stuṣaūṣunṛtamāya dhṛṣṇave ||
śavasā hy asiśruto vṛtrahatyenavṛtrahā | maghair maghono atiśūradāsasi ||
stego na kṣāmatyeṣi pṛthivīṃ mahī nu vātā ihāvāntubhūmau | mitro no atra varuṇo ajyamāno 'gnirvanena vy asṛṣṭa śokam ||
stuhi śrutaṃ gartasadaṃ janānāṃ rājānaṃ bhīmam upahatnumugram| mṛḍā jaritre rudra stavāno anyaṃ te asman ni vapantusenyam||
sarasvatīṃ devayanto havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne | sarasvatīṃ sukṛtohvayantaread 'hvayanta? sarasvatī dāśuṣevāryaṃdāt ||Bhatt. vāryan
sarasvatīṃyāṃpitaro havante dakṣiṇā yajñamabhinakṣamāṇāḥ| āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayasva- -anamīvāiṣa ā dhehyasme||
sarasvatī yā sarathaṃ yayātha- -ukthaiḥ svadhābhir devi pitṛbhirmadantī| sahasrārghamiḍoatra bhāgaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ yajamānāya dhehi ||
ud īratām avara ut parāsa un madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ | asuṃ yaīyuravṛkā ṛtajñās te no 'vantu pitaro haveṣu ||
āhaṃ pitṝn suvidatrām̐avitsi napātaṃ ca vikramaṇaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ | barhiṣado ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvas ta ihāgamiṣṭhāḥ ||
idaṃ pitṛbhya ity ekā ||PS 2.30.3 is repeated
mātalī kavair yamo aṅgirobhir bṛhaspatirṛkmabhirvāvṛdhānaḥ | yāṃś ca devā vāvṛdhur ye ca devān svāhān ye svadhayān ye madanti ||
svāduṣ kilāyaṃ madhumām̐ utāyaṃ tīvraḥ kilāyaṃ rasavām̐ utāyam | uto nv asya papivām̐sam indraṃ na kaś cana sahata āhaveṣu ||
pareyivāṃsaṃ pravato mahīr anu bahubhyaḥ panthāmanupaspaśānaḥ| vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānāṃ yamaṃ rājānaṃ haviṣā duvasya ||
yamo no gātuṃ prathamo viveda naiṣāgavyūtirapabhartavāu | yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyur enājajñānāḥpathyā anu svāḥ ||
barhiṣadaḥ pitaraūtyarvāg imā vo havyā cakṛmā juṣadhvam | ta āgatāvasāśaṃtamena- -athā naḥ śaṃ yor arapo dadhāta ||
ācyā jānu dakṣiṇato niṣadya- -imaṃ yajñam abhi gṛṇīta viśve | māhiṃsiṣṭapitaraḥ kena cin no yad vaāgaḥpuruṣatākarāma||
tvaṣṭā duhitrevahatuṃkṛṇoti- -idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ sam eti | yamasya mātāparyuhyamāṇā maho jāyā vivasvato nanāśa ||
prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūrvebhir yatrāte pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ | ubhā rājānā svadhayā madantā yamaṃ paśyāsi varuṇaṃ ca devam ||
apeta vīta vi ca sarpatāto 'sma etaṃ pitaro lokam akran | ahobhir adbhir aktubhir vyaktaṃBhatt. a(ho)bhir yamodadātyavasānam asmai ||
uśantas tvā ni dhīmahy uśantaḥsam idhīmahi | uśann uśata ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave ||
dyumantas tvā ni dhīmahi dyumantaḥ sam idhīmahi | dyumān dyumata ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave ||
aṅgiraso naḥ pitaro navagvā atharvāṇo bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ | teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma ||
aṅgirobhiryajñiyairāgahīha yama vairūpair iha mādayasva | vivasvantaṃ huve yaḥ pitā te asmin yajñe barhiṣy āniṣadya||Bhatt. varhiṣy
imaṃyamaprastaram ā hi sīda- -aṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ | ā tvā mantrāḥ kaviśastāvahanty enā rājan haviṣo mādayasva ||
yamāya somaṃ sunuta yamāya juhutā haviḥ | yamaṃhayajñogacchatv agnidūto araṃkṛtaḥ ||
yamāya ghṛtavad dhavir juhotā pra ca tiṣṭhata | sa nojīveṣvā yamadBhatt. yama(d) dīrgham āyuṣ yad īyase ||
yamāya madhumattamaṃ rājñe havyaṃ juhotana | idaṃ nama ṛṣibhyaḥpūrvajebhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥpathikṛdbhyaḥ ||
trikadrukebhiḥ patati ṣaḍurvīr ekam id bṛhat | triṣṭubgāyatrī chandāṃsi sarvā tā yama ārpitā ||
mainam agne vi daho mā vi śoco māsya tvacaṃ cakṣuṣo mā śarīram | yadā śṛtaṃ kṛṇavo jātavedo 'them enaṃ pra hiṇutāt pitṛbhyaḥ ||
śṛtaṃ yadā karasi jātavedo 'them enaṃ pari dattāt pitṛbhyaḥ | yadā gacchātyasunītimeṣo 'thā devānāṃ vaśanīr bhavāti ||
sūryaṃ cakṣur gacchatu vātam ātmā divaṃ ca gaccha pṛthivīṃ ca dharmaṇā | apo vā gaccha yadi tatra te hitam oṣadhīṣu prati tiṣṭhā śarīraiḥ ||
ajo bhāgas tapasas taṃ tapasva taṃ te śocis tapatu taṃ te arciḥ | yās te śivās tanvo jātavedas tābhir vahainaṃ sukṛtām ulokam ||
yās te śocayo raṃhayo jātavedas tanvaḥ krūrāḥ parīṅkhayante | ajaṃ yantam anu tās tesamṛṇvatām athetarābhiḥ śivatamābhiḥ śṛtaṃ kṛdhi ||
ava sṛja punar agne pitṛbhyo yas ta āhutaś carati svadhābhiḥ | āyur vasāna upa yātu śeṣaḥ saṃ gacchatāṃ tanvā suvarcāḥ ||
ati drava sārameyauśvānau caturakṣau śabalau sādhunāpathā| adhā pitṝn suvidatrām̐ upehi yamena ye sadhamādaṃ madanti ||
yau te śvānau yama rakṣitārau caturakṣau pathirakṣī nṛcakṣasā | tābhyām enaṃ pari dhehi rājan svasti cāsmā anamīvaṃ ca dhehi ||
urūṇasāv ity ekā ||PS 10.9.10 is repeated
somaekebhyaḥpavate ghṛtam eka upāsate | yebhyo madhu prajāvati tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt ||
ye capūrvaṛtasācā ṛtajātā ṛtāyavaḥ | pitṝn tapasvato yama tapojām̐api gacchatāt ||
tapasā ye anādhṛṣyās tapasā yesvaryayuḥ | tapoyecakrire mahas tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt ||
sahasraṇīthāḥ kavayo ye gopāyanti sūryam | ṛṣīn tapasvato yama tapojām̐ api gacchatāt ||
ye yudhyante pradhaneṣu śūrāsoye tanūtyajaḥ | ye vā sahasradakṣiṇās taṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt ||
syonāsmaipṛthivībhava- -anṛkṣarā niveśinī | yacchāsmai śarma saprathāḥ ||Bhatt. saprathā(ḥ)
asaṃbādhe pṛthivyāBhatt. -vādhe urauloke mahīyate | svadhā yāścakṛṣejīvaṃ tās te santu madhuścutaḥ ||
hvayāmite namasā ma imaṃ gṛham upajujuṣāṇaehi | saṃ gacchasva pitṛbhir yac ca dattaṃ syonās tvā vātā upavāntuśagmāḥ ||
ā tvā vahantu maruta udavāhā udaplutaḥ | ajenakṛṇvantaḥ śītaṃ varṣeṇo yantu bāl iti ||
udahvam āyur āyuṣe kratve dakṣāya jīvase | svāṅ gacchatu te mano adhā pitṝn api drava ||
mā te mano māsur aṅgānāṃmāramaśca te | mā tehāstatanvaḥ kiṃcaneha||
mā vṛkṣaḥ saṃ bādhiṣṭa mā devī pṛthivī mahī | lokaṃ pitṛṣuvittvā- -edhasva yamarājasu ||
yat te aṅgaṃ vinihitaṃ parācair apānaḥ prāṇo ya u te paretaḥ | yat te saṃgatya pitaraḥ sanīḍā ghāse ghāsam ā sādayantu ||
apemaṃ jīvā arudhan gṛhebhyas taṃ nirūhatapari grāmād itaḥ | mṛtyoyamasyāsi dūtaḥ pracetā asūn pitṛbhyo gamayāṃ cakartha ||
ye dasyavaḥ pitṛṣu praviṣṭā jñātimukhā ahutādaś caranti | parāpuro nipuro ye caranti tān asmād yajñāt pradhamantudevāḥ ||
saṃ viśantv iha pitaraḥ svā naḥ syonaṃ kṛṇvantu pratiranta āyuḥ | tebhyaḥ śakema haviṣā yakṣamāṇā jyog jīvantaḥ śaradaḥpurūcīḥ||
yāṃ te dhenuṃ nigṛṇāmi yaṃ vā te kṣīra odanam | tenā janasyāsau bhartā yo 'trāsad ajīvanaḥ ||
aśvāvatīṃ pra tara yāsuśevā ṛkṣīkāṃ vā prataraṃ navīyaḥ | yas tvā jaghānavadhyaḥso astu mā so anyadvidatabhāgadheyam ||
yamaḥ parastād avaro vivasvān tataḥ paro nāti paśyāmy anyat | yame adhvaro adhi me niviṣṭo bhuve vivasvān anvātatāna ||
apāgūhann amṛtāṃ martyebhyaḥ kṛtvī suparṇām adadhur vivasvate | utāśvināv abharad yat tad āsīd ajahād u dvā mithunā saraṇyūḥ ||
ye nikhātā yeparoptā ye dagdhā ye coddhitāḥ | sarvāṃs tān agna ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave ||
ye ceha pitaro ye ceha na yāṃś ca vidma yām̐ u ca na pravidma | tvaṃ vettha yadi te jātavedaḥ svadhābhir yajñaṃ sukṛtaṃ juṣantām ||
śaṃ tapa māti tapo agne mā tanvaṃ tapaḥ | vaneṣuśuṣmo astu te pṛthivyām astu yaddharaḥ||
dadāmy asmā avasānam etad ya eṣa āgan mamacedabhūd iha | yamaś cikitvān praty etad āha mamaiṣa rāya upa tiṣṭhatām iha ||

idam id vā u nāparaṃ jarasītautāparam | jāyā patim iva vāsasā- -abhy enaṃ bhūma ūrṇuhi ||
abhi tvorṇomi pṛthivyā mātur vastreṇa bhadrayā | jīveṣu bhadraṃ tan mayi svadhā pitṛṣv amā tava ||

āyur viśvāyuḥ pari pātu tvā pūṣā tvā pātu prapathe purastāt | yatrāsatesukṛtoyatra te yayus tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātu ||
idaṃ tvā vāsaḥ prathamaṃ naāgannBhatt.āgant(misprint?) apaitad ūha yadihābibhaḥpurā | iṣṭāpūrtam anu saṃ krāma vidvān yatra te gacchaṃ bahudhā tatra gaccha ||

ud īrṣvā nāry abhi jīvalokaṃ gātāsum enaṃ tam upaśeṣaehi | hastagrābhasya dadhiṣos tavedaṃ patyur janitvam abhi saṃ babhūvitha ||
apaśyaṃyuvatīṃ nīyamānāṃ jīvāṃmṛtebhyaḥ pariṇīyamānām |Bhatt. jīvā andhena yat tamasāprāvṛtāsīt prāktoavācīmanayaṃtad enām ||
prajānatyaghnye jīvalokaṃ bhavantī devānāṃ panthām anusaṃcarantī | eṣa te gopatis taṃ juṣasva svargaṃ lokam adhi rohayainam ||
upa dyām upavetasam avattaro nadīnām | agnepittamapām asi ||
yaṃ tvam agne samadahas tam u nir vāpayā punaḥ | kiyāṃbuvatrarohatu śāṇḍadūrvāvyalkaśā||
idaṃ ta ekaṃ para u ta ekaṃ tṛtīyena jyotiṣā saṃ viśasva | saṃveśane tanvaś cārur edhi priyo devānāṃ parame sadhasthe ||
ut tiṣṭha prehi pra drava- -okaḥ kṛṇuṣva salile sadhasthe | tatra tvaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ saṃ somena madasva saṃ svadhābhiḥ ||
pra cyavasva tanvaḥ saṃ bharasva mā te gātraṃ vihāyimo śarīram | manoniviṣṭamamanu saṃ pra viśasva yatra bhūmer juṣase tatra gaccha ||
varcasā māṃ pitaraḥ somyāso añjantu devā madhvā ghṛtena | cakṣuṣo mā prataraṃ tārayanto jarase mā jaradaṣṭiṃ vardhayantu ||
varcasā māṃ sam anakty agnir medhāṃ me viṣṇurnyanakty āsani |Bhatt. meṃ rayiṃ me viśve ni yacchantu devāḥ śuddhā āpaḥ pavanair mā pūnantu ||
mitrāvaruṇā pari mām adhātām ādityā mā svaravo vardhayantu | varco ma indro ny anaktuhastayor jaradaṣṭiṃ mā savitā kṛṇotu ||
yo mamāra prathamo martyānāṃ yaḥ preyāya prathamo lokam etam | vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānāṃ yamaṃ rājānaṃ haviṣā duvasya ||
parā yāta pitara ā ca yāta-Bhatt. yāta ayaṃ (without sandhi) -ayaṃ vo yajño madhvā samaktaḥ | datto asmabhyaṃ draviṇeha bhadrā rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīraṃ dadhāta ||

yad vo rudraṃ pitaraḥ somyaṃ careadmudraṃwith ŚS teno sacadhvaṃ svayaśaso hi bhūta | te arvāṇaḥ kavaya ā śṛṇota suvidatrā vidathe hūyamānāḥ ||
ye atrayo aṅgiraso navagvā iṣṭāvanto rātiṣāco dadhānāḥ | dakṣiṇāvantaḥ sukṛto ya ustha-Bhatt.sthāāsadyā- -āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam ||
adhā yathā naḥ pitaraḥ parāsaḥ pratnāso agna ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ | śucīd ayandīdhitimukthaśasaḥ kṣāmā bhindanto aruṇīr upa bruvan ||
sukarmāṇaḥ suruco devayanto ayo na devā janimā dhamantaḥ | śucanto agniṃ vavṛdhanta indram urvīṃ gavyāṃ barhiṣadaṃ no akran ||
ā yūtheva kṣumati paśvoakhyad devānāṃ yaj janimānty ugraḥ | mārtānāṃcidurvaśīr akṛpran vṛdhecidaryauparasyāyoḥ||Bhatt. nṛdhecid

ā sīdataṃ svam ulokaṃ vidāne svāsasthe bhavatamindavenaḥ | yuje vāṃ brahma pūrvyaṃ namobhir vi śloka eti pathyeva sūreḥ ||

bṛhaspatiṃ yajñām̐ akṛṇvata rṣiṃ priyāṃ yamas tanvaṃ prārirekha| tvam agna īḍito jātavedo avāḍḍhavyānī surabhīṇikṛtvī| prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā teakṣann addhitvaṃ deva prayatā havīṃṣi ||Bhatt. adhi tvaṃ
āsīnāso aruṇīnām upasthe rayiṃ dhatta dāśuṣe martyāya | putrebhyaḥ pitaras tasya vasvaḥ pra yacchata taihorjaṃdadhāta ||
agniṣvattāḥpitara eha gacchata sadaḥsadaḥsadatasupraṇītayaḥ | attā havīṃṣi prayatāni barhiṣi rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīraṃ dadhāta ||
upahūtāḥ pitaraḥ somyāso barhiṣv eṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu | ta ā gamantu ta iha śruvantv adhi bruvantu te 'vantv asmān ||
ye naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ somyāsoBhatt. na(ḥ) anūhiresomapīthaṃvasisthāḥ| tebhir yamaḥ saṃrarāṇo havīṃṣy uśann uśadbhiḥ pratikāmamattu||Bhatt. aktu
yetātṛṣurdevatrā jīhamānā hotrāvidastomataṣṭāsoarkaiḥ| āgne yāhi suvidatryebhir arvāk satyaiḥ kavyaiḥ pitṛbhir gharmasadbhiḥ ||
ye satyāso havirado haviṣyā indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ dadhānāḥ | āgneyāhi sahasraṃdevavandaiḥ paraiḥ pūrvaiḥ pitṛbhir gharmasadbhiḥ ||
upa sarpa mātaraṃ bhūmim etām uruvyacasaṃpṛthivīṃsuśevām| ūrṇamradāḥpṛthivī dakṣiṇāvata eṣā tvā pātu nirṛter upasthāt ||
ucchvañcasvapṛthivimā ni bādhathāḥ sūpāyanāsmaibhava sūpavañcanā | mātā putraṃ yathā sicā- -abhy enaṃ bhūmaūrṇuhi||
ucchvañcamānāpṛthivī su tiṣṭhatu sahasraṃ mita upa hi śrayantām | te gṛhāso ghṛtaścutaḥ syonā viśvāhāsmaiśaraṇāḥ santv atra ||
uttestabhnāti pṛthivīṃ tvat pari- -imaṃ lokaṃ vidadhan mo aharṣam | etāṃsthūṇāṃpitaro dhārayantv atrā yamaḥ sadanā te kṛṇotu ||
atharvā pūrṇaṃ camasaṃ yam indrāyābibhar vājinīvate | tasmin kṛṇotu sukṛtasya lokaṃ tasminn induḥ pavate viśvadānīm ||
amum agne camasaṃ mā vi jijñaraḥBhatt. (⟨jihvaraḥ) priyo devānām upa somyānām | eṣa yaś camaso devapānas tasminn evā amṛtā mādayante ||
yat te kṛṣṇaḥ śakunaātutoda pipīlaḥ sarpa uta vāśvāpadaḥ| agniṣ ṭad viśvād ā pṛṇātu vidvān somaścā yo brāhmaṇām̐ āviveśa ||
payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvān māmakaṃ vacaḥ | atho payasvad yat payas tena mā saha jinvatha ||
imā narīty ekā ||PS 17.47.1 is repeated
saṃgacchasva pitṛbhiḥ saṃ yamena-Bhatt. pitṛmiḥ (misprint) -iṣṭāpūrtena parame vyoman | hitvāvadyaṃpunar astam ehiBhatt. hitvā vāvadyaṃ saṃ gacchasva tanvā suvarcāḥ ||
ye agnidagdhā ye 'nagnidagdhā madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayante |Bhatt. divaḥ(ḥ) tebhyaḥ svarāḍ asunītim etāṃ yathāvaśaṃtanvaṃkalpayāti ||

vivasvān no 'bhayaṃ kṛṇotu paraitu mṛtyur amṛtaṃ na aitu | iha me vīrā bahavo bhavantv aśvāvad goman mayy astu puṣṭam ||
vivasvān no 'mṛtatve dadhātu yaḥ sutrāmājīradānuḥsudānuḥ| imān rakṣaḥ puruṣān ā jarimṇoBhatt. jarimṇostā mo ṣv eṣāmasavoyamaṃguḥ ||
yodadhre antarikṣeṇa mahnā pitṝṇāṃ kaviḥ pramatir matīnām | tam arcata viśvamitrā havirbhiḥ sa no yamaḥ prataraṃjīvasedhāt ||
ā rohata divam uttamām ṛṣayo mā bibhītana | somapāḥsomapāyinaBhatt.somapāyinaḥ idaṃvaḥkriyate havir aganma jyotir uttamam ||
pra ketuna bṛhatā bhāty agnir ā rodasī vṛṣabho roravīti | divaś cidantām̐upamām̐ud ānaḍ apām upasthe mahiṣo vavardha ||
nāke suparṇam upa yat patantaṃ hṛdā venanto abhyacakṣata tvā | hiraṇyapakṣaṃ varuṇasya dūtaṃ yamasya yonau śakunaṃ bhuraṇyam ||
indra kratuṃ na ā bhara pitā putrebhyo yathā | śikṣā ṇo asmin puruhūta vājini jīvā jyotiraśīmahi||

ā rohata janitrīṃ jātavedasaḥ pitṛyānaiḥ saṃ va ā rohayāmi | avāḍ ḍhvyeṣitā havyavāha ījānaṃyuktāḥsukṛtaṃ dhatta loke ||
devā yajñam ṛtavaḥ kalpayanti haviḥ puroḍāśāṃsrucoyajña āyudhāni | tebhiryāhipathibhir devayānair yair ījānāḥ svargaṃ yanti lokam ||
ṛtasya panthām anu paśya sādhv aṅgirasaḥ sukṛto yena yanti vradhnasya viṣṭapy adhi vikramasva yatrādityā amṛtam īkṣayanti ||
trayaḥ suparṇā uparasyāsakhāyū nākasya pṛṣṭhe adhi viṣṭapi śritāḥ | svargā lokā amṛtena viṣṭāBhatt. viṣṭā(ḥ) kāmaṃkāmaṃ yajamānāya duhrām ||
juhūrdādhāra dyām upahṛd antarikṣaṃ dhruvāṃ dādhāra pṛthivīṃ pratiṣṭhām | pratimā lokānāṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭhā prapīnāṃBhatt. ghṛtapṛṣṭhā(ḥ) svadhām ūrjaṃ yajamānāya duhrām ||
dhruva ā roha pṛthivīṃ viśvavedasam antarikṣam upahṛd ā kramasva | juhudyāṃgaccha yajamānena sākaṃ sruvenavatsena diśaḥ prapīnāḥ sarvā dhukṣā ahṛṇīyamānāḥ ||

aṅgirasām ayanaṃ pūrvo agnir ādityānām ayanaṃ gārhapatyo dakṣiṇānām ayanaṃ dakṣiṇāgniḥ | padmānam agner vihitasya brāhmaṇā samaṅgaḥ sarva upa yāhi śagmam ||
pūrvo agnis tvā tapatuśaṃpurastāc chaṃ paścāt tapatu gārhapatyaḥ | dakṣiṇāgnis tapatu śarma varma- -uttarato madhyato antarikṣād diśodiśo agne pari pāhi ghorāt ||
yūyam agne śantamābhis tanūbhir ījāno abhi lokaṃ svargam | aśva bhūtvā pṛṣṭivāho vahātha yatra devaiḥ sadhamādaṃ madanti ||
śam agne paścāt tapaśaṃpurastāc cham adharāt tapa jātavedaḥ | ekas tredhā vihito jātavedaḥ samyaṅenaṃ dakṣiṇāgniḥ ||

padmānam agner vihitasya brahmaṇā samaṅganaṃ dhehi sukṛtām ulokam | tam agnayaḥsamiddhāā bharantāṃBhatt. samidhā prajāpatyaṃmedhyaṃjātavedasaḥ | śṛtaṃ kṛṇvanta iha mā vi cakṣaṇan ||Bhatt. cakṣaṇaṃ (⟨ ṇan*)

yās te dhānāanukirāmi tilamiśrāḥsvadhāvatīḥ | tās te santuvibhvīḥprabhvīsBhatt. vibhvī(ḥ)+ tās te rājānu manyatāṃ yamo akṣitaṃbhūyāṃsam||
drapsaś caskanda prathamām anu dyām imaṃ ca yonim anu yaś ca pūrvaḥ | ṛtasya yonim anu saṃcarantaṃ drapsaṃ juhomy anu sapta hotrāḥ ||
śatadhāraṃ vāyum arkaṃ svarvidaṃ nṛcakṣasas te abhi cakṣate rayim | ye gṛṇanti pra ca yakṣanti sarvadā teduhratedakṣiṇāṃ saptamātaram ||
utsanduhanti kalaśaṃcaturbilaṃ mṛḍāṃdhenuṃmadhumatīṃ svastaye | ūrjaṃmadantīm aditiṃ janeṣv agne mā hiṃsīḥ parame vyoman ||

dhānā dhenur bhavad vatso asyās tilo 'bhavat | tāṃ tvaṃ yamasya rājye +'kṣitām upajīvatāt||Bhatt. akṣitam
etās te asau dhānāḥ kāmadughā bhavantu | enīḥśyenīrvirūpāḥ sarūpās tilavatsāupa tiṣṭhantu tvāt ||
enīr dhānā hariṇīḥ śyenīr āsu kṛṣṇā dhānā hariṇīrdhenavaste | tilavatsā ūrjam asmai duhānā viśvahā santv anapasphurantīḥ ||Bhatt. -rantī(ḥ)
vaiśvānarehavir idaṃ juhomy etaṃ sāhasraṃ śatadhāram utsam | sa bibharat pitaraṃ pitāmahaṃ prapitāmahān bibharat pinvamānaḥ ||
utsaṃśatadhāram akṣitaṃ vyacamānaṃ salilasya pṛṣṭhe | ūrjaṃ duhānamanapasphurantam upāsatāṃ sukṛtāṃ yatra lokaḥ ||
idaṃ kasāmbucayanenacittaṃ tat sajātā ava paśyateta | martyoamṛtyumamṛtatvaeti tasmai lokaṃ kṛṇuta yāvatsabandhu ||
ihaivaidhi dhanasanir iha citta ihakratuḥ | ihaidhi vīravattaro vayodhā aparāhitaḥ ||

āpo agniṃ pra hiṇutemaṃ yajñaṃ pitaro no juṣantām | māsīnām ūrjam upa ye sacante te no rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ niyacchān||Bhatt. ni yacchāt
sam indhate amartyaṃ havyavāhaṃ ghṛtapriyam | sa veda nihitān nidhīn pitṝnparāvatogatān||
yaṃte manthaṃ yaṃ kalambhaṃ yam odanaṃ yan māsaṃnipṛṇāmite |Bhatt. nipṛṇāma* te te santu svadhāvanto madhamanto ghṛtaścutaḥ ||
sarasvatīṃ yāṃ sukṛto havante dakṣiṇā yajñamabhinakṣamāṇāḥ| sahasrāyormainān atra parā dā dīrgham eṣām āyuṣ kṛṇu viśvarūpe ||
idaṃ pūrvam aparaṃ niyānaṃ yena te pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ | purogavā ye abhiśāco asyaBhatt. abhiśā(⟨ ṣā)co te tvā vahantu sukṛtām ulokam ||
pṛthivīṃ tvā pṛthivyām ā veśayāmi devo no dhātā savitāty āyuḥ | parāpuraitā vasuvidvoastvBhatt. purī(⟨ rai)tā adhā mṛtaiḥ pitaraḥ saṃ bhavātha ||
eyam agan dakṣiṇā bhadrato no anena dattā sudughā vayodhāḥ |Bhatt. vayodhā(ḥ) yauvane jīvām̐ api pṛñcatī jarāBhatt. (jarā) parā pitṛbhya upa saṃ parāṇayāt ||
ā pra cyavethām apa taṃ nudethāṃ yad vām abhibhā atroduḥ | arvāñ cāvetam aghnyau tad vaśīyo dātre pitṛṣv iha bhojanau mama ||
idaṃ pitṛbhyaḥ pra harāmi barhir jīvaṃ devebhya uttaraṃ stṛṇāmi | tad ā roha puruṣo medhyo bhavan prati tva jānantu pitaraḥ paretam ||
evaṃ barhir asado medhyo bhavan prati tva jānantu pitaraḥ paretam | yathāparu tanvaṃ saṃ bharasva gātrāṇi te brahmaṇā kalpayāmi ||
parṇo rājāpidhānaṃcarūṇām ūrjo balaṃ saha ojo na āgan | āyur jīvebhyo vidadhad dīrghayutvāya śataśāradāya ||
ūrjo bhāgo ya idaṃyajānām aśmānnānām adhipatir babhūva | tamarcataviśvamitrā havirbhiḥ sa no yamaḥ prataraṃjīvasedhāt ||
yathā yamāya harmyam avapan pañca mānavāḥ | evāvapāmiharmyaṃBhatt. vapāpāmi (vapāmi?) yathā mebhūrayo'satha ||
idaṃ hiraṇyaṃbibhṛhi yat te pitābibhaḥ purā | svargaṃ yataḥpiturhastaṃ nir mṛḍḍhī dakṣiṇam ||
ye jīvā ye ca mṛtā ye jātā ye ca yajñiyāḥ | tebhyo ghṛtasya kulyaitu śatadhārā vy undatī ||
vṛṣā matīnāṃ pavatevicakṣaṇaḥ sūroahnāṃ pratarītoṣasāṃ divaḥ | prāṇaḥ sindhūnāṃ kalaśām̐ acikradadBhatt. kalaśāṃ indrahārdivamāviśanmanīṣayā||
tveṣas te dhūmā ūrṇoti divi ṣaṃ chuka ātataḥ | sūrona hidyatātvāṃ kṛpā pāvaka rocase ||
pra vā etīndur indrasya niṣkṛtiṃ sakhā sakhyur na pra mināti saṅgiram | marya iva yoṣāḥ sam arṣate somaḥkalaśeśatayāmanāpathā ||
āyatapitaraḥ somyāso gambhīrebhiḥ pathibhiḥ pitṛyāṇaiḥ |Bhatt. gabhbhīrebhiḥ, misprint prajām asmabhyaṃ dadhato rayiṃ ca dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya ||
parā yāta pitaraḥ somyāso gambhīrebhiḥ pathibhiḥ pitṛyāṇaiḥ | adhā māsi punar āyātano gṛhaṃBhatt. panar, misprint havir annaṃ suprajasaḥ suvīrāḥ ||
akṣann amīmadanta- -ava priyā adhūṣata | astoṣatasvabhānavaḥ paretapitaro gṛhān ||
yad vo agnirajahādekam aṅgaṃ pitṛlokaṃ gamayaṃ jātavedāḥ | tadva etat punar ā veśayāmi sāṅgāḥ sarve pitaro mādayadhvam ||
asauhā iha te manaḥ | kaputsalam iva jāmayo 'bhy enaṃ bhūma ūrṇūhi ||
ramadhvaṃ mā bibhītanā asmin goṣṭhe karīṣiṇaḥ | ūrjaṃ dadhānāḥ sakṛtaḥ śacivratāBhatt. dadhānā(ḥ) gṛhā jīvanta upa vaḥ sadema ||
ūrjaṃ me devā adadhur ūrjaṃ manuṣyā uta | ūrjaṃpitṛbhyaāhārṣam ūrjasvanto gṛhā mama ||
payo me devā adadhuḥ payo manuṣyā uta | payaḥ pitṛbhya āharṣaṃ payasvanto gṛhā mama ||
ud uttamaṃ varuṇa pāśam asmad avādhamaṃ vi madhyamaṃ śrathāya | athāditya vrate vayaṃ tava- -anāgaso 'ditaye syāma ||
ye te śataṃ varuṇa ye sahasraṃ yajñiyāḥ pāśā vitatā mahāntaḥ | tebhyo asmān varuṇaḥ soma indro viśve muñcantu marutaḥ svarkāḥ ||
prāsmat pāśān varuṇa muñca sarvānBhatt.  pāśāṃ … sarvāṃ yaiḥ samamebadhyateyairvyāme| atha jīvema śaradaḥ śatāni tvāya rājan gupito rakṣamāṇaḥ ||
ava te heḍa īmahe namobhir ava yajñebhir īmahe havirbhiḥ | (…)yad asmad varuṇa praceto rājann enāṃsiśiśrathaḥkṛtāni ||
candramā apsv antar ā suparṇo dhāvate divi | na vo hiraṇyanemayaḥ padaṃ vindanti vidyuto vittaṃ me asya rodasī ||
doṣo gāya bṛhad gāya dyumad gāyātharvaṇa | stuhi devaṃ savitāram ||
tamustuhy antaḥsindhuṃ sūnuṃsatyasya yuvānam | adroghavācaṃ suśevam ||
sa ghā no devaḥ savitā- -āsāviṣad vasupatir vasūni | ubhe suṣṭutī sugātum ||
indrāya somam ṛtvijaḥ sunotanā ca dhāvata | stotur yo havaṃ śṛṇavad dhavaṃ ca naḥ ||
sunotāsomapāvne somam indrāya vajriṇe | yuvā jeteśānaḥ sapuruṣṭutaḥ||
ā tvā viśantv indavo vayo na vṛkṣamandhasaḥ|Bhatt. andhasā virapśinvi mṛdho jahi rakṣasvinīḥ ||
āre asāv asmad astu hetir devāso asat | āre martānām aśastiḥ ||
sakhaiva no rātir astu sakhendraḥ sakhā savitā | sakhā bhagaḥ satyadharmā no astu ||
abhi no devīr avasā mahāśarmaṇānṛpatnīḥ| acchinnapatrāḥ sacantām ||
īḍe agniṃ bhavaṃ sarvaṃ rakṣaubjad ahiṃ balāsam uta sedim ugrām | āre asmad adite daivyaṃ bhayaṃ suvīryaṃ marutaḥ śarma yacchata ||
īḍe dyāvāpṛthivīparvatām̐apaḥ svaḥsūryam urv antarikṣam | vanaspatīn oṣadhīr gā uta rca ṛtasya naḥ patayo mṛḍayantu ||
huve viṣṇuṃ pūṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇaspatiṃ bhagaṃ nu śaṃsaṃ savitāram ūtaye | iha somo varuṇo vāyur agnir bhaga ugrā avase no gamantu ||
pātaṃ na indrāpūṣaṇā varuṇaḥ pāntu marutaḥ | apāṃ napāt sindhavaḥ saptapātana pātu viṣṇur uta dyauḥ ||
pātāṃno dyāvāpṛthivī abhiṣṭaye pātu grāvā pātu somo no aṃhasaḥ | pātu no devī suhavā sarasvatī pātv agnir yeśivāasyapāyavaḥ ||
pātāṃno devāśvinā sudaṃsasā- -uṣāsānaktota nauruṣyatām| apāṃ napādavihrutīkayasya cidBhatt. tac cid devomūrdhannadite śarma yaccha naḥ ||Bhatt. divo
tvaṣṭā me daivyaṃ vacaḥ parjanyo brahmaṇaspatiḥ | putrair bhrātṛbhir aditir nu pātu no duṣṭaraṃ trāmaṇe śavaḥ ||
aṃśo bhago varuṇo mitro aryamā- -aditiḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ | apa tasya dveṣo gamed avihrutoyāvayāc chatrum ?antitam? ||
devatvaṣṭarvardhaya sarvatātaye dhiye sam u śriyeprāvatānnaḥ | uruṣyāṇaurutarāprayucchanBhatt. urutaraḥprayucchan dyauṣpitaryāvayaducchunāmitaḥ ||
ye no vacobhir uta daṃsanābhis tanvaṃ soma paritāpayante | nīcaistān vṛśca na yathāvirukṣan mā te dṛśan sūryamuccarantam||
tvayeṣvātvayā soma dhanvanāBhatt. tvayeṣṭā, dhanvinā tvayā muṣṭighnā śāśadmahe vayam | tvaṃ tān vṛśca ya idaṃ na ?ādṛśākaran?Bhatt. karaṃ hanāma daṇḍairutadaṃsanābhiḥ||
padena tānpadanyonayantu vadhair enān pitaro daṃsayantu | yathā na jīvāt katamaś canaiṣām ||
yena somāditiḥ pathā mitrā vā yanty adruhaḥ | tenā no 'vitā bhuvaḥ ||Bhatt. novitā
yo naḥ somasuśaṃsino duḥśaṃso abhidāsati | vajreṇāsya mukhe jahi sa saṃpiṣṭo apāyati ||
yonaḥsomābhidāsati sanābhir yaś ca niṣṭiyaḥ |Bhatt. niṣṭyaḥ+ apa tasya balaṃ tira mahīva dyaur vadha tmanā ||
punar agham aghakṛtam etu devāḥ punar enaenaskṛtaṃvijānat |Bhatt. om. vi punaḥputraḥpitaram etu vidvān hatām uta yad asya svam asti ||
yena cāsau śapati yena cainaṃ śapāmasi | ubhau saṃvṛhya tau tasmādBhatt. -vṛjya antikād dhetim asyatām ||
yepārthivāsaḥśapathā ya urāv antarikṣe | ye vātasya prabharmaṇi tebhiṣ ṭaṃ vartayāmasi yo 'smān dveṣṭiyaṃvayaṃdviṣmaḥ||Bhatt. om. dviṣmaḥ
yeasmānparisīsṛpuḥBhatt. yo 'smān pari sāsṛpaḥ kulīpayānibibhrataḥ | ud devas teṣāṃ vṛścataBhatt. devās mūlamurvārvoyathā ||
yad devāaghadhāaghamBhatt. yo, -dhām agham anyasminn ā sisaṃkṣati |Bhatt. āsisasaṅkṣati bhāro aghasyaduḥsahaḥ pratyak kartāram ṛcchatu ||
punar evāghadhām aghaṃ dyumnam?ivaitur arṣatu |Bhatt. nyumnam ādityāduryāmahiṣā?Bhatt. -duryamāhiṣā mahīsindhor ivāvaniḥ ||
śaśvaddidyutkriyamāṇāBhatt. vidyut pratīcī ni hipaptat|Bhatt. na hi paptata pratyak kartāram ṛcchatu ||
śaśvantamicchāśadānam anyasmāiṣuṃdihānam |Bhatt. iṣūr pratīcī śarur ṛcchatu ||
yad etad bhūriśāśadat pratīcīnam apohase | viṣād iva viṣam addhi tat ||
namas te pravato napād yatas tapaḥ samūhase | mṛḍā nas tanūbhyaś śaṃ nas tokebhyas kṛdhi ||
pravato napān namo astu tubhyaṃBhatt. namo 'stu namas te hetayetapuṣyai| vidma te dhāma paramaṃ guhā yat samudre antar nihitāsi nābhiḥ ||
yāṃ tvā devā ajanayanta viśva iṣuṃkṛṇvānā asanāya tṛṣvīm | sā no mṛḍa vidathe gṛṇānā mitrasya ca varuṇasyapraśiṣṭau||
yūyaṃ naḥ pravato napān marutaḥ sūryatvacaḥ | śarma yacchāthasaprathaḥ||Bhatt. saprathā(ḥ)
mamṛḍatā suṣūdatā mṛḍā no aghnyābhyaḥ | tokāyatanve ca ||Bhatt. stokāya
namas te astu vidyute namas testanayitnave| namas te astv aśmane yenādūḍāśeasyasi ||
yo asmān brahmaṇaspate 'devo abhidāsati |Bhatt. om. avagraha sarvaṃtaṃ rīradhāsi naḥ ||
yebhiḥ soma sāhantya- -asurānrandhayāsai| tebhir no 'vitā bhuvaḥ ||
yāni devā asurāṇām ojāṃsy avṛṇīdhvam | tebhir no adhi vocata ||
ud enam uttaraṃ naya- -agne ghṛtebhir āhutaḥ | sam enaṃ varcasā sṛja devānāṃ bhāgadhā asat ||
indremaṃ prataraṃ kṛdhi sajātānām asad vaśī | rāyaspoṣeṇa saṃ sṛja prajayā ca bahuṃ kṛdhi ||
yasya kṛṇmo gṛhe havis tam agne vardhayā tvam | tasmai somo adhi bruvad ayaṃ ca brahmaṇaspatiḥ ||
ṛtāvānaṃ vaiśvānaram ṛtasyajyotiṣaspatim | ajasraṃ gharmam īmahe ||
sa idaṃ pratipaprathad yajñasya svaruttiran| ṛtūn ut sṛjate vaśī ||Bhatt. ṛtūṃr ut
agniḥ priyeṣu dhāmasu kāmo bhūtasya bhavyasya | samrāḍ eko vi rājati ||
