gaṇapravardhana gaṇaṃ me pra vardhaya gavām aśvānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ brahmacāriṇām bhūtyā annādyasya ||
yac ca khātaṃ yac cākhātaṃ sarvaṃ tad arasaṃ viṣam ||
yac ca piṣṭaṃ yac cāpiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ tad arasaṃ viṣam ||
yac ca digdhaṃ yac cādigdhaṃ sarvaṃ tad arasaṃ viṣam ||
yathā vṛkī jagdhaputrā vyāghrī vālalā bhavet | evā tvamalalābhava- -ādhībhiḥ preṣito mama ||
yathā dīptaṃ śaratūlam agninālalā bhavet | evā tvamalalābhava- -ādhībhiḥ preṣito mama ||
ākrandayālalābhavaBhatt. krandaya lalā dasyakāmena śuṣya ca |Bhatt. hasya ādhībhiḥ preṣito mama ||
yayoḥ sarvam idam ārpitaṃ vaśe bhūtaṃ ca nimiṣac caceṣṭat|Bhatt. ceṣṭata(⟨ ceṣṭat) tau mā vadantaṃ gṛhṇītām upadraṣṭāram atra māsyoc cheṣy ayathāvat prajāpate ||
yo mā vadantaṃ hṛdayena vācā vācā śrotreṇa manasā jihṛkṣāt | tam indro devo varuṇo bṛhaspatir īśāno devo abhi yātu mṛtyur yathā na jīvād uṣasaṃtṛtīyām||Bhatt. tṛtīyān (⟨ -yām)
yo mā jihṛkṣād brahmīyān manyamāna itthaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ pramatir matīnām | tam indro devo varuṇo bṛhaspatir īśāno devo abhi yātu mṛtyur yathā na jīvād uṣasaṃtṛtīyām||
pratyagvadhenāsyāpi dadhāmi prāṇaṃ mo dānaṃvidatayo mā jihṛkṣāt | so asyāyur ā chinattu kuliśeneva vṛkṣaṃ yathā na jīvād uṣasaṃtṛtīyām||
yasyā akṣaram ekam eva paraḥ sahasrā ayutaṃ ca śākhāḥ | tasyā vāco vidathāvadantaṃ yo mā jihṛkṣāt sa nv etv ārtim ||
uṣā vā ādityamaindha sauṣaseddhaud ait sa udyan prajābhya ātapatBhatt. uṣasedya so 'pa tamo 'hata so 'nnādyam avārundha | apa tamo hate 'nnādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
vāto vāagnimaindha sa vāteneddho 'jvalat so 'dīpyata so 'pa tamo 'hata so 'nnādyam avārundha | apa tamo hate 'nnādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
manomayī brāhmaṇam aindhaBhatt. (⟨ mano vai) sa brahmacaryam avasat sa vedam anvabrūta so 'pa tamo 'hata so 'nnādyam avārundha | apa tamo hate 'nnādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
homena pratiran prajāpate dampatī pari dadhāmi puṣṭyā | rāyaspoṣaṃ savitar ni yaccha jarāmṛtyū kṛṇuhi sarvavīrau ||
ayaṃ homo vardhayann etu dampatī prajāvantau paśuvantau suvīrau | rāyaspoṣaṃ savitar ni yaccha jarāmṛtyū kṛṇuhi sarvavīrau ||
gomantaṃ paśumantam aśvamantaṃ homaṃ dampatībhyāṃ juhomi | rāyaspoṣaṃ savitar ni yaccha jarāmṛtyū kṛṇuhi sarvavīrau ||
jīvā stha jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam ||
upajīvā sthopa jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam ||
saṃjīvā stha saṃ jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam ||
jīvalā stha jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam ||
prajāpater ākūtir asi sāhasrī puṣṭiḥ | prajāpater ākūtyāhaṃ sāhasryā puṣṭyā sāhasrān paśūn puṣeyam ||
bṛhaspater ākūtiḥ (…) | bṛhaspater ākūtyā (…) ||
brahmaṇa ākūtir asi sāhasrī puṣṭiḥ | brahmaṇa ākūtyāhaṃ sāhasryā puṣṭyā sāhasrān paśūn puṣeyam ||
virāḍ asi virājaṃ mā kṛṇu tasyās te yaśo bhakṣīya ||
svarāḍ asi svarājaṃ mā kṛṇu tasyās te madhu bhakṣīya ||
samrāḍ asi samrājaṃ mā kṛṇu tasyās te annaṃ bhakṣīya ||
vīryāvatā te haviṣā juhomi jīvātave na martave | dakṣaṃ te bhadram āhārṣaṃ parā suvāmy āmayat ||
abhivīreṇa te (…) ||see 4abcd
suvīreṇa te (…) ||see 4abcd
sarvavīreṇa te haviṣā juhomi jīvātave na martave | dakṣaṃ te bhadram āhārṣaṃ parā suvāmy āmayat ||
prajāvatā te haviṣā juhomi garbham ā dhatsva yonyām |Bhatt. garmam sa kāle jāyatāṃ punar daśame māsi sūtave ||
suprajasā te (…) ||see 8abcd
suputreṇa te haviṣā juhomi garbham ā dhatsva yonyām | sa kāle jāyatāṃ punar daśame māsi sūtave ||
bhūtaye te haviṣā juhomi- -imaṃ devāso abhi hiṅ karātha | asminn eva paśavaḥ saṃ viśantu catuṣpāda uta vā ye dvipādaḥ ||
vittaye te (…) ||see 11abcd
svṛddhenate (…) ||see 11abcd
samṛddhena te haviṣā juhomi- -imaṃ devāso abhi hiṅ karātha | asminn eva paśavaḥ saṃ viśantu catuṣpāda uta vā ye dvipādaḥ ||
kṣemyeṇa te haviṣā juhomi kṣemyo bhavāsi paśubhiś ca vīraiḥ | indrāgnī tvā sayujā sakhāyau viśvebhir devair anu saṃ dadetām ||
pratiṣṭhitena te haviṣā juhomi prati tiṣṭhāsi paśubhiḥ (…) ||see 15bcd
sambhūtena te haviṣā juhomi saṃ bhavāsi paśubhiḥ (…) ||see 15bcd
prabhūtena te haviṣā juhomi pra bhavāsi paśubhiś ca vīraiḥ | indrāgnī tvā sayujā sakhāyau viśvebhir devair anu saṃ dadetām ||
dhītī vā ye anayan vāco agraṃ manasā vā ye avadann ṛtāni | tṛtīyena brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānās turīyeṇa manvata nāma dhenoḥ ||
sa veda putraḥ pitaraṃ sa mātaraṃ sa sūnur bhavat sa bhavat punarmaghaḥ | sa dyām aurṇod antarikṣaṃ sasvar viśvā bhuvo abhavat sa ābhavat ||
atharvāṇaṃ pitaraṃ viśvadevaṃ mātur garbhaṃ pitaraṃ saṃyuvānam | ya īṃciketāmṛtasyadhāman nityasya rāyaḥ paridhīṃr apaśyat ||
śivās ta ekāaśivāstaekāḥ sarvā bibharṣy ahṛṇīyamānaḥ | guhā vāco nihitās tisra etā eked idaṃ vibabhūvānusarvam ||
aditir dyaur aditir antarikṣam aditir mātā sa pitā sa putraḥ | viśve devā aditiḥ pañca janā aditir jātam aditir janitvam ||
diteḥ putrāṇām aditerakāriṣaṃ mahāśarmaṇāṃ mahatāmanarmaṇām| teṣāṃ hi dhāma gabhiṣak samudryaṃ naiṣāṃvepasaḥparo asti kiṃ cana ||
vājasya nu prasave mātaraṃ mahīm aditir nāma vacasā karāmahe | yasyām idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam āviveśa sā no devī suhavā śarma yacchatu ||
mahīm ū ṣu mātaraṃ suvratānām ṛtasya patnīm avase huvema | tuvikṣatrām ajarantīmurūcīṃ suśarmāṇam aditiṃ supraṇītim ||
sutrāmāṇaṃ pṛthivīṃ dyām anehasaṃ suśarmāṇam aditiṃ supraṇītim | daivīṃ nāvaṃ svaritrām anāgaso asravantīm ā ruhemā svastaye ||
ekayā ca daśabhiś cā suhūte dvābhyām iṣṭaye viṃśatyā ca | tisṛbhiś ca vahase triṃśatā ca viyugbhir vāyav iha tā vi muñca ||
ayā viṣṭhā janayan karvarāṇi sa hi ghṛṇir urur varāya gātuḥ | sapratyud aid varuṇo madhvo agraṃ svāṃ yat tanūṃ tanvām airayata ||
yajñena yajñam ayajanta devās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan | te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacante yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ ||
yajño babhūva sa ā babhūva sa pṛthivyā adhipatir babhūva | sa pra jajñe sa u vāvṛdhe punaḥ so asmāsu draviṇam ā dadhātu ||
devā yad devān haviṣāyajant--āyajanta -āmartiyān manasāmartyena | bravāma tatra parame vyoman vadema tad uditau sūryasya ||
mugdhā devā utaśunāyajant--āyajanta -ota gor aṅgair bahudhāyajanta | ya imaṃ yajñaṃ manasānvavindat pra ṇo vocat tam iheha bravāma ||
yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā devā yajñam atanvata | kva svit tad adya no brūyād yadi havyenejire ||
indraḥ sutrāmā svavām̐ avobhiḥ sumṛḍīko bhavatu viśvavedāḥ | bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ kṛṇotu suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma ||
sa sutrāmā svavām̐ indro asmad ārācciddveṣaḥsanutaryuyota| tasya vayaṃ sumatauyajñiyasy-yajñiyasya -āpi bhadre saumanase syāma ||
yas te pṛthustanayitnuryaṛṣvo yo daivaḥ ketur viśvam ābhūṣatīdam | mṛḍayā no vidyutā deva sasyāya mota vadhī raśmibhiḥ sūryasya ||
yas te stanaḥśasayuryo mayobhūr yaḥ sumnayuḥ suhavo yaḥ sudakṣaḥ | yena viśvā vanasi vāryāṇi sarasvatī tam iha dhātave kaḥ ||
idaṃ te havyaṃ ghṛtavat sarasvat-sarasvati -īdaṃ pitṝṇāṃhavirāsyaṃyat | imāni ta uditā śaṃtamāni tebhir vayaṃ maghavānaḥ syāma ||
prapathe pathām ajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathe pṛthivyāḥ | ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā ca carati prajānan ||
pūṣemā āśā anu vedasarvāḥ so asmām̐ abhayatamenaneṣat| svastidā āghṛṇiḥ sarvavīro +'prayucchan pura etu prajānan ||
pūṣā gā anv etu naḥ pūṣā rakṣatv arvataḥ | pūṣāvājaṃsanotu naḥ ||
pūṣan tava vrate vayaṃ na riṣyema kadā cana | stotāras ta iha smasi ||
śukraṃ te anyad yajataṃ te anyad viṣurūpe ahanī dyaur ivāsi | viśvā hi māyā avasi svadhāvo bhadrā te pūṣann iha rātir astu ||
dhātā dadhātu dāśuṣe prāñcaṃ jīvātum akṣitam | vayaṃ devasya dhīmahi sumatiṃ satyadharmaṇaḥ ||
dhātā viśvāni dāśuṣe dadhātu prajākāmāya dāśuṣe duroṇe | tasya prajā amṛtāḥ saṃ vyayantu viśve devāso aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ ||
dhātā rātiḥ savitedaṃ juṣantāṃ prajāpatir nidhipatir no agniḥ | tvaṣṭā pūṣā prajayāsaṃrarāṇo yajamānāya draviṇaṃ dadhātu ||
dhātā prajānām uta rāya īśe dhātedaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ jajāna | saṃ dāśuṣe vahatu bhūri puṣṭā tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
sāvīr hi deva prathamāya pitre varṣmāṇam asmai varimāṇam asmai | athāsmabhyaṃ savitar vāryāṇi dvedve ā suvā bhūri paśvaḥ ||
bhadrād adhi śreyaḥ prehi bṛhaspatiḥ puraetā te astu | athemam asyā vara ā pṛthivyā āreśatruṃkṛṇuhi sarvavīram ||
damūnādevaḥ savitā vareṇyo dadhad ratnaṃ dakṣaṃ pitṛbhyaāyūṃṣi| pibāt somaṃ mamadad enam iṣṭe parijmā cid ramate asya dharmaṇi ||
tāṃ savituḥ satyasavasya citrāṃ vayaṃ devasya prasave vanāmahe | yām asya kaṇvo aduhat prapīnāṃ sahasradhārāṃ mahiṣo bharāya ||
ko no asyā druho 'vadyavatyā un neṣati kṣatriyo vasya icchan | kaḥ pūrtikāmaḥ ka u yajñakāmaḥ ko deveṣu vanute dīrgham āyuḥ ||
kaḥ pṛśniṃ dhenuṃ varuṇena dattām atharvaṇe sudughāṃ nityavatsām | tāṃ bṛhaspatyā sakhyā duhāno yathāvaśaṃ tanvaḥ kalpayāti ||
naghraṃstatāpana himo jaghāna prasarsṛtepṛthivī jīradānuḥ | āpaś cid asmai sadam it kṣaranti yatra somaḥ sadam it tatra bhadram ||
yasyā idaṃ pradiśi yad virocate anumatiṃ prati bhūṣanty āyavaḥ | yasyā upastha urv antarikṣaṃ sā naḥ śarma bahulaṃ ni yacchāt ||
anv adya no anumatir yajñaṃ deveṣu yacchatām | agniś ca havyavāhano bhavatāṃ dāśuṣe mayaḥ ||
anv id anumate tvaṃ maṃsaseśaṃca nas kṛdhi | iṣaṃ tokāya no dadhaḥ pra ṇa āyūṃṣitāriṣaḥ||
anu manyatām anumanyamānā prajāvatīṣamakṣīyamāṇam | tasyā vayaṃ heḍasi mā vi bhūma sā no devī suhavā śarma yacchatu ||
anumate anu manyasva tā no yā te vayaṃ cakṛmā yā tanūbhiḥ | yā tokeṣu tanuṣu yā prajāyāṃ yā goṣv oṣadhīṣv apsv antaḥ ||
ā no devy anumatirjagamyāt sukṣatratāvīratā yā sujātā | bhadrā hy asyāḥ pramatir babhūva semaṃ yajñam avatu devajuṣṭam ||
anumatir viśvam idaṃ jajāna yad ejati carati yac ca tiṣṭhati | tasyās te devi sumatau syām-syāma -ānumate anu hi maṃsase naḥ ||
yat te nāma suhavaṃ supraṇīte anumateanumataṃsudānu| tena tvaṃ sumatiṃ devy asmā iṣaṃ pinva viśvavāraṃ suvīram ||
prajābhyas tvā prajās tvānu prāṇantu prajā anu prāṇihi | śukraṃ te śukreṇa candraṃ candreṇāmṛtam amṛtenakrīṇāmi||
tapasas tanūr asi prajāpater varṇaḥ | parameṇa paśunā krīyase ||
abhi tyaṃ devaṃ savitāram oṇyoḥ kavikratum | arcāmi satyasavaṃ ratnadhām abhi priyaṃ matim ||
ūrdhvā yasyāmatir bhāadidyutatsavīmani | hiraṇyapāṇir amimīta sukratuḥ kṛpā svaḥ ||
ayaṃsahasramānṛṣiḥkavīnāṃ matir jyotir vidharmaṇi | bradhnaḥ samīcīr uṣasaḥ sam īrayāt ||
arepasaḥ sacetasaḥ svasare manyumattamāḥ | cite goḥ ||
sam eta viśvā ojasā patiṃ divo ya eka id bhūr atithir janānām | sa pūrvyonūtanamāvivāsan taṃ vartanir anu vavṛta ekam it puru ||
kuhūṃ devīm amṛtāṃ vidmanāpasam asmin yajñe suhavāṃ johavīmi | yā no dadāti śravaṇaṃ pitṝṇāṃ tasyai te devi haviṣā vidhema ||
kuhūr devānām amṛtasya patnī havyā no asya haviṣaḥ śṛṇotu | saṃ dāśuṣe kiratu bhūri puṣṭā rāyaspoṣaṃ cikituṣe dadhātu ||
saṃ jānīdhvaṃ saṃ pṛcyadhvaṃ saṃ vo manāṃsi jānatām | mitro vaḥ sarvāḥ saṃ sṛjān mayi saṃjñānam astu vaḥ ||
yan no agnir asanad yan na indro viśve yad devā marutaḥ svarkāḥ | tad asmabhyaṃ savitā satyadharmā sarasvaty anumatir ni yacchāt ||
yūyaṃ no devā ubhayāyavedase śarma yacchata dvipade catuṣpade | adat pibad ūrjayamānam āśitaṃ tad asmabhyaṃ śaṃ yor arapo dadhāta ||
bṛhaspate savitar bodhayainaṃ saṃśitaṃ cit saṃtaraṃ saṃ śiśādhi | vardhayainaṃ mahate saubhagāya viśva enam anu madanti devāḥ ||
amutrabhūyād adhi yad yamasya bṛhaspatir abhiśastyā amuñcata | prati mṛtyum auhatām aśvinā te devānām agne bhiṣajā śacībhiḥ ||
indrāvaruṇā sutapāv imaṃ sutaṃ madyaṃsomaṃ pibataṃ dhṛtavratā | yuvo ratho adhvaraṃ devavītaye prati svasaram upa yāti pītaye ||
indrāvaruṇā madhumattamasya vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām | idaṃ vām asme pariṣiktam andha āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayethām ||
uru viṣṇo vi kramasv-kramasva -oru kṣayāya niṣ kṛdhi | ghṛtaṃ ghṛtayone piba pra pra yajñapatiṃ tira ||
divo viṣṇa uta vā pṛthivyā uror vā viṣṇo maho antarikṣāt | ubhā hi hastau madhunā pṛṇasv-pṛṇasva -āprayaccha dakṣiṇād ota savyāt ||
viṣṇor nū kaṃ pra vocaṃ vīryāṇi yaḥ pārthivāni vimame rajāṃsi | yo askabhāyad uttaraṃ sadhasthaṃ vicakramāṇastredhorugāyaḥ||
pra tad viṣṇu stavate vīryāṇi mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ | yasyoruṣu triṣu vikramaṇeṣv adhikṣiyanti bhuvanāni viśvā ||
agnāviṣṇū mahi dhāma priyaṃ vāṃ pātaṃ ghṛtasya guhyāni nāma | damedame sapta ratnādadhān-dadhānā -opa vāṃ jihvā ghṛtam ā caraṇyāt ||
agnāviṣṇūmahi tad vāṃ mahitvaṃ vītaṃ ghṛtasya guhyā juṣāṇā | damedame suṣṭutyā vāvṛdhānā prati vāṃ jihvā ghṛtam uc caraṇyāt ||
un nambhaya pṛthivīṃ bhindhīdaṃdivyaṃ nabhaḥ | ūdhno divyasya nodhātar īśāno vi ṣyā bilam ||
apakrāman pauruṣeyād gṛṇāno daivyaṃsahaḥ| praṇītīrabhyāvartasva devo devānāṃ sakhyā juṣāṇaḥ ||
pitor ahaṃ pitupatiṃ tad īḍe dhātā vidhartā bhuvaneṣv eṣu | nemena mahyaṃ madhumām̐ ihaidhi nemenāmuṣmai viṣuvān nv edhi ||
ayaṃ pitoḥ pitumān ābhṛtas par-pari -īdaṃ śṛṇotu yad ahaṃ bravīmi | nemena mahyaṃ madhumām̐ ihaidhi nemenāmuṣmai viṣuvān nv edhi ||
atraivainaṃ nirṛta ā rabhasv-rabhasva -ātraivainaṃ nirṛte pra kṣiṇīhy atraivainaṃsarvavi vṛśca | nemena mahyaṃ madhumām̐ ihaidhi nemenāmuṣmai viṣuvān nv edhi ||
yattvāpita upabruve tan ma ā śṛṇv asmin me have havyo yathāsaḥ | amuṃdevairnirṛtiḥ saṃvidān-saṃvidānā -āmuṃ chinatti varuṇasya pāśāt ||
yad asmṛti cakṛmā kiṃ cid ena upārima caraṇair jātavedaḥ | tasmāt pāhi tvaṃ naḥ pracetaḥ śubhe sakhibhyo amṛtatvam asmān||
agne 'dhyakṣo na ehi pāhi no duritāt pāhi duṣvapnyāt | āsanyād anyād yakṣmān naḥ pāhi ||
tviṣir asi tviṣivanto bhūyāsma | cakṣuṣmanto gomantaḥ prajāvanto varcasvinaḥ ||
yad ahnā saṃcinutha kṣīraṃbharathodhabhiḥ| idaṃ tad viśvarūpā vaḥ payo harāmi vīrudhā ||
yad aghnyā oṣadhībhyo 'dbhyaḥ saṃbharathā madhu | idaṃ tad viśvarūpā vaḥ kṣīraṃ harāmy oṣadhyā ||
yo abhyavabhṛṇāyasi svapantam iccha pūruṣaṃ śayānamakasvalam| ayasmayena varmaṇ-varmaṇā -āśmamayena varmaṇā pary asmān varuṇo dadhat ||
ye no gṛhe brāhmaṇā manyamānā ghorāṃ vācaṃmithuyānubruvanti| enohṛto malahṛto bhavantu duryoṇam asmatparite harantu ||
ayam agniḥsatpatirvṛddhavṛṣṇiyo rathīvapatyai najanayat purohitaḥ | nābhā pṛthivyā nihito davidyutad adhaspadaṃ kṛṇutāṃ ye pṛtanyavaḥ ||
agne śardha mahate saubhagāya tava dyumnāny uttamāni santu | saṃ jāspatyaṃ suyamam ā kṛṇuṣva śatrūyatām abhi tiṣṭhā mahāṃsi ||
dṛṣṭodamūnāatithir duroṇa imaṃ no yajñam upa yāhi vidvān | viśvā hy agne abhiyujo vihatya śatrūyatām ā bharā bhojanāni ||
agne sapatnān pra ṇudasva jātān praty ajātāñ jātavedo nudasva | adhi no brūhi sumanasyamānaḥ śarma no yacchatrivarūthamudbhit ||
prānyān sapatnān sahasā sahasva praty ajātāñ jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi | idaṃ rāṣṭraṃpipṛhisaubhagāy-saubhagāya -ānu tvā devā vasavomadantām||
yo nomitrāvaruṇābhidāsāt sapatnovotpipānobṛhaspate | sarvaṃ tam agne adharaṃ pātayāsmad yathendrāham uttamaś cetayāni ||
aham eṣām uttamaś cetayāni mama vaśam upa tiṣṭhantu sarve | ājuhvāno ghṛtapṛṣṭhaḥ suvarcā vasor madhye dīdihi jātavedaḥ ||
amum agne adharaṃ pātayāsmaj jāsayotpipānaṃ sapatnam | ye no dhūrvān adhare te bhavantu viśvā dveṣāṃsy abhito nimṛḍḍhi||
mūrdhānaṃ divo aratiṃ pṛthivyā viśas tvā sarvā balihṛta upāsatām | tāsām ugromadhyameṣṭheyam asyā sve kṣetre saviteva vi rāja ||
ā pratyañcaṃ dāśuṣe dāśvāṃsaṃ sarasvantaṃ puṣṭipatiṃ rayīṇām | rāyaspoṣaṃ śravasyaṃ vasānam iha huvema sadanaṃ rayīṇām ||
yasya vrate paśavo yanti sarve yasya vrata upatiṣṭhanta āpaḥ | yasya vrate puṣṭipatir niviṣṭas taṃ sarasvantam avase huvema ||
ye te sarasvann ūrmayo madhumanto ghṛtaścutaḥ | tebhir no 'vitā bhuvaḥ ||
divyaṃ samudraṃ payasaṃ bṛhantam apāṃ garbhaṃ vṛṣabham oṣadhīnām | abhīpatorayyā tarpayantaṃ sarasvantaṃrayiṣṭhāṃsādayeha ||
indrasya kukṣir asi somadhāna ātmā devānām uta viśvarūpaḥ | iha prajā janayayāsta āsu yā anyatreha tās tesvadhitogṛṇantu ||
śyenaḥ suparṇo divyo nṛcakṣāḥ sahasrapācchatayonir vayodhāḥ | sa no ni yacchād vasu yat parābhṛtam asmākam astu pitṛṣu svadhāvat ||
ati dhanvāny aty apas tatarda śyeno nṛcakṣā avasānadarśaḥ | taran viśvāvarā rajāṃs-rajāṃsi -īndreṇa sakhyā śiva ā jagāma ||
āgan devaḥ savitā sarvadhāyā urujyotir avidāmā namobhiḥ | mahīṃ nāvam aditer ā ruhema yatra somaḥ sadam it tatra bhadram ||
ud vayam ity ekā ||
patir divaḥ patir agniḥ pṛthivyāḥ patir viśvasya bhuvanasya rājati | patir viśvā oṣadhīr ā viveśa patnīvān agna iha yāhi somam ||
saṃ krāmataṃ mā jahītaṃ śarīraṃ prāṇāpānau sayujeha stam | saptaṛṣibhyaḥ paridadmaetaṃBhatt. dadhma ta enaṃ svasti jarase nayantu ||
yat ta āyur atihitaṃ parācair apānaḥ prāṇo ya u te paretaḥ | agniṣ ṭadāhārnirṛter upasthāt tad ātmani punar ā veśayāmi ||
mā tvā prāṇo hāsīd yas tve praviṣṭo mā tvāpāno 'vahāya parā gāt | saṃrabhya jīva śaradaḥ suvarcā agniṣ ṭe gopā adhipāvasiṣṭhaḥ||
rākām ahaṃ suhavāṃ suṣṭutī huve śṛṇotu naḥ subhagā bodhatu tmanā | sīvyatv apaḥ sūcyācchidyamānayā dadātu vīraṃ śatadāyam ukthyam ||
yās te rāke sumatayaḥ supeśaso yābhir dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni | tābhir no adya sumanā upāgahi sahasrapoṣaṃ subhage rarāṇā ||
yā rākā yā sinīvālī yā guṅgūr yā sarasvatī | indrāṇīm ahva ūtaye varuṇānīṃ svastaye ||
yā subāhuḥ svaṅguriḥ suṣumā bahusūvarī | tasyai viśpatnyai haviḥ sinīvālyai juhotana ||
sinīvāli pṛthuṣṭuke yā devānām asi svasā | juṣasva havyam āhutaṃ prajāṃ devididiḍḍhinaḥ ||
yā viśvata indram asi pratīcī sahasrastutām abhi yantu devīḥ | viṣṇupatnitubhyaṃrātāhavīṃṣi patiṃ devi rādhasā codayasva ||
upa hvaya iti tisraḥ ||

sūyavasād bhagavatīty ekā ||
saṃjānānā upa sīdān abhijñu patnīvanto namasyaṃnamasyān| ririkvāṃsas tanvā sumnam āyuḥ sakhet sakhyur nimiṣirakṣamāṇāḥ||
samiddho agnir aśvinā tapto vāṃ gharma ā gatam | duhyante nūnaṃ vṛṣaṇeha dhenavo dasrāvadanti kāravaḥ ||
samiddho agnir aśvinā rathī divas tapto gharmo duhyate vām iṣe madhu | vayaṃ hivāṃpurutamāso aśvinā havāmahe sadhamādeṣu kāravaḥ ||
yadusriyāsvāhutaṃ ghṛtaṃ payo 'yaṃ so aśvinā vāṃ bhāga ā gatam | mādhvī dhartārāvidathasyasatpatī taptaṃ gharmaṃ pibataṃ rocane divaḥ ||
tapto vāṃ gharmonakṣatisuhotā pra vām adhvaryuś carati payasvān | madhor dugdhasyāśvinā tanāyā vītaṃ pātaṃ payasa usriyāyāḥ ||
upa drava payasā godhug oṣum ā gharme siñca payausriyāyāḥ| vi nākam akhyat savitā vareṇyo 'nu dyāvāpṛthivī supraṇītiḥ ||
svāhākṛtaḥ śucir deveṣu gharmo yo aśvinoś camaso devapānaḥ | tam u viśve amṛtāso juṣāṇā gandharvasya praty āsnā rihanti ||
sugā vo devāḥ sadanā kṛṇomi ya ātasthedaṃ savanaṃ juṣāṇāḥ | vahamānā bharamāṇāabhrā astaṃ gharmaṃ tam udātiṣṭhatānu ||
śivā naḥ śaṃtamā bhava sumṛḍīkā sarasvati | mā teyuyomasaṃdṛśaḥ ||
upainaṃ devo agrabhīc camasena bṛhaspatiḥ | yajamānāya śundhata indra gīrbhir na ā bhara ||
saṃ mā siñcantu maruta ity ekā ||
iḍaivāsmām̐anu vastāṃ vratena yasyāḥ pade punate devayantaḥ | ghṛtapadī śakvarī somapṛṣṭh-somapṛṣṭhā -opa yajñam asthita vaiśvadevī ||
drapsaś caskandety ekā ||
yas te drapsa skandati yas te aṃśur bāhucyutodhiṣaṇāyāupasthāt | adhvaryor vā pari yaḥ pavitrāt taṃ te juhomi manasā vaṣaṭkṛtam ||
drapsaḥ patitoviśvayaḥpariśrutaḥ | ayaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ saṃ taṃ siñcatu rādhase ||
yas te drapsaḥ patitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ dhānāsomaḥ parivāpaḥ karambhaḥ | ayaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ saṃ taṃ siñcatu varcase ||
payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvan māmakaṃ vaca ity ekā ||
ayam agnir vareṇya āyuṣ ṭe viśvato dadhat | punas tvā prāṇa āyati parā yakṣmaṃ suvāmi te ||
janādviśvajanīnaṃ viśāmurukṣitīnām| dūrāttvā manya ābhṛtam īrṣyāyā nāma bheṣajam ||
dūrād etat saṃ bharant-bharanti -īrṣyāyā nāma bheṣajam | tat saṃvegasya bheṣajaṃ tad aśnāsaṃgṛbhāyikam||
agner iva dahato dāvasya dahato yathā | etām etasyerṣyāṃ hṛda udnāgnimiva vāraye ||
apa mārjmy apanayan manyuṃ te hṛdayād adhi | amuṣminn īrṣyām ā dadhmas tatro enāṃ ni dadhmasi ||Kubisch tato (sandhi?)
tiraścirājer asitāt pṛdākoradhi saṃbhṛtam | tat kaṅkaparvaṇo viṣam iyaṃ vīrud adūduṣat ||
iyaṃ vīrun madhujātā madhuścunmadhulā madhu sāvihrutasyabheṣajy atho maśakajambhanī ||
yato daṣṭaṃ yataḥ pītaṃ tatas tvā nir ṇayāmasi | abhryasyatṛpradaṃśino maśakasyārasaṃ viṣam ||
ayaṃ yo vikhyo vikaṭo viparvā mukhāny eṣāṃ vṛjinā kṛṇoṣi | tāni tvaṃ deva savitar iṣīkām iva saṃ namaḥ ||
yad annam admi bahudhā virūpaṃ hiraṇyam aśvam uta gām ajām avim | yad eva kiṃ ca pratijagrahāham agniṣ ṭad viśvād agadaṃ kṛṇotu ||
yad āśasā me carato janām̐ anu yācamānasya vadatovicukṣubhe| yan me tanvo manaso viriṣṭaṃ sarasvatī tad ā pṛṇād ghṛtena ||
yad ārima pratigṛhṇanta enaḥ siṣāsanto balim agne carantaḥ | tvaṃ nas tasmād enaso mumugdhi vaiśvānaraḥ prati havyā gṛbhāya ||
cakṣuṣaḥ pāśān manasaś ca pāśād vīkṣāyāḥ pāśād uta śakvarīṇām | tasmān mumugdhi viśvāvaso tvaṃ no dātṝṇāṃ dānaṃ bhunajāmahai vayam ||
adur me viśve devā adāt savitedam | adān me brahmaṇaspatiḥ priyo mitro adād idam ||
indreṇa medinā yuj-yujā -āpa bādhe pṛtanyataḥ | adhare santu śatravaḥ ||
agnir indraś ca yad yuvaṃ hato vṛtrāṇy aprati | ugrā hivṛtrahantamā||
agnim indraṃ ca yad vayaṃ purodhāyai havāmahe | tau no mṛḍāta īdṛśe ||
yābhyāṃ svar ajayann agre yāv ātasthatur bhuvanājuṣāṇā| pracarṣaṇī vṛṣaṇā vajrabāhū agnim indraṃ vṛtrahaṇā huvema ||
yayor ojasā stabhitā rajāṃsi yau vīryair vīratamā śacībhiḥ | yau patyete apratītau sahobhir viṣṇum agan varuṇaṃ pūrvahūtiḥ ||
yayor apsu na mahimā nadīṣu praririce pradivi rocanāyām | yayor asty anumatirbhūyiṣṭhā viṣṇum agan varuṇaṃ pūrvahūtiḥ ||
yayor idaṃ pradiśi yad virocate prajāmati vi ca caṣṭe śacībhiḥ | mahaṛtasya dharmāṇā yuvānā viṣṇum agan varuṇaṃ pūrvahūtiḥ ||
ubhā jigyathur na parājayethe na parā jigye kataraś canaiva vām | indraścaviṣṇo yadapaspṛdhethāṃ tredhā sahasraṃ vi tad airayethām ||
yad aśuddhaṃ yad anṛtaṃ yac carāmasi pāpayā | āpo mā tasmād enaso duritāt pāntu viśvataḥ ||
duṣvapnyaṃ durjīvitam ity ekā ||
yad avāmṛkṣata kṛṣṇaśakunir mukhena nirṛte tava | agniṣ ṭat sarvaṃ śundhatu havyavāḍghṛtasūdanaḥ ||
yad asmān kṛṣṇaśakuner niṣpatya tata ānaśe | āpo mā tasmād enaso duritāt pāntu viśvataḥ ||
agnir mā pātu prathamo durarmaṇo nirṛtyāṃ viśvā duritāni mṛjmahe | viśve mā devā marutaḥ punantu varuṇo rājā savitā pavitraiḥ ||
antarikṣeṇa patati yātudhānanibādhitaḥ | stokaṃ yam abhyacuścutat tam u syonaṃ kṛṇomi te ||
yattvā kṛṣṇo abhyamṛkṣad devebhyas pari nirhataḥ | śivaṃ te tanve tatkṛṇmo vi te pāśāṃś cṛtāmasi ||
tṛṣṭike tṛṣṭivandana ud amuṃ chindhi tṛṣṭike | yathā kṛtadviṣṭe daśat sarvasmai śepyāvate ||
tṛṣṭāsi tṛṣṭikāsi viṣā viṣātaky asi | parivṛttā yathāsasy ṛṣabheṇa vaśeva ||
ā te dade vakṣaṇābhya ā dade hṛdayād adhi | ā te mukhasya yad varca ā puṃso yattitṛpsasi||
mayi varco mayi śravo mayi dyumnaṃ mayi tviṣiḥ | ahaṃ te varca ā dade ahaṃ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ ||
abhi prāgāt sahasrākṣo yuktvā śapatho ratham | śaptāramanvicchanyātu vṛka ivāvimato gṛham ||
pari ṇo vṛṅdhi śapatha hradamagnir iva dahan | śaptāram atra tvaṃ jahi divyā vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ ||
yo naḥ śapādaśapataḥ śapato yaś ca naḥ śapāt | vṛkṣa iva vidyutā hata ā mūlād anu śuṣyatu ||
śaptāraṃ yantu śapathā yaḥsuhārttenanaḥ saha | jihvāślakṣṇasya durhārdaḥ pṛṣṭīr api śṛṇīmasi ||
yaṃ dviṣmo yaś ca no dveṣṭy aghāyur yaś ca naḥ śapāt | śune peṣṭram ivāvakṣāmaṃ taṃ praty asyāmi mṛtyave ||
preto yantu vyādhyaḥ prānudhyāḥpro aśastayaḥ | agnīrakṣasvinīr hantu somo hantu durasyatīḥ ||
pra catetaḥ pāpi lakṣmi naśyetaḥ prāmutaḥpata| ayasmayenāṅkena yaṃ dviṣmas tasmin tvā sṛjāmaḥ ||
yā tvā lakṣmīḥ patayālūrajuṣṭ-ajuṣṭā -ādhicaskanda vandaneva vṛkṣam | anyatrāsmat savitas tām ito dhā hiraṇyahasto vasu no rarāṇaḥ ||
nir araṇīṃ savitā sāviṣatpador nir hastayor varuṇo mitro aryamā | nir ādityā anumatī rarāṇāḥ praṇaḥsuvāt savitā saubhagāya ||
ekaśataṃ lakṣmyaḥ sākaṃ martyasya januṣehajātāḥ| tāsāṃ pāpiṣṭhā nir ataḥ pra hiṇmaḥ śivāsmabhyaṃ jātavedo ni yaccha ||
yat ta ātmantanvāṃghoram asti yad vā keśeṣu praticakṣaṇe vā | tat te vidvān apa bādhe ahaṃ pra tvā suvāt savitā saubhagāya ||
nir lakṣmyaṃ lalāmyaṃ nir arātiṃ suvāmasi | yathā no vasyasīd aso rāyaspoṣam ihā suva ||
agnim accha devayatāṃ manāṃsi cakṣūṃṣīva sūryaṃ saṃ caranti | yadī suvāte uṣasā virūpe śveto vājī jāyate agre ahnām ||
indro rājā jagataś carṣaṇīnām adhi kṣami viṣurūpaṃ yad asti | tato dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni codad rādha upastutaś cid arvāk ||
śakunir bhūtvā prababhastipippalaṃ patyāṃ niviṣṭā yadi vā gha patnyām | bhīmā ghorālakṣmyaḥsahabhavyās tā ito haviṣā nir yajāmaḥ ||
yā te gṛheṣūta vā dhaneṣu prajāṃ lakṣmīr yadi vā tebabhasti| tāṃ bṛhaspatir haviṣā bādhamāno nirhūya pra dadhmāv adhi dūram asmat ||
riśyapadīṃriśadvatīṃ goṣedhāṃ vidhamām uta | vilīḍhyaṃ vyādhyaṃ brahmaṇā tā anīnaśam ||
pratyoṣantīm utsaṅginīm uta cchidrāmutāraṇīm| siṃhīṃjyeṣṭhalakṣmīṃ vyāghrīṃ nāśayāmasi ||
anudhyāyinīṃ paricarāṃ vibādhām uta hiṃsatīm | rodasya patnīṃ rodhanāṃ pra tā dhamāmi lakṣmyaḥ ||
vāmaspṛhāṃ pitṛṣadaṃ yeṣantīṃ tapanīm uta | asidhyantīṃ pradhvaṃsinīm aṣṭrāvadhāṃ ca lakṣmyaṃ brahmaṇā tā anīnaśam ||
āsanmantryāṃ vacasyāṃ saṃpibantīṃ nyakvarīm | uttarāṃ janaṃgamāṃ pra tā dhamāmi lakṣmyaḥ ||
yā te ghorā tanvam āviveśa yā te lakṣmīḥ sarvāsamaktā| agniṣ ṭe tāsv adatta saubhagāy-saubhagāya -āpaḥ śundhantu bṛhate raṇāya ||
adevṛghnīṃ varuṇ-varuṇa -āpatighnīṃ bṛhaspate | indrāputraghnīṃ lakṣmyam asyai tāḥ savitaḥ suva ||
yā te lakṣmīś cakṣuṣi yota datsu yā hastayo stanayor yopapakṣayoḥ | śroṇyor bhaṃsasi yā padoṣṭe sarvās tā ati krāma ghorāḥ ||
ūrubhyāṃ te aṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ pārṣṇibhyāṃ prapadābhyām | lakṣmīḥ śroṇibhyām aṅgebhyo yāḥ pāpīs tā anīnaśan ||
apāślīlaṃpṛthivī hantu yat pador apahastayor varuṇo mitro aryamā | apādityā anumatī rarāṇāḥ pra ṇaḥsuvātsavitā saubhagāya ||
etā enā vyākaran khile gā aditīr iva | ramantāṃ bhadrā lakṣmyo yāḥ pāpīs tā anīnaśan ||
sāhuṣī nāma vā asi sahamānā sahasvatī | gṛhaguptim anuvartiṃ kulāyinīṃ tā ihā veśayāmasi ||
?saṃcāriṇy ubhair yā babhūv-babhūva -ānyā anyāṃ jinvati bhadrapāpīḥ | tāṃ lakṣmīṃ nihavā nayāmo bhadrā subhadrām api saubhagāya? ||
ekaśataṃ lakṣmyas tāsāṃ rājñī babhūvitha | bhadrābhir bhadre saṃbhūya bhadreṇābhi sacasva naḥ ||
divas pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣād vātāt paśubhyo adhy oṣadhībhyaḥ | yato lakṣmīr vṛjinā saṃbabhūva sā brahmaṇā pracyutā dūram etu ||
vālkutsasyaca gandhena hiraṇyavarcasena ca | ātpuṣkariṇyā yo gandho bhago mā tena jinvatu ||
yad indro agre asurāñ jaghāna tato lakṣmīr ny adadhur martyeṣu | tāsāṃ pāpiṣṭhā nir ataḥ suvāmaḥ śivā asyai jātavedo ni yaccha ||
yā tvā lakṣmīr devṛghnī yā patighnī gṛhebhyas tvā nudate yāvyāḍā| atas tvam enaso mucyamān-mucyamānā -ot taremāḥ srotyāḥ sapta sākam ||
nipiṃśantīṃ nitudantīṃ saṃpibantīṃ nyakvarīm | prabhaṅgāṃbhrūṇaghnīṃ lakṣmīṃ brahmaṇā tā anīnaśam ||
udojiṣṭhāṃsahasyāṃ jayantīm aparājitām | lakṣmīr yāḥ puṇyāḥ kalyāṇīs tā asyai savitaḥ suva ||
lakṣmyaḥ sam alapsata sam alapsata lakṣmyaḥ | ajaiṣur bhadrā lakṣmyaḥ parā pāpīr ajeṣata ||
lakṣmīṇāṃ lakṣmītame lakṣmīṇām adhipā asi | tāṃ tvāhaṃ śuddho gopsyāmi devajā hi babhūvitha ||
sabhā ca mā samitiś cāvatāṃ prajāpater duhitarau sacetasau | yenasaṃgacchāupa mā sa tiṣṭhād antar vadāni hṛdaye janānām ||
sabhā senā samitis tvāmavantu prajāpater duhitaraḥ pracetasaḥ | yena vadāny upa mā saśikṣād antar vadāni hṛdaye janānām ||
māṃ vadantam anu sarve vadantu māṃ prāṇantam anu prāṇantu sarve | māṃ viśantam anu sarve viśantu mayi devā ekavṛto bhavantu ||
sūryo mā cakṣuṣaḥ pātu bṛhaspatir vācaḥ somo rājā sabhāyāḥ | indro vo dṛśe bhavāmi ||
veda vai te sabhe nāma subhadrāsi sarasvati | atho ye te sabhāsadas te me santu suvācasaḥ ||
imā yā brahmaṇaspate viṣūcīr vācaīrate| sadhrīcīr indra tāḥ kṛtvā mahyaṃ śivatamāḥ kṛdhi ||
aham eṣāṃhastarasam ahaṃ vijñānam ā dade | sarvasyā asyāḥsaṃsado 'haṃ bhūyāsam uttama indro yo gāyatām iva ||
uttamaṃ mottame kṛdhy uttamā hi babhūvitha | yāṃ tvābhuraṇyuranvaicchad gandharvaḥ śaradaḥ śatam ||
abhibhūr aham āgamam ahaṃ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ | idaṃ pratipravādinaṃ dviṣantam ava dhūnve ||
uruṣ ṭe vastir bhavatu samudrasya bilaṃ yathā | parodakam iva sicyatāṃ mūtraṃ te tanvas pari ||
yathā vāto yathodakaṃ yathā samudra ejati | evā te garbha ejatu niraitu daśamāsyo bahir jarāyuṇā saha ||
idam u śreyo 'vasānamāgāṃ śive me dyāvāpṛthivī abhūtām | asapatnāḥ pradiśo me bhavantu na vai tvā dviṣmo abhayaṃ no astu ||
vāstoṣpata iha naḥ śarma yaccha bhadrācchreyo abhi no neṣavasyaḥ| ariṣṭā vīrā iha me bhavantu dvipāc catuṣpān mayy astu puṣṭam ||
anamīvo vāstoṣpate viśvā rūpāṇy āviśan | sakhā suśeva edhi naḥ ||
ṛtena sthūṇā adhi roha vaṃś-vaṃśa -ogro virājann apavṛṅkṣvaśatrūn | mā te riṣann upasattāro atra virājāṃjīvāccharadaḥ śatāni ||
ā rohataṃ pakṣāv amṛtaṃ vasānau dampatyoḥ kṛṇutaṃ dīrgham āyuḥ | tatra nārī putriṇī jīvapatn-jīvapatnī -īdaṃ kulāyam upasaṃviśāti ||
agnir mā viśvād duritāt punātu mātariśvā pavamānaḥ purastāt somo mā pātu maruto bṛhaspatir vāyuś ca mā pavamānaḥ punītām ||
tvayā satyaṃ vi jayante tava satyaṃ vivācanam | agre vṛkṣasya jāyase semaṃ janaya pūruṣam ||
vṛkṣasya śataśākhasya mādhuntasyanikṛtvanaḥ | vibhīdakasya yat phalaṃ tena tvon mādayāmasi ||
pūrve vātāt pra patataṃ pūrve patatam aśvibhyām | imenyarvaṇīaham udnevāgnimavīvare ||
mā yakṣmam ihahāsiṣṭa mā riphanto vi gātana | subhūtam asmabhyaṃ dhatta yuṣmān anv etu kilbiṣam ||
iha varca iha paya iha cakṣur upa hvaye | ihendriyaṃ dadhātana ||
ā hi harīapaptatām imaṃ vatsaṃ vanād iyam | apakāmaṃ hy aghnye vatso devi mamāra te ||
ye tvopavidur vidur nijavatseva dohasva | ahaṃ te veda saṃmanaḥ saṃvananasya veda te ||
eṣa te aghnye vatsas taṃ vāñcha | tāṃsatyoktiṃbrūmaḥ ||
yā sarasvatī govananī sā vāmenāṅkasā nyetya | imāṃ gāṃ vānayatu svāhā ||
dūrād bheṣajam ābhṛtaṃ bahūny atiyojanā| apaśyam asyantaṃ rudraṃ na dṛṣṭo duṣkṛtaṃ karat ||
bhinadmi te parāvato vatsasya śepyām iva | vṛṣed aso yathā mayi kṛṣṇo viṣāṇavām̐ iva ||
sarvā gāvaḥ saṃmanasaḥ sacchavayaḥsanābhayaḥ | samānaṃ bibhratīr nāma vatsāud rihatāṃ mithaḥ ||
indras tvāgre avānayat savitā tvotāparaḥ | tṛtīyam aśvinā tvāghnye vāñcha ||
ā te nayatu savit-savitā -ā nayatu bṛhaspatiḥ | patir yaḥpratikāmyas tam asyai dhehy oṣadhe ||
indraṃ vayam anurādham ity ekā ||
bhaga prehi prathamo 'nu tvā vayam emasi | indrāgnī brahmaṇāsmān svasti nayatāṃ pathā ||
aditiḥ praitu prathamā bṛhaspatiḥ puraetā te astu | indro bhayaṃ vy asyatu śūdrācca naāryācca ||
ime ye anasi yuktā uṣṭārā utapīlvā| teṣāṃ sam agrabhaṃ padaḥ sam īrmān sam u sakthyaḥ ||
vi madhyamā aproṣata gardabhākṣipitāiva | athāsurasya māyayā mayīdaṃ sthāpayāmasi ||
saṃ mā bhagena dviguṇena varcasā saṃ mā pṛthivyāsaṃmauṣadhībhiḥ| saṃ māpo mayobhuvo bhagena varcasā sican ||
varco me mitrāvaruṇety ekā ||
ṛcaṃ sāma yajāmahe yābhyāṃ karmāṇi kṛṇvate | vi te sadasi rājato yajñaṃ deveṣu yacchatām ||
aṅgamaṅgaṃ saṃ cinomi cakṣuḥ prāṇam atho balam | priyāḥśrutasya bhūyāsm-bhūyāsma -āyuṣmantaḥ sumedhasaḥ ||
etan no deva savitar jagaddhātrīcarakṣatam| pūṣainat punar ājatv avinaṣṭam avihrutam ||
yāvanty eva palitāni sākaṃ jajñire agraśaḥ | tebhyaḥ pari bravīmi tvā kṛṣṇāḥ keśā bhavantu me ||
kṛṣṇān keśān sinīvāli kṛṣṇān keśān sarasvati | kṛṣṇān me aśvinā keśān kṛṇutaṃ puṣkarasrajā ||
ado yad agre devānāṃ purastād avatiṣṭhati | tan me +'bravīt tvaṣṭā viriṣṭabheṣajam ||
śvāviśvadhāyasā viśvabheṣajyā kṛtam | yad āmayati niṣ kṛdhi niṣkṛtir nāma vā asi ||
saṃ te cṛtāmi takariṃ saṃ yoniṃ saṃ gavīnyau | saṃ mātaraṃ ca putraṃ ca saṃ garbhaṃ ca jarāyu ca ||
tiryaṅ te garbho bhavatu hṛdayasthaṃjarāyu te | ād oṣam agnim āroh-roha -ād gaccha yamasādanam ||
vi te cṛtāmi takariṃ vi yoniṃ vi gavīnyau | vi mātaraṃ ca putraṃ ca vi garbhaṃ ca jarāyu ca ||
anvaṅte garbho bhavatv anusotajarāyu te | yathā tvaṃ putraṃ vindāsai yathā jīvāsi bhadrayā ||
pra pṛṣṭhe garbham ardaya vi yona āsyaṃ sṛja | nir aitu daśamāsyo garbho gavīnyor adhi ||
viṣkambheṇa vi ṣkabhāya tau viṣvañcau vyākuru | eṣa vām agnir antarā sa viṣvañcau vy asyatu ||
viṣkambho vi ṣkabhāyatu manaś ca hṛdayaṃ ca vām | vivartana vartaya śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ ||
samudraṃ tvā pra hiṇomi svāṃ yonim apīhi | acchidras tanvā bhūyāsaṃ mā parā seci me payaḥ ||
yad atrāpi rasasya me parāpapātāsmṛtam| tad ihopa hvayāmahe tan mā pyāyatāṃ punaḥ ||
kavir agre pra lilekha dhartā keśām̐ adhārayat | ihaiva viśvato dadhad dhātā tvaṣṭā tvaci keśām̐acīkl̥pat||
sarasvati vrateṣu te divyeṣu devi dhāmasu | mandre hiraṇyavartane pra ṇa āyūṃṣitāriṣaḥ||
yad apsu te sarasvati goṣv aśveṣu yan madhu | tena no vājinīvati mukham aṅdhi sarasvati varcasā ||
yo adya deva sūrya tvāṃ ca māṃcāntarāyati| tasmin duṣvapnyaṃ sarvaṃ duritāni ca mṛjmahe ||
yo no +'bhicchāyaṃ martyeṣv agniṃ tiṣṭhasy antarā | tasya vṛścāmi te mūlaṃ na cchāyāṃ karavo 'param ||
ghnantv enaṃ deveṣavo brahmāṇo ghnantu menyā | yo asmākaṃ prajāpate agniṃ tiṣṭhaty antarā ||
prajāpate yo 'smām̐ ādṛś-ādṛśā -āgniṃ tiṣṭhaty antarā | taṃ mṛtyave pra yacchāmi sa rudrasyāstv ākhaṇaḥ ||
pra suvainaṃdevavajrebhyo mṛtyurvi kramatām adhi | sinātv enān nirṛtir mṛtyoḥ pāśair bandhair avimokyaiḥ ||
sumaṅgalena vacasā keśin grāmaṃ na ā vada | brahmaṇābrahmaṇā tv-tvā -olūkācchā vadāmasi ||
parāṅ eva parā vada parācīm anu saṃvatam | yathā yamasya tvā gṛhe 'rasaṃ praticākaśaṃ niyastaṃ praticākaśam ||
śunamulūkano vada yaṃ dviṣmas tam ito naya | rājño yamasya te gṛhe sikatābhirvidevyam ākhus te mūṣiked bhāgaḥ ||
ā vada bahulaṃ goṣṭhaṃ dhītavatsamanaṣṭagum| dhvāṅkṣāya dvipadāṃ vada śune catuṣpadāṃ vada ||
punar me rājā varuṇaḥ punar indraḥ punar bhagaḥ | punar me viśve devā āyur jīvitavā aduḥ ||
ut tiṣṭhātaḥ pra dravārvāṅ mātra tiṣṭho 'bhicākaśat | sapatnyā varca ādāy-ādāya -āthāsmābhiḥ sahāsasi ||
ut tiṣṭhata nir dravata na va ihāsti nyañcanam | amuṣya vittam abhi vaḥ suvāmi tad anuvadhvaṃ sudatīr ahinas tat||
ye asmākaṃ sabandhavo viṣṭhitāḥ pṛthivīm anu | teṣām indra iva devānām ahaṃ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ ||
ye agnayaḥ pārthivā āhitāḥ pṛthivīm anu | teṣām asi tvaṃ saṃgathe sa no jīvātave kṛdhi ||
citasthaparicitasth-stha -āgnayaś ca nihavā nāma | te no mā ni hvadhvaṃ tebhyo vo namo na vo havam emi | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ sa vo havam etu ||
indrāgnī punar ā kṛtaṃ na etā sthiravīrāv aparāvītagū | asmākaṃ sarvā nihave santv eṣāṃ vayaṃ vidyāma guhyaṃ nāma gavām ||
prajāpate anunikrandaya viśve devāḥ padavāyāḥ santv āsām | ādityā anusaṃgatya śūrā indrajyeṣṭhāḥ punar ā vartayantu ||
indra praṇetar vardhaya m-mā -āśvinā māṃ vahatam āśvaśvā | aindrāgnaṃ varma pratimuñcamāno yathobhayebhyaścāru samitim ā vadāni ||
cāruvāk cāruvadanaś cāru saṃ kāśa no nṛbhiḥ | adveṣyapratīkāśo jigīvām̐ aparājitaḥ ||
api vṛśca purāṇavad vratater iva guṣpitam | ojo dāsasya jambhaya yad etad asya saṃbhṛtaṃ madhu tad indrasya vibhajāvahai ||
mlāpayāmivrajaḥśubhraṃ varuṇasya vratena te | yathāśepoapāyyasa strīṣu cāso anāvayāḥ ||
avasthasya kladīvato bhaṅgurasya nitodinaḥ | yad uttatamavatat tanu yad ātataṃ ni tat tanu ||
amimlapaṃ te tanvaṃ klībaṃ tvā vīrudhākaram | antaḥkośa iva kośeṣu strīṣv apyākṛtaś cara ||
ā no medaṃ gṛhapatir dadhātv indreṇa medinā | ā no medaṃ sarasvaty ā no vahantu sindhavaḥ ||
medaṃ dhātā medaṃ pūṣā medam indro dadhātu me | medaṃ me aśvinobh-aśvinobhā -ā dhattāṃ puṣkarasrajā ||
ūrū medaya me bāhū aṣṭhīvantāuraśca me | vapāṃ pary asya udare medam indro dadhātu me ||
carmaṇa ivopanītasya sarvān keśān vṛhāmi te | ayaspātram iva te śiro yathāsat samaraṃ samam ||
divi tārāudabhiśryan sapta sūryasya raśmayaḥ | dhārāḥ samudriyā apas tās te śalyamacucyavuḥ||
īḍe agniṃ svāvasuṃ namobhir iha prasakto vicayatkṛtaṃ naḥ | rathair iva pra bhare vājayadbhiḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ marutāṃ stomam ṛdhyām ||
sapta sravanti śiśave marutvate pitā putrebhyo apy avīvatad v ṛtā | ubhe pipṛta ubhe asya rājata ubhe yatete ubhe asya puṣyataḥ ||
vedaḥ svastirdruhaṇaḥsvastiḥ parśur vediḥ paraśur naḥ svastiḥ | haviṣkṛto yajñiyā yajñakāmās te devāso havir idaṃ juṣadhvam ||
upa priyaṃpanipnataṃ yuvānam āhutīvṛdham | aganma bibhrato namaḥ ||
imā yās te śataṃhirāḥ sahasraṃ dhamanīr uta | tāsāṃ te sarvāsāṃ sākam aśmanā bilam apy adhām ||
idaṃ khanāmi bheṣajaṃ māṃpaśyam abhirorudam | yenā nicakra āsur-āsurī -īndrāṇī kevalaṃ patim ||
akṣyaunaumadhusaṃkāśe anīkaṃnausamañjanam | antaḥ kṛṇuṣva mā hṛdi mana in nau sahāsati ||
tvāṣṭreṇāhaṃ vacas-vacasā -erṣyāṃ vy amīmadam | atho yo manyus te pate tam u te śamayāmasi ||
vratena tvaṃ vratapate samakto 'hā viśvā sumanā dīdhyo naḥ | taṃ tvā vayaṃ jātavedaḥ samiddhaṃ prajāvanta upa sadema sarve ||
prajāvatīḥ sūyavase riśantīr mā vo vidyuttaranmota senā | suge tīrthe suprapāṇe pibantīḥ parivṛjyavadhaṃ gohanaṃcarantu||
padajñā sta ramatayaḥ saṃhitā viśvarūpā upa no devīr devebhir eta | imaṃ goṣṭham idaṃ sado ghṛtenā naḥ sam ukṣata ||
yā graivyā apacito atho yāupapakṣiyāḥ| vijāmanyāapacitaḥsvayaṃsrasas tā ito nāśayāmasi ||
sāṃtapanā idaṃ havir marutas taj jujuṣṭana | yuṣmākotīriśādasaḥ||
yo no marto maruto durhaṇāyus tiraś cittāni vasavo jighāṃsāt | tasmin tān pāśān prati muñcatā yūyaṃ tapiṣṭhena tapasā hantanā tam ||
saṃvatsarīṇā marutaḥ svarkā urukṣayāḥ sagaṇā mānuṣebhyaḥ | te asmat pāśānpramuñcantu sarvān sāṃtapanā matsarā mādayiṣṇavaḥ ||
dhṛṣat piba kalaśe somam indra vṛtrahā śūra samare vasūnām | mādhyaṃdine savana ā juṣasva rayiṣṭhāno rayim asmāsu dhehi ||
yunajmi tvā brahmaṇā daivyen-daivyena -āsmai kṣatrāṇi dhārayantam agne | didiḍḍhyasmabhyaṃ draviṇeha bhadrā premaṃ vocohavirdāṃdevatāsu ||
vi te muñcāmi raśanāṃ vi yoktraṃ vi niyojanam | ihaiva tvam ajasra edhy agne ||
prajāpate na hi tvad anyo viśvā rūpāṇi mahinā jajāna | yatkāmās te juhumas tan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām ||
yat te devā akṛṇvan bhāgadheyam amāvāsye saṃvasanto mahitvā | semaṃ yajñaṃpipṛhiviśvavāre rayiṃ no dhehi subhage suvīram ||
ghṛtaṃ te agne divye sadhasthe ghṛtena tvā manuradyāsam īdhe | ghṛtaṃ te devā āpyā vahanti ghṛtaṃ tubhyaṃ duhrate gāvo agre ||
mayy agre agniṃ gṛhṇāmi saha kṣatreṇa varcasā balena | mayi prajāṃ mayy āyur dadhāmi svāhā mayy agniḥ ||
apsu te rājan varuṇa gṛho mito hiraṇyayaḥ | tato dhṛtavrato rājā sarvā dhāmāni no muceḥ ||
dhāmnodhāmno rājann ito varuṇa no muceḥ ||
yad āpo aghnyā iti varuṇeti yad ūcima | tato varuṇa no muceḥ ||
yo rudro agnau yo apsv antar ya oṣadhīr vīrudha āviveśa | ya imā viśvā bhuvanāni cākl̥pe tasmai rudrāya namo astv adya ||
apehy arir asy arir vā asi | viṣe viṣam apṛkthā ahim evābhy apehi taṃ jahi ||
pṛtanājitaṃ sahamānam agnim ugraṃ huvema paramāt sadhasthāt | sa naḥ parṣad ati durgāṇi viśvahā kṣāsaddevo 'ti duritāny agniḥ ||
yady antarikṣe yadi vāta āsa yadi vṛkṣeṣu yadi volapeṣu yad aśravan paśava udyamānaṃ tad brāhmaṇaṃ punar asmān upaitu ||
śaṃ mā vāto abhi vātu śaṃ me tapatu sūryaḥ | ahāni śaṃ bhavantu me śaṃ rātrī prati dhīyatāṃ śam uṣā me vy ucchatu ||
ut tiṣṭhata pitaro ye purāsthan yamaṃ rājānam avasānam arcata | ayaṃ nṛṇāṃ nṛtamaḥ śreṣṭha āgan tasmai lokaṃ kṛṇuta yāvatsabandhu ||
yasyedaṃ śastaṃ pratimākṛtaṃ devair dattam asūriyaṃ ca saṃbhṛtam | triḥ sapta kṛtva ṛṣayaḥ paretā mṛtyuṃ pratyauhanpadayopanena ||
agaman gāvaḥ sadanam agamad vasatiṃvayaḥ| āsthāne parvatā asthuḥ sthāman vṛkkāv arīramam ||
ā gāvo goṣṭham agamann āgnidhānāny agnayaḥ | ā vṛkkau samavitsātām utsaktabheṣajam asi ||
yathā dyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ c-ca -āntas tiṣṭhati tejanam | evā rogaṃcāsrāvaṃca muñjas tiṣṭhatiy antarā ||
asthād idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam asthād vāto vanacyavaḥ | asthur vṛkṣā ūrdhvasvapnās tiṣṭhād rogo ayaṃ tava ||
śataṃ yad bheṣajāni te sahasraṃ saṃbhṛtāni ca | teṣām asi tvam uttamaṃ śreṣṭhamāsrāvabheṣajaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃroganāśanam ||
yad adya tvā prayati yajñe asmin hotaś cikitvannavṛṇīmahīha| dhruvam ayo dhruvamutāśamiṣṭha prajānan vidvān upa yāhi somam ||
sam indra no manasā neṣa gobhiḥ saṃ sūribhir harivan saṃ svastyā | saṃ brahmaṇā devakṛtaṃ yad asti ||
saṃ varcasety ekā ||
saṃsrāvabhāgās taviṣā bṛhantaḥ prastareṣṭhā barhiṣadaś ca devāḥ | imaṃ yajñam abhi viśve gṛṇantaḥ svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām ||
yān āvaha uśato deva devāṃs tān preraya punar agne sve sadhasthe | jakṣivāṃsaḥpapivāṃso madhūny asmai dhatta vasavo vasūni ||
ayaṃ no yajño apy etu devān uttarāṃ vedim apy etu vediḥ | vi muñcāmy ṛtvijo dakṣiṇābhir devā yakṣīṣṭa punar uttarāvat ||
yajña yajñaṃ gaccha yajñapatiṃ gaccha | svāṃ yoniṃ gaccha svāhā ||
eṣa te yajñoyajamānasahasūktanamovākaḥ | suvīraḥ svāhā ||
manasaspata imaṃ deva yajñam | svāhā vāci svāhāvātedhāḥ svāhā ||
svāhā hutebhyo vaṣaḍḍhutebhyaḥ| devā gātuvido gātuṃvittvāgātumitasvāhā ||
saṃ barhir aktaṃ haviṣā ghṛtena sam indreṇa vasubhiḥ saṃ marudbhiḥ | saṃ devebhir viśvadevebhir aktam indraṃ gacchatu yat svāhā ||
āśāsānā saumanasaṃ prajāṃ cakṣur atho balam | indrāṇyā anuvrataṃ saṃ nahye amṛtāya kam ||
indrāṇī nārī subhagā supatny ud aṃśena patividye bibheda | triṃśad yasyā jaghanaṃ yojanāny upastha indraṃ sthaviraṃ pipartu ||
senāsi pṛthivīdhanaṃjay-dhanaṃjayā -āditir viśvarūpā sūryatvak | indrāṇī prāṣāṭ saṃjayantī tasyai ta enā haviṣā vidhema ||
ajirottiṣṭhantyutthitāgre tvarī prāṣāṭ tūrtam upacarantīm | prāṣāṭ kastvariṣātvāgre tvarikas tvayiṣamesa tvābhadre ||
paryāvarteduṣvapnyāt pāpāt svapnād abhūtyāḥ | brahmāham antaraṃ kṛṇve parā svapnamukhāḥ śucaḥ ||
yat svapne annam aśnāmi na prātar adhigamyate | sarvaṃ tad astu naḥ śivaṃ nahi tad dṛśyate divā ||
viśvaṃ vivyajmi pṛthivīva puṣṭam āyadāyatprati gṛhṇāmy annam | vaiśvānarasya mahato mahimnā syonam asmabhyaṃ madhumat kṛṇotu ||
triśṛṅgam asi durabhidharṣam indrāya dhriyase | pūṣā te prāśitā ||
pāhi no agne tanvaṃ pāhi gāḥ pāhi yat tanūkṛtam | ahutādāvamartyau tāv asmān pāto aṃhasaḥ ||
yaudevānām ahutādāvamartyau svarbhānuś ca svarjyotiś ca | tayos tvāsyena prāśnāmy agneṣ ṭvā vaiśvānarasya tvāsyena prāśnāmi ||
dakṣaścatvā mānasaḥ prāśnītāṃ svarbhānuś ca mārutaḥ | mā pṛṇan pūrtyā vi rādhi mo vayaṃ prajayā dhanena ||
anādhṛṣyasya te pito anādhṛṣyaśavasaḥ | sarvavīrāḥ sarvātmāno bhakṣaṃ kriyāsma ||
kāmo me rājñi pra viveśa tvāṃ tam ahaṃ nir hvaye punaḥ | gṛheṣu goṣu me mano akṣyor astu me bhago jihvāyām astu me raso bāhvor astu me balam ūrvor astu me javaḥ ||
divo 'si nirmathitaṃ pṛthivyā adhy udbhṛtam | samudrād ucyase jātam akṣyāmayabheṣajam asy ātharvaṇam ||
pūṣā parastād āvartayatu catasro bhūmyā diśaḥ | sagalika puṣalika punar no naṣṭam āyati jīvena bhunajāmahai ||
yad ābharacchṛtadagnis tejane naṣṭavedanam | khargaleva punar dattaṃ punarasmāaśvinānaṣṭamājatam||
yady asy apriyajā yadi vānyataābhṛtaḥ| visalpakasya bheṣajīr devīr āpa imā mama ||
yavasyapūtikasya dṛśāmbasyota garmutaḥ | teṣāṃ sam agrabhaṃ śuṣmam āśūnāṃ dhāvatām iva ||
yas tanuḥpraturvaṇī vadha iva prasarpati | mayūraḥ kila te viṣaṃ kṛkavākuś ca jakṣatu ||
udīcīnaḥ pra tanoti nitatnir bhūmyām adhi | ojmānaṃ paśya vīrudho mithunā sam avīvanat ||
ni tvātanaṃ nitatninā pari tvāgāṃ sahīyasā | śyenādabhidravīyasā suparṇān nikarīyasā ||
yad atrāpi madhor ahaṃ niraṣṭhaviṣamasmṛtam| agniś ca tat savitā ca punar me jaṭhare dhattām ||
agne rudrasya jāyāsi duhitāsiprajāpateḥ| uccaiḥślokedānapatnihaviḥśrava upa tvā hvaya upa mā hvayasva | nariṣṭā nāma vā asi ||
yathāsau hariṇo vṛṣā kūlād adhi praskandati | evā ni ṣkanda pitryād bhagaṃ jayantī dhanaṃ jayantī ||
ṛjiśvāmahyam abravīd gandharvasyānuśāsanam | etat te pativedanam ||
pāṭā bhinattu kumbhaṃ pāṭā kumbhīṃ gadohanīm | pāṭā sarvasya pātrasya vadhūṃ kṛṇotu viśvataḥ ||
apehi takmaṃś cara paro anyam asmad iccha puruṣaṃ kaṃ cid eva | veda tetakmanpitaraṃ veda mātaram ||
śamīvān asi śāmīvataḥ śamīvān ābhiśokiḥ | abhiśoko hārṣaṇir harṣaṇo jāñjabhiḥ ||
yaḥ paśūnāṃ mārjanīyo yaṃ tvam aṃśena bhejiṣe | abhīhi takman gardabhaṃ na mām abhyetum arhasi ||
visrasā nāma te mātā kiḥkiśo (⟨kiṣkiṣo?) nāma te pitā | śimidā nāma te svasā ||
giriṃgacchagirijā asi girau te māhiṣo gṛhaḥ | dāsī cakram āsthāya nāmlāte ni krandayiṣyati ||
ā vāto vātv anaghaḥ sarvasya dūtoabhiśastipāḥ| jalāṣam it pra siñcati tad viṣasyāpa siñcatu ||
yām asyati pṛśnibāhur iṣṭaṃ haridruparṇyam | tām asya niṣ khidāmasi yathā jīvāsi bhadrayā ||
aśrāntasya tvā manasā yunajmi prathamasya ca | utkūlamudvaho bhav-bhava -oduhya prati dhāvatāt ||
etaṃ dantaṃ nirṛtyā ghoram āhur yasta āsann avarūḍha eṣaḥ | taṃ durhārde pra hiṇomi ghoraṃ sanomāhiṃsījjyāyaso mā kanīyasaḥ ||
śivaḥ śagmo bhavatu danta eṣa mā nohiṃsījjyāyaso mā kanīyasaḥ | aghamāram aghaśaṃsaṃ nirṛthaṃ taṃ te dantaḥ sacatāṃ ghora eṣaḥ ||
aghamāram aghaśaṃsaṃ nirṛthaṃ durhārde dantaṃ pra hiṇomi ghoram | so asyāttu dvipadaś catuṣpadaḥ śivo asmabhyaṃ sumanā astv eṣaḥ ||
śivaṃ te dantaṃ haviṣā kṛṇomi śivo mahyaṃ kurvate danto astu | śivāni te trīṇi trikadrukāṇi santu śivo mahyaṃ nabhasī rodasī stām ||
pururūpā pṛthupeśā araṃkṛdvahator asi | pratiṣṭhāsi catuṣpadāṃ yas ta eṣa pañcamaḥ pādas taṃ tena prati gṛhṇāmi ||
sasarparīr amatiṃ bādhamānā bṛhan mimāya jamadagnidattā | ā sūryasya duhitā tatāna śravo deveṣv amṛtam ajuryam ||
sasarparīr abharat tūyam ebhyo 'dhi śravaḥ pāñcajanyāsu kṛṣṭiṣu | sā pakṣyānavyamāyurdadhānā yāṃ me pulasti jamadagnayo daduḥ ||
aghnyedūramūtkanda ni padaś caturo jahi | adhā goduhaḥ śīrṣaṇi śaphām̐ urasi vādaya ||
śṛṅgābhyām upa sraṣṭāraṃ padāvartaya goduham | atho ye anye tiṣṭhanti tān viṣūco vi nāśaya ||
yathā nartā sakṣikājiṃ ni kulpham abhinṛtyati | evā tvam aghnye padaḥ sarvān sākam ud ardaya ||
ud u kṣīram uttabhitaṃ syandantām asya dhenavaḥ | asṛk tasya gāvo duhrāṃ yo asmānnāpacāyati||
ṛkṣīkāyā yathā mano vyāghrasya yathā manaḥ | evā tasya gavāṃ mano yo asmānnāpacāyati||
uttamosy oṣadhīnāṃ vīrudhāṃ balavattamaḥ | sasyandana tvam oṣadhe sarvāḥsyandaya gā imāḥ ||
aranturathantu | vaneṣu śuṣmo astu te pṛthivyām astu yaddharaḥ||
akṛd aśvo akṛt kharo akṛd aśvataro hariḥ | evāsibahvaghe tava bhasan nadatvāsicā||
yathā nadati gardabha evānadatite bhasat | vrīher yavasya māṣasy-māṣasya -aitat paśyābhidarśanam ||
ud bhare dyāvāpṛthivī ud āpa ud agnim ud indram ut sūryam ud rātrim ud ahaḥ ||
namaskṛtya dyāvāpṛthivībhyām antarikṣāya mṛtyave | mekṣyāmy ūrdhvas tiṣṭhan mā mā hiṃsiṣur īśvarāḥ ||
yanmeḍhvāyad apsarasaḥ payo devīr ahṛṣata | tad ihopa hṛyāmahe cakṣuṣe ca balāya ca | devānāṃ devahūtyā mayi tyā devatāḥ punaḥ ||
yāsya doṣā rasasya me tvaṃ devi tatarpitha | nārāśaṃsena stomen-stomena -āhaṃ tvat punar ā dade yuṣmad apsarasas pari ||
yan me tanvo rasaṃ vayam ud apsarasas pari | nārāśaṃsena stomena prajām ā pyāyāmahe ||
yan me payo viṣiṣice jāgrataḥ svapataś ca yat | punas tad adya me devā ā siñcantu tanū adhi ||
yad adya dugdhaṃ pṛthivīm asakta yad oṣadhīrvyasaradyad āpaḥ | vatse payo gavi payo yadasyām asmāṃstat sacatāṃ payaḥ ||
parā patanty āśavo 'śvā adhodhuraṃ yathā | evā mūtra pra bhidyasva vi vaster āsyaṃ sṛja ||
viṣitaṃ te vastibilam ity ekā ||
asya pāre samudrasya śukraṃ jyotir amartyam | tan naḥ pātv aṃhasas tan naḥ pātu viśvataḥ ||
ā no medhā sumatir viśvarūpā hiraṇyavarṇā jagatī jagamyāt | sā no agne medhā juṣatām iha pracetāḥ ||
niṣ krāmatv iṣiryo atra praviṣṭo vayāṣṭhaśca sayujā yāv iha staḥ | sapta ṛṣīṇāṃ syūmaraśmiḥ pathaitu svān mṛgān punar apy etu kṛṣṇaḥ ||
sapta ṛṣīn gaccha syūmaraśmaye mṛgān kṛṣṇaḥ sacatāṃ vājo aśvam | īḍo asmān suprajasaḥ suvīrān saha yajñena payasā sacātai ||
namo astvṛṣayesyūmaraśmaye namaḥ kṛṣṇāyota yo vājo asya | namo devāyārvateṣu jiṣṇave 'yaṃ no vājī pra tirāty āyuḥ ||
ati yanty ahāny ati rātrīr aty uṣasaḥ | āpo antardhāvarīs tābhir antar dadhe tvā ||

rantir asi ramatir asi | saṃśrutenarādhiṣīya mā śrutena vi rādhiṣi ||
darśo 'si darśato 'si viśvataḥ saṃdṛṣṭaḥ | somo asi rudro asi ||
taṃ tvā yaṃ devā aṃśum āpyāyanti taṃ tvā yam ādityā aṃśum āpyāyanti | taṃ tvā yam akṣitam akṣitaye pibanti sa naḥ somaḥ pra tirad dīrgham āyuḥ ||
anyeṣāṃ prāṇenā pyāyasva māsmākaṃ prāṇena | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas tasya prāṇenā pyāyasva ||
cid asi samudrayoniḥ śyena ṛtāvān | somapīthopa na ehy arvāṅ rāyaspoṣeṇa prajayā dhanena ||

apaścāddaghvānnasyabhūyāsam | annādāyānnapataye rudrāya namo agnaye ||
yā te vaso vāta iṣuḥ sā ta eṣā | tayā no mṛḍa ||
agnis takmānam apa bādhatām ito varuṇo grāvā marutaḥ pūtadakṣāḥ | barhiṣadaḥ samidhaḥ śośucānās takmanaḥ śocām apa nir nudantu ||
yo abhyavabhṛṇāyasi svapantam iccha puruṣaṃ śayānam akovidam | sa naḥ sahasravīry-sahasravīrya -ānuṣṭhātā śivo bhava ||

brahmayātur asi mṛḍo 'si | mṛḍāsmākaṃ dvipade catuṣpade mā tasya mīmṛḍo dvipade catuṣpade yo asmān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ ||
annayātur asi mṛḍo 'si | mṛḍāsmākaṃ dvipade catuṣpade mā tasya mīmṛḍo dvipade catuṣpade yo asmān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ ||
manuṣyayātur asi mṛḍo 'si | mṛḍāsmākaṃ dvipade catuṣpade mā tasya mīmṛḍo dvipade catuṣpade yo asmān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ ||
avabharaṇo nāmāsi devatrā ṇo akṣamāpaḥ | yo asmān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃtaāsann api daghmaḥ ||

ketuluṅgā nāma te mātā karkaṭaḥ pitā | tat satyam arasam abhaga te viṣam ||
dve viṣasya dhāre striyā anyā puṃso anyā | te ubhe arase ||

viśvakarmantattvam upa gacchasi | ado me naṣṭaṃ tan me punar dehi ||
viśvavyacas tat tvayy adhy āhitam | ado me naṣṭaṃ tan me punar dehi ||
pari pūṣā purastād dhastaṃ dadhātu dakṣiṇam | punar no naṣṭam āyati jīvena bhunajāmahai ||
indras tvābhy ait sarpat tattvā goṣṭha ādadhāt | tadāsrāvasyabheṣajaṃ tad u rogam anīnaśat ||

viṣṇor manasā pūtam asi devas tvā savitot punātu | acchidreṇapavitreṇa sahasradhāreṇasupvā||
hṛdā pūtaṃ manasā jātavedo viśvāni devo vayunāni vidvān | saptāsyāni tava yāny agne tebhyo juhomi sa juṣasva havyam ||

snuṣāsau senāsyāḥ senāyā ihāsyāḥ śvaśuroyam asyāḥ śvaśuraḥ | sā yathā snuṣā śvaśurād adhaspadyate adharā padyate nīcī padyate ||
evāsau senāsyāḥ senāyā adhas padyatām adharā padyatāṃ nīcī padyatām | sendrāgnibhyāṃ hatavīrāṃ hatapūruṣāṃ parājitāṃ praṇuttaitu paramāṃparāvatam||
tām indrāgnī hatavīrāṃ hatapūruṣāṃ parājitāṃ praṇuttāṃ yatīmanvākśītām| parājita etv asāv āmuṣyāyaṇo amuṣyāḥ putraḥ ||
asnā vyakta etu | aghaṃ hi raṇyetv asāv āmuṣyāyaṇo amuṣyāḥ putraḥ ||
aghapratīko aghenainaṃ vidhyāmaḥ | abhūtyā enaṃ pāśe sitvā duṣvapnyena saṃ sṛjya mṛtyor vyātta āsann api dadhāmi ||
sṛjāmy āpa uśatīrupemāḥ saṃrarāṇāḥ payasā saṃ babhūvuḥ | datto asmabhyaṃ draviṇeha bhadrā apāṃ prati prati gṛhṇātv enāḥ ||
uc chrayasva bahur bhava svena mahasā yava | pṛṇīhi sarvā pātrāṇi mā tvā divyāśanir vadhīt ||
āśṛṇvantaṃ yavaṃ devaṃ yatra tvācchāvadāmasi | tad uc chrayasva dyaur iva samudra ivaidhy akṣitaḥ ||
akṣitās ta upasado akṣitāḥ santu rāśayaḥ | pṛṇantoakṣitāḥ santv attāraḥ santv akṣitāḥ ||
sakṛd yad dyaur ajāyata sakṛd bhūmir ajāyata | sakṛd yaḥ pṛśniyā dugdhaṃ tad anyo nānu jāyate mā tvānu jani kaś cana ||
iṣvagram iṣuyāvanaṃ maṇiṃ kṛṇve sumaṅgalam | sa mā śaravyābhyaḥ pātu divānaktaṃ ca jīvase ||

śīrṇaṃ ta etan na kṣutaṃ ta etat saṃkṣutaṃ duḥkṣutaṃ tubhyam astu | rudrāśaniṣ ṭe jaghanena grīvā indra iva vṛtraṃ vajreṇa hantu ||
anuhavaṃ parihavaṃ parivādaṃ parikṣavam | savyermaṃ riktakumbhāṃ parā tāṃ savitaḥ suva ||
apapāpaṃ parikṣavaṃ puṇyaṃ bhakṣīmahi kṣavam | śivā tepāpanāsikāṃ parṇakaś cābhi mehatām ||
abhi tvā pañcaśākhena hastenādhāṃ sahīyasā | yathā navidviṣāvahai na vibhavāva kadā cana ||
cākravākaṃ saṃvananam asyasyasvaṃkaram | amuṃ svaṃ kṛṇotu me yam ahaṃ kāmaye priyam ||
yat kakṣīvāṃ saṃvananaṃ cyavanaś cakra āsuraḥ | tad vāṃ kṛṇomi dampatī saṃ priyau bhavataṃ yuvam ||
yathā saṃyuktau pakṣiṇau saṃpriyau carato mṛgau | evā saṃyuktau brahmaṇā saṃpriyau bhavataṃ yuvam ||
prehi pra hara pādāv ā gṛhebhyaḥ svastaye | kapiñjala pradakṣiṇaṃ śatapatrābhi no vada ||
bhadraṃ vada dakṣiṇato bhadram uttarato vada | bhadraṃ purastān no vada bhadraṃ paścāt kapiñjala ||
śunaṃ vada dakṣiṇataḥ śunam uttarato vada | śunaṃ purastān no vada śunaṃ paścāt kapiñjala ||
yauvanānimahayasi jigyuṣām iva dundubhiḥ | kapiñjala pradakṣiṇaṃ śatapatrābhi no vada ||
ut tabhnāmi gavāṃ kṣīram ud rathaṃ rathavāhanam | ut tabdhā asmākaṃ vīrā mayi gāvaś ca gopatau ||
ut tvā stabhnātu savitā devo agnir un mitrāvaruṇāv aśvinobhā | sarvān sapatnān avadhīr yugena viśāṃ patir upasattaidhy atra ||

vāyav ārundhino mṛgān asmabhyaṃ mṛgayadbhyaḥ | sa no nediṣṭham ā kṛdhi vāto hi raśanākṛtaḥ ||

ā no hasto akṛtāgāt svargaḥ punar aitu tanvā saṃvidānaḥ | prāṇena tejasā harasā balena mitro asmān varuṇa ubhayatas pātu ||
yat kāma kāmayamānā idaṃ kṛṇmasi te haviḥ | tan naḥ sarvaṃ sam ṛdhyatām athaitasya haviṣo vīhi svāhā ||
yad varco dyāvāpṛthivyor atho yad āñjana tvayi | tena sucakṣā varcasy ahaṃ bhūyāsam āñjana ||
yady aspṛṣi śliṣṭaṃ yadi vā svapnayānuśliṣṭam | āśliṣṭāvacchedanam asy abhidṛṣṭavīryam ||
ava vār iva vārivā ava varṣaṃ girer iva | ava jyām iva dhanvano hṛdi śliṣṭaṃ chinadmi te ||
yat te hṛdi śliṣṭaṃ yac ca śliṣṭaṃpurītati| madhye pṛṣṭīnāṃ yac chliṣṭaṃ tat pārṣṇyāva chinadmi te ||
yat te śliṣṭaṃ kloma karṇeṣu yac ca śiśne sanābhyām | indras tad abravīd bhiṣak pārṣṇir āśliṣṭāvacchedanī ||
eṣā vai duḥsahā nāma pārṣṇir āśliṣṭāvacchedanī | idam aham amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasyāmuṣyāḥ putrasyāśliṣṭāṃ pra cchinadmi ||
vipaścit puccham ābharat tad viṣṇuḥ punar ābharat | tad agninā manasā saṃvidānaṃ pumāṃsam asyai putraṃ dhehi svāhā ||
vipaścit puccham ā bhara yarjjarahastācittyā| yathāsyāḥ putro jāyatā abhibhūr ṇo vipaścitā ||
apehīto vipaścit tvaṃ pumān ayaṃ janiṣyate | pumān puṃso adhi saṃbhūtaḥ sa pumān eva jāyatām ||
bhadrāya karṇaḥ krośatu bhadrāyākṣi vi vepatām | parā duṣvapnyaṃ suva yad bhadraṃ tan na ā suva ||

ā pyāyasva sam etu te viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam | bhavā vājasya saṃgathe ||
ā pyāyasva madintama soma viśvebhir aṃśubhiḥ | bhavā naḥ sumnayuḥ sakhā vṛdhe ||

vidma tvā vayaṃ somaṃ rājānaṃ ye tvā na viduḥ | teṣāṃ cakṣuṣā śrotreṇa prāṇena prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanenā pyāyasva | eṣā ta oṣadhīs tayā tvam ā pyāyasva ||
āpīnoasmān āpyāyac cakṣuṣā śrotreṇa prāṇena prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena ||
yad veda rājā varuṇo veda devo bṛhaspatiḥ | indro yad vṛtrahā veda tat satyaṃ cittamohanam ||
śarveṇa nīlaśikhaṇḍena bhavena marutāṃ pitrā | virūpākṣeṇa babhruṇā vācaṃ vadiṣyatohatāḥ||

asti vai pathāṃ niṣkuṭaṃ nadīnāṃ ca niraṅkaśam | tena vaś cittam amūmuhaṃ tena vaś cittam anīnaśam ||
yāni vaḥ sapta cetāṃsy aṣṭau yāni manāṃsi ca | tad vaś cittam amūmuhaṃ tad vaś cittam anīnaśam ||
indreṇa medinā yuj-yujā -āgninā jātavedasā | tena vaś cittam amūmuhaṃ tena vaś cittam anīnaśam ||
pratīcīnāṃ vo abhy adhām aśvam ivāśvābhidhānyā | kṛṇve vo māmake vaśe pador upānahau yathā ||
devānāṃ saṃsad asi devānāṃ yātur asi | yayā tanvā brahma jinvasi tayā mā jinva ||
roce mā prakāśe mā kaṇvā vidan mā gamaya | anu mā budhyantām ||
vayaḥ suparṇā upa sedur indraṃ priyamedhā ṛṣayo nādhamānāḥ | apa dhvāntam ūrṇuhipūrdhicakṣur mumugdhy asmān nidhayeva baddhān ||
apsu jātasya mahatas pary aśmanaḥ | svayaṃjātasya śociṣo 'dbhiḥ parvata nāśaya ||
uttodinīṃ śimidvatī durgayonir vyadvarām | mṛgām̐ anu pra pātaya marīcīr anu nāśaya ||
aśvasyāsnaḥsaṃpatitāaśvaḥsyāstnaḥ V/122 parṇe te vasatiṣ kṛtā | asṛk patatriṇām asi jahi vāmūn pra bādhama ||
asṛkto adhi jāto 'si parṇe te sadanaṃ kṛtam | āṇḍaṃ patatriṇām asi jahi vāmūn pra bādhama ||
yathā gardabho vivartanād vidhūyavipalāyate| evāsau palāyatām amuṣmād adhy āyataḥ ||
sanir asi sanitāsi saneyam ||
kṛtir asi kartāsi kriyāsam ||
vittir asi vettāsi videyam ||
bhūtir asi bhūtāsi bhūyāsam ||
bhūr asi subhūr asi subhūr nāmāsi ||
prajāpater madhyamaḥ śreṣṭho raśmir asi ||
bhūtaye tvā vittaye tvā paśūnāṃ tvā vittaya ā dadhāmi ||
agnir vahnirvahniragniḥ ||
indraāroddhāprajāpatiḥ pradātā ||
bṛhaspates tvā mukhena yācāmi sūryasya tvā cakṣuṣā pratīkṣe adabdhena tvā cakṣuṣāvekṣe ||
ayuto 'ham ayuto ma ātmā ayutaṃ me cakṣur ayutaṃ me śrotram ayuto me prāṇo ayuto me 'pāno ayuto 'haṃ sarvaḥ ||
devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ prasūta ā rabhe ||
agneṣ ṭvāsyena prāśnāmi bṛhaspater mukhena ||
indrasya tvā jaṭhare sādayāmi varuṇasyodare ||
yo agnirnṛmaṇānāma brāhmaṇeṣu praviṣṭaḥ ||
tasminnetatsuhutam astu prāśitaṃ tan mā mā hiṃsīḥ parame vyoman ||
veda vai te takman nāma viśvaso nāma vā asi | asamaratho nāma te pitā hārṣī nāma takman te mātā śimidā nāma te svasā ||
giriṃ gaccheti sāptamikī ||
asurās tvod ava bharan samudrād adhi māyayā | tad āsrāvasya bheṣajaṃ tad u rogam anīnaśat ||
rogasthānam asṛksthānam atho āsrāvabheṣajam | babhror aśvasya vāreṇ-vāreṇa -āpi nahyāmi tā aham ||
yan me daṇḍo vāpāti dīkṣayā tapasā saha | tam ahaṃ punar ā dade punar indraḥ punar bhagaḥ | punar me brahmaṇaspatir brahma jīvitavā adāt ||
itthād ulūkāpatanvan uttānapādam arbhakaḥ | sa me premāṇam ā vahad apa dveṣaḥ parā vahat ||
yathā bāṇaḥ susaṃśitaḥ parāpataty āśumat | evā mūtrasya te dhārā parā patati ketumat ||
yathā madhu madhukṛtaḥ saṃbharanti madhāv adhi | evā me madhumad vaco deveṣu puruṣeṣu ca ||
dīrghāyutvāya tapase mahyā ariṣṭatātaye | suparṇo mahyam abravīd etad utsaktabheṣajam etat puliśabheṣajam ||
agnī rakṣāṃsīty ekā ||
paiśir mātā peśiḥ pitā paiśeyaḥ peśyā hataḥ | addhā kṛtasya brahmaṇā vṛścikasyārasaṃ viṣam ||
nir hvayāmi parṇasādān nir ut pucchād u te viṣam | bhūmis ta ucyate mātā tasyaite nama it sṛja ||
kim u danta āmayati kim abhūd upaveśanam | āpo nir asyatā krimim agade kṛṇutā hanū ||
yatra bhūmyā anāmṛtaṃ divi candramasi śritam | vidvām̐ ahaṃ tatra manye māhaṃ pautram aghaṃ ni gām ||
yat te susīme hṛdayam ado vai tat prajāpatau | vedāma tasya te vayaṃ (māhaṃ pautram aghaṃ ni gām) ||
yat suvarṇāyā hṛdayaṃ pṛthivyām adhi niṣṭhitam | vedāhaṃ tasyās tan nāma (māhaṃ pautram aghaṃ ni gām) ||
agner hṛdayam asi vidyuttattvā tathā veda | māhaṃ pautram aghaṃ ni gām ||
prajā ime prajāpata indrāgnī śarma yacchatam | yathāhaṃ jyog ihāsāni prajānām adhipā vaśī ||
yāṃ prajām avidāmady-adya -ātmanaḥparinirmitām | āyuṣmatīṃ tanūkṛtāṃ tām̐ agne jarase naya ||
indra ivāsāni sāsahir agnir iva jyotiṣā bṛhan | sūrya iva viśvataḥ pratyak samudra iva duṣṭaraḥ ||
ṛcaṃ sāma yad aprākṣaṃ havir ojo yajur balam | etaṃ mā tasmān māhiṃsīd vedaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ śacīpate ||
ud bhare dyāvāpṛthivī sahauṣadhībhiḥ | gṛhṇāmi prajāṃ nir apaḥ sṛjāmi ||
mā na āpo medhāṃ mā brahma pramathiṣṭana| suṣyadāyūyaṃ syandadhvam upahūto 'haṃ sumedhā varcasvī ||
mā no medhāṃ mā no dīkṣāṃ mā no hiṃsiṣṭa yat tapaḥ | śivā naḥ sarvaāyuṣaBhatt. āyuṣe āpo bhavantu mātaraḥ ||
iha prajā viśvarūpā ramantām asmin goṣṭhe viśvabhṛto janitrīḥ | agniṃ kulāyam upa saṃviśantīr jānantu naḥ payasā ghṛtena ||
rantaya stha ramataya stha mayiśritastha mayi śrayadhvam | manotā nāma stha grāmyā apsaraso veda vo vittam ā māviśata||
śarva nīlaśikhaṇḍa vīra karmaṇikarmaṇi | imām asya prāśaṃ jahi yenedaṃ vivadāmahe ||
tṛtīyakaṃ vitṛtīyaṃsadandiṃ takmānam uta rājayakṣmam | yathā śakra unmumoca tṛtīyakam evāhaṃ tad un muñcāmi tṛtīyakaṃ tam asyām oṣadhyāṃ badhnāmi ||
ādhvastapakṣṇe bṛhate pathe 'ham akaraṃ namaḥ ||
indrāya tviṣīmate pathe 'ham akaraṃ namaḥ ||
vyāghrāyobhayādate pathe 'ham akaraṃ namaḥ ||
namas te pathye revati svasti mā parā ṇaya svasti punar ā naya | atho svasti naskṛdhi jīvā jyotir aśīmahi ||
āmanasaṃyajāmahe satyaprāśaṃ purohitam | taṃ devaṃ prathamaṃ yaje yo 'mum āmanasaṃ karat ||
āmanaska devak-devaka -āroruvatka devaka | arvāg avastaraṃ kṛdhi yam ahaṃ kāmaye priyam ||
ayaṃ no agnir adhyakṣo ayaṃ no vasuvittamaḥ | asyopasadye mā riṣām-riṣāma -āyaṃ rakṣatu naḥ prajām ||
asmin sahasraṃ puṣyāsm-puṣyāsma -aidhamānāḥ sve gṛhe | imaṃ sam indhiṣīmahy āyuṣmantaḥ suvarcasaḥ ||
śuddhavālā kṛṣṇaphalā kabrūr balāsabheṣajī | śuktivalgasya nāśanī devī dadātu bheṣajam ||
aśvattho devasadanas tṛtīyasyām ito divi | tatra lohitavṛkṣo jātaḥ śigruḥ kṣiptabheṣajaḥ ||
na tatra bhavo hanti na śarva iṣum asyati | yatra tvaṃ deva tumburo parvateṣuvirohasi||
kṛṣyām anyo vi rohati girer anyo 'dhi pakṣasi | trātārauśaśvatāmimāv ā gantāṃśigrutumburū||
yāvat parṇaṃ yāvat phalaṃ yāvanto adhyṛkṣarāḥ | tāvantaḥ śuṣmās tumburos tad u te viṣadūṣaṇam ||
rudra jalāṣabheṣaj-jalāṣabheṣaja -emaṃ rogam aśīsamo jalāṇiti ||
asthāddyaur asthāt pṛthivy asthād idam urv antarikṣam | ṛṣabhasyeva kanikladato hṛdayaṃ śamayāmi te ||
saṃ mā siñcantu marutaḥ saṃ māsau rohiṇī divaḥ | saṃ māyam agniḥ siñcatu prajayā ca dhanena ca dīrgham āyuṣ kṛṇotu me ||
naktaṃharīmṛgayete divā suparṇarohitau | bhavāya ca śarvāya c-ca -obhābhyām akaraṃ namaḥ ||
namo bhavāya namaḥ śarvāya namaḥ kumāraśatrave | namo nīlaśikhaṇḍāya namaḥsabhāprapādine||
yasya harī aśvatarau gardabhāv abhitaḥsarau | tasmai nīlaśikhaṇḍāya namaḥsabhāprapādine||
asāv eti śiśumāro asāv eti pulīkayā | kumāraśatro va roh-roha -odakaṃ parivācanam ||
yathedam abhram arbhakaṃ parjanyād apaśīyate| evā me aśvinā mukhād abhīly apaśīyatām||
abhīli naśyetaḥ paras tvacaṃ me mābhi mimlapaḥ | agastyasya brahmaṇ-brahmaṇā -ābhīlīṃ nāśayāmasi ||
sesicām upatvacāṃ nāśay-nāśaya -ā pururūpād abhīlyaṃ mukhāt ||
yan me kṛtād apriyād āruroha malaṃ mukham | apāṃ vāta iva śīpālaṃ sūryas tad apa lumpatu ||
apa me 'bhīlī patatv abhraṃvātahṛtaṃyathā | ā mā suvarṇaṃ gacchatu subhāgam astu me mukham ||
yathā sūryasyopodaye hiraṇyaṃ pratirocate | evā me aśvinā mukhaṃ suvarṇaṃprati rocatām ||
pra yad gāvo na bhūrṇayas tveṣā vayāṃsy akraman | ghnantu kṛṣṇāmapatvacaṃ subhāgam astu me mukham ||
indreṇa preṣita ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te ||
somena preṣita ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te ||
sūryeṇa preṣita ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te ||
bṛhaspatinā preṣita ulūkāsaṃ pacāmi te ||
prajāpatinā preṣita ulūkāsaṃ pacāmi te ||
grāhyā dūto 'sy ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te ||
nirṛtyā dūto 'sy ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te ||
varuṇasya dūto 'sy ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te ||
mṛtyor dūto 'sy ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te ||
yamasya dūto 'sy ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te ||
rājā tvā varuṇo 'khanad dattāṃ somena babhruṇā | tāṃ tvā vidma pratāpikāṃ prāmuṣya hṛdayaṃ tapa ||
śocayainaṃ pratapainaṃ sam enaṃ takmanā sṛja | yathāsya dahyamānasy-dahyamānasya -āgniḥ parvāṇy anvayad| hṛdayaṃprevalijjayād akṣyaukāmena śocayān muhūrtaṃ mām apaśyataḥ ||
ayamittvāgnir ā nayād vātas tvāta ud yamāt | yaṃ tvam enaṃ ni vartay-vartaya -āsauhā iha te manaḥ ||
agniṣ ṭvā tapatu sūryas tvā tapatu vātas tvā yuṅktāṃ marutaś ca yuñjatām | arvāṅ ehi samaṭamāno marīcibhiḥ ||
vṛhāmi te lomāny aṅgebhyaḥ pacāmi māṃsaṃ jvalayāmy asthi | iha te ramatāṃ mano mayi te ramatāṃ manaḥ ||
ayaṃ piṇḍaḥ karkarapiṇḍaḥ smaraḥ pāñcalaḥ saṃtapanaḥ karaṃkaraḥ | amuṣya hṛdayaṃ tapo yam ahaṃ kāmaye priyam ||
yathāyam agnis tapati yathā tapati sūryaḥ | evā te tapyatāṃ mano hṛdayam aṅgamaṅgaṃ paruṣparur māṃ kāmena na ramāsā atra ||
yathā tapati paraśuṃ yathāvāsinakhādanam| yathā sūrya udyan sarvaṃ saṃtapati | evā te tapyatāṃ mano hṛdayam aṅgamaṅgaṃ paruṣparur māṃ kāmena na ramāsā atra ||
saṃ tvā dyauś ca pṛthivī ca tapatāṃ māṃ kāmena na ramāsā atra ||
smara hai smaratād amum aṅgajvareṇocchocanīnām | takmanainaṃ saṃ sṛja viśvaśāradena mama kāmena ||
aṣṭāśītiṃ sahasrāṇy aty avādīd vaco mama | ihāre 'hamavādiṣam atrāreprāyasyastam ||
yaṃ sumitraḥ sumitrāyai cakre 'vāsā smaram | yathā sā tasya kāmena na suṣvāpa kadā cana | evāsau mama kāmena māva svāpsīt kadā cana ||
pary agnir āpas tapati pari dyām eti sūryaḥ | pari tvām indro vṛtrahā mahyaṃ tapatu sarvataḥ ||
yathā vāto nyāvāti yathā tapati sūryaḥ | evā tvam indra vṛtrahann amuṃ mahyam ihā naya ||
śālālavaṃ saṃvananaṃ vanād vananam ābhṛtam | yena gayo gandharvo apsarasāṃ samavānayat | tenāham amuṃ mayi vānayāmy ā mṛtyor ā parāvataḥ ||
